40001001	Li‸ chi lehˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ leh Daˍviˆ ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ caˉ peuˬ teˇ caˉ ya‸ la ve awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40001002	-
40001011	Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Iˉcaˆ yoˬ. Iˉcaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Yaˍkoˆ yoˬ. Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ leh yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ. Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma Taˍmaˍ lo paw la ve Hpaˍrehˆ leh Seˍraˆ yoˬ. Hpaˍrehˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Heˍsaˍronˍ yoˬ. Heˍsaˍronˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍranˍ yoˬ. Aˍranˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍmiˆnaˍdaˆ yoˬ. Aˍmiˆnaˍdaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Naˍsonˍ yoˬ. Naˍsonˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Saˍlaˍmonˍ yoˬ. Saˍlaˍmonˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma Raˍhkaˆ lo paw la ve Bawˇzaˆ yoˬ. Bawˇzaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma Ruˉhtaˆ lo paw la ve Awˇbehˆ yoˬ. Awˇbehˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Yeˍsehˇ yoˬ. Yeˍsehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Daˍviˆ yoˬ. Daˍviˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ, Uˇriˇya‸ ve awˬ miˇ ma hpeh‸ jaw ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ lo paw la ve Sawˉla‸monˍ yoˬ. Sawˉla‸monˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Rawˇbaoˍ yoˬ. Rawˇbaoˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍbiˉya‸ yoˬ. Aˍbiˉya‸ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍsaˆ yoˬ. Aˍsaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Yawˇsaˍhpaˆ yoˬ. Yawˇsaˍhpaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Yaˍhawˇranˍ yoˬ. Yaˍhawˇranˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Awˇsiˆ yoˬ. Awˇsiˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Yoˇtanˍ yoˬ. Yoˇtanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍhkaˆ yoˬ, Aˍhkaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Heˍsaˍkiˆ yoˬ. Heˍsaˍkiˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Maˍnaˍseˍ yoˬ. Maˍnaˍseˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍmonˍ yoˬ. Aˍmonˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Yoˇsiˆ yoˬ. Yoˇsiˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Baˍbuˍlonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo shu yuˬ k'ai ve teˇ co-e htaˇ, Yeˍhkawˇniˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui yoˬ.
40001012	-
40001016	Baˍbuˍlonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo shu yawˇ hui hta‸ yuˬ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍhkawˇniˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Saˍlaˍteˍlaˆ yoˬ. Saˍlaˍteˍlaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Seˍruˇbeˍlaˆ yoˬ. Seˍruˇbeˍlaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍbiˉoˆ yoˬ. Aˍbiˉoˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Eˇlaˍkenˍ yoˬ. Eˇlaˍkenˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍcawˍ yoˬ. Aˍcawˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Saˍdoˆ yoˬ. Saˍdoˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Aˍhkeˍ yoˬ. Aˍhkeˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Eˇliˍoˆ yoˬ. Eˇliˍoˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Eˇlaˍsaˍ yoˬ. Eˇlaˍsaˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Maˍhtanˍ yoˬ. Maˍhtanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ Yaˍkoˆ yoˬ. Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ yaˇ lehˬ, Maˍriˆ ve awˬ hpawˇ Yoˇseh‸ yoˬ. Maˍriˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ paw la piˇ ve yoˬ.
40001017	Hk'e te leh, Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ tanˬ leh Daˍviˆ ve awˬ co-e hk'a gaˬ, teˇ chi awˇ co-e cawˬ ve yoˬ. Daˍviˆ hta‸ tanˬ leh Baˍbuˍlonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo shu yuˬ k'ai ve awˬ co-e hk'a gaˬ, teˇ chi awˇ co-e cawˬ ve yoˬ. Baˍbuˍlonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo shu yuˬ k'ai ve hta‸ tanˬ leh Hkri‸ ve awˬ co-e hk'a gaˬ, teˇ chi awˇ co-e cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40001018	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ paw la ve awˬ lawn lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ lehˬ, Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ heuˆ tuˬ ka ti‸ te da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ maˇ heuˆ da‸ sheˍ htaˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw Maˍriˆ yaˇ hu la ve yoˬ.
40001019	Yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ Yoˇseh‸ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh Maˍriˆ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ maˇ luˬ piˇ gaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ ta‸ iˉ baˬ taˉ tuˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40001020	Yawˇ chi hk'e dawˇ nyi chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, zuh‸ maˆ mawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la leh k'oˆ ve, Daˍviˆ ve yaˇ Yoˇseh‸-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ miˇ ma Maˍriˆ hta‸ heuˆ tuˬ taˇ dawˇ haˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ yaˇ hu ve lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
40001021	Yawˇ yaˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ paw la tuˬ leh, nawˬ yawˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ teh‸ g'a meh piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40001022	Chi hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
40001023	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ. Yaˇ miˇ haˉ teˇ g'aˇ yaˇ hu la leh yaˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ paw la tuˬ yoˬ. Yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ Eˇmaˍno-eˍlaˆ meh piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. (Eˇmaˍno-eˍlaˆ k'oˆ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui geh chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
40001024	Yoˇseh‸ zuh‸ nawˇ la htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te leh, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ heuˆ ve yoˬ.
40001025	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yaˇ paˍ maˇ paw la sheˍ ve ceh ceh yawˇ geh maˇ zuh‸. Yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve paw la leh yawˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ teh‸ meh piˇ ve yoˬ.
40002001	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ Behˍ lehˍhehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ paw la ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ hpawˇ lo tu la leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
40002002	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Paw la peuˬ ve Yuˇda‸ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hk'aˬ lo le. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ hpawˇ lo yawˇ ve meu‸ keu shiˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ ngaˬ hui laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40002003	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ tawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ka‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ yaˇ hk'a peuˍeˬ ka‸ dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40002004	Yuˇda‸ chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo paw hkuˇ lonˉ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ kuˬ hpawnˬ peuˬ leh, Hkri‸ hk'aˬ lo paw la tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40002005	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ Behˍlehˍhehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo paw la tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e,
40002006	Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ Behˍlehˍhehnˍ venˇ-oˬ, Yuˇda‸ jawˇ mawˇ hui ve venˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ lehˬ shu a‸ kehˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ i ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hta‸ sheh k'ai tuˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40002007	Oˇ htaˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ hui hta‸ ta‸ iˉ kuˬ yuˬ leh, meu‸ keu shiˍ tawˆ la ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40002008	Hk'e te leh, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui k'ai leh yaˇ paˍ ehˉ oˇ ve hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ca nyi-o. Yawˇ hta‸ mawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ g'a pui tuˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ Behˍlehˍhehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
40002009	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ hpawˇ lo yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve meu‸ keu shiˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai leh, yaˇ paˍ ehˉ chehˇ taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo gaˬ htaˇ, jehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40002010	Meu‸ keu shiˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui maˇ maˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40002011	Yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e htaˇ, awˬ e Maˍriˆ geh yaˇ paˍ ehˉ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ hui boˆ sheˬ leh yaˇ paˍ ehˉ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yuˬ laˬ taˍ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ tawˆ leh, shi, lawˇbanˍ, leh muˇraˍ, la‸ shawnˍ chi teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40002012	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ geh maˇ g'a k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ, zuh‸ maˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui lehˬ yawˇ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ya‸ k'aw teˇ caˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
40002013	Yawˇ hui k'o‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, zuh‸ maˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Yoˇseh‸ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Tu loˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ leh yawˇ ve awˬ e hta‸ shiˍ veu leh Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo hpaw-e loˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ ca tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40002014	Oˇ htaˇ Yoˇseh‸ tu leh, yaˇ ehˉ leh yawˇ ve awˬ e hta‸ tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ shiˍ veu leh Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
40002015	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn chi lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la tuˬ ngaˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ ngaˬ kuˬ yuˬ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
40002016	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ hui yawˇ hta‸ heˍ laˇ ve teh‸ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na nyi peuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ yawˇ shawˍ nyi leh, Behˍlehˍhehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo leh awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo hk'a chehˇ ve a sha‸ nyiˇ hk'aw‸ te leh awˬ hawˉ ve hawˉ hk'aˆ paˍ ehˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ca tiˇ pehˍ tcuh ve yoˬ.
40002017	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Yeˍraˍmiˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la ve yoˬ.
40002018	Raˍmaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo, paˆ hawˬ kehˇ hawˬ ve awˬ hkawˇ leh dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Raˍhkeˍlaˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw hawˬ chehˇ leh, yawˇ yaˇ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ ve pa taw, shu yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma sha la tuˬ te maˇ g'a, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40002019	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ suh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yoˇseh‸ Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ zuh‸ maˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40002020	Tu loˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ leh yawˇ ve awˬ e hta‸ shiˍ veu leh Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'o‸-e loˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca ve chaw hui suh peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40002021	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ tu leh, yaˇ ehˉ leh yawˇ ve awˬ e hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
40002022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Aˍhkeˍlaˆ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ pa jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ yuˬ leh Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ chehˇ ve awˬ lawn Yoˇseh‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ kawˆ leh oˇ kaˬ lo k'o‸-e maˇ haˆ. Zuh‸ maˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ maˍ piˇ leh, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'ai leh, Naˍzaˍrehˆ meh ve venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ca chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40002023	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ hta‸ Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la ve yoˬ.
40003001	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ tawˆ la leh k'oˆ ve,
40003002	Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve pa taw, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ loˬ teh‸, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo yawˇ bon maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40003003	Tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve lehˬ, Heh puiˉ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ gu taˍ loˬ. Yawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ te-o, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40003004	Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, kaˍlaˍoˆ awˬ mvuh te taˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, yawˇ ve caw‸ cehˍ nyi lo shaˍ guiˬ haˍ pi caˆ tsuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve caˇ tuˬ lehˬ, paˉ ce‸ leh heh puiˉ hk'aw ve pehˇ g'uiˬ yoˬ.
40003005	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ yaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ leh, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma awˬ paˇ awˬ kui hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40003006	Yawˇ hui a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ leh, Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40003007	Baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ tuˬ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ leh Saˍduˆkehˇ chaw hui maˇ maˇ yawˇ geh laˬ ve hta‸ Yoˇhanˬ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Vuiˬ haiˬ awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, gaˬ la tuˬ ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ tuˬ, a shu nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve le.
40003008	Venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la-o.
40003009	Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw taˇ ca dawˇ, taˇ ca k'oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ haˉ pui shiˍ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tawˆ la hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40003010	Chi beu‸ ka‸, suhˆ cehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ lo ceˉ ceˇ teh taˍ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ ve awˬ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ le le hta‸ htu baˬ leh aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ.
40003011	Nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve awˬ pon, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ a‸ kehˉ kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve hkuiˉ nuˆ hta‸ yuˬ shi tuˬ ve ceh ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40003012	Yawˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo caˬ hpeuˇ tuˬ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve caˬ jaw‸ kuiˬ hta‸ kehˬ lehˍ shiˆ baˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, caˬ shiˍ hta‸ caˬ ciˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shaw pfuhˇ keu tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, caˬ cuˉ hta‸ maˇ suh puiˉ ve aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tuˉ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yoˇhanˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40003013	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ tuˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw tawˆ la leh, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma lo Yoˇhanˬ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
40003014	Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ geh baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ngaˬ geh laˬ ve laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40003015	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˆ ve, Chi beu‸ a ciˉ te laˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ liˇ hk'a peu-eˬ biˇ la tuˬ ngaˬ hui te cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40003016	Yeˍsuˆ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ leh iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ cawˬ haˉ tawˆ la htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hpaw taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, aˉ pui k'aˍ hk'e ya‸ la leh yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ lo mui la ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40003017	Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, ngaˬ ha‸ jaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40004001	Oˇ htaˇ, neˇ haiˬ beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hta‸ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40004002	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, awˇ chi nyi awˇ chi haˉ caˇ tuˬ maˇ caˇ leh chehˇ peuˬ heh‸, awˍ meu‸ la ve yoˬ.
40004003	Oˇ htaˇ beˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve k'o, haˉ pui shiˍ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hkaoˍ monˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ tawˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004004	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Chaw yaˇ lehˬ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ g'a te‸ ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve maw‸ k'aw hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ le le hta‸ pa taw g'a te‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40004005	Oˇ htaˇ neˇ haiˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ da‸ kehˬ ve venˇ lo shiˍ k'ai leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ ve awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ lo yawˇ hta‸ teh taˍ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40004006	Nawˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve k'o, pawˆ ce hk'a. Awˬ lawn k'o, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ve hkui sheh haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a heuˆ tuˬ, yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004007	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Li‸ hpu hk'aw teˇ kaˬ bvuh‸ taˍ sheˍ ve lehˬ, Nawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ nawˬ maˇ g'a beˬ maˇ g'a lawˇ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004008	Teˇ pawˆ neˇ haiˬ yawˇ hta‸ mvuh jaˇ ve hk'aw teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ leh mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ yawˇ hta‸ maw piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
40004009	Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh oˉ k'oˍ pui laˇ ve k'o, chi hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004010	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Saˍtanˍ-oˬ, k'ai loˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Nawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ceh tiˉ nawˬ oˉ k'oˍ g'a pui leh, yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ ceh tiˉ nawˬ g'a te ve yoˬ, teh‸ li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40004011	Oˇ htaˇ neˇ haiˬ yawˇ geh tawˆ k'ai leh, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ caˍ piˇ taw piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004012	Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ shu hpeh yuˬ ve awˬ lawn Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
40004013	Yawˇ Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai leh, Zaˍbuˆlonˍ leh Naˍtaˍliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ kaˍ lo, g'uiˬ po paˇ cawˬ ve Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ hk'aw gaˬ leh oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40004014	Chi lehˬ, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ biˇ la piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004015	Zaˍbuˆlonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Naˍtaˍliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ g'uiˬ po paˇ lo k'ai ve ya‸ k'aw, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui chehˇ kuiˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ-oˬ,
40004016	naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ ba jaˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ. Suh ve mvuhˇ miˬ leh suh ve aˉ g'uiˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon awˬ g'euˆ ba tawˆ la peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40004017	Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ka‸ te leh, Yeˍsuˆ bon tanˬ maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve pa taw, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ loˬ teh‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004018	Gaˍliˍlehˇ g'uiˬ po paˇ lo Yeˍsuˆ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Anˍdrehˍ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi nyiˇ g'aˇ, g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo geu‸ hpehˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ ngaˇ ca paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40004019	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸. Ngaˬ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ chaw ca shehˍ hpaˇ te tcuh laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004020	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ geu‸ hta‸ teh taˉ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40004021	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'aw‸ k'ai htaˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi nyiˇ g'aˇ, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ Yaˍkoˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, awˬ pa Zeˍbeˍdehˇ geh haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw yawˇ hui ve geu‸ gu tawˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
40004022	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ htawˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ haw lo‸ k'oˍ leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve awˬ pa hta‸ teh taˉ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40004023	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo k'ai leh yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ htawˇ, teˇ kaˬ le le lo ca maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve a naˍ teˇ ceuˬ le le leh naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004024	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn Suˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, a naˍ laiˉ ceuˬ naˬ chehˇ gawˬ chehˇ ve chaw, neˇ geh ve chaw, paw‸ hpeuˆ ve chaw, hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw, chaw naˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ geh yuˬ laˬ leh yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40004025	Hk'e te leh Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ, Deˍkaˍpawˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ leh, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ lo laˬ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40005001	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo yawˇ taˆ-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ mui taˍ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
40005002	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ leh awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
40005003	Nyi ma hk'aw haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40005004	Dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hta‸ nyi ma sha la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005005	Nyi ma nuˇ nuˇ nehˬ nehˬ cawˬ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ lehˬ yawˇ hui g'a tuˬ ve awˬ shinˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40005006	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ meu‸ ve kaˆ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui g'a caˇ bvuhˆ dawˬ bvuhˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005007	Ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hta‸ shu k'aw‸ ha k'aˉ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005008	Nyi ma hk'aw hpu ve kehˬ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005009	Cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ tuˬ te ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ teh‸ shu k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005010	Hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ te ve pa taw fawˉ ve mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40005011	Ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw shu nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ ve, fawˉ mehˍ ve, heˍ leh nawˬ hui awˬ lawn haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
40005012	Ha lehˬ ve hk'a biˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui ve la‸ shawnˍ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ tawˆ la peuˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hta‸ htawˇ shu oˇ hk'e te fawˉ mehˍ jaw ve yoˬ.
40005013	Nawˬ hui lehˬ miˬ guiˬ ve aˉ leh‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Aˉ leh‸ lehˬ mehˬ ve pehˆ k'ai peuˬ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te k'aw‸ mehˬ la hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Aˉ leh‸ oˇ ve awˬ bon maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ ve pa taw, shu yuˬ baˬ leh, chaw yaˇ naˆ toˇ ve ceh tiˉ yoˬ.
40005014	Nawˬ hui lehˬ miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve venˇ hta‸ faˉ taˍ maˇ g'a.
40005015	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, kawˆ faiˇ tuˉ leh hk'awˍ lawˇ tcuhˍ mvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ te jaw. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, mvuh kuiˬ lo taˍ ve yoˬ.
40005016	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui htawˇ awˬ g'euˆ ba piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve da‸ ve kanˉ hta‸ shu g'a mawˬ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve naw hui ve Awˬ pa hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005017	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve teh‸ taˇ dawˇ. Te luˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Te biˇ la tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
40005018	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, miˬ guiˬ mvuhˇ naw ma maˇ luˬ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, hk'a peu-eˬ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo li‸ mehˆ ehˉ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ maiˉ ehˉ maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ maˬ ka‸ maˇ luˬ maˇ mehˉ taˬ.
40005019	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo i jaˇ ve teˇ maˬ maˬ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to ka‸ maˇ te leh, shu ka‸ maˇ te tuˬ maˍ piˇ ve chaw lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo shu a‸ kehˉ i ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ awˬ to ka‸ te leh, shu ka‸ te tuˬ maˍ piˇ ve chaw lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo uiˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005020	Awˬ lawn k'o, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui a‸ kehˉ nawˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ leuˉ ve k'o, nawˬ hui mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e taˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40005021	Aˬ sho-eˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ. Shu hta‸ nawˬ maˇ g'a tiˇ pehˍ. Shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve chaw lehˬ, suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
40005022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ ve chaw lehˬ, suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve chaw lehˬ, jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ hkeu ve chaw lehˬ, moˬ naˆ ho‸ aˬ miˍ hk'aw g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
40005023	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ ve tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ tanˇ kuiˬ lo yuˬ laˬ htaˇ, nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi nawˬ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ dawˇ nawˇ ve k'o,
40005024	tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ teh taˉ leh k'o‸-e sheˍ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ nawˬ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ taˉ peuˬ heh‸, k'aw‸ laˬ leh tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ yuˬ tanˇ loˬ.
40005025	Nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ te ve chaw geh teˇ geh shaˉ nanˉ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, nawˬ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ tuˬ haˆ haˆ te loˬ. Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ lehˬ suhˉ taˆ shehˍ hpaˇ la‸ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Suhˉ taˆ shehˍ hpaˇ htawˇ nawˬ hta‸ htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ la‸ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ leh, nawˬ hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw keu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40005026	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, peh‸ shanˍ awˬ leh teˇ peh‸ hk'a gaˬ maˇ shaiˍ peuˬ ve ceh ceh, htawnˍ hk'aw lo nawˬ maˇ g'a tawˆ k'ai taˬ.
40005027	Nawˬ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ maˇ g'a te teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
40005028	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, yaˇ miˇ hta‸ nyi leh peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te peuˬ.
40005029	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ la‸ sha paˉ ve mehˆ shiˍ nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, mehˆ shiˍ oˇ ve hta‸ k'ehˉ baˬ sheˍ. Awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ, awˬ hk'eun teˇ maˬ luˬ k'ai ve lehˬ da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
40005030	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, la‸ sha paˉ ve la‸ sheh htawˇ nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, la‸ sheh oˇ ve hta‸ tawˆ baˬ-o‸. Awˬ to teˇ to hk'a peu-eˬ moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ, awˬ hk'eun teˇ maˬ luˬ k'ai ve lehˬ da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
40005031	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ ve k'o, baˬ da‸ ve li‸ teˇ k'oˆ yawˇ hta‸ g'a piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
40005032	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ lawn hta‸ pa taw a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te tcuh ve yoˬ. Shu baˬ taˍ ve yaˇ miˇ hta‸ ca heuˆ ve chaw htawˇ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve yoˬ.
40005033	Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve hta‸ nawˬ maˇ g'a hkanˍ. Nawˬ hkanˍ taˍ ve hk'e Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ g'a te ve yoˬ teh‸, aˬ sho-eˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
40005034	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, a ciˉ ka‸ taˇ hkanˍ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ cuˇ leh taˇ hkanˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve k'aw jaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40005035	Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh taˇ hkanˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve hkui sheh taˍ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh taˇ hkanˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lonˉ ve venˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40005036	Nawˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh taˇ hkanˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ lehˬ uˉ hkeh mvuh teˇ mvuh hpu la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, naˆ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ te maˇ g'a.
40005037	Nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, yoˬ k'o yoˬ, maˇ heˆ k'o maˇ heˆ teh‸ ceh tiˉ k'oˆ loˬ. Chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haiˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40005038	Shu nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ teˇ shiˍ hta‸ te luˬ laˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ teˇ shiˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ te luˬ piˇ leh, shu nawˬ ve ciˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ te hk'eh‸ laˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve ciˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ te hk'eh‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
40005039	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ laˇ ve chaw hta‸ taˇ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ. Nawˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ mehˆ hpfuhˇ diˬ hta‸ shu hta laˇ ve k'o, la‸ mehˍ paˉ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ hk'o piˇ sheˍ.
40005040	Shu nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ te leh aˉ po‸ yuˬ gaˇ ve k'o, aˉ po‸ lonˉ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ piˇ sheˍ.
40005041	Shu nawˬ hta‸ nyiˉ leh ya‸ k'aw teˇ laˆ k'ai tcuh laˇ ve k'o, yawˇ geh nyiˇ laˆ k'ai-o
40005042	Lawˬ ve chaw hta‸ piˇ-oˆ. Chiˇ gaˇ ngaˍ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ htawˇ, taˇ hpfuhˆ k'ai.
40005043	A shu yawˇ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ ha‸ leh, a shu yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ hta‸ canˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
40005044	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon bon lawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
40005045	Nawˬ hui chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui Awˬ pa ve yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Aw lawn k'o, chaw haiˬ leh chaw da‸ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ ve mvuhˇ nyi hta‸ yawˇ tawˆ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve chaw leh maˇ hteˇ ve chaw awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ mvuhˇ yeˬ laˬ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
40005046	Nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw hui hta‸ ceh k'aw‸ ha‸ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le. Awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ hui ka‸ chi hk'e te chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40005047	Nawˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ ceh awˬ chawˇ te leh na‸ uˉ te da‸ ve k'o, shu te ve a‸ kehˉ nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma te leuˉ ve le. Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ka‸ chi hk'e te ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40005048	Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ ve Awˬ pa biˇ ve hk'a shuˍshuˍ nawˬ hui htawˇ biˇ la piˇ-oˆ.
40006001	Shu g'a mawˬ tuˬ awˬ pon chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ da‸ ve kanˉ maˇ g'a te tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Maˇ heˆ k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve Awˬ pa geh nawˬ awˬ bon maˇ g'a.
40006002	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ shu hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh tanˇ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, heˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui hk'e taˇ te. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, shu chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh laˇ tuˬ, bon yehˬ hk'aw maˇ k'oˆ, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo maˇ k'oˆ, behˬ heh ma meuˆ tcuh ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a peuˬ.
40006003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ shu hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh tanˇ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, shu maˇ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, nawˬ la‸ sha paˉ te ve kanˉ la‸ mehˍ paˉ hta‸ taˇ shiˍ piˇ
40006004	Shu maˇ mawˬ kuiˬ lo mawˬ puiˉ ve nawˬ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40006005	Nawˬ bon lawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, heˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui hk'e taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ shu g'a mawˬ tuˬ, bon yehˬ hk'aw maˇ k'oˆ, ya‸ k'aw ceh lo maˇ k'oˆ, huˉ taˍ leh bon lawˬ gaˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a peuˬ.
40006006	Nawˬ bon lawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ ve bawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh yehˬ miˉ hta‸ hoˆ peuˬ htaˇ heh‸, baˬ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve nawˬ ve Awˬ pa hta‸ lawˬ-o‸. Baˬ kuiˬ lo mawˬ puiˉ ve nawˬ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40006007	Nawˬ hui bon lawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hk'e taˇ te. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ peuˬ teˇ pawˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui tawˇ maˇ maˇ yaw ve pa taw yawˇ hui bon lawˬ ve hk'e biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
40006008	Yawˇ hui hk'e taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui loˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ lawˬ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa shiˍ taˍ peuˬ.
40006009	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui bon chi hk'e lawˬ-o‸. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ yawˆ yan te piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
40006010	Nawˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ gaˬ la piˇ-oˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo nawˬ ve a loˍ biˇ ve hk'e, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ htawˇ biˇ la piˇ-oˆ.
40006011	Ya‸ nyi loˍ ve caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, ya‸ nyi ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ.
40006012	Shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ te ya‸ laˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ ngaˬ hui hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ htawˇ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ-oˆ.
40006013	Venˇ baˆ beˬ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ hui hta‸ taˇ k'ai piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, haiˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ miˬ, kanˇ paˆ leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a peu-eˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ nawˬ ve yoˬ. A menˬ.
40006014	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui shu ve ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ hta‸ htawˇ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40006015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ shu ve ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ hpehˇ hk'a k'o, nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa htawˇ, nawˬ hui ve ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ hpehˇ.
40006016	Nawˬ hui caˇ tuˬ ce ve teˇ yanˇ, heˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui hk'e mehˆ hpfuhˇ nawˍ tiˆ taˇ te. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce ve hta‸ shu g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, yawˇ hui mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nyi maˇ sha tuˬ te taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a peuˬ.
40006017	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ caˇ tuˬ ce htaˇ, oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ naˍ manˇ shehˍ leh mehˆ hpfuhˇ tsuhˇ-oˆ.
40006018	Chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui caˇ tuˬ ce ve hta‸ shu maˇ mawˬ maˇ shiˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu maˇ mawˬ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve nawˬ ve Awˬ pa mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, shu maˇ mawˬ kuiˬ lo mawˬ puiˉ ve nawˬ ve Awˬ pa htawˇ, nawˬ hta‸ awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40006019	Chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ taˇ shaw hpoˆ taˍ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo shaw hpoˆ ve k'o, yawˇ taˆ puiˉ ve, pfuhˇ caˇ puiˉ ve leh chaw hk'awˇ hk'awˇ yuˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
40006020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ shaw hpoˆ taˍ loˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ maˇ taˆ puiˉ, pfuhˇ maˇ caˇ puiˉ leh chaw hk'awˇ hk'awˇ yuˬ maˇ g'a.
40006021	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ shaw hpoˆ taˍ ve teˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ ve nyi ma htawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40006022	Mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, awˬ to ve kawˆ faiˇ yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, mehˆ shiˍ nyi leh shu hta‸ maˇ chaweh piˇ gaˇ ve k'o, awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ g'euˆ hk'a deh‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40006023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ mehˆ shiˍ nyi leh maˇ piˇ gaˇ ve k'o, awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ naˆ ho‸ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ lehˬ naˆ ho‸ k'ai ve k'o, naˆ ho‸ ve oˇ ve lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40006024	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ jawˇ mawˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ceˬ te maˇ g'a. Awˬ lawn k'o, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ canˇ k'o, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ha‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan k'o, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ ka‸, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ ve awˬ ceˬ ka‸, teˇ pawˆ tiˉ teˇ geh te maˇ g'a.
40006025	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ tuˬ, nawˬ hui a sha‸ te‸ ve awˬ pon taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ. Hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a veu‸ g'a deh tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ to awˬ pon ka‸ taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ. A sha‸ te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ a‸ kehˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ leh, awˬ to htawˇ veu‸ k'aˇ a‸ kehˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40006026	Mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ toˇ ve ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi-o. Yawˇ hui lehˬ caˬ maˇ ti, caˬ maˇ g'eu‸ leh caˬ ciˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo caˬ shiˍ maˇ pfuhˇ keu. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ caˍ piˇ taw piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˆ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40006027	Dawˇ hkiˉ ve pa taw, a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ teˇ jaˆ k'aw‸ zuhˬ la tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ te g'a ve le.
40006028	Veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ pon nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te dawˇ hkiˉ ve le. Heh puiˉ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve shiˍ ya‸ veˆ hk'aˬ hk'e te uiˍ la ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o. Awˬ cehˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, kanˉ maˇ te, hkeh ka‸ maˇ g'awˬ.
40006029	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve jawˇ mawˇ Sawˉla‸monˍ lehˬ, awˬ cehˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ cehˬ hk'e taw ka‸ maˇ g'a veu‸ maˇ g'a deh jaw teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40006030	Hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ya‸ nyi te‸ chehˇ leh shawˉ pawˍ aˬ miˍ hk'aw baˬ keu tuˬ ve mvuh‸ cehˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha chi taw taw feuˉ piˇ deh piˇ ve k'o, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ feuˉ laˇ deh laˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40006031	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e g'a caˇ tuˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e g'a dawˬ tuˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e g'a veu‸ g'a deh tuˬ, taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ.
40006032	Awˬ lawn k'o, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui loˍ ve hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40006033	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ leh yawˇ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ ca-o. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ htehˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40006034	Hk'e te leh, shawˉ pawˍ awˬ pon taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ. Awˬ lawn k'o, shawˉ pawˍ awˬ pon shawˉ pawˍ dawˇ hkiˉ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Teˇ nyi pon teˇ nyi dawˇ haˍ tuˬ cawˬ ve lehˬ law‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40007001	Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ maˇ g'a taˍ tuˬ, nawˬ hui shu hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˇ taˍ.
40007002	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui shu hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ k'aw‸ taˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui shu hta‸ tsuh piˇ kawˬ piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ tsuh laˇ kawˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007003	Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve toˉ la‸ lonˉ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ nyi leh, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍve mehˆ puˉ hta‸ nawˬ nyi chehˇ ve le.
40007004	Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo toˉ la‸ lonˉ cawˬ taˍ ve ka‸, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸, Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve mehˆ puˉ hta‸ ngaˬ yuˬ tawˆ laˇ shaˍ teh‸ ca k'oˆ ve le.
40007005	Heˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui-oˬ, nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve toˉ la‸ lonˉ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ yuˬ tawˆ sheˍ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw cawˬ taˍ ve mehˆ puˉ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te yuˬ tawˆ tuˬ nawˬ hk'a deh‸ mawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007006	Da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpuiˇ hta‸ taˇ piˇ. Piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ va‸ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ taˇ ca baˬ teh taˍ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui naˆ taˍ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ che‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007007	Lawˬ loˬ. Lawˬ k'o g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Ca loˬ. Ca k'o mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ hta‸ htawˆ loˬ. Htawˆ k'o hpaw laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007008	Awˬ lawn k'o, lawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Ca ve chaw htawˇ, mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ hta‸ htawˆ ve chaw awˬ pon htawˇ, yehˬ miˉ hpaw laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007009	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo a shu teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ caˇ tuˬ lawˬ ve k'o, haˉ pui shiˍ yuˬ piˇ tuˬ laˇ.
40007010	Ngaˇ lawˬ ve k'o, vuiˬ hta‸ yuˬ piˇ tuˬ laˇ.
40007011	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chaw haiˬ hpeh‸ ve ka‸ a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ hta‸ da‸ ve mawˇ piˇ hkawˇ shiˍ ve k'o, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa geh hk'a lawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40007012	Hk'e te leh, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ te laˇ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui shu hta‸ oˇ hk'e te piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hk'aˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40007013	Maˇ k'oˍ ve yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ hta‸ lo‸-e loˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, luˬ kuiˬ lo k'ai ve ya‸ k'aw lehˬ k'ehˬ jaˇ leh, yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ ka‸ k'oˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo lo‸-e ve chaw ka‸ maˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40007014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, a sha‸ te‸ kuiˬ lo lo‸-e ve yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ lehˬ, maˇ k'oˍ leh, ya‸ k'aw ka‸ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ca mawˬ leh lo‸-e ve chaw a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40007015	Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ yawˇ hui haiˬ jaˇ ve veˬ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, yawˬ awˬ guiˬ k'uˉ hta‸ deh leh nawˬ hui geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
40007016	Yawˇ hui ve awˬ shiˍ hta‸ nyi k'o, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Aˉ chuˇ cehˬ lo a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ hta‸ g'a shaˉ jaw laˇ. Aˉ chuˇ buiˇ lo maˉ nawˆ shiˍ hta‸ g'a shaˉ jaw laˇ.
40007017	Da‸ ve awˬ cehˬ lehˬ, da‸ ve aw shiˍ naw‸ ve yoˬ. Maˇ da‸ ve awˬ cehˬ lehˬ, maˇ da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ ve yoˬ.
40007018	Da‸ ve awˬ cehˬ lehˬ, maˇ da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ puiˉ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ da‸ ve awˬ cehˬ lehˬ, da‸ve awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ puiˉ.
40007019	Da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ ve awˬ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ le le hta‸ htu baˬ leh aˬ miˍ hk'aw baˬ keu ve yoˬ.
40007020	Hk'e te leh chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ shiˍ hta‸ nyi k'o, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007021	Ngaˬ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ teh‸ hk'a k'oˆ laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'a le le lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve a loˍ hta‸ te ve chaw ceh tiˉ g'a lo‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
40007022	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ nawˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo bon maˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Nawˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ haiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ leh, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve laiˉ ceuˬ te peuˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸, chaw maˇ maˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007023	Yawˇ hui oˇ hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve chaw hui-oˬ, ngaˬ geh tawˆ k'ai loˬ teh‸, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40007024	Ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a kaˇ leh na yuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, haˉ pui hk'oˆ lo yehˬ te ve cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40007025	Mvuhˇ yeˬ laˬ leh iˉ kaˆ uiˍ taˆ la ve, mvuhˇ haw meuˆ leh yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ htinˍ ve htawˇ, haˉ pui hk'oˆ lo te taˍ ve pa taw, yehˬ oˇ ve maˇ paiˍ.
40007026	Ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ leh maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, shehˇ shiˍ hk'oˆ yehˬ te ve cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40007027	Mvuhˇ yeˬ laˬ leh iˉ kaˆ uiˍ taˆ la ve, mvuhˇ haw meuˆ leh yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ htinˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yehˬ oˇ ve paiˍ ve yoˬ. Paiˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40007028	Yeˍsuˆ bon maˍ peuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ maˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40007029	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui ve li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui hk'e yawˇ maˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Kanˇ paˆ cawˬ paˍ hk'e yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008001	Yeˍsuˆ hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40008002	Oˇ htaˇ, hkiˬ tu‸ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ te gaˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ nawˬ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008003	Yeˍsuˆ la‸ sheh che leh yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ te gaˇ ve yoˬ. Da‸ la kehˬ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ cawˬ haˉ hkiˬ tu‸ a naˍ mehˉ k'ai leh, yawˇ da‸ la kehˬ la ve yoˬ.
40008004	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ lawn chi chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ taˇ hto piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, k'ai leh paw hkuˇ hta‸ nawˬ awˬ to ca maw piˇ-oˆ. Shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ, Moˉseˍ awˬ liˇ teh taˍ ve hk'e tanˇ tuˬ ca tanˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008005	Yeˍsuˆ Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e htaˇ ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ leh k'oˆ ve,
40008006	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh leh aˉ hk'aw lo zuh‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008007	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40008008	Oˇ htaˇ, ma‸ poˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve yehˬ hk'aw nawˬ lo‸ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ceh tiˉ yaw ve ka‸, ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ na-e la tuˬ yoˬ.
40008009	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ shu ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ leh, ngaˬ awˬ hawˉ lo ka‸ ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, K'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ paˍ hta‸ htawˇ, Chi hta‸ te-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ te ve yoˬ teh‸, ma‸ poˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008010	Tawˇ chi hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ yawˇ anˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, Iˉsaˍ-reˍlaˆ chaw awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸ chi taw taw yonˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ g'a mawˬ jaw sheˍ.
40008011	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ hpawˇ mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ laˬ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Aˍbraˍhanˍ, Iˉcaˆ, Yaˍkoˆ hui geh hk'a geh g'a mui caˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40008012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ naˆ ho‸ kuiˬ lo yuˬ baˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hui hawˬ leh ciˬ geu‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008013	Yeˍsuˆ ma‸ poˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ k'o‸-e loˬ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve hk'e nawˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ teˇ hkui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve na-e la ve yoˬ.
40008014	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ ve yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ awˬ miˇ ma ve awˬ e kaˆ naˬ leh zuh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40008015	Yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ leh, kaˆ naˬ ve na-e la ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ tu leh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ te caˍ te taw piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008016	Mehˆ muiˉ naˆ la htaˇ, neˇ geh ve chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ shu Yeˍsuˆ geh shiˍ laˬ leh, yawˇ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˬ ceh tiˉ yaw leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw naˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008017	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, Yawˇ awˬ to ngaˬ hui ve g'aˇ nuˇ shaˉ nuˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ taˆ leh, ngaˬ hui ve naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ pfuhˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e biˇ la tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
40008018	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ hta,ˇ G'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo hkanˍ k'ai-a veuˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008019	Oˇ htaˇ li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ hk'aˬ lo k'ai ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008020	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve, Heh hpuiˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ k'oˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, zuh‸ kuiˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, oˉ k'oˍ taˍ kuiˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008021	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ pa hta‸ awˉ lawˉ ca tuˍ piˇ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ a ciˉ pe‸ laˇ sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40008022	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸. Chaw suh teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui chaw suh hta‸ tuˍ piˇ lawˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40008023	Yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40008024	Oˇ htaˇ, g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ la ve pa taw, g'uiˬ baˇ teˇ hpaˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ hk'a beh hk'a beh k'ai chehˇ htawˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40008025	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca nawˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ hui g'a luˬ la yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008026	Yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te kawˆ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ tu la leh, mvuhˇ haw leh g'uiˬ po hta‸ deˇ piˇ htaˇ, ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40008027	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ anˇ jaˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw le. Mvuhˇ haw leh g'uiˬ po ka‸ yawˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve law teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40008028	G'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ Gaˍdaˍraˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ, chaw tuˍ hpfuh lo tawˆ la ve neˇ geh ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ caˬ jaˇ ve pa taw, ya‸ k'aw oˇ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ k'ai maˇ hpeh‸.
40008029	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ka‸ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ tuˬ nawˬ laˬ ve laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40008030	Oˇ teˇ hkui yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a cawˇ cawˇ vuiˇ ve teˇ kaˬ lo va‸ teˇ moˍ lonˉ k'aˆ caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40008031	Hk'e te leh, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ laˇ ve k'o, va‸ moˍ lonˉ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ lo‸-e tcuh laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008032	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸, K'ai loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui tawˆ-e leh, va‸ awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'aw lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, va‸ oˇ ve teˇ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ miˬ haˍ kuiˬ lo g'aˇ hte‸ g'uiˇ ya‸-e leh, g'uiˬ po hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh k'a suh peuˬ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40008033	Va‸ hawˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpaw-e leh venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Hk'a hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ leh, neˇ geh ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn yawˇ hui k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40008034	Venˇ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ tuˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai tuˬ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
40009001	Yeˍsuˆ haw lo‸ k'oˍ k'aw‸ ciˇ k'aw‸ la leh, yawˇ ve venˇ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
40009002	Oˇ htaˇ, zuh‸ kuiˬ hk'oˆ zuh‸ chehˇ ve hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shu yawˇ geh taˆ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yaˇ paˍ-oˬ, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009003	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Chi hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸, a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40009004	Yawˇ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ shiˍ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw lo maˇ da‸ ve hta‸ dawˇ chehˇ ve le.
40009005	Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ hkawˇ a ciˉ k'oˆ piˇ sha le. Nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve sha laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, Tu leh ya‸ k'aw toˇ k'ai loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve sha laˇ.
40009006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ peuˬ leh, hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Tu-o. Nawˬ ve zuh‸ kuiˬ hta‸ taˆ leh nawˬ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009007	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ tu leh yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
40009008	Oˇ ve hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui kawˆ leh, chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ chi hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009009	Yeˍsuˆ tu leh awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw kuiˬ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mui chehˇ ve Ma‸htehˍ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tu leh Yeˍsuˆ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40009010	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ hpui lawˇ paˇ mui caˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui maˇ maˇ laˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh teˇ geh mui caˇ ve yoˬ.
40009011	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui ve saˍ la‸ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui geh hk'a geh caˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40009012	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chehˇ sha ve chaw hui naˆ tsuhˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ maˇ loˍ. Naˬ ve chaw hui ceh tiˉ loˍ ve yoˬ.
40009013	Ngaˬ lehˬ tanˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ heuˆ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ, ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ ca henˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009014	Oˇ htaˇ, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ caˇ tuˬ ce chehˇ ve ka‸, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ caˇ tuˬ maˇ ce ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40009015	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, hkehˉ caˇ la ve chaw hui geh chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ chehˇ tuˬ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui geh yuˬ hpaˆ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce tuˬ yoˬ.
40009016	Veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ piˍ hta‸ hpa awˬ suhˉ a shu ka‸ maˇ nehˉ jaw. Oˇ hk'e nehˉ ve k'o, nehˉ taˍ ve hpa lehˬ veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ piˍ hta‸ g'awˬ leh leuˉ leh k'aw‸ tzuh‸ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40009017	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui awˬ piˍ awˬ hk'aw lo a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ a shu ka‸ maˇ keu jaw. Oˇ hk'e keu ve k'o, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui pe‸ hkoˇ ve pa taw, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ sheˆ leh, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui htawˇ luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui awˬ suhˉ awˬ hk'aw lo keu ve k'o, nyiˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ maˇ luˬ k'ai teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009018	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh k'oˆ ve, Chi teˇ hkui ngaˬ ve yaˇ miˇ suh peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ laˬ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ la‸ sheh taˍ piˇ la. Yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009019	Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ tu leh, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh chaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40009020	Oˇ htaˇ, teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ awˬ suhˍ ya‸ leh naˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ lo laˬ leh yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ awˬ caˍ hta‸ htawˇ ve yoˬ.
40009021	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ hta‸ ceh ngaˬ g'a htawˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ na-e la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ ve yoˬ.
40009022	Yeˍsuˆ hpfuhˆ nyi leh yawˇ hta‸ mawˬ htaˇ, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ na-e la piˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ teˇ hkui yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve na-e la ve yoˬ.
40009023	Bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ ve aˉ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ gaˬ la htaˇ, lehˉ lu meuˆ ve chaw hui leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40009024	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Tawˆ k'ai loˬ. Yaˇ miˇ ehˉ chi suh ve maˇ heˆ, yawˇ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ g'uiˬ ve yoˬ.
40009025	Yawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ tawˆ k'ai tcuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ lo‸-e leh yaˇ miˇ ehˉ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ yuˬ hk'a leh, yaˇ miˇ ehˉ tu la ve yoˬ.
40009026	Hk'e te leh awˬ lawn chi, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40009027	Yeˍsuˆ tu leh awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, mehˆ cuˉ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a‸ leh, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu -oˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ kuˬ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40009028	Yawˇ yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e htaˇ, mehˆ cuˉ paˍ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi hta‸ ngaˬ te puiˉ ve teh‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ yonˍ ve laˇ teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yonˍ ve yoˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009029	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ yawˇ htawˇ leh, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ yonˍ ve hk'e nawˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009030	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009031	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ tawˆ k'ai leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ pa taw mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw teˇ kaˬ le le lo Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ lawn bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40009032	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ tawˆ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, neˇ geh ve chaw k'aˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shu Yeˍsuˆ geh shiˍ veu laˇ ve yoˬ.
40009033	Neˇ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, chaw k'aˍ oˇ ve tawˇ yaw la ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ anˇ leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e ve teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40009034	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ neˇ jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40009035	Oˇ htaˇ, venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo Yeˍsuˆ k'ai leh, yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ leh G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. A naˍ teˇ ceuˬ le le leh naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40009036	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ yawˬ hawˉ paˍ maˇ cawˬ ve yawˬ hk'e nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ jaˇ leh awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ jaˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40009037	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Caˬ g'eu‸ tuˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve ka‸, g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hui a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40009038	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve caˬ g'eu‸ kuiˬ lo caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hui hta‸ peu laˇ tuˬ, Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ bon lawˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40010001	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ leh, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, a naˍ teˇ ceuˬ le le leh naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40010002	Tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ meh lehˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ, Peˍtruˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Anˍdrehˍ, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ leh Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Yoˇhanˬ,
40010003	Hpiˇliˇpuˆ leh Baˍhtawˇlaˍmehˇ, Htoˉma‸ leh awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ Ma‸htehˍ, Aˍlaˍhpehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ leh Htaˍdehˇ,
40010004	Hkaˍnaˍniˆ awˬ moˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw Siˉmonˍ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ hui yoˬ.
40010005	Tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'ai tcuh leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ chi hk'e tawˇ piˇ ve, Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo taˇ k'ai. Saˍmaˍriˆ venˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ taˇ lo‸-e.
40010006	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mehˉ k'ai peuˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh k'ai-o.
40010007	Nawˬ hui k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ peuˬ teh‸, bon maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
40010008	Naˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ-oˆ. Suh ve chaw hui hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ-oˆ. Hkiˬ tu‸ keuˆ ve chaw hui hta‸ da‸ la kehˬ la piˇ-oˆ. Neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ-o‸. Nawˬ hui hk'e leˇ g'a ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu hta‸ hk'e leˇ k'aw‸ piˇ-oˆ.
40010009	Nawˬ hui ve haˍ pi caˆ awˬ hk'aw lo, hpu, shi, peh‸ shanˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ doˆ veu.
40010010	Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ awˬ pon miˉ chaw leh aˉ po‸ nyiˇ hk'oˆ hta‸ ka‸, hkuiˉ nuˆ leh juˇ fuiˍ hta‸ ka‸, taˇ yuˬ k'ai. Awˬ lawn k'o, kanˉ te ve chaw lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hta‸ g'a cawˇ ve yoˬ.
40010011	Hk'aˬ ve teˇ venˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ hk'aˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lo‸-e ve maˇ k'oˆ, A shu keunˍ ve le teh‸ na nyi leh, hk'aˆ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui tawˆ k'ai htaˇ hk'a gaˬ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
40010012	Yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e htaˇ bon na‸ piˇ-oˆ.
40010013	Yehˬ oˇ ve keunˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ kaˬ lo cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ maˇ keunˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ ceuˬ nawˬ hui geh k'aw‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40010014	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ leh nawˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na ve k'o, yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui tawˆ k'ai htaˇ, hkui taw k'aw hta‸ ngawˉ taˍ ve je‸ meu-e hta‸ hpi baˬ taˉ-oˆ.
40010015	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ, venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ Sawˉdonˍ leh Gawˇmawˇra‸ mvuhˇ miˬ a‸ kehˉ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40010016	Nawˬ hui yawˬ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, veˬ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, vuiˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ leh, aˉ pui k'aˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu hta‸ maˇ ya‸ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
40010017	Chaw yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ, jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ jaw‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40010018	Ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ leh hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shu yuˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˆ suhˍ leh buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40010019	Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ g'a yaw tuˬ taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ. Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40010020	Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ yaw shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ nawˬ hui maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui Awˬ pa ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ yaw tuˬ yoˬ.
40010021	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ suh tuˬ chiˇ a‸ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ pa htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Yaˇ paˍ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ hpfuhˆ leh tiˇ pehˍ tcuh tuˬ yoˬ.
40010022	Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ yeˬ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40010023	Venˇ teˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo shu nawˬ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ ve k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ venˇ lo hpaw-e loˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ venˇ teˇ hpaˍ lo nawˬ hui ca toˇ maˇ zuhˇ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40010024	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve saˍ la‸ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ ceˬ htawˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
40010025	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve saˍ la‸ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ leh, awˬ ceˬ htawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve k'o, law‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ Beˍsaˍbuˇlaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui hta‸ chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ, maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40010026	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ taˇ kawˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'a beh taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ hpeu‸ tawˆ la tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Hk'a faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ, maˇ shiˍ la tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
40010027	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ naˆ ho‸ k'uiˬ lo hto laˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ g'euˆ ba kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ a yehˉ yehˉ hto laˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e leh kuˬ maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
40010028	Awˬ to hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ g'a ve htawˇ, co ha hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ maˇ g'a ve pa taw, chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ taˇ kawˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, co ha hta‸ ka‸ awˬ to hta‸ ka‸ moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo te luˬ g'a shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ kawˆ loˬ.
40010029	Jaˍ meuˇ nyiˇ hkeh hta‸ peh‸ shanˍ teˇ peh‸ hawˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa a loˍ maˇ cawˬ k'o, teˇ hkeh ka‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ ce.
40010030	Nawˬ hui ve uˉ hkeh mvuh hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ htawˇ g'aw nyi taˍ peuˬ.
40010031	Hk'e te leh, taˇ kawˆ. Jaˍ meuˇ teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ nawˬ hui awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40010032	Hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40010033	Hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40010034	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ laˬ ve teh‸ taˇ dawˇ. Cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Aˉ htaw hta‸ ngaˬ yuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
40010035	Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ paˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ pa, yaˇ miˇ leh yawˇ ve awˬ e, awˬ hkuiˇ ma leh yawˇ ve awˬ pi, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ maˇ cawˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
40010036	A shu yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40010037	Ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve a‸ kehˉ awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ keunˍ. Ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve a‸ kehˉ yaˇ paˍ yaˇ miˇ hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ keunˍ.
40010038	A shu yawˇ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ laˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ keunˍ.
40010039	A shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ g'a ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a sha‸ shonˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ pon a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ shonˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a sha‸ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40010040	Nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
40010041	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ pa taw, shu yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve k'o, ha‸ yuˬ shehˍ hpaˇ htawˇ tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ pa taw shu yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve k'o, ha‸ yuˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40010042	I ve chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ pa taw, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ gawˬ teˇ kawˆ taw piˇ ve k'o, taw piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ bon a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ mehˉ taˬ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve.
40011001	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ca maˍ piˇ tuˬ leh bon maˍ tuˬ, yawˇ htawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40011002	Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Hkri‸ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh,
40011003	Nawˬ lehˬ, laˬ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a dawˇ law tuˬ sheˍ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi tcuh ve yoˬ.
40011004	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'a g'a kaˇ hk'a g'a mawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ ca hto piˇ-oˆ.
40011005	Mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw hui mehˆ mawˬ la ve, hkui luˬ ve chaw hui ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai ve, hkiˬ tu‸ keuˆ ve chaw hui da‸ la kehˬ la ve, naˍ paw pawˇ ve chaw hui naˍ paw kaˇ la ve, suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve leh, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui htawˇ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
40011006	Ngaˬ hta‸ nyi ma maˇ luˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40011007	Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'o‸-e chehˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ lawn chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo k'ai ve le. Mvuhˇ haw meuˆ leh hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ te chehˇ ve lo cehˬ hta‸ laˇ.
40011008	Maˇ heˆ k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ k'ai ve le. Nuˇ lehˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh ve chaw hta‸ laˇ. Nuˇ lehˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh ve chaw hui lehˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40011009	Maˇ heˆ k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ k'ai ve le. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hta‸ laˇ. Yoˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hta‸ ca nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40011010	Nyi loˬ. Nawˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo nawˬ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ gu tuˬ ngaˬ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ngaˬ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40011011	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yaˇ miˇ geh hk'a paw la ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo, baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ tawˆ la jaw. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ i ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
40011012	Baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ kanˉ te ve awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tanˬ leh ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ hiˉ yuˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Hiˉ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, g'aˇ hte‸ buiˆ da‸ leh lo‸-e chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40011013	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ leh awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ co-e hk'a gaˬ hto piˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40011014	Nawˬ hui na yuˬ gaˇ ve k'o, chaw chi lehˬ laˬ tuˬ ve Eˇliˇya‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40011015	Kaˇ tuˬ naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw hk'a deh‸ na-o.
40011016	Chaw chi teˇ co-e hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma yuˬ leh g'a tehˆ maˍ tuˬ le.
40011017	Chaw chi teˇ co-e lehˬ, Nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui nawˍ meuˆ htawˇ nawˬ hui k'aˍ maˇ hk'eˆ. Ngaˬ hui paˆ hawˬ ve htawˇ nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ haˍ, teh‸ tcuh hk'aw mui taˍ leh awˬ chawˇ chawˇ hta‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ chehˇ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40011018	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇhanˬ laˬ leh, maˇ caˇ maˇ dawˬ ve pa taw, Yawˇ lehˬ neˇ geh ve chaw yoˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40011019	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu laˬ leh caˇ ve dawˬ ve pa taw, Chaw chi lehˬ, caˇ leuˉ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ponˬ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ awˬ chawˇ te ve chaw yoˬ teh‸ shu k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, yawˇ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ shu g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40011020	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ kanˉ uiˍ ve maˇ maˇ te maˍ piˇ peuˬ ve venˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ deˇ maˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
40011021	Hkawˇraˍsenˍ venˇ -oˬ, nawˬ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Behˇsehˇdaˆ venˇ -oˬ, nawˬ htawˇ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo te peuˬ ve kanˉ uiˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Tuˇruˆ venˇ leh Siˉdonˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo te ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ meh htuˉ pui hpa hta‸ veu‸ deh leh hk'aw‸ laˉ hkaˆ pfuhˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
40011022	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ Tuˇruˆ venˇ leh Siˉdonˍ venˇ a‸ kehˉ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40011023	Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma lo hk'a gaˬ chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ teh‸ dawˇ ve laˇ. Nawˬ lehˬ, suh mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a gaˬ g'a ya‸-e tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo te peuˬ ve kanˉ uiˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ Sawˉdonˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo te ve hk'e k'o, venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ cawˬ tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
40011024	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ Sawˉdonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ a‸ kehˉ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40011025	Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma miˬ naˆ ma hta‸ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ A pa-oˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw leh shiˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui hta‸ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ faˉ taˍ leh, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
40011026	A pa-oˬ, chi lehˬ nawˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
40011027	Ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ peuˬ. Awˬ pa maˇ heˆ k'o, Yaˇ hpu hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Yaˇ hpu leh Yaˇ hpu hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ gaˇ ve chaw maˇ heˆ k'o, Awˬ pa hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ.
40011028	Kanˉ te heuˬ leh mawˇ pfuhˇ hawˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ geh laˬ-o‸. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ g'aˇ jehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40011029	Ngaˬ ve taˆ tuˬ hta‸ taˆ leh ngaˬ geh henˇ yuˬ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ nyi ma nuˇ nuˇ nehˬ nehˬ cawˬ leh, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma htawˇ g'aˇ g'a jehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40011030	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve taˆ tuˬ taˆ sha leh, ngaˬ ve mawˇ htawˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40012001	Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ shinˉ nyi htaˇ heh hk'aw hpanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˍ meu‸ leh caˬ nu chehˆ caˇ ve yoˬ.
40012002	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ mawˬ leh, Nyi-o, shinˉ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo te maˇ keunˍ te maˇ cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ te chehˇ ve law teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40012003	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Daˍviˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˍ meu‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'aw jaw leh laˇ.
40012004	Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh, yawˇ awˬ to ka‸ yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ caˇ maˇ keunˍ caˇ maˇ cawˇ ve, paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ caˇ keunˍ caˇ cawˇ ve tanˇ taˍ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40012005	Peuˬ leh, shinˉ nyi htaˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ shinˉ nyi ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ te ya‸ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui maˇ g'aw jaw laˇ.
40012006	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, bon yehˬ lonˉ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ choˬ kaˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40012007	Tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve hk'e k'o, venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
40012008	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, shinˉ nyi ve awˬ jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40012009	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
40012010	Oˇ kaˬ lo la‸ sheh teˇ paˉ suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ, Shinˉ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo shu hta‸ gu na-e piˇ cawˇ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40012011	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ yawˬ teˇ hkeh tiˉ cawˬ leh, shinˉ nyi htaˇ yawˬ oˇ ve teˇ hkeh miˬ k'oˍ hk'aw ce lo‸-e ve k'o, maˇ yuˬ tawˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ laˇ.
40012012	Chaw yaˇ lehˬ, yawˬ a‸ kehˉ hk'aˬ ma awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve le. Hk'e te leh, shinˉ nyi htaˇ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ te cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40012013	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw oˇ ve hta‸, Nawˬ ve la‸ sheh che hk'a teh‸, yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve la‸ sheh che ve teˇ yanˇ k'aw‸ da‸ la leh, awˬ nu ve teˇ paˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
40012014	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh g'a tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40012015	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw maˇ maˇ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40012016	Yawˇ ve awˬ lawn shu hta‸ maˇ g'a k'aoˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ tawˇ hk'a deh‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40012017	Awˬ lawn chi lehˬ, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ,
40012018	Ngaˬ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nyi-o. Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh leh ha‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ngaˬ chehˇ piˇ leh, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ lawn buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40012019	Tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, kuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ maˇ te. Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo yawˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a kaˇ
40012020	Suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ g'aˇ kuiˬ lo yawˇ maˇ gaˬ tcuh sheˍ ve ceh ceh, hteh k'aˉ taˍ ve lo cehˬ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ te cheˆ. Kawˆ faiˇ awˬ caˆ mvuhˇ hk'awˇ du du te to‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˉ.
40012021	Yawˇ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui dawˇ law tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40012022	Oˇ htaˇ neˇ geh taˍ ve, mehˆ cuˉ leh k'aˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shu yawˇ geh yuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ chaw k'aˍ oˇ ve hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve pa taw, chaw k'aˍ oˇ ve tawˇ yaw g'a la leh, mehˆ mawˬ la ve yoˬ.
40012023	Oˇ htaˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ anˇ jaˇ leh, Chi lehˬ Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu leh naˍ leˇ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40012024	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Chaw chi lehˬ, neˇ jawˇ mawˇ Beˍsaˍbuˇlaˆ hta‸ g'aˇ va ve awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40012025	Yawˇ hui dawˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Maˇ cawˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ le le luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ cawˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve venˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yehˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yeˬ chehˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
40012026	Saˍtanˍ lehˬ, Saˍtanˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te yeˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
40012027	Ngaˬ lehˬ Beˍsaˍbuˇlaˆ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve hk'e k'o, nawˬ hui ve yaˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu hta‸ g'aˇ va leh g'a‸ k'oˬ ve le. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui lehˬ nawˬ hui ve suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40012028	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la peuˬ.
40012029	Awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ maˇ hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve k'o, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ a shu hiˉ yuˬ g'a tuˬ le. Awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw hta‸ hpeh tiˍ taˍ peuˬ htaˇ heh‸, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40012030	Ngaˬ hpawˇ maˇ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ ve canˇ paˍ hpawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh maˇ g'awˆ hpoˆ ve chaw lehˬ, g'awˆ baˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40012031	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw yaˇ hui te ve venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ le le leh maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
40012032	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ yaw ya‸ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ yaw ya‸ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ ka‸, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ ca‸ na‸ ka‸, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ maˇ hpeh‸.
40012033	Awˬ cehˬ da‸ ve k'o, awˬ shiˍ htawˇ da‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ loˬ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ cehˬ maˇ da‸ ve k'o, awˬ shiˍ htawˇ maˇ da‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ loˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ shiˍ hta‸ pa taw awˬ cehˬ hta‸ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40012034	Vuiˬ haiˬ awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui chaw haiˬ hpeh‸ ve pa taw da‸ ve tawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te yaw hpeh‸ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, maw‸ k'aw yaw tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
40012035	Da‸ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ doˆ taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ doˆ taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
40012036	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ chaw yaˇ lehˬ, awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hk'a yaw ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn g'a k'aw‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40012037	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40012038	Oˇ htaˇ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ te maˍ laˇ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui mawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40012039	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Haiˬ leh te ya‸ puiˉ ve chaw chi teˇ co lehˬ, awˬ heˆ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Tcuh kaˍ paˍ Yoˇnaˆ ve awˬ heˆ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ heˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ chaw chi teˇ co hta‸ maˇ maˍ piˇ.
40012040	Yoˇnaˆ lehˬ, ngaˇ lonˉ g'oˇ peˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shehˆ nyi shehˆ haˉ g'a chehˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu htawˇ miˬ k'oˍ hk'aw lo shehˆ nyi shehˆ haˉ g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40012041	Suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ, Niˇnaˍveˍ venˇ yaˇ hui lehˬ, chaw chi teˇ co geh teˇ geh tu la leh, chaw chi teˇ co hta‸ suhˉ taˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇnaˆ bon maˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve yo‸. Nyi loˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo Yoˇnaˆ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yo‸.
40012042	Suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ, awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ mvuhˇ miˬ ve nanˇ hawˉ hkanˇ ma htawˇ, chaw chi teˇ co geh teˇ geh tu la leh, chaw chi teˇ co hta‸ suhˉ taˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ Sawˉla‸monˍ ve cuˇ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ kaˬ lo tu leh laˬ ve yoˬ. Nyi loˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo Sawˉla‸monˍ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40012043	Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hkeh lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, goˇ choˆ ve chehˇ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ca toˇ nyi leh, g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ hta‸ ca ve htawˇ, maˇ mawˬ.
40012044	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ tawˆ la ve ngaˬ ve yehˬ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e shaˍ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ k'awˇ lehˍ kehˬ lehˍ hk'a deh‸ gu shiˆ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40012045	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ k'ai leh yawˇ a‸ kehˉ haiˬ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu neˇ suhˍ hkeh hta‸ kuˬ veu laˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui lo‸-e leh oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ hpeh‸ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh haiˬ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve chaw chi teˇ co htawˇ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40012046	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ e leh awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ na‸ uˉ te da‸ gaˇ leh, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40012047	Hk'e te leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ e leh nawˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ na‸ uˉ te da‸ gaˇ leh, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40012048	Yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ e leh ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ a shu le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40012049	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ beˆ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ e leh ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi loˬ.
40012050	Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve a loˍ hta‸ hk'a te ve chaw hui lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ, ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi ma leh ngaˬ ve awˬ e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40013001	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi Yeˍsuˆ yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai leh g'uiˬ po paˇ lo ca mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
40013002	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh hpawnˬ la ve pa taw, yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e leh mui taˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40013003	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tawˇ pa haˉ te leh, awˬ lawn laiˉ ceuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ yawˇ sheˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ yawˇ ca sheˍ ve yoˬ.
40013004	Yawˇ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo ce leh, ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh g'awˆ caˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40013005	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ miˬ shaˍ paˇ kuiˬ haˉ pui de lo ce leh, miˬ shaˍ maˇ naˉ ve pa taw, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yeˬ la ve yoˬ.
40013006	Awˬ yeˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ geu maˇ naw‸ ve pa taw, mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ la htaˇ haw jaˇ chiˆ jaˇ leh, nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40013007	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ aˉ chuˇ de lo ce leh, aˉ chuˇ buiˇ teˇ hpaˍ uiˍ la leh awˬ yeˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hoˆ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40013008	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ miˬ hkuiˇ da‸ kuiˬ lo ce leh awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la ve yoˬ. Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ teˇ ha pun, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hkaw‸ chi pun leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ shehˆ chi pun naw‸ la ve yoˬ.
40013009	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw hk'a deh‸ na-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013010	Oˇ htaˇ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ piˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40013011	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ shiˍ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ.
40013012	Awˬ lawn k'o, cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ k'aw‸ htehˍ piˇ tuˬ leh yawˇ maˇ maˇ cawˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ cawˬ ve chaw geh yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ yuˬ tawˆ sheˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40013013	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui nyi ve ka‸ nyi maˇ mawˬ, kaˇ ve ka‸ na maˇ g'a ve awˬ hk'oˆ, maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40013014	Tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve htawˇ na maˇ g'a. Nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve htawˇ maˇ shiˍ.
40013015	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui mehˆ shiˍ maˇ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, naˍ paw maˇ g'a kaˇ tuˬ, nyi ma hk'aw lo maˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, nyi ma maˇ k'aw‸ pa leh ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a gu na-e tuˬ, chaw chi teˇ ceuˬ ve nyi ma heh leh, yawˇ hui ve naˍ paw maˇ na gaˇ leh yawˇ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ me‸ taˍ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40013016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ g'a mawˬ leh nawˬ hui ve naˍ paw g'a kaˇ ve pa taw, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
40013017	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw laiˉ g'aˇ mawˬ gaˇ ve htawˇ, maˇ g'a mawˬ. Nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui kaˇ gaˇ ve htawˇ maˇ g'a kaˇ.
40013018	Awˬ yawˇ sheˍ paˍ ve awˬ lawn tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ hta‸ na sheˍ.
40013019	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn g'a kaˇ leh na maˇ g'a ve k'o, haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ laˬ leh, yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ taˍ ve awˬ yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ ve yoˬ. Chi lehˬ, ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo sheˍ ve awˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013020	Haˉ pui de lo sheˍ ve awˬ yawˇ awˬ lawn lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh teˇ cawˬ haˉ ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve leh fawˉ ve mehˍ ve gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ geu maˇ naw‸ leh teˇ hkui ceh tiˉ hkanˍ g'a ve pa taw, yawˇ luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40013022	Aˉ chuˇ de lo sheˍ ve awˬ yawˇ awˬ lawn lehˬ, bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve htawˇ, chi miˬ guiˬ ve dawˇ haˍ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ leh, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve pa taw, awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la maˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013023	Miˬ hkuiˇ da‸ kuiˬ lo sheˍ ve awˬ yawˇ awˬ lawn lehˬ, bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ kaˇ leh na g'a ve chaw hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ teˇ ha pun, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hkaw‸ chi pun leh teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ shehˆ chi pun awˬ shiˍ naw‸ maˇ la ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
