40013024	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tawˇ pa haˉ k'aw‸ te maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve heh hk'aw lo da‸ ve awˬ yawˇ sheˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40013025	Chaw yaˇ hui zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ laˬ leh, caˬ sheˍ taˍ kuiˬ lo veˬ k'awˍ yawˇ sheˍ keu taˉ leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
40013026	Awˬ yeˬ yeˬ la leh awˬ shiˍ awˬ nu tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, veˬ k'awˍ htawˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40013027	Oˇ htaˇ, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve heh hk'aw lo da‸ ve awˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ sheˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw veˬ k'awˍ cawˬ la ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40013028	Yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Canˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ chi ve hta‸ te ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Veˬ k'awˍ cehˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui ca g'awˬ baˬ tuˬ nawˬ nyi ma cawˇ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40013029	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Maˇ heˆ, nawˬ hui veˬ k'awˍ cehˬ hta‸ g'awˬ baˬ ve k'o, caˬ cehˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ ga g'awˬ baˬ puiˉ-aˆ.
40013030	Caˬ g'euˬ ve awˬ yanˇ hk'a gaˬ nyiˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ teˇ geh uiˍ la piˇ sheˍ. Caˬ g'eu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ k'o, veˬ k'awˍ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ g'eu‸ leh aˬ miˍ tuˉ baˬ tuˬ, awˬ k'a‸ awˬ k'a‸ te tsuh‸ taˍ-o‸. Caˬ shiˍ hta‸ ngaˬ ve caˬ ciˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shaw keu taˍ-o teh‸ caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013031	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tawˇ pa haˉ k'aw‸ te maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve heh awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ taˍ ve g'awˇ caˉ yawˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40013032	Awˬ yawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ yawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ i jaˇ ve htawˇ, uiˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ g'awˇ hpa‸ mvuhˬ naweh hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ la leh awˬ cehˬ lonˉ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ g'aˇ jehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013033	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tawˇ pa haˉ k'aw‸ te maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, diˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ diˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh hkaoˍ monˇ meu-e shehˆ hk'awˍ lawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo keu ve teˇ yanˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ciˇ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013034	Awˬ lawn chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ pa haˉ te leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ pa haˉ maˇ te k'o, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ maˍ piˇ.
40013035	Yawˇ chi hk'e te maˍ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ biˇ la tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Ngaˬ ve maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ leh tawˇ pa haˉ teˇ hpaˍ te maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸ faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40013036	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Heh hk'aw sheˍ ve veˬ k'awˍ yawˇ tawˇ pa haˉ awˬ lawn tcuhˉ kuiˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ a ciˉ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013037	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Da‸ ve awˬ yawˇ hta‸ sheˍ paˍ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ.
40013038	Heh lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ chi hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve awˬ yawˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Veˬ k'awˍ yawˇ lehˬ, haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013039	Awˬ yawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ sheˍ ve canˇ paˍ lehˬ neˇ haiˬ yoˬ. Caˬ g'eu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ chi leh ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ.
40013040	Veˬ k'awˍ hta‸ g'eu‸ leh aˬ miˍ tuˉ baˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, miˬ guiˬ chi leh ve awˬ yanˇ htaˇ chi hk'e hpehˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40013041	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ peu laˇ leh, shu hta‸ te ya‸ tcuh ve chaw leh haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui yuˬ tawˆ peuˬ hk'aw nawˉ,
40013042	aˬ miˍ buiˬ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ hui hawˬ leh ciˬ geu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40013043	Oˇ htaˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui Awˬ pa ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, mvuhˇ nyi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ g'euˆ ba tuˬ yoˬ. Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw hk'a deh‸ na-o.
40013044	Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, ti mi hk'aw faˉ taˍ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve mawˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Mawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ mawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, k'aw‸ gu faˉ taˍ leh, ha lehˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e leh, yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ti mi oˇ ve hta‸ vuiˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
40013045	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, da‸ jaˇ ve piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ hta‸ ca ve tanˇ kaˬ paˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40013046	Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ teˇ shiˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ k'o‸-e leh yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, shehnˉ oˇ ve hta‸ vuiˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
40013047	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hpehˇ keu leh ngaˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ hoˆ leh g'awˬ yuˬ ve geu‸ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40013048	Ngaˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˇ ca paˍ teˇ hpaˍ geu‸ hta‸ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ lo g'awˬ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mui taˍ leh da‸ ve ngaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'awˍ lawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo leuˆ keu leh, maˇ da‸ ve ngaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ ve yoˬ.
40013049	Miˬ guiˬ leh ve teˇ yanˇ, chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui leh haiˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ pehˬ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ,
40013050	haiˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ aˬ miˍ buiˬ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ hui hawˬ leh ciˬ geu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40013051	Awˬ lawn chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui na g'a peuˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Na g'a peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40013052	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn henˇ yuˬ peuˬ ve li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ a shu yawˇ ve mawˇ keu taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, mawˇ awˬ piˍ awˬ suhˉ yuˬ tawˆ ve hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40013053	Tawˇ pa haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ te maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40013054	Yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui anˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, chi hk'e ve cuˇ yiˍ leh kanˇ paˆ hta‸ hk'aˬ lo g'a ve le.
40013055	Yawˇ lehˬ, la‸ shaˉ maˉ ve yaˇ paˍ maˇ heˆ laˇ. Yawˇ ve awˬ e lehˬ Maˍriˆ meh ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yaˍkoˆ, Yoˇseh‸, Siˉmonˍ leh Yuˇda‸ hui maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40013056	Yawˇ ve awˬ nyi ma hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ ngaˬ hui geh chehˇ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Hk'e te leh chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, chi hk'e ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ lo g'a ve le teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma luˬ ve yoˬ.
40013057	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, a shu yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ leh a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40013058	Yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw, oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ kanˉ uiˍ ve hta‸ a ciˉ ceh tiˉ te ve yoˬ.
40014001	Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ lawn bvuhˬ k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh,
40014002	yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve pa taw, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ uiˍ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tawˆ la ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40014003	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ ve awˬ miˇ ma Heˍroˍdiˆ awˬ lawn hta‸ pa taw, Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
40014004	Awˬ lawn k'o Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ heuˆ maˇ cawˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve pa taw yoˬ.
40014005	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ gaˇ ve htawˇ, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ kawˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ yoˬ teh‸ mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hui shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40014006	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ paw ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ pawehˇ te ve awˬ nyi k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, Heˍroˍdiˆ ve awˬ yaˇ miˇ chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ pawehˇ te maˍ piˇ htaˇ, Heˍroˆ nyi ma cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40014007	Hk'e te leh, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hk'a lawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ ka ti‸ te leh hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40014008	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ e maˍ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, Baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hkehˇ pe le awˬ hk'aw keu leh pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40014009	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ dawˇ haˍ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh, yawˇ geh mui caˇ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ pa taw, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lawˬ ve hk'e piˇ tuˬ yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014010	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ chaw hta‸ hpehˇ peu leh, htawnˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Yoˇhanˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ ca tawˆ tcuh ve yoˬ.
40014011	Oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hkehˇ pe le awˬ hk'aw keu veu laˇ leh, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ htawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ e hta‸ ca yuˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014012	Oˇ htaˇ, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ tuˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014013	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ-e leh, chaw gawˬ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, venˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai leh, miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40014014	Yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo naˬ ve gawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014015	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Choˬ kaˬ lehˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw hpeh‸ leh, mvuhˇ ka‸ hpeu‸ la yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˆ hk'aw lo k'ai leh caˇ tuˬ ca vuiˬ caˇ-e tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014016	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yawˇ hui k'ai tuˬ maˇ loˍ. Nawˬ hui yawˇ hui hta‸ caˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014017	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, hkaoˍ monˇ ngaˇ diˬ leh ngaˇ nyiˇ hkeh ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014018	Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ geh yuˬ veu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014019	Oˇ htaˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸, Mvuh‸ awˬ hk'oˆ mui-o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve ngaˇ diˬ leh ngaˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ hkeh hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ hk'eh‸ leh awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014020	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˇ ve yoˬ. Caˇ leuˉ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'awˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ hk'a biˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
40014021	Caˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ leh yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ k'o, hawˉ hk'aˆ chaw mawˇ tiˉ aˬ laˬ hk'e ngaˇ hinˉ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40014022	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ coˇ paˉ lo k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
40014023	Yawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, bon ca lawˬ tuˬ yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ. Mehˆ muiˉ naˆ la htaˇ, yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40014024	Haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, g'uiˬ po awˬ k'aw ji lo gaˬ htaˇ, mvuhˇ haw hpawˇ maˇ cawˇ ve pa taw, g'uiˬ baˇ teˇ hpaˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ htinˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40014025	Tanˇ hkuinˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ g'uiˬ po hk'oˆ ya‸ k'aw juˇ leh yawˇ hui geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
40014026	G'uiˬ po hk'oˆ lo yawˇ ya‸ k'aw juˇ laˬ ve hta‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ leh, Chaw ha ku yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40014027	Yawˇ hui kawˆ ve pa taw g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Teˇ cawˬ haˉ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te-o. Taˇ kawˆ, ngaˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014028	Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ yoˬ k'o, iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'oˆ ngaˬ hta‸ nawˬ geh laˬ tcuh laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014029	Hk'e te leh Peˍtruˆ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw tawˆ-e leh, iˉ kaˆ hk'oˆ ya‸ k'aw juˇ leh Yeˍsuˆ geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40014030	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ haw hehnˇ jaˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ mawˬ htaˇ, kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo tuˍ lo‸-e chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
40014031	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve la‸ sheh che leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'awˬ tawˆ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ ve chaw-oˬ, nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma te htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ te ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40014032	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ haw htawˇ dehˬ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40014033	Haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, Nawˬ lehˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40014034	G'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo yawˇ hui hkanˍ k'ai leh Geˍneˍsaˍrehˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
40014035	Oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw teˇ kaˬ le le lo chaw hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, naˬ ve gawˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh yuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
40014036	Yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ awˬ caˍ hta‸ ceh g'a htawˇ tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Hk'a htawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ na-e la ve yoˬ.
40015001	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo tu leh, Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
40015002	Nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chaw mawˇ hui piˇ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ya‸ ve le. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui la‸ sheh maˇ tsuhˇ leh caˇ tuˬ caˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015003	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te ya‸ ve le.
40015004	Awˬ lawn k'o G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te-o. Peuˬ leh, A shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a suh ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40015005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui lehˬ, Hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸, Ngaˬ geh hk'a cawˬ ve nawˬ hui g'a cawˇ ve mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tanˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ yawˆ yan tuˬ maˇ loˍ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015006	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui te pehˆ ve yoˬ.
40015007	Chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve,
40015008	Chaw chi teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw ngaˬ hta‸ yawˆ yan ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ vuiˇ da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40015009	Chaw yaˇ hui teh taˍ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve lehˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015010	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ geh kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hk'a deh‸ na leh shiˍ-o‸.
40015011	Maw‸ k'aw hk'aw lo‸-e ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ maˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ maw‸ k'aw hk'aw tawˆ la ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015012	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ-aw laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015013	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa maˇ ti taˍ ve awˬ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ le le hta‸ g'awˬ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40015014	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ chehˇ taˍ piˇ sheˍ. Yawˇ hui mehˆ cuˉ ve ka‸, ya‸ k'aw maˍ piˇ paˍ te ve yoˬ. Mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw lehˬ, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw hta‸ ya‸ k'aw maˍ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ miˬ k'oˍ hk'aw ce lo‸-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015015	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Tawˇ pa haˉ chi ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015016	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ nawˬ hui htawˇ na maˇ g'a sheˍ leh laˇ.
40015017	Maw‸ k'aw hk'aw lo‸-e ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, g'oˇ peˬ awˬ hk'aw gaˬ leh, aˉ k'a‸ yiˬ kuiˬ lo baˬ taˉ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
40015018	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, nyi ma hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
40015019	Awˬ lawn k'o, haiˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ ve, chaw hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve, guiˇ ya‸ ve, shu mawˇ hk'awˇ ve, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve leh, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ nyi ma hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
40015020	Chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, la‸ sheh maˇ tsuhˇ leh caˇ tuˬ caˇ ve lehˬ, chaw hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015021	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ kaˬ tawˆ k'ai leh, Tuˇruˆ leh Siˉdonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ hpawˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
40015022	Oˇ htaˇ, Hkaˍnanˍ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ ve yaˇ miˇ neˇ geh leh g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
40015023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ yaw piˇ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ chi ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a‸ laˬ leh kuˬ chehˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh-o teh‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
40015024	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mehˉ k'ai peuˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh laˬ tuˬ awˬ pon ceh G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015025	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ga laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015026	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh hpuiˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˍ piˇ maˇ cawˇ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015027	Yaˇ miˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hpuiˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve hpui lawˇ hawˉ sheˆ taˍ ve caˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'awˆ caˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015028	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, nawˬ yonˍ ve lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve hk'e nawˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ teˇ hkui yawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ na-e la ve yoˬ.
40015029	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh Gaˍliˍlehˇ g'uiˬ po paˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e leh mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
40015030	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, hkui luˬ la‸ luˬ ve chaw, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw, k'aˍ ve chaw leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw naˬ laiˉ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui shiˍ veu taˆ veu laˇ leh, yawˇ hkui paˇ lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015031	Hk'e te leh, chaw k'aˍ teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ yaw g'a la ve, hkui luˬ la‸ luˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ da‸ la leh ya‸ k'aw juˇ g'a la ve, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw hui mehˆ mawˬ la ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ leh Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015032	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ geh kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ chi hta‸ ngaˬ ha k'aˉ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui ngaˬ geh chehˇ ve shehˆ nyi gaˬ peuˬ leh, caˇ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ hui awˍ meu‸ jehˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ k'o‸-e tcuh gaˇ. K'o‸-e tcuh ve k'o, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo yawˇ hui g'aˇ nuˇ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40015033	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Chaw chi ma ve hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˇ tuˬ ve, choˬ kaˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo hkaoˍ monˇ hk'aˬ lo ca g'a tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015034	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui geh hkaoˍ monˇ hk'aˬ nyiˇ diˬ cawˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Hkaoˍ monˇ suhˍ diˬ leh ngaˇ ehˉ a ciˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015035	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ mui tuˬ yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015036	Hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve suhˍ diˬ leh ngaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htaˬ yawˇ yuˬ leh, bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hk'eh‸ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui htawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40015037	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a bvuhˆ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, caˇ leuˉ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'awˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, suhˍ hk'awˍ lawˇ hk'a biˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
40015038	Caˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ leh yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ k'o, hawˉ hk'aˆ chaw mawˇ tiˉ awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40015039	Oˇ htaˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh Maˍgaˍdanˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
40016001	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui leh Saˍduˆkehˇ hui laˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma ve awˬ heˆ a ciˉ te maˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
40016002	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, Mvuhˇ naw ma nyiˉ lehˍ cawˬ ve k'o, mvuhˇ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40016003	Peuˬ leh mvuhˇ shawˉ htaˇ, Mvuhˇ naw ma nyiˉ lehˍ cawˬ leh moˬ hoˆ taˍ ve k'o, ya‸ nyi mvuhˇ haw mvuhˇ yeˬ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ nyi leh shiˍ puiˉ ve htawˇ, awˬ co-e awˬ yanˇ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui fuiˍ da‸ maˇ g'a.
40016004	Haiˬ leh te ya‸ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ co-e lehˬ, awˬ heˆ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yoˇnaˆ ve awˬ heˆ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ heˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ maˍ piˇ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40016005	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, hkaoˍ monˇ yuˬ k'ai tuˬ yawˇ hui leunˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
40016006	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ leh Saˍduˆkehˇ hui ve diˇ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te leh jaw k'ai-o teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40016007	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Ngaˬ hui hkaoˍ monˇ maˇ yuˬ laˬ ve pa taw chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40016008	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui hkaoˍ monˇ maˇ yuˬ laˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve le.
40016009	Chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ gaˬ sheˍ leh laˇ. Hkaoˍ monˇ ngaˇ diˬ hta‸ chaw ngaˇ hinˉ g'aˇ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ hui awˬ leuˉ hk'aˬ nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ k'aw‸ g'awˆ g'a ve hta‸ maˇ dawˇ nawˇ leh laˇ.
40016010	Peuˬ leh hkaoˍ monˇ suhˍ diˬ hta‸ chaw awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ caˇ peu hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ hui awˬ leuˉ hk'aˬ nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ k'aw‸ g'awˆ g'a ve hta‸ maˇ dawˇ nawˇ leh laˇ.
40016011	Ngaˬ hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ lawn nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ gaˬ ve le. Hpaˍriˍsehˇ leh Saˍduˆkehˇ hui ve diˇ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40016012	Oˇ htaˇ, hkaoˍ monˇ hk'aw keu ve diˇ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Hpaˍriˍsehˇ leh Saˍduˆkehˇ hui maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ la ve yoˬ.
40016013	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ Kehˉsaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hpawˇ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ a shu hpeh‸ ve teh‸ shu k'oˆ ve le.
40016014	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Eˇliˇya‸ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍraˍmiˆ, maˇ heˆ k'o G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40016015	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ a shu hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve le.
40016016	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40016017	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yoˇnaˆ ve yaˇ paˍ Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ lawn chi hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa nawˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40016018	Peuˬ leh ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ yoˬ. Haˉ pui chi awˬ hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ ve awˬ moˍ hta‸ ngaˬ te tuˬ yoˬ. Suh mvuhˇ miˬ ve yehˬ miˉ lehˬ, awˬ moˍ chi hta‸ maˇ g'aˇ.
40016019	Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ ve shawˇ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hk'a hpeh taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo htawˇ hpeh taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hk'a hpui hk'a ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo htawˇ hpui hk'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40016020	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve awˬ lawn chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a hto piˇ tuˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ tawˇ hehnˇ chaweh piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40016021	Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ hta‸ tanˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo g'a k'ai leh, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ g'a suh leh, shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o g'a k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40016022	Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, chi hk'e g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Chi hk'e ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hta‸ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ g'a heuˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh yawˇ hta‸ deˇ ve yoˬ.
40016023	Yeˍsuˆ hpfuhˆ nyi leh Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Saˍtanˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ lo jiˆ k'ai-o. Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ pon hkui htiˇ poˬ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve dawˇ hk'aˇ maˇ heˆ, chaw yaˇ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40016024	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ gaˇ ve k'o, a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸.
40016025	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ gaˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve a sha‸ shonˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ awˬ pon a sha‸ shonˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40016026	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a ve htawˇ, yawˇ ve a sha‸ shonˇ k'ai ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ tuˬ le. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh pa g'a tuˬ le.
40016027	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ Awˬ pa ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui geh teˇ geh laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, a shu yawˇ te taˍ ve hk'e, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ yawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40016028	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, choˬ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu chi yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, maˇ g'a suh teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40017001	Hkaw‸ nyi ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ, Yaˍkoˆ leh Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ ceh shiˍ veu leh, mvuh ve hk'aw teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ hui taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
40017002	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han pa ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ nyi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ g'euˆ ba leh, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ htawˇ awˬ g'euˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpu la ve yoˬ.
40017003	Moˉseˍ leh Eˇliˇya‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ tawˆ la leh Yeˍsuˆ geh na‸ uˉ te da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40017004	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui choˬ kaˬ chehˇ ve lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ nyi ma cawˇ ve k'o, choˬ kaˬ lo ngaˬ aˉ po k'o shehˆ shiˍ te tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ, Moˉseˍ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ leh Eˇliˇya‸ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40017005	Yawˇ tawˇ yaw chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ g'euˆ ba ve moˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Moˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hkawˇ chi hk'e bvuhˬ la ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, ngaˬ ha‸ jaˇ ve ngaˬ ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40017006	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ leh mehˆ hpfuhˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40017007	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ laˬ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ htawˇ leh, Tu-o, taˇ kawˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40017008	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ chiˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ mawˬ. Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40017009	Hk'aw oˇ ve teˇ shiˍ lo yawˇ hui k'aw‸ ya‸ la chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, suh kuiˬ lo maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la sheˍ ve ceh ceh, nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn chi, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ taˇ hto piˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40017010	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hk'e te k'o, Eˇliˇya‸ awˉ lawˉ g'a laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. teh‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ,
40017011	yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Eˇliˇya‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na laˬ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ gu te tuˬ yoˬ.
40017012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Eˇliˇya‸ gaˬ la peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, te gaˇ ve hk'e yawˇ hta‸ te piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu htawˇ yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40017013	Oˇ htaˇ, baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ awˬ lawn yawˇ k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40017014	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ geh yawˇ hui gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh k'oˆ ve,
40017015	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ yaˇ paˍ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ paw‸ hpeuˆ leh g'a hkanˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ hkui teˇ hkui paˍ lo‸-e leh, iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ teˇ hkui teˇ hkui paˍ lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
40017016	Nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu laˇ htawˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ maˇ g'a teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40017017	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yonˍ ve maˇ cawˬ leh nyi ma hpfuhˆ puiˉ ve chaw chi teˇ co-e-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ maw g'a chehˇ tuˬ sheˍ le. Nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ maw g'a yeunˇ hkanˍ tuˬ sheˍ le. Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ geh yuˬ laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40017018	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ neˇ oˇ ve hta‸ deˇ leh, neˇ oˇ ve yaˇ paˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ hkui yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve na-e la ve yoˬ.
40017019	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Neˇ oˇ ve hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw ngaˬ hui g'a‸ k'oˬ maˇ g'a ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40017020	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ g'awˇ caˉ yawˇ hk'e hui cawˬ ve k'o, hk'aw chi teˇ shiˍ hta‸, Oˇ kaˬ lo jiˆ k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, jiˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui te maˇ g'a ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40017021	Bon lawˬ ve leh caˇ tuˬ ce ve ceh tiˉ chi teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ tawˆ k'ai piˇ lawˬ g'a ve yoˬ. (Li‸ hpu teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ka nanˉ ehˉ chi teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.)
40017022	Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui teˇ geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ yanˇ neˇ la peuˬ.
40017023	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ leh shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40017024	Yawˇ hui Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ pon a moˇ shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ Peˍtruˆ geh k'ai leh, Nawˬ ve saˍ la‸ lehˬ, a moˇ maˇ keu leh laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40017025	Keu ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peˍtruˆ yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ awˉ lawˉ yaw leh k'oˆ ve, Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ ve le. Chi miˬ guiˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu geh a moˇ shaw ve le. A shu yawˇ ve yaˇ geh laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, shu geh shaw ve laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40017026	Shu geh shaw ve yoˬ teh‸ Peˍtruˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Hk'e te k'o, yawˇ hui ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a ponˬ ve yoˬ.
40017027	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ pa taw shu maˇ g'a dawˇ ya‸ tuˬ, g'uiˬ po lo k'ai leh biˉ teˇ maˬ hta‸ ca baˬ keu-o. Awˉ lawˉ g'a ve ngaˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ hk'a nyi. Oˇ htaˇ, hpu teˇ hteh‸ hta‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Hpu oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ leh, ngaˬ awˬ pon leh nawˬ awˬ pon yawˇ hui hta‸ ca piˇ-oˆ teh‸, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018001	Oˇ ve teˇ hkui awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40018002	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ yaˇ ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, yaˇ ehˉ oˇ ve yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo taˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
40018003	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui nyi ma maˇ pa leh yaˇ ehˉ hk'e maˇ hpeh‸ la ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui maˇ g'a lo‸-e taˬ.
40018004	A shu teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yaˇ ehˉ chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nyi ma nehˬ lehˍ taˍ ve chaw lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40018005	Yaˇ ehˉ chi hk'e ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
40018006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve k'awˍ peˍ hta‸ haˉ pui mawˍ lonˉ hpeh k'u leh naˉ jaˇ ve laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ ce peu ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
40018007	Shu ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, shu ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40018008	Nawˬ ve la‸ sheh teˇ paˉ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ ve hkui sheh teˇ paˉ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, tawˆ baˬ-o‸. Hkui sheh la‸ sheh nyiˇ paˉ paˉ cawˬ leh co co taiˍ taiˍ to‸ chehˇ ve aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ, hkui sheh la‸ sheh hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ cawˬ leh a sha‸ te‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e ve lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
40018009	Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ teˇ paˉ nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, mehˆ shiˍ oˇ ve hta‸ k'ehˉ baˬ sheˍ. Mehˆ shiˍ nyiˇ paˉ paˉ cawˬ leh aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ ve moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ, mehˆ shiˍ teˇ paˉ tiˉ cawˬ leh a sha‸ te‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e ve lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
40018010	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, yaˇ ehˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ g'a te tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo yawˇ hui ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40018012	Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ le. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, yawˬ teˇ ha hkeh cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ hkeh mehˉ k'ai ve k'o, k'awˇ chi k'awˇ hkeh hta‸ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo teh taˉ leh mehˉ k'ai ve teˇ hkeh hta‸ yawˇ ca nyi tuˬ yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40018013	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˬ oˇ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ mawˬ ve k'o, maˇ mehˉ ve yawˬ k'awˇ chi k'awˇ hkeh hta‸ ha lehˬ ve a‸ kehˉ, oˇ ve teˇ hkeh hta‸ leuˉ leh ha lehˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40018014	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yaˇ ehˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ luˬ k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ Awˬ pa nyi ma maˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
40018015	Nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ laˇ ve k'o, yawˇ geh k'ai leh nawˬ huiˉ maˬ ceh tiˉ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve ya‸ kuiˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ nawˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na ve k'o, nawˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ nawˬ k'aw‸ g'a peuˬ.
40018016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ na ve k'o, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o shehˆ g'aˇ, tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ le le hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hk'a deh‸ hkanˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ geh chaw teˇ g'aˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai-o.
40018017	Yawˇ hui ve hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ na ve k'o, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve hkawˇ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ na ve k'o, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw leh awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ hk'e yawˇ hta‸ shawˍ taˍ-o‸.
40018018	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui hk'a hpeh taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo htawˇ hpeh taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui hk'a hpui hk'a ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo htawˇ hpui hk'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40018019	Peuˬ leh ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ nyi ma hawˍ da‸ leh teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ lawˬ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lawˬ ve hk'e te piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40018020	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ shehˆ g'aˇ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh hpawnˬ da‸ ve k'o, oˇ kaˬ yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo ngaˬ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40018021	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ngaˬ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ peuˬ teˇ pawˆ te ya‸ laˇ ve k'o, hk'aˬ nyiˇ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ le. Suhˍ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40018022	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Suhˍ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Suhˍ pawˆ suhˍ chi pawˆ hk'a gaˬ g'a hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40018023	Hk'e te leh mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh hpu caˇ lanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu gaˇ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40018024	Yawˇ caˇ lanˇ tanˬ gu chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ chi lanˬ hteh‸ jeˬ cha taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shu yawˇ geh shiˍ veu laˇ ve yoˬ.
40018025	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, k'aw‸ shaiˍ piˇ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ awˬ to ka‸, yawˇ miˇ yawˇ yaˇ ka‸, yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve mawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ka‸ hawˇ baˬ sheˬ leh shaiˍ piˇ lawˬ-o‸ teh‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018026	Hk'e te leh awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ a ciˉ yeunˇ hkanˍ laˇ sheˍ. Ngaˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ shaiˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
40018027	Hk'e te leh awˬ ceˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ leh yawˇ ve jeˬ hta‸ htawˇ ponˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018028	Oˇ htaˇ awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve tawˆ k'ai leh, yawˇ hta‸ jeˬ teˇ ha hteh‸ cha taˍ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh k'awˍ peˍ nyiˉ leh, Ngaˬ ve jeˬ hta‸ shaiˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018029	Hk'e te leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hkui tcuhˉ teh leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ a ciˉ yeunˇ hkanˍ laˇ sheˍ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ shaiˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
40018030	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ maˇ na leh, jeˬ k'aw‸ shaiˍ laˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw lo ca keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
40018031	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ jaˇ leh, awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hui ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018032	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Haiˬ ve awˬ ceˬ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve pa taw nawˬ ve jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ ponˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018033	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ htawˇ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ cawˇ ve yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018034	Peuˬ leh yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ nyi ma zuhˆ leh, yawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ k'aw‸ shaiˍ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpaˍ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40018035	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi te ya‸ laˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ maˇ hpehˇ piˇ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e te laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019001	Tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai leh, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ lo cawˬ ve Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ tawn lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
40019002	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019003	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ Hpaˍ riˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Hk'aˬ hk'e ve awˬ lawn teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ hpeh‸-aw laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40019004	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve. Te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ hawˉ hk'aˆ leh yaˇ miˇ hta‸ te hpanˍ taˍ peuˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
40019005	Chi hta‸ pa taw hawˉ hk'aˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ teˇ suhˍ teˇ shaˍ tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'aw jaw laˇ.
40019006	Chi hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ, teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha caˉ da‸ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ chaw yaˇ maˇ g'a yuˬ hpaˆ da‸ piˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019007	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te k'o, hpaˆ da‸ ve li‸ piˇ peuˬ htaˇ heh‸, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ-o‸ teh‸, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw Moˉseˍ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40019008	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui nyi ma heh ve pa taw, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ tuˬ Moˉseˍ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ lehˬ chi hk'e maˇ heˆ.
40019009	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, a shu yawˇ awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu yaˇ miˇ hta‸ ca heuˆ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019010	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ chi hk'e hpeh‸ ve k'o, maˇ heuˆ ve lehˬ da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40019011	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hkanˍ yuˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Hkanˍ yuˬ tuˬ awˬ bon g'a taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ hkanˍ yuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40019012	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, paw la htaˇ ka‸ awˬ tawnˇ hpeh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ tawnˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ shu yawˇ hui hta‸ te piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ aw pon a shu yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ chaw awˬ tawnˇ hpeh‸ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ hpeh‸ ve chaw lehˬ, hkanˍ yuˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40019013	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ la‸ sheh taˍ leh bon lawˬ piˇ tuˬ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu yawˇ geh shiˍ laˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shiˍ laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ deˇ ve yoˬ.
40019014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ geh laˬ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ taˇ tawˍ taˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, chaw oˇ hk'e ve mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019015	Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ la‸ sheh taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40019016	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ da‸ ve kanˉ hk'aˬ ve teˇ maˬ hta‸ g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40019017	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ ve awˬ lawn na nyi laˇ ve le. Da‸ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. A sha‸ te‸ kuiˬ lo nawˬ lo‸-e gaˇ ve k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019018	Hk'aˬ ve teˇ maˬ le teh‸ yawˇ na nyi htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw hta‸ taˇ tiˇ pehˍ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ taˇ te, shu ve mawˇ hta‸ taˇ hk'awˇ, shu hta‸ maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ taˇ hkanˍ,
40019019	nawˬ ve awˬ pa aw e hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te-o, nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e nawˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ ha‸-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019020	Chaw haˉ paˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, Chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ na yuˬ leh te peuˬ. Ngaˬ aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ loˍ sheˍ le teh‸, k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019021	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ biˇ la gaˇ ve k'o, nawˬ k'o‸-e leh, nawˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ leh haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ-oˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve mawˇ nawˬ cawˬ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh nawˬ k'aw‸ laˬ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019022	Chaw haˉ paˍ lehˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ dawˇ haˍ jaˇ leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ mawˇ jeˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40019023	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, paw sha ve chaw lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40019024	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, kaˍ laˍ oˆ teˇ hkeh g'o‸ naˍ hk'awˇ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e tuˬ ve lehˬ, paw sha ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ ve a‸ kehˉ sha ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40019025	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ leh, Hk'e te k'o, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ a shu g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40019026	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ nyi leh, Chaw yaˇ lehˬ chi hta‸ te maˇ g'a. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te g'a ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40019027	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh nawˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma g'a tuˬ ve le.
40019028	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, miˬ guiˬ awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ gu te ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve k'aw jawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ mui ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, k'aw jaw teˇ chi nyiˇ maˬ awˬ hk'oˆ mui leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ chi nyiˇ ceuˬ hta‸ suhˉ g'a jehˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40019029	Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ leh a shu yawˇ ve ti mi hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ teˇ ha pun k'aw‸ g'a leh, co ti‸ ha ti‸ awˬ shinˉ hta‸ htawˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40019030	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ, shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ g'a k'aw‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ, shu awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ g'a k'aw‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40020001	Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve a pehˉ meuˇ hko awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te tuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ ca tuˬ, mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸ tawˆ k'ai ve yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40020002	Yawˇ lehˬ, teˇ nyi teˇ hteh‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, kanˉ te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh jehˬ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve a pehˉ meuˇ hko awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
40020003	Mvuhˇ shawˉ aˬ laˬ hk'e k'awˇ naˍ riˍ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai leh, tcuh hk'aw lo kanˉ maˇ cawˬ leh hk'e leˇ chehˇ taˍ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ,
40020004	Nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ ve a pehˉ meuˇ hko awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai-o. Keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui htawˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40020005	Peuˬ leh, mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ teˇ yanˇ leh mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ hk'e teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai leh oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te ve yoˬ.
40020006	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ aˬ laˬ hk'e ngaˇ naˍ riˍ teˇ yanˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ oˇ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw choˬ kaˬ lo teˇ nyi tanˇ vanˇ hk'e leˇ chehˇ taˍ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40020007	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˇ ca la ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, Nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ ve a pehˉ meuˇ hko awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai-o teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40020008	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, hko awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ hk'aw‸ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ leh leh ca te ve chaw hui hta‸ tanˬ leh, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ca te ve chaw hui hk'a gaˬ awˬ hpfuhˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ ve mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40020009	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ aˬ laˬ hk'e ngaˇ naˍ riˍ htaˇ kanˉ ca te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, teˇ g'aˇ le le teˇ hteh‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
40020010	Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ca te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui shu a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ taˍ ve ka‸, yawˇ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ teˇ hteh‸ ceh tiˉ g'a ve yoˬ.
40020011	Yawˇ hui hpu g'a ve teˇ yanˇ, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ca beu leh yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40020012	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ leh leh ca te la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ naˍ riˍ tiˉ g'a te ve htawˇ, ngaˬ hui teˇ nyi tanˇ vanˇ kanˉ te hkeu‸ leh mvuhˇ cha chiˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ shawˍ piˇ ve law teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40020013	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ te laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Teˇ hteh‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ geh ngaˬ jehˬ da‸ taˍ peuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
40020014	Nawˬ ve hpu hta‸ yuˬ leh k'ai-o. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ leh leh te ve chaw hta‸ nawˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ piˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
40020015	Ngaˬ ve mawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ te gaˇ ve hk'e te maˇ cawˇ leh laˇ. Ngaˬ shu hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh piˇ ve pa taw nawˬ nyi ma naˬ leh laˇ teh‸, k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40020016	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, shu awˬ g'u suhˍ g'a k'aw‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Shu awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ g'a k'aw‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40020017	Peuˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tiˉ kuˬ veu leh, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40020018	Ngaˬ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, yawˇ g'a suh tuˬ ve yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
40020019	Maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te ve, jaw‸ ve, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40020020	Oˇ htaˇ, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve yaˇ paˍ hui ve awˬ e leh yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh, awˬ e yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh teˇ ceuˬ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
40020021	Nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma heuˆ gaˇ ve le teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ na nyi htaˇ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Nawˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve yaˇ paˍ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, la‸ mehˍ paˉ teˇ g'aˇ a ciˉ mui piˇ lawˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40020022	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ lawˬ ve nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ. Ngaˬ g'a dawˬ tuˬ ve kawˆ hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˬ hpeh‸-aw laˇ teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Dawˬ hpeh‸-aw teh‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40020023	Ngaˬ ve kawˆ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a dawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ la‸ mehˍ paˉ g'a mui tuˬ ngaˬ pe‸ laˇ maˇ hpeh‸. Ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa gu taˍ ve chaw hui ceh tiˉ g'a mui tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ,
40020024	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi g'aˇ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ ve yoˬ.
40020025	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ uˉ peunˍ leh, yawˇ hui ve chaw uiˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ nyiˉ te ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40020026	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e maˇ g'a te. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw uiˍ hpeh‸ gaˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ nawˬ hui ve awˬ ceˬ g'a te ve yoˬ.
40020027	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ te gaˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve te g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon yawˇ lehˬ vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40020028	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, shu yawˇ awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ shu awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ laˬ leh, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ ve a sha‸ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40020029	Yeˍriˆhkoˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40020030	Oˇ htaˇ ya‸ k'aw paˇ lo mui chehˇ ve mehˆ cuˉ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ paˇ lo k'ai chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
40020031	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸, Ta‸ iˉ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸ deˇ piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, leuˉ leh k'aw‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
40020032	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ huˉ taˍ leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ kuˬ leh, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40020033	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ hpaw laˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40020034	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ htawˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ mehˆ mawˬ la leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40021001	Yawˇ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la leh, Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw hta‸ neˇ ve Behˆhpaˍgeˍ hk'aˆ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh k'oˆ ve,
40021002	Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ cawˬ ve hk'aˆ hk'aw lo k'ai-o. Oˇ kaˬ lo hpeh taˍ ve piˉ laˬ awˬ ma peuˍ leh awˬ yehˇ hta‸ teˇ cawˬ haˉ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Hpui leh ngaˬ geh sheh veu laˇ-oˆ.
40021003	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ k'oˆ ve k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ loˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40021004	Awˬ lawn chi ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve,
40021005	Ziˉonˍ ve yaˇ miˇ hta‸ chi hk'e hto piˇ-oˆ. Nyi loˬ, nawˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo piˉ laˬ awˬ ma peuˍ leh awˬ yehˇ hta‸ ciˇ leh nawˬ geh laˬ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40021006	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tcuh ve hk'e te ve yoˬ.
40021007	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, piˉ laˬ awˬ ma peuˍ leh awˬ yehˇ hta‸ sheh veu laˇ leh, piˉ laˬ oˇ ve nyiˇ hkeh awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve veu‸ k'aˇ hk'awˇ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ taˆ ciˇ ve yoˬ.
40021008	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw maˇ-awˍ ve a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo hk'awˇ piˇ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ suhˆ hpa‸ chaw leh ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo hk'awˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40021009	Yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ leh awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'ai ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ kuˬ leh, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ Hoˍsaˍnaˍ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo laˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma lo htawˇ, Hoˍsaˍnaˍ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40021010	Yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, venˇ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te leh, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ a shu le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40021011	Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ yaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40021012	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo mawˇ vuiˬ mawˇ hawˇ ve chaw hk'a pue-eˬ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ leh, hpu pa shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve hpui lawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, aˉ pui k'aˍ hawˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve mui hk'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hpfuhˆ baˬ ve yoˬ.
40021013	Ngaˬ ve yehˬ hta‸ bon lawˬ kuiˬ yehˬ g'a k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ, yehˬ chi hta‸ chaw hk'awˇ chehˇ kuiˬ hpeh‸ la piˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40021014	Mehˆ cuˉ paˍ hui leh hkui luˬ paˍ hui, bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw yawˇ geh laˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
40021015	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ te ve anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ Hoˍsaˍnaˍ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ kuˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40021016	Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ kaˇ-aw laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ kaˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh cuˉ dawˬ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve chiˇ mvuh hkawˇ nawˬ keu piˇ taˍ peuˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ g'aw jaw laˇ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40021017	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh, venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai leh Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ hk'aw lo ca haˉ ve yoˬ.
40021018	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la leh venˇ hk'aw k'aw‸ k'o‸-e htaˇ, yawˇ awˍ meu‸ ve yoˬ.
40021019	Ya‸ k'aw paˇ lo cawˬ ve maˉ nawˆ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ ca nyi htaˇ awˬ hpa‸ hta‸ ceh tiˉ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, nawˬ awˬ shiˍ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ taˇ k'aw‸ naw‸ teh‸, maˉ nawˆ cehˬ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, maˉ nawˆ cehˬ oˇ ve teˇ cawˬ haˉ nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40021020	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ anˇ leh, Maˉ nawˆ cehˬ chi, aˬ hto‸ ma te teˇ cawˬ haˉ nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40021021	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui yonˍ leh nyi ma htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ maˇ te ve k'o, maˉ nawˆ cehˬ chi hta‸ ngaˬ te piˇ ve hk'e nawˬ hui te hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, hk'aw chi teˇ shiˍ hta‸, Jiˆ tawˆ-e leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'aw lo ca ce lo‸-e loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40021022	Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hk'a lawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40021023	Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ lo‸-e leh maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hui ve awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve le. Kanˇ paˆ chi a shu nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40021024	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ na nyi shaˍ. Nawˬ hui yaw hk'aw‸ laˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve awˬ lawn nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40021025	Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, hk'aˬ lo g'a ve le. Mvuhˇ naw ma lo laˇ, chaw yaˇ hui geh lo laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ jehˬ da‸ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma lo g'a ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve k'o, Hk'e te leh nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve le teh‸, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40021026	Chaw yaˇ hui geh g'a ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ,
40021027	Hk'e te leh, Ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸ yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ hto laˇ.
40021028	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ ve le. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ geh yawˇ k'ai leh, Yaˇ paˍoˬ, ya‸ nyi a pehˉ meuˇ hko awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ kanˉ ca te-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ,
40021029	Ngaˬ maˇ k'ai teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ k'aw‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40021030	Peuˬ leh, awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ g'aˇ geh awˬ pa k'aw‸ k'ai leh, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ nyi paˍ lehˬ, Ngaˬ pa-oˬ, ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, yawˇ maˇ k'ai.
40021031	Yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ pa ve a loˍ hta‸ te ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Awˬ viˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ hui leh meh maˬ lanˉ teˇ hpaˍ, nawˬ hui awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
40021032	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ toˇ leh nawˬ hui geh lo laˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ hui leh meh maˬ lanˉ hui yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui chi hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve htawˇ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ, yawˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ yonˍ.
40021033	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tawˇ pa haˉ hta‸ na sheˍ. Yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a pehˉ meuˇ hko te leh ti taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hk'a deh‸ ko taˍ leh, a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ nyiˉ kuiˬ duˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Shaw kuiˬ yehˬ mvuh ve hta‸ htawˇ te taˍ leh, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˍ piˇ taˉ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40021034	Awˬ shiˍ meh ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ htaˇ, awˬ shiˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ hko te paˍ hui geh yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
40021035	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ leh, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ dawˆ ve, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ leh, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ ve yoˬ.
40021036	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ teˇ pawˆ a‸ kehˉ awˬ ceˬ maˇ chaweh hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'ai tcuh ve htawˇ, hko te paˍ hui lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ ka‸ te piˇ ve yoˬ.
40021037	Awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ pawˆ, Ngaˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui yawˆ yan tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
40021038	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Chaw chi lehˬ, awˬ shinˉ g'a shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Laˬ-o‸, yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ shinˉ hta‸ ngaˬ hui yuˬ-a veuˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40021039	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh, hko awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo chiˇ baˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
40021040	Hk'e te leh hko awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te piˇ tuˬ le teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40021041	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Haiˬ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ te luˬ te sheˆ piˇ leh, awˬ shiˍ meh la htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ shiˍ k'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hko te paˍ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ ngaˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40021042	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yehˬ kawˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hui baˬ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ ceˍ k'aweh‸ lo kawˍ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Chi lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha te taˍ ve kanˉ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ anˇ tu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ g'aw jaw laˇ,
40021043	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh yuˬ tawˆ leh, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la puiˉ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40021044	Haˉ pui oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ paiˍ ve chaw lehˬ, hteh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ pui oˇ ve ce teˍ ve k'o, chaw oˇ ve meu-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40021045	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ pa haˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui awˬ lawn k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40021046	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ gaˇ ve htawˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ kawˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ chaw chi ma ve shawˍ taˍ ve pa taw yoˬ.
40022001	Peuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ pa haˉ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ te leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40022002	Mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ awˬ pon hkehˉ caˇ tuˬ gu taˍ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40022003	Hkehˉ caˇ la tuˬ kuˬ taˍ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ ca k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'ai tcuh ve htawˇ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ maˇ laˬ.
40022004	Teˇ pawˆ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ peuˬ. Ngaˬ ve nuˇ leh chu ve ceˇ caˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ peuˬ. Hkehˉ caˇ la-o teh‸, kuˬ taˍ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca hto piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui te‸ chiˉ maˇ dawˇ leh, teˇ g'aˇ heh hk'aw k'ai leh, teˇ g'aˇ tanˇ kaˬ ca te k'ai ve yoˬ.
40022006	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te leh tiˇ pehˍ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40022007	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, yawˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ te luˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve venˇ hta‸ htawˇ aˬ miˍ tuˉ baˬ ve yoˬ.
40022008	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hkehˉ caˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, kuˬ taˍ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ laˬ maˇ keunˍ.
40022009	Hk'e te leh, ya‸ k'aw lonˉ ceh da‸ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ lo k'ai leh, hk'a mawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hkehˉ caˇ kuiˬ lo kuˬ veu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022010	Hk'e te leh, awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ya‸ k'aw lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lo k'ai leh, hk'a mawˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, maˇ da‸ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ, kuˬ hpawnˬ leh, hkehˉ caˇ kuiˬ lo chaw hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40022011	Hkehˉ caˇ la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ca lo‸ nyi la ve teˇ yanˇ, hkehˉ caˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ veu‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40022012	Hk'e te leh yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, hkehˉ caˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ maˇ veu‸ leh, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh nawˬ choˬ kaˬ lo‸ la ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ k'aw‸ k'oˆ maˇ g'a.
40022013	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yawˇ ve hkui sheh la‸ sheh hta‸ hpeh tsuh‸ leh, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ naˆ ho‸ kuiˬ lo baˬ keu-o. Oˇ kaˬ lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hui hawˬ leh ciˬ geu‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022014	Awˬ lawn k'o, kuˬ yuˬ ve chaw maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve htawˇ, leuˆ yuˬ ve chaw a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40022015	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw ya‸ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ hui jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40022016	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh Heˍroˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'ai leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ kawˆ leh, shu ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40022017	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ taˍ ve ngaˬ hui hta‸ a ciˉ hto laˇ-oˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ a moˇ keu piˇ cawˇ laˇ, maˇ keu piˇ cawˇ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40022018	Yawˇ hui nyi ma k'aw‸ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a shiˍ leh, Chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te ngaˬ hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve le.
40022019	A moˇ hpu teˇ hteh‸ ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpu teˇ hteh‸ yuˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022020	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, A shu ve awˬ han, a shu ve awˬ meh cawˬ le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022021	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hk'e te leh, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve mawˇ jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ piˇ-oˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ piˇ-oˆ.
40022022	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, anˇ leh yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40022023	K'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Saˍduˆkehˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ, oˇ ve teˇ nyi yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
40022024	Saˍ la‸-oˬ, Moˉseˍ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ yaˇ maˇ cawˬ leh suh ve k'o, awˬ nyi paˍ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ k'aw‸ heuˆ leh, awˬ viˉ paˍ awˬ pon awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ g'a cawˬ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40022025	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui geh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi suhˍ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ heuˆ leh, yaˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ suh leh, awˬ nyi paˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma teh taˉ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022026	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ, shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ, leh suhˍ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ hk'a gaˬ, chi hk'e teh taˉ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022027	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ suh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve htawˇ suh ve yoˬ.
40022028	Hk'e te leh, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw oˇ ve suhˍ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ heuˆ peuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40022029	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Li‸ hpu hta‸ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw nawˬ hui dawˇ ya‸ ve yoˬ.
40022030	Awˬ lawn k'o, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ka piˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ te. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hk'e hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40022031	Suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ lawn, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'aw jaw laˇ.
40022032	Ngaˬ lehˬ Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve G'uiˬ sha, Iˉcaˆ ve G'uiˬ sha leh Yaˍkoˆ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, suh ve chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022033	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui anˇ ve yoˬ.
40022034	Saˍduˆkehˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ tawˇ k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ maˇ g'a ve awˬ lawn Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui teˇ geh hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ.
40022035	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40022036	Saˍ la‸-oˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40022037	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve nyi ma hk'a peu-eˬ, nawˬ ve co ha hk'a peu-eˬ leh nawˬ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ g'a ha‸ ve yoˬ.
40022038	Piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ leh awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve teˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40022039	Nyiˇ hkawˇ teˇ hkawˇ htawˇ, awˉ lawˉ teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ shuˍ da‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, nawˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ g'a ha‸ ve yoˬ.
40022040	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ, piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ chi nyiˇ hkawˇ hta‸ tcuhˉ naw‸ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022041	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ na nyi ve,
40022042	Hkri‸ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ ve le. Yawˇ a shu ve yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Daˍviˆ ve yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40022043	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te leh, Awˬ ha hpu Daˍviˆ hta‸ dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw yawˇ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve le.
40022044	Awˬ lawn k'o Daˍviˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve hkui sheh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ taˍ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ-oˆ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40022045	Daˍviˆ yawˇ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh Daˍviˆ ve yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40022046	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ka‸ k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ maˇ hpeh‸ leh, oˇ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ka‸ shu k'aw‸ na nyi maˇ haˆ ve yoˬ.
40023001	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40023002	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui lehˬ, Moˉseˍ ve mui kuiˬ lo mui ve yoˬ.
40023003	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a k'oˆ laˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te-o. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui te ve hk'e taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve hk'e yawˇ hui maˇ te.
40023004	Hawˇ jaˇ ve mawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui tsuh‸ taˍ leh, chaw yaˇ hui ve la‸ hpeh k'aˉ hk'oˆ lo taˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, gu jiˆ pfuhˍ piˇ tuˬ a shu yawˇ ve la‸ naw meuˇ ceh ka‸ maˇ htawˇ.
40023005	Yawˇ hui hk'a te ve kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ ceh te ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu awˬ tawn ehˉ doˆ pfuhˇ kuiˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui uiˍ chaweh te leh, aˉ po‸ awˬ caˍ zuhˬ chaweh te ve yoˬ.
40023006	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hti caˇ hti dawˬ kuiˬ lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˇ, bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui hk'awˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
40023007	Tcuh hk'aw lo shu yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˆ yan laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, shu yawˇ hui hta‸ saˍ la‸ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
40023008	Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ saˍ la‸ teh‸ taˇ k'oˆ tcuh. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui saˍ la‸ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ leh, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40023009	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ awˬ pa teh‸ taˇ k'oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui Awˬ pa teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40023010	Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai shehˍ hpaˇ teh‸ taˇ k'oˆ tcuh. Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ nawˬ hui ve sheh k'ai shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40023011	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ ceˬ g'a te ve yoˬ.
40023012	A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ uiˍ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, taˍ i ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ i ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, taˍ uiˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40023013	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ, chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e tuˬ, nawˬ hui yehˬ miˉ hta‸ hoˆ tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui maˇ lo‸-e ve awˬ hk'oˆ, lo‸-e gaˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40023014	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ, chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mehˇ chawˇ ma ve yehˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui hiˉ yuˬ leh, nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ maˇ g'a tawˆ la tuˬ maw chaweh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, shu a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh uiˍ jaˇ ve ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40023015	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ, chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'oˆ nawˬ hui teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui a‸ kehˉ nyiˇ pun yawˇ hta‸ moˬ naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
40023016	Ya‸ k'aw maˍ shehˍ hpaˇ mehˆ cuˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve k'o, yawˇ hkanˍ ve hk'e maˇ te htawˇ te‸ chiˉ maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ ve shi hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve k'o, yawˇ hkanˍ taˍ ve hk'e g'a te ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40023017	Mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw luˬ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ uiˍ ve le. Shi uiˍ ve laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o shi hta‸ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ lawˬ ve bon yehˬ lonˉ uiˍ ve laˇ.
40023018	Nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ tanˇ kuiˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve k'o, yawˇ hkanˍ ve hk'e maˇ te htawˇ te‸ chiˉ maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve k'o, yawˇ hkanˍ taˍ ve hk'e g'a te ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40023019	Mehˆ cuˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ uiˍ ve le. Tanˇ tuˬ uiˍ ve laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o, tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ lawˬ ve tanˇ kuiˬ uiˍ ve laˇ.
40023020	Hk'e te leh tanˇ kuiˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve chaw lehˬ, tanˇ kuiˬ hta‸ ka‸, oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ka‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
40023021	Bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve chaw lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ ka‸, oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ka‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve yo‸.
40023022	Mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve k'aw jaw hta‸ ka‸, oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ mui shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ka‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
40023023	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ, chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ i hkinˇ, hawˉ loˍ leh g'aˆ shaweh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ teˇ chi pun teˇ pun yuˬ leh tanˇ piˇ ve htawˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo leuˉ leh uiˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ, hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ te ve, ha k'aˉ ve leh yonˍ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ naw hui maˇ te. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui te cawˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ teh taˉ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
40023024	Ya‸ k'aw maˍ shehˍ hpaˇ mehˆ cuˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui lehˬ puiˉ suhˆ naˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ che baˬ leh, kaˍ laˍ oˆ hta‸ hehˆ dawˬ ve yoˬ.
40023025	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ, chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ hkehˇ leh kawˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo tsuhˇ kehˬ ve htawˇ, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lehˬ hiˉ yuˬ lu yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh te ponˬ te leuˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40023026	Mehˆ cuˉ ve Hpaˍriˍsehˇ-oˬ, hkehˇ leh kawˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo da‸ kehˬ la tuˬ, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo awˉ lawˉ tsuhˇ kehˬ-o‸.
40023027	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ, chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ, hpuˉ lehˍ shehˍ taˍ ve chaw tuˍ hpfuh hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Tuˍ hpfuh oˇ ve awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo nyi sha ve htawˇ, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo chaw awˬ mu‸ ku leh cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40023028	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui lehˬ awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo heˍ ve leh haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40023029	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ, chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu te leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui ve kawˍ taˍ ve tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi sha tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
40023030	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ puˍ awˬ pi co-e htaˇ g'a chehˇ ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hta‸ ngaˬ hui tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40023031	Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
40023032	Nawˬ hui awˬ puˍ awˬ pi te ve hta‸ biˇ la tuˬ te-o.
40023033	Vuiˬ haiˬ awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, suhˉ taˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a geh tuˬ ve hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te ponˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
40023034	Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ lehˬ tcuh kaˍ paˍ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh lo peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ leh, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui ve bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo jaw‸ leh, teˇ venˇ peuˬ teˇ venˇ lo nawˬ hui k'ai leh fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40023035	Hk'e te leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve Aˍbeˍlaˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ te leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ leh tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ kaˍ lo nawˬ hui tiˇ pehˍ ve Baˍraˍhkiˆ yaˇ paˍ Zaˍhkaˍriˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hk'a gaˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo hk'a sheˆ peuˬ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ suhˍ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40023036	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ chaw chi teˇ co awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40023037	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ-oˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ-oˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ tiˇ pehˍ leh, nawˬ geh peu laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ pehˍ ve yoˬ. G'aˆ ma peuˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ yehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ toˍ la‸ k'uˉ awˬ hawˉ lo hpoˆ chehˇ piˇ lawˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'aˬ nyiˇ pawˆ hpoˆ chehˇ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ maˇ te.
40023038	Nyi loˬ, nawˬ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lehˬ, gawˬ cu gawˬ pehˆ te teh taˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
40023039	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo laˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, nawˬ hui maˇ k'oˆ ve ceh ceh, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40024001	Yeˍsuˆ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ beˆ maˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
40024002	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui mawˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yehˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ haˉ pui teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ teˇ shiˍ maˇ cawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ shu te luˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024003	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo mui chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ htaˆ hpeh‸ la tuˬ le. Nawˬ k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ ve leh, miˬ guiˬ chi awˬ yanˇ leh tuˬ ve awˬ heˆ hk'aˬ hk'e hpehˬ tawˆ la tuˬ ve le. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ a ciˉ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40024004	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸.
40024005	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw maˇ maˇ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pfuhˇ laˬ leh, Ngaˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024006	Ma‸ bawˆ ve leh bawˆ da‸-a teh‸ te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui maˇ g'a kawˆ cheˇ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve htawˇ, awˬ leh meuˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ.
40024007	Chaw teˇ ceuˬ leh teˇ ceuˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ leh teˇ peˆ ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Meu‸ ve kaˆ ve leh miˬ hiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ lo hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40024008	Chi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
40024009	Oˇ htaˇ, fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024010	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw maˇ maˇ hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ chiˇ a‸ da‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ canˇ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024011	Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ maˇ maˇ tawˆ la leh, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024012	Haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ cawˬ maˇ la ve pa taw, chaw maˇ maˇ ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ i k'ai yawnˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
40024013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ yeˬ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40024014	Chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo ca maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40024015	Hk'e te leh, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Daˍyeˍlaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, te luˬ te sheˆ puiˉ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, (li‸ chi hta‸ g'aw ve chaw lehˬ shiˍ-o‸.)
40024016	oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hk'aw hk'oˆ lawˬ hk'oˆ lo hpaw-e loˬ.
40024017	Yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mawˇ ca yuˬ tuˬ, taˇ k'aw‸ ya‸-e.
40024018	Heh hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ ca k'aw‸ yuˬ tuˬ taˇ k'o‸-e.
