40024019	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yaˇ hu ma leh cuˉ dawˬ ve yaˇ ehˉ cawˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024020	Nawˬ hui g'a hpaw-e ve awˬ yanˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ kaˆ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, shinˉ nyi htaˇ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ g'a cawˇ tuˬ bon lawˬ-o‸.
40024021	Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ maˇ hpeh‸ la jaw sheˍ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve tu‸ jaˇ hkanˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, oˇ htaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40024022	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve maˇ ngeh piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ponˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ngeh piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024023	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Nyi-o, Hkri‸ choˬ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ, oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve k'o taˇ yonˍ.
40024024	Awˬ lawn k'o, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve Hkri‸ leh maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hpeh‸ ve k'o leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ g'a tuˬ, uiˍ ve anˇ tuˬ leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024025	Nyi loˬ, maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40024026	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui lehˬ, Nyi loˬ, yawˇ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve ka‸ taˇ k'ai. Bawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve ka‸ taˇ yonˍ.
40024027	Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ lehˬ mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ hpawˇ lo ba la leh mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ hpawˇ lo gaˬ ve hk'e, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ ve lehˬ, chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024028	Suh taˍ ve awˬ to hk'a cawˬ kuiˬ lo, naˬ beuˬ ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40024029	Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ mvuhˇ nyi naˆ ho‸ k'ai leh, ha pa htawˇ awˬ g'euˆ maˇ k'aw‸ ba. Meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ mvuhˇ naw ma lo ce la leh, mvuhˇ naw ma ve kanˇ paˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
40024030	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu ve awˬ heˆ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ paˆ hawˬ leh, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, uiˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, mvuhˇ naw ma ve moˬ hta‸ ciˇ ya‸ la ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024031	Peuˬ leh, behˬ heh ma awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh meuˆ leh, yawˇ yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ awˇ ceˍ miˬ awˍ hpawˇ lo yawˇ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ hpawnˬ da‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024032	Maˉ nawˆ cehˬ hta‸ tehˆ maˍ ve tawˇ pa haˉ chi hta‸ henˇ yuˬ-o‸. Awˬ tuˍ tuˍ la leh, awˬ caˍ caˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ cha hkui yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40024033	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ ceuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ lehˬ yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-o‸.
40024034	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chi teˇ co maˇ ponˬ k'ai sheˍ htaˇ, awˬ ceuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40024035	Mvuhˇ naw ma leh miˬ naˆ ma mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ maˇ mehˉ k'ai taˬ.
40024036	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui ka‸, Yaˇ hpu ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Awˬ pa teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40024037	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ ve lehˬ, Noˉa‸ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024038	Awˬ lawn k'o, Noˉa‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ, iˉ kaˆ maˇ htonˍ sheˍ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hui lehˬ caˇ ve dawˬ ve, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ da‸ leh ka piˇ ve, chi hk'e te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40024039	Iˉ kaˆ htonˍ la leh yawˇ hui hta‸ poˬ chiˇ veu htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ ve hk'e, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024040	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ heh hk'aw lo teˇ geh chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teh taˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024041	Yaˇ miˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ geh haˉ pui mawˍ geuˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teh taˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
40024042	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ ve Awˬ jawˇ mawˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ nyi k'aw‸ gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw shaw taˍ-o‸.
40024043	Yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ laˬ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ shiˍ taˍ ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hk'awˇ maˇ g'a lo‸ la tuˬ yawˇ shaw taˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-o‸.
40024044	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui htawˇ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, naw hui maˇ dawˇ maˇ gaˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
40024045	Ka ti‸ yeˬ leh cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu le. Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ yanˇ cawˇ lehˍ caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ pehˬ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve hta‸ awˬ hoˉ te tcuh ve yoˬ.
40024046	Awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e te chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh g'a mawˬ ve k'o, awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve lehˬ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
40024047	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve hta‸ awˬ hoˉ te tcuh tuˬ yoˬ.
40024048	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, haiˬ ve awˬ ceˬ lehˬ, Ngaˬ ve awˬ jawˇ mawˇ haˆ haˆ maˇ k'aw‸ la taˬ teh‸ yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ leh,
40024049	awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˆ leh, tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve chaw hui geh caˇ chehˇ dawˬ chehˇ ve k'o,
40024050	awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve maˇ dawˇ maˇ gaˇ ve awˬ nyi, maˇ shiˍ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh,
40024051	yawˇ hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh ciˍ yanˍ piˇ leh chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh chehˇ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hui hawˬ leh ciˬ geu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025001	Peuˬ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve kawˆ faiˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ yuˬ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ teˇ chi g'aˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
40025002	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˇ g'aˇ lehˬ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ leh, ngaˇ g'aˇ lehˬ cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40025003	Awˬ lawn k'o, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve kawˆ faiˇ hta‸ yuˬ k'ai htaˇ, naˍ manˇ maˇ yuˬ k'ai.
40025004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve kawˆ faiˇ geh teˇ geh naˍ manˇ kaw hta‸ htawˇ yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40025005	Awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ haˆ haˆ maˇ laˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ zuh‸ muiˉ jo leh, zuh‸ muiˉ k'a sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40025006	Shehˍ k'aw hkui htaˇ gaˬ leh, Nyi loˬ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ laˬ peuˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ yuˬ loˬ teh‸, shu kuˬ hk'a laˇ ve yoˬ.
40025007	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ miˇ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ tu la leh, a shu yawˇ ve kawˆ faiˇ hta‸ gu tuˉ ve yoˬ.
40025008	Cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve ngaˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ hui ve kawˆ faiˇ suh la paˇ neˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ve naˍ manˇ a ciˉ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve ngaˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40025009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Ngaˬ hui awˬ pon leh nawˬ hui awˬ pon naˍ manˇ maˇ law‸ hehˉ. Naˍ manˇ hawˇ shehˍ hpaˇ geh k'ai leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ca vuiˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40025010	Yawˇ hui ca vuiˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ laˬ leh, gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hkehˉ caˇ kuiˬ lo yawˇ geh teˇ geh lo‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yehˬ miˉ hoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40025011	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yaˇ miˇ haˉ oˇ ve ngaˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ la leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ yehˬ miˉ a ciˉ hpaw laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40025012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ shiˍ teh‸, k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40025013	Hk'e te leh, awˬ nyi hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ yanˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw hk'a deh‸ shaw taˍ-o‸.
40025014	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ leh, yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ taˉ ve hta‸ shuˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025015	Yawˇ hui puiˉ ve hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ nyi leh, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpu ngaˇ hinˉ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nyiˇ hinˉ leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ hinˉ piˇ taˉ leh tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40025016	Oˇ htaˇ, hpu ngaˇ hinˉ g'a ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ k'ai leh ca kaˬ ve pa taw, awˬ yawˬ ngaˇ hinˉ k'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
40025017	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, hpu nyiˇ hinˉ g'a ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, awˬ yawˬ nyiˇ hinˉ k'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
40025018	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hpu teˇ hinˉ g'a ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve hpu hta‸ yuˬ leh miˬ k'oˍ ca duˇ faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40025019	Awˬ yanˇ maw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve awˍ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ la leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui geh hpu caˇ lanˇ shawˍ nyi ve yoˬ.
40025020	Hpu ngaˇ hinˉ g'a taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh, awˬ yawˬ ngaˇ hinˉ hteh‸ ka‸ yuˬ veu laˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hpu ngaˇ hinˉ pe‸ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nyi-o, awˬ yawˬ ngaˇ hinˉ hteh‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ g'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40025021	Yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Da‸ ve yoˬ. Na yuˬ puiˉ leh da‸ ve awˬ ceˬ-oˬ, i ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ na yuˬ puiˉ ve pa taw, maˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ teh taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ha lehˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ htawˇ ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40025022	Hpu nyiˇ hinˉ g'a taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ laˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hpu nyiˇ hinˉ pe‸ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nyi-o, awˬ yawˬ nyiˇ hinˉ hteh‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ g'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40025023	Yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Da‸ ve yoˬ. Na yuˬ puiˉ leh da‸ ve awˬ ceˬ-oˬ, i ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ na yuˬ puiˉ ve pa taw, maˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ teh taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ha lehˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ htawˇ ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40025024	Hpu teˇ hinˉ g'a taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ laˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ te haˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ maˇ sheˍ kuiˬ lo nawˬ g'eu‸ yuˬ leh, nawˬ maˇ hpeuˇ baˬ kuiˬ lo nawˬ shaw hpoˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40025025	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ kawˆ ve pa taw, nawˬ ve hpu hta‸ miˬ k'oˍ hk'aw duˇ faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nyi-o, nawˬ ve mawˇ nawˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40025026	Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Haiˬ ve leh bawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ-oˬ, maˇ sheˍ kuiˬ lo ngaˬ g'eu‸ yuˬ leh, maˇ hpeuˇ baˬ kuiˬ lo ngaˬ shaw hpoˆ ve hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ ve k'o,
40025027	hpu chi ve hta‸ yuˬ leh hpu chiˇ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui hta‸ chiˇ piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, ngaˬ k'aw‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ ve hpu chi ve leh awˬ yawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
40025028	Hk'e te leh, hpu teˇ hinˉ hta‸ yawˇ geh yuˬ hk'aw‸ leh, hpu teˇ meunˍ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ piˇ-oˆ.
40025029	Awˬ lawn k'o, cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ k'aw‸ htehˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ maˇ maˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ cawˬ ve chaw geh, yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve hta‸ ka‸ k'aw‸ yuˬ tawˆ sheˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025030	Awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ naˆ ho‸ kuiˬ lo baˬ keu-o. Oˇ kaˬ lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hui hawˬ leh ciˬ geu‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40025031	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ geh laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve k'aw jaw awˬ hk'oˆ yawˇ mui tuˬ yoˬ.
40025032	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hpawnˬ la leh, yawˬ hawˉ paˍ, yawˬ leh aˉ che‸ hta‸ pehˬ da‸ ve hk'e, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ pehˬ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025033	Yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ taˍ leh, aˉ che‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ la‸ mehˍ paˉ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025034	Oˇ htaˇ, la‸ sha paˉ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ Awˬ pa geh awˬ bon g'a ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, laˬ-o‸. Miˬ guiˬ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui awˬ pon gu taˍ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ chehˇ la-o.
40025035	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˍ meu‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ awˍ caˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ taw laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hkehˉ chaw hpeh‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
40025036	Ngaˬ veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ veu‸ k'aˇ feuˉ laˇ ve yoˬ, Ngaˬ chehˇ haˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ nyi laˇ ga laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ca nyi la ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025037	Oˇ htaˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ awˍ meu‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh awˍ caˍ laˇ ve hk'aˬ htaˆ le. Nawˬ iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh iˉ kaˆ taw laˇ ve hk'aˬ htaˆ le.
40025038	Nawˬ hkehˉ chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve hk'aˬ htaˆ le. Veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ cawˬ leh veu‸ k'aˇ feuˉ laˇ ve hk'aˬ htaˆ le.
40025039	Nawˬ chehˇ haˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh nawˬ hta‸ ca nyi la ve hk'aˬ htaˆ le teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025040	Oˇ htaˇ, Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo i jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui te piˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hta‸ te laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025041	Oˇ htaˇ, la‸ mehˍ paˉ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hui-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh, neˇ haiˬ leh yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ hui awˬ pon gu taˍ ve co co taiˍ taiˍ to‸ chehˇ ve aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e loˬ.
40025042	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˍ meu‸ ve teˇ yanˇ nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ caˍ laˇ. Ngaˬ iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ maˇ taw laˇ.
40025043	Ngaˬ hkehˉ chaw hpeh‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ. Ngaˬ veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ feuˉ laˇ. Ngaˬ chehˇ haˍ ve teˇ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ ca nyi la teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025044	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ awˍ meu‸ ve, iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve, hkehˉ chaw hpeh‸ ve, veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ cawˬ ve, chehˇ haˍ ve, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, nawˬ hta‸ maˇ ga laˇ ve hk'aˬ htaˆ le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025045	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo i jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ te piˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ te laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
40025046	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ ciˍ yanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026001	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40026002	Nyiˇ nyi peuˬ k'o, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ peh tuˬ, shu chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026003	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hui lehˬ, Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ meh ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve shaˉ nanˉ lo hpawnˬ da‸ leh,
40026004	hk'aˬ hk'e te leh heˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40026005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Chaw chi ma ve duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ maˇ g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ, pawehˇ te ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ te teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40026006	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ hk'aw hkiˬ tu‸ paˍ Siˉmonˍ ve aˉ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ htaˇ,
40026007	yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve naˍ manˇ hawnˉ keu taˍ ve hpuˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui kaw teˇ maˬ yuˬ laˬ leh, hpui lawˇ paˇ lo Yeˍsuˆ mui caˇ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ naˍ manˇ hawnˉ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026008	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve hta‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ leh k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma te awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chi hta‸ yehˇ baˬ ve le.
40026009	Naˍ manˇ hawnˉ chi ve hta‸ awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ chaweh hawˇ leh haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ hui hta‸ pehˬ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ chi hta‸ shiˍ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yaˇ miˇ chi hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te sho‸ sha‸ piˇ ve le. Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ te laˇ peuˬ.
40026011	Haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
40026012	Naˍ manˇ hawnˉ chi ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ laˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ tuˍ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ pon yawˇ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
40026013	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi, miˬ guiˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo ca maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ miˇ chi hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ te taˍ ve kanˉ chi hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026014	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui geh k'ai leh,
40026015	Nawˬ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ ma pe‸ laˇ tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpu shehˆ chi hteh‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026016	Oˇ teˇ hkui hta‸ tanˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ, da‸ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ Yuˇda‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40026017	Hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'aw lo diˇ maˇ keu ve pawehˇ awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ caˇ tuˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon hk'aˬ lo teˇ kaˬ gu tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40026018	Yawˇ lehˬ, Venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw oˇ ve hpaˇ geh k'ai leh, Saˍ la‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ yanˇ neˇ la peuˬ. Nawˬ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh teˇ geh Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ hta‸ ngaˬ caˇ tuˬ yoˬ ceˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
40026019	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ tcuh ve hk'e awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ te leh, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ caˇ tuˬ awˬ pon ca gu ve yoˬ.
40026020	Mehˆ muiˉ naˆ la htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ geh hpui lawˇ paˇ lo yawˇ mui caˇ ve yoˬ.
40026021	Yawˇ hui caˇ chehˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40026022	Yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ jaˇ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ laˇ teh‸ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40026023	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ geh teˇ hkehˇ tiˉ hkaˆ caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
40026024	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e yawˇ g'a k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ chiˇ a‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve maˇ paw la ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026025	Yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ shehˍ hpaˇ Yuˇda‸ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yoˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026026	Yawˇ hui caˇ chehˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ hk'eh‸ leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Yuˬ leh caˇ-oˆ. Chi lehˬ ngaˬ ve awˬ to yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026027	Kawˆ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ yuˬ leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ chi hta‸ dawˬ-o‸.
40026028	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi lehˬ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ, chaw maˇ maˇ awˬ pon ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ ve yoˬ.
40026029	Nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a dawˬ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ dawˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026030	Peuˬ leh yawˇ hui k'a muiˬ hkawˇ k'a peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui tawˆ-e leh Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
40026031	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ya‸ puiˉ nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw nyi ma luˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yawˬ hawˉ paˍ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˆ pehˍ leh, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˆ da‸ leh teˇ kaˬ teˇ hkeh hpaw k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40026032	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ hui g'uˇ suhˍ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026033	Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hta‸ pa taw shu hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma luˬ htawˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ nyi ma maˇ luˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026034	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ya‸ puiˉ g'aˆ hpfuh maˇ bvuhˬ sheˍ htaˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ chiˇ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
40026035	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ g'a suh ve htawˇ, nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ chiˇ baˬ taˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026036	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh k'ai leh, Geˍseˍmaˍniˆ meh ve teˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo bon ca lawˬ htaˇ, nawˬ hui choˬ kaˬ lo mui taˍ-o‸ teh‸, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026037	Peuˬ leh, Peˍtruˆ leh Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ veu ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ nyi ma dawˇ haˍ jaˇ, sho‸ sha‸ jaˇ la leh,
40026038	yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nyi ma dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve suh la yoˬ. Choˬ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ leh ngaˬ geh teˇ geh shaw taˍ-o‸.
40026039	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ a ciˉ k'ai leh, yawˇ mehˆ hpfuhˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ sheˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ pa-oˬ, kawˆ chi hta‸ ngaˬ ponˬ k'ai hpeh‸ ve k'o, ponˬ k'ai tcuh laˇ-oˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Nawˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
40026040	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh yawˇ k'aw‸ la leh, yawˇ hui zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Teˇ naˍ riˍ ceh ka‸ nawˬ hui ngaˬ geh shaw taˍ maˇ hpeh‸ laˇ.
40026041	Nawˬ hui beˬ ve lawˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ bon lawˬ leh shaw taˍ-o‸. Ngaˬ hui te gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ htawˇ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ lehˬ, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026042	Yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai leh, Ngaˬ Pa-oˬ, kawˆ chi hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ dawˬ leh ponˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve k'o, nawˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸, bon k'aw‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
40026043	Yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'aw‸ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui zuh‸ muiˉ geu‸ jaˇ ve pa taw zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40026044	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ teh taˉ leh teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ yawˇ lawˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shehˆ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ bon k'aw‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
40026045	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh yawˇ k'aw‸ la leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui zuh‸ muiˉ k'a leh g'aˇ jehˇ chehˇ sheˍ laˇ. Nyi loˬ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, chaw haiˬ hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ.
40026046	Tu, k'ai-a veuˬ. Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026047	Yawˇ tawˇ yaw chehˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh, aˉ htaw pfuhˇ leh suhˆ taˬ taˆ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ tcuh peu laˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40026048	Yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ heˆ chi hk'e te tuˬ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve, Ngaˬ boˆ nu ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tiˍ taˍ-o‸.
40026049	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh teˇ cawˬ haˉ k'ai leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ boˆ nu ve yoˬ.
40026050	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ dawˇ taˍ leh laˬ ve hk'e te-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ vawˆ leh yuˬ tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40026051	Yeˍsuˆ geh chehˇ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve aˉ htaw g'awˬ tawˆ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ chaw leh, naˍ paw cheˆ ve yoˬ.
40026052	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve aˉ htaw hta‸ awˬ hpui awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ hk'aw‸ keu-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, aˉ htaw hk'a yehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, aˉ htaw hta‸ pa taw luˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
40026053	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ moˍ awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸ ngaˬ geh peu laˇ tuˬ, chi beu‸ ngaˬ Awˬ pa geh lawˬ maˇ g'a teh‸ nawˬ dawˇ ve laˇ.
40026054	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ oˇ hk'e lawˬ ve k'o, chi hk'e g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve Li‸ hpu teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ hk'e te biˇ la tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026055	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ hta‸ ca hpeh yuˬ ve hk'e aˉ htaw leh suhˆ taˬ teˇ hpaˍ yuˬ veu laˇ leh, ngaˬ hta‸ ca hpeh la ve laˇ. Teˇ nyi le le bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hkaw lo ngaˬ mui taˍ leh maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ hpeh yuˬ.
40026056	Ya‸ hk'aˇ chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh hpaw-e ve yoˬ.
40026057	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ lo, paw hkuˇ lonˉ Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ geh yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
40026058	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve shaˉ nanˉ awˬ paˇ lo ko taˍ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ hk'a gaˬ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh a ciˉ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai leh, awˬ lawn chi awˬ leh meuˇ hk'a gaˬ g'a shiˍ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ lo‸-e leh shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
40026059	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ, yawˇ awˬ lawn maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui ca ve yoˬ.
40026060	Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ maˇ maˇ tu la leh awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo laˬ ve htawˇ, jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ ca maˇ mawˬ. Awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ htaˇ, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
40026061	Chi hpaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ ngaˬ te luˬ leh, shehˆ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ te g'a ve yoˬ ceˇ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
40026062	Oˇ htaˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ tu la leh, Nawˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ yaw hk'aw‸ ve laˇ. Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ awˬ lawn aˬ hto‸ ma shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026063	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, nawˬ yoˬ laˇ. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ hkanˍ tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026064	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yoˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, chi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, Kanˇ paˆ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui leh, mvuhˇ naw ma ve moˬ hta‸ ciˇ ya‸ la ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026065	Oˇ htaˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ tzuh‸ suhˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ peuˬ. Ngaˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma shaˉ hkiˆ k'aw‸ loˍ sheˍ le.Yawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve hta‸ chi beu‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
40026066	Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yawˇ lehˬ suh keunˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026067	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ pfuhˍ leh yawˇ hta‸ chu-iˬ ve yoˬ.
40026068	Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hta leh k'oˆ ve, Hkri‸-oˬ, nawˬ hta‸ a shu dawˆ laˇ ve le. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'e te leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026069	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, shaˉ nanˉ awˬ paˇ lo ko taˍ kuiˬ awˬhk'aw hpawˇ lo mui chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceˬ ma teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Nawˬ htawˇ Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw Yeˍsuˆ geh chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026070	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Peˍtruˆ g'awˬ hk'aˆ leh, Nawˬ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40026071	Peuˬ leh, Peˍtruˆ ko taˍ kuiˬ yehˬ miˉ awˬ baˬ lo tawˆ k'ai htaˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ ma teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ mawˬ leh, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ geh chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026072	Yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ g'awˬ hk'aˆ leh, Chaw oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ leh hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
40026073	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw gaˬ leh, oˇ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ Peˍtruˆ geh laˬ leh, Nawˬ htawˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ tawˇ yaw ve hkawˇ hta‸ na ve ceh ka‸, ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40026074	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ hkeu leh, Chaw oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ leh hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Teˇ cawˬ haˉ g'aˆ hpfuh bvuhˬ la ve yoˬ.
40026075	G'aˆ hpfuh maˇ bvuhˬ sheˍ htaˇ nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ chiˇ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ Peˍtruˆ dawˇ nawˇ la ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh g'aˇ hte‸ hawˬ ve yoˬ.
40027001	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
40027002	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpeh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ sheh veu leh, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ Piˉla‸ ve la‸ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027003	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ shehˍ hpaˇ Yuˇda‸ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ shu suhˉ taˆ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh, hpu oˇ ve shehˆ chi hteh‸ hta‸ paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh k'aw‸ yuˬ laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
40027004	Venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ ngaˬ chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ venˇ baˆ te peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chi ve ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Nawˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ nawˬ hk'aˇ nawˬ nyi-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027005	Hpu oˇ ve hta‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu taˉ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ k'awˍ peˍ ca nyiˉ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
40027006	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hpu oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ leh, Hpu chi lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, hpu tanˇ geh hkaw‸ da‸ maˇ cawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027007	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui jehˬ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hkehˉ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tuˍ piˇ tuˬ, hpu oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ leh mu‸ hk'u te shehˍ hpaˇ ve miˬ guiˬ teˇ peˆ hta‸ vuiˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40027008	Hk'e te leh, ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ miˬ guiˬ oˇ ve teˇ peˆ hta‸ Awˬ suhˍ miˬ guiˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027009	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Yeˍraˍmiˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e biˇ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ awˬ hpfuhˇ k'oˆ cheˆ taˍ ve, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ hpu shehˆ chi hta‸ yuˬ leh,
40027010	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ laˇ ve hk'e, mu‸ hk'u te shehˍ hpaˇ ve miˬ guiˬ teˇ peˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui vuiˬ ve yoˬ.
40027011	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ huˉ chehˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yoˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027012	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ.
40027013	Oˇ htaˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Nawˬ awˬ lawn yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hk'aˬ hk'e hkanˍ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ maˇ kaˇ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ lehˬ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ka‸ maˇ yaw hk'aw‸ ve pa taw, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
40027015	Pawehˇ oˇ ve hta‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw chi ma ve nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ hpehˇ piˇ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40027016	Oˇ htaˇ, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ meh bvuhˬ ve Baˍraˍbaˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
40027017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ htaˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui awˬ pon a shu hta‸ hpehˇ tcuh gaˇ le. Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
40027018	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hkawehˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve pa taw yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ ve hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40027019	Peuˬ leh, suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo yawˇ mui chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ chi hk'e shanˍ piˇ ve, Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, ya‸ nyi yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ zuh‸ maˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a tu‸ hkanˍ jaˇ peuˬ teh‸, tawˇ shanˍ feu piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027020	Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ lawˬ yuˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ g'aˇ hte‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027021	Mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ lehˬ, Chaw chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui awˬ pon hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpehˇ tcuh gaˇ le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ na nyi htaˇ, Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027022	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Hk'e te k'o, Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ loˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027023	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw le. Yawˇ haiˬ ve aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ loˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui leuˉ leh g'aˇ hte‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
40027024	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, yawˇ te‸ chiˉ te maˇ g'a ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, shu duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te tawˆ la ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ iˉ kaˆ yuˬ leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ la‸ sheh tsuhˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ suhˍ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ taˇ gaˬ la piˇ. Nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui te-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027025	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ ngaˬ hui leh ngaˬ hui ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ gaˬ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027026	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ jaw‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027027	Oˇ htaˇ mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shiˍ k'ai leh, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ ta‸ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh hpawnˬ la piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027028	Yawˇ hui yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ hta‸ k'ehˆ baˬ leh, nyiˉ-ehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma yawˇ hta‸ deh piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027029	Aˉ chuˇ te hta‸ yuˬ leh shi uˉ tcuhˍ hk'e te g'a‸ leh, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ la‸ sha paˉ ve la‸ sheh hk'aw lo, lo taˬ teˇ taˬ vawˆ taˍ tcuh leh, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh k'oˆ ve, Yuˇda‸ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ-oˬ, nawˬ awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te leh k'oˆ guiˇ ve yoˬ.
40027030	Yawˇ hta‸ ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ pfuhˍ leh, lo taˬ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ yuˬ leh yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ dawˆ ve yoˬ.
40027031	Yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ yawˇ hui k'ehˆ baˬ leh, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ feuˉ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ sheh k'ai ve yoˬ.
40027032	Yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, Siˉ monˍ meh ve Kuˇreˍneˍ venˇ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ nyiˉ leh Yeˍsuˆ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ tcuh ve yoˬ.
40027033	Gawˇlaˍgawˇtaˆ meh ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo yawˇ hui gaˬ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ meh oˇ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, oˉ koˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027034	Hk'aˇ ve naˆ tsuhˇ hkaw‸ taˍ ve a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ taw piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ leh‸ nyi sheˬ leh maˇ dawˬ.
40027035	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu peuˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui kuˇ da‸ leh yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
40027036	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui oˇ kaˬ lo mui leh yawˇ hta‸ shaw taˍ ve yoˬ.
40027037	Chaw chi lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve li‸ yawˇ hui bvuh‸ leh, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo nehˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40027038	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh chaw hk'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ, la‸ sha paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, la‸ mehˍ paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
40027039	K'ai chehˇ laˬ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ leh, a shu yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hiˆ leh k'oˆ ve,
40027040	Bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ te luˬ leh shehˆ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ te g'a ve chaw-oˬ, nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ponˬ piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ k'o, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027041	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui lehˬ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ ve yoˬ.
40027042	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Shu hta‸ yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ maˇ g'a. Yawˇ lehˬ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la piˇ sheˍ. Oˇ htaˇ heh‸, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
40027043	Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ cuˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ G'ui sha ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ k'o, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ lawˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027044	Yawˇ geh teˇ geh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve chaw hk'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027045	Mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ htaˇ ka‸ tanˬ leh mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ hk'a gaˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ naˆ ho‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40027046	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ hk'e gaˬ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh te leh, Eˇliˆ, Eˇliˆ, laˍmaˍ saˍbaˆtaˍniˍ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, Ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ laˇ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027047	Oˇ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, Eˇliˇya‸ hta‸ kuˬ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027048	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ g'uiˇ k'ai leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ mvuhˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh, ci ve awˬ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tuˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, lo taˬ hta‸ choˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ taw piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027049	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Taˇ te sheˍ. Eˇliˇya‸ yawˇ htaˬ ca htaiˍ hk'aw‸ la tuˬ leh naˍ, nyi taˍ shaˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027050	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ kuˬ leh shaˉ cheˆ ve yoˬ.
40027051	Oˇ htaˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ ve hpaˬ kaˍ lehˬ, awˬ na te leh awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a gaˬ nyiˇ hkoˇ tzuh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ. Miˬ hiˆ leh, haˉ pui teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ hkoˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
40027052	Tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ hpaw sheˬ leh, suh taˍ peuˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ laiˉ g'aˇ awˬ to k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve yoˬ.
40027053	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui tuˍ hpfuh hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh, da‸ kehˬ ve venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
40027054	Ma‸ poˍ leh yawˇ geh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ shaw chehˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, miˬ hiˆ ve leh hk'a hpeh‸ la ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ leh, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na G'uiˬ sha ve yaˇ hpu teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027055	Oˇ kaˬ a ciˉ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo yaˇ miˇ laiˉ g'aˇ htawˇ chehˇ leh nyi taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh yawˇ hta‸ te caˍ te taw piˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ.
40027056	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo, Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ, Yaˍkoˆ leh Yoˇseh‸ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ leh, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ hui ve awˬ e, chi teˇ hpaˍ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40027057	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, Aˍriˆma‸htehˍ venˇ yaˇ Yoˇseh‸ meh ve paw sha paˍ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
40027058	Yawˇ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ piˇ tuˬ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027059	Hk'e te leh Yoˇseh‸ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ yuˬ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, da‸ kehˬ ve hpa hpu yuˬ htiˆ sheˬ leh, haˉ pui htawˆ taˍ ve,
40027060	yawˇ ve tuˍ hpfuh awˬ suhˉ awˬ hk'aw lo keu taˍ ve yoˬ. Tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ lo uiˍ jaˇ ve haˉ pui teˇ shiˍ hta‸ hpfuhˆ tsuhˇ taˉ leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
40027061	Oˇ kaˬ lo Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Maˍriˆ teˇ g'aˇ, tuˍ hpfuh awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ vuiˇ maˇ neˇ kuiˬ lo mui chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
40027062	Pawehˇ te tuˬ gu ve awˬ nyi peuˬ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh hpawnˬ k'ai leh k'oˆ ve,
40027063	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, heˍ puiˉ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ te‸ chehˇ htaˇ, Shehˆ nyi peuˬ k'o ngaˬ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ nawˇ ve yoˬ.
40027064	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca hk'awˇ yuˬ leh, Yawˇ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ teh‸, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ maˇ g'a ca k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ, shehˆ nyi hk'a gaˬ tuˍ hpfuh oˇ ve hta‸ hk'a deh‸ shaw taˍ tuˬ tawˇ piˇ-oˆ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, awˉ lawˉ heˍ ve a‸ kehˉ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ heˍ ve lehˬ, leuˉ leh jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40027065	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui geh shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. K'ai leh nawˬ hui te g'a ve hk'e, hk'a deh‸ te leh shaw tcuh-o teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40027066	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui k'ai leh, tuˍ hpfuh hta‸ shu hpaw maˇ g'a tuˬ haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ yinˉ tcuhˉ sheˬ leh, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ hui hta‸ shaw tcuh taˍ ve yoˬ.
40028001	Shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi peuˬ leh, suhˍ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi mvuhˇ htiˇ la paˇ neˇ htaˇ, Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Maˍriˆ teˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ tuˍ hpfuh hta‸ ca nyi ve yoˬ.
40028002	Oˇ htaˇ miˬ hiˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la leh haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ sheˬ leh, haˉ pui shiˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
40028003	Yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han lehˬ, mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ htawˇ vaˇ meu-e hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpu ve yoˬ.
40028004	Shaw shehˍ hpaˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ kawˆ jaˇ ve pa taw cheˇ jaˇ leh, chaw suh hk'e hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
40028005	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Taˇ kawˆ. La‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ ca nyi la ve ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
40028006	Yawˇ choˬ kaˬ maˇ chehˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ teh taˍ kuiˬ lo ca nyi la-o.
40028007	Haˆ haˆ k'o‸-e leh, suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ ca hto piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui g'uˇ suhˍ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'ai peuˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ sheˍ. Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40028008	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ kawˆ ka‸ kawˆ, ha lehˬ ka‸ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ cawˬ haˉ tuˍ hpfuh lo tu leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ tuˬ g'uiˇ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
40028009	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ca ha‸ la leh, Awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ ve hkui sheh hta‸ ca vawˆ taˍ leh yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
40028010	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Taˇ kawˆ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai tuˬ ca hto piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
40028011	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, hk'a hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
40028012	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui lehˬ, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hui geh hpawnˬ da‸ leh jehˬ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui hpu maˇ maˇ piˇ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
40028013	Tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ ngaˬ hui zuh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca hk'awˇ yuˬ la ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui shu hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
40028014	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ g'a kaˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ te‸ chiˉ maˇ g'a te tuˬ, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ beˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
40028015	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui hpu oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ leh, shu yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e te ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ bvuhˬ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ.
40028016	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'aw teˇ shiˍ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
40028017	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ.
40028018	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui geh jiˆ laˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve kanˇ paˆ hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ.
40028019	Hk'e te leh nawˬ hui k'ai leh, chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ca te-o. Awˬ pa, Yaˇ hpu leh da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo yawˇ hui hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ-oˆ.
40028020	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ na yuˬ leh te tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Miˬ guiˬ chi awˬ yanˇ leh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001001	G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ.
41001002	G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Nyi loˬ, nawˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ gu taˍ laˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ peu k'ai ve yoˬ.
41001003	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ gu taˍ loˬ. Yawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ te-o teh‸, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
41001004	Yoˇhanˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a g'a tuˬ, venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001005	Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ Yoˇhanˬ geh k'ai ve yoˬ. A shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ leh, Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001006	Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, kaˍ laˍ oˆ awˬ mvuh te taˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, caw‸ cehˍ nyi lo shaˍ guiˬ haˍ pi caˆ tsuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Paˉ ce‸ leh heh puiˉ hk'aw ve pehˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ yawˇ caˇ ve yoˬ.
41001007	Yawˇ bon maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ a‸ kehˉ kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'aw‸ lehˍ te leh yawˇ ve hkuiˉ nuˆ caˆ hta‸ hpui tuˬ ve ceh ka‸ maˇ keunˍ.
41001008	Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001009	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ tawˆ la leh, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma awˬ hk'aw lo Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001010	Yeˍsuˆ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ cawˬ haˉ tawˆ la htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hpaw leh Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ aˉ pui k'aˍ hk'e yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ ya‸ la ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41001011	Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ha‸ jaˇ ve ngaˬ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
41001012	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hta‸ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo g'a‸ peu ve yoˬ.
41001013	Yawˇ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo awˇ chi nyi chehˇ leh, Saˍtanˍ yawˇ hta‸ beˬ ve lawˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ teˇ hpaˍ geh chehˇ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ loˍ ve hta‸ ga piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001014	Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ shu hpeh yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo laˬ ve yoˬ.
41001015	G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ yanˇ biˇ la peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ peu. Venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ yonˍ loˬ teh‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001016	Gaˍliˍlehˇ g'uiˬ po paˇ lo Yeˍsuˆ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, Siˉmonˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Anˍdrehˍ g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo geu‸ hpehˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ ngaˇ ca paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41001017	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chaw ca shehˍ hpaˇ te tcuh laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001018	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ geu‸ hta‸ teh taˉ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41001019	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ a ciˉ k'aw‸ k'ai htaˇ, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Yoˇhanˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw geu‸ gu tawˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41001020	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. G'aˇ ga caˇ paˍ hui geh awˬ pa Zeˍbeˍdehˇ hta‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo teh taˉ peuˬ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41001021	Yawˇ hui Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Shinˉ nyi htaˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ bon yehˬ lo taˆ-e leh maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001022	Yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui maˍ piˇ ve hk'e yawˇ maˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001023	Oˇ teˇ hkui yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ cha‸ chiˆ geh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
41001024	Yawˇ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ te luˬ laˇ tuˬ nawˬ laˬ ve laˇ. Nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41001025	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ deˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Ta‸ iˉ chehˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001026	Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ lehˬ, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ hpeˆ dawˇ tcuh leh, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41001027	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chi ve lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e le. Maˍ piˇ ve chi lehˬ, awˬ suhˉ teˇ ceuˬ law leˇ. Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ tawˇ piˇ leh yawˇ hui na yuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41001028	Yawˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ cawˬ haˉ Gaˍliˍ lehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41001029	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hui bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai leh, Yaˍkoˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ geh Siˉmonˍ leh Anˍdrehˍ hui ve yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
41001030	Siˉmonˍ awˬ miˇ ma ve awˬ e kaˆ naˬ leh zuh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ lawn Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui teˇ cawˬ haˉ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001031	Yeˍsuˆ laˬ leh, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ vawˆ leh tu la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve kaˆ naˬ ve na-e la leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ te caˍ te taw piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001032	Mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ peuˬ leh mehˆ muiˉ naˆ la paˇ neˇ htaˇ, naˬ ve gawˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ leh, neˇ geh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh shiˍ veu laˇ ve yoˬ.
41001033	Venˇ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ awˬ paˇ lo hpawnˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41001034	A naˍ laiˉ ceuˬ te naˬ chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ leh, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ g'a‸ k'oˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Neˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve pa taw Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ maˇ yaw tcuh.
41001035	Mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸, mvuhˇ maˇ htiˇ sheˍ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ tu leh heh puiˉ hk'aw lo k'ai leh, oˇ kaˬ lo bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41001036	Siˉmonˍ leh yawˇ geh chehˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a‸ ca ve yoˬ.
41001037	Yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ mawˬ htaˇ, Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001038	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo cawˬ ve venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ bon g'a maˍ piˇ tuˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai-a veuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e te tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001039	Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ bon ca maˍ piˇ leh, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ.
41001040	Hkiˬ tu‸ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh hkui tcuhˉ teh leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ te gaˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ nawˬ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
41001041	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve pa taw, la‸ sheh che leh yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ te gaˇ ve yoˬ. Da‸ la kehˬ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41001042	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ hkiˬ tu‸ a naˍ mehˉ k'ai leh yawˇ da‸ la kehˬ la ve yoˬ.
41001043	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ hehnˇ chaweh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
41001044	Awˬ lawn chi chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ taˇ ca hto piˇ. Nawˬ k'ai leh paw hkuˇ hta‸ nawˬ awˬ to ca maw piˇ-oˆ. Shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ ve awˬ pon Moˉseˍ awˬ liˇ teh taˍ ve hk'e, tanˇ tuˬ ca tanˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ leh teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ.
41001045	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ ca k'aoˍ piˇ leh, teˇ kaˬ le le awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ k'ai piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ venˇ teˇ hpaˍ hk'aw hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'aw‸ lo‸-e maˇ hpeh‸ leh, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hpawˇ chi hpawˇ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
41002001	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw, Yeˍsuˆ Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ lo‸-e leh, yehˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ chehˇ taˍ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ shu g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
41002002	Chaw hpawnˬ la maˇ jaˇ ve pa taw yehˬ hk'aw chehˇ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ leh, yehˬ miˉ awˬ paˇ lo ka‸ chehˇ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ. Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ,
41002003	hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ chaw awˇ g'aˇ taˆ veu laˇ leh yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
41002004	Chaw chehˇ maˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ geh yawˇ hui lo‸-e maˇ gaˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ chehˇ taˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ lo beh taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui hpaˆ pawnˍ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh hpaˆ pawnˍ taˍ kuiˬ lo, hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw zuh‸ taˍ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ yawˇ hui hpehˇ ya‸-e ve yoˬ.
41002005	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw hta‸, Yaˇ paˍ-oˬ, nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41002006	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ oˇ kaˬ lo mui chehˇ leh, a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo chi hk'e dawˇ chehˇ ve,
41002007	Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te chi hk'e k'oˆ ve le. Yawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, venˇ baˆ hta‸ a shu hpehˇ hk'a hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
41002008	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e dawˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo teˇ cawˬ haˉ shiˍ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui nyi ma hk'aw aˬ hto‸ ma te chi hk'e dawˇ chehˇ ve le.
41002009	Hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tawˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ hkawˇ a ciˉ k'oˆ piˇ sha le. Nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve sha laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, Tu leh nawˬ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ taˆ leh juˇ k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve sha laˇ.
41002010	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ peuˬ leh, hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
41002011	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, tu loˬ. Nawˬ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ taˆ leh nawˬ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e loˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41002012	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ tu leh, zuh‸ hpui hta‸ taˆ veu leh chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw chi ma ve anˇ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ leh, Ngaˬ hui teˇ pawˆ ka‸ chi hk'e ve hta‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41002013	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ g'uiˬ po paˇ lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ loˉ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41002014	Yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'aw‸ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw kuiˬ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Aˍlaˍhpehˇ ve yaˇ paˍ Leˍviˆ mui chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tu leh Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41002015	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Leˍviˆ aˉ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui caˇ chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui maˇ maˇ htawˇ yawˇ hui geh mui caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui maˇ maˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41002016	Awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh yawˇ awˍ caˇ chehˇ ve hta‸, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui ve li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui geh hk'a geh caˇ ve le teh‸, na nyi ve yoˬ.
41002017	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chehˇ sha ve chaw hui naˆ tsuhˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ maˇ loˍ. Naˬ ve chaw hui ceh tiˉ loˍ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41002018	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, shu Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce chehˇ ve ka‸, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ caˇ tuˬ maˇ ce ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41002019	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hkehˉ caˇ la ve chaw hui geh chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce tuˬ leh laˇ. Yawˇ yawˇ hui geh chehˇ ve ceh ceh, yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce maˇ hpeh‸.
41002020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ hkehˉ caˇ la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh yuˬ hpaˆ piˇ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce tuˬ yoˬ.
41002021	Veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ piˍ hta‸ hpa awˬ suhˉ a shu ka‸ maˇ nehˉ jaw. Oˇ hk'e nehˉ ve k'o, hpa awˬ suhˉ lehˬ awˬ piˍ hta‸ g'awˬ leh, leuˉ leh k'aw‸ tzuh‸ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41002022	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui awˬ piˍ awˬ hk'aw lo a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ a shu ka‸ maˇ keu jaw. Oˇ hk'e keu ve k'o, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ lehˬ, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui hta‸ te hkoˇ ve pa taw, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ sheˆ leh, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui htawˇ luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui awˬ suhˉ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a keu ve yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41002023	Shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, Yeˍsuˆ heh hk'aw hpanˍ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui caˬ nu hta‸ chehˆ yuˬ leh k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41002024	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nyi-o, shinˉ nyi htaˇ te maˇ keunˍ te maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw te ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41002025	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Daˍviˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˍ meu‸ leh caˇ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a g'aw jaw leh laˇ.
41002026	Aˍbiˍaˍtaˍ paw hkuˇ lonˉ te chehˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Daˍviˆ lo‸-e leh, paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ heˆ k'o teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ caˇ maˇ keunˍ caˇ maˇ cawˇ ve, tanˇ taˍ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ caˇ leh, awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ pehˬ caˍ piˇ ve maˇ heˆ leh laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41002027	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Shinˉ nyi lehˬ chaw yaˇ awˬ pon te taˍ ve yoˬ.
41002028	Chaw yaˇ lehˬ, shinˉ nyi awˬ pon te taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Hk'e te leh, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, shinˉ nyi ve awˬ jawˇ mawˇ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41003001	Yawˇ bon yehˬ hk'aw k'aw‸ lo‸-e htaˇ, oˇ kaˬ lo la‸ sheh teˇ paˉ suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41003002	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ g'a tuˬ, shinˉ nyi htaˇ chaw naˬ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ leh naˍ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi taˍ ve yoˬ.
41003003	Yawˇ lehˬ, la‸ sheh teˇ paˉ suh ve chaw hta‸, Nawˬ tu leh awˬ k'aw ji ca huˉ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41003004	Peuˬ leh yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Shin nyi htaˇ da‸ tuˬ te cawˇ laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o luˬ tuˬ te cawˇ laˇ. Shu ve a sha‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ cawˇ laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o tiˇ pehˍ cawˇ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41003005	Yeˍsuˆ nyi ma zuhˆ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui nyi ma heh ve pa taw yawˇ dawˇ haˍ leh, chaw oˇ ve hta‸, Nawˬ ve la‸ sheh che-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ la‸ sheh che leh na-e la ve yoˬ.
41003006	Hk'e te leh, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui tawˆ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh g'a tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ Heˍroˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh ca jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41003007	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh g'uiˬ po hpawˇ lo k'aw‸ k'ai leh, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a‸ ve yoˬ.
41003008	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ, Iˇduˇmehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ leh, Tuˇruˆ venˇ leh Siˉdonˍ venˇ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, yawˇ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn g'a kaˇ ve pa taw, awˬ moˍ lonˉ te leh yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
41003009	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a buiˆ tuˬ, Haw lo‸ k'oˍ ehˉ teˇ maˬ hta‸ gu taˍ-o‸ teh‸, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41003010	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw naˬ maˇ maˇ hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve pa taw, naˬ ve gawˬ ve chaw hui hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ g'a htawˇ tuˬ, yawˇ geh g'aˇ hte‸ buiˆ lo‸ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41003011	Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ boˆ sheˬ leh, Nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
41003012	Yawˇ ve awˬ lawn shu hta‸ maˇ g'a shiˍ piˇ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ hehnˇ chaweh piˇ ve yoˬ.
41003013	Peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41003014	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ geh chehˇ tcuh tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ca maˍ tcuh tuˬ,
41003015	neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ hpeh‸ ve kanˇ paˆ piˇ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ chaw teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
41003016	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ Peˍtruˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ,
41003017	Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ, Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍYoˇhanˬ, (yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ Bawˇneˍgehˆ meh piˇ ve, tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, mvuhˇ tawˍ yaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ),
41003018	Anˍdrehˍ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ, Baˍhtawˇlaˬmehˇ, Ma‸htehˍ, Htoˉma‸, Aˍlaˍhpehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ, Htaˍdehˇ, Hkaˍnaˍniˆ awˬ moˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw Siˉmonˍ leh,
41003019	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ hui yoˬ.
41003020	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ hpawnˬ la ve pa taw, yawˇ hui awˍ ka‸ caˇ maˇ tanˇ ve yoˬ.
41003021	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Yawˇ g'uˇ k'ai peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ ca hpeh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41003022	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo ya‸ la ve li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ Beˍsaˍbuˇlaˆ geh taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Neˇ jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41003023	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ leh, tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍtanˍ lehˬ Saˍtanˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a‸ k'oˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
41003024	Mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ maˇ cawˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve k'o, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve yeˬ maˇ hpeh‸.
41003025	Yehˬ teˇ yehˬ htawˇ, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ maˇ cawˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve k'o, yehˬ oˇ ve yeˬ maˇ hpeh‸.
41003026	Saˍtanˍ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ leh hpaˆ da‸ ve k'o, yawˇ htawˇ yeˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Yawˇ luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tu yoˬ.
41003027	Awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw hta‸ awˉ lawˉ maˇ hpeh tiˍ taˍ k'o, a shu htawˇ yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw hta‸ hpeh tiˍ taˍ peuˬ htaˇ heh‸, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
41003028	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw yaˇ hui te ve venˇ baˆ hk'a peu-eˬ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ hk'a k'oˆ hk'a yaw ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41003029	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ venˇ baˆ maˇ hpehˇ piˇ taˬ. Yawˇ co co taiˍ taiˍ venˇ baˆ cawˬ taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41003030	Yawˇ neˇ cha‸ chiˆ cawˬ ve teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41003031	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ e leh awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ baˬ hpawˇ huˉ taˍ leh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca ku‸ tcuh ve yoˬ.
41003032	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ mui chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ e leh nawˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ ca leh awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41003033	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ e leh ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ a shu le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41003034	Hk'a caw zuhˇ mui chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ caw nyi leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ e leh ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi loˬ.
41003035	G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ hk'a te ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ awˬ nyi ma leh ngaˬ ve awˬ e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004001	Teˇ pawˆ g'uiˬ po paˇ lo Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ geh hpawnˬ la ve pa taw, g'uiˬ po hk'aw cawˬ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw yawˇ ca lo‸ mui ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41004002	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tawˇ pa haˉ te leh, awˬ lawn laiˉ ceuˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e k'oˆ ve,
41004003	Na sheˍ. Awˬ yawˇ sheˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ yawˇ ca sheˍ ve yoˬ.
41004004	Yawˇ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo ce leh, ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ g'awˆ caˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
41004005	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ miˬ shaˍ paˇ kuiˬ haˉ pui de lo ce leh, miˬ shaˍ maˇ naˉ ve pa taw, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yeˬ la ve yoˬ.
41004006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ yeˬ oˇ ve awˬ geu maˇ naw‸ ve pa taw, mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ la htaˇ, haw jaˇ chiˆ jaˇ leh nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41004007	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ aˉ chuˇ de lo ce ve yoˬ. Aˉ chuˇ buiˇ uiˍ la leh awˬ yeˬ hta‸ hoˆ ve pa taw, awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸.
41004008	Peuˬ leh awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ miˬ hkuiˇ da‸ kuiˬ lo ce ve yoˬ. Awˬ yeˬ yeˬ la uiˍ la leh, awˬ shiˍ maˇ maˇ naw‸ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ shiˍ shehˆ chi pun, hkaw‸ chi pun leh teˇ ha pun naw‸ maˇ la ve yoˬ.
41004009	Kaˇ tuˬ naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw hui hk'a deh‸ na-o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41004010	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ shu maˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw leh tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ca na nyi la ve yoˬ.
41004011	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ tawˇ pa haˉ tiˉ g'a te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004012	Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, Yawˇ hui nyi ve ka‸ nyi maˇ mawˬ. Yawˇ hui kaˇ ve ka‸ na maˇ g'a. Chi hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la leh yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41004013	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Tawˇ pa haˉ chi ve hta‸ nawˬ hui na maˇ g'a leh laˇ. Na maˇ g'a ve k'o, tawˇ pa haˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te na g'a tuˬ le.
41004014	Awˬ yawˇ sheˍ paˍ lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
41004015	Ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo bon hkawˇ sheˍ ve awˬ lawn lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ htaˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ Saˍtanˍ laˬ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ taˍ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41004016	Haˉ pui de lo sheˍ ve awˬ lawn lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh, teˇ cawˬ haˉ ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41004017	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ geu maˇ naw‸ ve hta‸ pa taw, teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ jaw ceh tiˉ te‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ bon hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ leh fawˉ ve mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ htaˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hui luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41004018	Aˉ chuˇ de lo sheˍ ve awˬ lawn lehˬ, yawˇ hui bon hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ ve htawˇ,
41004019	chi miˬ guiˬ dawˇ haˍ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve pa taw, awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la maˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41004020	Miˬ hkuiˇ da‸ kuiˬ lo sheˍ ve awˬ lawn lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ leh ha‸ yuˬ ve pa taw, awˬ shiˍ shehˆ chi pun, hkaw‸ chi pun, teˇ ha pun naw‸ la ve chaw hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004021	Peuˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Kawˆ faiˇ tuˉ leh hk'awˍ lawˇ tcuhˍ mvuh‸ taˍ tuˬ laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, ku-iˍ hawˉ teh taˍ tuˬ laˇ. Kawˆ faiˇ taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo teh taˍ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
41004022	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'a faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Shu hta‸ maˇ shiˍ tcuh ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, awˬ g'euˆ ba kuiˬ lo tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
41004023	Kaˇ tuˬ naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw a shu htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a deh‸ na-o.
41004024	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'a g'a kaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Nawˬ hui kawˬ piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ kawˬ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, awˬ leuˉ ka‸ k'aw‸ htehˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41004025	Awˬ lawn k'o, cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ k'aw‸ htehˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ cawˬ ve chaw geh, yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ yuˬ tawˆ sheˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004026	Yeˍsuˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ heh hk'aw lo awˬ yawˇ sheˍ ve hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
41004027	Yawˇ mvuhˇ hpeu‸ zuh‸ leh mvuhˇ shawˉ tu la ve yoˬ. Awˬ yawˇ oˇ ve hk'aˬ hk'e te yeˬ la uiˍ la ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ.
41004028	Miˬ guiˬ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ awˬ yeˬ yeˬ la leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ nu, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ nu awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la maˬ la ve yoˬ.
41004029	Meh la leh g'eu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la ve pa taw, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ law‸ k'awˉ yuˬ leh g'eu‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41004030	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma yuˬ leh tehˆ da‸ nyi tuˬ le. Tawˇ pa haˉ hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ yehˇ leh tehˆ maˍ tuˬ le.
41004031	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, g'awˇ caˉ yawˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ heh hk'aw lo sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve awˬ yawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ i ve htawˇ,
41004032	sheˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ yeˬ yeˬ la uiˍ la leh, g'awˇ hpa‸ mvuhˬ naweh hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ uiˍ la leh, mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ aˉ g'uiˬ ha baˬ kuiˬ lo g'aˇ jehˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41004033	Yawˇ hui na g'a puiˉ ve hk'e ceh, chi hk'e ve tawˇ pa haˉ maˇ maˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004034	Tawˇ pa haˉ maˇ yehˇ k'o, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ maˍ piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui ceh tiˉ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a deh‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004035	Oˇ teˇ nyi mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, Coˇ paˉ hpawˇ lo hkanˍ k'ai-a veuˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004036	Hk'e te leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ hui hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh, Yeˍsuˆ chehˇ taˍ ve hk'e haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu haw lo‸ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ yawˇ hui geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41004037	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ la leh, g'uiˬ baˇ teˇ hpaˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ htinˍ lo‸ la ve pa taw, haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo iˉ kaˆ biˇ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41004038	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ mehˍ hpawˇ lo uˉ gehˇ tcuhˉ leh, zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca nawˍ piˇ leh, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ hui luˬ k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ dawˇ nyi leh laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41004039	Yeˍsuˆ tu la leh mvuhˇ haw hta‸ deˇ piˇ leh, g'uiˬ po hta‸, Ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ haw dehˬ k'ai leh, ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
41004040	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw kawˆ ve le. Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ leh laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41004041	Yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve, Chi hpaˇ a shu le. Mvuhˇ haw leh g'uiˬ po yawˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve law teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41005001	Hk'e te leh, g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ, Gaˍdaˍ raˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ hui gaˬ ve yoˬ.
41005002	Yeˍsuˆ haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la htaˇ, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ geh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ chaw tuˍ hpfuh lo tawˆ la leh yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ la ve yoˬ.
41005003	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ kuiˬ lo tiˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ hpeh tiˍ taˍ maˇ g'a. Sho caˆ yuˬ leh hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve ka‸ maˇ g'a.
41005004	Awˬ lawn k'o, laiˉ pawˆ shu yawˇ hta‸ sho kawˬ sho caˆ yuˬ hpeh tiˍ taˍ htawˇ, yawˇ sho caˆ hta‸ g'awˬ cheˆ leh, sho kawˬ hta‸ awˉ hteh ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ meuˇ la tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
41005005	Tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ lo maˇ k'oˆ, hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yawˇ kuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ ka‸, haˉ pui shiˍ yuˬ leh gui htu-iˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41005006	Yeˍsuˆ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ chaw oˇ ve g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ geh g'uiˇ laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
41005007	Yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuh jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005008	Awˬ lawn k'o, Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ-oˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai-o teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
41005009	Nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma meh le teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Ngaˬ hui maˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh lehˬ Leˍjonˍ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005010	Mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a g'a‸ tawˆ tuˬ, yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
41005011	Hk'aw oˇ ve awˬ ba‸ le lo, va‸ moˍ lonˉ k'aˆ caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41005012	Hk'e te leh, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve, Va‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui g'a lo‸-e tuˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005013	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ k'ai leh va‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Va‸ awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, miˬ haˍ kuiˬ lo g'aˇ hte‸ g'uiˇ ya‸-e leh, g'uiˬ po hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh k'a suh peuˬ sheˬ ve yoˬ. Va‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ, aˬ laˬ hk'e nyiˇ hinˉ hkeh cawˬ ve yoˬ.
41005014	Va‸ hawˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ g'uiˇ k'o‸-e leh, awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ ca nyi la ve yoˬ.
41005015	Yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ Leˍjonˍ geh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh leh mui chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve nyi ma awˉ lawˉ htaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ k'aw‸ da‸ la ve hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ leh kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41005016	G'a mawˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, neˇ geh ve chaw awˬ lawn leh va‸ teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn, ca nyi la ve chaw hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai tuˬ, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
41005018	Yeˍsuˆ haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ geh jaw ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ geh chehˇ tuˬ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
41005019	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ chehˇ tcuh. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ aˉ hk'aw k'o‸-e leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'ui sha nawˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ga laˇ leh ha k'aˉ laˇ ve awˬ lawn, nawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005020	Hk'e te leh yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ga laˇ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn, Deˍkaˍpawˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ ca k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41005021	Yeˍsuˆ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo k'aw‸ hkanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ g'uiˬ po paˇ chehˇ taˍ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ geh hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ.
41005022	Oˇ htaˇ, Yaˍiˉruˆ meh ve bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ te ve teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve hkui paˇ lo boˆ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
41005023	Yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ ve yaˇ miˇ ehˉ suh la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ na-e la leh a sha‸ g'a te‸ tuˬ, nawˬ laˬ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ la‸ sheh a ciˉ ca taˍ piˇ la-o teh‸, g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
41005024	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ Yaˍiˉruˆ geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, yawˇ hta‸ buiˆ heuˆ ca‸ heuˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41005025	Teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ awˬ suhˍ ya‸ la chehˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
41005026	Naˆ tsuhˇ shehˍ hpaˇ laiˉ g'aˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ g'a hkanˍ jaˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yehˇ peuˬ htawˇ, yawˇ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ na-e la ve awˬ hk'oˆ, a naˍ oˇ ve shaˬ te shaˬ k'aw‸ jaˇ la ve yoˬ.
41005027	Yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn g'a kaˇ jaw ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ lo laˬ leh, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ ca htawˇ ve yoˬ.
41005028	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ ceh ngaˬ g'a htawˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ na-e la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41005029	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ suhˍ ya‸ la ve teˇ cawˬ haˉ cheh sheˬ leh, yawˇ na-e la peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to shiˍ ve yoˬ.
41005030	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo kanˇ paˆ tawˆ k'ai ve hta‸ teˇ cawˬ haˉ g'a shiˍ ve pa taw, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ hpfuhˆ nyi leh, Ngaˬ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ a shu htawˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41005031	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ nawˬ hta‸ buiˆ heuˆ ca‸ heuˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ mawˬ chehˇ ve ka‸, Ngaˬ hta‸ a shu htawˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve laˇ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005032	Yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ laˇ ve chaw hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ Yeˍsuˆ hk'a caw zuhˇ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41005033	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hta‸ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ kawˆ cheˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ boˆ sheˬ leh, awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005034	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ na-e la piˇ peuˬ. Dawˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e loˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ chehˇ sha la piˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005035	Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ ve yehˬ lo laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ suh peuˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma te Saˍ la‸ hta‸ k'aw‸ sho‸ sha‸ piˇ ve le.
41005036	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ maˇ na leh, bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, Taˇ dawˇ haˍ. Yonˍ ve tiˇ te-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005037	Peˍtruˆ, Yaˍkoˆ leh Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Yoˇhanˬ, yawˇ hui shehˆ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ laˬ tcuh.
41005038	Yawˇ bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ ve yehˬ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, shu duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te leh, g'aˇ hte‸ hawˬ leh paˆ hawˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41005039	Yeˍsuˆ aˉ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te leh hawˬ chehˇ ve le. Yaˇ ehˉ chi suh ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41005040	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpawnˬ g'uiˬ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a‸ tawˆ sheˬ leh, yaˇ ehˉ ve awˬ pa awˬ e leh yawˇ geh laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, yaˇ ehˉ teh taˍ kuiˬ lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
41005041	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yaˇ miˇ ehˉ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ vawˆ leh k'oˆ ve, Taˍliˇtaˍkuˇmiˆ. Tawˇ oˇ ve tcuhˉ kui lehˬ, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, tu la-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41005042	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ miˇ ehˉ oˇ ve teˇ cawˬ haˉ tu la leh, ya‸ k'aw toˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ a sha‸ teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'aw‸ gaˬ peuˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ maˇ tawˆ leh anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41005043	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ shu teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ tawˇ piˇ peuˬ leh, Yaˇ miˇ ehˉ hta‸ caˇ tuˬ caˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006001	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41006002	Shinˉ nyi gaˬ leh bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. G'a kaˇ ve chaw laiˉ g'aˇ anˇ jaˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, chi hk'e ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ lo g'a ve le. Yawˇ g'a ve cuˇ yiˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve cuˇ yiˍ le. Chi taw taw kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve kanˉ yawˇ la‸ hk'aw hk'aˬ hk'e te hpeh‸ la ve le.
41006003	Yawˇ lehˬ, Maˍriˆ ve yaˇ paˍ la‸ shaˉ maˉ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Yaˍkoˆ, Yoˇseˍ, Yuˇda‸, Siˉmonˍ hui ve awˬ viˉ paˍ maˇ heˆ laˇ. Yawˇ awˬ nyi ma teˇ hpaˍ ka‸, ngaˬ hui geh chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma luˬ ve yoˬ.
41006004	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, a shu yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi leh, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41006005	Chehˇ haˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ leh gu na-e piˇ ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ k'o, oˇ kaˬ lo kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve kanˉ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve hta‸ yawˇ te maˇ hpeh‸.
41006006	Yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ puiˉ ve pa taw, yawˇ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ teˇ hk'aˆ peuˬ teˇ hk'aˆ lo hk'a zuhˇ k'ai leh bon maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006007	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ leh, nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ kaˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ kaˬ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006008	Juˇ fuiˍ teˇ taˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ awˬ pon awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu te‸ chiˉ taˇ yuˬ k'ai. Miˉ chaw ka‸, hkaoˍ monˇ ka‸ taˇ pfuhˇ k'ai. Haˍ pi caˆ hk'aw lo hpu taˇ doˆ pfuhˇ k'ai.
41006009	Hkuiˉ nuˆ tcuhˉ leh, aˉ po‸ teˇ hk'oˆ ceh tiˉ deh k'ai-o teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006010	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hk'aˬ ve teˇ kaˬ maˇ k'oˆ, shu ve yehˬ hk'aw nawˬ hui lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, hk'aˆ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ tawˆ k'ai sheˍ ve ceh ceh, oˇ ve teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
41006011	Hk'aˬ ve teˇ kaˬ lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ leh nawˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na ve k'o, oˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ hui tawˆ k'ai htaˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ te maˍ piˇ tuˬ, hkui taw k'aw hta‸ ngawˉ taˍ ve je‸ meu-e hta‸ hpi baˬ taˉ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006012	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai leh, Chaw yaˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ bon maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006013	Yawˇ hui neˇ maˇ maˇ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ leh, naˬ ve gawˬ ve chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ naˍ manˇ shehˍ leh gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006014	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn bvuhˬ k'ai jaˇ ve pa taw, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ la peuˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve kanˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41006015	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ Eˇliˇya‸ yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41006016	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ g'a kaˇ leh, Chaw chi lehˬ, ngaˬ oˉ k'oˍ tawˆ peuˬ ve Yoˇhanˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
