41006017	Awˬ lawn chi lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ ve awˬ miˇ ma Heˍroˍdiˆ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ heuˆ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ chaw hta‸ hpehˇ leh Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
41006018	Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, Nawˬ awˬ nyi paˍ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ nawˬ heuˆ maˇ cawˇ teh‸, Yoˇhanˬ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
41006019	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Heˍroˍdiˆ Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ canˇ jaˇ leh tiˇ pehˍ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tiˇ pehˍ maˇ hpeh‸ sheˍ.
41006020	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ kawˆ leh hk'a deh‸ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yoˇhanˬ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ chehˇ ve htawˇ, ha lehˬ ha k'a na gaˇ ve yoˬ.
41006021	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ paw ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ pawehˇ te ve awˬ nyi k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ hawˉ ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, ma‸ poˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw ve awˬ hoˉ awˬ naˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ leh hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve yoˬ.
41006022	Awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve pa taw, Heˍroˍdiˆ ve awˬ yaˇ miˇ lo‸-e leh pawehˇ te maˍ piˇ htaˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ leh yawˇ geh mui caˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ yaˇ miˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve hk'e lawˬ-o‸. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41006023	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸ yawˇ hkanˍ leh yaˇ miˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hk'a lawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ, ngaˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hkoˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41006024	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve tawˆ k'ai leh, Ngaˬ aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ g'a lawˬ tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ ve awˬ e hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Awˬ e lehˬ, Baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ lawˬ yuˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006025	Hk'e te leh, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ geh haˆ haˆ k'aw‸ lo‸-e leh k'oˆ ve, Baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hkehˇ pe le awˬ hk'aw keu leh ngaˬ hta‸ haˆ haˆ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
41006026	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw leh yawˇ geh mui caˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ te luˬ gaˇ.
41006027	Oˇ htaˇ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, Yoˇhanˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ ca tawˆ veu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, teˇ cawˬ haˉ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'ai leh, htawnˍ hk'aw lo Yoˇhanˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ tawˆ ve yoˬ.
41006028	Oˉ k'oˍ oˇ ve hkehˇ pe le hk'aw keu veu laˇ leh yaˇ miˇ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh awˬ yaˇ miˇ htawˇ, awˬ e hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006029	Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui laˬ leh yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ yuˬ leh, tuˍ hpfuh hk'aw lo ca tuˍ ve yoˬ.
41006030	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ geh hpawnˬ la leh, yawˇ hui hk'a te hk'a maˍ ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'aoˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006031	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ laˬ-o‸. Heh puiˉ hk'aw chaw gawˬ kuiˬ lo g'aˇ a ciˉ ca jehˇ sheˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw maˇ maˇ yiˬ yiˬ laˬ laˬ te chehˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ hui awˍ ka‸ caˇ maˇ tanˇ ve yoˬ.
41006032	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh heh puiˉ hk'aw chaw gawˬ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
41006033	Yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai ve hta‸ chaw maˇ maˇ g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ venˇ chi venˇ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui g'uiˬ po jaˇ lo g'uiˇ k'ai leh, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ gaˬ ve yoˬ.
41006034	Yeˍsuˆ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, yawˬ hawˉ paˍ maˇ cawˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh awˬ lawn laiˉ ceuˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006035	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Choˬ kaˬ lehˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw hpeh‸ leh, mvuhˇ ka‸ hpeu‸ la yoˬ.
41006036	Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui cawˬ ve hk'aˆ hk'aw pa hk'aw lo k'ai leh caˇ tuˬ ca vuiˬ caˇ-e tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006037	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ caˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui lehˬ, Ngaˬ hui hkaoˍ monˇ nyiˇ ha hteh‸ hpfuhˇ ca vuiˬ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ g'a caˍ piˇ tuˬ laˇ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006038	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui geh hkaoˍ monˇ hk'aˬ nyiˇ diˬ cawˬ le. A ciˉ ca nyi sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui ca nyi peuˬ leh, Hkaoˍ monˇ ngaˇ diˬ leh ngaˇ nyi hkeh cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006039	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Mvuh‸ nawˉ lehˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ awˬ moˍ awˬ moˍ te mui tcuh-o teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006040	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, teˇ ha g'aˇ teˇ moˍ, ngaˇ chi g'aˇ teˇ moˍ, chi hk'e awˬ moˍ awˍ moˍ te mui ve yoˬ.
41006041	Yeˍsuˆ hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve ngaˇ diˬ leh ngaˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ hkeh hta‸ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hk'eh‸ peuˬ leh, chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'u suhˍ lo ca chiˇ teh piˇ tuˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ hkeh hta‸ htawˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006042	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˇ ve yoˬ.
41006043	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, caˇ leuˉ ve hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'eh‸ leh ngaˇ shaˍ awˬ peˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'awˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ hk'a biˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
41006044	Hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ caˇ ve chaw hui, hawˉ hk'aˆ chaw mawˇ tiˉ ngaˇ hinˉ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
41006045	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ hpehˇ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw teˇ cawˬ haˉ lo‸-e tcuh leh, g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ Behˇsehˇdaˆ venˇ lo yawˇ hui hta‸ awˉ lawˉ hkanˍ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
41006046	Yawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, bon ca lawˬ tuˬ yawˇ hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
41006047	Mehˆ muiˉ naˆ la htaˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ lehˬ, g'uiˬ po awˬ k'aw ji lo gaˬ peuˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ chehˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
41006048	Mvuhˇ haw hpawˇ maˇ cawˇ ve pa taw, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ g'awˆ heuˬ jaˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, tanˇ hkuiˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ g'uiˬ po hk'oˆ ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ ponˬ k'ai-a teh‸ te ve yoˬ.
41006049	Yawˇ g'uiˬ po hk'oˆ ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ htaˇ, chaw ha ku yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ leh, g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
41006050	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ yaw leh, Nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te-o. Taˇ kawˆ, ngaˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41006051	Oˇ htaˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw yawˇ yawˇ hui geh lo‸-e leh, mvuhˇ haw dehˬ sheˬ leh, yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ tehˬ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
41006052	Awˬ lawn k'o, hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ anˇ tuˬ te maˍ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui maˇ dawˇ shiˍ maˇ dawˇ pawnˍ. Yawˇ hui nyi ma ka‸ heh chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
41006053	Yawˇ hui g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo hkanˍ k'ai leh, Geˍneˍsaˍrehˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ lo hpeh taˍ ve yoˬ.
41006054	Haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui tawˆ-e leh, chaw teˇ hpaˍ teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
41006055	Mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ teˇ kaˬ le le lo g'uiˇ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ hk'aˬ lo chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ k'o, chaw naˬ chaw gawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ zuh‸ hpui hk'oˆ taˆ veu leh, oˇ kaˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
41006056	Yawˇ hk'a lo‸-e kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ le le, hk'aˆ hk'aw maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ hk'aw maˇ k'oˆ, pa hk'aw maˇ k'oˆ, tcuh awˬ paˇ chaw hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ lo chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu ca yuˬ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ awˬ caˍ hta‸ ceh g'a htawˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ leh, hk'a htawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ na-e la ve yoˬ.
41007001	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo laˬ ve li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ geh hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ.
41007002	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ la‸ sheh maˇ kehˬ leh awˬ caˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. La‸ sheh maˇ kehˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve hk'e la‸ sheh maˇ tsuhˇ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41007003	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui leh Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, chaw mawˇ hui piˇ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te leh, la‸ sheh maˇ tsuhˇ k'o, caˇ tuˬ maˇ caˇ.
41007004	Tcuh ca huˉ k'aw‸ la htaˇ ka‸, yawˇ hui iˉ kaˆ maˇ hehˉ k'o, caˇ tuˬ maˇ caˇ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, kawˆ, hkehˇ, kuiˇ mu‸ hk'u teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tsuhˇ ve awˬ liˇ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ liˇ laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui yehˇ chehˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41007005	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ na nyi ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw mawˇ hui awˬ liˇ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw maˇ te le. La‸ sheh maˇ kehˬ leh aˬ hto‸ ma te caˇ tuˬ caˇ ve le.
41007006	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw heˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Chaw chi teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw ngaˬ hta‸ yawˆ yan ve htawˇ yawˇ hui ve nyi ma lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ vuiˇ da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41007007	Chaw yaˇ hui teh taˍ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve lehˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41007008	G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui baˬ taˉ leh, chaw yaˇ hui ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41007009	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te g'a tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui baˬ taˉ puiˉ ve law.
41007010	Awˬ lawn k'o Moˉseˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te-o. Peuˬ leh, A shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a suh ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41007011	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui lehˬ, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸, Ngaˬ geh hk'a cawˬ ve nawˬ hui g'a cawˇ ve mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ ve Kawˍbanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve k'o,
41007012	yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ nawˬ hui a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ ga piˇ tcuh.
41007013	Teˇ caˉ peuˬ teˇ caˉ chaw yaˇ geh g'a ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te pehˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e ve awˬ liˇ laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui te ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41007014	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ geh k'aw‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ ve tawˇ hta‸ na leh shiˍ-o‸.
41007015	Awˬ baˬ hpawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te maˇ g'a. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41007017	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ hpaˆ da‸ leh yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e htaˇ, tawˇ pa haˉ oˇ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41007018	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui htawˇ na maˇ g'a leh laˇ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ te leh awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ hk'a lo‸-e ve teˇ ceuˬ le le yawˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
41007019	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo maˇ lo‸-e. Yawˇ ve g'oˇ peˬ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, aˉ k'a‸ yiˬ kuiˬ lo baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. (Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ da‸ ve kehˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.)
41007020	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
41007021	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ nyi ma hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haiˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ ve, guiˇ ya‸ ve, shu mawˇ hk'awˇ ve, chaw hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve,
41007022	shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve, awˬ haiˬ te ve, shu hta‸ heˍ ve, te ponˬ te leuˉ ve, hkawehˉ ve, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve, nyi ma uiˍ ve mvuh ve, maˇ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ.
41007023	Haiˬ ve chi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ tawˆ la leh, chaw yaˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41007024	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh, Tuˇruˆ leh Siˉdonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ hpawˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ yehˬ teˇ yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ tcuh piˇ gaˇ htawˇ, yawˇ ca va‸ taˍ maˇ g'a.
41007025	Awˬ lawn k'o, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ geh taˍ ve yaˇ miˇ ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ e lehˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn g'a kaˇ leh, yawˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh yawˇ ve hkui paˇ lo boˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41007026	Yawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ hta‸ g'a‸ tawˆ tuˬ yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Suˇriˇhpiˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve Heˍlaˍsaˆ ma hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41007027	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˍ piˇ sheˍ. Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh hpuiˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˍ piˇ maˇ cawˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41007028	Yaˇ miˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hpuiˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ caˇ sheˆ dawˬ sheˆ taˍ ve hta‸ hpui lawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo g'awˆ caˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41007029	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve pa taw, k'o‸-e loˬ. Nawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41007030	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve yawˇ aˉ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ ehˉ zuh‸ hpui hk'aw zuh‸ taˍ ve hta‸ ka‸, neˇ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ ve hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41007031	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ Tuˇruˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ Siˉdonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo te leh Deˍkaˍpawˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ k'aw ji lo hpanˍ k'ai leh, Gaˍliˍlehˇ g'uiˬ po lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
41007032	Oˇ htaˇ, naˍ paw pawˇ leh tawˇ hk'a deh‸ yaw maˇ g'a ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shu Yeˍsuˆ geh shiˍ veu laˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
41007033	Hk'e te leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'aw Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ tawˆ-e leh, baˬ kuiˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve naˍ paw hk'aw lo yawˇ ve la‸ naw juˆ keu leh, ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ sheˬ leh yawˇ ve ha tehˍ hta‸ htawˇ ve yoˬ.
41007034	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi peuˬ leh hk'anˇ leh, Eˇhpaˍtaˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, hpaw piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
41007035	Hk'e te leh, chaw oˇ ve naˍ paw kaˇ la leh, ha tehˍ awˬ kuˇ caˆ nuˇ k'ai leh tawˇ hk'a deh‸ k'aw‸ yaw g'a ve yoˬ.
41007036	Awˬ lawn chi chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a hto piˇ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ shaˬ tawˍ taˍ ve k'o, yawˇ hui shaˬ leuˉ leh shu hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41007037	Yawˇ hui maˇ maˇ anˇ jaˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ da‸ lehˍ te peuˬ. Naˍ paw pawˇ ve chaw hui kaˇ la tuˬ yawˇ te leh, k'aˍ ve chaw hui tawˇ yaw puiˉ tuˬ ka‸ te ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41008001	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw awˬ moˍ uiˍ jaˇ ve k'aw‸ hpawnˬ la leh, yawˇ hui geh caˇ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ. Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
41008002	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ chi hta‸ ngaˬ ha k'aˉ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui ngaˬ geh chehˇ ve shehˆ nyi gaˬ peuˬ leh, caˇ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ.
41008003	Yawˇ hui awˍ meu‸ jehˇ chehˇ leh ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve k'o, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo g'aˇ nuˇ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008004	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Choˬ kaˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo chaw chi ma ve hta‸ hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˍ piˇ tuˬ hkaoˍ monˇ hk'aˬ lo ca g'a tuˬ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008005	Nawˬ hui geh hkaoˍ monˉ hk'aˬ nyiˇ diˬ cawˬ le teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Hkaoˍ monˇ suhˍ diˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008006	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ mui tuˬ yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve suhˍ diˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hk'eh‸ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ca chiˇ teh piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui htawˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ca chiˇ teh piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008007	Yawˇ hui geh ngaˇ ehˉ ka‸ a ciˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ca chiˇ teh piˇ-oˆ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008008	Yawˇ hui hk'a bvuhˆ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, caˇ leuˉ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ g'awˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, suhˍ hk'awˍ lawˇ hk'a biˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
41008009	Caˇ ve chaw aˬ laˬ hk'e awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ.
41008010	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, Daˍlaˍmaˍnuˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41008011	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma ve awˬ heˆ yawˇ geh lawˬ ve yoˬ.
41008012	Yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw hk'anˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi teˇ co lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw awˬ heˆ hta‸ lawˬ ve le. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw chi teˇ co hta‸ awˬ heˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ maˍ piˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41008013	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ lo‸-e leh g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41008014	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hkaoˍ monˇ yuˬ k'ai tuˬ leunˇ taˉ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw yawˇ hui hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ diˬ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
41008015	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ ve diˇ leh jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ ve diˇ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te leh jaw k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008016	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Ngaˬ hui hkaoˍ monˇ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41008017	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui hkaoˍ monˇ maˇ yuˬ laˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw k'oˆ da‸ ve le. Chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ gaˬ maˇ dawˇ shiˍ sheˍ leh laˇ. Nawˬ hui nyi ma heh chehˇ sheˍ leh laˇ.
41008018	Nawˬ hui mehˆ shiˍ cawˬ ka‸ maˇ mawˬ leh laˇ. Naˍ paw cawˬ ka‸ maˇ kaˇ leh laˇ. Nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ nawˇ leh laˇ.
41008019	Ngaˬ hkaoˍ monˇ ngaˇ diˬ hta‸ hk'eh‸ leh, chaw ngaˇ hinˉ g'aˇ hta‸ caˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ hui awˬ leuˉ hk'aˬ nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ k'aw‸ g'awˆ g'a ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008020	Ngaˬ hkaoˍ monˇ suhˍ diˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh, chaw awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ hta‸ caˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ hui awˬ leuˉ hk'aˬ nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ k'aw‸ g'awˆ g'a ve le teh‸ k'aw‸ na nyi htaˇ, suhˍ hk'awˍ lawˇ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008021	Peuˬ leh yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸, Chi beu‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ shiˍ sheˍ leh laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008022	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui Behˇsehˇdaˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ cuˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ geh shiˍ laˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ tuˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
41008023	Yawˇ mehˆ cuˉ paˍ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ g'awˬ leh hk'aˆ awˬ baˬ lo sheh tawˆ-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ keu piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ leh, Nawˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ mawˬ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41008024	Chaw oˇ ve chiˇ nyi leh, Ngaˬ chaw teˇ hpaˍ htaˬ mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ suhˆ cehˬ hta‸ shuˍ ve ka‸, ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41008025	Yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ la‸ sheh teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ htawˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ teˇ pawˆ hk'a deh‸ k'aw‸ nyi htaˇ, mehˆ shiˍ da‸ la leh hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ kehˬ lehˍ mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41008026	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸, Hk'aˆ chi awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ lo‸-e teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ.
41008027	Yeˍsuˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ Kehˉsaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ na nyi ve, Shu ngaˬ hta‸ a shu hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve le.
41008028	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Eˇliˇya‸ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, peuˬ leh teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41008029	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ a shu hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ yoˬ teh‸, Peˍtruˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008030	Yawˇ awˬ lawn chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a hto piˇ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ hehnˇ chaweh piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41008031	Oˇ htaˇ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41008032	Awˬ lawn chi yawˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh deˇ ve yoˬ.
41008033	Yeˍsuˆ hpfuhˆ nyi leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ mawˬ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Saˍtanˍ -oˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ lo jiˆ k'ai-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve dawˇ hk'aˇ maˇ heˆ. Chaw yaˇ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh yawˇ hta‸ deˇ ve yoˬ.
41008034	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ gaˇ ve k'o, a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸.
41008035	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ gaˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve a sha‸ shonˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ awˬ pon leh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ pon yawˇ ve a sha‸ shonˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41008036	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a htawˇ, yawˇ ve a sha‸ shonˇ k'ai ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le.
41008037	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh pa g'a tuˬ le.
41008038	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, te ya‸ puiˉ leh venˇ baˆ te puiˉ ve chaw chi teˇ co awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ leh ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ya‸ taw ve k'o, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ Awˬ pa ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve kehˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui geh teˇ geh laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ ya‸ taw tuˬ yoˬ.
41009001	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, choˬ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, maˇ g'a suh teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009002	Hkaw‸ nyi pon peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ, Yaˍk'oˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ ceh shiˍ veu leh mvuh ve hk'aw teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ hui taˆ-e ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han pa leh,
41009003	yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ g'euˆ ba la leh hpu da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ mawˇ tsuhˇ paˍ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, oˇ hk'e taw taw tsuhˇ hpu maˇ g'a.
41009004	Moˉseˍ leh Eˇliˇya‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ tawˆ la leh Yeˍsuˆ geh na‸ uˉ te da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41009005	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui choˬ kaˬ chehˇ ve lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui aˉ po k'o shehˆ shiˍ te tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ, Moˉseˍ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ leh Eˇliˇya‸ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009006	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ shiˍ.
41009007	Oˇ htaˇ, moˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hoˆ taˍ beh taˍ leh, Chaw chi lehˬ, ngaˬ ha‸ jaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na-o teh‸, moˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la ve yoˬ.
41009008	Yawˇ hui teˇ cawˬ haˉ caw nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ mawˬ. Yeˍsuˆ ceh tiˉ yawˇ hui geh chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41009009	Hk'aw oˇ ve teˇ shiˍ lo yawˇ hui k'aw‸ ya‸ la chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ suh kuiˬ lo maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la sheˍ ve ceh ceh, yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a hto piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41009010	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ tawnˇ taˍ leh, Suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve taˇ ceuˬ aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ k'oˆ ve le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ na nyi da‸ ve yoˬ.
41009011	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Eˇliˇya‸ awˉ lawˉ g'a laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41009012	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Eˇliˇya‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na laˬ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ gu te ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ leh chiˇ baˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw bvuh‸ taˍ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41009013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Eˇliˇya‸ gaˬ la peuˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ te gaˇ ve hk'e te piˇ peuˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41009014	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh k'aw‸ gaˬ la htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ chehˇ taˍ leh, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui geh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41009015	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ anˇ jaˇ leh, yawˇ geh g'uiˇ k'ai leh yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
41009016	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui yawˇ hui geh aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ lawn tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ chehˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ,
41009017	chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ nawˬ geh shiˍ veu laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, k'aˍ ve neˇ geh taˍ ve yoˬ.
41009018	Neˇ yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hk'aˬ lo chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, neˇ yawˇ hta‸ ca‸ baˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, maw‸ k'aw hk'aw awˬ fuˇ tawˆ la leh, ciˬ geu‸ leh awˬ to heh kuˉ lehˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Neˇ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ tuˬ nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui te maˇ g'a teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009019	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yonˍ ve maˇ cawˬ ve chaw chi teˇ co-e-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ maw g'a chehˇ tuˬ sheˍ le. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ maw g'a yeunˇ hkanˍ tuˬ sheˍ le. Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ geh yuˬ laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009020	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, yaˇ paˍ hta‸ yawˇ geh yuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ. Neˇ oˇ ve Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yaˇ paˍ hta‸ yawˇ paw‸ hpeuˆ piˇ lawˬ leh, yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ paiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, maw‸ k'aw hk'aw awˬ fuˇ tawˆ la leh hpeˆ dawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41009021	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yawˇ chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve hk'aˬ maw gaˬ peuˬ le teh‸, awˬ pa hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ pa k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ i htaˇ ka‸ chi hk'e hpeh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41009022	Yawˇ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, laiˉ pawˆ neˇ yawˇ hta‸ ca‸ keu piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ te hpeh‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh ga laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41009023	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Te hpeh‸ ve k'o teh‸ nawˬ k'oˆ ve laˇ. Yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la g'a ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009024	Oˇ htaˇ yaˇ paˍ ehˉ ve awˬ pa teˇ cawˬ haˉ kuˬ leh, Ngaˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ yonˍ maˇ biˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ a ciˉ ga laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009025	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ geh g'uiˇ laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ oˇ ve hta‸ deˇ leh, K'aˍ leh naˍ paw pawˇ ve neˇ-oˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai leh awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ k'aw‸ lo‸-e teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009026	Oˇ htaˇ, neˇ oˇ ve bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ paw‸ hpeuˆ tcuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yaˇ paˍ ehˉ oˇ ve chaw suh hk'e hpeh‸ ve pa taw, Yawˇ suh peuˬ teh‸, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41009027	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ vawˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'awˬ tu piˇ leh yawˇ tu la ve yoˬ.
41009028	Yeˍsuˆ aˉ hk'aw lo‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Neˇ oˇ ve hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw ngaˬ hui g'a‸ k'oˬ maˇ g'a ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41009029	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Bon lawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, neˇ chi teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ maˇ g'a teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009030	Yawˇ hui oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'ai ve awˬ lawn chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ piˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
41009031	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, shehˆ nyi gaˬ k'o yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009032	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui na maˇ g'a htawˇ, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ na nyi maˇ haˆ.
41009033	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui Kaˍpeˍ neˍonˍ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ yehˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ lawn jehˬ da‸ ve le teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41009034	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve le teh‸ ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41009035	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ mui taˍ leh, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, Shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ gaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ i ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ ceˬ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009036	Peuˬ leh, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ leh yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo taˍ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ taˆ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
41009037	Yaˇ ehˉ chi hk'e ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ ha‸ yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41009038	Oˇ htaˇ Yoˇhanˬ k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh laˬ ve chaw maˇ heˆ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41009039	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ taˇ tawˍ taˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh anˇ tuˬ te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ haˆ haˆ k'aw‸ hk'aiˉ g'a tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
41009040	Ngaˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ hpawˇ maˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41009041	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ nawˬ hui pfuhˇ taˍ ve pa taw, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ iˉ kaˆ teˇ kawˆ taw laˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve awˬ bon a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ mehˉ taˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
41009042	Ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve k'awˍ peˍ hta‸ haˉ pui mawˍ lonˉ hpeh k'u leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ce peu ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
41009043	Nawˬ ve la‸ sheh teˇ paˉ nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, tawˆ baˬ-o‸. La‸ sheh nyiˇ paˉ paˉ cawˬ leh, moˬ naˆ ho‸ lo maˇ suh puiˉ ve aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ, la‸ luˬ leh a sha‸ te‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e ve lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
41009045	Nawˬ ve hkui sheh teˇ paˉ nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, tawˆ baˬ-o‸. Hkui sheh nyiˇ paˉ paˉ cawˬ leh moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ, hkui luˬ leh a sha‸ te‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e ve lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
41009047	Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ teˇ paˉ nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, k'ehˉ baˬ-o‸. Mehˆ shiˍ nyiˇ paˉ paˉ cawˬ leh, awˬ pfuhˇ ma maˇ suh puiˉ, aˬ miˍ ka‸ maˇ suh puiˉ ve moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ,
41009048	mehˆ shiˍ teˇ paˉ tiˉ cawˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e ve lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
41009049	Awˬ lawn k'o, aˉ leh‸ yuˬ leh tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ pfuhˍ piˇ ve hk'e, aˬ miˍ pfuhˍ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
41009050	Aˉ leh‸ lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mehˬ ve pehˆ k'ai peuˬ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te k'aw‸ mehˬ la tuˬ le. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo aˉ leh‸ cawˬ piˇ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010001	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ lo cawˬ ve Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ tawn lo k'ai leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh k'aw‸ hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ liˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010002	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ, Hpaˍriˍ sehˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Awˬ hpawˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ hpeh‸-aw laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41010003	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Moˉseˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e piˇ taˍ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi htaˇ,
41010004	Baˬ da‸ ve li‸ teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ piˇ peuˬ k'o, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ hpeh‸-aw teh‸ Moˉseˍ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010005	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui nyi ma heh ve pa taw Moˉseˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ chi hk'e piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ hawˉ hk'aˆ leh yaˇ miˇ hta‸ te hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41010007	Chi hta‸ pa taw hawˉ hk'aˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh,
41010008	yawˇ huiˉ maˬ teˇ suhˍ teˇ shaˍ tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ, teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
41010009	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha caˉ da‸ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ chaw yaˇ maˇ g'a yuˬ hpaˆ da‸ piˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010010	Yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ lawn oˇ ve yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41010011	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, A shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu yaˇ miˇ hta‸ ca heuˆ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve pa taw, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ ya‸ ve yoˬ.
41010012	Yaˇ miˇ htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ baˬ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hawˉ hk'aˆ hta‸ ca heuˆ ve k'o, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010013	Oˇ htaˇ yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ piˇ tuˬ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu yawˇ geh shiˍ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shiˍ laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ deˇ ve yoˬ.
41010014	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ nyi ma zuhˆ leh, Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ geh laˬ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ taˇ tawˍ taˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, chaw oˇ hk'e ve mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41010015	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yaˇ ehˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e taˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010016	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ taˆ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ leh bon na‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010017	Yawˇ ya‸ k'aw k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh g'uiˇ laˬ leh yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh, Da‸ ve Saˍ la‸-oˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41010018	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve le. G'uiˬ sha maˇ heˆ k'o, da‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
41010019	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw hta‸ taˇ tiˇ pehˍ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ taˇ te, shu ve mawˇ hta‸ taˇ hk'awˇ, shu hta‸ maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ taˇ hkanˍ, shu ve mawˇ hta‸ taˇ heˍ yuˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010020	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ ka‸ tanˬ leh chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ na yuˬ leh te peuˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010021	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ nyi leh yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ leh, Nawˬ teˇ ceuˬ loˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ k'o‸-e leh hk'a cawˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ leh haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ-oˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve mawˇ nawˬ cawˬ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, nawˬ k'aw‸ laˬ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010022	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, mehˆ hpfuhˇ nawˍ lehˍ te leh, dawˇ haˍ jaˇ leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ mawˇ jeˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41010023	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ caw nyi leh k'oˆ ve, Paw sha ve chaw hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ hk'aˬ ma haˍ jaˇ ve le.
41010024	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ pawˆ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ hk'aˬ ma haˍ jaˇ ve le.
41010025	Kaˍ laˍ oˆ teˇ hkeh g'o‸ naˍ hk'awˇ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e tuˬ ve lehˬ, paw sha ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ ve a‸ kehˉ sha ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010026	Yawˇ hui leuˉ leh anˇ jaˇ leh, Hk'e te k'o, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ a shu g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010027	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ nyi leh, Chaw yaˇ lehˬ chi hta‸ te maˇ g'a. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha te maˇ g'a ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te g'a ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010028	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh nawˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010029	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ awˬ pon leh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ pon, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ leh a shu yawˇ ve ti mi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ,
41010030	chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo yehˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi, awˬ e, awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ leh ti mi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ teˇ ha pun g'a ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ htawˇ g'a ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ htawˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
41010031	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ, shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ g'a k'aw‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ, shu awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ g'a k'aw‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010032	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ hui awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ kawˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ ve,
41010033	Ngaˬ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ g'a suh tuˬ ve yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ leh, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41010034	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te leh, ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ pfuhˍ leh, yawˇ hta‸ jaw‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41010035	Oˇ htaˇ, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lawˬ ve hk'e nawˬ te laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010036	Yawˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve le teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010037	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Nawˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a htaˇ, nawˬ la‸ sha paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, la‸ mehˍ paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ mui tcuh laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010038	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ lawˬ ve, nawˬ huiˉ maˬ maˇ shiˍ. Ngaˬ dawˬ ve kawˆ hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ dawˬ hpeh‸-aw laˇ. Ngaˬ hkanˍ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hkanˍ hpeh‸-aw laˇ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010039	Hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ dawˬ ve kawˆ hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ g'a dawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hkanˍ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
41010040	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ la‸ mehˍ paˉ g'a mui tuˬ, ngaˬ pe‸ laˇ maˇ hpeh‸. Yawˇ hui awˬ pon gu taˍ piˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ oˇ kaˬ lo g'a mui ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010041	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi g'aˇ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Yaˍkoˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ ve yoˬ.
41010042	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ te tuˬ aˉ yaˇ g'a ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ uˉ peunˍ leh, yawˇ hui ve chaw uiˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ nyiˉ te ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
41010043	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e maˇ g'a te. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw uiˍ hpeh‸ gaˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ nawˬ hui ve awˬ ceˬ g'a te ve yoˬ.
41010044	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ te gaˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon yawˇ lehˬ vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41010045	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, shu yawˇ awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ shu awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ laˬ leh, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ tuˬ, yawˇ ve a sha‸ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41010046	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Yeˍriˆhkoˇ venˇ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ geh Yeˍriˆhkoˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Tiˆmehˇ ve yaˇ paˍ Baˍtiˆmehˇ meh ve mehˆ cuˉ ve lawˬ leh‸ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ k'aw paˇ lo mui chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41010047	Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ g'a kaˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
41010048	Chaw laiˉ g'aˇ lehˬ, Ta‸ iˉ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ deˇ piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ lehˬ, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, leuˉ leh g'aˇ hte‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
41010049	Yeˍsuˆ huˉ taˍ leh, Yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui mehˆ cuˉ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ kuˬ leh, Ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Tu loˬ. Yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ kuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010050	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ k'ehˆ teh taˉ leh, pawˆ tu leh Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
41010051	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ mehˆ mawˬ la tuˬ nawˬ hta‸ te tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41010052	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, K'ai loˬ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ nawˬ hta‸ na-e la piˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ cawˬ haˉ mehˆ mawˬ la leh Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41011001	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ paˇ lo, Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw hta‸ neˇ ve Behˆhpaˍgeˍ hk'aˆ leh Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh k'oˆ ve,
41011002	Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo cawˬ ve hk'aˆ hk'aw lo k'ai-o. Oˇ kaˬ lo lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ ciˇ jaw sheˍ ve piˉ laˬ ehˉ hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
41011003	Hpui leh sheh veu laˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chi hk'e te ve le teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ na nyi laˇ ve k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ loˍ leh yawˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ k'aw‸ hk'aw‸ veu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41011004	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'ai leh, yehˬ miˉ awˬ baˬ ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo piˉ laˍ ehˉ hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, piˉ laˍ ehˉ oˇ ve hta‸ hpui ve yoˬ.
41011005	Oˇ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw piˉ laˍ ehˉ hta‸ hpui ve le teh‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41011006	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41011007	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ piˉ laˬ ehˉ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh sheh veu laˇ leh, piˉ laˍ ehˉ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve veu‸ k'aˇ hk'awˇ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ taˆ ciˇ ve yoˬ.
41011008	Chaw maˇ maˇ a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo hk'awˇ piˇ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ heh jaˇ lo suhˆ hpa‸ chaw leh ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo hk'awˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41011009	Yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ leh awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Hoˍsaˍnaˍ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo laˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ.
41011010	Laˬ chehˇ ve ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Daˍviˆ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma lo htawˇ Hoˍsaˍnaˍ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41011011	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ yawˇ caw nyi peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la ve pa taw tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
41011012	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la leh, Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˍ meu‸ ve yoˬ.
41011013	Hk'e te leh yawˇ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ htaˇ ka‸ awˬ hpa‸ cawˬ ve maˉ nawˆ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, awˬ cehˬ oˇ ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ leh naˍ maˇ naw‸ leh naˍ, g'a mawˬ tuˬ yawˇ ca nyi ve yoˬ. Awˬ paˇ lo yawˇ gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ shiˍ naw‸ ve awˬ yanˇ maˇ heˆ ve pa taw, awˬ hpa‸ hta‸ ceh tiˉ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41011014	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, nawˬ ve awˬ shiˍ hta‸ a shu ka‸ taˇ g'a caˇ piˇ teh‸, maˉ nawˆ cehˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
41011015	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo mawˇ vuiˬ mawˇ hawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ leh, hpu pa shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve hpui lawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, aˉ pui k'aˍ hawˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve mui hk'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hpfuhˆ baˬ ve yoˬ.
41011016	Mawˇ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ yuˬ leh bon yehˬ lonˉ oˇ ve hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai tuˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ piˇ.
41011017	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ ve yehˬ hta‸ chaw teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ pon bon lawˬ kuiˬ yehˬ g'a k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ, yehˬ chi hta‸ chaw hk'awˇ chehˇ kuiˬ hpeh‸ la piˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41011018	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ ca ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ anˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ kawˆ ve yoˬ.
41011019	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ hui venˇ awˬ baˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41011020	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ shawˉ yawˇ hui ya‸ k'aw oˇ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ k'ai htaˇ, maˉ nawˆ cehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ geu hk'a gaˬ nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41011021	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ dawˇ nawˇ la leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nyi sheˍ. Nawˬ hkeu piˇ taˉ ve maˉ nawˆ cehˬ lehˬ, nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai peuˬ law leˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41011022	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ loˬ.
41011023	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ teh‸ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ k'oˆ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yonˍ leh, nyi ma htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ maˇ te ve k'o, hk'aw chi teˇ shiˍ hta‸, Jiˆ tawˆ-e leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ca ce lo‸-e loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
41011024	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui bon lawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a lawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yonˍ loˬ. Oˇ hk'e yonˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
41011025	Nawˬ hui huˉ taˍ leh bon lawˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ nawˬ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve k'o, venˇ baˆ oˇ ve hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a-o. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ htawˇ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41011026	Li‸ hpu teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ka nanˉ ehˉ chi teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ shu ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ hpehˇ piˇ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa htawˇ nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ hpehˇ laˇ.
41011027	Yawˇ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo toˇ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
41011028	Nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve le. Kanˇ paˆ chi a shu nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41011029	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ na nyi shaˍ. Nawˬ hui yaw hk'aw‸ laˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve awˬ lawn nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41011030	Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo g'a ve laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o chaw yaˇ hui geh lo g'a ve laˇ. Ngaˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41011031	Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ jehˬ da‸ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma lo g'a ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve k'o, Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve le teh‸, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41011032	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ hui geh g'a ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ shawˍ taˍ ve pa taw, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ yawˇ hui kawˆ ve yoˬ.
41011033	Hk'e te leh, Ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ, Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ hto laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012001	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ teˇ hpaˍ te maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a pehˉ meuˇ hko te leh ti taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hk'a caw zuhˇ ko taˍ leh, a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ nyiˉ kuiˬ duˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Shaw kuiˬ yehˬ mvuh ve hta‸ htawˇ te leh, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˍ piˇ taˉ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41012002	Awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, hko oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
41012003	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tiˍ taˍ leh dawˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ k'awˇ lehˍ k'o‸-e peu ve yoˬ.
41012004	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ yawˇ hui geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ dawˆ hk'aw sheˬ leh, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na te piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012005	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'ai tcuh ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ laiˉ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'ai tcuh ve htawˇ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui dawˆ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
41012006	Yawˇ ha‸ jaˇ ve yaˇ paˍ ceh tiˉ yawˇ geh cawˬ taˉ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui yawˆ yan tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ leh, awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ pawˆ yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
41012007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, awˬ shinˉ g'a shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Laˬ-o‸, yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ-a veuˬ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, yawˇ ve awˬ shinˉ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41012008	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hko awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo chiˇ baˬ ve yoˬ.
41012009	Hk'e te leh, hko awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te piˇ tuˬ le. Yawˇ laˬ leh hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hko oˇ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ ngaˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41012010	Yehˬ kawˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hui baˬ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ ceˍ k'aweh‸ lo kawˍ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
41012011	Chi lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha te ve kanˉ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ anˇ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui maˇ g'aw jaw laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012012	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ pa haˉ chi yawˇ yawˇ hui awˬ lawn k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41012013	Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw ya‸ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ hui lehˬ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ leh Heˍroˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
41012014	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ maˇ kawˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ nyi leh G'uiˬ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ a moˇ keu piˇ cawˇ laˇ, maˇ keu piˇ cawˇ laˇ.
41012015	Ngaˬ hui g'a keu piˇ tuˬ laˇ, maˇ g'a keu piˇ tuˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui heˍ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve teh‸ shiˍ leh, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te ngaˬ hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve le. Ngaˬ g'a nyi tuˬ, hpu teˇ hteh‸ ngaˬ geh yuˬ laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012016	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui yuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, A shu ve awˬ han, a shu ve awˬ meh cawˬ le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012017	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve mawˇ jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ piˇ-oˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41012018	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Saˍduˆkehˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
41012019	Saˍ la‸-oˬ, Moˉseˍ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ viˉ paˍ yaˇ maˇ cawˬ leh suh ve k'o, awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ k'aw‸ heuˆ leh awˬ viˉ paˍ awˬ pon awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ g'a cawˬ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41012020	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi suhˍ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ heuˆ leh, yaˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ suh ve yoˬ.
41012021	Nyi g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ heuˆ leh, yaˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ suh ve yoˬ. Shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yoˬ.
41012022	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi suhˍ g'aˇ hk'a gaˬ yaˇ maˇ cawˬ taˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ suh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve htawˇ suh ve yoˬ.
41012023	K'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hpehˬ tuˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui suhˍ g'aˇ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ heuˆ peuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41012024	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Li‸ hpu hta‸ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui dawˇ ya‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
41012025	Awˬ lawn k'o, suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ka piˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ te. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hk'e hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
41012026	Suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha Moˉseˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, Moˉseˍ bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui maˇ g'aw jaw laˇ. Aˉ chuˇ buiˇ awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo, Ngaˬ lehˬ Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve G'uiˬ sha, Iˉcaˆ ve G'uiˬ sha leh Yaˍkoˆ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012027	Yawˇ lehˬ, suh ve chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui dawˇ ya‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012028	Oˇ htaˇ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh yawˇ hui tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ leh, Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve teˇ hkawˇ uiˍ leuˉ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41012029	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Uiˍ leuˉ ve teˇ maˬ lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, na sheˍ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41012030	Nawˬ ve nyi ma hk'a peu-eˬ, nawˬ ve co ha hk'a peu-eˬ, nawˬ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ leh nawˬ ve awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ g'a ha‸ ve yoˬ.
41012031	Nyiˇ hkawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, nawˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ g'a ha‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ chi nyiˇ hkawˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41012032	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ oˇ ve k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Cawˇ ve yoˬ, Saˍ la‸-oˬ. G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ leh, yawˇ maˇ heˆ k'o awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu G'uiˬ sha maˇ cawˬ ve teh‸ nawˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ hteˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41012033	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nyi ma hk'a peu-eˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ hk'a peu-eˬ, awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ ha‸ ve lehˬ, aˬ miˍ tuˉ tanˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ leh tanˇ tuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41012034	Yawˇ hk'a deh‸ dawˇ nyi leh yaw hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ vuiˇ da‸ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ na nyi maˇ haˆ ve yoˬ.
41012035	Yeˍsuˆ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ teˇ pawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Hkri‸ lehˬ Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸, aˬ hto‸ ma te li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve le.
41012036	Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu Daˍviˆ hta‸ dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve hkui sheh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ taˍ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ-oˆ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41012037	Daˍviˆ awˬ to yawˇ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ ve yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ha lehˬ ha k'a na yuˬ ve yoˬ.
41012038	Yawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ve hta‸ deh leh ca te toˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Tcuh hk'aw lo shu yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˆ yan laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ,
41012039	bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui hk'awˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hti caˇ hti dawˬ kuiˬ lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
41012040	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mehˇ chawˇ ma ve yehˬ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ leh, venˇ baˆ maˇ g'a tawˆ la tuˬ maw chaweh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Shu a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh uiˍ jaˇ ve ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41012041	Oˇ htaˇ, hpu tanˇ keu kuiˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ teˇ hpawˇ lo yawˇ mui chehˇ leh, chaw chi ma ve hpu tanˇ keu kuiˬ lo hpu keu ve hta‸ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ. Paw sha ve chaw laiˉ g'aˇ hpu maˇmaˇ keu ve yoˬ.
41012042	Oˇ htaˇ haˍ g'awˇ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh, kuiˇ peh‸ shanˍ ehˉ nyiˇ maˬ keu ve yoˬ. Peh‸ shanˍ ehˉ oˇ ve nyiˇ maˬ lehˬ, teˇ peh‸ hpfuhˇ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
41012043	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, hpu tanˇ keu kuiˬ lo keu ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ haˍ g'awˇ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ leuˉ leh keu maˇ ve yoˬ.
41012044	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ tawˆ leh keu ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yaˇ miˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, haˍ g'awˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ ve a sha‸ hu tuˬ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ leh keu ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41013001	Yeˍsuˆ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nyi sheˍ. Hk'aˬ ma da‸ jaˇ ve haˉ pui teˇ hpaˍ leh, hk'aˬ ma da‸ jaˇ ve yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve le.
41013002	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Uiˍ jaˇ ve yehˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ mawˬ laˇ. Choˬ kaˬ lo haˉ pui teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ teˇ shiˍ maˇ cawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ shu te luˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41013003	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ teˇ hpawˇ, Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo mui chehˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ, Yaˍkoˆ, Yoˇhanˬ leh Anˍdrehˍ hui laˬ leh,
41013004	Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ htaˆ hpeh‸ la tuˬ le. Chi hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la paˇ neˇ ve teˇ yanˇ awˬ heˆ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ tawˆ la tuˬ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ a yehˉ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41013005	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸.
41013006	Chaw maˇ maˇ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pfuhˇ laˬ leh, Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013007	Ma‸ bawˆ ve leh bawˆ da‸-a teh‸ te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui kawˆ cheˇ ve nyi ma taˇ cawˬ piˇ. Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ leh meuˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ.
41013008	Chaw teˇ ceuˬ leh teˇ ceuˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ leh teˇ peˆ ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Chehˇ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo miˬ hiˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Meu‸ ve kaˆ ve htawˇ cawˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
41013009	Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo shu nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo shu nawˬ hui hta‸ jaw‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ htaˬ pa taw nawˬ hui mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ leh hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ g'a huˉ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shaˉ hkiˆ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013010	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi, chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ g'a maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013011	Nawˬ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ laˇ tuˬ shu nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, tawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a yaw tuˬ ve hta‸ taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ. Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ yaw tcuh laˇ ve hk'e ceh tiˉ yaw-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ yaw shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui maˇ heˆ, daˬ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yoˬ.
41013012	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ suh tuˬ chiˇ a‸ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ pa htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Yaˇ paˍ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ hpfuhˆ leh tiˇ pehˍ tcuh tuˬ yoˬ.
41013013	Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw chaw hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ yeˬ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
41013014	Te luˬ te sheˆ puiˉ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ chehˇ cawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, (li‸ chi hta‸ g'aw ve chaw lehˬ shiˍ-o‸,) oˇ htaˇ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hk'aw hk'oˆ lawˬ hk'oˆ lo hpaw-e loˬ. Yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw taˇ k'aw‸ ya‸-e.
41013015	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, mawˇ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ ca yuˬ tuˬ, yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ lo‸-e.
41013016	Heh hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ ca k'aw‸ yuˬ tuˬ, taˇ k'o‸-e.
41013017	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ hu ma leh cuˉ dawˬ ve yaˇ ehˉ cawˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013018	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ kaˆ yanˇ maˇ g'a cawˇ tuˬ bon lawˬ-o‸.
41013019	Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha te hpanˍ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ maˇ hpeh‸ la jaw sheˍ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve tu‸ jaˇ hkanˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
41013020	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha maˇ ngeh piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ponˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ pa taw, awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ ngeh piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013021	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Nyi-o, Hkri‸ choˬ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ, oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve k'o, taˇ yonˍ.
41013022	Awˬ lawn k'o, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve Hkri‸ leh maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hpeh‸ ve k'o leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ g'a tuˬ, anˇ tuˬ leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013023	Nawˬ hui shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
41013024	Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, mvuhˇ nyi naˆ ho‸ k'ai leh, ha pa htawˇ awˬ g'euˆ maˇ k'aw‸ ba.
41013025	Meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ mvuhˇ naw ma lo ce la leh, mvuhˇ naw ma lo cawˬ ve kanˇ paˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
41013026	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh uiˍ jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo moˬ ciˇ leh ya‸ la ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013027	Oˇ htaˇ mvuhˇ awˇ ceˍ miˬ awˍ hpawˇ lo, miˬ guiˬ awˬ leh teˇ kaˬ te leh mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ leh teˇ kaˬ hk'a gaˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'ai tcuh leh, yawˇ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ hpawnˬ da‸ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013028	Maˉ nawˆ cehˬ hta‸ tehˆ maˍ ve tawˇ pa haˉ chi hta‸ henˇ yuˬ-o‸. Awˬ tuˍ tuˍ la leh awˬ caˍ caˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ cha hkui yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
41013029	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ lehˬ yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-o‸.
41013030	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chi teˇ co maˇ ponˬ k'ai sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, awˬ ceuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
41013031	Mvuhˇ naw ma leh miˬ naˆ ma mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, maˇ mehˉ k'ai taˬ.
41013032	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui ka‸, Yaˇ hpu ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Awˬ pa teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
41013033	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve hk'aˬ htaˆ gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, shaˍ ti‸ te leh shaw taˍ-o‸.
41013034	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve yehˬ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve kanˉ chiˇ a‸ piˇ taˉ leh, yehˬ miˉ shaw shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ htawˇ hk'a deh‸ shaw taˍ tuˬ tawˇ piˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
41013035	Hk'e te leh, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la tuˬ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ htaˇ leh naˍ, shehˍ k'aw hkui htaˇ leh naˍ, g'aˆ hpfuh bvuhˬ htaˇ leh naˍ, mvuhˇ shawˉ htaˇ leh naˍ, hk'aˬ htaˆ k'aw‸ gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, shaw taˍ-o‸.
41013036	Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, nawˬ hui zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
41013037	Nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'e, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve, shaw taˍ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014001	Nyiˇ nyi peuˬ k'o, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ leh Hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'aw lo diˇ maˇ keu ve pawehˇ te ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh heˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca ve yoˬ.
41014002	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ, Chaw chi ma ve duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ maˇ g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ, pawehˇ te ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ te teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41014003	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ hk'aw hkiˬ tu‸ paˍ Siˉmonˍ ve aˉ hk'aw hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui caˇ chehˇ htaˇ, yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ lo‸ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve naˍ manˇ hawnˉ keu taˍ ve hpuˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui kaw teˇ maˬ yuˬ laˬ leh, kaw oˇ ve hta‸ dawˆ hkoˇ sheˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ naˍ manˇ hawnˉ oˇ ve ngeuˍ pfuhˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014004	Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ nyi ma zuhˆ leh k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma te awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo naˍ manˇ hawnˉ chi hta‸ yehˇ baˬ ve le.
41014005	Naˍ manˇ hawnˉ chi ve hta‸ shehˆ ha hteh‸ hpaˆ hawˇ leh, haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ hui hta‸ pehˬ piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui deˇ ve yoˬ.
41014006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ chi hta‸ taˇ deˇ. Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te yawˇ hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ piˇ ve le. Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ te laˇ peuˬ.
41014007	Haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui te gaˇ ve k'o, hk'aˬ ve teˇ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ te piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
41014008	Yaˇ miˇ chi lehˬ, te puiˉ te hpeh‸ ve hk'e te peuˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ tuˍ tuˬ awˬ pon, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ naˍ manˇ hawnˉ pfuhˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
41014009	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ miˬ guiˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo ca maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ miˇ chi hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ te taˍ ve kanˉ chi hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014010	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
41014011	Yawˇ hui tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ hpu piˇ tuˬ ka ti‸ te taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ, da‸ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ Yuˇda‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41014012	Hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'aw lo diˇ maˇ keu ve pawehˇ awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi htaˇ, paˍsaˍhkaˍ yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ tiˇ tanˇ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ caˇ tuˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon hk'aˬ lo teˇ kaˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ca gu tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41014013	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai-o. Iˉ kaˆ mu‸ hk'u taˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ g'a hpuˇ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
41014014	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, yawˇ hk'aˬ lo lo‸-e ve maˇ k'oˆ, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ. Saˍ la‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Ngaˬ leh ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh teˇ geh Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ caˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ pon teh taˍ ve hkehˉ chaw bawehˇ hk'aˬ lo le.
41014015	Oˇ htaˇ, chehˇ kuiˬ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ peuˬ ve, awˬ hta‸ teˇ htai‸ bawehˇ uiˍ ve teˇ bawehˇ yawˇ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo ngaˬ hui awˬ pon gu taˍ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014016	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'e g'a mawˬ leh, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ caˇ tuˬ awˬ pon gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
41014017	Mehˆ muiˉ naˆ la htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ geh yawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ.
41014018	Yawˇ hui awˍ mui caˇ chehˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ geh teˇ geh hkaˆ caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014019	Yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ leh, Ngaˬ laˇ teh‸ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41014020	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ geh teˇ hkehˇ tiˉ hkaˆ caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ.
41014021	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ g'a k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ chiˇ a‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve maˇ paw la ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014022	Yawˇ hui caˇ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ hk'eh‸ leh awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Yuˬ-o‸. Chi lehˬ ngaˬ ve awˬ to yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014023	Kawˆ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ yuˬ leh, bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ kawˆ oˇ ve hta‸ dawˬ ve yoˬ.
41014024	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chi lehˬ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ yoˬ. Awˬ suhˍ chi lehˬ, chaw maˇ maˇ ve awˬ pon ngeuˍ pfuhˍ ve yoˬ.
41014025	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ g'a dawˬ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ dawˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014026	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui k'a muiˬ hkawˇ k'a peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui tawˆ-e leh Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
41014027	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma luˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yawˬ hawˉ paˍ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˆ pehˍ leh, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˆ da‸ leh teˇ kaˬ teˇ hkeh hpaw k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41014028	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ nawˬ hui g'uˇ suhˍ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014029	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Shu hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma luˬ htawˇ ngaˬ lehˬ nyi ma maˇ luˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014030	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ya‸ puiˉ g'aˆ hpfuh nyiˇ pawˆ maˇ bvuhˬ sheˍ htaˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ chiˇ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014031	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ g'a suh ve htawˇ, nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ chiˇ baˬ taˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014032	Oˇ htaˇ Geˍseˍmaˍniˆ meh ve teˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ hui gaˬ leh, Ngaˬ bon ca lawˬ chehˇ htaˇ nawˬ hui choˬ kaˬ lo mui taˍ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014033	Peuˬ leh, Peˍtruˆ, Yaˍkoˆ, Yoˇhanˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ geh teˇ geh shiˍ veu ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo anˇ jaˇ, sho‸ sha‸ jaˇ la leh,
41014034	yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nyi ma dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve suh la yoˬ. Choˬ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ leh shaw taˍ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014035	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ a ciˉ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ sheˍ leh, awˬ yanˇ chi ve yawˇ hta‸ ponˬ k'ai g'a k'o, ponˬ k'ai laˇ tuˬ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
41014036	Aˍbaˆ A pa-oˬ, nawˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Kawˆ chi ve ngaˬ hta‸ ponˬ k'ai tcuh laˇ-oˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Nawˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
41014037	Yawˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, nawˬ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve laˇ. Teˇ naˍ riˍ ceh ka‸ nawˬ shaw taˍ maˇ hpeh‸ laˇ.
41014038	Nawˬ hui beˬ ve lawˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ bon lawˬ leh shaw taˍ-o‸. Nawˬ hui te gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ htawˇ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ lehˬ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014039	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai leh, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ lawˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ bon k'aw‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
41014040	Yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'aw‸ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui zuh‸ muiˉ geu‸ jaˇ ve pa taw zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
41014041	Shehˆ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ yawˇ k'aw‸ la leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui zuh‸ muiˉ k'a leh g'aˇ jehˇ chehˇ sheˍ laˇ. Pehˇ-o, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ.
41014042	Tu, k'ai-a veuˬ. Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014043	Yawˇ tawˇ yaw chehˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh, aˉ htaw pfuhˇ leh suhˆ taˬ taˆ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ htawˇ yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ tcuh peu laˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41014044	Yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ heˆ chi hk'e te tuˬ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve, Ngaˬ boˆ nu ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tiˍ taˍ leh hk'a deh‸ yuˬ k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014045	Yawˇ gaˬ la htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh teˇ cawˬ haˉ k'ai leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ leh yawˇ hta‸ boˆ nu ve yoˬ.
41014046	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ vawˆ leh yuˬ tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41014047	Awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve aˉ htaw g'awˬ tawˆ leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ chaw leh naˍ paw cheˆ ve yoˬ.
41014048	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ hta‸ ca hpeh yuˬ ve hk'e, aˉ htaw leh suhˆ taˬ teˇ hpaˍ yuˬ veu laˇ leh ngaˬ hta‸ ca hpeh la ve leˇ.
41014049	Teˇ nyi le le bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ leh maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ hpeh yuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014050	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh hpaw-e ve yoˬ.
41014051	Chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, pi‸ hpa teˇ hk'oˆ ceh tiˉ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hawˆ taˍ leh Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ,
41014052	pi‸ hpa oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ k'ehˆ baˬ taˉ leh awˬ k'u nyi te hpaw-e ve yoˬ.
41014053	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ paw hkuˇ lonˉ geh yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ oˇ kaˬ lo hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ.
41014054	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve shaˉ nanˉ awˬ paˇ lo ko taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ hk'a gaˬ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh a ciˉ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai leh, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh mui leh, aˬ miˍ lehˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
41014055	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca ve htawˇ, shaˉ hkiˆ ca maˇ mawˬ.
41014056	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw maˇ maˇ yawˇ awˬ lawn maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve maˇ hawˍ da‸.
41014057	Oˇ htaˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tu la leh, yawˇ awˬ lawn maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
41014058	La‸ sheh te taˍ ve bon yehˬ lonˉ chi hta‸ ngaˬ te luˬ leh, la‸ sheh maˇ te ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ shehˆ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ ngaˬ k'aw‸ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014059	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve htawˇ, maˇ hawˍ da‸.
41014060	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ tu leh awˬ k'aw ji lo huˉ taˍ leh, Nawˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ yaw hk'aw‸ ve laˇ. Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ awˬ lawn aˬ hto‸ ma shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve le teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41014061	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ leh te‸ chiˉ maˇ yaw hk'aw‸ ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Awˬ bon uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41014062	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yoˬ, ngaˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, Kanˇ paˆ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui leh, mvuhˇ naw ma ve moˬ hta‸ ciˇ ya‸ la ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41014063	Oˇ htaˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ lehˬ, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ tzuh‸ suhˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma shaˉ hkiˆ k'aw‸ loˍ sheˍ le.
41014064	Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ. Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yawˇ lehˬ suh keunˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ ve yoˬ.
41014065	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ pfuhˍ ve, yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ beh taˍ leh yawˇ hta‸ chu-iˬ leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'e te leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ dawˆ leh yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41014066	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, awˬ hawˉ lo ko taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve awˬ ceˬ ma teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh,
41014067	Peˍtruˆ aˬ miˍ lehˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh, Nawˬ htawˇ Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ geh chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014068	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Peˍtruˆ g'awˬ hk'aˆ leh, Nawˬ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ, na ka‸ na maˇ g'a teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, ko taˍ kuiˬ yehˬ miˉ awˬ baˬ lo yawˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
41014069	Awˬ ceˬ ma oˇ ve teˇ pawˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ mawˬ htaˇ, awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸, Chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014070	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw gaˬ leh awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41014071	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hkeu leh, Nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ leh hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
41014072	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ g'aˆ hpfuh nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ bvuhˬ la ve yoˬ. G'aˆ hpfuh nyiˇ pawˆ maˇ bvuhˬ sheˍ htaˇ nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ chiˇ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ Peˍtruˆ dawˇ nawˇ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ dawˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ hawˬ ve yoˬ.
41015001	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui lehˬ, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ geh jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpeh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ sheh veu leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ ve la‸ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41015002	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yoˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41015003	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ maˇ maˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41015004	Hk'e te leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve laˇ. Yawˇ hui nawˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ hk'aˬ ma taˍ ve hta‸ nyi sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41015005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ka‸ maˇ yaw hk'aw‸ ve pa taw jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ anˇ ve yoˬ.
41015006	Pawehˇ oˇ ve hta‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hui lawˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
41015007	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpfuhˆ k'ai leh chaw hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve Baˍraˍbaˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hpfuhˆ k'ai ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh htawnˍ hk'aw hpeh keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
41015008	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh k'ai leh awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve hk'e te laˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui lawˬ ve yoˬ.
41015009	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui awˬ pon Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ tcuh gaˇ ve laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41015010	Awˬ lawn k'o, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hkawehˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ ve hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
41015011	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ maˇ hpehˇ leh Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ ca juˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
