41015012	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Hk'e te k'o, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ na nyi htaˇ,
41015013	Yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ loˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui g'aˇ hte‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
41015014	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw le. Yawˇ haiˬ ve aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ loˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui leuˉ leh g'aˇ hte‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
41015015	Hk'e te leh jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ te gaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui awˬ pon Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ jaw‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41015016	Oˇ htaˇ, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ve hawˉ yehˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ko taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai leh, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ ta‸ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ ve yoˬ.
41015017	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hpa nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma yawˇ hta‸ deh piˇ ve yoˬ. Aˉ chuˇ te hta‸ htawˇ yuˬ leh, shi uˉ tcuhˍ hk'e te g'a‸ leh yawˇ hta‸ hk'awˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41015018	Yuˇda‸ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ-oˬ, nawˬ awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˆ yan ve hk'e te leh yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ ve yoˬ.
41015019	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui lo taˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ dawˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ pfuhˍ leh, hkui tcuhˉ teh leh yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
41015020	Yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ yawˇ hui k'ehˆ baˬ leh yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ feuˉ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ sheh tawˆ-e ve yoˬ.
41015021	Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ leh Ruˇhpuˆ awˬ pa, Siˉmonˍ meh ve Kuˇreˍneˍ venˇ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ, heh hk'aw k'ai k'aw‸ la ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ nyiˉ leh Yeˍsuˆ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ tcuh ve yoˬ.
41015022	Gawˇlaˍgawˇtaˆ meh ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ meh oˇ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, oˉ koˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41015023	Muˇraˍ hkaw‸ taˍ ve a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ taw piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ maˇ dawˬ.
41015024	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui lehˬ veu‸ k'aˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ hk'oˆ hta‸ a shu g'a cawˇ leh naˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui kuˇ da‸ leh yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ pehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41015025	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ shawˉ k'awˇ naˍ riˍ teˇ yanˇ yoˬ.
41015026	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve li‸ yawˇ hui bvuh‸ nehˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41015027	Peuˬ leh yawˇ geh teˇ geh chaw hk'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ, la‸ sha paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, la‸ mehˍ paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
41015028	Li‸ hpu teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ka nanˉ ehˉ chi teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh yawˇ hta‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve Li‸ hpu tawˇ hkawˇ biˇ la ve yoˬ.
41015029	K'ai k'ai laˬ laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ leh, a shu yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hiˆ leh k'oˆ ve, Eˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ te luˬ leh shehˆ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ te g'a ve chaw-oˬ,
41015030	nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ponˬ piˇ leh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41015031	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui htawˇ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui geh teˇ geh chi hka shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Shu hta‸ yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ maˇ g'a.
41015032	Ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh g'a yonˍ tuˬ, Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ geh teˇ geh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41015033	Mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ htaˇ ka‸ tanˬ leh mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ hk'a gaˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ naˆ ho‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
41015034	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh te leh, Eˇliˆ, Eˇliˆ, laˍmaˍsaˍbaˆtaˍniˍ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, Ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ laˇ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41015035	Awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Nyi loˬ, yawˇ Eˇliˇya‸ hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41015036	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'uiˇ k'ai leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ mvuhˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh ci ve awˬ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tuˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, lo taˬ hta‸ choˆ leh yawˇ hta‸ taw piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Law taˍ sheˍ. Eˇliˇya‸ yawˇ hta‸ ca yuˬ ya‸ la tuˬ leh naˍ, ngaˬ hui nyi taˍ shaˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41015037	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh, shaˉ cheˆ ve yoˬ.
41015038	Oˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ ve hpaˬ kaˍ lehˬ, awˬ na te leh awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a gaˬ nyiˇ hkoˇ tzuh‸ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
41015039	Yawˇ chi hk'e shaˉ cheˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ huˉ chehˇ ve ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Chaw chi lehˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na G'uiˬ sha ve yaˇ hpu teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
41015040	Oˇ kaˬ a ciˉ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ chehˇ leh nyi taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo, Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ, a sha‸ i ve Yaˍkoˆ teˇ g'aˇ leh Yoˇseˍ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ leh, Saˍloˍmenˍ hui chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
41015041	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh yawˇ hta‸ te caˍ te taw piˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ. Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo yawˇ geh teˇ geh taˆ la ve yaˇ miˇ laiˉ g'aˇ htawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ leh nyi taˍ ve yoˬ.
41015042	Shinˉ nyi maˇ gaˬ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ teˇ nyi mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, gu ve awˬ nyi hpeh‸ ve pa taw,
41015043	awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ, Aˍriˆma‸htehˍ venˇ yaˇ Yoˇseh‸ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh k'ai leh Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ lawˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
41015044	Awˬ yanˇ chi maw ceh tiˉ ka‸ suh peuˬ ve pa taw, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ anˇ leh ma‸ poˍ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, Yawˇ suh peuˬ tehˬ ve yoˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
41015045	Yeˍsuˆ suh peuˬ ve awˬ lawn ma‸ poˍ hto piˇ leh yawˇ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41015046	Hk'e te leh, Yoˇseh‸ hpa hpu hta‸ vuiˬ yuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ yuˬ ya‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hpa hpu yuˬ hawˆ htiˆ sheˬ leh, haˉ pui htawˆ taˍ ve tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo keu taˍ ve yoˬ. Tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ lo haˉ pui hpfuhˆ tsuhˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
41015047	Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ leh Yoˇseˍ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ teh taˍ kuiˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
41016001	Shinˉ nyi peuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ,Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ leh Saˍloˍmenˍ hui lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ ca pfuhˍ piˇ tuˬ sha hawnˉ vuiˬ ve yoˬ.
41016002	Teˇ shinˉ awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸ mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui tuˍ hpfuh lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
41016003	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ hta‸ tsuhˇ taˍ ve haˉ pui hta‸ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon a shu hpfuhˆ baˬ laˇ tuˬ le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
41016004	Yawˇ hui chiˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, haˉ pui oˇ ve hpfuhˆ baˬ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Haˉ pui oˇ ve lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41016005	Tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, hpuˉ lehˍ ve aˇ po‸ zuhˬ ma veu‸ taˍ ve chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
41016006	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Taˇ kawˆ. La‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve Naˬzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ nawˬ hui ca ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ. Yawˇ choˬ kaˬ maˇ chehˇ. Yawˇ hta‸ teh taˍ kuiˬ lo ca nyi la-o.
41016007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui k'ai leh, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh Peˍtruˆ hta‸ chi hk'e hto piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui g'uˇ suhˍ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ taˉ laˇ ve hk'e, oˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41016008	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tuˍ hpfuh hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai leh, kawˆ cheˇ leh anˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui g'uiˇ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve pa taw, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ hto piˇ.
41016009	Teˇ shinˉ awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ awˬ to Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ maw piˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ neˇ suhˍ hkeh geh taˍ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a‸ k'oˬ piˇ jaw ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
41016010	Yeˍsuˆ geh chehˇ jaw ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ haˍ g'aˇ haˍ leh hawˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Maˍriˆ k'ai leh yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
41016011	Yeˍsuˆ te‸ chehˇ leh Maˍriˆ yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, maˇ yonˍ.
41016012	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ hk'aˆ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ ho‸ awˬ han peun da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˬ to yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ.
41016013	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ laˬ leh, chehˇ taˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hto piˇ ve htawˇ yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ.
41016014	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ awˍ mui caˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ to yawˇ hui hta‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ puiˉ ve leh nyi ma ka‸ heh ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ deˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw yoˬ.
41016015	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo k'ai leh chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ca maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
41016016	Yonˍ leh baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
41016017	Yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ heˆ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a‸ k'oˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
41016018	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, vuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ taw‸ ma hta‸ dawˬ ve ka‸, yawˇ hui te‸ chiˉ maˇ hpeh‸. Chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui la‸ sheh taˍ leh chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ na-e la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
41016019	Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo chiˇ taˆ-e leh, G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sha paˉ lo yawˇ mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
41016020	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh teˇ kaˬ le le lo bon hkawˇ ca maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hui geh kanˉ te leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ te tawˆ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo, bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yeˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
42001001	Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve Htawˇhpiˇ luˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ puiˉ ve hpeh‸ ve hk'e, awˬ lawn teˇ ceuˬ peuˬ teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hteˇ lehˍ bvuh‸ taˍ peuˬ.
42001002	Hk'a hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ g'a mawˬ taˍ leh, bon hkawˇ g'a maˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ peuˬ ve hk'e yawˇ hui bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42001003	Ngaˬ htawˇ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ hui bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ shawˍ nyi tehˆ nyi taˍ peuˬ.
42001004	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ g'a henˇ taˍ peuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ teˇ ceuˬ peuˬ teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hteˇ lehˍ nawˬ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42001005	Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ uˉ peunˍ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Aˍbiˉya‸ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Zaˍhkaˍriˆ meh ve paw hkuˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma lehˬ Aˍronˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ meh Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ yoˬ.
42001006	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ leh piˇ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te leh ya‸ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ. G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42001007	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yaˇ maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ lehˬ chaw meh ma hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ mawˇ la peuˬ.
42001008	Zaˍhkaˍriˆ ve awˬ moˍ kanˉ te ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ paw hkuˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te chehˇ htaˇ,
42001009	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh sha hawnˉ ve hta‸ tuˉ tanˇ tuˬ, paw hkuˇ awˬ liˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui kuˇ da‸ leh yawˇ hta‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
42001010	Sha hawnˉ ve hta‸ tuˉ tanˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42001011	Oˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ tawˆ la leh, sha hawnˉ ve tuˉ tanˇ kuiˬ la‸ sha paˉ lo huˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42001012	Zaˍhkaˍriˆ yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ leh kawˆ ve yoˬ.
42001013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Zaˍhkaˍriˆ-oˬ, taˇ kawˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ bon lawˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha kaˇ peuˬ. Nawˬ ve awˬ miˇ ma Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon yaˇ paˍ paw la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ Yoˇhanˬ teh‸ nawˬ g'a meh piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001014	Nawˬ lehˬ ha lehˬ tuˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve paw la ve pa taw, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ htawˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001015	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw uiˍ chaw mvuh hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ leh bvuhˆ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ a ciˉ ka‸ dawˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ paw la htaˇ ka‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hk'a biˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001016	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha geh lo k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la tuˬ ve yawˇ te tuˬ yoˬ.
42001017	Awˬ pa teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ cawˇ da‸ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui ve cuˇ yiˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon gu taˍ ve chaw ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ gu piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ lehˬ Eˇliˇya‸ ve nyi ma leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ mvuhˇ maw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001018	Oˇ htaˇ Zaˍhkaˍriˆ lehˬ, Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ tuˬ le. Ngaˬ lehˬ mawˇ la peuˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ miˇ ma htawˇ mawˇ la peuˬ teh‸, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001019	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ huˉ taˍ ve Gaˍbeˍlaˆ yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ leh, ha lehˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ chi hto laˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
42001020	Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ nawˬ tawˇ yaw maˇ g'a leh chaw k'aˍ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001021	Chaw chi ma ve lehˬ, Zaˍhkaˍriˆ hta‸ law chehˇ ve yoˬ. Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maw chaweh chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui anˇ ve yoˬ.
42001022	Yawˇ tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ yaw maˇ g'a leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'aˍ chehˇ leh, la‸ sheh awˬ heˆ ceh tiˉ te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001023	Yawˇ kanˉ te ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ peuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42001024	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ yaˇ hu la leh, ha pa ngaˇ maˬ hk'a gaˬ va‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42001025	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ nyi laˇ ve awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw yaˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shu hk'aiˉ leh venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hta‸ yuˬ baˬ laˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ awˬ pon chi hk'e te laˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42001026	Ha pa hkaw‸ maˬ gaˬ htaˇ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ geh, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ Gaˍbeˍlaˆ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42001027	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Daˍviˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ Yoˇseh‸ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ heuˆ da‸ tuˬ ka ti‸ te taˍ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ haˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, Maˍriˆ meh ve yoˬ.
42001028	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve Maˍriˆ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, Awˬ bon g'a maˇ ve yaˇ miˇ -oˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ geh chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001029	Maˍriˆ lehˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ jaˇ leh, na‸ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ chi hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ gaˇ ve leh naˍ teh‸, yawˇ dawˇ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42001030	Oˇ htaˇ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'oˆ ve, Maˍriˆ-oˬ, taˇ kawˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
42001031	Nawˬ yaˇ hu la leh, yaˇ paˍ paw la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ teh‸ nawˬ g'a meh piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001032	Yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw uiˍ chaw mvuh hpeh‸ leh, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ awˬ pa Daˍviˆ ve k'aw jaw piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001033	Yawˇ lehˬ, Yaˍkoˆ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ maˇ cawˬ, teh‸ Maˍriˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001034	Oˇ htaˇ Maˍriˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ awˬ hpawˇ maˇ cawˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e te chi hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ le teh‸, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001035	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ awˬ hk'oˆ ya‸ la leh, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ nawˬ hta‸ beh taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, paw la tuˬ ve yaˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ leh, da‸ kehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teh‸ shu k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001036	Chaw meh ma teh‸ k'oˆ ve nawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ htawˇ, yawˇ mawˇ la peuˬ ve ka‸, yaˇ paˍ hta‸ hu chehˇ ve ha pa hkaw‸ maˬ gaˬ peuˬ.
42001037	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha maˇ te puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001038	Maˍriˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ ma yoˬ. Nawˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42001039	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, Maˍriˆ tu leh Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw hk'oˆ lawˬ hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve venˇ teˇ venˇ lo haˆ haˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42001040	Yawˇ Zaˍhkaˍriˆ ve yehˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh, Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ hta‸ na‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001041	Maˍriˆ na‸ piˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve g'oˇ peˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ ehˉ lehˬ, hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ te ve yoˬ. Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu biˇ la leh,
42001042	yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ lehˬ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ve g'oˇ peˬ hk'aw ve yaˇ ehˉ htawˇ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
42001043	Ngaˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ ve awˬ e ngaˬ geh laˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ ngaˬ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw g'a ve le.
42001044	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ na‸ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ ve g'oˇ peˬ hk'aw ve yaˇ ehˉ lehˬ, ha lehˬ leh hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ te ve yoˬ.
42001045	Yonˍ ve yaˇ miˇ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42001046	Oˇ htaˇ Maˍriˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve nyi ma lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
42001047	Ngaˬ ve co ha htawˇ, ngaˬ ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42001048	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ ma hta‸ yawˇ nyi laˇ peuˬ. Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, chaw teˇ co peuˬ teˇ co ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yaˇ miˇ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001049	Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ uiˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ te laˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ.
42001050	Yawˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan ve chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ teˇ co peuˬ teˇ co cawˬ ve yoˬ.
42001051	Yawˇ ve la‸ sheh lehˬ, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve hta‸ te taˍ peuˬ. A shu yawˇ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma uiˍ ve mvuh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hpaˆ da‸ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ.
42001052	Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo yawˇ yuˬ ce piˇ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ taˆ piˇ peuˬ.
42001053	Meu‸ ve kaˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a bvuhˆ caˍ piˇ leh, paw sha ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ to k'awˇ lehˍ hpehˇ peu piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001054	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e.
42001055	Aˍbraˍhanˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ hta‸ ga piˇ peuˬ.
42001056	Maˍriˆ lehˬ, Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ geh shehˆ ha pa chehˇ taˉ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42001057	Eˇliˇsaˍbehˆ yaˇ paw ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la leh yaˇ paˍ paw la ve yoˬ.
42001058	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ bon yawˇ hta‸ te piˇ ve awˬ lawn, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ geh hk'a geh ha lehˬ ve yoˬ.
42001059	Hiˉ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ htaˇ, yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ pa ve awˬ meh hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hta‸ Zaˍhkaˍriˆ meh piˇ-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ,
42001060	awˬ e k'oˆ ve, Maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hta‸ Yoˇhanˬ g'a meh piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42001061	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Nawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42001062	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ ehˉ oˇ ve hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e meh piˇ tcuh gaˇ leh naˍ teh‸, awˬ pa hta‸ yawˇ hui awˬ heˆ te leh na nyi ve yoˬ.
42001063	Yawˇ lehˬ, bvuh‸ tuˬ ve awˬ baˉ hta‸ lawˬ leh, Yawˇ ve awˬ meh Yoˇhanˬ yoˬ teh‸, bvuh‸ maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42001064	Oˇ ve teˇ hkui awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ leh ha tehˍ htawˇ nuˇ la ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ tawˇ yaw leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
42001065	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ kawˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw hk'oˆ lawˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42001066	Hk'a g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw tawnˇ taˍ leh, Yaˇ ehˉ chi lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ leh naˍ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ yawˇ geh cawˬ ve yoˬ.
42001067	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ pa Zaˍhkaˍriˆ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu biˇ la leh, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ yaw leh k'oˆ ve,
42001068	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ ca nyi la leh htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ peuˬ.
42001069	Yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ Daˍviˆ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ hta‸ tawˆ la piˇ peuˬ.
42001070	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ ve da‸ kehˬ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e te ve yoˬ.
42001071	Yawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ hta‸ tawˆ la piˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ nyi bawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ.
42001072	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˬ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ te piˇ leh, yawˇ ve da‸ kehˬ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ awˬ pon te ve yoˬ.
42001073	Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ yawˇ hkanˍ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42001074	Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo g'a ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ,
42001075	ngaˬ hui ve a sha‸ leh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, kawˆ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ leh yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ awˬ pon kanˉ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42001076	Yaˇ ehˉ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001077	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha ha k'aˉ puiˉ jaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a ve awˬ hk'aw lo htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ shiˍ piˇ tuˬ, nawˬ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo g'a k'ai leh, yawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ g'a gu taˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42001078	Mvuhˇ naw ma ve awˬ g'euˆ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ba la htaˇ,
42001079	naˆ ho‸ ve leh suh ve aˉ g'uiˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ awˬ g'euˆ ba piˇ leh, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve ya‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ sheh maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. teh‸ Zaˍhkaˍriˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42001080	Yaˇ ehˉ oˇ ve uiˍ la leh, co ha hpawˇ htawˇ awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ la ve yoˬ. Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ tawˆ la ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42002001	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ meh yuˬ tuˬ jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ Awˇguˇtuˆ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42002002	Chi teˇ pawˆ awˬ meh yuˬ ve lehˬ, Suˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Kuˇreˍniˆ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ te chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ meh yuˬ ve awˉ lawˉ peuˇ teˇ pawˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42002003	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ meh keu tuˬ awˬ pon, teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ ve venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
42002004	Yoˇseh‸ htawˇ, Daˍviˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, yawˇ heuˆ taˍ ve yaˇ miˇ Maˍriˆ geh hk'a geh awˬ meh ca keu tuˬ,
42002005	Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ lo tu leh, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ Behˍlehˍhehnˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Daˍviˆ ve venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Maˍriˆ yaˇ hu taˍ ve yoˬ.
42002006	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ paw ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
42002007	Maˍriˆ lehˬ, yaˇ paˍ awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ paw la leh, pehˉ keu htiˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nuˇ lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw yawˇ hta‸ iˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hkehˉ chaw yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ.
42002008	Mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, heh hk'aw lo mvuhˇ hpeu‸ htaˇ yawˇ hui ve yawˬ moˍ hta‸ shaw chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42002009	Oˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la leh, yawˇ hui awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ ba tawˆ la leh, yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42002010	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Taˇ kawˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon ha lehˬ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
42002011	Ya‸ nyi Daˍviˆ ve venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui awˬ pon Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ paw la peuˬ.
42002012	Yawˇ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Hkri‸ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ heˆ chi hk'e cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ pehˉ kuiˬ htiˆ sheˬ leh, nuˇ lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw iˉ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42002013	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ geh mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ cawˬ haˉ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh k'oˆ ve,
42002014	Mvuh jaˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo htawˇ, yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42002015	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo k'aw‸ taˆ k'o‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Behˍlehˍhehnˍ venˇ lo ngaˬ hui k'ai leh, hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve awˬ lawn chi Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve hk'e ca nyi-a veuˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42002016	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui haˆ haˆ k'ai leh, Maˍriˆ leh Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ ka‸, nuˇ lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw iˉ taˍ ve yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ ka‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42002017	G'a mawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yaˇ ehˉ oˇ ve awˬ lawn mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui shu hta‸ k'aw‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42002018	Hk'a g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˬ hawˉ paˍ hui hto piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ anˇ ve yoˬ.
42002019	Maˍriˆ lehˬ, awˬ lawn chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ tawnˇ taˍ leh, yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42002020	Yawˬ hawˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a kaˇ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42002021	Hiˉ nyi gaˬ leh yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ teh‸ meh piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ meh chi lehˬ, awˬ e g'oˇ peˬ hk'aw maˇ hu sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ meh piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42002022	Moˉseˍ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui awˬ pon da‸ tuˬ kehˬ tuˬ te ve awˬ nyi biˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ,
42002023	Yaˇ kaoˬ hawˉ hk'aˆ hk'a paw la ve teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon g'a fuiˍ teh taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yaˇ ehˉ oˇ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ,
42002024	aˉ pui k'aˍ teˇ ceh, maˇ heˆ k'o guˇ ehˉ nyiˇ hkeh hta‸ tanˇ piˇ tuˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e g'a tanˇ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42002025	Oˇ htaˇ, Suˉmonˍ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yawˇ dawˇ law tcuhˉ taˍ leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42002026	Yawˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ sheˍ ve ceh ceh maˇ g'a suh teh‸, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42002027	Oˇ htaˇ, Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hta‸ dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ pa awˬ e lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e yaˇ paˍ ehˉ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ te piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ,
42002028	Suˉmonˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hk'aw lo yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ taˍ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh k'oˆ ve,
42002029	Hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ dawˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a k'o‸-e tuˬ, chi beu‸ a hkaw-anˬ a ciˉ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ.
42002030	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ g'a mawˬ peuˬ.
42002031	Chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve oˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
42002032	Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ ba piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ ve chaw ceuˬ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui awˬ pon awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42002033	Yaˇ ehˉ awˬ lawn yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve hta‸ awˬ pa awˬ e anˇ ve yoˬ.
42002034	Suˉmonˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ bon na‸ piˇ leh, awˬ e Maˍriˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yaˇ ehˉ chi hta‸ pa taw, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ paiˍ leh laiˉ g'aˇ tu la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ tuˬ ve awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42002035	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hpeu‸ tawˆ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Aˉ htaw lehˬ, nawˬ ve nyi ma hta‸ juˆ pawnˍ laˇ ve hk'e ˬ nawˬ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42002036	Aˍsaˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ, Hpaˍnoˍ eˍlaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ miˇ Aˍnaˆ meh ve tcuh kaˍ ma teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ mawˇ jaˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ hpawˇ geh suhˍ hk'aw‸ ceh tiˉ g'a chehˇ leh,
42002037	hiˉ chi awˇ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ mehˇ chawˇ ma hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ chehˇ taˍ leh, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ caˇ tuˬ ce leh bon lawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42002038	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ laˬ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve te ceuˬ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yaˇ ehˉ oˇ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42002039	Awˬ pa awˬ e lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42002040	Yaˇ ehˉ oˇ ve uiˍ la leh, awˬ g'aˇ awˇ shaˉ uiˍ la ve yoˬ. Cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ la leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve yoˬ.
42002041	Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ te ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e lehˬ, teˇ hk'aw‸ le le Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
42002042	Yawˇ a sha‸ teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'aw‸ gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
42002043	Pawehˇ te ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui k'o‸-e htaˇ, yaˇ paˍ ehˉ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˉ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ pa awˬ e maˇ shiˍ.
42002044	Awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh yawˇ k'o‸-e peuˬ hehˉ teh‸ dawˇ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ teˇ nyi ya‸ k'aw k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ leh awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh yawˇ hta‸ ca nyi ve yoˬ.
42002045	Maˇ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'ai leh yawˇ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ.
42002046	Shehˆ nyi gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, saˍ la‸ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ k'aw ji lo mui taˍ leh, yawˇ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na leh yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42002047	Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ yaw hk'aw‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, anˇ ve yoˬ.
42002048	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ anˇ jaˇ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ e yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yaˇ paˍ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ chi hk'e te laˇ ve le. Nawˬ pa ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42002049	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ huiˉ maˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ca ve le. Ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve yehˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ g'a chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ maˇ shiˍ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42002050	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ na maˇ g'a.
42002051	Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh Naˍzaˍ rehˆ venˇ lo k'o‸-e leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na yuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ e lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nyi ma hk'aw lo tawnˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42002052	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ to maˇ k'oˆ, uiˍ la leh, G'uiˬ sha ka‸ chaw yaˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
42003001	Kehˉsaˍ Tiˍbeˍriˆ uˉ peunˍ ve teˇ chi ngaˇ hk'aw‸ gaˬ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Poˍtiˆ Piˉla‸ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ te chehˇ ve, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Heˍroˆ jawˇ mawˇ te chehˇ ve, Iˉtuˆrehˇ leh Taˍraˍhkawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Heˍroˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ jawˇ mawˇ te chehˇ ve, Aˍbiˇleˍ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Luˇsaˍniˆ jawˇ mawˇ te chehˇ ve leh,
42003002	Aˍnaˆ leh Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ paw hkuˇ lonˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve Zaˍhkaˍriˆ ve yaˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ geh G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
42003003	Yawˇ lehˬ Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma awˬ paˇ awˬ kui teˇ kaˬ le le lo k'ai leh, venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a g'a tuˬ, venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ awˬ lawn hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42003004	Tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Heh puiˉ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ gu taˍ loˬ. Yawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ te-o.
42003005	Lawˬ hk'o‸ teˇ maˬ le le hta‸ g'a biˇ la piˇ leh, hk'aw uiˍ ve i ve teˇ shiˍ le le hta‸ g'a nehˬ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. K'aw‸ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a hteˇ la piˇ leh, mvuh mvuh nehˬ nehˬ cawˬ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˍ lehˍ leˆ lehˍ g'a k'aw‸ gu piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42003006	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42003007	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ la‸ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ tuˬ laˬ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ Yoˇhanˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Vuiˬ haiˬ awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, gaˬ la tuˬ ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ tuˬ, a shu nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve le.
42003008	Venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la-o. Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw taˇ ca dawˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ haˉ pui shiˍ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tawˆ la hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
42003009	Chi beu‸ ka‸, suhˆ cehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ lo ceˉ ceˇ teh taˍ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ ve awˬ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ le le hta‸ htu baˬ leh, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42003010	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te k'o, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42003011	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Aˉ po‸ nyiˇ hk'oˆ cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, aˉ po‸ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ pehˬ piˇ-oˆ. Caˇ tuˬ cawˬ ve chaw htawˇ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42003012	Awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ tuˬ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42003013	Nawˬ hui awˬ hkawnˍ shaw keunˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ awˬ leuˉ taˇ ca shaw teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42003014	Ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, A shu ve mawˇ hta‸ ka‸ taˇ ca hiˉ yuˬ. Shu hta‸ maˇ heˆ heˆ ve ca k'oˆ leh heˍ caˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ taˇ te. Nawˬ hui g'a ve ha pa hpfuhˇ hta‸ nyi hk'aˇ suh chehˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42003015	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ dawˇ law chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ yoˬ leh naˍ, maˇ heˆ leh naˍ, yawˇ hui a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ nyi chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ,
42003016	yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ Yoˇhanˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ a‸ kehˉ kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ laˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve hkuiˉ nuˆ caˆ hta‸ hpui tuˬ ve ceh ka‸ ngaˬ te maˇ keunˍ. Yawˇ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42003017	Yawˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo caˬ hpeuˇ tuˬ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve caˬ jaw‸ kuiˬ hta‸ kehˬ lehˍ shiˆ baˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, caˬ shiˍ hta‸ caˬ ciˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shaw pfuhˇ keu tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, caˬ cuˉ hta‸ lehˬ maˇ suh puiˉ ve aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tuˉ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yoˇhanˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42003018	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ lehˬ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu laiˉ ceuˬ k'oˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ leh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42003019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ nyi paˍ ve awˬ miˇ ma Heˍroˍdiˆ hta‸ heuˆ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ te ve awˬ haiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ aw lawn maˇ k'oˆ, Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hta‸ deˇ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw,
42003020	yawˇ Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw yuˬ keu ve yoˬ. Heˍroˆ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ yawˇ te ya‸ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ, awˬ haiˬ chi teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ te ve yoˬ.
42003021	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ leh bon lawˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ,
42003022	mvuhˇ naw ma hpaw la leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, awˬ ho‸ awˬ han aˉ pui k'aˍ awˬ to hk'e yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ ya‸ la ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ha‸ jaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42003023	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ kanˉ tanˬ te ve teˇ yanˇ, a sha‸ shehˆ chi hk'aw‸ hk'e gaˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ pa lehˬ, Yoˇseh‸ yoˬ teh‸ chaw yaˇ hui dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yoˇseh‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇliˆ yoˬ.
42003024	Eˇliˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍsaˆ yoˬ. Maˍsaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Leˍviˆ yoˬ. Leˍviˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Meˍlaˍhkiˆ yoˬ. Meˍlaˍhkiˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yaˍnaˆ yoˬ. Yaˍnaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yoˇseh‸ yoˬ.
42003025	Yoˇseh‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍtaˍhtiˆ yoˬ. Maˍtaˍhtiˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Aˍmoˆ yoˬ. Aˍmoˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Naˍhonˍ yoˬ. Naˍhonˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇsaˍliˆ yoˬ. Eˇsaˍliˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Naˍgehˇ yoˬ.
42003026	Naˍgehˇ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍaˆ yoˬ. Maˍaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍtaˍhtiˆ yoˬ. Maˍtaˍhtiˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Seˍmiˆ yoˬ. Seˍmiˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yoˇseh‸ yoˬ. Yoˇseh‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yuˇda‸ yoˬ.
42003027	Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yoˇhaˍnaˆ yoˬ. Yoˇhaˍnaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Reˍsaˆ yoˬ. Reˍsaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Seˍruˇbeˍlaˆ yoˬ. Seˍruˇbeˍlaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Saˍlaˍteˍlaˆ yoˬ.
42003028	Saˍlaˍteˍlaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Neˍriˆ yoˬ. Neˍriˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Meˍlaˍhkiˆ yoˬ. Meˍlaˍhkiˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Aˇdiˆ yoˬ. Aˇdiˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Kawˇsanˍ yoˬ. Kawˇsanˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇlaˍmawˇdaˆ yoˬ. Eˇlaˍmawˇdaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇraˆ yoˬ. Eˇraˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yoˇseˍ yoˬ.
42003029	Yoˇseˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇleˍsaˍ yoˬ. Eˇleˍsaˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yoˇrenˍ yoˬ. Yoˇrenˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍsaˆ yoˬ. Maˍsaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Leˍviˆ yoˬ.
42003030	Leˍviˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Suˉmonˍ yoˬ. Suˉmonˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yuˇda‸ yoˬ. Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yoˇseh‸ yoˬ. Yoˇseh‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yoˇnanˍ yoˬ. Yoˇnanˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇlaˍkenˍ yoˬ.
42003031	Eˇlaˍkenˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Meˍleˍ yoˬ. Meˍleˍ ve aw pa lehˬ Mehˇnaˍ yoˬ. Mehˇnaˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍtaˍhtaˆ yoˬ. Maˍtaˍhtaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Naˍtanˍ yoˬ. Naˍtanˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Daˍviˆ yoˬ.
42003032	Daˍviˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yeˍsehˇ yoˬ. Yeˍsehˇ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Awˇbehˆ yoˬ. Awˇbehˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Bawˇzaˆ yoˬ. Bawˇzaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Saˍlaˍmonˍ yoˬ. Saˍlaˍmonˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Naˍsonˍ yoˬ.
42003033	Naˍsonˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Aˍmiˆnaˍdaˆ yoˬ. Aˍmiˆnaˍdaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Aˍranˍ yoˬ. Aˍranˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ, Heˍsaˍronˍ yoˬ. Heˍsaˍronˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Hpaˍrehˆ yoˬ. Hpaˍrehˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yuˇda‸ yoˬ.
42003034	Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yaˍkoˆ yoˬ. Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Iˉcaˆ yoˬ. Iˉcaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Aˍbraˍhanˍ yoˬ. Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Teˍraˆ yoˬ.
42003035	Teˍraˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Naˍhkawˍ yoˬ. Naˍhkawˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Seˍroˆ yoˬ. Seˍroˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Raˍgawˇ yoˬ. Raˍgawˇ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Hpaˍlehˆ yoˬ. Hpaˍlehˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Heˍbaˆ yoˬ. Heˍbaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Saˍlaˆ yoˬ.
42003036	Saˍlaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Kaˍiˇnanˍ yoˬ. Kaˍiˇnanˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Aˍhpaˍyaˆ yoˬ. Aˍhpaˍyaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Seˍmaˆ yoˬ. Seˍmaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Noˉa‸ yoˬ. Noˉa‸ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Laˍmehˆ yoˬ.
42003037	Laˍmehˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍtuˍsaˍlaˆ yoˬ. Maˍtuˍsaˍlaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇnawˆ yoˬ. Eˇnawˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Yaˍrehˆ yoˬ. Yaˍrehˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Maˍhaˍleˍlaˆ yoˬ.
42003038	Maˍhaˍleˍlaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Kaˍiˇnanˍ yoˬ. Kaˍiˇnanˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Eˇnoˆ yoˬ. Eˇnoˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Seˍtaˆ yoˬ. Seˍtaˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ Aˍdanˍ yoˬ. Aˍdanˍ ve awˬ pa lehˬ G'uiˬ sha yoˬ.
42004001	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma lo tu leh k'o‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hta‸ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo awˇ chi nyi hk'a gaˬ shiˍ toˇ leh, neˇ haiˬ beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
42004002	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ te‸ chiˉ maˇ caˇ leh, awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ awˍ meu‸ la ve yoˬ.
42004003	Oˇ htaˇ neˇ haiˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve k'o, haˉ pui shiˍ chi hta‸ hkaoˍ monˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ tawˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004004	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Chaw yaˇ lehˬ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ g'a te‸ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004005	Teˇ pawˆ neˇ haiˬ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ taˆ-e leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ teˇ hkui tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maw piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
42004006	Kanˇ paˆ chi hk'a peu-eˬ leh mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ peuˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ piˇ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ ngaˬ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42004007	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui laˇ ve k'o, chi hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ ve mawˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004008	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Nawˬ ve jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ nawˬ oˉ k'oˍ g'a pui leh, yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ ceh tiˉ nawˬ g'a te ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004009	Teˇ pawˆ neˇ haiˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo shiˍ k'ai leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ ve awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ lo yawˇ hta‸ teh taˍ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve k'o, pawˆ ce hk'a.
42004010	Awˬ lawn k'o, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42004011	Nawˬ ve hkui sheh haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a heuˆ tuˬ, yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ tuˬ yoˬ. teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ,
42004012	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Nawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ nawˬ maˇ g'a beˬ maˇ g'a lawˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004013	Neˇ haiˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le beˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ geh tawˆ k'ai leh, teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ yanˇ hpaˆ da‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42004014	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e leh, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ kaˬ le le yawˇ ve awˬ lawn bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42004015	Yawˇ hui ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˍ piˇ leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004016	Yawˇ uiˍ la kuiˬ Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ lo k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, yawˇ awˬ liˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e shinˉ nyi htaˇ bon yehˬ taˆ-e ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hta‸ g'aw tuˬ yawˇ tu ve yoˬ.
42004017	Oˇ htaˇ, shu yawˇ hta‸ tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ ve li‸ piˇ leh, li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hpeu‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ kaˬ hta‸ ca mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42004018	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ naˍ manˇ shehˍ laˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve lehˬ, hpeh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, maˍ piˇ hto piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ,
42004019	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ bon te piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ teˇ hk'aw‸ awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ hto piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42004020	Li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ lo‸ leh bon yehˬ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ mui taˍ ve yoˬ. Bon yehˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi chehˇ htaˇ,
42004021	yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tanˬ maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve Li‸ hpu tawˇ hkawˇ chi lehˬ, ya‸ nyi nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ biˇ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004022	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh, yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw hk'aw tawˆ la ve na sha jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ anˇ leh, Chaw chi lehˬ, Yoˇseh‸ ve yaˇ paˍ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42004023	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, tawˇ pa haˉ yehˇ leh, Naˆ tsuhˇ shehˍ hpaˇ-oˬ, a shu yawˇ ve a naˍ hta‸ gu na-e loˬ, Ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve hk'e, Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ te-o teh‸, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
42004024	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ.
42004025	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Eˇliˇya‸ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ, shehˆ hk'aw‸ leh ha pa hkaw‸ maˬ hk'a gaˬ mvuhˇ yeˬ maˇ laˬ leh, mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ meu‸ lonˉ kaˆ lonˉ cawˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mehˇ chawˇ ma cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ.
42004026	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha Eˇliˇya‸ hta‸ yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ geh ka‸ maˇ k'ai tcuh. Siˉdonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ Saˍraˍtaˆ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ geh ceh tiˉ yawˇ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42004027	Tcuh kaˍ paˍ Eˇliˇshehˇ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ htawˇ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ awˬ hkaw lo hkiˬ tu‸ keuˆ ve chaw cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ da‸ la kehˬ la piˇ ve maˇ cawˬ. Suˇriˆ chaw Neˍmanˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ da‸ la kehˬ la piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004028	Bon yehˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42004029	Yawˇ hui tu la leh venˇ awˬ baˬ lo Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a‸ tawˆ leh, yawˇ hui ve venˇ te taˍ ve hk'aw teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ lo ca‸ ce piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42004030	Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo hpanˍ k'ai leh, oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42004031	Oˇ htaˇ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Kaˍpeˍ neˍonˍ venˇ lo yawˇ ya‸ la leh, shinˉ nyi htaˇ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004032	Yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
42004033	Bon yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ cha‸ chiˆ geh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
42004034	Aˇ yoˇ, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ te luˬ laˇ tuˬ nawˬ laˬ ve laˇ. Nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42004035	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ deˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Ta‸ iˉ chehˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, neˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo ca‸ baˬ sheˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ te leh tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42004036	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ jaˇ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve, Tawˇ hkawˇ chi hk'aˬ hk'e ve tawˇ hkawˇ le. Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ tawˇ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42004037	Mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ paˇ awˬ kui teˇ kaˬ le le lo yawˇ ve awˬ lawn bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42004038	Bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, Siˉmonˍ ve yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Siˉmonˍ awˬ miˇ ma ve awˬ e kaˆ naˬ jaˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ pon yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42004039	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve awˬ paˇ lo Yeˍsuˆ huˉ taˍ leh, kaˆ naˬ ve oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ deˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, kaˆ naˬ ve oˇ ve na-e la ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve teˇ cawˬ haˉ tu la leh yawˇ hui hta‸ te caˍ te taw piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004040	Mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, a naˍ laiˉ ceuˬ naˬ chehˇ ve chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a shiˍ veu laˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, chaw naˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ la‸ sheh taˍ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004041	Neˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, Nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸ kuˬ leh, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ deˇ leh tawˇ maˇ yaw tcuh.
42004042	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh heh puiˉ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca leh yawˇ geh gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a hpaˆ k'ai tuˬ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42004043	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ ngaˬ g'a ca maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e te tuˬ awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42004044	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo cawˬ ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ bon ca maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005001	Teˇ pawˆ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ Yeˍsuˆ geh buiˆ lo‸ la chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Geˍneˍsaˍrehˆ g'uiˬ po paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh,
42005002	g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ nyiˇ maˬ deh taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˇ ca paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve geu‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42005003	Siˉmonˍ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ teˇ maˬ hk'aw yawˇ lo‸-e leh, iˉ kaˆ hk'aw a ciˉ jiˆ k'ai tuˬ Siˉmonˍ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw mui taˍ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005004	Yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hpehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Siˉmonˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Iˉ kaˆ naˉ kuiˬ lo jiˆ k'ai leh, ngaˇ g'a tuˬ nawˬ hui ve geu‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005005	Siˉmonˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui aˬ miˍ haˉ teˇ haˉ mvuhˇ hk'a htiˇ g'aˇ hte‸ te ve htawˇ, teˇ hkeh ka‸ maˇ g'a. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, geu‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hpehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005006	Yawˇ hui oˇ hk'e te ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˇ geh maˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui ve geu‸ teˇ hpaˍ tzuh‸ paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
42005007	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ ga laˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui la‸ mehˆ muiˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve nyiˇ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˇ yuˬ keu ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve nyiˇ maˬ aˬ laˬ hk'e iˉ kaˆ tuˍ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42005008	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hkui paˇ lo yawˇ boˆ sheˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ geh lo tawˆ k'ai-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ venˇ baˆ uiˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005009	Yawˇ hui ngaˇ g'a maˇ jaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, Siˉmonˍ leh yawˇ geh chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42005010	Siˉmonˍ geh teˇ geh kanˉ te ve yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ htawˇ, anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Siˉmonˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Taˇ kawˆ. Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, nawˬ lehˬ chaw ca shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42005011	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ deh piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42005012	Teˇ pawˆ htaˇ, yawˇ venˇ teˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ to teˇ to hk'a peu-eˬ hkiˬ tu‸ keuˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, mehˆ hpfuhˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ sheˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ te gaˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ nawˬ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42005013	Yeˍsuˆ la‸ sheh che leh yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ te gaˇ ve yoˬ. Da‸ la kehˬ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hkiˬ tu‸ a naˍ mehˉ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42005014	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a hto piˇ tuˬ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ k'ai leh paw hkuˇ hta‸ nawˬ awˬ to ca maw piˇ-oˆ Shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ ve awˬ pon Moˉseˍ awˬ liˇ teh taˍ ve hk'e, tanˇ tuˬ ca tanˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn leuˉ leh teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve pa taw, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui ve naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu na-e laˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ.
42005016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo k'ai leh bon ca lawˬ ve yoˬ.
42005017	Teˇ nyi htaˇ, yawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo leh Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw cawˬ ve hk'aˆ teˇ hk'aˆ le le lo chehˇ ve Hpaˍriˍsehˇ leh awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ ve saˍ la‸ teˇ hpaˍ gaˬ la leh mui taˍ ve yoˬ. Naˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ yawˇ geh cawˬ ve yoˬ.
42005018	Oˇ htaˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ku-iˍ hk'oˆ zuh‸ chehˇ ve hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ taˆ veu laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ lo‸-e leh Yeˍsuˆ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ taˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui ca ve yoˬ.
42005019	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ chehˇ taˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ lo‸-e tuˬ yawˇ hui ya‸ k'aw ca maˇ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ hui taˆ-e leh, beh taˍ ve hta‸ hpaˆ pawnˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, chaw naˬ oˇ ve leh yawˇ zuh‸ taˍ ve ku-iˍ hta‸ chaw chi ma ve awˬ k'aw ji lo Yeˍsuˆ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hpehˇ ya‸-e ve yoˬ.
42005020	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005021	Oˇ htaˇ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw le. G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, venˇ baˆ hta‸ a shu hpehˇ hk'a hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hui dawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42005022	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e dawˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ shiˍ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui nyi ma hk'aw aˬ hto‸ ma te chi hk'e dawˇ chehˇ ve le.
42005023	Tawˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ hkawˇ a ciˉ k'oˆ piˇ sha le. Nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve sha laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, Tu leh ya‸ k'aw toˇ k'ai loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve sha laˇ.
42005024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a tu kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ peuˬ leh, hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, tu-o. Nawˬ ve ku-iˍ hta‸ taˆ leh nawˬ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e loˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005025	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ tu leh, yawˇ ve zuh‸ kuiˬ hta‸ taˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42005026	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ jaˇ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Ngaˬ hui maˇ dawˇ nyi jaw ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ya‸ nyi g'a mawˬ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42005027	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ tawˆ k'ai leh, Leˍviˆ meh ve awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hkawnˍ shaw kuiˬ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mui chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005028	Yawˇ lehˬ, hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, tu leh Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42005029	Oˇ htaˇ, Leˍviˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve pawehˇ lonˉ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw maˇ maˇ, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42005030	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh yawˇ hui ve li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ ca beu ca hk'aiˉ leh k'oˆ ve, Naw hui aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui geh hk'a geh hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42005031	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chehˇ sha ve chaw hui naˆ tsuhˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ maˇ loˍ. Naˬ ve chaw hui ceh tiˉ loˍ ve yoˬ.
42005032	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ, a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ awˬ pon kuˬ yuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005033	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ hkui teˇ hkui caˇ tuˬ ce leh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Hpaˍriˍsehˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ oˇ hk'e te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, caˇ chehˇ dawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42005034	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, hkehˉ caˇ la ve chaw hui geh chehˇ htaˇ, nawˬ hui yawˇ hui hta‸ caˇ tuˬ ce piˇ lawˬ g'a tuˬ leh laˇ.
42005035	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ hkehˉ caˇ la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh yuˬ hpaˆ piˇ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42005036	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ suhˉ teˇ hk'oˆ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ peˆ tzuh‸ sheˬ leh, veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ piˍ hta‸ a shu ka‸ maˇ nehˉ jaw. Oˇ hk'e nehˉ ve k'o, veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ tzuh‸ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ suhˉ ve hpa peˆ lehˬ, veu‸ k'aˇ awˬ piˍ hta‸ maˇ hawˍ da‸.
42005037	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui awˬ piˍ awˬ hk'aw lo a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ a shu ka‸ maˇ keu jaw. Oˇ hk'e keu ve k'o, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ lehˬ, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui hta‸ te hkoˇ ve pa taw, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ sheˆ leh, shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui htawˇ luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42005038	A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ shaˍ guiˬ htuˉ pui awˬ suhˉ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a keu ve yoˬ.
42005039	A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ piˍ hta‸ dawˬ peuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ suhˉ hta‸ maˇ dawˬ gaˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ piˍ lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42006001	Shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, Yeˍsuˆ heh hk'aw hpanˍ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui caˬ nu hta‸ chehˆ leh, yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh ye‸ leh caˇ ve yoˬ.
42006002	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Shinˉ nyi htaˇ te maˇ keunˍ te maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw te ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42006003	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Daˍviˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˍ meu‸ ve teˇ yanˇ,
42006004	G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh, paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ heˆ k'o teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ caˇ maˇ keunˍ caˇ maˇ cawˇ ve, tanˇ taˍ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ yuˬ caˇ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ caˍ piˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'aw jaw leh laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42006005	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, shinˉ nyi ve awˬ jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42006006	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi k'aw‸ gaˬ leh, bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ lo‸-e leh maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, oˇ kaˬ lo la‸ sha paˉ la‸ sheh suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42006007	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ g'a tuˬ, shinˉ nyi htaˇ chaw naˬ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ leh naˍ teh‸, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi taˍ ve yoˬ.
42006008	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui dawˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ leh, la‸ sheh teˇ paˉ suh ve chaw hta‸, Nawˬ tu leh awˬ k'aw ji lo ca huˉ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tu leh huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42006009	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ na nyi shaˍ. Shinˉ nyi htaˇ da‸ tuˬ te cawˇ laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o luˬ tuˬ te cawˇ laˇ. Shu ve a sha‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ cawˇ laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o te luˬ cawˇ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42006010	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ hk'a caw zuhˇ nyi leh, chaw oˇ ve hta‸, Nawˬ ve la‸ sheh che-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, chaw oˇ ve la‸ sheh che leh na-e la ve yoˬ.
42006011	Yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42006012	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ bon lawˬ tuˬ hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e leh, oˇ ve teˇ haˉ mvuhˇ hk'a htiˇ G'uiˬ sha geh bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42006013	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tcuh yaˇ teh‸ yawˇ meh piˇ ve yoˬ.
42006014	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ teh‸ yawˇ meh piˇ ve Siˉmonˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Anˍdrehˍ, Yaˍkoˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ leh Baˍhtawˇlaˍmehˇ,
42006015	Ma‸htehˍ leh Htoˉma‸, Aˍlaˍhpehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ leh Seˍluˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ,
42006016	Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yuˇda‸ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ hui yoˬ.
42006017	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh ya‸ la leh, miˬ tawˬ kuiˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ awˬ moˍ lonˉ maˇ k'oˆ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ Tuˇruˆ leh Siˉdonˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e laˇ tuˬ, yawˇ geh hpawnˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42006018	Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ fawˉ mehˍ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
42006019	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ g'a htawˇ tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˇ paˆ tawˆ la leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
42006020	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ nyi leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42006021	Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui meu‸ chehˇ kaˆ chehˇ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui g'a caˇ bvuhˆ dawˬ bvuhˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui hawˬ chehˇ ve chaw hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui g'a g'uiˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42006022	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ pa taw shu nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ laˇ ve, shawˍ baˬ laˇ ve, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ laˇ ve leh, nawˬ hui ve awˬ meh hta‸ te luˬ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
42006023	Awˬ nyi oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ leh pawˆ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui ve la‸ shawnˍ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˇ hk'e te ve yoˬ.
42006024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui paw sha ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ dawˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a peuˬ.
42006025	Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui g'a caˇ bvuhˆ dawˬ bvuhˆ chehˇ ve chaw hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui g'a meu‸ g'a kaˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui g'uiˬ chehˇ ve chaw hui g'a dawˬ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ leh g'a hawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42006026	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ mvuh laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˇ hk'e chiˇ mvuh jaw ve yoˬ.
42006027	Nawˬ hui hk'a g'a kaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸-o‸. Nawˬ hui hta‸ nyi bawˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ te piˇ-oˆ.
42006028	Nawˬ hui hta‸ hkeu laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bon na‸ piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na te laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon bon lawˬ-o‸.
42006029	Nawˬ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ diˬ teˇ paˉ hta‸ hta laˇ ve chaw hta‸ teˇ paˉ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ hk'o piˇ sheˍ. Nawˬ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ yuˬ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ nawˬ ve aˉ po‸ hta‸ htawˇ yuˬ tuˬ taˇ tawˍ taˍ.
42006030	Nawˬ geh hk'a lawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ ve mawˇ hta‸ yuˬ ve chaw geh taˇ k'aw‸ lawˬ hk'aw‸.
42006031	Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ te laˇ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui shu hta‸ oˇ hk'e te piˇ-oˆ.
42006032	Nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw hui hta‸ ceh k'aw‸ ha‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
42006033	Nawˬ hui hta‸ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ te laˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ ceh da‸ ve k'aw‸ te piˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te ve yoˬ.
42006034	Nawˬ hui k'aw‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ law taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ ceh chiˇ piˇ ngaˍ piˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui htawˇ, yawˇ hui chiˇ piˇ ngaˍ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e k'aw‸ g'a tuˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ chiˇ piˇ ngaˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42006035	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ leh da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ te piˇ-oˆ. K'aw‸ g'a tuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo shu hta‸ chiˇ piˇ ngaˍ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ ve la‸ shawnˍ uiˍ jaˇ leh, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ awˬ bon hta‸ maˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve chaw leh haiˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ awˬ bon te piˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
42006036	Nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui htawˇ ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
42006037	Nawˬ hui shu hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˇ taˍ. Oˇ hk'e maˇ taˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ shu venˇ baˆ maˇ taˍ. Shu hta‸ suhˉ taˇ taˆ. Oˇ hk'e maˇ taˆ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ shu suhˉ maˇ taˆ. Shu ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ ka‸ shu hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42006038	Shu hta‸ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e piˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ ka‸ shu k'aw‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui pe‸ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, kawˬ tuˬ uiˍ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ kawˬ laˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, biˇ sheˆ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ nyiˉ keu hiˆ keu leh nawˬ hui ve taˉ poˆ hk'aw keu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui shu hta‸ kawˬ piˇ ve hk'e shu nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ kawˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42006039	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw lehˬ, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw hta‸ ya‸ k'aw maˍ piˇ hpeh‸-aw laˇ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ miˬ k'oˍ hk'aw ce lo‸-e tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
42006040	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve saˍ la‸ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ, Hk'a biˇ biˇ henˇ yuˬ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve saˍ la‸ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42006041	Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve toˉ la‸ lonˉ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ nyi leh, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve mehˆ puˉ hta‸ nyi chehˇ ve le.
42006042	Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve toˉ la‸ lonˉ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ leh, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi-oˬ, nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve mehˆ puˉ hta‸ ngaˬ yuˬ tawˆ laˇ shaˍ teh‸, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ ca k'oˆ ve le. Heˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui-oˬ, nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve toˉ la‸ lonˉ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ yuˬ tawˆ sheˍ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw cawˬ taˍ ve mehˆ puˉ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te yuˬ tawˆ tuˬ nawˬ hk'a deh‸ mawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42006043	Da‸ ve awˬ cehˬ lehˬ, maˇ da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ ve teˇ cehˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Maˇ da‸ ve awˬ cehˬ lehˬ, da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ ve teˇ cehˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
42006044	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ shiˍ hta‸ nyi leh, awˬ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ le le hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Aˉ chuˇ cehˬ lo maˉ nawˆ shiˍ maˇ shaˉ jaw. Aˉ chuˇ buiˇ lo a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ maˇ shaˉ jaw.
42006045	Da‸ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ doˆ taˍ kuiˬ lo, da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ doˆ taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve hk'e yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw yaw tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
42006046	Ngaˬ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e nawˬ hui maˇ te leh, aˬ hto‸ ma te ngaˬ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve le.
42006047	Ngaˬ geh laˬ leh ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ leh na yuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ shaˍ.
42006048	Yehˬ kawˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, naˉ chaweh duˇ leh, haˉ pui awˬ hk'oˆ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ teh taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ uiˍ taˆ la leh, iˉ kaˆ g'uiˬ dawˇ yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ htinˍ ve htawˇ, yeˬ chaweh kawˍ taˍ ve pa taw, hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ maˇ te.
42006049	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ maˇ kawˍ leh miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ ceh yehˬ kawˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ g'uiˬ dawˇ yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ htinˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ paiˍ leh, yehˬ oˇ ve luˬ k'ai ve lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007001	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
42007002	Oˇ htaˇ ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ ha‸ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ naˬ leh suh la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
42007003	Ma‸ poˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ gu na-e laˇ tuˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca lawˬ hkawˉ tcuh ve yoˬ.
42007004	Yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ hkawˉ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e te piˇ tuˬ yawˇ keunˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42007005	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ngaˬ hui ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ ha‸ leh, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon bon yehˬ te laˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007006	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Ma‸ poˍ ve yehˬ hta‸ maˇ vuiˇ maˇ neˇ kuiˬ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ma‸ poˍ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ awˬ to hkeu‸ tuˬ taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve yehˬ hk'aw nawˬ lo‸ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ.
42007007	Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ geh lo laˬ maˇ keunˍ teh‸ dawˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ tawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ceh yaw ve ka‸, ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ na-e la tuˬ yoˬ.
42007008	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ shu ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ leh, ngaˬ awˬ hawˉ lo ka‸ ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, K'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ paˍ hta‸ htawˇ, Chi hta‸ te-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ te ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ tcuh ve yoˬ.
42007009	Tawˇ chi hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ yawˇ anˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ hpfuhˆ nyi leh, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸ chi taw taw yonˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ g'a mawˬ jaw sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42007010	K'ai tcuh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ yehˬ lo k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve na-e la peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42007011	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw, Naˍiˉnaˆ meh ve venˇ lo yawˇ k'ai leh, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42007012	Venˇ taˍ meu‸ hpe‸ awˬ paˇ lo yawˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, suh taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ca tuˍ tuˬ, shu taˆ tawˆ la chehˇ ve yoˬ. Suh taˍ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ e lehˬ, mehˇ chawˇ ma hpeh‸ leh, yaˇ paˍ chi teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Mehˇ chawˇ ma oˇ ve geh teˇ geh venˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ awˬ moˍ lonˉ te laˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42007013	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ jaˇ leh, Taˇ hawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007014	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ awˬ paˇ lo k'ai leh, taˆ tuˬ hta‸ htawˇ leh, chaw taˆ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ huˉ sheˬ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chaw haˉ paˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, tu-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007015	Oˇ htaˇ, suh taˍ ve chaw tu mui leh tawˇ yaw ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, awˬ e ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007016	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ kawˆ jaˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ lonˉ ngaˬ hui geh tawˆ la peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca nyi la peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42007017	Yeˍsuˆ te ve awˬ lawn chi Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ leh, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42007018	Oˇ htaˇ Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ lawn oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007019	Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh k'ai tcuh leh, Nawˬ lehˬ laˬ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a dawˇ law tuˬ sheˍ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ ca na nyi tcuh ve yoˬ.
42007020	Chaw oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ lehˬ laˬ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a dawˇ law tuˬ sheˍ laˇ teh‸, nawˬ hta‸ na nyi tuˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ nawˬ geh lo laˬ tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007021	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ lehˬ, chaw maˇ maˇ ve a naˍ leh naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ leh, haiˬ ve neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ htawˇ, mehˆ mawˬ la piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007022	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hk'a g'a kaˇ hk'a g'a mawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ ca hto piˇ-oˆ. Mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw hui mehˆ mawˬ la ve, hkui luˬ ve chaw hui ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai ve, hkiˬ tu‸ keuˆ ve chaw hui da‸ la kehˬ la ve, naˍ paw pawˇ ve chaw hui naˍ paw kaˇ la ve, suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve leh, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui htawˇ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
42007023	Ngaˬ hta‸ nyi ma maˇ luˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007024	Yoˇhanˬ tcuh peu laˇ ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ k'o‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ lawn chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo k'ai ve le. Mvuhˇ haw meuˆ leh hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ te chehˇ ve lo cehˬ hta‸ laˇ.
42007025	Maˇ heˆ k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ k'ai ve le. Nuˇ lehˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh ve chaw hta‸ laˇ. Veu‸ da‸ k'aˇ da‸ leh caˇ da‸ dawˬ da‸ ve chaw hui lehˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42007026	Maˇ heˆ k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ k'ai ve le. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hta‸ laˇ. Yoˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hta‸ ca nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
42007027	Nyi loˬ. Nawˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo nawˬ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ gu tuˬ, ngaˬ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ngaˬ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ,
42007028	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, yaˇ miˇ geh hk'a paw la ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo, Yoˇhanˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ i ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
42007029	(Awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha te ve lehˬ, hteˇ jaˇ cawˇ jaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ Yoˇhanˬ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42007030	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui awˬ pon gu taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ geh baˆtiˆsaˬ maˇ hkanˍ yuˬ.)
42007031	Hk'e te leh, chaw chi teˇ co-e hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma yuˬ leh g'a tehˆ maˍ tuˬ le. Yawˇ hui aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ shuˍ da‸ ve le.
42007032	Chaw chi teˇ co-e lehˬ, Nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui nawˍ meuˆ htawˇ, nawˬ hui k'aˍ maˇ hk'eˆ. Ngaˬ hui paˆ hawˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ haˍ, teh‸ tcuh hk'aw mui taˍ leh teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ kuˬ da‸ chehˇ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
42007033	Awˬ lawn k'o, baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ laˬ leh hkaoˍ monˇ maˇ caˇ leh a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ maˇ dawˬ ve pa taw, Yawˇ lehˬ neˇ geh ve chaw yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42007034	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu laˬ leh caˇ ve dawˬ ve pa taw, Chaw chi lehˬ, caˇ leuˉ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ponˬ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ awˬ chawˇ teˇ ve chaw yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42007035	Ya‸ hk'aˇ cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ pa taw shu g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007036	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ geh awˍ caˇ tuˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ oˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo yawˇ lo‸-e leh mui caˇ ve yoˬ.
42007037	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ mui caˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve haiˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, naˍ manˇ hawnˉ keu taˍ ve hpuˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui kaw teˇ maˬ yuˬ laˬ leh,
42007038	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ hkui sheh paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh hawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve mehˆ g'uiˬ Yeˍsuˆ ve hkui sheh hta‸ jaˆ pfuhˍ leh, yawˇ ve uˉ hkeh mvuh yuˬ shiˆ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve hkui sheh hta‸ boˆ nu leh, naˍ manˇ hawnˉ shehˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007039	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ kuˬ ve Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ g'aˇ chi hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ chehˇ ve yaˇ miˇ chi a shu hpeh‸ ve leh, hk'aˬ hk'e ve yaˇ miˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ miˇ chi lehˬ haiˬ ve yaˇ miˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
42007040	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, k'oˆ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, Siˉmonˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007041	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Hpu chiˇ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ geh jeˬ pfuhˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ jeˬ ngaˇ ha hteh‸ cawˬ leh teˇ g'aˇ jeˬ ngaˇ chi hteh‸ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
42007042	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, jeˬ k'aw‸ shaiˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, hpu chiˇ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ve jeˬ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ leuˉ leh ha‸ tuˬ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42007043	Siˉmonˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ dawˇ ve, jeˬ cawˬ maˇ ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ leuˉ leh ha‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007044	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hpfuhˆ nyi leh Siˉmonˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yaˇ miˇ chi hta‸ nawˬ mawˬ laˇ. Nawˬ ve aˉ hk'aw lo ngaˬ lo‸ la htaˇ, ngaˬ hkui sheh tsuhˇ tuˬ nawˬ iˉ kaˆ maˇ pe‸ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yaˇ miˇ chi lehˬ, yawˇ ve mehˆ g'uiˬ ngaˬ ve hkui sheh hta‸ jaˆ pfuhˍ leh, yawˇ ve uˉ hkeh mvuh yuˬ shiˆ laˇ peuˬ.
42007045	Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ boˆ nu. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ lo‸ la ve teˇ hkui te leh, ngaˬ ve hkui sheh hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ boˆ nu tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42007046	Nawˬ ngaˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ naˍ manˇ maˇ shehˍ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve hkui sheh hta‸ naˍ manˇ shehˍ laˇ peuˬ.
42007047	Chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˇ lehˬ venˇ baˆ maˇ jaˇ ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ leh, ha‸ maˇ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ leh g'a ponˬ ve chaw lehˬ, a ciˉ ceh tiˉ ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007048	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ htawˇ, Nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42007049	Yawˇ geh teˇ geh mui caˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Venˇ baˆ hta‸ ka‸ hpehˇ hk'a g'a ve chaw chi lehˬ, a shu le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42007050	Yeˍsuˆ yaˇ miˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ peuˬ. Dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e loˬ.
42008001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ teˇ venˇ peuˬ teˇ venˇ, teˇ hk'aˆ peuˬ teˇ hk'aˆ lo k'ai leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hto piˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008002	Tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve neˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a‸ k'oˬ peuˬ leh naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ peuˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, neˇ suhˍ hkeh tawˆ k'ai peuˬ ve Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Maˍriˆ,
42008003	Heˍroˆ ve mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ Hkuˇsaˆ ve awˬ miˇ ma Yoˇhaˍnaˆ, Suˇsaˍnaˆ hui leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu yaˇ miˇ laiˉ g'aˇ, a shu yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ yehˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ te caˍ te taw piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008004	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hpawnˬ la leh, teˇ venˇ le le lo chehˇ ve chaw hui yawˇ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ piˇ ve,
42008005	Awˬ yawˇ sheˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ yawˇ ca sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo ce leh, shu naˆ toˇ leh, mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ g'awˆ caˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42008006	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ haˉ pui awˬ hk'oˆ ce leh yeˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, miˬ shaˍ goˇ ve pa taw nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42008007	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ aˉ chuˇ de lo ce leh, aˉ chuˇ buiˇ geh yeˬ la ve pa taw, aˉ chuˇ buiˇ lehˬ awˬ yeˬ oˇ ve hta‸ hoˆ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
