42008008	Awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ miˬ hkuiˇ da‸ kuiˬ lo ce leh awˬ yeˬ yeˬ la uiˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ shiˍ teˇ ha pun naw‸ maˇ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Kaˇ tuˬ naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw hui hk'a deh‸ na-o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42008009	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Tawˇ pa haˉ chi aˬ hto‸ ma tcuhˉ kuiˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, yawˇ k'oˆ ve,
42008010	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ve ka‸ nyi maˇ mawˬ leh, kaˇ ve ka‸ na maˇ g'a tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ ceh tiˉ g'a te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008011	Tawˇ pa haˉ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Awˬ yawˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve bon hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42008012	Ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo ve chaw teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ hui maˇ g'a yonˍ leh, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a tuˬ, neˇ haiˬ laˬ leh yawˇ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ ve yoˬ.
42008013	Haˉ pui hk'oˆ ve chaw teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ geu maˇ naw‸ ve hta‸ pa taw, teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ jaw ceh yonˍ leh, beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ k'aw‸ luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42008014	Aˉ chuˇ de lo ce ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ, paw sha ve teˇ hpaˍ leh ha lehˬ tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ hoˆ taˍ leh, awˬ shiˍ maˬ la meh la maˇ g'a.
42008015	Miˬ hkuiˇ da‸ kuiˬ lo ce ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hteˇ ve leh da‸ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo g'a kaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ vawˆ yeˬ taˍ leh, yeunˇ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la ve yoˬ.
42008016	Kawˆ faiˇ tuˉ leh mu‸ hk'u tcuhˍ mvuh‸ taˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ku-iˍ hawˉ teh taˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ te jaw. Hk'a lo‸ la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ mawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, kawˆ faiˇ taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
42008017	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'a faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Shu hta‸ maˇ shiˍ tcuh ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ shu shiˍ la leh, awˬ g'euˆ ba kuiˬ lo tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42008018	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui hk'a g'a kaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ k'aw‸ htehˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ cawˬ ve chaw geh, yawˇ cawˬ ve teh‸ dawˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ k'aw‸ yuˬ tawˆ sheˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42008019	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ e leh awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hpawnˬ chehˇ taˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ geh lo‸-e maˇ hpeh‸.
42008020	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ e leh nawˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ mawˬ gaˇ leh, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo huˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42008021	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ leh na yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ e leh ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42008022	Teˇ nyi htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, Ngaˬ hui g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ hpawˇ lo hkanˍ k'ai-a veuˬ teh‸ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui hkanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42008023	Yawˇ hui hkanˍ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a sheˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, g'uiˬ po hta‸ mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ la leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw iˉ kaˆ biˇ la chehˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui g'a luˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
42008024	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca nawˍ piˇ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui g'a luˬ la yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ nawˇ la leh, mvuhˇ haw leh g'uiˬ baˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ deˇ piˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ haw leh g'uiˬ baˇ teˇ hpaˍ dehˬ sheˬ leh ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42008025	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma hk'aˬ lo cawˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ anˇ jaˇ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve, Chi hpaˇ a shu le. Mvuhˇ haw leh iˉ kaˆ ka‸ yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve law teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42008026	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ tawˍ da‸ taˍ ve Geˍraˍtaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
42008027	Yawˇ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ geh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ la ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ yanˇ maw chaweh ve awˬ hk'aw lo veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ veu‸ leh, yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸ maˇ chehˇ. Chaw tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ kuiˬ lo tiˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42008028	Chaw oˇ ve Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ kuˬ leh, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ boˆ sheˬ leh, Mvuh jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008029	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai tuˬ, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ neˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ laiˉ pawˆ yuˬ tiˍ taˍ ve pa taw, shu yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ yuˬ haw taˍ leh, sho caˆ leh sho kawˬ hta‸ yuˬ hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve htawˇ, hpeh taˍ ve oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ g'awˬ cheˆ leh, neˇ oˇ ve yawˇ hta‸ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo g'a‸ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42008030	Nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma meh le teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh lehˬ Leˍjonˍ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ maˇ maˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42008031	Naˉ jaˇ ve teˇ kaˬ lo lo‸-e loˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ maˇ g'a piˇ tuˬ, neˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42008032	Hk'aw oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ lo va‸ awˬ moˍ lonˉ k'aˆ caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Va‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui g'a geh tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008033	Hk'e te leh, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ chaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ-e leh, va‸ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, va‸ awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, miˬ haˍ kuiˬ lo g'aˇ hte‸ g'uiˇ ya‸-e leh, g'uiˬ po hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh k'a suh peuˬ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42008034	Va‸ hawˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui g'uiˇ k'o‸-e leh, awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008035	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ ca nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh leh, nyi ma awˉ lawˉ htaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ k'aw‸ da‸ la leh Yeˍsuˆ hkui paˇ lo mui chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42008036	G'a mawˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, neˇ geh ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te k'aw‸ na-e la ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008037	Oˇ htaˇ, Geˍraˍtaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ maˇ kawˆ jaˇ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui geh lo tawˆ k'ai tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42008038	Neˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh chehˇ tuˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42008039	Nawˬ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e leh, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ga laˇ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn ca hto piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ga laˇ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn oˇ ve teˇ venˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008040	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve pa taw, ha lehˬ ha k'a yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
42008041	Oˇ htaˇ, Yaˍiˉruˆ meh ve bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hkui paˇ lo boˆ sheˬ leh, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo laˬ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42008042	Awˬ lawn k'o, a sha‸ teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'aw‸ hk'e gaˬ ve yawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ tiˍ suh la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ buiˆ heuˆ ca‸ heuˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42008043	Oˇ htaˇ, teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ awˬ suhˍ ya‸ la leh naˬ chehˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ maˇ g'a.
42008044	Yawˇ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ lo laˬ leh, yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ awˬ caˍ hta‸ htawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ suhˍ ya‸ la ve teˇ cawˬ haˉ cheh sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42008045	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ hta‸ a shu htawˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Chaw chi ma ve lehˬ, Teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ htawˇ teh‸ g'awˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ nawˬ hta‸ buiˆ heuˆ ca‸ heuˆ chehˇ leh cehˍ cehˍ nuˆ nuˆ te chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008046	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˇ paˆ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42008047	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, va‸ taˍ maˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, cheˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ boˆ sheˬ leh, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, oˇ teˇ hkui awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te na-e la ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008048	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ nawˬ hta‸ na-e la piˇ peuˬ. Dawˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e loˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008049	Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ ve yehˬ lo laˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ suh peuˬ. Saˍ la‸ hta‸ taˇ k'aw‸ sho‸ sha‸ piˇ loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008050	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, Taˇ kawˆ. Yonˍ ve tiˉ te-o. Yawˇ na-e la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008051	Yehˬ lo yawˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Peˍtruˆ, Yoˇhanˬ, Yaˍkoˆ leh, yaˇ miˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ geh teˇ geh yehˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ lo‸-e tcuh.
42008052	Yaˇ miˇ hta‸ pa taw chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hawˬ leh paˆ hawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Taˇ hawˬ. Yawˇ suh ve maˇ heˆ. Zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42008053	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve suh peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ g'uiˬ ve yoˬ.
42008054	Yaˇ miˇ ehˉ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ yawˇ vawˆ leh, Yaˇ miˇ ehˉ-oˬ, tu la-o teh‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008055	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve co ha k'aw‸ la leh, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ tu la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ caˇ tuˬ caˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42008056	Yaˇ ehˉ ve awˬ pa awˬ e lehˬ, anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn chi, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a hto piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42009001	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ leh, neˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'aˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, naˬ ve gawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009002	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw naˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42009003	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ awˬ pon te‸ chiˉ taˇ yuˬ k'ai. Juˇ fuiˍ, miˉ chaw, hkaoˍ monˇ leh hpu taˇ yuˬ k'ai.
42009004	Yehˬ hk'aˬ ve teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lo‸-e ve maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ tawˆ k'ai sheˍ ve ceh ceh, yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
42009005	Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui tawˆ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw hui ve awˬ lawn shu hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ te maˍ piˇ tuˬ, hkui taw k'aw hta‸ ngawˉ taˍ ve je‸ meu-e hta‸ hpi baˬ taˉ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009006	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai leh, teˇ hk'aˆ peuˬ teˇ hk'aˆ lo ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ca maˍ piˇ leh, teˇ kaˬ le le lo chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009007	Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ a ciˉ ka‸ dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009008	Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Eˇliˇya‸ tawˆ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ te‸ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009009	Heˍroˆ k'oˆ ve, Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ ngaˬ oˉ k'oˍ tawˆ peuˬ. Chi taw taw te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu leh naˍ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ ca ve yoˬ.
42009010	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ hui k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, yawˇ hui hk'a te taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ ceh tiˉ ta‸ iˉ kuˬ yuˬ leh, Behˇsehˇdaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
42009011	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ leh, gu na-e piˇ tuˬ loˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009012	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ chi lehˬ, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo cawˬ ve hk'aˆ hk'aw pa hk'aw lo ca haˉ leh, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ ca vuiˬ caˇ-e tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, choˬ kaˬ lehˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ caˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi ma ve awˬ pon ngaˬ hui caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ maˇ ca vuiˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui geh hkaoˍ monˇ ngaˇ diˬ leh ngaˇ nyiˇ hkeh ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009014	(Awˬ lawn k'o, hawˉ hk'aˆ ceh tiˉ ngaˇ hinˉ g'aˇ hk'e cawˬ ve yoˬ.) Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸, teˇ moˍ ve ngaˇ chi g'aˇ hk'e, awˬ moˍ awˬ moˍ te mui tcuh-o teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009015	Yawˇ hui htawˇ oˇ hk'e te leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ mui tcuh ve yoˬ.
42009016	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve ngaˇ diˬ leh ngaˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ hkeh hta‸ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hk'eh‸ sheˬ leh, chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ca teh piˇ tuˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009017	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui caˇ leuˉ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'awˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
42009018	Teˇ pawˆ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve, Chaw chi ma ve ngaˬ hta‸ a shu hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve le.
42009019	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ paˍ Yoˇhanˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Eˇliˇya‸ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, peuˬ leh teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teh‸ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009020	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ a shu hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ Peˍtruˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009021	Awˬ lawn chi chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a hto piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh, tawˇ hehnˇ chaweh piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42009022	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, laiˉ ceuˬ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009023	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ gaˇ ve k'o, a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, teˇ nyi le le a shu yawˇ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸.
42009024	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ gaˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve a sha‸ shonˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ awˬ pon a sha‸ shonˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42009025	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a htawˇ, yawˇ ve a sha‸ luˬ k'ai shonˇ k'ai ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le.
42009026	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ leh ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ya‸ taw ve k'o, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ, Awˬ pa ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh da‸ kehˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ ya‸ taw tuˬ yoˬ.
42009027	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, choˬ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, maˇ g'a suh teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009028	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hiˉ nyi hk'e gaˬ la leh, yawˇ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ, Yoˇhanˬ leh Yaˍkoˆ hui hta‸ shiˍ veu leh bon lawˬ tuˬ hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
42009029	Yawˇ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ awˬ ho‸ awˬ han pa leh, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ htawˇ, hpu jaˇ leh awˬ g'euˆ ba jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42009030	Oˇ htaˇ, Moˉseˍ leh Eˇliˇya‸ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh,
42009031	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ g'a suh tuˬ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ geh na‸ uˉ te da‸ ve yoˬ.
42009032	Peˍtruˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ zuh‸ muiˉ geu‸ jaˇ leh zuh‸ muiˉ jo ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a deh‸ k'aw‸ nawˇ la leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh, yawˇ geh huˉ taˍ ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42009033	Chaw oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui choˬ kaˬ chehˇ ve lehˬ, da‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui aˉ po k'o shehˆ shiˍ te tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ, Moˉseˍ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ leh Eˇliˇya‸ awˬ pon teˇ shiˍ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, maˇ nawˇ maˇ hteh hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009034	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, moˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hoˆ taˍ beh taˍ ve yoˬ. Moˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42009035	Moˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, ngaˬ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve ngaˬ ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009036	Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve bvuhˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. yawˇ hui ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn, awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ hui maˇ hto piˇ.
42009037	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi yawˇ hui hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ la ve yoˬ.
42009038	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ nyi laˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ ve yaˇ tiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42009039	Yawˇ neˇ geh leh, neˇ yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tiˍ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ kuˬ leh, paw‸ hpeuˆ leh awˬ fuˇ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ naˬ jaˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ fawˉ mehˍ piˇ peuˬ htaˇ heh‸ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42009040	Neˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ tuˬ nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ lawˬ hkawˉ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui te maˇ g'a teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009041	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yonˍ ve maˇ cawˬ leh nyi ma hpfuhˆ puiˉ ve chaw chi teˇ co-e-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ maw g'a chehˇ leh g'a yeunˇ hkanˍ tuˬ sheˍ le. Nawˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ choˬ kaˬ yuˬ laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009042	Yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve laˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ka‸, neˇ yawˇ hta‸ ca‸ baˬ leh paw‸ hpeuˆ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ oˇ ve hta‸ deˇ leh, yaˇ ehˉ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ pa hta‸ k'aw‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009043	Oˇ htaˇ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh anˇ ve yoˬ.
42009044	Yawˇ hk'a te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na leh tawnˇ taˍ-o‸. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ yanˇ neˇ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009045	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui na maˇ g'a. Yawˇ hui na maˇ g'a tuˬ faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui na nyi maˇ haˆ.
42009046	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˬ g'aˇ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42009047	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ tcuh taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42009048	Yaˇ ehˉ chi hta‸ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ i ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009049	Oˇ htaˇ Yoˇhanˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh laˬ ve chaw maˇ heˆ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009050	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ taˇ tawˍ taˍ. Nawˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ hpawˇ maˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009051	Mvuhˇ naw ma lo yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ-e ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ neˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai tuˬ yawˇ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42009052	Yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, yawˇ awˬ pon gu taˍ tuˬ, Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw hui ve hk'aˆ teˇ hk'aˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
42009053	Yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ.
42009054	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ Yaˍkoˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ chi hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo aˬ miˍ ce la leh yawˇ hui hta‸ to‸ baˬ tuˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ te tcuh laˇ gaˇ leh laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009055	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ nyi leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ deˇ ve yoˬ.
42009056	Peuˬ leh yawˇ hui awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ hk'aˆ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
42009057	Yawˇ hui ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ hk'aˬ lo k'ai ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009058	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Heh hpuiˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ k'oˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, zuh‸ kuiˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, oˉ k'oˍ taˍ kuiˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009059	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, Ngaˬ ve awˬ pa hta‸ awˉ lawˉ ca tuˍ piˇ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ a ciˉ pe‸ laˇ sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009060	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw suh teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui chaw suh hta‸ tuˍ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ awˍ hk'e k'ai leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn ca maˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42009061	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ngaˬ yehˬ hk'aw ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca hto piˇ taˉ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ a ciˉ pe‸ laˇ sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42009062	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Laˇ hpuiˇ tuˇ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ leh hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpfuhˆ nyi ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ keunˍ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010001	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ suhˍ chi g'aˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ to k'ai tuˬ ve venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ kaˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ kaˬ yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42010002	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Caˬ g'eu‸ tuˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve ka‸, caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hui a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve caˬ g'eu‸ kuiˬ lo caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ peu laˇ tuˬ, Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ geh bon lawˬ-o‸.
42010003	Nawˬ hui k'ai loˬ. Nawˬ hui yawˬ ehˉ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, veˬ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42010004	Hpu guˉ pi, miˉ chaw leh hkuiˉ nuˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ pfuhˇ k'ai. Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, shu hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ tawˇ taˇ yaw.
42010005	Yehˬ hk'aˬ ve teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, Yehˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ awˉ lawˉ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
42010006	Yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ ve dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui geh k'aw‸ k'aw‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42010007	Yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ chehˇ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui te caˍ te taw laˇ ve caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ hpfuhˇ g'a cawˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ yehˬ peuˬ teˇ yehˬ lo taˇ jiˆ k'ai.
42010008	Venˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lo‸-e ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hk'a teh laˇ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ-oˆ.
42010009	Oˇ kaˬ lo naˬ ve gawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ-oˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la paˇ neˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
42010010	Venˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lo‸-e ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve k'o, venˇ oˇ ve ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
42010011	Ngaˬ hui ve hkui taw k'aw hta‸ ngawˉ taˍ ve, nawˬ hui ve venˇ awˬ hk'aw ve je‸ meu-e ka‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ gaˬ la tuˬ, ngaˬ hui shiˆ baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ nawˬ hui awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la peuˬ ve hta‸ shiˍ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
42010012	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, venˇ oˇ ve teˇ venˇ lehˬ, Sawˉdonˍ venˇ a‸ kehˉ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42010013	Hkawˇraˍsenˍ venˇ-oˬ, nawˬ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Behˇsehˇdaˆ venˇ-oˬ, nawˬ htawˇ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo te peuˬ ve kanˉ uiˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Tuˇruˆ venˇ leh Siˉdonˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo te ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ meh htuˉ pui hpa hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, hk'aw‸ laˉ hk'aw mui taˍ leh venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42010014	Suhˉ jehˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ Tuˇruˆ venˇ leh Siˉdonˍ venˇ a‸ kehˉ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42010015	Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma lo hk'a gaˬ chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ teh‸ dawˇ ve laˇ. Nawˬ lehˬ, suh mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a gaˬ ya‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
42010016	Nawˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010017	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve suhˍ chi g'aˇ ha lehˬ ha k'a k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ hui g'aˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010018	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Saˍtanˍ lehˬ mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ mvuhˇ naw ma lo ce la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42010019	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, vuiˬ leh aˉ ci ku taw‸ ma teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ naˆ tiˍ taˍ g'a tuˬ leh, canˇ paˍ ve kanˇ paˆ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'aˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
42010020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'aˇ ve pa taw taˇ ha lehˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui ve awˬ meh bvuh‸ taˍ ve hta‸ ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010021	Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma leh miˬ naˆ ma hta‸ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ A pa-oˬ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw leh shiˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ nawˬ faˉ taˍ leh, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. A pa-oˬ, chi hk'e te tuˬ nawˬ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
42010022	Ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ peuˬ. Awˬ pa maˇ heˆ k'o, Yaˇ hpu a shu leh naˍ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Yaˇ hpu leh Yaˇ hpu hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ gaˇ ve chaw maˇ heˆ k'o, Awˬ pa a shu leh naˍ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42010023	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hpawˇ lo yawˇ hpfuhˆ nyi leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ ceh tiˉ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
42010024	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ laiˉ g'aˇ leh hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ laiˉ g'aˇ mawˬ gaˇ ve htawˇ, maˇ g'a mawˬ. Nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui kaˇ gaˇ ve htawˇ maˇ g'a kaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010025	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ tu la leh, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42010026	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve le. Nawˬ g'aw ve hk'aˬ hk'e g'a shiˍ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42010027	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve nyi ma hk'a peu-eˬ, nawˬ ve co ha hk'a peu-eˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ hk'a peu-eˬ leh nawˬ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ g'a ha‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, nawˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ g'a ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010028	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ yaw hk'aw‸ laˇ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ oˇ hk'e te-o. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010029	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw oˇ ve lehˬ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve teh‸ shawˍ taˍ gaˇ leh, Ngaˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw a shu le teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42010030	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo tu leh Yeˍriˆhkoˇ venˇ lo ya‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw hk'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a hpuˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw hk'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ k'ehˆ baˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ dawˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ suh paˇ neˇ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42010031	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ k'aw oˇ ve teˇ caˆ hta‸ k'ai cawˇ leh chaw oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ya‸ k'aw jaˇ lo yawˇ jaw k'ai ve yoˬ.
42010032	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Leˍviˆ chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ la leh chaw oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ya‸ k'aw jaˇ lo jaw k'ai ve yoˬ.
42010033	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ k'aw oˇ ve teˇ caˆ hta‸ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw oˇ ve geh gaˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ ha k'aˉ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42010034	Yawˇ geh k'ai leh, yawˇ ve naˬ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ naˍ manˇ leh a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ keu leh peh piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw lehˬ, yawˇ ve piˉ laˬ awˬ hk'oˆ chaw naˬ oˇ ve hta‸ chiˇ taˍ peuˬ leh, hkehˉ chaw yehˬ teˇ yehˬ lo yuˬ k'ai leh yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010035	Shawˉ pawˍ teˇ nyi hk'e htaˇ yawˇ hpu nyiˇ hteh‸ yuˬ tawˆ leh, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ piˇ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw chi hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ha‸ shaˉ-oˆ. Chi awˬ hk'oˆ nawˬ hk'a peuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ k'aw‸ la htaˇ nawˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ shaiˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
42010036	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ ve le. Chaw chi shehˆ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw hk'awˇ hta‸ g'a hpuˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ le teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42010037	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ piˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ teh‸, yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ htawˇ k'ai leh oˇ hk'e ca te-o teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010038	Yawˇ hui ya‸ k'aw k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, hk'aˆ teˇ hk'aˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ lo‸-e leh, Maˍhtaˆ meh ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
42010039	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Maˍriˆ meh ve awˬ nyi ma teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Maˍriˆ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve hkui paˇ lo mui taˍ leh yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42010040	Maˍhtaˆ lehˬ, te caˍ te taw ve kanˉ maˇ jaˇ leh, nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh k'ai leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ awˬ nyi ma lehˬ, te caˍ te taw piˇ ve kanˉ te tuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ teh taˍ laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ dawˇ leh laˇ. Ngaˬ hta‸ ga laˇ tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ hto piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42010041	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Maˍhtaˆ-oˬ, Maˍhtaˆ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ dawˇ haˍ dawˇ hkiˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42010042	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ loˍ ve yoˬ. Maˍriˆ lehˬ, da‸ ve oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ peuˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ geh shu hiˉ yuˬ maˇ g'a teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011001	Teˇ pawˆ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ, teˇ kaˬ lo bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ bon lawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bon lawˬ ve awˬ hk'aˇ maˍ piˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ maˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011002	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui bon lawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ lawˬ-o‸. Awˬ pa-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ yawˆ yan te piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Nawˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ gaˬ la piˇ-oˆ.
42011003	Ngaˬ hui loˍ ve caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ teˇ nyi le le ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ.
42011004	Ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ te ya‸ laˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ ngaˬ hui hpehˇ hk'a ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ beˬ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ hui hta‸ taˇ k'ai tcuh laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011005	Teˇ pawˆ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ awˬ chawˇ cawˬ leh, shehˍ k'aw hkui teˇ yanˇ yawˇ geh k'ai leh, Awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ hkaoˍ monˇ shehˆ diˬ a ciˉ chiˇ laˇ sheˍ.
42011006	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ g'aˇ toˇ ve yiˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ geh gaˬ la leh, yawˇ hta‸ caˍ piˇ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ,
42011007	yehˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ taˇ sho‸ sha‸ laˇ. Yehˬ miˉ hoˆ taˍ peuˬ. Ngaˬ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh zuh‸ hpui hk'aw lo zuh‸ taˍ peuˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ tu maˇ hpeh‸-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011008	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˇ lehˬ awˬ chawˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, yawˇ tu ka‸ maˇ tu, piˇ ka‸ maˇ piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw oˇ ve g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ tcuhˉ taˍ ve pa taw yawˇ tu leh, chaw oˇ ve hk'a loˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011009	Teˇ pawˆ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, lawˬ loˬ. Lawˬ k'o g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Ca loˬ. Ca k'o mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ hta‸ htawˆ loˬ. Htawˆ k'o hpaw laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011010	Awˬ lawn k'o, lawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Ca ve chaw htawˇ mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ hta‸ htawˆ ve chaw awˬ pon htawˇ yehˬ miˉ hpaw laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011011	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ ngaˇ lawˬ ve k'o, ngaˇ awˬ tan vuiˬ hta‸ yuˬ piˇ tuˬ laˇ.
42011012	G'aˆ u lawˬ ve k'o, aˉ ci ku taw‸ ma hta‸ yuˬ piˇ tuˬ laˇ.
42011013	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui chaw haiˬ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ da‸ ve mawˇ piˇ hkawˇ shiˍ ve k'o, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa geh hk'a lawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ piˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011014	Teˇ pawˆ htaˇ, k'aˍ ve neˇ teˇ hkeh hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a‸ k'oˬ leh, neˇ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, k'aˍ ve chaw oˇ ve tawˇ yaw la ve pa taw, chaw chi ma ve anˇ ve yoˬ.
42011015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ, neˇ jawˇ mawˇ Beˍsaˍbuˇlaˆ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42011016	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ naw ma ve awˬ heˆ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
42011017	Yawˇ hui oˇ hk'e dawˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Maˇ cawˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ le le luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai leh, yehˬ teˇ yehˬ hta‸ teˇ yehˬ paˆ teˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011018	Ngaˬ lehˬ, Beˍsaˍbuˇlaˆ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Saˍtanˍ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ maˇ cawˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve k'o, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te yeˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
42011019	Ngaˬ lehˬ Beˍsaˍbuˇlaˆ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve hk'e k'o, nawˬ hui ve yaˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu hta‸ g'aˇ va leh g'a‸ k'oˬ ve le. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui lehˬ nawˬ hui ve suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la peuˬ.
42011021	Awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, la‸ caˉ hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh yawˇ ve yehˬ hta‸ shaw taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ shu hk'awˇ maˇ hpeh‸.
42011022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ a‸ kehˉ awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ g'aˇ va taˍ ve la‸ caˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ lu yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ yuˬ sheˬ leh pehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42011023	Ngaˬ hpawˇ maˇ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ ngaˬ ve canˇ paˍ hpawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh maˇ g'awˆ hpoˆ ve chaw lehˬ, g'awˆ baˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42011024	Neˇ cha‸ chiˆ teˇ hkeh lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, goˇ choˆ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ca toˇ nyi leh, g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ca maˇ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Ngaˬ tawˆ la ve ngaˬ ve yehˬ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e shaˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42011025	Yawˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ kehˬ lehˍ hk'a deh‸ gu shiˆ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42011026	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'ai leh, yawˇ a‸ kehˉ haiˬ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu neˇ suhˍ hkeh hta‸ kuˬ veu laˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui lo‸-e leh oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ hpeh‸ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh haiˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42011027	Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hta‸ hu ve g'oˇ peˬ leh nawˬ g'a dawˬ ve cuˉ lehˬ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011028	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na awˬ bon uiˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te k'ai ve chaw hui yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011029	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ shaˬ te shaˬ maˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi teˇ co lehˬ, haiˬ ve chaw teˇ co hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ heˆ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yoˇnaˆ ve awˬ heˆ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ heˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ maˍ piˇ.
42011030	Yoˇnaˆ lehˬ, Niˇnaˍveˍ venˇ yaˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ ve hk'e, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu htawˇ chaw chi teˇ co awˬ pon awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011031	Suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ, awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ mvuhˇ miˬ ve nanˇ hawˉ hkanˇ ma lehˬ chaw chi teˇ co geh teˇ geh tu la leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ taˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ Sawˉla‸monˍ ve cuˇ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ kaˬ lo tu leh laˬ ve yoˬ. Nyi loˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo Sawˉla‸monˍ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42011032	Suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi htaˇ, Niˇnaˍveˍ venˇ yaˇ hui htawˇ chaw chi teˇ co geh teˇ geh tu la leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ taˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇnaˆ bon maˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, Niˇnaˍveˍ venˇ yaˇ hui a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve yoˬ. Nyi loˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo Yoˇnaˆ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42011033	Kawˆ faiˇ tuˉ leh baˬ kuiˬ lo taˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hk'awˍ lawˇ tcuhˍ mvuh‸ taˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ te jaw. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, lo‸ la ve chaw hui awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, kawˆ faiˇ taˍ kuiˬ lo taˍ ve yoˬ.
42011034	Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, awˬ to ve kawˆ faiˇ yoˬ. Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ da‸ ve k'o, nawˬ ve awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ g'euˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ maˇ da‸ ve k'o, nawˬ ve awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ naˆ ho‸ ve hk'a biˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011035	Hk'e te leh nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ lehˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve maˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o.
42011036	Nawˬ awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo naˆ ho‸ ve teˇ kaˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ leh, awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ g'euˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve k'o, kawˆ faiˇ awˬ g'euˆ nawˬ hta‸ ba laˇ ve hk'e, nawˬ awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ g'euˆ ba lehˍ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011037	Yeˍsuˆ chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh awˍ caˇ la tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ lo‸-e leh, hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
42011038	Awˍ maˇ caˇ sheˍ htaˇ, yawˇ iˉ kaˆ maˇ tsuhˇ ve hta‸ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ oˇ ve g'a mawˬ leh anˇ ve yoˬ.
42011039	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hkehˇ leh kawˆ hta‸ awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ lo tsuhˇ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hiˉ yuˬ lu yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
42011040	Chaw luˬ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ lo te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo htawˇ te hpanˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
42011041	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ shu hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh tanˇ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon da‸ kehˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011042	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ i hkinˇ, mvuhˇ shaweh leh g'awˇ hpa‸ mvuhˬ naweh teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ teˇ chi pun teˇ pun tanˇ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve teˇ ceuˬ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui teh taˉ ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui te cawˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ teh taˉ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
42011043	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, tcuh hk'aw lo shu nawˬ hui hta‸ yawˆ yan laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui heuˆ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42011044	Nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ shu maˇ mawˬ ve tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Tuˍ hpfuh oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tuˍ hpfuh hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011045	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011046	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ pfuhˇ haˍ jaˇ ve mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ shu hta‸ pfuhˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ naw meuˇ ceh ka‸ mawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ htawˇ.
42011047	Nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui tiˇ pehˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tuˍ hpfuh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˍ ve yoˬ.
42011048	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui te ve kanˉ hta‸ nawˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ leh, nawˬ hui lehˬ tuˍ hpfuh oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˍ ve yoˬ.
42011049	Chi hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha ve cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ hui geh tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh tuˬ yoˬ. Tcuh kaˍ paˍ leh tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui tiˇ pehˍ leh fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42011050	Hk'e te leh, Aˍbeˍlaˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ te leh, tanˇ kuiˬ leh bon yehˬ awˬ kaˍ lo tiˇ pehˍ ve Zaˍhkaˍriˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hk'a gaˬ, miˬ guiˬ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸ te leh, sheˆ peuˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ suhˍ chaw chi teˇ co awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42011051	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ suhˍ oˇ ve chaw chi teˇ co awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42011052	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ ve shawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui yuˬ taˍ peuˬ. Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to maˇ lo‸-e ve awˬ hk'oˆ, lo‸-e gaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42011053	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ tawˇ yaw ya‸ ve hta‸ ca g'a tuˬ,
42011054	yawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ na nyi leh, awˬ lawn laiˉ ceuˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ tcuh ve awˬ hk'aw lo jaˆ nyi taˍ ve yoˬ.
42012001	Oˇ htaˇ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ naˆ da‸ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ chaw awˬ hinˉ awˬ meunˍ hpawnˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˉ lawˉ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ ve diˇ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te leh jaw k'ai-o. Diˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, heˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
42012002	Hk'a beh taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ hpeu‸ tawˆ la tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Hk'a faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ, maˇ shiˍ la tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
42012003	Naˆ ho‸ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hk'a k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ g'euˆ ba kuiˬ lo shu g'a kaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Bawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui a yehˉ yehˉ hk'a yaw ve teˇ hpaˍ yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo shu k'aw‸ kuˬ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012004	Ngaˬ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ to hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ g'a leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ te‸ chiˉ k'aw‸ te maˇ g'a ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ kawˆ.
42012005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui a shu hta‸ g'a kawˆ tuˬ ve ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ shaˍ. Awˬ to hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu tuˬ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ kawˆ-oˆ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˇ hta‸ kawˆ-oˆ.
42012006	Jaˍ meuˇ ngaˇ hkeh hta‸ peh‸ shanˍ nyiˇ peh‸ hawˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Jaˍ meuˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ hkeh hta‸ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha maˇ leunˇ.
42012007	Nawˬ hui ve uˉ hkeh mvuh hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ htawˇ g'aw nyi taˍ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, taˇ kawˆ. Jaˍ meuˇ maˇ jaˇ ve a‸ kehˉ nawˬ hui awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42012008	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012009	Chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012010	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ yaw ya‸ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
42012011	Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh kanˇ paˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, yuˬ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a yaw hk'aw‸ tuˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ.
42012012	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42012013	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ awˬ viˉ paˍ ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ shinˉ pehˬ laˇ tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ a ciˉ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42012014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ leh awˬ shinˉ pehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ te tuˬ, a shu ngaˬ hta‸ teh taˍ laˇ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42012015	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve nyi ma a ciˉ ka‸ taˇ cawˬ piˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mawˇ jeˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw chaw yaˇ a sha‸ g'a te‸ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42012016	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Paw sha paˍ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve miˬ guiˬ da‸ leh, awˬ shiˍ g'a maˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42012017	Paw sha paˍ oˇ ve yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw chi hk'e dawˇ ve, Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le. Ngaˬ ve awˬ shiˍ awˬ nu teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ keu taˍ kuiˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ.
42012018	Peuˬ leh yawˇ dawˇ ve, Ngaˬ chi hk'e te tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve caˬ ciˇ yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpaˆ baˬ leh, leuˉ leh uiˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ te tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve caˬ shiˍ leh mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ keu taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012019	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ ve nyi ma hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nyi ma-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ laiˉ hk'aw‸ awˬ pon mawˇ jeˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a deh‸ shaw hpoˆ taˍ peuˬ. G'aˇ jehˇ-oˆ. Hk'a deh‸ caˇ chehˇ dawˬ chehˇ leh ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve, Chaw luˬ paˍ-oˬ, ya‸ puiˉ ka‸ nawˬ ve co ha hta‸ yuˬ hk'aw‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ shaw hpoˆ taˍ ve mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ a shu ve mawˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42012021	A shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ shaw hpoˆ leh, G'uiˬ sha hpawˇ lo haˍ g'awˇ ve chaw lehˬ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42012022	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ tuˬ, nawˬ hui a sha‸ te‸ ve awˬ pon taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ. Hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a veu‸ g'a deh tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ to awˬ pon ka‸ taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ.
42012023	A sha‸ te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ a‸ kehˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ leh, awˬ to htawˇ veu‸ k'aˇ a‸ kehˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve yoˬ.
42012024	Aˉ naˆ k'aˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, caˬ maˇ ti, maˇ g'eu‸. Caˬ ciˇ yehˬ maˇ k'oˆ, mawˇ jeˬ shaw hpoˆ kuiˬ yehˬ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ caˍ piˇ taw piˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˆ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˬ ma hk'aˆ ve le.
42012025	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, dawˇ hkiˉ ve pa taw a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ teˇ jaˆ k'aw‸ zuhˬ la tuˬ, a shu te g'a le.
42012026	Hk'e te leh, i jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ceh ka‸ nawˬ hui te maˇ g'a ve k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui dawˇ hkiˉ ve le.
42012027	Shiˍ ya‸ veˆ hk'aˬ hk'e te uiˍ la ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o. Awˬ cehˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, kanˉ maˇ te, hkeh ka‸ maˇ g'awˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve jawˇ mawˇ Sawˉla‸monˍ lehˬ, awˬ cehˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ cehˬ hk'e taw ka‸ maˇ g'a veu‸ maˇ g'a deh jaw teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
42012028	Hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ya‸ nyi te‸ chehˇ leh shawˉ pawˍ aˬ miˍ hk'aw baˬ keu tuˬ ve mvuh‸ cehˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha chi hk'e feuˉ piˇ deh piˇ ve k'o, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ feuˉ laˇ deh laˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
42012029	Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ tuˬ taˇ ca. Dawˇ hkiˉ ve nyi ma ka‸ taˇ cawˬ piˇ.
42012030	Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui loˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42012031	Nawˬ hui lehˬ yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ ca-o. Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ htehˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012032	I ve yawˬ teˇ moˍ-oˬ, taˇ kawˆ. Nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve pe‸ laˇ tuˬ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
42012033	Nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ leh, shu hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh tanˇ piˇ-oˆ. Maˇ piˍ puiˉ ve hpu guˉ pi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui awˬ pon te-o. Chaw hk'awˇ hk'awˇ yuˬ maˇ g'a ve, pfuhˇ maˇ caˇ puiˉ ve, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo maˇ peuˬ maˇ leh puiˉ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ shaw hpoˆ taˍ-o‸.
42012034	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ shaw hpoˆ taˍ ve teˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ hui ve nyi ma htawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012035	Nawˬ hui ve caw‸ cehˍ nyi hta‸ haˍ pi caˆ tsuh‸ leh, kawˆ faiˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tuˉ taˍ-o‸.
42012036	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hkehˉ caˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai k'aw‸ la leh, yehˬ miˉ hta‸ htawˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ teˇ cawˬ haˉ hpaw piˇ tuˬ law chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui htawˇ oˇ hk'e te chehˇ-oˆ.
42012037	Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, shaw chehˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ yawˇ haˍ pi tsuh‸ leh, awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui tcuh sheˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ to yawˇ hui hta‸ te caˍ te taw piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012038	Shehˍ k'aw hkui maˇ gaˬ sheˍ htaˇ leh naˍ, maˇ heˆ k'o shehˍ k'aw hkui ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ leh naˍ, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ chi hk'e shaw chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
42012039	Yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ laˬ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ shiˍ taˍ ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hk'awˇ maˇ g'a lo‸ la tuˬ yawˇ hk'a deh‸ shaw taˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-o‸.
42012040	Nawˬ hui htawˇ hk'a deh‸ hehnˇ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ maˇ gaˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42012041	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, tawˇ pa haˉ chi ngaˬ hui hta‸ ceh tiˉ k'oˆ laˇ ve laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42012042	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ka ti‸ yeˬ leh cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu le. Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ yanˇ cawˇ lehˍ caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ pehˬ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ hoˉ teh taˍ tuˬ yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
42012043	Yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la htaˇ, awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e te chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve k'o, awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve lehˬ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
42012044	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve hta‸ awˬ hoˉ te tcuh tuˬ yoˬ.
42012045	Ya‸ hk'aˇ awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, Ngaˬ ve awˬ jawˇ mawˇ haˆ haˆ maˇ k'aw‸ la taˬ teh‸ yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ leh, awˬ ceˬ paˍ awˬ ceˬ ma teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˆ leh, caˇ chehˇ dawˬ chehˇ leh tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve k'o,
42012046	awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve maˇ dawˇ maˇ gaˇ ve awˬ nyi, maˇ shiˍ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, yawˇ hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh ciˍ yanˍ leh, ka ti‸ maˇ yeˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh chehˇ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012047	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ shiˍ taˍ ve ka‸, maˇ gu maˇ hehnˇ taˍ leh, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ maˇ te ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, laiˉ hk'e jaw‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012048	Maˇ shiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, jaw‸ keunˍ jaw‸ cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ya‸ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a ciˉ ceh tiˉ jaw‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ chaweh g'a ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, maˇ chaweh g'a k'aw‸ shaiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ chaweh a‸ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a ha‸ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ geh leuˉ leh k'aw‸ lawˬ hk'aw‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012049	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo aˬ miˍ baˬ keu tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ. Aˬ miˍ oˇ ve chi beu‸ ka‸ to‸ chehˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
42012050	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ hkanˍ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, nyiˉ tiˍ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hk'aˬ ma g'a hkanˍ ve le.
42012051	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo shu cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ laˬ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ ve laˇ. Oˇ hk'e te tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Shu hpaˆ da‸ guiˇ da‸ tuˬ awˬ pon laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
42012052	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi beu‸ hta‸ tanˬ leh, yehˬ teˇ yehˬ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw ngaˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hpaˆ da‸ leh nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ moˍ, shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ moˍ hpeh‸ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
42012053	Awˬ pa leh awˬ yaˇ paˍ, awˬ e leh awˬ yaˇ miˇ awˬ pi leh awˬ hkuiˇ ma, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hpaˆ da‸ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42012054	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ hpawˇ lo moˬ tawˆ la ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Mvuhˇ yeˬ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, teˇ cawˬ haˉ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. K'oˆ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
42012055	Awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ ve mvuhˇ haw meuˆ laˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Haw jaˇ chiˆ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. K'oˆ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
42012056	Heˍ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, miˬ guiˬ leh mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ nyi leh fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ tuˬ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ maˇ g'a ve le.
42012057	Aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ maˇ g'a ve le.
42012058	Nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ te ve chaw geh teˇ geh jawˇ mawˇ geh k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ tuˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te-o. Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ lehˬ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ geh nawˬ hta‸ g'awˬ k'ai leh, suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ htawˇ htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw keu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42012059	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, peh‸ shanˍ awˬ leh teˇ peh‸ hk'a gaˬ maˇ shaiˍ peuˬ ve ceh ceh, htawnˍ hk'aw lo nawˬ maˇ g'a tawˆ k'ai taˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42013001	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ laˬ leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ve awˬ suhˍ leh yawˇ hui tanˇ chehˇ ve ceˇ caˬ awˬ suhˍ hta‸ hkaw‸ da‸ ve awˬ lawn Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013002	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chi hk'e g'a hkanˍ ve pa taw, Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ uiˍ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ ve laˇ.
42013003	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˇ hui leuˉ leh venˇ baˆ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ k'o, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ yawˇ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
42013004	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Siˉlonˍ hk'aˆ hk'aw mvuh ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ paiˍ leh, teˍ pehˍ ve chaw teˇ chi hiˉ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ yawˇ hui te ya‸ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ ve laˇ.
42013005	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˇ hui leuˉ leh te ya‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ yawˇ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013006	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve a pehˉ meuˇ hko awˬ hk'aw lo ti taˍ ve maˉ nawˆ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Maˉ nawˆ cehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ awˬ shiˍ ca nyi la ve htawˇ maˇ mawˬ.
42013007	Hk'e te leh, hko ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Shehˆ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ maˉ nawˆ cehˬ chi hta‸ ngaˬ awˬ shiˍ ca nyi la ve htawˇ maˇ mawˬ. Awˬ cehˬ chi hta‸ htu baˬ loˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma te miˬ guiˬ hta‸ chehˇ kuiˬ hk'e leˇ te peuˬ piˇ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013008	Hko ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, chi teˇ hk'aw‸ teh taˍ piˇ sheˍ. Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ lo ngaˬ hk'a caw zuhˇ duˇ sheˬ leh, hkuiˇ keu piˇ shaˍ.
42013009	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la ve k'o, da‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ la ve k'o, nawˬ htu baˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013010	Shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi htaˇ bon yehˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42013011	Oˇ htaˇ, teˇ chi hiˉ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ neˇ geh leh naˬ chehˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, caw‸ k'aw‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ a ciˉ ka‸ hteˇ lehˍ te maˇ g'a.
42013012	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve a naˍ hta‸ nawˬ g'a ponˬ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013013	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ ve la‸ sheh taˍ piˇ leh, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ caw‸ hteˇ lehˍ te leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
42013014	Shinˉ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo chaw naˬ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ gu na-e piˇ ve pa taw, bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ nyi ma zuhˆ leh, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Kanˉ te cawˇ ve awˬ nyi hkaw‸ nyi cawˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve a naˍ na-e la tuˬ, awˬ nyi oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ-o‸. Shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi htaˇ taˇ laˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013015	Oˇ htaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Heˍ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le shinˉ nyi htaˇ a shu yawˇ ve nuˇ leh piˉ laˬ hta‸ hpui leh, hkawˆ hk'aw sheh tawˆ-e leh iˉ kaˆ ca taw piˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
42013016	Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve yaˇ miˇ chi hta‸ teˇ chi hiˉ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ Saˍtanˍ hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hpeh taˍ ve chi hta‸ shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo hpui hpehˇ piˇ ve maˇ cawˇ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013017	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ ya‸ taw ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ te ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42013018	Hk'e te leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ shuˍ ve le. Ngaˬ aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ yuˬ leh g'a tehˆ da‸ nyi tuˬ ve le.
42013019	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve hko awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ taˍ ve g'awˇ caˉ yawˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, yeˬ la uiˍ la leh, awˬ cehˬ lonˉ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ g'aˇ jehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42013020	Yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ ngaˬ aˬ hto‸ ma yuˬ leh g'a tehˆ da‸ nyi tuˬ ve le.
42013021	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, diˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ diˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh hkaoˍ monˇ meu-e shehˆ hk'awˍ lawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo keu ve teˇ yanˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ciˇ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42013022	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo cawˬ ve venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42013023	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve chaw lehˬ, a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42013024	Maˇ k'oˍ ve yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e tuˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te-o. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw maˇ maˇ lo‸-e tuˬ te ve htawˇ, lo‸-e maˇ hpeh‸.
42013025	Yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ tu leh yehˬ miˉ hta‸ hoˆ taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ hui awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh, yehˬ miˉ hta‸ htawˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ yehˬ miˉ a ciˉ hpaw laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸, nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42013026	Oˇ htaˇ nawˬ hui chi hk'e k'aw‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ nawˬ geh teˇ geh g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ peuˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve venˇ hk'aw cawˬ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ lo htawˇ nawˬ maˍ laˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42013027	Yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ chi hk'e k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ-oˬ, ngaˬ geh tawˆ k'ai-o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42013028	Aˍbraˍhanˍ, Iˉcaˆ, Yaˍkoˆ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ to awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo g'a‸ tawˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hawˬ leh ciˬ geu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42013029	Oˇ htaˇ mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ, awˬ hawˉ awˬ na lo chehˇ ve chaw hui laˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a mui caˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42013030	Shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, shu awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Shu awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, shu awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013031	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ laˬ leh, Choˬ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai-o. Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ nawˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42013032	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui k'ai leh heh hpuiˇ oˇ ve hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ. Ya‸ nyi leh shawˉ pawˍ neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a‸ k'oˬ leh chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, ngaˬ ve kanˉ biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ca k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
42013033	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ya‸ nyi, shawˉ pawˍ leh hpa‸ nyi ngaˬ g'a k'ai tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ heˆ k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ maˇ g'a luˬ maˇ g'a sheˆ.
42013034	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ-oˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ tiˇ pehˍ leh, nawˬ geh peu laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ haˉ pui baˬ pehˍ ve yoˬ. G'aˆ ma peuˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ yehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ toˍ la‸ k'uˉ awˬ hawˉ lo hpoˆ chehˇ piˇ lawˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'aˬ nyiˇ pawˆ hpoˆ chehˇ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ maˇ te.
42013035	Nyi loˬ, nawˬ hui ve yehˬ lehˬ, gawˬ cu gawˬ pehˆ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo laˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, nawˬ hui maˇ k'oˆ ve ceh ceh, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42014001	Shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ ve yehˬ lo awˍ caˇ tuˬ lo‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ jaˆ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42014002	Oˇ htaˇ, g'oˇ peˬ hk'aw iˉ kaˆ cawˬ leh hpo‸ naˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ g'uˇ suhˍ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42014003	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Shinˉ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo chaw naˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ cawˇ laˇ, maˇ cawˇ laˇ teh‸, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42014004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ taˍ leh gu na-e piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014005	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ maˇ k'oˆ, nuˇ maˇ k'oˆ, shinˉ nyi htaˇ nanˬ bawˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ce lo‸-e ve k'o, teˇ cawˬ haˉ maˇ g'awˬ tawˆ piˇ ve a shu teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014006	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, tawˇ chi hta‸ te‸ chiˉ k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ maˇ g'a.
42014007	Kuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42014008	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hta‸ hkehˉ caˇ kuiˬ lo kuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ taˇ mui. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ a‸ kehˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ kuˬ taˍ ve k'o,
42014009	nawˬ hui nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ shehˍ hpaˇ laˬ leh, Nawˬ ve mui kuiˬ chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ nawˬ lehˬ, ya‸ taw ve awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ mui tuˬ yoˬ.
42014010	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hta‸ kuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, shu a‸ kehˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ mui-o. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hta‸ kuˬ shehˍ hpaˇ laˬ leh, Awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, chi a‸ kehˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ ca mui-o teh‸ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, nawˬ geh teˇ geh mui chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
42014011	Awˬ lawn k'o, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ uiˍ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, taˍ i ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ i ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, taˍ uiˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42014012	Yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Mvuhˇ shawˉ awˍ caˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ awˍ caˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ shu hta‸ kuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ ve awˬ chawˇ awˬ paˆ teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve paw sha ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ kuˬ. Oˇ hk'e ve chaw hta‸ kuˬ ve k'o, yawˇ hui htawˇ nawˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ leh awˬ bon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42014013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hti caˇ hti dawˬ tuˬ shu hta‸ kuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw, hkui luˬ la‸ luˬ ve chaw leh, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ-o‸.
42014014	Chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ awˬ bon uiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui nawˬ hta‸ awˬ bon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ laˇ maˇ g'a. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ k'o, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ awˬ bon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014015	Yawˇ geh teˇ geh mui caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014016	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hti caˇ hti dawˬ lonˉ te tuˬ, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ kuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42014017	Hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la htaˇ, Laˬ-o‸, hk'a peu-eˬ gu taˍ peuˬ teh‸ kuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42014018	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh, maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ lawˬ hkawˉ leh ca awˉ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ti mi teˇ peˆ vuiˬ taˍ leh g'a ca nyi ve pa taw, ngaˬ hta‸ a ciˉ hpehˇ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42014019	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nuˇ ngaˇ ceh hta‸ vuiˬ taˍ leh g'a ca te nyi ve pa taw, ngaˬ hta‸ a ciˉ hpehˇ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42014020	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ peuˬ leh, laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014021	Hk'e te leh awˬ ceˬ k'aw‸ la leh, yawˇ ve awˬ jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ awˬ lawn oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hto piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Venˇ hk'aw ya‸ k'aw lonˉ ya‸ k'aw ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ lo haˆ haˆ k'ai leh, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw, la‸ luˬ ve chaw, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw leh hkui luˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca kuˬ veu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014022	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ ceˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'e te taˍ peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chehˇ kuiˬ cawˬ sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014023	Awˬ jawˇ mawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Venˇ awˬ baˬ lo ya‸ k'aw lonˉ leh ti mi hk'aw k'ai ve ya‸ k'aw ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ lo k'ai leh, ngaˬ ve yehˬ hk'aw chaw biˇ la tuˬ, laˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ kuˬ veu laˇ-oˆ.
42014024	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ kuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a leh‸ nyi teh‸, awˬ ceˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42014025	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hpfuhˆ nyi leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42014026	Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e, awˬ miˇ awˬ yaˇ, awˇ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ canˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ te maˇ hpeh‸ taˬ.
42014027	Chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ laˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ te maˇ hpeh‸ taˬ.
42014028	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, mvuh ve yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ te gaˇ ve k'o, yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ te peuˬ tuˬ yawˇ hpu law‸ leh naˍ, maˇ law‸ leh naˍ, hk'aˬ ma peuˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ mui taˍ leh awˉ lawˉ maˇ shawˍ nyi ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ laˇ.
42014029	Chi hk'e maˇ shawˍ nyi ve k'o, yehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hta‸ yawˇ kawˍ taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te maˇ g'a ve k'o, hk'a g'a mawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ leh chi hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42014030	Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, yehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ tanˬ te sheˬ leh, peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te maˇ g'a law teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42014031	Maˇ heˆ k'o, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ bawˆ da‸-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, shu ve ma‸ yaˇ nyiˇ meunˍ laˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ meunˍ bawˆ g'aˇ tuˬ naˍ, maˇ g'aˇ tuˬ naˍ, mui taˍ leh awˉ lawˉ hk'a deh‸ maˇ dawˇ nyi ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ laˇ.
42014032	Maˇ g'aˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo laˬ chehˇ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ ve awˬ tan te shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ tuˬ yawˇ lawˬ hkawˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
42014033	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ baˬ taˉ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ te maˇ hpeh‸ taˍ.
42014034	Aˉ leh‸ lehˬ, da‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mehˬ ve pehˆ k'ai peuˬ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te k'aw‸ mehˬ la tuˬ le.
42014035	Aˉ leh‸ oˇ ve lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ hkuiˇ te tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ leh, aˉ k'a‸ paˉ lo shu yuˬ baˬ sheˬ ve yoˬ. Kaˇ tuˬ naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw na-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42015001	Awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ hui leh venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve tawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ yawˇ awˬ paˇ lo jiˆ laˬ ve yoˬ.
42015002	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hui k'oˆ ve, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ leh yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve law teh‸, yawˇ hui ca beu ca hk'aiˉ leh k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42015003	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ pa haˉ chi maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
42015004	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˬ teˇ ha hkeh cawˬ leh teˇ hkeh mehˉ k'ai ve k'o, k'awˇ chi k'awˇ hkeh hta‸ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo teh taˉ leh, mehˉ k'ai ve yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ mawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ maˇ ca nyi ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ laˇ.
42015005	Yawˬ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ mawˬ htaˇ, ha lehˬ ha k'a la‸ hpeh k'aˉ hk'oˆ chiˇ taˆ ve yoˬ.
42015006	Yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ leh, Ngaˬ geh ga ha lehˬ la-o. Ngaˬ ve mehˉ k'ai ve yawˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ ca mawˬ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42015007	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ maˇ loˍ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw k'awˇ chi k'awˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ha lehˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve a‸ kehˉ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve pa taw, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ha lehˬ tuˬ leuˉ leh cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
42015008	Teˇ lawn lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpu teˇ chi hteh‸ cawˬ leh, teˇ hteh‸ mehˉ k'ai ve k'o, aˬ miˍ tuˉ leh yehˬ hta‸ shiˆ leh mawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ maˇ ca nyi ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ laˇ.
42015009	Hpu oˇ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ leh, Ngaˬ geh ga ha lehˬ la-o. Mehˉ k'ai ve hpu hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ ca mawˬ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
42015010	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ha lehˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
42015011	Yeˍsuˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
42015012	Awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ pa hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ pa-oˬ, ngaˬ g'a cawˇ ve awˬ shinˉ pehˬ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ lawˬ htaˇ, awˬ pa yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ awˬ shinˉ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42015013	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw, awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ shaw yuˬ veu leh, vuiˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ miˬ guiˬ ha lehˬ tuˬ te ponˬ te leuˉ leh, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ yehˇ baˬ caˇ baˬ peuˬ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42015014	Yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yehˇ baˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo meu‸ lonˉ kaˆ lonˉ gaˬ la leh, yawˇ g'a haˍ g'a g'awˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42015015	Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ ca peun chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ yawˇ hta‸ heh hk'aw lo va‸ ca hawˉ caˍ tcuh ve yoˬ.
42015016	Va‸ caˇ ve nawˆ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hk'a bvuhˆ caˇ gaˇ htawˇ, shu teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ caˇ tuˬ maˇ caˍ piˇ.
42015017	Yawˇ k'aw‸ shiˍ k'aw‸ nawˇ la leh, Ngaˬ pa geh chehˇ ve g'aˇ hpfuhˇ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ caˇ maˇ peuˬ dawˬ maˇ peuˬ ve ka‸, ngaˬ choˬ kaˬ lo meu‸ jehˇ kaˆ jehˇ leh suh tuˬ yoˬ.
42015018	Ngaˬ tu leh ngaˬ pa geh k'o‸-e leh, Ngaˬ pa-oˬ, ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hta‸ ka‸ te ya‸ peuˬ.
42015019	Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ ve yaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ. Nawˬ ve g'aˇ hpfuhˇ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hk'e ngaˬ hta‸ shawˍ taˍ laˇ-oˆ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42015020	Yawˇ tu leh awˬ pa geh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ awˬ pa g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh, yawˇ geh g'uiˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ yaˇ paˍ ve k'awˍ peˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'uˉ taˍ leh boˆ nu ve yoˬ.
42015021	Oˇ htaˇ awˬ yaˇ paˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ pa-oˬ, ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hta‸ ka‸ te ya‸ peuˬ. Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ ve yaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ.
42015022	Awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ pa k'oˆ piˇ ve, Da‸ jaˇ ve aˉ po‸ lonˉ hta‸ haˆ haˆ yuˬ veu laˇ leh yawˇ hta‸ deh piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ ve la‸ naw hta‸ la‸ peˍ tcuhˉ piˇ-oˆ. Hkui sheh hta‸ hkuiˉ nuˆ tcuhˉ piˇ-oˆ.
42015023	Caˍ chu taˍ ve nuˇ ehˉ hta‸ sheh veu laˇ leh tiˇ pehˍ-o‸. Ngaˬ hui hti caˇ hti dawˬ leh ha lehˬ ha k'a te-a veuˬ.
42015024	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ yaˇ paˍ chi lehˬ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ suh peuˬ htawˇ, chi beu‸ k'aw‸ te‸ la peuˬ. Mehˉ k'ai peuˬ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ k'aw‸ mawˬ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a tanˬ te k'ai ve yoˬ.
42015025	Awˬ viˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, heh hk'aw chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'aw‸ la leh, yehˬ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, nawˍ meuˆ leh k'aˍ hk'eˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
42015026	Yawˇ awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ leh, Aˬ hto‸ ma te chehˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42015027	Awˬ ceˬ paˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ nyi paˍ k'aw‸ k'aw‸ la peuˬ. Yawˇ naˬ ve gawˬ ve luˬ ve sheˆ ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ leh, awˬ pa yawˇ hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve pa taw, caˍ chu taˍ ve nuˇ ehˉ hta‸ tiˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42015028	Awˬ viˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, yehˬ hk'aw maˇ lo‸-e. Hk'e te leh, awˬ pa tawˆ la leh yawˇ hta‸ ca lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42015029	Yawˇ awˬ pa hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nyi-o, ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ tiˉ te chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ awˬ yanˇ chi maw maw gaˬ peuˬ. Nawˬ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ ponˬ leuˉ jaw. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh ha lehˬ ha k'a te tuˬ, aˉ che‸ ehˉ teˇ hkeh ceh ka‸ nawˬ teˇ pawˆ htawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ pe‸ laˇ jaw.
42015030	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, meh maˬ lanˉ hui geh awˬ chawˇ te leh, nawˬ ve hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ yehˇ baˬ caˇ baˬ peuˬ ve, nawˬ ve yaˇ paˍ chi teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ la leh, caˍ chu taˍ ve nuˇ ehˉ yawˇ awˬ pon nawˬ tiˇ peuˬ law leˇ teh‸, awˬ pa hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42015031	Awˬ pa k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ yaˇ paˍ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42015032	Ngaˬ hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ ve deˇ deˇ yoˬ. Nawˬ nyi paˍ lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ suh peuˬ htawˇ chi beu‸ k'aw‸ te‸ la peuˬ. Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ mehˉ k'ai peuˬ htawˇ, chi beu‸ k'aw‸ mawˬ peuˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, ha lehˬ ha k'a te piˇ cawˇ tehˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ pa yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016001	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Paw sha ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ yehˇ baˬ chehˇ ve awˬ lawn, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ shu ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016002	Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ leh, Nawˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve, nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te ve le. Nawˬ mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ ve caˇ lanˇ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ. Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ ve kanˉ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ te teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016003	Oˇ htaˇ, mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ ve, Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le. Ngaˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ tawˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ ca duˇ tuˬ ngaˬ te maˇ g'a. Shu geh lawˬ caˇ tuˬ ka‸ ngaˬ ya‸ taw ve yoˬ.
42016004	Mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ tawˆ-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, shu lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ hk'aw ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
42016005	Yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ geh jeˬ cha taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ leh, awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ geh nawˬ jeˬ hk'aˬ ma cha taˍ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42016006	Naˍ manˇ teˇ ha punˇ cha taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve caˇ lanˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh haˆ mui taˍ leh, ngaˇ chi punˇ bvuh‸ keu-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016007	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ jeˬ hk'aˬ ma cha taˍ ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Caˬ shiˍ teˇ ha taˆ cha taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve caˇ lanˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh, hiˉ chi taˆ bvuh‸ keu-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016008	Maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve mawˇ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, cuˇ yiˍ yehˇ puiˉ ve pa taw, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve teˇ co awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ g'euˆ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ cuˇ yiˍ yehˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
42016009	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve ka‸ awˬ chawˇ g'a tuˬ oˇ ve hta‸ yehˇ-oˆ. Hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ oˇ ve peuˬ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, co co taiˍ taiˍ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42016010	I ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ ve chaw lehˬ, uiˍ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ ka ti‸ yeˬ tuˬ yoˬ. I ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw lehˬ, uiˍ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te tuˬ yoˬ.
42016011	Hk'e te leh, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ lehˬ maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve ka‸, oˇ ve hta‸ yehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ka ti‸ maˇ yeˬ ve k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ teˇ ceuˬ a shu nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ tuˬ le.
42016012	Nawˬ hui lehˬ shu ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ yehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ maˇ yeˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ a shu nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ tuˬ le.
42016013	Awˬ ceˬ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ jawˇ mawˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ceˬ te maˇ g'a. Awˬ lawn k'o, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ canˇ k'o teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ha‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan k'o teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ ka‸, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ ve awˬ ceˬ ka‸, teˇ pawˆ tiˉ te maˇ g'a taˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42016014	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hpu hta‸ sheˉ lai ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ ve yoˬ.
42016015	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ a shu yawˇ awˬ to hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hk'e te htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ taˍ uiˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42016016	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ co-e maˇ gaˬ sheˍ htaˇ ve awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo buiˆ da‸ leh lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
42016017	Miˬ guiˬ mvuhˇ naw ma luˬ k'ai haˍ ve a‸ kehˉ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ maiˉ ehˉ teˇ maˬ luˬ k'ai tuˬ haˍ ve yoˬ.
