42016018	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu yaˇ miˇ hta‸ heuˆ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ hpawˇ baˬ taˉ peuˬ ve yaˇ miˇ hta‸ ca heuˆ ve chaw htawˇ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve yoˬ.
42016019	Teˇ pawˆ htaˇ, paw sha paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hpa nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve leh da‸ jaˇ ve hpa hpu hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, teˇ nyi le le ha lehˬ ha k'a hti caˇ hti dawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42016020	Yawˇ ve yehˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo cawˬ ve yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ awˬ paˇ lo, awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ pawˆ lawˆ k'uˉ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve Laˍzaˍruˆ meh ve lawˬ leh‸ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shu ca taˆ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
42016021	Yawˇ lehˬ, paw sha paˍ ve hpui lawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo caˇ sheˆ dawˇ sheˆ taˍ ve hta‸ caˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Hpuiˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh yawˇ ve pawˆ lawˆ k'uˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaw leh‸ ve yoˬ.
42016022	Teˇ nyi htaˇ, haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ oˇ ve suh leh, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve nyi ma pui lo shiˍ teh taˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Paw sha paˍ htawˇ suh leh, shu yawˇ hta‸ ca taˆ tuˍ ve yoˬ.
42016023	Suh mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hehnˇ jaˇ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ leh, yawˇ chiˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, vuiˇ kuiˬ lo Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve nyi ma pui lo Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42016024	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ lehˬ aˬ miˍ chi awˬ hk'aw lo g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ jaˇ ve pa taw, Laˍzaˍruˆ yawˇ ve la‸ naw meuˇ iˉ kaˆ hk'aw tuˍ leh, ngaˬ ve ha tehˍ gawˬ la piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ geh peu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42016025	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Aˍbraˍhanˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ paˍ-oˬ, nawˬ te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ g'a leh, Laˍzaˍruˆ maˇ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ loˬ. Chi beu‸ lehˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo yawˇ dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw g'a chehˇ leh, nawˬ lehˬ tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42016026	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ hui leh nawˬ hui awˬ kaˍ lo naˉ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'o‸ lonˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, choˬ kaˬ te leh nawˬ hui chehˇ kuiˬ lo shu k'ai gaˇ ka‸ k'ai maˇ hpeh‸. Nawˬ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo te leh ngaˬ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo shu laˬ gaˇ ka‸ laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016027	Paw sha paˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ pa-oˬ, hk'e te k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42016028	Ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ ngaˇ g'aˇ cawˬ sheˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui lehˬ choˬ kaˬ tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo maˇ g'a gaˬ la tuˬ, Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ ngaˬ pa ve yehˬ lo k'ai tcuh leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ maˍ piˇ tcuh-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016029	Aˍbraˍhanˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hui geh Moˉseˍ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui na piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42016030	Paw sha paˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ-oˬ, chi hk'e maˇ heˆ. Suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hui geh k'ai ve k'o, yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42016031	Aˍbraˍhanˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Moˉseˍ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ na ve k'o, suh kuiˬ lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve htawˇ yawˇ hui yonˍ tuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42017001	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Shu ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ shu ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te piˇ ve chaw lehˬ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42017002	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, yaˇ ehˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te ve a‸ kehˉ, yawˇ ve k'awˍ peˍ hta‸ haˉ pui mawˍ hpeh k'u leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ce peu ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
42017003	Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi nawˬ hta‸ te ya‸ laˇ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve k'o, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ.
42017004	Teˇ nyi tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ suhˍ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ te ya‸ laˇ leh, suhˍ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ nawˬ geh k'aw‸ laˬ leh, Ngaˬ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ nawˬ g'a hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42017005	Oˇ htaˇ tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ la tuˬ a ciˉ te laˇ-oˆ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
42017006	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ g'awˇ caˉ yawˇ hk'e hui cawˬ ve k'o, naˬ hawˉ cehˬ chi hta‸, Nawˬ ve awˬ geu ka‸ teˇ pawˆ tiˉ g'awˬ tawˆ leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ca tcuhˉ naw‸ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42017007	Nawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ ti mi mehˇ kuiˬ lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˬ hawˉ kuiˬ lo maˇ k'oˆ, k'aw‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Haˆ mui leh caˇ la-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ ve, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ laˇ.
42017008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve hta‸, Ngaˬ awˬ pon caˇ tuˬ gu loˬ. Ngaˬ caˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ nawˬ haˍ pi tsuh‸ taˍ leh, ngaˬ hta‸ te caˍ te taw laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ nawˬ g'a caˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
42017009	Awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve hk'e te ve pa taw, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh piˇ tuˬ laˇ.
42017010	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui htawˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ chi hk'e k'oˆ loˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ maˇ keunˍ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui g'a te cawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ ceh ngaˬ hui te peuˬ ve yoˬ.
42017011	Yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Saˍmaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Gaˍliˍ lehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ tcuhˉ kaˍ lo hpanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42017012	Hk'aˆ teˇ hk'aˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, hkiˬ tu‸ paˍ teˇ chi g'aˇ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ taˍ leh yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
42017013	Yawˇ hui bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42017014	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, K'ai leh, paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui ve awˬ to ca maw piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, da‸ la kehˬ la ve yoˬ.
42017015	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ to na-e la ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ la leh, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
42017016	Yeˍsuˆ ve hkui paˇ lo yawˇ mehˆ hpfuhˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ taˍ leh, yawˇ ve bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42017017	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Na-e la ve chaw lehˬ, teˇ chi g'aˇ yoˬ maˇ heˆ leh laˇ. K'awˇ g'aˇ hk'aˬ lo k'ai le.
42017018	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ tuˬ k'aw‸ la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ laˇ teh‸, k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42017019	Tu leh k'o‸-e loˬ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ na-e la piˇ peuˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42017020	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ gaˬ la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ gaˬ la ve lehˬ, mehˆ shiˍ nyi leh mawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ.
42017021	Nyi loˬ, choˬ kaˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ, oˇ kaˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42017022	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu ve awˬ nyi hta‸ nawˬ hui mawˬ gaˇ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
42017023	Choˬ kaˬ nyi-o, oˇ kaˬ nyi-o teh‸ shu nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ taˇ k'ai, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh taˇ g'a‸.
42017024	Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma teˇ ceˍ lo ba la leh teˇ ceˍ lo ba gaˬ ve hk'e, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ ya‸ la ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42017025	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, oˇ hk'e maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸, chaw chi teˇ co chiˇ baˬ ve hta‸ ka‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42017026	Noˉa‸ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ hpeh‸ la ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu ve awˬ co-e awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42017027	Noˉa‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ hui caˇ chehˇ dawˬ chehˇ leh, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ da‸ leh ka piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ iˉ kaˆ htonˍ la leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42017028	Lawˇtaˍ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ htawˇ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui caˇ chehˇ dawˬ chehˇ ve, mawˇ vuiˬ mawˇ hawˇ chehˇ ve, mawˇ ti chehˇ leh, yehˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42017029	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Lawˇtaˍ lehˬ Sawˉdonˍ venˇ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai ve teˇ nyi htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo aˬ miˍ leh ma‸ shiˉ mvuhˇ yeˬ hk'a shuˍ ce la leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te luˬ ve yoˬ.
42017030	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu tawˆ la ve teˇ nyi htaˇ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42017031	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ve mawˇ cawˬ ve k'o, mawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ca yuˬ tuˬ taˇ k'aw‸ ya‸-e. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ heh hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw htawˇ, taˇ k'o‸-e.
42017032	Lawˇtaˍ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ loˬ.
42017033	A shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ ponˬ tuˬ ca ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ a sha‸ shonˇ tuˬ yoˬ. A sha‸ shonˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve a sha‸ g'a ponˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42017034	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, oˇ ve teˇ haˉ awˬ hk'aw lo hawˉ hk'aˆ nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, zuh‸ hpui teˇ maˬ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo zuh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teh taˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
42017035	Yaˇ miˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ geh haˉ pui maw geuˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teh taˉ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42017037	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, hk'aˬ lo hpeh‸ la tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Suh ve awˬ to cawˬ kuiˬ lo naˬ beuˬ ngaˆ teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018001	Yawˇ hui nyi ma maˇ luˬ leh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon g'a lawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
42018002	Venˇ teˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ka‸ maˇ kawˆ, chaw yaˇ hta ka‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42018003	Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ geh teˇ hkui teˇ hkui k'ai leh, Ngaˬ ve canˇ paˍ ngaˬ hta‸ ya‸ laˇ ve hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ awˬ pon a ciˉ te laˇ-oˆ teh‸, k'oˆ piˇ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42018004	Teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve te‸ chiˉ maˇ te piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ka‸ maˇ kawˆ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve chaw hpeh‸ ve htawˇ,
42018005	mehˇ chawˇ ma chi ngaˬ hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ laˇ ve pa taw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ awˬ pon te piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ laˬ leh, hpeh‸ haˍ hkanˍ haˍ jaˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
42018006	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o.
42018007	G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui awˬ pon maˇ te piˇ tuˬ leh laˇ. Yawˇ maw chaweh law chehˇ tuˬ leh laˇ.
42018008	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ yawˇ hui awˬ pon haˆ haˆ te piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018009	A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teh‸ shawˍ taˍ leh, shu hta‸ te‸ chiˉ maˇ shawˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ tawˇ pa haˉ chi maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
42018010	Chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ bon lawˬ tuˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hpeh‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42018011	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ g'aˇ huˉ taˍ leh, G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw hta‸ maˇ shuˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hiˉ yuˬ lu yuˬ ve chaw, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve chaw, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ, ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ shuˍ ve pa taw htawˇ nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
42018012	Teˇ shinˉ awˬ hk'aw lo nyiˇ nyi ngaˬ caˇ tuˬ ce ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ g'a ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ chi pun teˇ pun tanˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ leh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
42018013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, vuiˇ kuiˬ lo huˉ taˍ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi maˇ hpeh‸. Dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve nyi ma pui hta‸ hta leh, G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, ngaˬ venˇ baˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve hta‸ a ciˉ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
42018014	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la leh, yawˇ ve yehˬ lo k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Hpaˍriˍsehˇ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw maˇ hpeh‸ la. Awˬ lawn k'o, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, taˍ i ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ i ve chaw lehˬ, taˍ uiˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42018015	Oˇ htaˇ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ piˇ tuˬ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu yawˇ geh shiˍ laˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, shiˍ laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ deˇ ve yoˬ.
42018016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ geh laˬ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ taˇ tawˍ taˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, chaw oˇ hk'e ve mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42018017	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yaˇ ehˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e taˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42018018	Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve, Da‸ ve Saˍ la‸-oˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42018019	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ da‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve le. G'uiˬ sha maˇ heˆ k'o, da‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
42018020	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ taˇ te, chaw hta‸ taˇ tiˇ pehˍ, shu ve mawˇ hta‸ taˇ hk'awˇ, shu hta‸ maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ taˇ hkanˍ, nawˬ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te-o teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018021	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, Ngaˬ yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ htaˇ ka‸ chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ na yuˬ leh te peuˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42018022	Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ teˇ ceuˬ loˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hk'a cawˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ leh, haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ-oˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve mawˇ nawˬ cawˬ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, nawˬ k'aw‸ laˬ leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018023	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ paw sha jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42018024	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Paw sha ve chaw hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ hk'aˬ ma haˍ jaˇ ve le.
42018025	Kaˍ laˍ oˆ teˇ hkeh g'o‸ naˍ hk'awˇ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e tuˬ ve lehˬ, paw sha ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ ve a‸ kehˉ sha ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018026	G'a kaˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, Hk'e te k'o, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ a shu g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42018027	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ te maˇ g'a ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha te g'a ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018028	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh nawˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018029	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ pon, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e leh, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ,
42018030	chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh g'a tuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ htawˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42018031	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hk'a bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ g'a biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42018032	Awˬ lawn k'o, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ leh, k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ ve, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te ve leh, ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ pfuhˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42018033	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ jaw‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018034	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ faˉ taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui na maˇ g'a.
42018035	Yawˇ lehˬ Yeˍriˆhkoˇ venˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, mehˆ cuˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ k'aw paˇ lo mui leh lawˬ caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42018036	Mehˆ cuˉ paˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ k'ai k'ai laˬ laˬ te chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Chi aˬ hto‸ ma te ve le teh‸ yawˇ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42018037	Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ laˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018038	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
42018039	Awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Ta‸ iˉ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ deˇ piˇ ve htawˇ yawˇ lehˬ, Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, leuˉ leh g'aˇ hte‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
42018040	Yeˍsuˆ huˉ taˍ leh, Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ geh shiˍ veu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Mehˆ cuˉ paˍ yawˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve,
42018041	Nawˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ mehˆ mawˬ la tuˬ nawˬ hta‸ te tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018042	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Mehˆ mawˬ la piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ na-e la piˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42018043	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ mehˆ mawˬ la leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˬ chiˇ mvuh leh Yeˍsuˆ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ G'uiˬ sha ve bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
42019001	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yeˍriˆhkoˇ venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e leh hpanˍ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42019002	Oˇ kaˬ lo Saˍkehˇ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hkawnˍ shaw paˍ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ leh paw sha jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42019003	Yeˍsuˆ a shu leh naˍ teh‸ yawˇ mawˬ gaˇ leh ca nyi ve htawˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ chehˇ taˍ leh, yawˇ maˇ mvuh ve pa taw maˇ g'a mawˬ.
42019004	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo g'uiˇ k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ laˬ tuˬ ve ya‸ k'aw paˇ lo cawˬ ve hpaˉ leuˍ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ hta‸ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
42019005	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ la htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ nyi leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍkehˇ-oˬ, haˆ haˆ ya‸ la-o. Ya‸ nyi ngaˬ nawˬ ve aˉ hk'aw lo g'a haˉ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019006	Oˇ htaˇ, Saˍkehˇ haˆ haˆ ya‸ la leh, ha lehˬ ha k'a yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
42019007	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yawˇ lehˬ venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ geh ca haˉ ve law teh‸ k'oˆ leh, ca beu ca hk'aiˉ ve yoˬ.
42019008	Saˍkehˇ huˉ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ teˇ hkoˇ hk'a gaˬ haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ hui hta‸ pehˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ ngaˬ heˍ caˇ taˍ peuˬ ve k'o, awˇ pun ngaˬ k'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019009	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yehˬ chi teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ nyi htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ gaˬ la peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ htawˇ Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42019010	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, mehˉ k'ai ve chaw hui hta‸ ca leh htaiˍ hk'aw‸ yuˬ tuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ Saˍkehˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019011	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui na chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ k'aw‸ te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
42019012	Hk'e te leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ ca yuˬ leh k'aw‸ la tuˬ, vuiˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42019013	Yawˇ maˇ k'ai sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ chi g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpu teˇ g'aˇ teˇ cawehˬ piˇ leh, Ngaˬ k'aw‸ gaˬ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ hpu chi hta‸ yuˬ leh ca kaˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
42019014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ canˇ leh, yawˇ hui ve awˬ tan te shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tcuh leh, Yawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ ngaˬ hui maˇ heuˆ gaˇ teh‸ ca k'oˆ piˇ tcuh ve yoˬ.
42019015	Yawˇ lehˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ g'a peuˬ leh k'aw‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, hpu piˇ taˉ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ ca kaˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ yawˬ hk'aˬ ma g'a ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, Yawˇ hui hta‸ ca kuˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019016	Awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve hpu teˇ cawehˬ hta‸ ngaˬ ca kaˬ leh, teˇ chi cawehˬ k'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019017	Awˬ jawˇ mawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Da‸ ve awˬ ceˬ-oˬ, nawˬ te ve lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. I ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ na yuˬ puiˉ ve pa taw, venˇ teˇ chi venˇ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019018	Nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve hpu teˇ cawehˬ hta‸ ngaˬ ca kaˬ leh, ngaˇ cawehˬ k'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019019	Awˬ jawˇ mawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Venˇ ngaˇ venˇ hta‸ nawˬ uˉ peunˍ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019020	Teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, cho-e‸, nawˬ ve hpu teˇ cawehˬ hta‸ hpaˉ ce‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ htiˆ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
42019021	Nawˬ lehˬ te hehnˇ jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ kawˆ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ maˇ teh taˍ kuiˬ lo nawˬ g'awˆ yuˬ leh, nawˬ maˇ sheˍ kuiˬ lo nawˬ g'eu‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019022	Oˇ htaˇ awˬ jawˇ mawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Haiˬ ve awˬ ceˬ-oˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ yuˬ leh nawˬ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ te hehnˇ jaˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ maˇ teh taˍ kuiˬ lo g'awˆ yuˬ leh, maˇ sheˍ kuiˬ lo g'eu‸ yuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ ve k'o,
42019023	ngaˬ ve hpu chi hta‸ yuˬ leh hpu chiˇ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te maˇ piˇ le. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, ngaˬ k'aw‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ ve hpu chi hta‸ ka‸ awˬ yawˬ hta‸ ka‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019024	Awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hpu oˇ ve teˇ cawehˬ hta‸ yawˇ geh yuˬ hk'aw‸ leh, hpu teˇ chi cawehˬ cawˬ ve chaw hta‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019025	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, yawˇ hpu teˇ chi cawehˬ cawˬ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019026	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ k'aw‸ htehˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ cawˬ chaw geh, yawˇ hk'a cawˬ ve hta‸ ka‸ k'aw‸ yuˬ tawˆ sheˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42019027	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ maˇ heuˆ gaˇ ve ngaˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ choˬ kaˬ lo yuˬ laˬ leh, ngaˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ tiˇ pehˍ loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42019028	Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
42019029	Yawˇ lehˬ Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw hta‸ neˇ ve, Behˆhpaˍgeˍ hk'aˆ leh Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh k'oˆ ve,
42019030	Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ cawˬ ve hk'aˆ hk'aw lo k'ai-o. Oˇ kaˬ lo lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ ciˇ jaw sheˍ ve piˉ laˬ ehˉ hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Hpui leh sheh veu laˇ-oˆ.
42019031	Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw hpui ve le teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ na nyi laˇ ve k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ loˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019032	K'ai tcuh ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ k'ai leh gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'e g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42019033	Piˉ laˬ ehˉ hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ ma hpui chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw piˉ laˬ ehˉ hta‸ hpui ve le teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019034	Jawˇ mawˇ loˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019035	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ piˉ laˬ ehˉ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh sheh veu laˇ leh, piˉ laˬ ehˉ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve veu‸ k'aˇ hk'awˇ piˉ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ciˇ tcuh ve yoˬ.
42019036	Yawˇ ciˇ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo hk'awˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019037	Venˇ awˬ paˇ lo yawˇ gaˬ la leh, Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw gaˬ ya‸ teˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ jaw peuˬ ve kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ pa taw, ha lehˬ ha k'a awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh te leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
42019038	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo laˬ ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˇ. Mvuh jaˇ kuiˬ lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42019039	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ deˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019040	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ ta‸ iˉ chehˇ ve k'o, haˉ pui shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ kuˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019041	Venˇ awˬ paˇ lo yawˇ gaˬ la htaˇ, venˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ hawˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
42019042	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ-oˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh nawˬ gawˬ lehˍ g'a chehˇ tuˬ ya‸ nyi ka‸ nawˬ shiˍ ve hk'e k'o da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ lehˬ gawˬ lehˍ g'a chehˇ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42019043	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ ca nyi ca ha‸ shaˉ la ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ lo ta‸ duˇ taˍ leh, nawˬ hta‸ teˇ hpawˇ le le hoˆ taˍ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42019044	Oˇ htaˇ, nawˬ leh nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve nawˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ lo chiˇ baˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo haˉ pui teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ teˇ shiˍ maˇ cawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui te luˬ taˉ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42019045	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh, mawˇ hawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ.
42019046	Ngaˬ ve yehˬ hta‸ bon lawˬ kuiˬ yehˬ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ yehˬ chi hta‸ chaw hk'awˇ chehˇ kuiˬ hpeh‸ la piˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42019047	Yawˇ lehˬ teˇ nyi le le bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ hoˉ awˬ naˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca ve yoˬ.
42019048	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui ca maˇ mawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na chehˇ ve pa taw yoˬ.
42020001	Teˇ nyi htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw chi ma ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
42020002	Nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve le. Kanˇ paˆ chi a shu nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve le, Ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42020003	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ na nyi shaˍ. Nawˬ hui yaw hk'aw‸ laˇsheˍ.
42020004	Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ baˆtiˆsaˬ, piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma lo g'a ve laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o chaw yaˇ hui geh lo g'a ve laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42020005	Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ jehˬ da‸ leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma lo g'a ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve k'o, Nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma te yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve le teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42020006	Chaw yaˇ hui geh g'a ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve k'o, chaw chi ma ve ngaˬ hui hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ pehˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui yonˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42020007	Yawˇ hk'aˬ lo g'a ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42020008	Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ, Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˇ paˆ g'a leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ hto laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42020009	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ chi maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a pehˉ meuˇ hko te leh ti taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˍ piˇ taˉ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai leh oˇ kaˬ lo maw chaweh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42020010	Awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, hko oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ dawˆ leh, awˬ k'awˇ lehˍ k'o‸-e peu ve yoˬ.
42020011	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ yawˇ hui geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui dawˆ leh hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na te piˇ leh, awˬ k'awˇ lehˍ k'o‸-e peu ve yoˬ.
42020012	Peuˬ leh, awˬ ceˬ shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui dawˆ hk'aw sheˬ leh g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ.
42020013	Oˇ htaˇ, a pehˉ meuˇ hko awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le. Ngaˬ ha‸ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'ai tcuh shaˍ. Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan tuˬ yoˬ hehˉ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42020014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ jehˬ da‸ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ awˬ shinˉ g'a shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Laˬ-o‸, yawˇ ve awˬ shinˉ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ-a veuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42020015	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hko awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo chiˇ baˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, hko awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te piˇ tuˬ le.
42020016	Yawˇ laˬ leh, hko te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hko oˇ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ ngaˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Oˇ hk'e maˇ hpeh‸ taˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42020017	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ nyi leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yehˬ kawˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hui baˬ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ ceˍ k'aweh‸ lo kawˍ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ gaˇ ve le.
42020018	Haˉ pui oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ paiˍ ve chaw lehˬ, hteh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ pui oˇ ve ce teˍ ve k'o, chaw oˇ ve meu-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42020019	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tawˇ pa haˉ oˇ ve yawˇ yawˇ hui awˬ lawn k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ ve pa taw, awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ tuˬ ca ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ yawˇ hui kawˆ ve yoˬ.
42020020	Mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ve kanˇ paˆ leh uˉ peunˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ awˬ pon Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui lehˬ jaˆ nyi shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Jaˆ nyi shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ yaw ya‸ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ tuˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hk'e te leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42020021	Jaˆ nyi shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ hteˇ lehˍ k'oˆ piˇ maˍ piˇ leh, chaw yaˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
42020022	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ a moˇ keu piˇ cawˇ laˇ, maˇ keu piˇ cawˇ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42020023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui cuˇ yiˍ te leh heˍ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42020024	Hpu teˇ hteh‸ ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ-oˆ. A shu ve awˬ han, a shu ve awˬ meh cawˬ le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42020025	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te leh, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve mawˇ jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ piˇ-oˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42020026	Chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ kuiˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui ca maˇ mawˬ. Yawˇ yaw hk'aw‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui anˇ leh ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42020027	K'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Saˍduˆkehˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yawˇ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
42020028	Saˍ la‸-oˬ, Moˉseˍ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ miˇ ma cawˬ leh, yaˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ suh ve k'o, yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ lehˬ, awˬ viˉ paˍ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ k'aw‸ heuˆ leh, awˬ viˉ paˍ awˬ pon awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ g'a cawˬ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42020029	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi suhˍ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ heuˆ leh, yaˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ suh ve yoˬ.
42020030	Nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸, shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ heuˆ ve yoˬ.
42020031	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi suhˍ g'aˇ hk'a gaˬ yaˇ maˇ cawˬ taˉ leh suh ve yoˬ.
42020032	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ gaˬ leh, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve htawˇ suh ve yoˬ.
42020033	Hk'e te leh, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui suhˍ g'aˇ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ heuˆ peuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42020034	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ka piˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42020035	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ ca‸ na‸ hta‸ ka‸, suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ g'a keunˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ka piˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ te.
42020036	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a suh. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ leh, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42020037	Suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve yoˬ teh‸, aˉ chuˇ buiˇ awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo Moˉseˍ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve G'uiˬ sha, Iˉcaˆ ve G'uiˬ sha leh Yaˍkoˆ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42020038	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ suh peuˬ ve chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ pa taw chaw hk'a peu-eˬ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42020039	Oˇ htaˇ li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42020040	Yawˇ hui lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ k'aw‸ na nyi maˇ haˆ.
42020041	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hkri‸ lehˬ Daˍviˆ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸, aˬ hto‸ ma te shu k'oˆ ve le.
42020042	Awˬ lawn k'o, Daˍviˆ yawˇ awˬ to k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42020043	Nawˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve hkui sheh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ taˍ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ-oˆ, teh‸ Chiˇ mvuh ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42020044	Hk'e te leh, Daˍviˆ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ ve yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42020045	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ na chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42020046	Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ve hta‸ deh leh ca te toˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Tcuh hk'aw lo shu yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˆ yan laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui hk'awˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hti caˇ hti dawˬ kuiˬ lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve mui kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
42020047	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mehˇ chawˇ ma ve yehˬ hta‸ hiˇ yuˬ leh, a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ maˇ g'a tawˆ la tuˬ maw chaweh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Shu a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh uiˍ jaˇ ve ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42021001	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ chiˇ nyi leh, hpu tanˇ keu kuiˬ lo paw sha paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpu keu chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42021002	Haˍ g'awˇ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ peh‸ shanˍ nyiˇ peh‸ keu ve hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42021003	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, haˍ g'awˇ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh keu maˇ ve yoˬ.
42021004	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ tawˆ leh keu ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yaˇ miˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, haˍ g'awˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ a sha‸ hu tuˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ leh keu ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42021005	Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi sha jaˇ ve haˉ pui shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh, tanˇ taˍ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ ve awˬ lawn shu k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve,
42021006	Nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu te luˬ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, haˉ pui teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ teˇ shiˍ maˇ cawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ luˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42021007	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, hk'e te k'o, awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ htaˆ hpeh‸ la tuˬ le. Hpeh‸ la paˇ neˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ heˆ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ tawˆ la tuˬ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42021008	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw maˇ maˇ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pfuhˇ laˬ leh, Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh taˇ k'ai.
42021009	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ma‸ bawˆ ve leh mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpfuhˆ k'ai ve awˬ lawn hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, kawˆ ve cheˇ ve taˇ cawˬ piˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˉ lawˉ g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ la tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42021010	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ ceuˬ leh teˇ ceuˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ leh teˇ peˆ ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021011	Miˬ g'aˇ hte‸ hiˆ ve, chehˇ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo meu‸ ve kaˆ ve leh naˬ beuˬ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo kawˆ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ leh, uiˍ jaˬ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42021012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh fawˉ mehˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo leh htawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo shu nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shu nawˬ hui hta‸ yuˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
42021013	Chi hk'e te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ yanˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42021014	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e k'aw‸ k'oˆ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ ve, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ dawˇ nyi teh‸, a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo dawˇ cheˆ taˍ-o‸.
42021015	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ g'awˬ hk'aˆ maˇ g'a leh tawˍ taˍ maˇ g'a ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021016	Awˬ pa awˬ e, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ leh awˬ chawˇ awˬ paˆ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021017	Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw chaw hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021018	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui ve uˉ hkeh mvuh teˇ mvuh ka‸ maˇ g'a luˬ.
42021019	Nawˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ puiˉ ve hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui ve co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021020	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ ma‸ moˍ ma‸ cuˇ hk'a caw zuhˇ hoˆ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, venˇ oˇ ve g'a luˬ paˇ neˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-o‸.
42021021	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hk'aw hk'oˆ lawˬ hk'oˆ lo hpaw-e loˬ. Venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui tawˆ k'ai-o. Venˇ awˬ baˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui venˇ hk'aw lo taˇ lo‸-e.
42021022	Awˬ lawn k'o, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ biˇ la tuˬ, awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42021023	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yaˇ hu ma leh cuˉ dawˬ ve yaˇ ehˉ cawˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo dawˇ haˍ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw chi teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42021024	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, aˉ htaw chaw pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Shu yawˇ hui hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh, mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ yanˇ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ naˆ tiˍ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021025	Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ nyi, ha pa, meu‸ keu teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ leh g'uiˬ baˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ jaˇ ve pa taw, chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ anˇ jaˇ leh, dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021026	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, kawˆ jaˇ ve pa taw, maˇ nawˇ maˇ hteh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma ve kanˇ paˆ teˇ hpaˍ hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42021027	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, uiˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo moˬ hta‸ ciˇ ya‸ la ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42021028	Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ tanˬ hpeh‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui oˉ k'oˍ chiˇ leh nyi-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ neˇ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42021029	Yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Maˉ nawˆ cehˬ leh suhˆ cehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nyi-o.
42021030	Awˬ caˍ caˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ cha hkui yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui mawˬ leh shiˍ ve yoˬ.
42021031	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-o‸.
42021032	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chi teˇ co maˇ ponˬ k'ai sheˍ htaˇ, awˬ ceuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42021033	Mvuhˇ naw ma leh miˬ naˆ ma mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, maˇ mehˉ k'ai taˬ.
42021034	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, caˇ leuˉ dawˬ leuˉ ve, tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve, miˬ guiˬ dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ tuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui nyi ma hawˇ buiˬ lehˍ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ nyi oˇ ve lehˬ va yaw ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ teˇ cawˬ haˉ nawˬ hui aw‸ hk'oˆ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42021035	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ nyi oˇ ve lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42021036	Hk'e te leh, hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui g'a ponˬ leh, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ g'a huˉ chehˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ leh shaw taˍ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42021037	Yawˇ lehˬ, teˇ nyi le le bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ leh, teˇ haˉ le le tawˆ k'ai leh Shaˍlonˍ meh ve hk'aw lo ca haˉ-e ve yoˬ.
42021038	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ, mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸ htaˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ geh hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ.
42022001	Oˇ htaˇ, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ meh ve, Hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'aw lo diˇ maˇ keu ve pawehˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
42022002	paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ hta‸ g'a tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ kawˆ ve yoˬ.
42022003	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ meh ve Yuˇda‸ teˇ g'aˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo Saˍtanˍ lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
42022004	Yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh bon yehˬ lonˉ ve ma‸ poˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ yawˇ hui geh jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42022005	Yawˇ hui ha lehˬ jaˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ hpu piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42022006	Yawˇ htawˇ hkanˍ yuˬ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ maˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ, da‸ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ yawˇ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42022007	Paˍsaˍhkaˍ yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve awˬ nyi, Hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'aw lo diˇ maˇ keu ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
42022008	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Ngaˬ hui Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ hta‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon ca gu-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022009	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Hk'aˬ ve teˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ gu tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42022010	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ venˇ hk'aw gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, iˉ kaˆ mu‸ hk'u taˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, yawˇ lo‸-e ve yehˬ hk'aw nawˬ huiˉ maˬ lo‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ,
42022011	yehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ, Saˍ la‸ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Ngaˬ leh ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh teˇ geh Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ caˇ tuˬ, hkehˉ chaw bawehˇ hk'aˬ lo le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi-o.
42022012	Oˇ htaˇ, gu taˍ peuˬ ve, awˬ hta‸ teˇ htai‸ bawehˇ uiˍ ve teˇ bawehˇ yawˇ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo gu taˍ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022013	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve hk'e g'a mawˬ leh, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ caˇ tuˬ awˬ pon gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
42022014	Awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui leh, tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh mui ve yoˬ.
42022015	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ g'a hkanˍ sheˍ htaˇ, naw hui geh teˇ geh ngaˬ Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ chi hta‸ caˇ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
42022016	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo pawehˇ chi teˇ maˬ maˇ biˇ la sheˍ ve ceh ceh, pawehˇ chi hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ k'aw‸ caˇ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022017	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ kawˆ hta‸ yuˬ leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Kawˆ chi hta‸ yuˬ leh nawˬ hui pehˬ dawˬ-o‸.
42022018	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ maˇ gaˬ la sheˍ ve ceh ceh, ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, ngaˬ a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ dawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022019	Hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ yuˬ leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ hk'eh‸ leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chi lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon tanˇ piˇ ve ngaˬ ve awˬ to yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ chi hk'e te-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022020	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ mvuhˇ haˉ awˍ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, kawˆ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ yuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Kawˆ chi lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngeuˍ pfuhˍ ve, ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ hk'aw lo te taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42022021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ geh teˇ hkehˇ tiˉ hkaˆ caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42022022	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve hk'e yawˇ g'a k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022023	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo a shu teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e te tuˬ le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'a na nyi da‸ ve yoˬ.
42022024	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ shu a‸ kehˉ g'a uiˍ tuˬ le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42022025	Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bon shehˍ hpaˇ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022026	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e maˇ g'a te. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, shu a‸ kehˉ i ve teˇ g'aˇ hk'e te-o, Awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hk'e te-o.
42022027	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve le. Hpui lawˇ lo mui caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, te caˍ te taw ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ laˇ. Hpui lawˇ lo mui caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ uiˍ ve yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo te caˍ te taw shehˍ hpaˇ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42022028	Beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ geh hk'a geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42022029	Ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ pe‸ laˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
42022030	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve hpui lawˇ lo nawˬ hui g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, k'aw jaw hk'oˆ mui leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ chi nyiˇ ceuˬ hta‸ suhˉ g'a jehˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
42022031	Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, caˬ shiˍ caˬ hk'a htaˬ hkeunˉ ve hk'e, Saˍtanˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ hkeunˉ tuˬ yawˇ lawˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
42022032	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ g'a luˬ k'ai tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ awˬ pon bon lawˬ peuˬ. Nawˬ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022033	Oˇ htaˇ Siˉmonˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, htawnˍ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, suh kuiˬ lo maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ nawˬ geh hk'a geh k'ai tuˬ gu taˍ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022034	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Peˍtruˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, ya‸ puiˉ g'aˆ hpfuh maˇ bvuhˬ sheˍ htaˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ g'awˬ hk'aˆ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022035	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, hpu guˉ pi, miˉ chaw leh hkuiˉ nuˆ maˇ yuˬ k'ai tcuh laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui loˍ ve cuˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ cawˬ laˇ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ na nyi htaˇ, Loˍ ve cuˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022036	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ya‸ hk'aˇ chi beu‸ lehˬ, hpu guˉpi cawˬ ve chaw k'o, hpu guˉ pi yuˬ k'ai. Miˉ chaw cawˬ ve chaw k'o, miˉ chaw pfuhˇ k'ai. Aˉ htaw maˇ cawˬ ve chaw k'o, a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hawˇ leh aˉ htaw ca vuiˬ yuˬ-o‸.
42022037	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ chaw haiˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh shu shawˍ keu tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a biˇ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ g'a biˇ la ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022038	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nyi loˬ, choˬ kaˬ aˉ htaw nyiˇ taˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, Hk'e k'o, law‸ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022039	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, yawˇ awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve hk'e Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42022040	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Beˬ ve lawˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh nawˬ hui maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022041	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui chehˇ kuiˬ te leh, haˉ pui teˇ hk'e baˬ gaˬ law‸ hk'e fui yawˇ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh k'oˆ ve,
42022042	A pa-oˬ, nawˬ nyi ma cawˇ ve k'o, kawˆ chi hta‸ ngaˬ g'a ponˬ k'ai tuˬ a ciˉ te laˇ-oˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Nawˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
42022043	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ mvuhˇ naw ma lo tawˆ la leh yawˇ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022044	Yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw tu‸ jaˇ hkanˍ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ leuˉ leh g'aˇ hte‸ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ kuiˍ tawˆ la ve lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ diˬ hk'e hpeh‸ leh miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ ce ve yoˬ.
42022045	Yawˇ bon lawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ tu leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh k'o‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42022046	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve le. Tu-o. Beˬ ve lawˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022047	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ shiˍ veu laˇ leh laˬ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ boˆ nu tuˬ, awˬ paˇ lo yawˇ jiˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42022048	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yuˇda‸-oˬ, nawˬ boˆ nu ve hta‸ te leh chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve law leˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022049	Yeˍsuˆ geh hk'a geh chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui aˉ htaw g'a chaw tuˬ ve laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022050	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ chaw leh, la‸ sha paˉ ve naˍ paw cheˆ ve yoˬ.
42022051	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Pehˇ-o, taˇ k'aw‸ te loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve naˍ paw hta‸ htawˇ sheˬ leh gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022052	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ geh gaˬ la ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, bon yehˬ lonˉ ve maˬ poˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ hta‸ ca hpeh yuˬ ve hk'e, aˉ htaw leh suhˆ taˬ teˇ hpaˍ yuˬ veu laˇ leh laˬ ve laˇ.
42022053	Teˇ nyi le le bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ hpeh yuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ yanˇ chi ve lehˬ nawˬ hui ve awˬ yanˇ hpeh‸ leh, naˆ ho‸ ve kanˇ paˆ ve awˬ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022054	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve aˉ hk'aw lo sheh k'ai ve yoˬ. Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, awˬ hk'aˇ suh a ciˉ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo g'a‸ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42022055	Shaˉ nanˉ awˬ paˇ ko taˍ kuiˬ awˬ k'aw ji lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ aˬ miˍ tcuh leh teˇ geh mui lehˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Peˍtruˆ htawˇ yawˇ hui geh ca mui lehˬ ve yoˬ.
42022056	Yawˇ aˬ miˍ g'euˆ ba kuiˬ lo mui chehˇ ve hta‸ awˬ ceˬ ma teˇ g'aˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh, Chi hpaˇ htawˇ yawˇ geh chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022057	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Peˍtruˆ g'awˬ hk'aˆ leh, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022058	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ mawˬ leh, Nawˬ htawˇ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Chi hpaˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022059	Teˇ naˍ riˍ hk'e maw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, Chi hpaˇ ka‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yawˇ geh hk'a geh chehˇ ve chaw yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, g'aˇ hte‸ k'oˆ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42022060	Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Chi hpaˇ-oˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ g'aˆ hpfuh bvuhˬ la ve yoˬ.
42022061	Oˇ htaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ hpfuhˆ nyi ve yoˬ. Ya‸ puiˉ g'aˆ hpfuh maˇ bvuhˬ sheˍ htaˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ chiˇ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ Peˍtruˆ dawˇ nawˇ la ve yoˬ.
42022062	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh g'aˇ hte‸ hawˬ ve yoˬ.
42022063	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ leh dawˆ ve yoˬ.
42022064	Yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ beh taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Nawˬ hta‸ a shu dawˆ laˇ ve le. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'e te leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022065	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu laiˉ ceuˬ k'oˆ leh maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42022066	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hpeh‸ ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yuˬ k'ai leh,
42022067	Nawˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hto laˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui yonˍ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
42022068	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ na nyi ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
42022069	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022070	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te k'o, nawˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve leh laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yoˬ, nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve hk'e yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42022071	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma shaˉ hkiˆ k'aw‸ loˍ sheˍ ve le. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui awˬ to g'a kaˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42023001	Oˇ htaˇ, hpawnˬ da‸ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ tu la leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh sheh k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
42023002	Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ ya‸k'aw sheh ya‸ laˇ leh, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ a moˇ maˇ g'a keu tuˬ tawˍ taˍ laˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ to Hkri‸ k'oˆ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42023003	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ laˇ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yoˬ, nawˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023004	Hk'e te leh jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ mawˬ teh‸, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui leuˉ leh g'aˇ hte‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ te leh choˬ kaˬ hk'a gaˬ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo maˍ piˇ leh, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ tu la tuˬ ca juˆ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42023006	Tawˇ chi hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Yawˇ Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw yoˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42023007	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ uˉ peunˍ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ geh yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42023008	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ lawn g'a kaˇ jaw leh, yawˇ te maˍ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yawˇ dawˇ law chehˇ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ mawˬ gaˇ ve maw jaˇ peuˬ.
42023009	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ laiˉ ceuˬ na nyi ve htawˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ.
42023010	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ oˇ kaˬ lo huˉ taˍ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ g'aˇ hte‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42023011	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ hui geh teˇ geh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te leh, k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, da‸ jaˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ feuˉ piˇ leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh k'aw‸ shiˍ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42023012	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ leh jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ awˬ chawˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ canˇ da‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42023013	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
42023014	Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'aw sheh ya‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ geh sheh veu laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hk'e venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ mawˬ.
42023015	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ htawˇ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ maˇ mawˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui geh k'aw‸ hk'aw‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Nyi loˬ, yawˇ lehˬ suh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ te.
42023016	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ jaw‸ sheˬ leh hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023018	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ-o‸. Ngaˬ hui awˬ pon Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ teˇ geh kuˬ ve yoˬ.
42023019	Baˍraˍbaˆ lehˬ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hpfuhˆ hpeh‸ leh, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve pa taw, htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42023020	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ gaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ loˬ, hta‸ pehˍ loˬ.
42023022	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, shehˆ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw le. Yawˇ haiˬ ve aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve le. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo suh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ mawˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ jaw‸ sheˬ leh hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023023	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ, g'aˇ hte‸ k'oˆ tcuhˉ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui ve hkawˇ g'aˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42023024	Hk'e te leh jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ suhˉ taˆ ve yoˬ.
42023025	Mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpfuhˆ leh shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve pa taw, htawnˍ hk'aw lo keu taˍ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, yawˇ hui lawˬ ve hk'e hpehˇ piˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui te gaˇ ve hk'e te hpeh‸ tuˬ yawˇ hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023026	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui sheh tawˆ-e ve teˇ yanˇ, heh hk'aw k'ai k'aw‸ la ve Kuˇreˍneˍ venˇ yaˇ Siˉmonˍ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui yuˬ tiˍ taˍ leh, la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ tcuh leh Yeˍsuˆ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
42023027	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw hawˬ leh paˆ hawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42023028	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ hpfuhˆ nyi leh k'oˆ ve, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw taˇ hawˬ. Nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon leh nawˬ hui ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon hawˬ-o‸.
42023029	Awˬ lawn k'o, Chaw meh ma teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ maˇ hu jaw ve g'oˇ peˬ leh yaˇ ehˉ maˇ dawˬ jaw ve cuˉ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ g'a k'oˆ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
42023030	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, hk'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ paˆ teˍ laˇ-oˆ. Hk'aw pui ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ, Ngaˬ hui hta‸ hoˆ tiˍ taˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
42023031	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, suhˆ awˬ tcuhˇ hta‸ chi hk'e te ve k'o, suhˆ awˬ vi hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e taw te tuˬ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42023032	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ, chaw haiˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui sheh tawˆ-e ve yoˬ.
42023033	Oˉkoˆ meh ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw haiˬ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸, yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ teˇ g'aˇ, la‸ mehˍ paˉ teˇ g'aˇ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
42023034	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, A pa-oˬ, yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui kuˇ da‸ leh, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
42023035	Chaw chi ma ve huˉ leh nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Shu hta‸ yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ lawˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42023036	Ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ awˬ paˇ lo laˬ leh, ci ve awˬ g'uiˬ yawˇ hta‸ taw piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
42023037	Nawˬ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve k'o, nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ nawˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ ve yoˬ.
42023038	Yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ lo htawˇ, Chaw chi lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ teh‸, li‸ bvuh‸ nehˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42023039	Oˇ htaˇ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve chaw haiˬ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ maˇ heˆ laˇ. Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ka‸, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ka‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te leh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023040	Awˬ nu ve teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ suhˉ taˆ ve hta‸ nawˬ htawˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ nawˬ maˇ kawˆ laˇ.
42023041	Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ chi hk'e g'a hkanˍ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ te ya‸ ve pa taw, hkanˍ keunˍ hkanˍ cawˇ ve hk'e g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ te ya‸ teh‸ k'oˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ hta‸ deˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023042	Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, nawˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ te laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023043	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ya‸ nyi nawˬ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh Paˍraˍdiˇsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023044	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, aˬ laˬ hk'e mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ teˇ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ hk'a gaˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ naˆ ho‸ hpeh‸ sheˬ leh, mvuhˇ nyi awˬ g'euˆ mehˉ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42023045	Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve hpaˬ kaˍ lonˉ lehˬ, nyiˇ hkoˇ tzuh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42023046	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh, A pa-oˬ, ngaˬ ve co ha nawˬ ve la‸ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chiˇ a‸ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ shaˉ cheˆ ve yoˬ.
42023047	Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Chaw chi lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ ve yoˬ.
42023048	Oˇ ve hta‸ hpawnˬ nyi chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma pui hta‸ hta leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42023049	Yawˇ hta‸ hk'a shiˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ k'oˆ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo te leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a ciˉ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo huˉ taˍ leh chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42023050	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Aˍriˆma‸htehˍ venˇ lo laˬ ve Yoˇseh‸ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, da‸ ve chaw leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve chaw teˆ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42023051	Yawˇ lehˬ jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui jehˬ cheˆ leh te ve hta‸ yawˇ nyi ma maˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
42023052	Yawˇ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ lawˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
42023053	Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ ya‸ leh, hpa hpu yuˬ htiˆ sheˬ leh, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ tuˍ jaw sheˍ ve, haˉ pui htawˆ taˍ ve tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
42023054	Awˬ nyi oˇ ve lehˬ, pawehˇ awˬ pon gu ve awˬ nyi hpeh‸ leh, shinˉ nyi gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
42023055	Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo te leh Yeˍsuˆ geh hk'a geh laˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, tuˍ hpfuh hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te teh taˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42023056	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui k'o‸-e leh, sha hawnˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh naˍ manˇ hawnˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ gu taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e, shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui g'aˇ jehˇ ve yoˬ.
42024001	Teˇ shinˉ awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi mvuhˇ htiˇ la htaˇ, yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui gu taˍ ve sha hawnˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ leh tuˍ hpfuh lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
42024002	Yawˇ hui oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, tuˍ hpfuh hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42024003	Yawˇ hui lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ maˇ mawˬ
42024004	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ maˇ tawˆ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ g'euˆ ba ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ veu‸ deh taˍ ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la leh yawˇ hui awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42024005	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ kawˆ jaˇ leh miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ suh ve chaw chehˇ kuiˬ lo ca la ve le.
42024006	Yawˇ choˬ kaˬ maˇ chehˇ. K'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ. Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ htaˇ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ.
42024007	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, shehˆ nyi gaˬ k'o, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024008	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ la ve yoˬ.
42024009	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, tuˍ hpfuh lo k'aw‸ la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ lawn oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024010	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ, Yoˇhaˍnaˆ, Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ.
42024011	Yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ yonˍ.
42024013	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, oˇ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ la‸ g'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ suhˍ laˆ vuiˇ da‸ ve Eˇmaw‸ hk'aˆ lo k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ,
42024014	hk'a hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aoˍ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
42024015	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ chi hk'e k'aoˍ da‸ jehˬ da‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ to awˬ paˇ lo laˬ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh teˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
42024016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ koˍ taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
42024017	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ ya‸ k'aw k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ lawn na‸ uˉ te da‸ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ mehˆ hpfuhˇ nawˍ lehˍ te leh huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42024018	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Kaˍlawˇhpaˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hkehˉ chaw hpeh‸ leh, chi nyiˇ nyi venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve chaw nawˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ yoˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024019	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn le teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ lawn yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ leh chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'aˇ suhˍ, yawˇ k'oˆ ve te ve awˬ hk'aw lo kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42024020	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh ngaˬ hui ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ g'a suh tuˬ awˬ pon suhˉ taˆ tuˬ chiˇ a‸ piˇ leh, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
42024021	Yawˇ lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hui dawˇ law jaw ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, ya‸ nyi shehˆ nyi gaˬ peuˬ.
42024022	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ htawˇ anˇ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ shawˉ teˇ na‸ yawˇ hui tuˍ hpfuh lo k'ai leh, yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ maˇ mawˬ.
42024023	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ la leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, Yawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42024024	Ngaˬ hui ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, tuˍ hpfuh lo k'ai leh, yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve hk'e g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024025	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yonˍ tuˬ, nyi ma hk'aw maˇ dawˇ pawnˍ puiˉ leh cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hui-oˬ,
42024026	Hkri‸ lehˬ chi hk'e g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024027	Oˇ htaˇ, Moˉseˍ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ tanˬ leh, Li‸ hpu hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve awˬ lawn hk'a bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tcuhˉ kuiˬ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024028	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'ai chehˇ ve hk'aˆ lo gaˬ paˇ neˇ ve teˇ yanˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai-a teh‸ te ve yoˬ.
42024029	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ geh haˉ taˉ sheˍ. Mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ peuˬ. Mvuhˇ ka‸ hpeu‸ la yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh ca haˉ tuˬ yawˇ lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
42024030	Yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hkaoˍ monˇ hk'eh‸ leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024031	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ mehˆ hpaw la leh, Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ mehˉ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
42024032	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'oˆ ve, Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo yawˇ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ leh Li‸ hpu tcuhˉ kuiˬ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo geh jaˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
42024033	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ tu leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ leh yawˇ hui geh chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
42024034	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ. Siˉmonˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ to maw piˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
42024035	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ htawˇ, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, hkaoˍ monˇ hk'eh‸ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ la ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024036	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ to yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo huˉ taˍ leh, Nawˬ hui geh dawˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024037	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, chaw ha ku hta‸ mawˬ ve law teh‸ dawˇ leh, kawˆ jaˇ leh cheˇ lehˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
42024038	Yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ ve le. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw lo htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ te chehˇ ve le.
42024039	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ngaˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh hkui sheh hta‸ nyi-o. Ngaˬ hta‸ shoˆ nyi htawˇ nyi-o. Ngaˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui mawˬ taˍ ve hk'e, awˬ shaˍ leh awˬ mu‸ ku cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw ha ku lehˬ, oˇ hk'e cawˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh,
42024040	yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hkui sheh yawˇ hui hta‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024041	Yawˇ hui anˇ leh ha lehˬ jaˇ ve pa taw, hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ hui geh caˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ cawˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
42024042	Ngaˇ pinˍ taˍ ve teˇ tawn yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ,
42024043	Yawˇ yuˬ leh yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ caˇ ve yoˬ.
42024044	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chiˇ mvuh ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ awˬ lawn hk'a bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ g'a biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42024045	Oˇ htaˇ, Li‸ hpu ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ hta‸ shiˍ tuˬ, yawˇ yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024046	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Hkri‸ lehˬ g'a hkanˍ suh leh shehˆ nyi gaˬ k'o g'a k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ.
42024047	Venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ awˬ lawn, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ tanˬ leh chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo g'a maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
42024048	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
42024049	Ngaˬ Awˬ pa piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ nawˬ hui geh lo ngaˬ peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma lo ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'a sheˍ ve ceh ceh, venˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ sheˍ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024050	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ awˬ paˇ lo hk'a gaˬ shiˍ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ la‸ sheh chiˇ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ bon na‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
42024051	Chi hk'e bon na‸ piˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo taˆ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42024052	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui taˉ leh, ha lehˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
42024053	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43001001	Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ Tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve G'uiˬ sha geh chehˇ leh Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43001002	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha geh teˇ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43001003	Hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ te taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˇ te ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
43001004	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo co ha te‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Co ha te‸ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve Awˬ g'euˆ yoˬ.
43001005	Awˬ g'euˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ba la leh, naˆ ho‸ ve lehˬ Awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ maˇ g'aˇ.
43001006	G'uiˬ sha peu laˇ ve Yoˇhanˬ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ awˬ pon laˬ ve yoˬ.
43001007	Yawˇ hta‸ pa taw chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yonˍ la tuˬ, Awˬ g'euˆ oˇ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ la ve yoˬ.
43001008	Yawˇ lehˬ Awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ g'euˆ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ yawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ.
43001009	Awˬ g'euˆ awˬ tehˬ ma lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo laˬ leh chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ g'euˆ ba piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001010	Yawˇ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ taˍ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ taˍ htawˇ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ.
43001011	Yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo yawˇ laˬ htawˇ, yawˇ ve chaw yawˇ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ.
43001012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ hk'a ha‸ yuˬ leh yawˇ ve awˬ meh hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yawˇ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001013	Yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Chaw yaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ pa taw htawˇ maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
43001014	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ leh ngaˬ hui geh chehˇ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Awˬ pa lo laˬ ve Yaˇ hpu tiˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43001015	(Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ cawˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ taˍ ve lehˬ, chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
43001016	Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ biˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ peuˬ teˇ ceuˬ g'a taˍ ve yoˬ.
43001017	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, Moˉseˍ ve la‸ hk'aw lo pe‸ laˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
43001018	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw. Awˬ pa ve nyi ma pui lo chehˇ ve Yaˇ hpu tiˍ lehˬ, Awˬ pa awˬ lawn hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ.
43001019	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh Leˍviˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo tu leh Yoˇhanˬ geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Nawˬ a shu le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yoˇhanˬ chi hk'e shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
43001020	Ngaˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ maˇ heˆ teh‸, hteˇ lehˍ hto piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ maˇ heˍ maˇ faˉ.
43001021	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Hk'e te k'o, nawˬ Eˇliˇya‸ leh laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Ngaˬ Eˇliˇya‸ maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ leh laˇ teh‸ k'aw‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001022	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ a shu le. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ peu laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui k'aw‸ hto piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ awˬ to awˬ lawn nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43001023	Yoˇhanˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ te-o teh‸, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo kuˬ chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ ngaˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001024	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui k'ai tcuh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43001025	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ maˇ heˆ, Eˇliˇya‸ ka‸ maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ heˆ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ shu hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43001026	Yoˇhanˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ shu hta‸ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43001027	Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve hkuiˉ nuˆ caˆ hta‸ hpui tuˬ ve ceh ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001028	Yawˇ hui Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ chi hk'e na nyi kuiˬ lehˬ, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ lo cawˬ ve Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ hk'aw, Yoˇhanˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ chehˇ ve teˇ kaˬ yoˬ.
43001029	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ geh lo laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ shehˍ hpaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ nyi-o.
43001030	Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ cawˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ taˍ ve lehˬ, chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43001031	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui yawˇ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ laˬ leh shu hta‸ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001032	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Yoˇhanˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, aˉ pui k'aˍ hk'e mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la leh yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
43001033	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shi. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo shu hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ tcuh laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ Awˬ ha hpu ya‸ la leh chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo shu hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
43001034	Ngaˬ g'a mawˬ peuˬ leh, chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yoˇhanˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43001035	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ geh k'aw‸ huˉ chehˇ htaˇ,
