43001036	Yeˍsuˆ laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ nyi leh, G'uiˬ sha ve Yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ nyi-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001037	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
43001038	Yeˍsuˆ hpfuhˆ nyi leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ aˬ hto‸ ma ca ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ, nawˬ hk'aˬ lo chehˇ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. (Raˍbiˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, saˍ la‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
43001039	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ca nyi la-o. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'ai leh, yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ awˇ naˍ riˍ hk'e gaˬ peuˬ ve pa taw, oˇ ve teˇ nyi yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43001040	Yoˇhanˬ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Anˍdrehˍ yoˬ.
43001041	Yawˇ lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ paˍ Siˉmonˍ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ Meˍsiˉya‸ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. (Meˍsiˉya‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
43001042	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ viˉ paˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ geh shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ Siˉmonˍ hta‸ nyi leh, Nawˬ lehˬ Yoˇhanˬ ve yaˇ paˍ Siˉmonˍ yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ Keˍhpaˆ g'a meh tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. (Keˍhpaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, haˉ pui teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
43001043	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi, Yeˍsuˆ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai tuˬ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ htaˇ, Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001044	Hpiˇliˇpuˆ lehˬ, Anˍdrehˍ leh Peˍtruˆ ve chehˇ kuiˬ Behˇsehˇdaˆ venˇ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43001045	Hpiˇliˇpuˆ lehˬ, Naˍtaˍneˍlaˆ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Moˉseˍ bvuh‸ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn yawˇ hui bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ peuˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Yoˇseh‸ ve yaˇ, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001046	Naˍtaˍneˍlaˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Naˍzaˍrehˆ venˇ hk'aw lo da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ tawˆ la hpeh‸ tuˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Ca nyi la-o teh‸, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001047	Naˍtaˍneˍlaˆ yawˇ geh laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo heˍ ve a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw awˬ teh‸ awˬ na ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nyi-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43001048	Naˍtaˍneˍlaˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ le teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ kuˬ sheˍ htaˇ, maˉ nawˆ cehˬ awˬ hawˉ lo nawˬ chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ mawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001049	Naˍtaˍneˍlaˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ htawˇ nawˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001050	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˉ nawˆ cehˬ awˬ hawˉ lo mawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve pa taw nawˬ yonˍ ve laˇ. Chi a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ tuˬ sheˍ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43001051	Yeˍsuˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, mvuhˇ naw ma hpaw taˍ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ taˆ taˆ ya‸ ya‸ te chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ htaˇ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Kaˍnaˆ hk'aˆ awˬ hk'aw lo shu hkehˉ caˇ chehˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ e oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43002002	Yeˍsuˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ, hkehˉ caˇ kuiˬ lo laˬ tuˬ shu kuˬ ve yoˬ.
43002003	A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ peuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ e lehˬ, Yawˇ hui a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ maˇ cawˬ-oˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002004	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Ngaˬ ve awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002005	Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ e lehˬ, awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ tcuh laˇ ve hk'e te-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43002006	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ pon yehˇ tuˬ, oˇ kaˬ lo haˉ pui iˉ mvuhˇ k'oˍ hkaw‸ shiˍ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Iˉ mvuhˇ k'oˍ teˇ shiˍ ve hta‸, iˉ kaˆ nyiˇ taˆ shehˆ taˆ hk'e keu daw ve yoˬ.
43002007	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Iˉ mvuhˇ k'oˍ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ hk'a biˇ hk'o keu-o teh‸, awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui iˉ kaˆ hk'a biˇ keu ve yoˬ.
43002008	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi beu‸ nyiˉ veu leh, hkehˉ caˇ ve awˬ hoˉ hta‸ ca yuˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui ca yuˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002009	Hkehˉ caˇ ve awˬ hoˉ lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve hta‸ a ciˉ dawˬ nyi ve yoˬ. A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ chi hk'aˬ lo g'a ve leh naˍ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ. (Ya‸ hk'aˇ, iˉ kaˆ hk'o keu ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.) Oˇ htaˇ hkehˉ caˇ ve awˬ hoˉ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
43002010	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, da‸ ve a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ taw piˇ leh, shu hk'a bvuhˆ dawˬ peuˬ htaˇ heh‸, maˇ da‸ ve a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ taw piˇ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ lehˬ, da‸ ve a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ ve law teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43002011	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve awˬ heˆ chi teˇ maˬ hta‸ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Kaˍnaˆ hk'aˆ hk'aw te maˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
43002012	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ e, yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ lo ya‸-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui oˇ kaˬ lo hk'a‸ maw maw maˇ chehˇ.
43002013	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ te ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
43002014	Oˇ htaˇ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hkaw lo, yawˬ, nuˇ, aˉ pui k'aˍ teˇ hpaˍ hawˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hpu pa shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ oˇ kaˬ lo mui chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
43002015	Yawˇ lehˬ, aˉ caˆ hkeh hta‸ yuˬ leh jaw‸ tuˬ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˬ leh nuˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ tawˆ ve yoˬ. Hpu pa shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve hpu hta‸ ngeuˍ baˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve hpui lawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ ve yoˬ.
43002016	Aˉ pui k'aˍ hawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ, Mawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ k'ai-o. Ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve yehˬ hta‸ mawˇ hawˇ mawˇ vuiˬ kuiˬ yehˬ taˇ te teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002017	Nawˬ ve yehˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw hk'a biˇ biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ nawˇ ve yoˬ.
43002018	Oˇ htaˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ heˆ teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ te maˍ laˇ tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002019	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Bon yehˬ lonˉ chi hta‸ te luˬ-o‸. Shehˆ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ k'aw‸ te peuˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002020	Oˇ htaˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui k'oˆ ve, Bon yehˬ lonˉ chi hta‸ awˇ chi hkaw‸ hk'aw‸ g'a te ve yoˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ shehˆ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ k'aw‸ te peuˬ tuˬ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43002021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
43002022	Hk'e te leh, suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh, Li‸ hpu hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui yonˍ ve yoˬ.
43002023	Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ te chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ te maˍ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, chaw maˇ maˇ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
43002024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ to maˇ a‸ piˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43002025	Chaw yaˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e cawˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ taˍ ve pa taw, chaw yaˇ ve awˬ lawn chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ loˍ.
43003001	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo jawˇ mawˇ te ve, Niˆkawˇdeˍ meh ve Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43003002	Yawˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ haˉ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve saˍ la‸ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ te maˍ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ te maˇ g'a teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43003003	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ awˬ suhˉ teˇ pawˆ maˇ k'aw‸ paw la ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43003004	Niˆkawˇdeˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Mawˇ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te k'aw‸ paw la hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Yawˇ ve awˬ e g'oˇ peˬ hk'aw yawˇ k'aw‸ lo‸-e leh teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ paw la hpeh‸ tuˬ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ,
43003005	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ leh Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ paw la ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e.
43003006	Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ lo paw la ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu lo paw la ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ ha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43003007	Nawˬ hui awˬ suhˉ teˇ pawˆ g'a k'aw‸ paw la ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hta‸ taˇ anˇ.
43003008	Mvuhˇ haw lehˬ, hk'aˬ lo meuˆ k'ai gaˇ ve ka‸ meuˆ k'ai leh, awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ lo meuˆ laˬ leh naˍ, hk'aˬ lo meuˆ k'ai tuˬ leh naˍ, nawˬ maˇ shiˍ. Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo paw la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43003009	Niˆkawˇdeˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ hk'e te hpeh‸ g'a tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ,
43003010	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo saˍ la‸ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
43003011	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ leh, ngaˬ hui mawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ ha‸ yuˬ.
43003012	Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ngaˬ k'oˆ ve ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ yonˍ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te yonˍ tuˬ le.
43003013	Mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la ve chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo maˇ taˆ-e jaw.
43003014	Heh puiˉ hk'aw lo Moˉseˍ vuiˬ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ-e ve hk'e, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu htawˇ chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43003015	Yawˇ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ, yawˇ chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43003016	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hta‸ ha‸ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu tiˍ piˇ laˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Yaˇ hpu hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ g'a luˬ maˇ g'a sheˆ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
43003017	Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo peu laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw miˬ guiˬ yaˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yawˇ peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
43003018	Yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ. Maˇ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu tiˍ ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, chi beu‸ ka‸ suhˉ taˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ peuˬ.
43003019	Suhˉ taˆ ve chi lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo awˬ g'euˆ lo‸ la htawˇ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui awˬ haiˬ hta‸ te ve pa taw, awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ a‸ kehˉ yawˇ hui naˆ ho‸ ve hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
43003020	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ haiˬ hta‸ te ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ nyi bawˬ leh, yawˇ te ve teˇ hpaˍ maˇ g'a tawˆ la tuˬ, awˬ g'euˆ ba kuiˬ lo yawˇ maˇ laˬ.
43003021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ te ve teˇ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ cuˇ leh te ve teh‸ tawˆ la tuˬ, awˬ g'euˆ geh yawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ.
43003022	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ yawˇ hui geh oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ leh, shu hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43003023	Saˍlenˍ venˇ awˬ paˇ neˇ Ehˉnonˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ kaˬ lo iˉ kaˆ cawˬ maˇ ve pa taw, Yoˇhanˬ htawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo shu hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ oˇ kaˬ lo k'ai leh baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
43003024	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ htawnˍ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a geh sheˍ.
43003025	Oˇ htaˇ, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, da‸ tuˬ kehˬ tuˬ te ve awˬ liˇ awˬ lawn Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ geh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43003026	Yawˇ hui Yoˇhanˬ geh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ, nawˬ Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ lo chehˇ htaˇ nawˬ geh chehˇ jaw leh, nawˬ yawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, shu hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ chehˇ leh chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ geh k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43003027	Yoˇhanˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma lo yawˇ hta‸ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw yaˇ lehˬ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ g'a maˇ hpeh‸.
43003028	Ngaˬ Hkri‸ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ peu laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui awˬ to ngaˬ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43003029	Awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ tuˬ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ hta‸ g'a ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve pa taw ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ha lehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la peuˬ.
43003030	Yawˇ lehˬ, g'a uiˍ k'ai mvuh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ lehˬ, g'a i k'ai yawnˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43003031	Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ lawn ceh k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43003032	Yawˇ g'a mawˬ g'a kaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ.
43003033	Yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43003034	G'uiˬ sha peu laˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yaw ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Awˬ ha hpu piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, maˇ kawˬ maˇ tehˆ nyi leh piˇ ve yoˬ.
43003035	Awˬ pa lehˬ, Yaˇ hpu hta‸ ha‸ leh, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ la‸ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ.
43003036	Yaˇ hpu hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ hpu hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43004001	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ shu hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la piˇ leh baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ shu hta‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la piˇ leh baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve a‸ kehˉ maˇ ve hta‸ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
43004002	(Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ to shu hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui ceh tiˉ piˇ ve yoˬ.)
43004003	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ teh‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai ve yoˬ.
43004004	Yawˇ lehˬ Saˍmaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ g'a hpanˍ k'ai cawˇ ve yoˬ.
43004005	Hk'e te leh, Saˍmaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Suˇhkaˍ meh ve venˇ teˇ venˇ lo yawˇ gaˬ ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yaˍkoˆ yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ piˇ taˉ ve miˬ guiˬ teˇ peˆ hta‸ neˇ ve yoˬ.
43004006	Oˇ kaˬ lo Yaˍkoˆ ve nanˬ bawˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ ya‸ k'aw toˇ heuˬ ve pa taw, nanˬ bawˍ awˬ paˇ lo mui taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ teˇ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43004007	Saˍmaˍriˆ yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ iˉ kaˆ ca hk'o la ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ a ciˉ taw laˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004008	Oˇ ve teˇ hkui yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ hk'aw lo caˇ tuˬ ca vuiˬ k'ai peuˬ.
43004009	Saˍmaˍriˆ yaˇ miˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve ka‸, aˬ hto‸ ma te ngaˬ Saˍmaˍriˆ yaˇ miˇ geh iˉ kaˆ lawˬ dawˬ ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yuˇda‸ chaw leh Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw hui awˬ chawˇ maˇ te da‸ ve pa taw chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43004010	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha piˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Ngaˬ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ a ciˉ taw laˇ-oˆ teh‸ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve chaw hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ shiˍ ve hk'e k'o, nawˬ yawˇ geh lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ htawˇ nawˬ hta‸ co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ kaˆ taw laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004011	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ iˉ kaˆ nyiˉ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Nanˬ bawˍ chi naˉ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ kaˆ hta‸ nawˬ hk'aˬ lo g'a tuˬ le.
43004012	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Yaˍkoˆ lehˬ, nanˬ bawˍ chi ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to ka‸, yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸, yawˇ ve ceˇ caˬ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸, nanˬ bawˍ chi hta‸ dawˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ yawˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve leh laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004013	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Iˉ kaˆ chi hta‸ hk'a dawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ k'aw‸ shiˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
43004014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ piˇ ve iˉ kaˆ hta‸ hk'a dawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ iˉ kaˆ maˇ k'aw‸ shiˉ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ piˇ ve iˉ kaˆ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo co ti‸ ha ti‸ awˬ pon tawˆ la chehˇ ve g'uiˬ tuˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004015	Yaˇ miˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ iˉ kaˆ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ shiˉ tuˬ leh, choˬ kaˬ lo iˉ kaˆ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ hk'o la tuˬ, iˉ kaˆ oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ a ciˉ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004016	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Nawˬ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ ca kuˬ leh choˬ kaˬ k'aw‸ laˬ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ,
43004017	Ngaˬ awˬ hpawˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ awˬ hpawˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ nawˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
43004018	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ awˬ hpawˇ ngaˇ g'aˇ cawˬ jaw peuˬ leh, chi beu‸ nawˬ geh chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ nawˬ ve awˬ hpawˇ maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004019	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43004020	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hk'aw pui chi awˬ hk'oˆ lo oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ oˉ k'oˍ g'a pui tuˬ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004021	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yonˍ-o‸, Hk'aw pui chi teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ pa hta‸ nawˬ hui oˉ k'oˍ maˇ g'a ca k'aw‸ pui tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
43004022	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
43004023	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ma awˬ hk'aw leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ pa hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ g'a pui tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la chehˇ leh, chi beu‸ ka‸ gaˬ la peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ pa lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ oˇ hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
43004024	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ awˬ ha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw hui lehˬ, nyi ma awˬ hk'aw leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo oˉ k'oˍ g'a pui ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004025	Yaˇ miˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Meˍsiˉya‸ laˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le k'oˆ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. (Meˍsiˉya‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
43004026	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw chehˇ ve ngaˬ lehˬ, yawˇ yoˬ teh‸ yaˇ miˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004027	Oˇ ve teˇ hkui yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, yaˇ miˇ geh yawˇ tawˇ yaw chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui anˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma heuˆ gaˇ ve le. Aˬ hto‸ ma te yawˇ geh nawˬ tawˇ yaw chehˇ ve le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ na nyi.
43004028	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ve iˉ kaˆ mu‸ hk'u hta‸ teh taˉ leh, venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e leh venˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
43004029	Ngaˬ hk'a te jaw ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hto laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ca nyi la-o. Yawˇ lehˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve leh naˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004030	Yawˇ hui venˇ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai leh Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
43004031	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ, caˇ tuˬ a ciˉ caˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
43004032	Yawˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve caˇ tuˬ ngaˬ geh cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004033	Hk'e te leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ caˇ tuˬ laˬ caˍ piˇ leh naˍ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ na da‸ ve yoˬ.
43004034	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ te leh, yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te peuˬ tuˬ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ ve caˇ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43004035	Ha pa awˍ lehˇ gaˬ k'o, caˬ g'eu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, heh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chiˇ nyi-o. Chi beuˬ ka‸ caˬ g'eu‸ tuˬ caˬ meh la leh shiˉ-ehˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
43004036	Caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, g'aˇ hpfuhˇ g'a leh, co ti‸ ha ti‸ awˬ pon awˬ shiˍ shaw keu ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ti shehˍ hpaˇ leh g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ geh g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43004037	Teˇ g'aˇ ti leh teˇ g'aˇ g'eu‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, chi hta‸ cawˇ da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
43004038	Nawˬ hui kanˉ maˇ te kuiˬ lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ caˬ ca g'eu‸ tcuh ve yoˬ. Shu kanˉ te taˍ leh, yawˇ hui te taˍ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lo‸-e peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004039	Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Ngaˬ hk'a te jaw ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
43004040	Hk'e te leh, Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui geh chehˇ tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve pa taw, yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo nyiˇ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43004041	Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw laiˉ g'aˇ htawˇ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
43004042	Yawˇ hui lehˬ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw ceh ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui awˬ to yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh, chaw chi lehˬ miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43004043	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ kaˬ lo nyiˇ nyi chehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
43004044	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ awˬ to shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
43004045	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo pawehˇ awˬ hk'aw k'ai leh, pawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hk'a te ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve pa taw yoˬ.
43004046	Hk'e te leh, iˉ kaˆ hta‸ a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hpeh‸ la piˇ lawˬ ve teˇ kaˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Kaˍnaˆ hk'aˆ hk'aw lo yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ gaˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ ve yaˇ paˍ naˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43004047	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo tu leh Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ la ve awˬ lawn hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ suh la paˇ neˇ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ laˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
43004048	Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui awˬ heˆ leh anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui te‸ chiˉ maˇ yonˍ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004049	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve yaˇ maˇ suh sheˍ htaˇ a ciˉ laˬ-o‸ teh‸, jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004050	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, K'o‸-e loˬ. Nawˬ ve yaˇ pa na-e la peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yonˍ leh k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
43004051	Yawˇ k'o‸-e chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ la leh, Nawˬ ve yaˇ paˍ na-e la peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004052	Hk'e te leh, Yawˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ yanˇ tanˬ na-e la ve le teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Aˉ nyi mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ teˇ naˍ riˍ htaˇ, yawˇ kaˆ naˬ ve na-e la ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43004053	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Nawˬ ve yaˇ paˍ na-e la peuˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve awˬ yanˇ hta‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ awˬ pa shiˍ leh, yawˇ awˬ to ka‸ yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ ka‸ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ la ve yoˬ.
43004054	Awˬ heˆ chi lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo tu leh Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ te ve awˬ heˆ nyiˇ ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43005001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui pawehˇ te ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la leh, Yeˍsuˆ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
43005002	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw, yawˬ taˍ meu‸ hpe‸ awˬ paˇ lo, Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ Beˍteˍsaˍdaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve g'uiˬ po teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ po oˇ ve awˬ jaˇ lo aˉ po k'o ngaˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43005003	Aˉ po k'o oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo naˬ ve chaw, mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw, hkui luˬ ve chaw leh hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw maˇ maˇ zuh‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43005004	Awˬ yanˇ awˬ yanˇ k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ la leh iˉ kaˆ hta‸ hiˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ hiˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ g'a lo‸-e ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ naˬ ve a naˍ hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, na-e la ve yoˬ.
43005005	Shehˆ chi hiˉ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ naˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43005006	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ naˬ maw jaˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ chehˇ sha la gaˇ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43005007	Chaw naˬ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, iˉ kaˆ hiˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ yuˬ keu laˇ tuˬ ve chaw maˇ cawˬ. Ngaˬ ya‸-e chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo‸-e ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43005008	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Tu loˬ. Nawˬ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ yuˬ leh k'ai-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43005009	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ na-e la leh, yawˇ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ yuˬ leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
43005010	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi lehˬ, shinˉ nyi hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, na-e la ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ya‸ nyi lehˬ shinˉ nyi yoˬ. Nawˬ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ yuˬ k'ai ve lehˬ maˇ cawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43005011	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ gu na-e laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ yuˬ leh k'ai-o teh‸ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43005012	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ yuˬ leh k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve chaw a shu le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43005013	Na-e la ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ gu na-e laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ a shu leh naˍ maˇ shiˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, oˇ kaˬ lo chaw chehˇ maˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ.
43005014	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Nawˬ chehˇ sha la peuˬ. Chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, venˇ baˆ taˇ k'aw‸ te teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43005015	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ k'ai leh, Ngaˬ hta‸ gu na-e laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
43005016	Shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ oˇ hk'e te ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ ve yoˬ.
43005017	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ Awˬ pa lehˬ, chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawˇ kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43005018	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ shinˉ nyi hta‸ te luˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˇ ve Awˬ pa teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ G'uiˬ sha hk'a shuˍ shuˍ taˍ ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh g'a tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ leuˉ leh ca ve yoˬ.
43005019	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, Yaˇ hpu lehˬ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e te‸ chiˉ ka‸ te maˇ g'a. Awˬ pa te chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve hk'e ceh tiˉ yawˇ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ pa hk'a te ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ Yaˇ hpu htawˇ te ve yoˬ.
43005020	Awˬ pa lehˬ, Yaˇ hpu hta‸ ha‸ leh, yawˇ awˬ to hk'a te ve hk'a peu-eˬ Yaˇ hpu hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui g'a anˇ jaˇ tuˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ Yaˇ hpu hta‸ yawˇ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43005021	Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ pa lehˬ suh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ lawˬ ve hk'e, Yaˇ hpu htawˇ yawˇ te‸ la piˇ gaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te‸ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
43005022	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ Awˬ pa hta‸ yawˆ yan ve hk'e Yaˇ hpu hta‸ htawˇ yawˆ yan tuˬ, Awˬ pa lehˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ suhˉ maˇ jehˬ. Suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ Yaˇ hpu hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ.
43005023	Yaˇ hpu hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ, Awˬ pa hta‸ htawˇ maˇ yawˆ yan ve yoˬ.
43005024	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ cawˬ taˍ peuˬ. Suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ g'a hkanˍ. Suh ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ponˬ tawˆ-e leh, te‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e peuˬ.
43005025	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, suh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ tuˬ awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la chehˇ leh, chi beu‸ ka‸ gaˬ la peuˬ. G'a kaˇ ve chaw hui htawˇ co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
43005026	Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ pa awˬ hk'aw lo co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Yaˇ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ tuˬ Awˬ pa a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43005027	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ lehˬ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve pa taw, suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ ve kanˇ paˆ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43005028	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ taˇ anˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh tawˆ la tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
43005029	Da‸ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, co ha te‸ ve awˬ pon k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ. Haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ awˬ pon k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ.
43005030	Ngaˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ ngaˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e te‸ chiˉ ka‸ te maˇ g'a. Ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve hk'e ceh ngaˬ suhˉ jehˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ suhˉ jehˬ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve a loˍ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ te. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ te ve yoˬ.
43005031	Ngaˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ to awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ lehˬ maˇ cawˇ.
43005032	Ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve lehˬ, cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43005033	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ geh shu hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43005034	Chaw yaˇ lo laˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
43005035	Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ leh awˬ g'euˆ ba chehˇ ve kawˆ faiˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ yanˇ ha lehˬ tuˬ nyi ma cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43005036	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ cawˬ taˍ ve shaˉ hkiˆ lehˬ, Yoˇhanˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te tuˬ Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ te tcuh laˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ ka‸ kanˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ te chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43005037	Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa htawˇ, ngaˬ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ kaˇ jaw. Yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui maˇ mawˬ jaw.
43005038	Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ htawˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ peu laˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ yonˍ.
43005039	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ ve pa taw, Li‸ hpu hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ ca hpeu‸ nyi g'aw nyi ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
43005040	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui co ha te‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ geh laˬ tuˬ nawˬ hui nyi ma maˇ cawˬ.
43005041	Chaw yaˇ piˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ.
43005042	G'uiˬ sha ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43005043	Ngaˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ a shu yawˇ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43005044	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ piˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ leh, teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve G'uiˬ sha piˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ maˇ ca ve nawˬ hui lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te yonˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
43005045	Awˬ pa mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ laˇ tuˬ ve teh‸ taˇ dawˇ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui g'aˇ va taˍ ve Moˉseˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43005046	Moˉseˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui yonˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43005047	Yawˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ yonˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te yonˍ tuˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Tiˍbeˍriˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Gaˍliˍlehˇ g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo hkanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
43006002	Naˬ ve gawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ te ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
43006003	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e leh, oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
43006004	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ te tuˬ awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
43006005	Yeˍsuˆ chiˇ nyi leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ geh laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw chi ma ve g'a caˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui hkaoˍ monˇ hk'aˬ lo ca vuiˬ tuˬ le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43006006	Yawˇ chi hk'e na nyi ve lehˬ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve ceh yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te tuˬ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ awˬ to shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43006007	Hpiˇliˇpuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi ma ve hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ g'aˇ teˇ hk'eh‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ, hpu nyiˇ ha hteh‸ hpfuhˇ vuiˬ ve htawˇ maˇ law‸ taˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006008	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Anˍdrehˍ k'oˆ ve,
43006009	Cho‸ te taˍ ve hkaoˍ monˇ ngaˇ diˬ leh ngaˇ ehˉ nyiˇ hkeh cawˬ ve yaˇ paˍ ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ choˬ kaˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi ma ve awˬ pon chi teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le teh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006010	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mui tcuh-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo mvuh‸ de hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, oˇ kaˬ lo mui taˍ ve chaw, hawˉ hk'aˆ ceh tiˉ ngaˇ hinˉ g'aˇ hk'e cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43006011	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ leh, bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mui chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˇ shaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui caˇ gaˇ ve hk'e pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006012	Yawˇ hui hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Te‸ chiˉ maˇ g'a mehˉ k'ai tuˬ, caˇ leuˉ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'awˆ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006013	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ g'awˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, cho‸ te taˍ ve hkaoˍ monˇ ngaˇ diˬ hta‸ caˇ leuˉ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ, teˇ chi nyiˇ hk'awˍ lawˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
43006014	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ te ve awˬ heˆ chi hta‸ chaw chi ma ve g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Chaw chi lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo laˬ tuˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43006015	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ nyiˉ te tcuh-a teh‸ dawˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo k'aw‸ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
43006016	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'uiˬ po lo ya‸-e leh,
43006017	haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ lo hkanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ teˇ hkui mehˆ muiˉ naˆ jaˇ peuˬ ve ka‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui geh maˇ gaˬ la sheˍ.
43006018	Mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ jaˇ leh, g'uiˬ baˇ taˆ la ve yoˬ.
43006019	Yawˇ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ shehˆ laˆ awˇ laˆ hk'e g'awˆ k'ai peuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'oˆ lo ya‸ k'aw juˇ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ paˇ lo laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ htaˇ kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
43006020	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ yoˬ, taˇ kawˆ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006021	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ lehˬ yawˇ hui k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ kaˬ lo teˇ cawˬ haˉ gaˬ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
43006022	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi g'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo chehˇ taˉ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, aˉ nyi htaˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ehˉ teˇ maˬ ceh tiˉ cawˬ taˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ lo‸-e leh, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ k'ai ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
43006023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Tiˍbeˍriˆ venˇ lo laˬ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui hkaoˍ monˇ g'a caˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
43006024	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ oˇ kaˬ lo maˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui ciˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
43006025	G'uiˬ po coˇ paˉ lo yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ, nawˬ choˬ kaˬ lo hk'aˬ htaˆ laˬ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43006026	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve pa taw ngaˬ hta‸ ca ve maˇ heˆ. Hkaoˍ monˇ hk'a bvuhˆ g'a caˇ ve pa taw ceh nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ.
43006027	Luˬ puiˉ sheˆ puiˉ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon g'aˇ hte‸ taˇ te. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon g'aˇ hte‸ te-o. Caˇ tuˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon yeˬ ve caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha lehˬ chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006028	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ te tuˬ, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ,
43006029	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, yawˇ peu laˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006030	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh nawˬ hta‸ g'a yonˍ tuˬ, nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ heˆ te maˍ laˇ ve le.
43006031	Nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma kanˉ te maˍ laˇ ve le. Awˬ puˍ aw‸ pi teˇ hpaˍ g'a caˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, mvuhˇ naw ma ve hkaoˍ monˇ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo maˍnaˆ shi hta‸ g'a caˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006032	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ teh‸ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, mvuhˇ naw ma ve hkaoˍ monˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ Moˉseˍ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve mvuhˇ naw ma ve hkaoˍ monˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ ngaˬ Awˬ pa yoˬ.
43006033	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve hkaoˍ monˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la leh, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006034	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006035	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ geh laˬ ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ k'aw‸ meu‸-o. Ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ shiˉ-o.
43006036	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ mawˬ ve htawˇ maˇ yonˍ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ.
43006037	Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a pe‸ laˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, ngaˬ geh laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ geh laˬ ve chaw hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ chiˇ baˬ.
43006038	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve lehˬ, ngaˬ ve a loˍ hta‸ te tuˬ ya‸ la ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ ya‸ la ve yoˬ.
43006039	Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve a loˍ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a pe‸ laˇ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a mehˉ k'ai leh, awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43006040	Yaˇ hpu hta‸ mawˬ leh yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ Awˬ pa a loˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006041	Ngaˬ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve hkaoˍ monˇ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca beu ca hk'aiˉ ve yoˬ.
43006042	Chaw chi lehˬ, Yoˇseh‸ ve yaˇ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ maˇ heˆ laˇ. Yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ngaˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve yoˬ teh‸, chi beu‸ yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43006043	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ taˇ beu taˇ hk'aiˉ .
43006044	Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa lehˬ, shu hta‸ ngaˬ geh lo maˇ g'awˬ veu laˇ ve k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ geh laˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Ngaˬ geh g'awˬ veu laˇ ve chaw hta‸ awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43006045	G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ pa geh hk'a g'a kaˇ leh hk'a g'a henˇ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, ngaˬ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
43006046	Chaw teˇ g'a ka‸ Awˬ pa hta‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw. G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ Awˬ pa hta‸ mawˬ jaw ve yoˬ.
43006047	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43006048	Ngaˬ lehˬ, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43006049	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo maˍnaˆ shiˍ hta‸ g'a caˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui suh ve yoˬ.
43006050	Hkaoˍ monˇ chi hta‸ g'a caˇ ve chaw maˇ g'a suh tuˬ, hkaoˍ monˇ chi lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve yoˬ.
43006051	Ngaˬ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hkaoˍ monˇ chi hta‸ g'a caˇ ve chaw lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ co ha te‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ ve awˬ pon, ngaˬ piˇ tuˬ ve hkaoˍ monˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ shaˍ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006052	Hk'e te leh, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ shaˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te caˍ laˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43006053	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ maˇ caˇ leh yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ maˇ dawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ.
43006054	Ngaˬ ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˇ leh ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ dawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43006055	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ shaˍ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na caˇ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ htawˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na dawˬ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43006056	Ngaˬ ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˇ leh ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ dawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43006057	Te‸ chehˇ ve Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ te‸ chehˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hta‸ caˇ ve chaw htawˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw co ha te‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43006058	Hkaoˍ monˇ chi lehˬ, awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui g'a caˇ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a caˇ ve htawˇ suh ve yoˬ. Hkaoˍ monˇ chi lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve yoˬ. Hkaoˍ monˇ chi hta‸ caˇ ve chaw lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006059	Kaˍpeˍneˍonˍ venˇ lo cawˬ ve bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43006060	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui laiˉ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Tawˇ chi lehˬ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. A shu na hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43006061	Awˬ lawn chi yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ ca beu ca hk'aiˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Tawˇ chi ve hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui nyi ma luˬ ve leh laˇ.
43006062	Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ chehˇ jaw kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ taˆ k'o‸-e chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ tuˬ ve le.
43006063	Co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ ha yoˬ. Awˬ shaˍ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ te maˇ g'a. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ ha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43006064	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ maˇ yonˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ a shu hpeh‸ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ a shu hpeh‸ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ Yeˍsuˆ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43006065	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te leh ngaˬ Awˬ pa a hkaw-anˬ maˇ piˇ ve k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ geh laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ taˍ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43006066	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ laiˉ g'aˇ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'o‸-e leh yawˇ geh maˇ k'aw‸ te toˇ ve yoˬ.
43006067	Nawˬ hui htawˇ k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ ve laˇ teh‸, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43006068	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui a shu geh k'ai tuˬ ve le. Nawˬ lehˬ co ti‸ ha ti‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43006069	Nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ kehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ taˍ leh shiˍ taˍ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006070	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, neˇ haiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43006071	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Siˉmonˍ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ ve yaˇ Yuˇda‸ hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43007001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca chehˇ ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˇ k'ai.
43007002	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui Aˉ po k'o pawehˇ te ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
43007003	Yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai-o.
43007004	Awˬ lawn k'o, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ meh bvuhˬ k'ai tuˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, baˬ kuiˬ lo yawˇ te‸ chiˉ maˇ te. Kanˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ te ve k'o, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ nawˬ awˬ to hk'a tawˍ lehˆ maˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007005	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ.
43007006	Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
43007007	Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ maˇ hpeh‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ canˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui te ve kanˉ lehˬ haiˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve pa taw yoˬ.
43007008	Pawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui k'ai-o. Ngaˬ ve awˬ yanˇ hk'a deh‸ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ve pa taw, pawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ maˇ k'ai sheˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007009	Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ piˇ peuˬ leh, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
43007010	Yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ pawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ htawˇ shu hta‸ maˇ mawˬ tcuh leh ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
43007011	Pawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ca leh, Yawˇ hk'aˬ lo chehˇ le teh‸ na nyi da‸ ve yoˬ.
43007012	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˬ lawn tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yawˇ chaw da‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yawˇ chaw da‸ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Chaw chi ma ve hta‸ ya‸ k'aw sheh ya‸ chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43007013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ lawn hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ maˇ haˆ.
43007014	Pawehˇ oˇ ve te leh awˬ k'aw ji hk'eun la ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo taˆ-e leh maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007015	Hk'e te leh Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ anˇ leh, Chaw chi lehˬ li‸ maˇ henˇ jaw ve ka‸, hk'aˬ hk'e te chi taw taw shiˍ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43007016	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43007017	G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ te gaˇ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ chi, G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve leh naˍ, maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve leh naˍ, yawˇ shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43007018	A shu yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ pon awˬ me‸ awˇ hponˇ ca ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ pon awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ ca ve chaw lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo heˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ.
43007019	Moˉseˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ pe‸ laˇ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ na yuˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca ve le teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007020	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ neˇ geh ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ a shu ca ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43007021	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˇ ve, Ngaˬ kanˉ teˇ maˬ te leh, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ ve yoˬ.
43007022	Moˉseˍ lehˬ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve awˬ liˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. (Awˬ tehˬ k'oˆ k'o, Moˉseˍ geh awˉ lawˉ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ geh awˉ lawˉ laˬ ve yoˬ.) Shinˉ nyi htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui chaw hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007023	Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a te luˬ tuˬ, shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸ chaw yaˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ piˇ ve law k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ ve laˇ.
43007024	Nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ceh nyi leh suhˉ jehˬ ve taˇ te. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ suhˉ jehˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007025	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hui tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca chehˇ ve lehˬ, chaw chi hpaˇ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
43007026	Nyi sheˍ. Yawˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve ka‸, shu yawˇ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'oˆ. Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na shiˍ ve leh naˍ.
43007027	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi hpaˇ hk'aˬ lo tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hk'aˬ lo tawˆ la tuˬ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ shiˍ tuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43007028	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ yawˇ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˬ lo tawˆ la ve hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ laˬ gaˇ leh laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ.
43007029	Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ yawˇ geh lo laˬ leh, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43007030	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ve pa taw, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ ca hpeh yuˬ.
43007031	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Hkri‸ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ te ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ yawˇ te tuˬ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43007032	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn k'oˆ da‸ g'awˬ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ tuˬ bon yehˬ lonˉ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
43007033	Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ hkui teˇ yanˇ chehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ geh lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
43007034	Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ca tuˬ yoˬ. Ca ve htawˇ mawˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo nawˬ hui laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007035	Hk'e te leh Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ da‸ ve, Ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yawˇ hk'aˬ lo k'ai tuˬ ve le. Hpaˆ da‸ leh Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui geh ca chehˇ k'ai peuˬ ve chaw hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai leh, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ ca maˍ piˇ tuˬ ve laˇ.
43007036	Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ca tuˬ yoˬ. Ca ve htawˇ mawˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo nawˬ hui laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ gaˇ ve leh naˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43007037	Pawehˇ te ve awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ nyi, awˬ nyi uiˍ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, Yeˍsuˆ huˉ taˍ leh kuˬ ve, Iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve chaw cawˬ k'o, ngaˬ geh ca dawˬ la-o.
43007038	Ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ kaˆ lawˬ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la leh yoˬ ya‸-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43007039	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw hui g'a tuˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a sheˍ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Awˬ ha hpu maˇ pe‸ laˇ sheˍ.
43007040	Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Chi teˇ g'aˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na G'uiˬ sha ve tcuhˍ kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43007041	Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Hkri‸ lehˬ Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la tuˬ laˇ.
43007042	Hkri‸ lehˬ Daˍviˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ leh Daˍviˆ ve chehˇ kuiˬ Behˍlehˍhehnˍ hk'aˆ lo tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43007043	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ pa taw chaw chi ma ve nyi ma maˇ hawˍ da‸.
43007044	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ ca hpeh yuˬ.
43007045	Oˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui geh k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yuˬ laˬ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ,
43007046	bon yehˬ lonˉ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˍ piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ maˍ piˇ jaw teh‸ k'oˇ ve yoˬ.
43007047	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ heˍ g'a peuˬ laˇ.
43007048	Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ laˇ.
43007049	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007050	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh laˬ jaw ve Niˆkawˇdeˍ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve,
43007051	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a kaˇ leh yawˇ te ve hta‸ maˇ g'a shiˍ ve ceh ceh, yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43007052	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ htawˇ Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Nawˬ hk'a deh‸ chaˬ nyi sheˍ. Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ tawˆ la ve hta‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43007053	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
43008001	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Shaˍlonˍ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
43008002	Mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ mui taˍ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008003	Haˉ chawˇ te chehˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ yuˬ veu laˇ leh awˬ k'aw ji lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
43008004	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, yaˇ miˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ haˉ chawˇ te chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
43008005	Chi hk'e ve chaw hta‸ haˉ pui g'a baˬ pehˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Moˉseˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008006	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ lehˍ te leh, miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ ve la‸ naw bvuh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43008007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ na nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hteˇ lehˍ k'aw‸ te leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, haˉ pui yuˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ baˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008008	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ lehˍ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ te leh, miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ lo la‸ naw k'aw‸ bvuh‸ ve yoˬ.
43008009	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, shu a‸ kehˉ mawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tanˬ leh teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ chehˇ taˍ leh, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve htawˇ awˬ k'aw ji lo huˉ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
43008010	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hteˇ lehˍ k'aw‸ te leh k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, yawˇ hui hk'aˬ lo k'ai peuˬ le. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ ciˍ yanˍ laˇ leh laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008011	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ ciˍ yanˍ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ ciˍ yanˍ. K'ai loˬ. Venˇ baˆ taˇ k'aw‸ te teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008012	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ ve chaw lehˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'aw‸ k'ai. Co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ yawˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008013	Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ nawˬ awˬ to awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ lehˬ, maˇ cawˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008014	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ to awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve leh hk'aˬ lo k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve leh hk'aˬ lo k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ shiˍ.
43008015	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ ceh nyi leh suhˉ jehˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ suhˉ maˇ jehˬ.
43008016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ suhˉ jehˬ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ suhˉ jehˬ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa lehˬ ngaˬ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43008017	Shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve k'o, shaˉ hkiˆ oˇ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43008018	Ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ to awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa htawˇ, ngaˬ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008019	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui k'oˇ ve, Nawˬ Awˬ pa hk'aˬ lo le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ shiˍ. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ shiˍ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008020	Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, hpu shaw kuiˬ bawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ve pa taw, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ hpeh yuˬ.
43008021	Teˇ pawˆ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ca tuˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'ai kuiˬ lo nawˬ hui laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008022	Hk'e te leh Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ k'ai kuiˬ lo nawˬ hui laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43008023	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ lo laˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ na hpawˇ lo laˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ chi hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ chi hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
43008024	Nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui maˇ yonˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008025	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ a shu le. Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ chehˇ ve hk'e yoˬ.
43008026	Nawˬ hui awˬ lawn ngaˬ k'oˆ leh suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, hteˇ jaˇ cawˇ jaˇ leh, yawˇ geh lo ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve hk'e miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008027	Awˬ pa awˬ lawn yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
43008028	Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ nawˬ hui chiˇ taˆ-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ a loˍ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ te. Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve hk'e ceh ngaˬ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43008029	Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ geh teˇ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ g'a chehˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ baˬ taˉ laˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43008030	Tawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ yaw ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ la ve yoˬ.
43008031	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui chehˇ yeˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43008032	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008033	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, shu ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a te jaw. Nawˬ hui hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008034	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, venˇ baˆ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, venˇ baˆ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43008035	Awˬ ceˬ lehˬ, aˉ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ g'a chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ g'a chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43008036	Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a ponˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43008037	Nawˬ hui lehˬ Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca ve yoˬ.
43008038	Ngaˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa geh lo g'a mawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui htawˇ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ pa geh lo g'a kaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008039	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui lehˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'e k'o, Aˍbraˍhanˍ te ve hk'a suhˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui htawˇ te tuˬ yoˬ.
43008040	Ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha geh lo g'a kaˇ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ca ve yoˬ. Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ chi hk'e maˇ te.
43008041	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ pa te ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ leh, yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008042	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve hk'e k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha geh lo tawˆ la leh laˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ laˬ gaˇ leh laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
43008043	Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui na maˇ g'a ve le. Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui na yuˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw yoˬ.
43008044	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ pa neˇ haiˬ geh lo laˬ leh, nawˬ hui ve awˬ pa a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e te gaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ chehˇ maˇ g'a. Yawˇ heˍ ve tawˇ hta‸ yaw ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve hk'e yaw ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ heˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, heˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ve awˬ pa htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43008045	Ngaˬ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hta‸ yaw ve pa taw nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ.
43008046	Ngaˬ venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo a shu hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ g'a tuˬ le. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ yaw ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve le.
43008047	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ na teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008048	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, neˇ geh ve chaw htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve lehˬ, cawˇ ve yoˬ, maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008049	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ neˇ geh ve chaw maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa hta‸ yawˆ yan ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan.
43008050	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ca ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ca shehˍ hpaˇ leh suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43008051	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te k'ai ve chaw lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a suh teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008052	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ neˇ geh ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ peuˬ. Aˍbraˍhanˍ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ suh peuˬ. Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te k'ai ve chaw lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a suh teh‸ nawˬ k'oˆ ve law leˇ.
43008053	Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve leh laˇ. Yawˇ lehˬ suh peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ suh peuˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ a shu hk'e te ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008054	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ te ve k'o, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ oˇ ve hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ pe‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ nawˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43008055	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ. Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ heˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ leh, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ na yuˬ ve yoˬ.
43008056	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ g'a mawˬ peuˬ leh ha lehˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43008057	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ a sha‸ ngaˇ chi hk'aw‸ ka‸ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ. Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ nawˬ mawˬ jaw leh laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008058	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, Aˍbraˍhanˍ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ cawˬ taˍ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43008059	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ baˬ tuˬ ve haˉ pui shiˍ g'awˆ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ va‸ sheˬ leh bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
43009001	Yeˍsuˆ ya‸ k'aw k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, paw la htaˇ ka‸ mehˆ cuˉ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
43009002	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ. chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ paw la htaˇ ka‸ mehˆ cuˉ taˍ ve lehˬ, a shu ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw le. Yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw laˇ. Awˬ pa awˬ e ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43009003	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Awˬ pa awˬ e ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ chi hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43009004	Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw htaˇ ngaˬ hui g'a te ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ kanˉ te maˇ hpeh‸ ve mvuhˇ hpeu‸ awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
43009005	Ngaˬ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ sheˍ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43009006	Chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ ciˉ g'uiˇ hpe‸ pfuhˍ leh je‸ nehˆ te sheˬ leh, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ shehˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009007	Siˉlonˍ g'uiˬ po lo k'ai leh tsuhˇ baˬ-o‸ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. (Siˉlonˍ k'oˆ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, K'ai tcuh peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.) Hk'e te leh yawˇ k'ai leh ca tsuhˇ baˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ mehˆ mawˬ la leh k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ.
43009008	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve yehˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve chaw hui leh yawˇ lawˬ leh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve chaw hui k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ mui taˍ leh lawˬ leh‸ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43009009	Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ yoˬ. Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ ngaˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43009010	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te k'o, nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aˬ hk'e te mawˬ la ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43009011	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yeˍsuˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ je‸ nehˆ te leh, ngaˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ shehˍ laˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Siˉlonˍ g'uiˬ po lo k'ai leh tsuhˇ baˬ-o‸ teh‸ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ ca tsuhˇ hk'a ve teˇ yanˇ mehˆ mawˬ la ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009012	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hk'aˬ lo k'ai le teh‸ chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009013	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mehˆ cuˉ jaw ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
43009014	Yeˍsuˆ je‸ nehˆ te leh yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ mawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve teˇ nyi lehˬ, shinˉ nyi hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43009015	Yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hk'aˬ hk'e te mawˬ la ve awˬ lawn Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ yawˇ je‸ nehˆ shehˍ laˇ leh, ngaˬ ca tsuhˇ baˬ ve teˇ yanˇ mehˆ mawˬ la ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009016	Hk'e te leh, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Chaw oˇ ve hpaˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, shinˉ nyi htaˇ yawˇ maˇ ce maˇ kan teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chi hk'e ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh te g'a tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ dawˇ hk'aˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43009017	Mehˆ cuˉ jaw ve chaw hta‸ yawˇ hui teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ mawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009018	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mehˆ mawˬ la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ maˇ kuˬ na sheˍ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ mehˆ cuˉ leh awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ mehˆ mawˬ la ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ.
43009019	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ ve yaˇ paˍ yoˬ laˇ. Paw la htaˇ ka‸ mehˆ cuˉ ve teh‸ nawˬ huiˉ maˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, chi teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ laˇ. Hk'e te k'o, chi beu‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ mehˆ mawˬ la ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43009020	Yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hpeh‸ leh, paw la htaˇ ka‸ mehˆ cuˉ paˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43009021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh yawˇ mehˆ mawˬ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ maˇ shiˍ. Yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ a shu mawˬ la piˇ ve hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ maˇ shiˍ. Yawˇ hta‸ na nyi-o. Yawˇ uiˍ la peuˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ to awˬ lawn yawˇ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009022	Yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ tawˆ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ jehˬ cheˆ taˍ peuˬ.
43009023	Chi hta‸ pa taw, awˬ pa awˬ e k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ uiˍ la peuˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ na nyi-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009024	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui lehˬ, mehˆ cuˉ jaw ve chaw hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ kuˬ veu laˇ leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ceh tiˉ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009025	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ venˇ baˆ yaˇ leh naˍ, maˇ heˆ leh naˍ, ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ. Teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ngaˬ mehˆ cuˉ ve ka‸, chi beu‸ ngaˬ mehˆ mawˬ la peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009026	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te laˇ ve le. Nawˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te mawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43009027	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ya‸ sheh htaˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ ve ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ na. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ kaˇ gaˇ sheˍ le. Nawˬ hui htawˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la gaˇ leh laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009028	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ leh, Nawˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, Moˉseˍ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43009029	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Moˉseˍ hta‸ tawˇ yaw piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi hpaˇ hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43009030	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ ngaˬ ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ mawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve lehˬ, anˇ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43009031	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan leh yawˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ te ve k'o, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ shaˬ na yuˬ ve yoˬ.
43009032	Mvuhˇ kawˍ miˬ ya‸ htaˇ ka‸ tanˬ leh ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ, paw la htaˇ ka‸ mehˆ cuˉ taˍ ve chaw hta‸ shu mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ kaˇ jaw.
43009033	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ te maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009034	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ venˇ baˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo paw la ve ka‸, nawˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'a‸ tawˆ ve yoˬ.
43009035	Chaw oˇ ve hta‸ shu g'a‸ tawˆ ve awˬ lawn Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ ca mawˬ htaˇ, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ nawˬ yonˍ ve laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43009036	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a yonˍ tuˬ, chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu a shu le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43009037	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw chehˇ ve lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43009038	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
43009039	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Mehˆ maˇ mawˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, mehˆ mawˬ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, mehˆ mawˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, mehˆ cuˉ k'ai tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ awˬ pon miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43009040	Yawˇ awˬ paˇ lo chehˇ taˍ ve Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Ngaˬ hui htawˇ mehˆ cuˉ paˍ hpeh‸ ve laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43009041	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui mehˆ cuˉ paˍ hpeh‸ tehˬ ve hk'e k'o, venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Ngaˬ hui mehˆ mawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ cawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43010001	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, yawˬ hkawˆ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸ la htaˇ, yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ lo maˇ lo‸ la leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ hk'aˇ lo ca taˆ lo‸ la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ chaw naˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43010002	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ lo lo‸ la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˬ hawˉ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43010003	Yehˬ miˉ shaw shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ yehˬ miˉ hpaw piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ meh hta‸ kuˬ leh, yawˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ sheh tawˆ-e ve yoˬ.
43010004	Yawˇ ve yawˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ sheh tawˆ-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo yawˇ k'ai leh, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
43010005	Yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ da‸ ve chaw hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, chaw oˇ hk'e ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh yawˇ hui maˇ k'ai ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸ hpaw-e ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010006	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, tawˇ pa haˉ chi yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ lawn k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
43010007	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ lehˬ yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ lo‸ la tuˬ ve yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ yoˬ.
43010008	Ngaˬ maˇ laˬ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hk'a laˬ peuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ chaw naˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na.
43010009	Ngaˬ lehˬ, yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸ la ve chaw lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, tawˆ tawˆ lo‸ lo‸ te leh, k'aˆ caˇ kuiˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43010010	Chaw hk'awˇ lehˬ, hk'awˇ yuˬ tuˬ, tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ leh, te luˬ tuˬ awˬ pon ceh laˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ a sha‸ g'a te‸ tuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, a sha‸ te‸ ve oˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
43010011	Ngaˬ lehˬ da‸ ve yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, g'aˇ hpfuhˇ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ maˇ heˆ leh, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ ve maˇ heˆ ve pa taw, veˬ laˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh hpaw-e ve yoˬ. Veˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ che‸ leh hpaˆ da‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
43010013	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, g'aˇ hpfuhˇ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ceh hpeh‸ leh, yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon te‸ chiˉ maˇ dawˇ nyi ve pa taw, yawˇ hpaw-e ve yoˬ.
43010014	Ngaˬ lehˬ da‸ ve yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ yoˬ. Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ shiˍ leh, ngaˬ htawˇ Awˬ pa hta‸ shiˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ leh, ngaˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43010015	Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon ngaˬ ve a sha‸ hta‸ tanˇ ve yoˬ.
43010016	Yawˬ hkawˆ chi hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ ngaˬ cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ g'a ca shiˍ veu laˇ leh, yawˇ hui ngaˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˬ moˍ teˇ moˍ tiˉ cawˬ leh, yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43010017	Ngaˬ ve a sha‸ hta‸ k'aw‸ yuˬ hk'aw‸ g'a tuˬ, a sha‸ tanˇ piˇ ve pa taw Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
43010018	Ngaˬ ve a sha‸ hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ hiˉ yuˬ maˇ lu yuˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve a sha‸ hta‸ tanˇ piˇ tuˬ ve kanˇ paˆ leh, k'aw‸ yuˬ hk'aw‸ tuˬ ve kanˇ paˆ ngaˬ geh cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e te tuˬ, Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010019	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ dawˇ hk'aˇ maˇ k'aw‸ hawˍ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43010020	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw laiˉ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ neˇ geh leh g'uˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui na ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43010021	Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, neˇ geh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ heˆ. Neˇ lehˬ mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw hta‸ mehˆ mawˬ la piˇ g'a tuˬ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43010022	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve pawehˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43010023	Mvuhˇ kaˆ ve awˬ yanˇ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Sawˉla‸monˍ ve koˇ caˉ lo te toˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43010024	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ chehˇ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ nawˬ hk'aˬ maw maw te laˇ tuˬ ve le. Nawˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ tehˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010025	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ ve ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ yonˍ. Ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
43010026	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ heˆ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui maˇ yonˍ.
