43010027	Ngaˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ leh, yawˇ hui ngaˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ ve yoˬ.
43010028	Ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ co ti‸ ha ti‸ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a luˬ maˇ g'a sheˆ. A shu ka‸ ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ lu yuˬ maˇ g'a.
43010029	Yawˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ ve yoˬ. A shu ka‸ Awˬ pa ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ lu yuˬ maˇ g'a.
43010030	Awˬ pa ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010031	Oˇ htaˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ baˬ tuˬ ve haˉ pui shiˍ k'aw‸ g'awˆ ve yoˬ.
43010032	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ Awˬ pa lo tawˆ la ve da‸ ve kanˉ laiˉ ceuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ te maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Kanˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ-a teh‸ te ve le teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010033	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ da‸ ve kanˉ te ve pa taw nawˬ hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ-a teh‸ te ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve pa taw baˬ-a teh‸ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ chaw yaˇ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, G'uiˬ sha hk'e nawˬ te ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010034	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve, nawˬ hui lehˬ g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
43010035	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. (Li‸ hpu tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te luˬ maˇ hpeh‸.)
43010036	Hk'e te k'o, Awˬ pa da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ leh, chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo peu laˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve pa taw, Nawˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui k'oˇ ve leh laˇ.
43010037	Ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ te ve k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ taˇ yonˍ.
43010038	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ te ve k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ htawˇ, ngaˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yonˍ-o‸. Oˇ hk'e yonˍ ve k'o, Awˬ pa ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ ka‸, ngaˬ lehˬ Awˬ pa awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ ka‸, nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43010039	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ hpeh yuˬ-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
43010040	Yoˇhanˬ awˉ lawˉ peuˇ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve teˇ kaˬ, Yawˇdanˍ g'uiˬ ma coˇ paˉ lo yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai leh, oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43010041	Chaw laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ geh lo laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ awˬ heˆ te‸ chiˉ maˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn Yoˇhanˬ hk'a k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, cawˇ tehˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43010042	Oˇ kaˬ lo chaw laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ la ve yoˬ.
43011001	Maˍriˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ ma Maˍhtaˆ hui chehˇ ve Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ yaˇ Laˍzaˍruˆ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ naˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43011002	Maˍriˆ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ naˍ manˇ hawnˉ shehˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ ve hkui sheh hta‸ uˉ hkeh mvuh yuˬ shiˆ piˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ. Naˬ chehˇ ve Laˍzaˍruˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43011003	Hk'e te leh, awˬ viˉ ma oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ geh shu hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ naˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ tcuh ve yoˬ.
43011004	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Naˬ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, suh law‸ law‸ naˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ. Naˬ ve oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la leh, oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43011005	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Maˍhtaˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi ma hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ ve yoˬ.
43011006	Hk'e te leh, Laˍzaˍruˆ naˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ kaˬ lo nyiˇ nyi k'aw‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43011007	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai-a veuˬ teh‸, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011008	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Raˍbiˆ-oˬ, chi beu‸ ka‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ-a teh‸ te chehˇ ve ka‸, nawˬ oˇ kaˬ lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai tuˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011009	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ chi nyiˇ naˍ riˍ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw htaˇ ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai ve k'o, chi miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
43011010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ mvuhˇ hpeu‸ htaˇ ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'euˆ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43011011	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ chawˇ Laˍzaˍruˆ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ ca nawˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ k'ai shaˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011012	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, yawˇ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve k'o, na-e la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011013	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Laˍzaˍruˆ suh peuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, Laˍzaˍruˆ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve teh‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ ve yoˬ.
43011014	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Laˍzaˍruˆ suh peuˬ.
43011015	Nawˬ hui yonˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ ngaˬ oˇ kaˬ lo maˇ chehˇ ve pa taw nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ yawˇ geh k'ai-a veuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011016	Hk'e te leh, Yaˇ cehˬ k'a teh‸ k'oˆ ve Htoˉma‸ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yawˇ geh teˇ geh suh tuˬ ngaˬ hui htawˇ k'ai-a veuˬ teh‸, yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011017	Yeˍsuˆ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ tuˍ hpfuh hk'aw lo tuˍ taˍ ve awˇ nyi gaˬ peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43011018	Beˍtaˍniˆ venˇ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ neˇ ve yoˬ. Aˬ laˬ hk'e nyiˇ laˆ ceh tiˉ vuiˇ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43011019	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Maˍhtaˆ leh Maˍriˆ geh Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ maˇ laˬ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Laˍzaˍruˆ suh ve pa taw, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ dawˇ sha tuˬ te piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43011020	Yeˍsuˆ laˬ chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ Maˍhtaˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ Maˍriˆ lehˬ, yehˬ hk'aw chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43011021	Oˇ htaˇ Maˍhtaˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ choˬ kaˬ chehˇ taˍ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ suh tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
43011022	Chi beu‸ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha geh nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ lawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011023	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011024	Maˍhtaˆ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ nyi, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ k'o, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011025	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ leh co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, suh peuˬ ve htawˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ.
43011026	A sha‸ te‸ leh ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a suh. Tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ nawˬ yonˍ ve laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011027	Maˍhtaˆ k'oˆ ve, Yoˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo laˬ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011028	Maˍhtaˆ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ k'ai leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi ma Maˍriˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Saˍ la‸ gaˬ la peuˬ. Yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ kuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, a yehˉ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011029	Maˍriˆ tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ haˆ tu leh Yeˍsuˆ geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
43011030	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ hk'aˆ hk'aw lo maˇ lo‸-e sheˍ. Maˍhtaˆ yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ ve teˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ chehˇ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
43011031	Hk'e te leh, Maˍriˆ geh yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ leh yawˇ hta‸ dawˇ sha tuˬ te chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Maˍriˆ haˆ tu leh tawˆ k'ai ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ tuˍ hpfuh lo ca hawˬ ve hehˉ teh‸ dawˇ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
43011032	Maˍriˆ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ chehˇ taˍ kuiˬ lo gaˬ la leh yawˇ hta‸ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve hkui paˇ lo boˆ sheˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ choˬ kaˬ chehˇ taˍ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ suh tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011033	Maˍriˆ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hawˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hk'anˇ leh dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
43011034	Nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ lo ca taˍ ve le teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ca nyi la-o teh‸ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011035	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, mehˆ g'uiˬ ya‸ la ve yoˬ.
43011036	Hk'e te leh, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Nyi sheˍ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ ha‸ jaˇ law leˇ teh‸ k'oˇ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43011037	Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Mehˆ cuˉ paˍ hta‸ mehˆ mawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Laˍzaˍruˆ maˇ g'a suh tuˬ te maˇ g'a leh laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43011038	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ hk'anˇ leh tuˍ hpfuh lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Tuˍ hpfuh oˇ ve lehˬ, haˉ k'oˍ hpeh‸ leh, awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ lo haˉ pui shiˍ hoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43011039	Haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ-o‸ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ viˉ ma Maˍhtaˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, yawˇ suh ve chi beu‸ awˇ nyi gaˬ peuˬ ve pa taw, kuiˇ nuˬ la peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011040	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ yonˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011041	Oˇ htaˇ, haˉ pui shiˍ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui hpfuhˆ baˬ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi leh k'oˆ ve, A pa-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
43011042	Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ na yuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ g'a yonˍ tuˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43011043	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Laˍzaˍruˆ-oˬ, tawˆ la-o teh‸, yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ ve yoˬ.
43011044	Oˇ htaˇ, suh peuˬ ve chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve hkui sheh la‸ sheh hta‸ hpa hawˆ taˍ leh, yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ hpaˉ ce‸ hpeh tsuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ hpui hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011045	Hk'e te leh, Maˍriˆ geh laˬ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ te ve kanˉ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ la ve yoˬ.
43011046	Ya‸ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui geh k'ai leh, Yeˍsuˆ te ve kanˉ awˬ lawn ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011047	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw oˇ ve hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ heˆ laiˉ ceuˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43011048	Ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ hk'e leˇ teh taˍ ve k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Roˉma‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, ngaˬ hui ve da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hiˉ yuˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43011049	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, oˇ ve teˇ hk'aw‸ paw hkuˇ lonˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui te‸ chiˉ maˇ shiˍ.
43011050	Chaw teˇ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ g'a luˬ tuˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ chaw teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon suh ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon leuˉ leh da‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ nyi law leˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43011051	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ dawˇ tawˆ leh yaw ve maˇ heˆ. Oˇ ve teˇ hk'aw‸ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ chaw oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'e te leh tawˇ yaw ve yoˬ.
43011052	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ awˬ pon Yeˍsuˆ g'a suh tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Teˇ kaˬ le le lo hpaˆ da‸ chehˇ taˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui hta‸ teˇ moˍ tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ awˬ pon htawˇ yawˇ g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ.
43011053	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'a tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43011054	Hk'e te leh Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a tawˍ lehˆ maˇ k'aw‸ te toˇ. Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh, heh puiˉ hk'aw hta‸ neˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Eˇhpaˍrenˍ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh yawˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43011055	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw maˇ maˇ a shu yawˇ awˬ to da‸ la kehˬ la piˇ tuˬ, pawehˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, hk'aw hk'oˆ lawˬ hk'oˆ lo tu leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
43011056	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ. Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui huˉ chehˇ htaˇ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ le. Yawˇ lehˬ pawehˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ laˬ hehˉ laˇ teh‸ na nyi da‸ ve yoˬ.
43011057	Oˇ htaˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui lehˬ, chi hk'e tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve, A shu teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hk'aˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ shiˍ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui hpeh yuˬ tuˬ g'a hto laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43012001	Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hkaw‸ nyi htaˇ ka‸, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Beˍtaˍniˆ hk'aˆ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve Laˍzaˍruˆ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43012002	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ mvuhˇ hpeu‸ awˍ teˇ poˬ te caˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Maˍhtaˆ awˬ keu caˍ piˇ shehˍ ma te leh Laˍzaˍruˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ geh teˇ geh mui caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43012003	Oˇ htaˇ Maˍriˆ lehˬ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve naˍduˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve naˍ manˇ hawnˉ teˇ chi law hta‸ yuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve hkui sheh hta‸ shehˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Maˍriˆ yawˇ ve uˉ hkeh mvuh yuˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ ve hkui sheh hta‸ shiˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Naˍ manˇ hawnˉ oˇ ve awˬ shaˉ lehˬ, yehˬ teˇ yehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hawnˉ heuˍ lehˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
43012004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ ve, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve,
43012005	Naˍ manˇ hawnˉ chi hta‸ hpu shehˆ ha hteh‸ hawˇ sheˬ leh haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ hui hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te maˇ pehˬ piˇ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43012006	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ dawˇ nyi leh k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ lehˬ chaw hk'awˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Hpu miˉ chaw hta‸ yawˇ ha‸ shaˉ leh, keu taˍ ve hpu hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ jaw ve yoˬ.
43012007	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ chi hta‸ taˇ deˇ. Ngaˬ hta‸ tuˍ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ pon, naˍ manˇ hawnˉ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ peuˬ.
43012008	Haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43012009	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, yawˇ hui oˇ kaˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ k'ai ve maˇ heˆ. Suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ htawˇ mawˬ gaˇ leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
43012010	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ htawˇ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43012011	Awˬ lawn k'o, Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ pa taw Yuˇda‸ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai chehˇ leh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43012012	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ pawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo gaˬ la ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
43012013	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, tcuhˉ pui meuˇ awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ yuˬ tuˬ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Hoˍsaˍnaˍ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ ve Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
43012014	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, piˉ laˬ ehˉ hta‸ mawˬ leh ciˇ ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e,
43012015	Ziˉonˍ ve yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, taˇ kawˆ. Nyi loˬ, nawˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, piˉ laˬ awˬ yehˇ hta‸ ciˇ leh laˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43012016	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ awˬ lawn oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ g'a peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, shu yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e te piˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui dawˇ nawˇ la ve yoˬ.
43012017	Yeˍsuˆ Laˍzaˍruˆ hta‸ tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo kuˬ tawˆ la leh yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ geh chehˇ taˍ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43012018	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ ca ha‸ ve lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ heˆ oˇ ve hta‸ te ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ ve pa taw yoˬ.
43012019	Hk'e te leh, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ da‸ ve, Nawˬ hui te‸ chiˉ te maˇ g'a. Nyi loˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai peuˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43012020	Pawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw oˉ k'oˍ pui la tuˬ awˬ pon laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43012021	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw cawˬ ve Behˇsehˇdaˆ venˇ yaˇ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ geh k'ai leh, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, ngaˬ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ mawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43012022	Hpiˇliˇpuˆ k'ai leh Anˍdrehˍ hta‸ hto piˇ leh, Anˍdrehˍ leh Hpiˇliˇpuˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
43012023	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ.
43012024	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, caˬ yawˇ teˇ shiˍ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ ce leh, maˇ luˬ maˇ suh ve k'o, awˬ yawˇ teˇ shiˍ tiˉ cawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, luˬ k'ai suh k'ai ve k'o, awˬ shiˍ maˇ maˇ naw‸ la ve yoˬ.
43012025	A shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw lehˬ, a sha‸ g'a shonˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ canˇ ve chaw lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
43012026	Ngaˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a laˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ chehˇ ve teˇ kaˬ lo ngaˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve chaw htawˇ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ Awˬ pa taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43012027	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ nyi ma dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ le. A pa-oˬ, awˬ yanˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ g'a k'oˆ tuˬ laˇ. Maˇ heˆ, awˬ lawn k'o awˬ yanˇ chi awˬ pon ngaˬ gaˬ la peuˬ.
43012028	A pa-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la leh, Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ piˇ peuˬ. Ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ cawˬ piˇ tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43012029	Oˇ kaˬ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh, Mvuhˇ tawˍ tawˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43012030	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Bvuhˬ la ve awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ pon maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui awˬ pon yoˬ.
43012031	Miˬ guiˬ chi lehˬ, chi beu‸ ka‸ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ chi hta‸ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ chi beu‸ ka‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43012032	Chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ngaˬ chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ geh lo ngaˬ g'awˬ veu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43012033	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te suh tuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43012034	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Hkri‸ lehˬ co co taiˍ taiˍ g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma te k'oˆ ve le. Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, a shu le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43012035	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ g'euˆ lehˬ, nawˬ hui geh teˇ hkui ceh tiˉ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Naˆ ho‸ ve nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a hoˆ tiˍ taˍ tuˬ, nawˬ geh awˬ g'euˆ cawˬ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui toˇ k'ai loˬ. Naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo toˇ k'ai ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ hk'aˬ lo k'ai ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ.
43012036	Nawˬ hui geh awˬ g'euˆ cawˬ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ g'euˆ ve yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ yonˍ loˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui geh lo tawˆ k'ai leh ca va‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43012037	Yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ awˬ heˆ chi taw taw yawˇ te taˍ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ.
43012038	Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ a shu yonˍ ve le. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ a shu hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve le, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43012039	Chi hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui yonˍ maˇ hpeh‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, Iˉsaˍyaˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve,
43012040	Yawˇ hui mehˆ shiˍ maˇ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, nyi ma maˇ g'a dawˇ pawnˍ tuˬ leh, nyi ma maˇ k'aw‸ pa leh ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a gu na-e tuˬ, yawˇ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ yawˇ cuˉ piˇ lawˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ heh piˇ lawˬ peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˇ ve yoˬ.
43012041	Iˉsaˍyaˆ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43012042	Ya‸ hk'aˇ htawˇ, jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yonˍ ve htawˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw, yonˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui maˇ k'oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ tawˆ laˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ.
43012043	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha geh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a ve a‸ kehˉ, chaw yaˇ hui geh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
43012044	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
43012045	Ngaˬ hta‸ mawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ mawˬ ve yoˬ.
43012046	Ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a chehˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve yoˬ.
43012047	Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ leh maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ maˇ jehˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
43012048	Ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ leh ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na ve chaw hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ nyi htaˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43012049	Ngaˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ k'oˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa lehˬ, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ g'a yaw tuˬ ve, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ pe‸ taˇ peuˬ.
43012050	Yawˇ tawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh ngaˬ hk'a k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43013001	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo tawˆ k'ai leh Awˬ pa geh g'a k'o‸-e tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ ve hta‸ Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ maˇ te sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve yawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ha‸ chehˇ ve hk'e, awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
43013002	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ, neˇ haiˬ lehˬ Siˉmonˍ ve yaˇ paˍ Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ tawˆ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ.
43013003	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ pa chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha geh k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43013004	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ awˍ caˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ tu la leh yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ k'ehˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hpaˉ ce‸ yuˬ leh, yawˇ ve caw‸ cehˍ nyi hta‸ tsuh‸ ve yoˬ.
43013005	Oˇ htaˇ, hkehˇ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo iˉ kaˆ keu leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui ve hkui sheh hta‸ tsuhˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, yawˇ tsuh‸ taˍ ve hpaˉ ce‸ yuˬ leh shiˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013006	Yawˇ Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve hkui sheh hta‸ tsuhˇ tuˬ ve laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43013007	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te chehˇ ve hta‸ chi beu‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ sheˍ htawˇ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ nawˬ shiˍ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013008	Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve hkui sheh hta‸ nawˬ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a tsuhˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a tsuhˇ ve k'o, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013009	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve hkui sheh hta‸ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. La‸ sheh leh oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ htawˇ tsuhˇ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013010	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Iˉ kaˆ hehˉ peuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ da‸ kehˬ peuˬ ve pa taw, hkui sheh hta‸ ceh tiˉ tsuhˇ tuˬ loˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ da‸ kehˬ peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ da‸ kehˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013011	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ daˬ kehˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43013012	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui ve hkui sheh hta‸ tsuhˇ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ k'aw‸ deh leh mui ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-aˬ laˇ.
43013013	Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ Saˍ la‸ ka‸ Jawˇ mawˇ ka‸ k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve hk'e ngaˬ lehˬ Saˍ la‸ ka‸ Jawˇ mawˇ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43013014	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ ka‸, Saˍ la‸ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ve hkui sheh hta‸ tsuhˇ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ve hkui sheh hta‸ tsuhˇ da‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
43013015	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ te laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui htawˇ te tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ henˇ yuˬ jawˬ yuˬ tuˬ te maˍ laˇ peuˬ.
43013016	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ ceˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Tcuh yaˇ htawˇ, yawˇ hta‸ tcuh peu shehˍ hpaˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
43013017	Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ leh, shiˍ ve hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
43013018	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Ngaˬ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve hkui mehˍ cu ngaˬ hta‸ hteˆ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ g'a biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43013019	Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ tuˬ, maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ chi beu‸ ka‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ peuˬ.
43013020	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ peu k'ai ve chaw hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013021	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ haˍ jaˇ leh, Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ tehˬ, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43013022	Yawˇ a shu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ leh naˍ teh‸, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ nyi da‸ ve yoˬ.
43013023	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ ha‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ nyi ma pui paˇ lo ngeh mui chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43013024	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Yawˇ a shu hta‸ k'oˆ ve leh naˍ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ heˆ te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013025	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve nyi ma pui awˬ paˇ lo jiˆ k'ai leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, a shu le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43013026	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ peu-eˍ hta‸ yuˬ leh awˍ chiˇ hk'aw tuˍ sheˬ leh piˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ peu-eˍ hta‸ awˍ chiˇ hk'aw tuˍ sheˬ leh, Siˉmonˍ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ ve yaˇ pa Yuˇda‸ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013027	Yuˇda‸ lehˬ, hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve teˇ peu-eˍ hta‸ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Saˍtanˍ yawˇ awˬ k'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ te tuˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ haˆ haˆ ca te-o teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013028	Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ piˇ ve hta‸ hpui lawˇ paˇ lo mui chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ.
43013029	Yuˆda‸ lehˬ, hpu miˉ chaw hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸, Pawehˇ chi awˬ pon ngaˬ hui loˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca vuiˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh naˍ, maˇ heˆ k'o, Haˍ g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ ca piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh naˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ dawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43013030	Yuˇda‸ lehˬ, hkaoˍ monˇ oˇ ve teˇ peu-eˍ hta‸ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43013031	Yawˇ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, chi beu‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la peuˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha htawˇ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la peuˬ.
43013032	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sah awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo Yaˇ hpu hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43013033	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ hkui ceh g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ca tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'ai kuiˬ lo nawˬ hui laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve hk'e, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
43013034	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸-o‸ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ awˬ suhˉ teˇ hkawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸-o‸,
43013035	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸ ve k'o, ha‸ da‸ ve oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013036	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ hk'aˬ lo k'ai tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ k'ai kuiˬ lo chi beu‸ nawˬ laˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ heh‸, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh nawˬ laˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013037	Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chi beu‸ ngaˬ nawˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve le. Nawˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ ve a sha‸ tanˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43013038	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ awˬ pon nawˬ ve a sha‸ tanˇ tuˬ laˇ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, g'aˆ hpfuh maˇ bvuhˬ sheˍ htaˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ chiˇ baˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43014001	Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma taˇ dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ-o‸. Ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ yonˍ-o‸.
43014002	Ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ kuiˬ cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ. Chehˇ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve hk'e k'o, maˇ cawˬ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto taˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'o‸-e leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ ca gu tuˬ yoˬ.
43014003	Ngaˬ k'o‸-e leh nawˬ hui awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ ca gu taˉ peuˬ k'o, ngaˬ ve chehˇ kui lo nawˬ hui htawˇ g'a chehˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ laˬ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
43014004	Ngaˬ k'ai kuiˬ ya‸ k'aw hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43014005	Htoˉma‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ hk'aˬ lo k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ. Ya‸ k'aw hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ tuˬ le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43014006	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ ya‸ k'aw yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸, co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ cuˇ k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ Awˬ pa geh gaˬ maˇ hpeh‸.
43014007	Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shiˍ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ Awˬ pa hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi beu‸ hta‸ tanˬ leh nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ g'a shiˍ g'a mawˬ peuˬ teh‸, Htoˉma‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43014008	Hpiˇliˇpuˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ Awˬ pa a ciˉ maw laˇ-oˆ. Maw laˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43014009	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chi maw maw chehˇ peuˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ sheˍ laˇ. Ngaˬ hta‸ mawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ pa hta‸ mawˬ peuˬ. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ Awˬ pa a ciˉ maw laˇ-oˆ teh‸, nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma te k'oˆ ve le.
43014010	Awˬ pa awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ pa chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ maˇ yonˍ leh laˇ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, yawˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43014011	Ngaˬ lehˬ Awˬ pa awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ pa lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yonˍ loˬ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ loˬ.
43014012	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ ngaˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ te tuˬ yoˬ. Chi a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ te tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ Awˬ pa geh k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
43014013	Awˬ pa lehˬ Yaˇ hpu hta‸ pa taw awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hk'a lawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ te tuˬ yoˬ.
43014014	Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ lawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui lawˬ ve hk'e ngaˬ te tuˬ yoˬ.
43014015	Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui na yuˬ leh te tuˬ yoˬ.
43014016	Ngaˬ lehˬ, Awˬ pa hta‸ lawˬ leh, nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ tuˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43014017	Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Nawˬ hui lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ yawˇ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43014018	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ yaˇ cuˬ shi hk'e baˬ taˉ laˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh k'aw‸ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43014019	Teˇ hkui gaˬ k'o, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ te‸ ve hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui htawˇ g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
43014020	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, Awˬ pa awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43014021	Ngaˬ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ leh te ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ Awˬ pa ha‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawˇ chaw oˇ ve hta‸ ha‸ leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ to yawˇ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ maw piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43014022	Yuˇda‸ Iˉsaˍkaˍriˍoˆ maˇ heˆ ve, Yuˇda‸ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ to ngaˬ hui hta‸ maw laˇ leh miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ maˇ maw piˇ ve, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43014023	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ Awˬ pa yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ geh lo laˬ leh yawˇ geh chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43014024	Ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ. Nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43014025	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
43014026	Awˬ pa lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ Ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ, da‸ ve kehˍ ve Awˬ ha hpu peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le maˍ laˇ leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43014027	Dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ teh taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui piˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma taˇ dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ. Kawˆ ve nyi ma ka‸ taˇ cawˬ piˇ.
43014028	Ngaˬ k'o‸-e leh nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve k'o, Awˬ pa geh ngaˬ k'o‸-e ve pa taw nawˬ hui ha lehˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ pa lehˬ ngaˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
43014029	Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui g'a yonˍ tuˬ, maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ g'uˇ suhˍ chi beu‸ ka‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ.
43014030	Chi beu‸ hta‸ tanˬ leh ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ tcuhˇ tcuhˬ maˇ k'aw‸ yaw-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ laˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ te‸ chiˉ kanˇ paˆ maˇ cawˬ.
43014031	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ pa hta‸ ngaˬ ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ, Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ te ve yoˬ. Tu loˬ. K'ai-a veuˬ.
43015001	Ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve a pehˉ meuˇ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa lehˬ, hko ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43015002	Awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ ve ngaˬ ve awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ tawˆ baˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ shiˍ naw‸ ve awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, leuˉ leh awˬ shiˍ naw‸ maˇ la tuˬ, yawˇ kehˬ lehˍ gu shawˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43015003	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, chi beu‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui kehˬ la peuˬ.
43015004	Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ k'aˉ lehˬ, awˬ te hta‸ maˇ tcuhˉ naw‸ k'o, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la maˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ chehˇ ve k'o, awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la maˇ hpeh‸.
43015005	Ngaˬ lehˬ a pehˉ meuˇ te hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui lehˬ awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ shiˍ maˇ maˇ naw‸ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui te‸ chiˉ ka‸ te maˇ hpeh‸.
43015006	Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ chiˇ baˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e ve awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu g'awˆ hpoˆ leh, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu leh aˬ miˍ to‸ baˬ ve yoˬ.
43015007	Nawˬ hui ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui lawˬ gaˇ ve hk'e lawˬ-o‸. Nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
43015008	Nawˬ hui awˬ shiˍ maˇ maˇ naw‸ la ve pa taw, ngaˬ Awˬ pa awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a leh, nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve hta‸ shu g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
43015009	Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ-oˆ.
43015010	Ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ Awˬ pa piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na yuˬ leh, yawˇ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na yuˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43015011	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve ha lehˬ ve cawˬ tuˬ leh, nawˬ hui ha lehˬ ve biˇ la tuˬ, tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ.
43015012	Ngaˬ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸-o‸.
43015013	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ awˬ pon a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ tanˇ piˇ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
43015014	Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ ve awˬ chawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43015015	Chi beu‸ hta‸ tanˬ leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ ceˬ teh‸ maˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceˬ lehˬ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ aˬ hto‸ ma te chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ shiˍ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ chawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ pa geh ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ peuˬ.
43015016	Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui k'ai leh awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la leh, awˬ shiˍ oˇ ve yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ pa geh nawˬ hui hk'a lawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43015017	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ chi hk'e piˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸-o‸.
43015018	Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ canˇ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hta‸ canˇ ve teh‸ shiˍ-o‸.
43015019	Nawˬ hui lehˬ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve k'o, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve chaw hta‸ ha‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ tawˆ ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ ve yoˬ.
43015020	Awˬ ceˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ taˍ peuˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui na yuˬ leh te ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ htawˇ na yuˬ leh te tuˬ yoˬ.
43015021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw awˬ ceuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ te laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
43015022	Ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ ca hto piˇ la ve k'o, yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ lehˬ yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ g'a ponˬ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ ca k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
43015023	Ngaˬ hta‸ canˇ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa hta‸ htawˇ canˇ ve yoˬ.
43015024	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ te jaw ve kanˉ hta‸ yawˇ hui mehˆ g'aˇ suhˍ ngaˬ maˇ te ve k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ Awˬ pa hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi beu‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ leh canˇ ve yoˬ.
43015025	Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Te‸ chiˉ awˬ lawn maˇ cawˬ ka‸, yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ canˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
43015026	Awˬ pa geh lo tawˆ la ve Ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Awˬ pa lo tawˆ la ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve Awˬ ha hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ awˬ lawn yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43015027	Nawˬ hui htawˇ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ geh chehˇ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016001	Nawˬ hui nyi ma maˇ g'a luˬ k'ai tuˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
43016002	Shu nawˬ hui hta‸ Yuˇda‸ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ k'oˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ hta‸ te peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ dawˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'e ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
43016003	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Awˬ pa hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw oˇ hk'e te tuˬ yoˬ.
43016004	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ taˉ laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ, tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh chehˇ taˍ sheˍ ve pa taw, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ laˇ sheˍ.
43016005	Ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ geh chi beu‸ ngaˬ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hk'aˬ lo k'ai tuˬ le teh‸, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ na nyi.
43016006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˇ laˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ haˍ tuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
43016007	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ k'oˆ laˇ ve, ngaˬ k'o‸-e ve lehˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ maˇ k'o‸-e ve k'o, Ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ nawˬ hui geh maˇ laˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ k'o‸-e ve k'o, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016008	Yawˇ gaˬ la htaˇ, venˇ baˆ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, suhˉ jehˬ suhˉ taˆ ve awˬ lawn htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016009	Yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, venˇ baˆ awˬ lawn hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016010	Ngaˬ lehˬ Awˬ pa geh k'o‸-e leh, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ lawn hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016011	Miˬ guiˬ chi hta‸ uˉ peunˍ ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ piˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw suhˉ jehˬ suhˉ taˆ ve awˬ lawn ka‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016012	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui hkanˍ yuˬ maˇ hpeh‸ sheˍ.
43016013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu gaˬ la htaˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh nawˬ hui k'ai tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hk'a g'a kaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ dawˇ tawˆ leh yaw ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016014	Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ tawˆ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ yawˇ yuˬ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016015	Awˬ pa hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ ve htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ yawˇ yuˬ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ.
43016016	Teˇ hkui gaˬ k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ. Teˇ hkui k'aw‸ gaˬ k'o, g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43016017	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Teˇ hkui gaˬ k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ. Teˇ hkui k'aw‸ gaˬ k'o, g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, Ngaˬ Awˬ pa geh k'o‸-e ve pa taw teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ laˇ gaˇ ve leh naˍ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43016018	Peuˬ leh yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Teˇ hkui gaˬ k'o teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ gaˇ ve le, Yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
43016019	Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ na nyi gaˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ shiˍ ve pa taw yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Teˇ hkui gaˬ k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ. Teˇ hkui k'aw‸ gaˬ k'o, g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ na nyi da‸ chehˇ ve laˇ.
43016020	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ hui g'a kuˬ hawˬ paˆ hawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui lehˬ, g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ tuˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui dawˇ haˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, ha lehˬ tuˬ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
43016021	Yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ yaˇ paw ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ paw tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la ve pa taw, yawˇ dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yaˇ paw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ paw la peuˬ ve pa taw yawˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ leh, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ ve yoˬ.
43016022	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ hpuˇ da‸ tuˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve ha lehˬ tuˬ oˇ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui geh hiˉ yuˬ maˇ g'a.
43016023	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ na nyi. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, Awˬ pa geh nawˬ hui teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ lawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
43016024	Chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ lawˬ jaw sheˍ. Nawˬ hui ha lehˬ tuˬ ve biˇ la tuˬ lawˬ loˬ. Lawˬ ve k'o, g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
43016025	Ngaˬ tawˇ pa haˉ yehˇ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Tawˇ pa haˉ maˇ k'aw‸ yehˇ leh, Awˬ pa awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
43016026	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ pon Awˬ pa geh ngaˬ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ k'oˆ.
43016027	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ leh, Awˬ pa geh lo ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ ve pa taw, Awˬ pa yawˇ awˬ to nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
43016028	Ngaˬ lehˬ Awˬ pa geh lo tawˆ la leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo gaˬ la peuˬ. Teˇ pawˆ miˬ guiˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ tawˆ k'ai leh Awˬ pa geh k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43016029	Yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Chi beu‸ nawˬ tawˇ pa haˉ maˇ yehˇ leh hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
43016030	Nawˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ shiˍ taˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hta‸ na nyi laˇ tuˬ nawˬ maˇ loˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ G'uiˬ sha geh lo laˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˇ ve yoˬ.
43016031	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ peuˬ laˇ.
43016032	Nawˬ hui hpaˆ da‸ leh, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo k'o‸-e leh ngaˬ hta‸ tiˉ baˬ taˉ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la chehˇ leh chi beu‸ ka‸ gaˬ la peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ g'a chehˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ pa ngaˬ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43016033	Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ, tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ. Chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ nyi ma taˇ luˬ, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ lehˬ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ g'aˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43017001	Tawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi leh k'oˆ ve, A pa-oˬ, awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ. Yaˇ hpu lehˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ tuˬ, nawˬ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ-oˆ.
43017002	Nawˬ lehˬ Yaˇ hpu hta‸ hk'a chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ co ti‸ ha ti‸ piˇ tuˬ, chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ nawˬ yawˇ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ peuˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ-oˆ.
43017003	Co ti‸ ha ti‸ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve G'uiˬ sha nawˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ peu laˇ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui shiˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43017004	Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ te tcuh laˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ ngaˬ te peuˬ leh, chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ngaˬ tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ peuˬ.
43017005	A pa-oˬ, miˬ guiˬ maˇ te hpanˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
43017006	Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hpeu‸ maw piˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ nawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ a‸ laˇ peuˬ. Peuˬ leh, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui na yuˬ leh te k'ai peuˬ.
43017007	Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ lo laˬ ve hta‸ chi beu‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43017008	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ peuˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui na yuˬ leh, ngaˬ nawˬ geh lo tawˆ la ve hta‸ yawˇ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na shiˍ leh, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui yonˍ ve yoˬ.
43017009	Yawˇ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43017010	Ngaˬ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, nawˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-e htawˇ ngaˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
43017011	Chi beu‸ hta‸ tanˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ maˇ k'aw‸ chehˇ. Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ geh lo k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve kehˬ ve A pa-oˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ shaˉ-oˆ.
43017012	Ngaˬ yawˇ hui geh chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ peuˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ ve pa taw, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai ve yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ luˬ maˇ sheˆ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ luˬ k'ai ve lehˬ, Li‸ hpu hk'aw biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43017013	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ nawˬ geh lo k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve ha lehˬ tuˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la tuˬ, ngaˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
43017014	Nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˇ piˇ peuˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve hk'e yawˇ hui htawˇ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ canˇ ve yoˬ.
43017015	Chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ tuˬ ngaˬ lawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a ponˬ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ ngaˬ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
43017016	Ngaˬ lehˬ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui htawˇ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸.
43017017	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ da‸ la kehˬ la piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43017018	Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo peu laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo peu k'ai ve yoˬ.
43017019	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a da‸ g'a kehˬ la tuˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ ve awˬ to hta‸ ngaˬ da‸ lehˍ kehˬ lehˍ teh taˍ peuˬ.
43017020	Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon ceh tiˉ ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hui maˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ la tuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon htawˇ ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
43017021	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. A pa-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui yonˍ la tuˬ yoˬ.
43017022	Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ piˇ peuˬ.
43017023	Ngaˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, nawˬ htawˇ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hk'a deh‸ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ ha‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
43017024	A pa-oˬ, miˬ guiˬ chi maˇ te hpanˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh chehˇ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
43017025	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve A pa-oˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui nawˬ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43017026	Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo g'a cawˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ ve awˬ meh ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ shiˍ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, k'aw‸ shiˍ piˇ tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43018001	Yeˍsuˆ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh teˇ geh tawˆ k'ai leh, Keˍdronˍ lawˬ k'aˉ coˇ paˉ lo hkanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo cawˬ ve hko awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ leh yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ teˇ geh lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
43018002	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh teˇ geh oˇ kaˬ lo laiˉ pawˆ k'ai jaw ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Yuˇda‸ lehˬ, chehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43018003	Hk'e te leh Yuˇda‸ lehˬ, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ moˍ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ leh Hpiˍriˍsehˇ hui hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ veu laˇ leh laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, kawˆ faiˇ tuˉ aˬ miˍ tuˉ leh, la‸ caˉ ka‸ yuˬ veu laˇ ve yoˬ.
43018004	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hk'aˬ hk'e gaˬ la tuˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ shiˍ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui geh k'ai leh, Nawˬ hui a shu hta‸ ca ve le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43018005	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Yuˇda‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui geh huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43018006	Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ htunˍ k'o‸-e leh miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ paiˍ ve yoˬ.
43018007	Nawˬ hui a shu hta‸ ca ve le teh‸ yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ na nyi htaˇ, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43018008	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ hto laˇ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ca ve k'o, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43018009	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ luˬ k'ai teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43018010	Oˇ htaˇ, Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ aˉ htaw pfuhˇ taˍ ve pa taw, aˉ htaw oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'awˬ tawˆ leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ chaw leh, la‸ sha paˉ ve naˍ paw cheˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, Maˍlaˍhkuˆ meh ve yoˬ.
43018011	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve aˉ htaw hta‸ awˬ hpui awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ hk'aw‸ keu-o. Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve kawˆ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ g'a dawˬ leh laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43018012	Oˇ htaˇ, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ moˍ leh ma‸ poˍ ka‸, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yuˬ hpeh taˍ ve yoˬ.
43018013	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ Aˍnaˆ geh yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Aˍnaˆ lehˬ Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ ve awˬ puˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ lehˬ, oˇ ve teˇ hk'aw‸ awˬ hk'aw lo paw hkuˇ lonˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43018014	Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Chaw ceuˬ awˬ pon chaw teˇ g'aˇ suh ve k'o, leuˉ leh da‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ awˬ hk'aˇ beˆ maˍ piˇ jaw ve teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ.
43018015	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hta‸ shiˍ da‸ ve pa taw, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve shaˉ nanˉ awˬ paˇ ko taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ geh teˇ geh lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
43018016	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ yehˬ miˉ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hta‸ shiˍ da‸ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, yehˬ miˉ shaw shehˍ ma hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ shiˍ lo‸ la ve yoˬ.
43018017	Oˇ htaˇ, yehˬ miˉ shaw shehˍ ma lehˬ, Nawˬ htawˇ chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ Peˍtruˆ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Maˇ heˆ teh‸, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43018018	Oˇ htaˇ kaˆ ve pa taw, awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ leh ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shiˉ g'eu‸ hta‸ aˬ miˍ ceh leh, huˉ lehˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Peˍtruˆ htawˇ yawˇ hui geh huˉ taˍ leh aˬ miˍ lehˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43018019	Oˇ htaˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn na nyi ve yoˬ.
43018020	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ maˍ piˇ peuˬ. Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ, bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hk'a htaˆ ka‸ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ shu hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ hk'awˇ maˍ jaw.
43018021	Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ na nyi laˇ ve le. Ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e maˍ piˇ ve awˬ lawn, ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na nyi-o. Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e maˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43018022	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hta hpehˇ leh, Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hta‸ nawˬ chi hk'e yaw hk'aw‸ ve laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43018023	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve maˇ cawˇ k'o, maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ hk'a deh‸ beˆ maˍ laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve cawˇ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma te ngaˬ hta‸ dawˆ laˇ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43018024	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ shu hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ Aˍnaˆ maˇ hpui leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ geh sheh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
43018025	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ huˉ taˍ leh aˬ miˍ lehˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Nawˬ htawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ leh g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve yoˬ.
43018026	Peˍtruˆ chaw leh naˍ paw cheˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hpeh‸ ve, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ hko awˬ hk'aw lo chaw oˇ ve geh teˇ geh chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ mawˬ ve yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43018027	Peˍtruˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ teˇ hkui g'aˆ hpfuh bvuhˬ la ve yoˬ.
43018028	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸ htaˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ geh lo te leh jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ve hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, maˇ g'a cha‸ chiˆ leh, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ hta‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ, jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ve hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ lo‸-e.
43018029	Hk'e te leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ tawˆ la leh, Chi hpaˇ awˬ hk'oˆ nawˬ hui aˬ hto‸ ma venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ cawˬ le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43018030	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, haiˬ ve hta‸ maˇ te ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43018031	Hk'e te leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e suhˉ jehˬ-o‸ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43018032	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te suh tuˬ ve awˬ lawn k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43018033	Hk'e te leh jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ lo‸-e leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Nawˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43018034	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hk'aˇ nawˬ dawˇ tawˆ leh na nyi ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn shu nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43018035	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve leh laˇ. Nawˬ ve chaw ceuˬ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ ve la‸ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ laˇ peuˬ. Nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ te ya‸ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43018036	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ te kuiˬ lehˬ, chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸. Ngaˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ te kuiˬ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a gaˬ tuˬ, ngaˬ ve yaˇ g'uiˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ bawˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ te kuiˬ lehˬ, chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43018037	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te k'o, nawˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ paw la leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo laˬ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43018038	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui chehˇ taˍ kuiˬ lo yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ kuiˬ hta‸ ngaˬ ca maˇ mawˬ.
43018039	Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ te ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ nawˬ hui heuˆ gaˇ ve laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43018040	Yawˇ hui teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Chi hpaˇ hta‸ maˇ heˆ. Baˍraˍbaˆ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Baˍraˍbaˆ lehˬ, chaw hpfuhˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43019001	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yuˬ leh jaw‸ ve yoˬ.
43019002	Ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, aˉ chuˇ te hta‸ yuˬ leh shi uˉ tcuhˍ hk'e te g'a‸ sheˬ leh, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma yawˇ hta‸ deh piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019003	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ geh laˬ leh, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ-oˬ, nawˬ awˬ bon uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ hta hpehˇ ve yoˬ.
43019004	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ tawˆ la leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ya‸ kuiˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ mawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh shiˍ tawˆ la ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019005	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ aˉ chuˇ uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ taˍ leh, nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ deh taˍ leh tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Chaw chi hpaˇ hta‸ nyi-o teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019006	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh bon yehˬ lonˉ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ loˬ, hta‸ pehˍ loˬ teh‸ g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ-o‸. Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ kuiˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ mawˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019007	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e te ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ suh keunˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve pa taw yoˬ.
43019008	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, leuˉ leh kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
43019009	Yawˇ hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ lo‸-e leh, Nawˬ hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve chaw le teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ maˇ yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ.
43019010	Hk'e te leh jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ maˇ yaw laˇ leh laˇ. Nawˬ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ leh laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019011	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ naw ma lo nawˬ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ maˇ piˇ ve hk'e k'o, nawˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ te‸ chiˉ kanˇ paˆ maˇ cawˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ ve la‸ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, leuˉ leh venˇ baˆ uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019012	Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ ya‸ k'aw ca ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ chaw chi hpaˇ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve k'oˆ, nawˬ jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve awˬ chawˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. A shu yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43019013	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ shiˍ tawˆ-e leh, suhˉ jehˬ ve k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo ca mui ve yoˬ. Chehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ Gaˍbaˍtaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, haˉ pui hk'awˇ taˍ ve chehˇ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43019014	Awˬ nyi oˇ ve lehˬ, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ te tuˬ awˬ pon gu ve awˬ nyi hpeh‸ leh, awˬ yanˇ lehˬ mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ hk'e teˇ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ nyi loˬ.
43019015	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ loˬ, tiˇ pehˍ loˬ. La‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ loˬ teh‸, g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ g'a hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ ve laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Kehˉsaˍ maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ hui hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019016	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yuˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ sheh tawˆ-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ ve la‸ ka hta‸ taˆ leh, oˉ koˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Chehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ k'o, Gawˇlaˍgawˇtaˆ meh ve yoˬ.
43019018	Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ geh teˇ geh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ, teˇ hpawˇ lo teˇ g'aˇ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ awˬ k'aw ji lo hta‸ keu piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43019019	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, li‸ bvuh‸ leh, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo nehˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Li‸ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43019020	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve teˇ kaˬ lehˬ, venˇ hta‸ neˇ ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ g'aw ve yoˬ. Li‸ oˇ ve lehˬ, Heˍbrehˇ li‸, Roˉma‸ li‸ leh Heˍlaˍsaˆ li‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43019021	Hk'e te leh, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ teh‸ taˇ bvuh‸. Ngaˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yoˬ teh‸ chi hpaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸-o‸.
43019022	Jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ lehˬ, Ngaˬ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ k'aw‸ gu bvuh‸-o teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019023	Ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh awˬ pun pehˬ leh, teˇ g'aˇ teˇ pun yuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui yuˬ ve yoˬ. Aˉ po‸ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ hk'awˇ ma maˇ cawˬ. Hpaw k'awˍ hta‸ tanˬ leh hpaw mehˍ hk'a gaˬ te chiˇ taˍ ve aˉ po‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43019024	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Aˉ po‸ chi hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ tzuh‸ hkoˇ leh, a shu g'a cawˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ tuˬ kuˇ da‸ yuˬ-a veuˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, Ngaˬ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui pehˬ yuˬ leh, ngaˬ ve aˉ po‸ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui kuˇ da‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ, teh‸ Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43019025	Yeˍsuˆ ve la‸ ka paˇ lo yawˇ ve awˬ e, awˬ e ve awˬ nyi ma, Kaˍlawˉhpaˆ ve awˬ miˇ ma Maˍriˆ leh, Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ hui huˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43019026	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ e leh yawˇ ha‸ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ yawˇ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ e hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ nyi-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43019027	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ, Nawˬ ve awˬ e hta‸ nyi-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ hta‸ tanˬ leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ e hta‸ shiˍ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
43019028	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ te peuˬ ve hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ shiˍ leh, Ngaˍ iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Li‸ hpu tawˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e biˇ la ve yoˬ.
43019029	Oˇ kaˬ lo ci ve awˬ g'uiˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve mu‸ hk'u teˇ shiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ mvuhˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh ci ve awˬ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tuˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, lo taˬ hta‸ choˆ leh yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw hta‸ chiˇ daw‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43019030	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, ci ve awˬ g'uiˬ hta‸ chaw‸ dawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Kanˉ te peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, oˉ k'oˍ k'aw‸ lehˍ te sheˬ leh shaˉ cheˆ ve yoˬ.
43019031	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi lehˬ, pawehˇ awˬ pon gu ve awˬ nyi hpeh‸ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi k'o, uiˍ jaˇ ve shinˉ nyi hpeh‸ ve pa taw, shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo suh taˍ ve awˬ to teˇ hpaˍ maˇ g'a teh taˉ tuˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui lehˬ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh k'ai leh, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve hkui sheh hta‸ dawˆ hteh leh, suh taˍ ve awˬ to oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
43019032	Hk'e te leh, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ geh teˇ geh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu taˍ ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ ve hkui sheh hta‸ dawˆ hteh ve yoˬ.
43019033	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ suh peuˬ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ ve hkui sheh hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ dawˆ hteh.
43019034	Ma‸ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve nyi kuˇ hpawˇ hta‸ gehˇ juˆ leh, awˬ suhˍ leh iˉ kaˆ teˇ cawˬ haˉ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
43019035	Nawˬ hui htawˇ g'a yonˍ tuˬ, oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43019036	Oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, Yawˇ ve awˬ mu‸ ku teˇ ma ka‸ maˇ g'a dawˆ hteh teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
43019037	Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ kaˬ k'oˆ taˍ ve, Yawˇ hui juˆ pawnˍ taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui nyi tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43019038	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Aˍriˆma‸htehˍ venˇ yaˇ Yoˇseh‸ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ g'a yuˬ k'ai tuˬ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh ca lawˬ leh, jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ yawˇ hta‸ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh yawˇ laˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yoˇseh‸ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu hta‸ maˇ shiˍ tcuh.
43019039	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh lo tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ laˬ ve Niˆkawˇdeˍ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, muˇraˍ leh aˬ cawˍ hkaw‸ da‸ taˍ ve, aˬ laˬ hk'e shehˆ chi cawehˬ yuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
43019040	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ yuˬ leh, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui chaw tuˍ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, sha hawnˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ keu leh, hpa hpu yuˬ htiˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43019041	Yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ hta‸ pehˍ kuiˬ lo, hko teˇ hko cawˬ ve yoˬ. Hko oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ tuˍ jaw sheˍ ve tuˍ hpfuh awˬ suhˉ teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
43019042	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve pawehˇ awˬ pon gu ve awˬ nyi hpeh‸ leh, tuˍ hpfuh oˇ ve htawˇ awˬ paˇ lo cawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo ca tuˍ ve yoˬ.
43020001	Suhˍ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi, mvuhˇ maˇ htiˇ sheˍ htaˇ, Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ lehˬ teˇ na‸ tuˍ hpfuh lo k'ai leh, tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'oˇ meuˇ lo tsuhˇ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
43020002	Hk'e te leh Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ leh Yeˍsuˆ ha‸ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ geh lo yawˇ g'uiˇ laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ shu yuˬ k'ai leh, yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ lo ca teh taˍ leh naˍ ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020003	Hk'e te leh, Peˍtruˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ k'ai leh tuˍ hpfuh lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
43020004	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ teˇ geh g'uiˇ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Peˍtruˆ a‸ kehˉ g'uiˇ gehˬ leh, tuˍ hpfuh lo yawˇ awˉ lawˉ gaˬ ve yoˬ.
43020005	Tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ k'aw‸ k'ehˉ nyi htaˇ, hpa hpu oˇ kaˬ lo teh taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ, Ya‸ hk'aˇ tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˇ lo‸-e.
43020006	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'uiˇ laˬ chehˇ ve Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ gaˬ la leh, tuˍ hpfuh awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, hpa hpu teh taˍ laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ,
43020007	Oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ beh ve hpaˉ ce‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Hpaˉ ce‸ oˇ ve hpa hpu geh teˇ geh maˇ teh taˍ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ kaˬ lo lo‸ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
43020008	Oˇ htaˇ, tuˍ hpfuh lo awˉ lawˉ gaˬ ve, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ lo‸-e leh g'a mawˬ ve pa taw yonˍ ve yoˬ.
43020009	Yeˍsuˆ suh kuiˬ lo g'a k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Li‸ hpu hk'aw k'oˆ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ maˇ shiˍ sheˍ.
43020010	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, aˉ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
43020011	Maˍriˆ lehˬ, tuˍ hpfuh awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh hawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hawˬ chehˇ htaˇ, tuˍ hpfuh k'aw lo k'aw‸ k'ehˉ nyi leh,
43020012	hpuˉ-ehˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to teh taˍ kuiˬ oˉ k'oˍ hpawˇ teˇ g'aˇ, hkui sheh hpawˇ teˇ g'aˇ mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
43020013	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te hawˬ chehˇ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve Awˬ jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ shu yuˬ k'ai leh, hk'aˬ lo ca teh taˍ leh naˍ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw hawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020014	Yawˇ oˇ hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ leh awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ hpfuhˆ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ.
43020015	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te hawˬ chehˇ ve le. Nawˬ a shu hta‸ ca ve le teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Maˍriˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ hko ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve hehˉ teh‸ dawˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Saˍ la‸-oˬ, nawˬ yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ k'ai ve k'o, hk'aˬ lo teh taˍ ve ngaˬ hta‸ a ciˉ hto laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ ca yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020016	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Maˍriˆ-oˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Maˍriˆ hpfuhˆ nyi leh, Raˍbuˇniˆ-oˬ teh‸, Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ yaw leh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. (Raˍbuˇniˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ saˍ la‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
43020017	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ taˇ vawˆ taˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ pa geh ngaˬ maˇ g'a taˆ-e sheˍ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui geh k'ai leh chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ ve Awˬ pa leh nawˬ hui ve Awˬ pa, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha leh nawˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha geh lo ngaˬ taˆ-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Maˍriˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020018	Maˍriˆ Maˍgaˍdaˍlaˆ k'ai leh, Ngaˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ teh‸, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020019	Suhˍ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ nyi mvuhˇ hpeu‸ htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ laˬ leh yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji huˉ taˍ leh, Nawˬ hui geh dawˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020020	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve la‸ sheh leh yawˇ ve nyi kuˇ hpawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
43020021	Yeˍsuˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui geh dawˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ peu k'ai ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020022	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ meuˆ peu leh k'oˆ ve, Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸.
43020023	A shu teˇ g'aˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hpehˇ hk'a ve k'o venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. A shu teˇ g'aˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui maˇ hpehˇ piˇ ve k'o, yawˇ venˇ baˆ cawˬ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020024	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui geh laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yaˇ cehˬ k'a teh‸ k'oˆ ve Htoˉma‸ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
43020025	Hk'e te leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Htoˉma‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo sho cuˇ hta‸ keu ve awˬ haiˇ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ g'a mawˬ leh, awˬ haiˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ ve la‸ naw maˇ g'a htawˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'oˆ, yawˇ ve nyi kuˇ hpawˇ ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh maˇ g'a juˆ keu nyi ve k'o, ngaˬ maˇ yonˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020026	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hiˉ nyi gaˬ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ chehˇ taˍ leh, Htoˉma‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hoˆ taˍ ve htawˇ, Yeˍsuˆ laˬ leh yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji huˉ taˍ leh, Nawˬ hui geh dawˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020027	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ Htoˉma‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve la‸ naw choˬ kaˬ lo htawˇ nyi leh, ngaˬ ve la‸ taw k'aw hta‸ nyi-o. Nawˬ ve la‸ sheh che leh, ngaˬ ve nyi kuˇ hpawˇ hta‸ juˇ keu nyi-o. Maˇ yonˍ ve taˇ cawˬ piˇ. Yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020028	Htoˉma‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020029	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ mawˬ ve pa taw yonˍ ve law leˇ. Ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ htawˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43020030	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ te maˍ piˇ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ bvuh‸ keu taˍ ve maˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
43020031	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ tuˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw yawˇ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ chi ma bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ
43021001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Tiˍbeˍriˆ g'uiˬ po awˬ paˇ lo awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ to teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ to maw piˇ ve lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ.
43021002	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ, Yaˇ cehˬ k'a teh‸ k'oˆ ve Htoˉma‸, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ Kaˍnaˆ hk'aˆ yaˇ Naˍtaˍneˍlaˆ, Zeˍbeˍdehˇ ve yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu nyiˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
43021003	Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Ngaˬ ngaˇ ca-e shaˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui ka‸ k'ai-a teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'ai leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ haˉ yawˇ hui ngaˇ ca ve, teˇ hkeh ka‸ maˇ g'a.
43021004	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ shiˍ.
43021005	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˇ g'a-aw laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Maˇ g'a teh‸ yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021006	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Haw lo‸ k'oˍ la‸ sha paˉ lo geu‸ hpehˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, g'a tuˍ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui geu‸ hpehˇ leh, ngaˇ maˇ maˇ g'a ve pa taw, geu‸ hta‸ g'awˬ maˇ g'aˇ.
43021007	Oˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ha‸ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ veu‸ taˍ ve pa taw, aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ deh sheˬ leh, g'uiˬ po hk'aw lo pawˆ lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
43021008	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ hta‸ maˇ vuiˇ, ngaˇ chi loˬ hk'e ceh tiˉ vuiˇ ve pa taw, ngaˇ hk'a biˇ geh taˍ ve geu‸ hta‸ g'awˬ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ laˬ ve yoˬ.
