43021009	Yawˇ hui pehˬ shaˉ lo gaˬ htaˇ, shiˉ g'eu‸ aˬ miˍ ceh taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, ngaˇ pinˍ taˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hkaoˍ monˇ teh taˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
43021010	Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui g'a taˍ ve ngaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ veu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021011	Hk'e te leh, Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, ngaˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve geu‸ oˇ ve hta‸ pehˬ shaˉ lo g'awˬ veu laˇ ve yoˬ. Geu‸ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ ve ngaˇ 153 hkeh cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˇ chi taw taw g'a maˇ ve htawˇ, geu‸ maˇ tzuh‸.
43021012	Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve, Awˍ caˇ la-o teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, Nawˬ a shu le teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi maˇ haˆ.
43021013	Yeˍsuˆ laˬ leh hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˇ shaˍ hta‸ htawˇ oˇ hk'e te pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021014	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve awˬ to awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ maw piˇ ve lehˬ, chi teˇ pawˆ shehˆ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
43021015	Yawˇ hui awˍ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yoˇhanˬ ve yaˇ Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ ha‸ ve a‸ kehˉ nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸-aw laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Ha‸ ve yoˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve nawˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve yawˬ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˍ piˇ taw piˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021016	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yoˇhanˬ ve yaˇ Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸-aw laˇ teh‸ k'aw‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Ha‸ ve yoˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve nawˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021017	Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yoˇhanˬ ve yaˇ Siˉmonˍ-oˬ, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸-aw laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸-aw laˇ teh‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve pa taw Peˍtruˆ dawˇ haˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve nawˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˍ piˇ taw piˇ-oˆ.
43021018	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ laˇ ve, nawˬ yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ ve teˇ yanˇ nawˬ hk'aˇ nawˬ haˍ pi tsuh‸ leh, nawˬ k'ai gaˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ mawˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ ve la‸ sheh nyiˇ paˉ che leh, shu nawˬ hta‸ haˍ pi tsuh‸ laˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ maˇ k'ai gaˇ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ lo shu nawˬ hta‸ yuˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021019	(Yeˍsuˆ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la tuˬ ve awˬ pon Peˍtruˆ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te suh tuˬ ve hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.) Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸ Peˍtruˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021020	Peˍtruˆ hpfuhˆ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ha‸ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ ve teˇ pawˆ yawˇ hui mvuhˇ hpeu‸ awˍ caˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ve nyi ma pui awˬ paˇ lo ngeh mui taˍ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ ve a shu le teh‸ na nyi shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ.
43021021	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, chi hpaˇ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
43021022	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ k'aw‸ laˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh piˇ gaˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le. Nawˬ awˬ to ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
43021023	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ g'a suh teh‸, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ g'a suh teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ k'aw‸ laˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh piˇ gaˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ le teh‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
43021024	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh bvuh‸ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
43021025	Yeˍsuˆ te ve kanˉ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hk'a te ve awˬ lawn teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e k'o, bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ daw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ miˬ guiˬ chi ka‸ maˇ daw teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
44001001	Htawˇhpiˇluˆ-oˬ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ tanˬ te tanˬ maˍ ve hta‸ te leh, yawˇ mvuhˇ naw ma lo taˆ k'o‸-e ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ, li‸ awˉ lawˉ teˇ k'oˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ peuˬ.
44001002	Yawˇ maˇ taˆ k'o‸-e sheˍ htaˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh, yawˇ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
44001003	Yawˇ hkanˍ suh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˇ chi nyi awˬ hk'aw lo tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to maw piˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to te‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui hk'a deh‸ yonˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ laiˉ ceuˬ te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44001004	Teˇ pawˆ yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ tawˆ k'ai sheˍ. Ngaˬ geh nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ taˍ peuˬ ve, Awˬ pa ve ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ law taˍ sheˍ.
44001005	Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ maˇ maw maw k'o, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ g'a hkanˍ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44001006	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, chi beu‸ nawˬ lehˬ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ k'aw‸ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ laˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44001007	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ pa yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve awˬ yanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ maˇ loˍ.
44001008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la htaˇ, nawˬ hui kanˇ paˆ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ tanˬ leh Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ, Saˍmaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh mvuhˇ leh miˬ leh hk'a gaˬ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44001009	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh yaˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ nyi chehˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ-e leh, yawˇ hui mawˬ leh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, moˬ yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44001010	Yeˍsuˆ taˆ-e chehˇ ve hta‸ tcuh yaˇ hui chiˇ nyi chehˇ htaˇ, hpu ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ veu‸ deh ve chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ cawˬ haˉ tawˆ la leh, yawˇ hui awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44001011	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'oˆ ve, Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi chehˇ ve le. Nawˬ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ taˆ-e ve Yeˍsuˆ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ mvuhˇ naw ma lo taˆ k'o‸-e ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44001012	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ hui lehˬ Shaˍlonˍ meh ve hk'aw lo tu leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ. Hk'aw oˇ ve lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ maˇ vuiˇ da‸, shinˉ nyi teˇ nyi toˇ hpeh‸ ve ya‸ k'aw hk'e fui tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44001013	Yawˇ hui venˇ hk'aw k'aw‸ gaˬ la htaˇ, yehˬ awˬ hta‸ teˇ htai‸ yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ jaw ve bawehˇ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ, Yoˇhanˬ, Yaˍkoˆ, Anˍdrehˍ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ, Htoˉma‸, Baˍhtawˇlaˍmehˇ, Ma‸htehˍ, Aˍlaˍhpehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ, Siˉmonˍ Seˍluˆ leh, Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yuˇda‸, chi teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ.
44001014	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ leh yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ leh Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44001015	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ ha nyiˇ chi g'a hk'e hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo tu huˉ leh k'oˆ ve,
44001016	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ g'a biˇ la tehˬ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ ve teˇ hkawˇ le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ ya‸ k'aw maˍ piˇ paˍ Yuˇda‸ awˬ lawn awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu Daˍviˆ ve maw‸ k'aw hta‸ cuˇ leh k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ yoˬ.
44001017	Yuˇda‸ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh kanˉ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44001018	(Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te leh, g'a ve awˬ hpfuhˇ miˬ guiˬ teˇ peˆ vuiˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˉ k'oˍ hpawˇ ce leh, g'oˇ peˬ hkoˇ ve pa taw, awˬ g'uˬ tehˆ hk'a peu-eˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
44001019	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh miˬ guiˬ oˇ ve teˇ peˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve hkawˇ Aˍkeˍdaˍmaˆ teh‸ meh piˇ ve yoˬ. Tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ miˬ guiˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
44001020	Awˬ lawn k'o, Chiˇ mvuh ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve Yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hta‸ gawˬ cu gawˬ pehˆ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ taˇ chehˇ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Yawˇ ve aˉ yaˇ shu hta‸ k'aw‸ piˇ-oˆ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44001021	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui geh shaˉ hkiˆ ga hkanˍ tuˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ loˍ ve yoˬ.
44001022	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Yoˇhanˬ geh baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh, ngaˬ hui geh yiˬ yiˬ laˬ laˬ te toˇ ve awˬ yanˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo leh, ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh k'aw‸ taˆ k'o‸-e ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ hui geh chehˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44001023	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ meh hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ Yuˇtuˆ meh ve, Baˍsaˍbaˆ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ Yoˇseh‸ yoˬ. Nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Maˍhtiˆ yoˬ.
44001024	Yawˇ hui bon lawˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ ve nyi ma hta‸ shiˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ,
44001025	Yuˇda‸ lehˬ tcuh yaˇ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo k'o‸-e peuˬ. Yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ k'aw‸ te leh tcuh yaˇ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ g'a tuˬ, chi nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ leuˆ yuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ a ciˉ beˆ maˍ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44001026	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve awˬ meh bvuh‸ keu leh hkaˆ yuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Maˍhtiˆ hta‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ geh yawˇ lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
44002001	Peˍteˍkoˆteˍ pawehˇ awˬ nyi gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ kaˬ lo tiˉ hpawnˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44002002	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ ya‸ la leh, yawˇ hui mui taˍ ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
44002003	Aˬ miˬ ha hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ha tehˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ha tehˍ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ pehˬ taˍ leh teˇ g'aˇ le le awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ jehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44002004	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu biˇ la leh, Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ tcuh yaw tcuh ve hk'e, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ hkawˇ yaw ve yoˬ.
44002005	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ le le lo laˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44002006	Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hpawnˬ la leh, a shu yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ shu yaw laˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui ka keh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44002007	Yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ leh dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, tawˇ yaw chehˇ ve chaw chi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw maˇ heˆ laˇ.
44002008	Ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ paw la kuiˬ mvuhˇ miˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve, hk'aˬ hk'e le.
44002009	Ngaˬ hui Paˍtiˆ chaw, Meˍdiˆ chaw, Eˇlanˍ chaw, Meˍsoˇpoˇtaˍmiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw, Yuˇda‸ leh Kaˍpaˍdawˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw, Poˍtuˆ leh Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw,
44002010	Hpuˍgiˆ leh Paˍpuˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw, Eˇjiˇtu‸ leh Kuˇreˍneˍ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve Liˍbuˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw, Roˉma‸ venˇ lo laˬ ve hkehˉ chaw teˇ hpaˍ, Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, Yuˇda‸ awˬ liˇ hta‸ yuˬ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ,
44002011	Kaˍreˍte chaw leh Aˍraˆ chaw, G'uiˬ sha ve uiˍ jaˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn shu yaw laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44002012	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ jaˇ leh dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Aˬ hto‸ ma hpeh‸ ve leh naˍ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ na nyi da‸ ve yoˬ.
44002013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hk'aiˉ leh k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hui lehˬ, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ awˬ suhˉ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve yoˬ.
44002014	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ lehˬ tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi teˇ g'aˇ hui geh huˉ taˍ leh, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh chaw chi ma ve hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ chaw leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na leh awˬ lawn chi hta‸ shiˍ-o‸.
44002015	Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi beu‸ lehˬ mvuhˇ shawˉ k'awˇ naˍ riˍ ceh tiˉ gaˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
44002016	Awˬ lawn chi ve lehˬ, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Yawˇlaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44002017	G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve, Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ngaˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve yaˇ paˍ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ bon maˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, zuh‸ maˆ mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
44002018	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ paˍ awˬ ceˬ ma teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ka‸, ngaˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui htawˇ bon maˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
44002019	Awˬ na hpawˇ mvuhˇ naw ma lo anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo, awˬ suhˍ, aˬ miˍ leh mvuhˇ hk'awˇ, awˬ heˆ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44002020	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve awˬ nyi maˇ gaˬ sheˍ htaˇ, mvuhˇ nyi naˆ ho‸ hpeh‸ la leh, ha pa htawˇ awˬ suhˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
44002021	Oˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ peun leh kuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Yawˇlaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44002022	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui-oˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ na-o. Nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ cuˇ leh kanˉ uiˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ, anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
44002023	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha shiˍ taˍ leh dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve hk'e Yeˍsuˆ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chaw haiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ peuˬ.
44002024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, suh ve awˬ hk'aw lo tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha hpui baˬ piˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, suh ve oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ hpeh taˍ maˇ g'a.
44002025	Yawˇ awˬ lawn Daˍviˆ chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44002026	Chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ve nyi ma ha lehˬ leh, ngaˬ ve maw‸ k'aw ha lehˬ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ ve awˬ to dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44002027	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve co ha hta‸ suh mvuhˇ suh miˬ lo baˬ taˉ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ ve da‸ kehˬ ve Chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuiˇ k'ai luˬ k'ai tuˬ nawˬ maˇ hpeh‸ piˇ.
44002028	Co ha te‸ ve ya‸ k'aw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Nawˬ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve biˇ la tuˬ nawˬ te laˇ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ Daˍviˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44002029	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ Daˍviˆ awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ k'oˆ laˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ suh leh, shu yawˇ hta‸ tuˍ piˇ peuˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ yawˇ ve tuˍ hpfuh ngaˬ hui geh cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
44002030	Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ ve k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui tcuh tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ ka ti‸ te leh hkanˍ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44002031	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Hkri‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ dawˇ shiˍ dawˇ mawˬ leh, Hkri‸ hta‸ suh mvuhˇ suh miˬ lo maˇ baˬ taˉ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ ve awˬ to htawˇ kuiˇ ve luˬ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ teh‸ Daˍviˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44002032	Yeˍsuˆ chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ awˬ lawn chi hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44002033	Hk'e te leh, G'ui sha ve la‸ sha paˉ lo yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ uiˍ yuˬ mvuh piˇ leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Awˬ pa k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e Awˬ pa geh yawˇ g'a ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ g'a mawˬ ve hk'e, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ yawˇ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44002034	Awˬ lawn k'o, Daˍviˆ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ awˬ to k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
44002035	Nawˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve hkui sheh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ taˍ htaˇ hk'a ga, ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ-oˆ, teh‸ Daˍviˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44002036	Hk'e te leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ teˇ yehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ chi hta‸ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ-o‸. Nawˬ hui la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve Yeˍsuˆ chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ ka‸ Hkri‸ ka‸ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ teh‸ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44002037	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ heuˆ jaˇ leh, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸, Peˍtruˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44002038	Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ tuˬ, venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ-o‸. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
44002039	Awˬ lawn k'o, ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ chi lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ka‸, nawˬ hui ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ awˬ pon ka‸, vuiˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon ka‸, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hk'a kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44002040	Yawˇ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tawˇ maˇ maˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Nyi ma k'aw‸ ve chaw chi teˇ co awˬ hk'aw lo g'a ponˬ tuˬ te-o teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44002041	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo chaw aˬ laˬ hk'e shehˆ hinˉ g'aˇ k'aw‸ maˇ la ve yoˬ.
44002042	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tcuh yaˇ hui maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve, awˬ chawˇ te da‸ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ ve pawehˇ hta‸ caˇ ve leh bon lawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ te tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44002043	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Tcuh yaˇ hui lehˬ, anˇ tuˬ leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ maˇ te tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
44002044	Hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ moˍ tiˉ te leh, mawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ teˇ geh yehˇ ve yoˬ.
44002045	Yawˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hawˇ leh, hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, loˍ ve hk'e chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44002046	Teˇ nyi le le yawˇ hui teˇ geh bon yehˬ lonˉ lo taˆ-e ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hkaoˍ monˇ hk'eh‸ leh, ha lehˬ ha k'a nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui teˇ geh caˇ tuˬ caˇ ve yoˬ.
44002047	Yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ nyi le le Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ la piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44003001	Teˇ nyi htaˇ Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ bon lawˬ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, bon yehˬ lonˉ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44003002	Paw la htaˇ ka‸ hkui sheh luˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw lo‸-e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh lawˬ caˇ tuˬ, teˇ nyi le le shu yawˇ hta‸ taˆ laˬ leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo, Nyi sha ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve yehˬ miˉ awˬ paˇ lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44003003	Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44003004	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh, Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ nyi-o teh‸ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44003005	Yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ g'a tuˬ teh‸ dawˇ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi taˍ ve yoˬ.
44003006	Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ geh hpu shi maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo juˇ k'ai loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44003007	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ la‸ sheh hta‸ Peˍtruˆ g'awˬ tu piˇ leh, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ ve hkui taw peh leh hkui k'awˍ lehˍ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
44003008	Yawˇ pawˆ tu leh juˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw lo‸-e leh juˇ k'ai, pawˆ k'ai leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
44003009	Yawˇ juˇ k'ai chehˇ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ,
44003010	yawˇ lehˬ bon yehˬ lonˉ ve Nyi sha ve yehˬ miˉ awˬ paˇ lo mui taˍ leh lawˬ caˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ hui anˇ jaˇ leh dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve yoˬ.
44003011	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ htaˇ, chaw chi ma ve anˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh Sawˉla‸monˍ ve koˇ caˉ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ kaˬ lo g'uiˇ laˬ ve yoˬ.
44003012	Peˍtruˆ chi hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw awˬ lawn chi hta‸ naw hui anˇ ve le. Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ leh a shu yawˇ ve da‸ hkuiˇ ja hkuiˇ hta‸ pa taw chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ya‸ k'aw juˇ piˇ lawˬ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ leh, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tiˉ nyi tiˍ taˍ ve le.
44003013	Aˍbraˍhanˍ, Iˉcaˆ leh Yaˍkoˆ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ peuˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ leh jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ yawˇ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ dawˇ cheˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve yoˬ.
44003014	Da‸ ve kehˬ ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui chiˇ baˬ leh, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui lawˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44003015	Co ha te‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui tiˇ pehˍ ve htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ lawn chi hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44003016	Nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, awˬ meh oˇ ve lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw g'a leh, yonˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ chehˇ sha la piˇ peuˬ.
44003017	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ shiˍ leh te ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ maˇ shiˍ leh chi hk'e te ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44003018	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ ve Hkri‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hta‸ cuˇ leh awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ te biˇ la peuˬ.
44003019	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ shiˆ baˬ laˇ tuˬ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh nyi ma k'aw‸ pa-o. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve dawˇ sha ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la leh,
44003020	nawˬ hui awˬ pon leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve Yeˍsuˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Hkri‸ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44003021	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ ve da‸ kehˬ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ gu te htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, Yeˍsuˆ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44003022	Moˉseˍ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, ngaˬ hta‸ shuˍ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui awˬ pon tawˆ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a na yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
44003023	A shu teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve k'o, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ baˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Moˉseˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44003024	Saˍmo-eˍlaˆ hta‸ tanˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hk'a tawˆ la ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44003025	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ pa taw, miˬ guiˬ chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44003026	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ le le, a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˉ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ na‸ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hta‸ tawˆ la piˇ leh, nawˬ hui geh awˉ lawˉ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44004001	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ shaw ve ma‸ poˍ leh Saˍduˆkehˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui geh gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
44004002	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh, suh ve chaw hui hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve awˬ lawn bon maˍ ve pa taw, gaˬ la ve chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ bawˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44004003	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ la ve pa taw, shawˉ pawˍ teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44004004	Bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Yonˍ ve chaw hawˉ hk'aˆ tiˉ ngaˇ hinˉ g'aˇ hk'e cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44004005	Shawˉ pawˍ teˇ nyi hk'e gaˬ leh Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo hpawnˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44004006	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ Aˍnaˆ leh, Kaˍyaˍhpaˆ, Yoˇhanˬ, Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh hpawnˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44004007	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo teh taˍ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ a shu ve kanˇ paˆ, a shu ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo chi hk'e te ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44004008	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui ve jawˇ mawˇ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ,
44004009	hkui luˬ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ bon te piˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te gu na-e piˇ ve awˬ lawn ya‸ nyi ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ na nyi laˇ ve k'o,
44004010	nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ leh Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ chi hta‸ shiˍ-o‸. Nawˬ hui la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ leh suh kuiˬ lo G'uiˬ sha k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw, chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ na-e la leh, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44004011	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, nawˬ hui yehˬ kawˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ baˬ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpeh‸ htawˇ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ ceˍ k'aweh‸ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
44004012	Yawˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ maˇ g'a. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ meh maˇ heˆ k'o, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ meh maˇ cawˬ teh‸ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44004013	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ li‸ maˇ shiˍ ve chaw, te‸ chiˉ maˇ g'a henˇ jaw ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve pa taw, anˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Yeˍsuˆ geh chehˇ jaw ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44004014	Na-e la peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui te‸ chiˉ ka‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
44004015	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ awˬ baˬ lo tawˆ k'ai tcuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ jehˬ da‸ leh k'oˆ ve,
44004016	Chaw chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te tuˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, awˬ heˆ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na te tawˆ la ve hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui te‸ chiˉ ca k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44004017	ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi ma ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ lawn chi leuˉ leh maˇ g'a bvuhˬ k'ai tuˬ, awˬ meh chi hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a maˍ tuˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tawˇ hk'a deh‸ nyiˉ piˇ shaˍ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44004018	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ hto piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ a ciˉ ka‸ taˇ te teh‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44004019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve a‸ kehˉ nawˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ cawˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui dawˇ nyi-o.
44004020	Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, g'a kaˇ g'a mawˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ hto maˇ maˍ ve k'o, chehˇ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44004021	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tawˇ hk'a deh‸ k'aw‸ nyiˉ piˇ leh hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw chi ma ve hta‸ pa taw yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui ca maˇ g'a ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn chi hta‸ pa taw chaw hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
44004022	Na-e la peuˬ ve, awˬ heˆ chi hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a sha‸ awˇ chi hk'aw‸ hpaˆ gaˬ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
44004023	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ peuˬ htaˇ, awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'o‸-e leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hui hk'a k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44004024	Yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh te leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma, miˬ naˆ ma, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ leh oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44004025	Nawˬ lehˬ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh nawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Daˍviˆ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve le. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chaw yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ca dawˇ nyi ve le.
44004026	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha leh yawˇ ve Hkri‸ hta‸ tawˍ da‸ tuˬ, chi miˬ guiˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ tu la leh, uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ teˇ geh hpawnˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ Daˍviˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44004027	Nawˬ naˍ manˇ shehˍ taˍ ve, nawˬ ve da‸ kehˬ ve awˬ ceˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ tawˍ da‸ tuˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ leh jawˇ mawˇ Poˍtiˆ Piˉla‸, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui ka‸, venˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ tehˬ awˬ na teˇ geh hpawnˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44004028	Aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ ve kanˇ paˆ leh nawˬ ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e nawˬ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44004029	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, chi beu‸ yawˇ hui tawˇ nyiˉ laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ nyi leh, nawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ga laˇ sheˍ.
44004030	Naˬ ve gawˬ ve hta‸ gu na-e piˇ tuˬ, nawˬ ve la‸ sheh che leh, nawˬ ve da‸ kehˬ ve awˬ ceˬ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw, awˬ heˆ leh anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44004031	Yawˇ hui bon lawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hiˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu biˇ la leh, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh maˍ ve yoˬ.
44004032	Yonˍ ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ, dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ hk'aˇ tiˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ cawˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve teh‸ maˇ k'oˆ leh, hk'a cawˬ ve mawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ teˇ geh yehˇ ve yoˬ.
44004033	Tcuh yaˇ hui lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44004034	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo loˍ ve cuˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ leh yehˬ hk'a cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ, yawˇ hui ve miˬ guiˬ leh yehˬ hta‸ hawˇ leh, g'a ve hpu hta‸ yuˬ laˬ leh, tcuh yaˇ hui ve hkui paˇ lo taˍ ve yoˬ.
44004035	Yawˇ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ loˍ ve hk'e yawˇ hui hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44004036	Oˇ htaˇ, Kuˇpaˍruˆ conˇ lo paw la ve Leˍviˆ chaw, Yoˇseh‸ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Tcuh yaˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ Baˍnaˍbaˆ teh‸ meh piˇ ve yoˬ. Baˍnaˍbaˆ k'oˆ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, awˬ g'aˇ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44004037	Yawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve miˬ guiˬ teˇ peˆ hta‸ hawˇ leh, g'a ve hpu hta‸ tcuh yaˇ hui ve hkui paˇ lo laˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44005001	Aˍnaˍniˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ leh yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma Saˍhpiˉra‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ka‸ miˬ guiˬ teˇ peˆ hawˇ ve yoˬ.
44005002	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ nyi ma hawˍ da‸ leh, awˬ hpfuhˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pun yuˬ teh taˉ leh teˇ pun ceh tiˉ tcuh yaˇ hui ve hkui paˇ lo laˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44005003	Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Aˍnaˍniˆ-oˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ heˍ piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ hpfuhˇ teˇ pun yuˬ teh taˉ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ chi hk'e te gaˇ ve nyi ma hk'a biˇ cawˬ la tuˬ aˬ hto‸ ma te Saˍtanˍ nawˬ hta‸ dawˇ tawˆ piˇ lawˬ ve le.
44005004	Miˬ guiˬ oˇ ve maˇ hawˇ sheˍ htaˇ, nawˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Hawˇ leh g'a ve awˬ hpfuhˇ htawˇ, nawˬ ve mawˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chi hk'e te tuˬ nawˬ ve nyi ma hk'aw ca dawˇ ve le. Nawˬ chaw yaˇ hta‸ heˍ ve maˇ heˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ heˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005005	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Aˍnaˍniˆ paiˍ leh suh-e ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44005006	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw haˉ paˍ hui tu la leh, yawˇ hta‸ htiˆ leh ca taˆ tuˍ ve yoˬ.
44005007	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ shehˆ naˍ riˍ hk'e gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma lo‸ la ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ.
44005008	Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ miˬ guiˬ hawˇ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ chi ma tiˉ g'a ve yoˬ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yoˬ, chi ma tiˉ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005009	Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve le. Nyi loˬ. Nawˬ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ ca tuˍ ve chaw hui lehˬ, yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ lo k'aw‸ gaˬ la peuˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui taˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005010	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve Peˍtruˆ ve hkui paˇ lo paiˍ leh suh-e ve yoˬ. Chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lo‸ la leh, yaˇ miˇ suh taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui taˆ veu leh, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ paˇ lo ca tuˍ ve yoˬ.
44005011	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ leh awˬ lawn chi ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44005012	Tcuh yaˇ hui lehˬ chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ awˬ heˆ leh anˇ tuˬ maˇ maˇ te ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh Sawˉla‸monˍ ve koˇ caˉ lo hpawnˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44005013	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ ca pawnˇ da‸ maˇ haˆ htawˇ, chaw chi ma ve yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˆ yan leh taˍ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
44005014	Yonˍ ve chaw, hawˉ hk'aˆ yaˇ miˇ awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ pawnˇ da‸ la ve yoˬ.
44005015	Peˍtruˆ ya‸ k'aw k'ai htaˇ, yawˇ ve aˉ g'uiˬ ha chaw naˬ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ baˬ piˇ tuˬ, chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shu taˆ leh, ya‸ k'aw paˇ lo zuh‸ hpui leh ku-iˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44005016	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo cawˬ ve venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ hpawnˬ laˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ leh neˇ cha‸ chiˆ geh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ veu laˇ leh yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005017	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ leh yawˇ ve chaw Saˍduˆkehˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hkawehˉ ve nyi ma hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ geh tu la leh,
44005018	tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44005019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, htawnˍ yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpaw sheˬ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ shiˍ tawˆ-e leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
44005020	Nawˬ hui k'ai loˬ. Bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw huˉ leh, co ha te‸ ve chi hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005021	Tawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ shawˉ teˇ na‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw yawˇ hui lo‸-e leh maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ lonˉ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ ca shiˍ laˬ tuˬ, bon yehˬ ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw lo k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44005022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ hui htawnˍ hk'aw lo gaˬ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ. Yawˇ hui k'o‸-e leh k'oˆ ve,
44005023	Htawnˍ yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a deh‸ hoˆ taˍ leh, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yehˬ miˉ awˬ baˬ lo shaw chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui yehˬ miˉ hta‸ hpaw htaˇ, awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ mawˬ teh‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005024	Bon yehˬ lonˉ ve ma‸ poˍ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ leh naˍ, yawˇ hui dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve yoˬ.
44005025	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ lo‸ la leh k'oˆ ve, Htawnˍ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui haw taˍ ve chaw hui lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw lo huˉ taˍ leh chaw chi ma ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005026	Oˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ ve ma‸ poˍ leh yawˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ teˇ geh k'ai leh, tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ ca shiˍ veu laˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi ma ve yawˇ hui hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ la puiˉ-aˆ teh‸ yawˇ hui kawˆ ve pa taw, tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh maˇ te.
44005027	Yawˇ hui hta‸ shiˍ veu laˇ leh, jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve,
44005028	Awˬ meh chi hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui maˇ g'a maˍ maˇ g'a hto tuˬ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh tawˇ piˇ taˍ peuˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ, Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui maˍ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hk'a biˇ biˇ la piˇ peuˬ. Chaw oˇ ve hpaˇ ve awˬ suhˍ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la piˇ tuˬ nawˬ hui dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005029	Peˍtruˆ leh tcuh yaˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chaw yaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ a‸ kehˉ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a na yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44005030	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui suhˆ hkuiˉ daw hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ peuˬ.
44005031	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a g'a tuˬ awˬ pon, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ Uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ leh Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ leh, yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ-e peuˬ ve yoˬ.
44005032	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu htawˇ, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005033	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
44005034	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˆ yan ve Gaˍmaˍleˍlaˆ meh ve Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ tu leh, tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ teˇ hkui shiˍ tawˆ-e tuˬ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005035	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui-oˬ, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te tuˬ ve shaˍ ti‸ hk'a deh‸ taˍ-o‸.
44005036	Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ Htuˇda‸ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ tu la leh, yawˇ chaw uiˍ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw aˬ laˬ hk'e awˇ ha g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hpaˆ da‸ guiˇ da‸ leh luˬ k'ai mehˉ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44005037	Yawˇ luˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hui awˬ meh keu ve teˇ yanˇ, Yuˇda‸ meh ve Gaˍliˍlehˇ chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ tawˆ la leh, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ beˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ htawˇ, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai leh, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hpaˆ da‸ guiˇ da‸ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44005038	Hk'e te leh, chi beu‸ chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ taˇ te. Yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui chehˇ piˇ. Yawˇ hui dawˇ ve leh yawˇ hui te ve chi teˇ hpaˍ, chaw yaˇ lo hpeh‸ la ve k'o, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
44005039	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha lo hpeh‸ la ve k'o, nawˬ hui te luˬ g'a tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ heh‸ hkehnˉ ve chaw htawˇ hpeh‸ la puiˉ-aˆ mehˍ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44005040	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui na yuˬ leh, tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ jaw‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo shu hta‸ maˇ g'a maˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ k'aw‸ piˇ peuˬ leh hpehˇ peu ve yoˬ.
44005041	Tcuh yaˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ meh oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te laˇ ve hta‸ hkanˍ keunˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha shawˍ taˍ ve pa taw, jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44005042	Yawˇ hui teˇ nyi le le bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yehˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˍ piˇ leh bon maˍ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44006001	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ la chehˇ htaˇ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ hkawˇ yaw ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Heˍbrehˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca beu ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, teˇ nyi le le caˇ tuˬ pehˬ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hui ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ hk'a deh‸ maˇ g'a ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
44006002	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ teh taˉ leh caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ pehˬ caˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve lehˬ maˇ cawˇ.
44006003	Hk'e te leh, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh da‸ ve, Awˬ ha hpu ka‸ cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ ka‸ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve chaw suhˍ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui leuˆ yuˬ sheˍ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ kanˉ chi teˇ maˬ ngaˬ hui te tcuh tuˬ yoˬ.
44006004	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, bon lawˬ leh bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44006005	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma cawˇ leh chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yonˍ ve leh da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve Saˍteˍhpanˍ teˇ g'aˇ leh, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ, Pawˇhkawˍ, Niˆkaˍnawˍ, Tiˉmonˍ, Paˍmeˍnaˆ leh Yuˇda‸ awˬ liˇ yuˬ ve Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ yaˇ Niˇkawˇlaˆ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44006006	Tcuh yaˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ teh taˍ leh, tcuh yaˇ hui bon lawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44006007	G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ bvuhˬ k'ai leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ la‸ g'awˇ maˇ maˇ k'aw‸ maˇ la ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ laiˉ g'a htawˇ na yuˬ leh yonˍ ve yoˬ.
44006008	Saˍteˍhpanˍ lehˬ, awˬ bon leh kanˇ paˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh, chaw yaˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ uiˍ jaˇ ve anˇ tuˬ leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve yoˬ.
44006009	Oˇ htaˇ, ponˬ ve chaw hui teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yuˇda‸ bon yehˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hui leh, Kuˇreˍneˍ chaw, Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ chaw, Kiˇliˇkiˆ chaw leh, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ chaw hui tu la leh Saˍteˍhpanˍ hta‸ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44006010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ yaw ve cuˇ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ leh Awˬ ha hpu ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui tawˍ da‸ maˇ hpeh‸.
44006011	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'awˇ jehˬ leh chi hk'e k'oˆ tcuh ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, Moˉseˍ hta‸ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ka‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ tcuh ve yoˬ.
44006012	Yawˇ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca juˆ piˇ leh, Saˍteˍhpanˍ hta‸ ca hpeh yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44006013	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, heˍ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, da‸ kehˬ ve bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ leh awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44006014	Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ chi ve hta‸ te luˬ leh, Moˉseˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ piˇ taˉ laˇ ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44006015	Oˇ htaˇ, jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ Saˍteˍhpanˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi htaˇ, yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44007001	Oˇ htaˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ k'oˆ ve, Chi hk'e yoˬ laˇ teh‸, Saˍteˍhpanˍ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44007002	Saˍteˍhpanˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi leh awˬ pa hui-oˬ, a ciˉ na sheˍ. Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ, Haˍranˍ venˇ lo maˇ ca chehˇ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ, Meˍsoˇpoˇtaˍmiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve G'uiˬ sha yawˇ geh tawˆ la leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
44007003	Nawˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ leh nawˬ ve chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ lo tawˆ k'ai leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44007004	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Hkaˍlaˍdehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh, Haˍranˍ venˇ lo ca chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ pa suh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo k'aw‸ tawˆ la tcuh leh, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui chehˇ taˍ ve mvuhˇ miˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo jiˆ laˬ tcuh ve yoˬ.
44007005	Mvuhˇ miˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ awˬ shinˉ hkui taw k'aw hui ka‸ maˇ piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ yaˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, mvuhˇ miˬ chi yawˇ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui hta‸ ka‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44007006	G'uiˬ sha chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui lehˬ, shu ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hkehˉ chaw g'a te leh, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo yawˇ hui awˇ ha hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ awˬ ceˬ g'a te leh fawˉ ve mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
44007007	Yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ ceˬ te tcuh ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ suhˉ jehˬ leh ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui tawˆ la leh choˬ kaˬ lo ngaˬ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44007008	Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ htawˇ Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ Iˉcaˆ paw la leh, hiˉ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Iˉcaˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ paw la leh, Yaˍkoˆ htawˇ yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ paw la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
44007009	Awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ hkawehˉ ve pa taw, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ geh chehˇ leh,
44007010	yawˇ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Eˇjiˇtu‸ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Hpaˍrawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Yoˇseh‸ k'ai htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ piˇ ve pa taw, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ leh yawˇ ve hawˉ yehˬ ka‸ Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tcuh ve yoˬ.
44007011	Oˇ htaˇ, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Hkaˍnanˍ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo meu‸ ve kaˆ ve gaˬ la leh, tu‸ jaˇ hkanˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, nyiˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ ca maˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
44007012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo caˬ shiˍ cawˬ ve teh‸ Yaˍkoˆ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, nyiˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ teˇ pawˆ yawˇ peu k'ai ve yoˬ.
44007013	Yawˇ hui nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai htaˇ, Yoˇseh‸ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to shiˍ piˇ leh, Hpaˍrawˇ htawˇ Yoˇseh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44007014	Oˇ htaˇ Yoˇseh‸ lehˬ, awˬ pa Yaˍkoˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ca shiˍ laˬ tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui chaw hk'a peu-eˬ suhˍ chi ngaˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44007015	Yaˍkoˆ htawˇ Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai leh, yawˇ awˬ to ka‸, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ hui kaˬ oˇ kaˬ lo suh peuˬ ve yoˬ.
44007016	Yawˇ hui hta‸ Sheˍhkenˍ venˇ lo taˆ k'o‸-e leh, Sheˍhkenˍ venˇ yaˇ Haˍmawˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui geh Aˍbraˍhanˍ hpu piˇ leh vuiˬ taˍ ve tuˍ hpfuh lo ca tuˍ ve yoˬ.
44007017	G'uiˬ sha Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve awˬ yanˇ biˇ la paˇ neˇ htaˇ, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nyiˬ hui ve chaw ceuˬ uiˍ la maˇ la ve yoˬ.
44007018	Yoˇseh‸ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ hui maˇ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44007019	Jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, nyiˬ hui ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ cuˇ yiˍ te leh, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ g'a te‸ tuˬ, nyiˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ leh yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ tcuh ve yoˬ.
44007020	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nyi sha jaˇ ve Moˉseˍ teˇ g'a paw la ve yoˬ. Ha pa sheh lehˇ hk'a gaˬ awˬ pa ve aˉ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ hu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44007021	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hta‸ ca baˬ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, Hpaˍrawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ yawˇ hta‸ g'awˆ yuˬ leh yawˇ ve yaˇ hk'e shawˍ leh hu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44007022	Moˉseˍ lehˬ Eˇjiˇtu‸ chaw hui ve cuˇ yiˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a henˇ leh, tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44007023	Yawˇ a sha‸ awˇ chi hk'aw‸ gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ hta‸ ca nyi tuˬ, yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
44007024	Yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shu fawˉ mehˍ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve chaw hta‸ ga piˇ leh, fawˉ mehˍ chehˇ ve Eˇjiˇtu‸ chaw hta‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ leh tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
44007025	G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh, yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ chehˇ ve awˬ lawn awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ shiˍ-aw hehˉ teh‸ Moˉseˍ dawˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
44007026	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ ya‸ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, Awˬ chawˇ hui-oˬ, nawˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ da‸ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ la tuˬ hka piˇ ve yoˬ.
44007027	Yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ hta‸ ya‸ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ leh suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ te tuˬ, a shu nawˬ hta‸ teh taˍ ve le.
44007028	Aˉ nyi htaˇ Eˇjiˇtu‸ chaw hta‸ nawˬ tiˇ pehˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hta‸ ka‸ tiˇ pehˍ gaˇ ve laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, Moˉseˍ hta‸ ca‸ baˬ ve yoˬ.
44007029	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ Moˉseˍ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Meˇdiˍanˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ca hpaw chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ htaˇ, yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
44007030	Awˇ chi hk'aw‸ ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Siˉnaˆ hk'aw awˬ paˇ lo cawˬ ve heh puiˉ hk'aw lo aˉ chuˇ buiˇ aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ leh, aˬ miˍ ha oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44007031	Moˉseˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ anˇ leh, hk'a deh‸ nyi tuˬ awˬ paˇ lo jiˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44007032	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la leh, Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ hui ve G'uiˬ sha, Aˍbraˍhanˍ, Iˉcaˆ, Yaˍkoˆ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ Moˉseˍ kawˆ cheˆ leh nyi maˇ haˆ.
44007033	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve hkuiˉ nuˆ k'ehˆ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ huˉ taˍ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lehˬ, da‸ kehˬ ve miˬ guiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44007034	Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ shu fawˉ mehˍ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ hui hk'anˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ ya‸ la peuˬ. Chi beu‸ laˬ-o‸. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai tcuh laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44007035	Moˉseˍ chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui baˬ taˉ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ leh suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ te tuˬ a shu nawˬ hta‸ teh taˍ ve le. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ jawˇ mawˇ leh htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, aˉ chuˇ buiˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha cuˇ leh, Moˉseˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44007036	Moˉseˍ lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hta‸ sheh tawˆ-e ve yoˬ. Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, awˇ chi hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ heh puiˉ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ anˇ tuˬ leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve yoˬ.
44007037	Moˉseˍ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Nawˬ hui ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ shuˍ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hta‸ hto piˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44007038	Moˉseˍ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Siˉnaˆ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw piˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ geh maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ geh maˇ k'oˆ, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ, yawˇ lehˬ te‸ chehˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44007039	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'o‸-e gaˇ ve nyi ma tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44007040	Yawˇ hui Aˍronˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai laˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ te laˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw sheh tawˆ la ve Moˉseˍ teˇ g'aˇ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ leh naˍ, ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44007041	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui lehˬ, nuˇ ehˉ awˬ han shaˉ ho‸ teˇ maˬ te leh oˇ ve hta‸ tanˇ tuˬ tanˇ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui la‸ sheh te taˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ ha lehˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44007042	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hpfuhˆ k'ai leh, meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ yehˬ-oˬ, nawˬ hui heh puiˉ hk'aw lo awˇ chi hk'aw‸ chehˇ htaˇ, to nuˇ to shaˆ teˇ hpaˍ tiˇ tanˇ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ tanˇ laˇ ve laˇ.
44007043	Nawˬ hui oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ awˬ pon te taˍ ve Mawˇloˆ shaˉ ho‸ ve hpa aˉ po k'o leh, Reˍhpanˍ g'uiˬ sha ve meu‸ keu shiˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui taˍ uiˍ leh taˆ toˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ coˇ paˉ hk'a gaˬ shiˍ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44007044	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hpa aˉ po k'o cawˬ ve yoˬ. Moˉseˍ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ g'a te ve teh‸, G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e yawˇ te taˍ ve hpa aˉ po k'o hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44007045	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ hui lehˬ, Yawˇsuˆ geh teˇ geh mvuhˇ miˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸ la htaˇ, hpa aˉ po k'o oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ lo‸ la ve yoˬ. Hpa aˉ po k'o oˇ ve lehˬ, Daˍviˆ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ hk'a gaˬ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44007046	Daˍviˆ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh Yaˍkoˆ ve G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ yehˬ te tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ lawˬ ve htawˇ,
44007047	G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon yehˬ g'a te ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Sawˉla‸monˍ yoˬ.
44007048	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, chaw yaˇ la‸ sheh te taˍ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e,
44007049	Mvuhˇ naw ma lehˬ, ngaˬ ve k'aw jaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ lehˬ ngaˬ hkui sheh taˍ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ pon nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e ve yehˬ te tuˬ ve le. Ngaˬ jehˇ tuˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hk'aˬ ve teˇ kaˬ le.
44007050	Chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh te taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44007051	K'awˍ peˍ heh ve chaw, nyi ma leh naˍ paw awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ te ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44007052	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ fawˉ maˇ mehˍ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ le. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ laˬ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn hto piˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hui tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ htawˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui chiˇ a‸ leh tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ.
44007053	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a taˍ ve ka‸, nawˬ hui maˇ na yuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44007054	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw chi ma ve g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, ciˬ geu‸ ve yoˬ.
44007055	Oˇ htaˇ Saˍteˍhpanˍ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chiˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sha paˉ lo Yeˍsuˆ huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ ka‸ g'a mawˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ.
44007056	Mvuhˇ naw ma hpaw taˍ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sha paˉ lo chaw yaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ mawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44007057	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ leh, a shu yawˇ ve naˍ paw tsuhˇ taˍ leh yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ geh Saˍteˍhpanˍ geh g'uiˇ lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
44007058	Peuˬ leh, venˇ awˬ baˬ lo yawˇ hta‸ g'awˬ tawˆ-e leh, yawˇ hta‸ haˉ pui shiˍ ga hpoˆ baˬ ve yoˬ. Shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hui htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ k'ehˆ leh Sawˉlu‸ meh ve chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ ve hkui paˇ lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44007059	Yawˇ hui Saˍteˍhpanˍ hta‸ haˉ pui shiˍ ga baˬ chehˇ htaˇ, Saˍteˍhpanˍ bon lawˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve co ha hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44007060	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, venˇ baˆ chi yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ taˇ taˍ teh‸, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ suh ve yoˬ.
44008001	Yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve lehˬ, Sawˉlu‸ htawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ lehˬ, fawˉ mehˍ jaˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve pa taw, tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hpaˆ da‸ leh Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Saˍmaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo hpaw-e ve yoˬ.
44008002	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Saˍteˍhpanˍ hta‸ ca tuˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw g'aˇ hte‸ paˆ hawˬ kehˇ hawˬ ve yoˬ.
44008003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Sawˉlu‸ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ te luˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ teˇ yehˬ peuˬ teˇ yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, hawˉ hk'aˆ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'awˬ k'ai leh, htawnˍ hk'aw lo ca keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44008004	Hk'e te leh hpaˆ da‸ k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ lo k'ai leh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ca maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008005	Hpiˇliˇpuˆ htawˇ, Saˍmaˍriˆ venˇ lo k'ai leh yawˇ hui hta‸ Hkri‸ awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008006	Yawˇ maˍ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh, yawˇ te ve awˬ heˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ lehˬ, nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na ve yoˬ.
44008007	Awˬ lawn k'o, neˇ cha‸ chiˆ geh ve chaw maˇ maˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh ve chaw leh, hkui luˬ ve chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ htawˇ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008008	Hk'e te leh, venˇ yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ maˇ maˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44008009	Siˉmonˍ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo faˍ te leh, Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw hui hta‸ maˇ maˇ anˇ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ chaw uiˍ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44008010	Uiˍ ve i ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ leh, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na ve yoˬ.
44008011	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, maw chaweh faˍ te maˍ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ anˇ piˇ lawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na ve yoˬ.
44008012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ lawn Hpiˇliˇpuˆ maˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui yonˍ la leh, hawˉ hk'aˆ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44008013	Siˉmonˍ yawˇ awˬ to htawˇ yonˍ la leh, baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ heˆ leh uiˍ ve anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44008014	Saˍmaˍriˆ chaw hui G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve awˬ lawn Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Peˍtruˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44008015	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu g'a tuˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon bon lawˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008016	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ka‸, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu maˇ ya‸ la sheˍ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ ve ceh tiˉ sheˍ.
44008017	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ la‸ sheh taˍ leh, yawˇ hui da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ ha hpu g'a ve yoˬ.
44008018	Tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ shu awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ la‸ sheh taˍ ve pa taw da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu g'a ve hta‸ Siˉmonˍ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hpu yuˬ veu laˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
44008019	Hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ la‸ sheh taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu g'a tuˬ, kanˇ paˆ chi ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44008020	Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ hpu piˇ leh g'a tuˬ teh‸ nawˬ dawˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ ve hpu lehˬ nawˬ geh hk'a geh luˬ k'ai piˇ-oˆ.
44008021	G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ ve nyi ma maˇ hteˇ ve pa taw, kanˉ chi hta‸ nawˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ caˉ da‸.
44008022	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve chi hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ loˬ. Hpeh‸ ve k'o, nawˬ ve nyi ma dawˇ hk'aˇ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ-oˆ.
44008023	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˇ ve awˬ taw‸ ma cawˬ leh, venˇ baˆ nawˬ hta‸ hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008024	Oˇ htaˇ Siˉmonˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hk'a k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ, teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ g'a gaˬ la tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ pon Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha geh lawˬ hkawˉ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44008025	Hk'e te leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. K'o‸-e chehˇ htaˇ, Saˍmaˍriˆ hk'aˆ laiˉ hk'aˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008026	Oˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ tu leh, awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ lo k'ai-o. Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ te leh Gaˍsaˍ lo k'ai ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ k'aw oˇ ve lehˬ, shehˇ de hk'aw k'ai ve ya‸ k'aw yoˬ.
44008027	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ tu leh k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Ehˇtaˍyoˇpiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ ve, Kanˍdaˍkeˍ meh ve nanˇ hawˉ hkanˇ ma awˬ hawˉ lo jawˇ mawˇ te ve Ehˇtaˍyoˇpiˆ chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo oˉ k'oˍ ca pui k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, nanˇ hawˉ hkanˇ ma ve hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44008028	Yawˇ k'o‸-e chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve iˉ mvuhˇ lawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mui leh, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ ve li‸ hta‸ g'aw chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44008029	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ Awˬ ha hpu k'oˆ piˇ ve, Iˉ mvuhˇ lawˬ oˇ ve geh teˇ geh k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008030	Hk'e te leh, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ g'uiˇ k'ai leh, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ ve li‸ hk'aw lo jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve g'aw chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Nawˬ g'aw chehˇ ve awˬ lawn chi hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ-aˬ laˇ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44008031	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Shu ngaˬ hta‸ tcuhˉ kuiˬ maˇ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ peuˬ leh, yawˇ geh teˇ geh taˆ mui la tuˬ yawˇ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44008032	Yawˇ g'aw chehˇ ve Li‸ hpu lehˬ chi teˇ tawn yoˬ. Tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hta‸ sheh k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˬ mvuh nuˆ shehˍ hpaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˬ ehˉ ta‸ iˉ chehˇ ve hk'e, yawˇ ka‸ yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw maˇ ngaˉ leh ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44008033	Nyiˉ ya‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ htaˇ, shu yawˇ hta‸ maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo suhˉ jehˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ a shu k'aoˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ ve yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44008034	A ma‸ lonˉ lehˬ Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ na nyi ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ chi teˇ g'aˇ a shu awˬ lawn k'oˆ ve le. Yawˇ awˬ to awˬ lawn k'oˆ ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn k'oˆ ve laˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ a ciˉ na nyi gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008035	Oˇ htaˇ, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ leh, Li‸ hpu chi teˇ tawn hta‸ tanˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008036	Yawˇ hui ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, iˉ kaˆ cawˬ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ la leh, a ma‸ lonˉ k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, choˬ kaˬ iˉ kaˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma tawˍ taˍ tuˬ cawˬ le teh‸ k'oˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008038	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ iˉ mvuhˇ lawˬ hta‸ jehˇ tcuh leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ iˉ kaˆ hk'aw lo ya‸-e leh, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ lehˬ a ma‸ lonˉ hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44008039	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ iˉ kaˆ hk'aw lo tawˆ la htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ teˇ cawˬ haˉ yuˬ k'ai leh, a ma‸ lonˉ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ mawˬ. A ma‸ lonˉ lehˬ, ha lehˬ ha k'a awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'aw‸ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44008040	Oˇ htaˇ, Aˍcoˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Hpiˇliˇpuˆ hta‸ shu g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai leh, Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ hk'a gaˬ, venˇ hk'aˆ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009001	Sawˉlu‸ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ-a teh‸ tiˉ k'oˆ leh, g'aˇ hte‸ caˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44009002	Ya‸ k'aw awˬ liˇ chi hta‸ lo‸-e ve chaw, hawˉ hk'aˆ maˇ k'oˆ, yaˇ miˇ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a mawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hpeh yuˬ leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo sheh veu laˇ tuˬ, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ lo cawˬ ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ geh k'ai leh li‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44009003	Yawˇ Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, venˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la leh, mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ g'euˆ teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ hti la ve yoˬ.
44009004	Yawˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ lo paiˍ leh, Sawˉlu‸-oˬ, Sawˉlu‸-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44009005	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ a shu le teh‸ yawˇ na nyi htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ chehˇ ve Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ.
44009006	Tu leh venˇ hk'aw lo lo‸-e loˬ. Nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ ve hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009007	Yawˇ geh k'ai chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htawˇ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ mawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui ka keh leh huˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44009008	Sawˉlu‸ tu la leh, mehˆ ngaˉ nyi htawˇ yawˇ mehˆ maˇ mawˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ yuˬ leh, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ lo yawˇ hta‸ sheh k'ai ve yoˬ.
44009009	Shehˆ nyi hk'a gaˬ yawˇ mehˆ maˇ mawˬ leh, maˇ caˇ maˇ dawˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44009010	Oˇ htaˇ, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Aˍnaˍniˆ meh ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo, Aˍnaˍniˆ-oˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ choˬ kaˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009011	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Tu leh, Hteˇ ve ya‸ k'aw teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ caˆ lo k'ai-o. Yuˇda‸ ve aˉ hk'aw lo Taˍsuˆ venˇ yaˇ Sawˉlu‸ hta‸ ca nyi-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44009012	Yawˇ mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la tuˬ, Aˍnaˍniˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lo‸ la leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ teh‸, Yeˍsuˆ Aˍnaˍniˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Aˍnaˍniˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, chaw oˇ ve lehˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo nawˬ ve da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ haiˬ ve hk'aˬ ma te ve awˬ lawn chaw laiˉ g'aˇ hto laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
44009014	Choˬ kaˬ lo htawˇ, nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ hk'a kuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ tuˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui geh yawˇ a hkaw-anˬ g'a peuˬ teh‸, Aˍnaˍniˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, K'ai loˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw leh hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pfuhˇ k'ai tuˬ, yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve awˬ hk'eun hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44009016	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hk'aˬ ma g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ maw piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009017	Hk'e te leh, Aˍnaˍniˆ k'ai leh yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ Sawˉlu‸ awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ nyi paˍ Sawˉlu‸-oˬ, nawˬ mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la leh da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu biˇ la tuˬ, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo nawˬ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to maw laˇ ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009018	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ Sawˉlu‸ ve mehˆ shiˍ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ shehˆ hta‸ shuˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ ce la leh, yawˇ mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tu leh baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, caˇ tuˬ caˇ leh awˬ g'aˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
44009019	Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh yawˇ teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ jaw chehˇ leh,
44009020	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸, teˇ cawˬ haˉ bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ tanˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009021	G'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Chi hpaˇ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh oˇ ve hta‸ hk'a kuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ te luˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Choˬ kaˬ lo htawˇ, oˇ hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui geh sheh k'ai tuˬ yawˇ gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44009022	Sawˉlu‸ lehˬ, co ha hpawˇ shaˬ te shaˬ awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ la leh, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ tehˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ hk'e k'aw‸ k'oˆ tuˬ, yawˇ hui a ciˉ ka‸ dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve yoˬ.
44009023	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ hk'a cawˇ cawˇ maw la peuˬ htaˇ, Sawˉlu‸ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44009024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui jehˬ da‸ ve hta‸ Sawˉlu‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ, venˇ yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ yawˇ hui shaw chehˇ ve pa taw,
44009025	yawˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ Sawˉlu‸ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, hk'aˉ puˍ lu hk'aw keu leh lanˇ venˇ awˬ baˬ lo yawˇ hta‸ hpehˇ ya‸-e ve yoˬ.
44009026	Yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ ca pawnˇ da‸ tuˬ yawˇ te ve htawˇ, yawˇ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ kawˆ ve yoˬ.
44009027	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Baˍnaˍbaˆ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, tcuh yaˇ hui geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Sawˉlu‸ yawˇ ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ bon maˍ piˇ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, Baˍnaˍbaˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009028	Hk'e te leh, Sawˉlu‸ lehˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui geh chehˇ leh, tawˆ tawˆ lo‸ lo‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ bon maˍ ve yoˬ.
44009029	Heˍlaˍsaˆ hkawˇ yaw ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh yawˇ na‸ uˉ te da‸ leh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44009030	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo shiˍ k'ai leh, Taˍsuˆ venˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ.
44009031	Oˇ hta‸, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Saˍmaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ lehˬ, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha cawˬ leh, uiˍ la mvuh la ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu dawˇ sha piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui toˇ k'ai leh maˇ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44009032	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ lo k'ai leh, Luˇdaˆ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hui geh gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44009033	Oˇ kaˬ lo hkui sheh la‸ sheh suh leh, hiˉ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ zuh‸ chehˇ ve Ehˉneˍ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44009034	Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ehˉneˍ-oˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ nawˬ hta‸ gu na-e laˇ ve yoˬ. Tu leh nawˬ ve zuh‸ hpui hta‸ gu teh-o teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ tu la ve yoˬ.
44009035	Luˇdaˆ venˇ leh Shaˍronˍ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ na-e la peuˬ ve chaw oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ.
44009036	Yuˇpeˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Taˍbiˉtaˆ meh ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ meh oˇ ve Heˍlaˍsaˆ hkawˇ k'o, Dawˍkaˍ yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh, shu hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh tanˇ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44009037	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ naˬ leh suh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ tsuhˇ piˇ peuˬ leh, bawehˇ awˬ hta‸ teˇ htai‸ lo yawˇ hta‸ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44009038	Luˇdaˆ venˇ lehˬ Yuˇpeˍ venˇ hta‸ neˇ leh, Peˍtruˆ Luˇdaˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Awˬ yanˇ maˇ jiˆ leh ngaˬ hui geh haˆ haˆ laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
44009039	Hk'e te leh, Peˍtruˆ tu leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ, bawehˇ awˬ hta‸ teˇ htai‸ lo yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Mehˇ chawˇ ma hk'a peu-eˬ Peˍtruˆ awˬ paˇ huˉ taˍ leh hawˬ leh, Dawˍkaˍ yawˇ hui geh chehˇ htaˇ, tawˉ taˍ ve aˉ po‸ veu‸ k'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009040	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ tawˆ k'ai tcuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, awˬ suh ku hpawˇ yawˇ hpfuhˆ leh, Taˍbiˉtaˆ-oˬ, tu-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve mehˆ hpaw leh Peˍtruˆ hta‸ mawˬ htaˇ, tu mui ve yoˬ.
44009041	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ la‸ sheh che leh, yawˇ hta‸ g'awˬ tu piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui leh mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, te‸ la peuˬ ve yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44009042	Awˬ lawn chi, Yuˇpeˍ venˇ teˇ kaˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo bvuhˬ k'ai leh, chaw maˇ maˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ la ve yoˬ.
44009043	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Yuˇpeˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Siˉmonˍ meh ve shaˍ guiˬ te paˍ geh awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44010001	Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, Kawˍneˍliˆ meh ve ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Iˉtaˍliˍ ma‸ moˍ teˇ ta‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44010002	Yawˇ leh yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ puiˉ leh yawˆ yan puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ shu hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ maˇ tanˇ piˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44010003	Teˇ nyi htaˇ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ aˬ laˬ hk'e shehˆ naˍ riˍ teˇ yanˇ, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ geh laˬ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Kawˍneˍliˆ-oˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44010004	Kawˍneˍliˆ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh kawˆ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ bon lawˬ ve hkawˇ leh tanˇ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ gaˬ leh, yawˇ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44010005	Chi beu‸ Yuˇpeˍ venˇ lo chaw hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Peˍtruˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ca kuˬ tcuh-o.
44010006	Yawˇ lehˬ shaˍ guiˬ te paˍ Siˉmonˍ ve aˉ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010007	Yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'o‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ leh, yawˇ geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44010008	Awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yuˇpeˍ venˇ lo k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44010009	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi yawˇ hui k'ai leh, Yuˇpeˍ venˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Peˍtruˆ lehˬ bon lawˬ tuˬ, aˬ laˬ hk'e mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ htaˇ yehˬ awˬ hta‸ teˇ htai‸ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44010010	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ awˍ meu‸ la leh, awˍ caˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Shu caˇ tuˬ gu chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, zuh‸ maˆ mawˬ ve hk'e awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ naw ma hpaw taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44010011	Aˉ boˆ lonˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ve teˇ maˬ lehˬ, awˬ ceˍ awˇ ceˍ hta‸ hpeh taˍ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo hpehˇ ya‸ la ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44010012	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, hkui sheh la‸ sheh awˍ lehˇ cawˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ, loˇ k'ai gaˆ k'ai puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ leh, mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44010013	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la ve, Peˍtruˆ-oˬ, tu leh tiˇ caˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44010014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, maˇ hpeh‸ taˬ. Cha‸ chiˆ leh maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ caˇ jaw teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010015	Teˇ pawˆ awˬ hkawˇ k'aw‸ bvuhˬ la leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ ve taˇ k'oˆ teh‸, yawˇ g'a k'aw‸ kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44010016	Chi hk'e shehˆ pawˆ hpeh‸ peuˬ leh, aˉ boˆ lonˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ve oˇ ve hta‸ teˇ cawˬ haˉ mvuhˇ naw ma lo k'aw‸ yuˬ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44010017	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw g'a mawˬ ve aˬ hto‸ ma tcuhˉ kuiˬ leh naˍ, yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo dawˇ maˇ tawˆ te chehˇ htaˇ, Kawˍneˍliˆ tcuh peu laˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, Siˉmonˍ ve yehˬ hta‸ ca na laˬ leh, yehˬ miˉ hpe‸ lo gaˬ la peuˬ.
44010018	Yawˇ hui kuˬ leh, Peˍtruˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ choˬ kaˬ chehˇ-aw laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44010019	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi chehˇ htaˇ, Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw shehˆ g'aˇ nawˬ hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ. Tu leh ya‸ k'ai loˬ.
44010020	Nyi ma htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ taˇ te. Yawˇ hui geh k'ai loˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010021	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ geh ya‸-e leh, Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui ca ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ lawn cawˬ leh laˬ ve le teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44010022	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw da‸ chaw hteˇ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ leh, Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve Kawˍneˍliˆ meh ve ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ yawˇ ve yehˬ hk'aw lo kuˬ yuˬ leh, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ, da‸ kehˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010023	Hk'e te leh, Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ aˉ hk'aw lo kuˬ yuˬ leh hk'a deh‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Shawˉ pawˍ teˇ nyi hk'e yawˇ tu leh yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Yuˇpeˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
44010024	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi yawˇ hui Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ hk'aw gaˬ ve yoˬ. Kawˍneˍliˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ viˇ awˬ nyi leh awˬ chawˇ awˬ paˆ hui hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44010025	Peˍtruˆ lo‸ la htaˇ, Kawˍneˍliˆ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ leh, Peˍtruˆ ve hkui paˇ lo boˆ sheˬ leh oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
44010026	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hta‸ g'awˬ tu leh, Tu-o, ngaˬ htawˇ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010027	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ Kawˍneˍliˆ geh na‸ uˉ te da‸ leh lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw maˇ maˇ hpawnˬ chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44010028	Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hta‸ awˬ chawˇ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ geh ca guiˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, te maˇ keunˍ te maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, cha‸ chiˆ ve ka‸, maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve ka‸ maˇ g'a k'oˆ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ.
44010029	Chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hta‸ kuˬ htaˇ, ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ leh laˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ lawn cawˬ leh ngaˬ hta‸ ca kuˬ la ve le, ngaˬ na nyi gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010030	Kawˍneˍliˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ponˬ laˬ ve awˇ nyi htaˇ, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hpawˇ shehˆ naˍ riˍ chi teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ aˉ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ g'euˆ ba ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ huˉ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
44010031	Kawˍneˍliˆ-oˬ, nawˬ bon lawˬ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha g'a kaˇ leh, nawˬ ha k'aˉ leh tanˇ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44010032	Hk'e te leh, Yuˇpeˍ venˇ lo chaw hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Peˍtruˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ca kuˬ tcuh-o. Yawˇ lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo chehˇ ve shaˍ guiˬ te paˍ Siˉmonˍ ve aˉ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44010033	Chi hta‸ pa taw, teˇ cawˬ haˉ ngaˬ nawˬ geh chaw hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Nawˬ laˬ ve lehˬ, da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ hk'a k'oˆ tcuh laˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ na tuˬ, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Kawˍneˍliˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010034	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ chaw mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi ve ngaˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44010035	Chaw teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
44010036	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hta‸ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hpehˬ ve yoˬ.
