44010037	Yoˇhanˬ maˍ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ tanˬ leh Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44010038	Bon hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu maˇ k'oˆ, kanˇ paˆ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ piˇ ve awˬ lawn leh, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ geh chehˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ lo k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, da‸ ve hta‸ te leh, neˇ haiˬ fawˉ mehˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve awˬ lawn yoˬ.
44010039	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hk'a te ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui htawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Shu yawˇ hta‸ suhˆ hkuiˉ daw hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
44010040	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shehˆ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tuˬ la piˇ leh, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to maw piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010041	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maw piˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ awˬ pon awˉ lawˉ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ maw laˇ ve yoˬ. Suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui yawˇ geh hk'a geh caˇ ve dawˬ ve yoˬ.
44010042	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ bon maˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, suh peuˬ ve chaw hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ ve awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ htawˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44010043	Yawˇ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44010044	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ chehˇ htaˇ, tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ya‸ la ve yoˬ.
44010045	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ htawˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ngeuˍ pfuhˍ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, Peˍtruˆ geh laˬ ve Yuˇda‸ Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44010046	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44010047	Oˇ htaˇ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu g'a ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu g'a ve chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ maˇ g'a piˇ tuˬ, tawˍ taˍ tsuhˇ taˍ paˍ a shu cawˬ le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44010048	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui geh a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ taˉ tuˬ, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
44011001	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui htawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve tcuh yaˇ hui leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44011002	Hk'e te leh, Peˍtruˆ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo taˆ-e htaˇ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
44011003	Nawˬ lehˬ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui ve yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh yawˇ hui geh caˇ ve dawˬ ve law leˇ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ deˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44011004	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ te leh awˬ leh meuˇ hk'a gaˬ awˬ lawn teˇ ceuˬ peuˬ teˇ ceuˬ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
44011005	Ngaˬ lehˬ Yuˇpeˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ chehˇ htaˇ, aˉ boˆ lonˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ve teˇ maˬ lehˬ, awˬ ceˍ awˇ ceˍ hta‸ hpeh taˍ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma lo te leh ngaˬ geh hk'a gaˬ hpehˇ ya‸ la ve hta‸, zuh‸ maˆ mawˬ ve hk'e awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44011006	Oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ nyi htaˇ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo hkui sheh la‸ sheh awˍ lehˇ cawˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ awˬ ceuˬ, loˇ k'ai gaˆ k'ai puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ leh mvuhˇ hpe lo poˬ ve ngaˆ awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44011007	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ-oˬ, tu leh tiˇ caˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44011008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, maˇ hpeh‸ taˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, cha‸ chiˆ leh maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ ngaˬ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ lo‸ la jaw teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44011009	Mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ bvuhˬ la leh, G'uiˬ sha da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ ve taˇ k'oˆ teh‸ ngaˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44011010	Chi hk'e shehˆ pawˆ hpeh‸ peuˬ leh, oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma lo k'aw‸ g'awˬ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44011011	Oˇ teˇ hkui awˬ hk'aw lo, Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo ngaˬ geh tcuh peu laˇ ve chaw shehˆ g'aˇ ngaˬ hui chehˇ taˍ ve yehˬ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
44011012	Nyi ma htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ maˇ te leh yawˇ hui geh k'ai loˬ teh‸, Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi chi hkaw‸ g'aˇ htawˇ ngaˬ geh k'ai leh, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
44011013	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo tu huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yuˇpeˍ venˇ lo chaw hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Peˍtruˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Siˉmonˍ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ca kuˬ tcuh-o.
44011014	Nawˬ leh nawˬ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te leh htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve awˬ lawn htawˇ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ.
44011015	Ngaˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ tanˬ maˍ piˇ chehˇ htaˇ ka‸, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ya‸ la ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ htawˇ ya‸ la ve yoˬ.
44011016	Oˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ ve yoˬ. Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ g'a hkanˍ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44011017	Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ la‸ shawnˍ pe‸ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ htawˇ piˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tawˍ taˍ tuˬ le teh‸, Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44011018	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ. Yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh leh k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te k'o, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui htawˇ co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44011019	Oˇ htaˇ, Saˍteˍhpanˍ hta‸ tanˬ leh fawˉ mehˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve pa taw, hpaˆ da‸ guiˇ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hpiˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ, Kuˇpaˍruˆ conˇ leh Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ hk'a gaˬ k'ai ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ ceh tiˉ yawˇ hui bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44011020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui hta‸ htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e maˍ piˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Kuˇpaˍruˆ conˇ chaw leh Kuˇreˍneˍ mvuhˇ miˬ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44011021	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ yawˇ hui geh cawˬ ve pa taw, chaw maˇ maˇ yonˍ la leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ.
44011022	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ g'a kaˇ leh, yawˇ hui Baˍnaˍbaˆ hta‸ Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44011023	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui nyi ma yeˬ leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ vawˆ tcuhˉ taˍ tuˬ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44011024	Awˬ lawn k'o, Baˍnaˍbaˆ lehˬ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu maˇ k'oˆ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, chaw maˇ maˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ pawnˇ da‸ la ve yoˬ.
44011025	Baˍnaˍbaˆ lehˬ, Sawˉlu‸ hta‸ ca tuˬ, Taˍsuˆ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44011026	Yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo shiˍ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, teˇ hk'aw‸ hk'a zuh Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ geh hpawnˬ da‸ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Hkri‸ yaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve awˬ meh lehˬ, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo awˉ lawˉ k'oˆ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
44011027	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo tu la leh Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo laˬ ve yoˬ.
44011028	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo Aˍgaˍbuˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ tu leh, Miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo meu‸ lonˉ kaˆ lonˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh hto piˇ ve yoˬ. Meu‸ ve kaˆ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Kaˍlawˇdiˆ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
44011029	Hk'e te leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ puiˉ ve hpeh‸ ve hk'e, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga piˇ tuˬ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44011030	Yawˇ hui dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve hk'e te peuˬ leh, Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh Sawˉlu‸ la‸ sheh hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ feu piˇ ve yoˬ.
44012001	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ fawˉ mehˍ ve yoˬ.
44012002	Yawˇ lehˬ Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ viˉ paˍ Yaˍkoˆ hta‸ aˉ htaw chaw pehˍ ve yoˬ.
44012003	Chi ve hta‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui nyi ma cawˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ htawˇ hpeh yuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'aw lo diˇ maˇ keu ve pawehˇ awˬ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44012004	Peˍtruˆ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, htawnˍ hk'aw keu leh, yawˇ hta‸ shaw tuˬ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ chi hkaw‸ g'aˇ ve la‸ sheh hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ heh‸, chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Peˍtruˆ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ la tuˬ yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44012005	Hk'e te leh, Peˍtruˆ htawnˍ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha geh g'aˇ hte‸ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44012006	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, shawˉ pawˍ hk'e yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ-a teh‸ te ve teˇ haˉ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ sho caˆ nyiˇ caˆ hpeh taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ma‸ yaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ awˬ kaˍ lo zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ leh, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ htawnˍ yehˬ miˇ awˬ baˬ lo shaw chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44012007	Oˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la leh, bawehˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'euˆ ba ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ ve nyi kuˇ hpawˇ hta‸ hta leh, Haˆ haˆ tu loˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ nawˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ sho caˆ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve la‸ sheh lo k'ehˆ ce ve yoˬ.
44012008	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Haˍ pi tsuh‸ leh hkuiˉ nuˆ tcuhˉ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ htaˇ, yawˇ htawˇ oˇ hk'e te ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Nawˬ ve aˉ po‸ lonˉ deh leh ngaˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44012009	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ tawˆ-e leh mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ te ve kanˉ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ leh, zuh‸ maˆ mawˬ ve hk'e awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo mawˬ ve teh‸ yawˇ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
44012010	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ awˉ lawˉ teˇ moˍ leh nyiˇ moˍ teˇ moˍ hta‸ ka‸ ponˬ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e ve sho yehˬ miˉ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ pon yehˬ miˉ oˇ ve yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ hpaw baˬ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ k'aw ceh teˇ maˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44012011	Oˇ htaˇ, Peˍtruˆ nyi ma hk'aw k'aw‸ nawˇ la leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˬ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hta‸ peu laˇ leh, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hk'a dawˇ law taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ ponˬ laˇ ve awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ngaˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44012012	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ yawˇ g'a shiˍ peuˬ htaˇ, Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ e Maˍriˆ ve aˉ hk'aw lo yawˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. (Yoˇhanˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ lehˬ Maˍkuˆ yoˬ.) Oˇ kaˬ lo chaw maˇ maˇ hpawnˬ da‸ leh bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44012013	Yehˬ g'uˇ suhˍ ve yehˬ miˉ hta‸ Peˍtruˆ htawˆ htaˇ, Roˇdeˍ meh ve awˬ ceˬ ma ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ na la ve yoˬ.
44012014	Peˍtruˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, yawˇ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve pa taw yehˬ miˉ hta‸ maˇ hpaw piˇ sheˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, aˉ hk'aw g'uiˇ lo‸-e leh, Peˍtruˆ lehˬ yehˬ g'uˇ suhˍ ve yehˬ miˉ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44012015	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Nawˬ chaw g'uˇ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve htawˇ yawˇ lehˬ, Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yoˬ teh‸ g'aˇ hte‸ k'oˇ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Peˍtruˆ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44012016	Peˍtruˆ lehˬ, htawˆ chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui yehˬ miˉ hta‸ ca hpaw htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44012017	Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ta‸ iˉ chehˇ tuˬ la‸ sheh te maˍ piˇ peuˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ htawnˍ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e te yuˬ tawˆ laˇ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˍkoˆ leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ lawn chi ve kaˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ kaˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44012018	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Peˍtruˆ hk'aˬ hk'e k'ai ve awˬ lawn ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44012019	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, Peˍtruˆ hta‸ ca nyi leh maˇ mawˬ htaˇ, shaw shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hk'a deh‸ na nyi peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo tu leh Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo k'ai leh oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44012020	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, Tuˇruˆ venˇ yaˇ leh Siˉdonˍ venˇ yaˇ hui hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui lehˬ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ te leh yawˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ zuh‸ kuiˬ bawehˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ Baˍlaˍtuˆ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui jehˬ g'a leh, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ la tuˬ yawˇ hui lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ awˬ pon, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ g'a cuˇ ve yoˬ.
44012021	Jawˇ mawˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, tinˍ taˍ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la htaˇ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui leh yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44012022	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Awˬ hkawˇ chi ve lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ maˇ heˆ, g'uiˬ sha ve awˬ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44012023	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ chiˇ uiˍ maˇ chiˇ mvuh ve pa taw, teˇ cawˬ haˉ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ ciˍ yanˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo hawehˆ caˇ leh, yawˇ shaˉ cheˆ ve yoˬ.
44012024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, uiˍ la maˇ la ve yoˬ.
44012025	Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh Sawˉlu‸ lehˬ, shu hta‸ ga piˇ ve kanˉ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ Maˍkuˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yoˇhanˬ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo tu leh, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
44013001	Anˍtiˆawˍ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, bon maˍ paˍ hui leh maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Baˍnaˍbaˆ, Niˇgaˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Suˉmonˍ, Kuˇreˍneˍ mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ Luˇkiˆ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Heˍroˆ geh teˇ geh uiˍ la ve Maˍneˍ leh Sawˉlu‸ hui yoˬ.
44013002	Yawˇ hui Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh caˇ tuˬ ce chehˇ htaˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ te tcuh tuˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh Sawˉlu‸ te tuˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013003	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce leh bon lawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo la‸ sheh taˍ leh hpehˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44013004	Hk'e te leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve hk'e, Seˍluˍkiˆ venˇ lo ya‸-e leh, Kuˇpaˍruˆ conˇ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44013005	Saˍlaˍmiˆ venˇ lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ gaˬ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yoˇhanˬ htawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ga piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013006	Yawˇ hui conˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ k'ai leh, Paˍhpuˆ venˇ lo gaˬ htaˇ, Baˍyeˍsuˆ meh ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, faˍ te puiˉ ve maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44013007	Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, Seˍraˍgiˆ Pawˇlu‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ geh chehˇ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ gaˇ ve pa taw, Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh Sawˉlu‸ hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44013008	Eˇluˇmaˆ lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve maˇ g'a yonˍ tuˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. (Eˇluˇmaˆ k'oˆ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ, faˍ te puiˉ paˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
44013009	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Sawˉlu‸ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh, faˍ te puiˉ paˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
44013010	Neˇ haiˬ ve yaˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ heˍ ve leh haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ nawˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ k'ai tuˬ, nawˬ maˇ jehˇ jehˇ leh te tuˬ laˇ.
44013011	Chi beu‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ nawˬ awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la leh, nawˬ mehˆ cuˉ leh teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ jaw mvuhˇ nyi hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ cawˬ haˉ moˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ naˆ ho‸ ve yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ lo gaˬ la leh, yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ sheh k'ai tuˬ, yawˇ shu hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44013012	Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44013013	Pawˇlu‸ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Paˍhpuˆ venˇ lo tu leh, Paˍpuˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ Peˍraˍgeˍ venˇ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
44013014	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Peˍraˍgeˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ tu leh, Piˇsiˇdiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Shinˉ nyi htaˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ bon yehˬ taˆ-e leh mui ve yoˬ.
44013015	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ leh tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ hta‸ shu g'aw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh chaw k'ai tcuh leh, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ tuˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ ve k'o, k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013016	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ tu leh, la‸ sheh te maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, na sheˍ.
44013017	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ la‸ sheh chiˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ sheh tawˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44013018	Heh puiˉ hk'aw lo aˬ laˬ hk'e awˇ chi hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ hui te ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ yeunˇ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
44013019	Hkaˍnanˍ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw suhˍ ceuˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha te luˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˇ ha ngaˇ chi hk'aw‸ hk'e chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve mvuhˇ miˬ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013020	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Saˍmo-eˍlaˆ ve awˬ co-e hk'a gaˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hui piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013021	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lawˬ leh, Beˍyaˍmenˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ Kiˇshaˆ ve yaˇ Sawˉlu‸ teˇ g'aˇ awˇ chi hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ te tuˬ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013022	G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ Daˍviˆ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ-e ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha Daˍviˆ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw, Yeˍsehˇ ve yaˇ Daˍviˆ hta‸ ngaˬ mawˬ peuˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ ve a loˍ hk'a biˇ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44013023	G'uiˬ sha ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, Daˍviˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui awˬ pon Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yawˇ tawˆ la piˇ peuˬ.
44013024	Yeˍsuˆ maˇ tawˆ la sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ awˬ lawn Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013025	Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve kanˉ te peuˬ paˇ neˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ a shu hpeh‸ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ le. Ngaˬ lehˬ chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve hkuiˉ nuˇ caˆ hta‸ hpui tuˬ ve ceh ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44013026	Aˍbraˍhanˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui leh, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ lawn chi ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
44013027	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw leh yawˇ hui ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ shinˉ nyi le le g'aw chehˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te biˇ la ve yoˬ.
44013028	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo suh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ mawˬ htawˇ, yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jawˇ mawˇ Piˉla‸ geh lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44013029	Yawˇ awˬ lawn hk'a bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui te biˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hta‸ suhˆ hkuiˉ daw hk'oˆ yuˬ ya‸-e leh, tuˍ hpfuh hk'aw keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44013030	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013031	Gaˍliˍlehˇ mvuhˇ miˬ te leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ geh k'ai jaw ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ a ciˉ maw chaweh yawˇ awˬ to maw piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chi beu‸ shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44013032	Awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44013033	G'uiˬ sha Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ te biˇ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Chiˇ mvuh ve li‸ nyiˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ nyi ngaˬ nawˬ ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ la peuˬ, teh bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44013034	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la leh, kuiˇ ve luˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ gaˬ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Daˍviˆ g'a taˍ ve, da‸ kehˬ leh yeˬ ve awˬ bon teˇ hpaˍ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44013035	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Chiˇ mvuh ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ kaˬ bvuh‸ taˍ sheˍ ve, Nawˬ ve da‸ kehˬ ve Chaw lehˬ, kuiˇ ve luˬ ve hta‸ hpuˇ tuˬ nawˬ hkanˍ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44013036	Daˍviˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve teˇ co-e awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ suh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ puˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh shu yawˇ hta‸ taˍ leh, yawˇ kuiˇ k'ai luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44013037	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, kuiˇ ve luˬ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hpuˇ.
44013038	Chi hta‸ pa taw, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi hta‸ shiˍ-o‸. Chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a g'a ve awˬ lawn nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44013039	Yawˇ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ ponˬ piˇ maˇ g'a ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a ponˬ ve yoˬ.
44013040	G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui k'oˆ ve, Maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve chaw hui-oˬ, nyi leh anˇ leh luˬ k'ai-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ kanˉ teˇ maˬ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn chi chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui yonˍ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44013041	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve hk'e nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ maˇ g'a gaˬ la tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013042	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ bon yehˬ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ shinˉ htawˇ k'aw‸ hto laˇ tuˬ, chaw chi ma ve yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44013043	Bon yehˬ ya‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve Yuˇda‸ awˬ liˇ yuˬ ve chaw maˇ maˇ Pawˇlu‸ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ yeˬ tuˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013044	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ shinˉ, shinˉ nyi htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ aˬ laˬ hk'e venˇ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hpawnˬ la ve yoˬ.
44013045	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui lehˬ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, hkawehˉ ve nyi ma hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'awˬ hk'aˆ leh, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013046	Pawˇlu‸ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˉ lawˉ g'a hto piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ taˉ leh co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ g'a maˇ keunˍ teh‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui shawˍ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui geh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
44013047	Awˬ lawn k'o, Miˬ guiˬ awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ nawˬ hta‸ pa taw htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. teh‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ chi hk'e tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44013048	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, ha lehˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon hk'a fuiˍ taˍ ve chaw hui lehˬ yonˍ la ve yoˬ.
44013049	Hk'e te leh Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44013050	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve awˬ hoˉ awˬ naˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca juˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui g'aˇ hte‸ te leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ.
44013051	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ, hkui taw k'aw hawˉ ve je‸ meu-e hpi baˬ taˉ leh, Iˇkawˇniˆ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44013052	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ha lehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44014001	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Iˇkawˇniˆ venˇ lo gaˬ leh, Yuˇda‸ ve bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ geh lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ chaw leh Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui maˇ maˇ yonˍ la ve yoˬ.
44014002	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ yonˍ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ ca juˆ piˇ leh, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ canˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ la tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
44014003	Hk'e te leh, oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ maw chaweh chehˇ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh anˇ tuˬ leh awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ awˬ lawn maˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
44014004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, venˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyiˇ moˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hpawˇ chehˇ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tcuh yaˇ hui hpawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44014005	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui leh Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ hoˉ awˬ naˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh Pawˇlu‸ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na te leh haˉ pui baˬ-a teh‸ te ve hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ g'a shiˍ htaˇ,
44014006	Luˇkawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Luˇtaˍraˆ venˇ, Deˍbeˍ venˇ leh, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo hpaw-e ve yoˬ.
44014007	Mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44014008	Luˇtaˍraˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hkui luˬ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ mui chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ paw la htaˇ ka‸ hkui luˬ paˍ hpeh‸ leh, ya‸ kaw teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ toˇ jaw.
44014009	Yawˇ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ na chehˇ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh, na-e la tuˬ yawˇ yonˍ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ htaˇ,
44014010	awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh, Hteˇ lehˍ tu huˉ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ pawˆ tu leh, ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44014011	Pawˇlu‸ chi hk'e te ve hta‸ chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ Luˇkawˇniˆ hkawˇ yaw leh, G'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ chaw yaˇ hk'e te leh ngaˬ hui geh ya‸ la peuˬ teh‸, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44014012	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Baˍnaˍbaˆ hta‸ Cuˇsaˆ teh‸ meh piˇ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ leuˉ leh tawˇ yaw ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ Heˍmeˍ teh‸ meh piˇ ve yoˬ.
44014013	Venˇ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo Cuˇsaˆ ve bon yehˬ teˇ yehˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Bon yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve paw hkuˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, nuˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh suhˉ veˆ hk'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ venˇ taˍ meu‸ hpe‸ lo yuˬ laˬ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ geh teˇ geh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tanˇ piˇ tuˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44014014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tcuh yaˇ Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh Pawˇlu‸ awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ tzuh‸ suhˍ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo g'uiˇ lo‸-e leh k'oˆ ve,
44014015	Awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chi hk'e te ve le. Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ chaw yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha geh k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la tuˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma, miˬ guiˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ leh oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw hk'a cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44014016	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ ve awˬ co-e teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai tuˬ hpehˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44014017	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ teh taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ da‸ ve hta‸ te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma lo mvuhˇ yeˬ laˬ piˇ ve, awˬ shiˍ awˬ nu naw‸ la tuˬ awˬ tcuhˉ awˬ yanˇ piˇ ve, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hk'a bvuhˆ caˍ piˇ leh, ha lehˬ tuˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44014018	Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve htawˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a tanˇ laˇ tuˬ, aˬ laˬ hk'e tawˍ taˍ maˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
44014019	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ leh Iˇkawˇniˆ venˇ lo chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ beˬ g'a peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ haˉ pui baˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ suh peuˬ teh‸ dawˇ leh, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ venˇ awˬ baˬ lo g'awˬ baˬ ve yoˬ.
44014020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ tu leh venˇ hk'aw k'aw‸ lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi yawˇ Baˍnaˍbaˆ geh teˇ geh Deˍbeˍ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44014021	Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ leh, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ la piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ Luˇtaˍraˆ venˇ, Iˇkawˇniˆ venˇ leh Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
44014022	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma yeˬ la leh, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve maˇ maˇ hta‸ hkanˍ ve hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw g'a lo‸-e ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44014023	Yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ ce leh bon lawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ moˍ le le awˬ pon awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui yonˍ chehˇ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44014024	Peuˬ leh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Piˇsiˇdiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo hpanˍ k'ai leh, Paˍpuˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44014025	Peˍraˍgeˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Aˍtaˍliˆ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44014026	Oˇ kaˬ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ponˬ laˬ htaˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ te tuˬ awˬ pon awˬ bon piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo shu yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ kanˉ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ te biˇ peuˬ.
44014027	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ gaˬ la htaˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh hk'a te ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui yonˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yehˬ miˉ hpaw piˇ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44014028	Oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui geh a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44015001	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ gaˬ la leh, Nawˬ hui lehˬ Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve hk'e awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve k'o, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44015002	Pawˇlu‸ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ hawˍ da‸ leh tawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ g'awˬ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ lawn chi hta‸ ca na nyi tuˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸, Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo chehˇ ve tcuh yaˇ hui leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44015003	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ Hpiˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Saˍmaˍriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai leh, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma k'aw‸ pa ve awˬ lawn k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44015004	Yawˇ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ, tcuh yaˇ hui leh, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, hk'a te ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44015005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tu la leh k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ g'a shoˍ piˇ leh, Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ g'a piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44015006	Oˇ htaˇ, tcuh yaˇ hui leh, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn chi ve hta‸ jehˬ da‸ tuˬ hpawnˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44015007	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ maˇ maˇ jehˬ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Peˍtruˆ tu la leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh g'a yonˍ tuˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44015008	Nyi ma hta‸ shiˍ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu pe‸ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui hta‸ htawˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hui awˬ pon yawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
44015009	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui leh yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ peun da‸ piˇ lawˬ. Yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ peuˬ.
44015010	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ ngaˬ hui ka‸ taˆ maˇ g'aˇ ve taˆ tuˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui ve la‸ k'aˉ hk'oˆ ca taˍ piˇ ve le.
44015011	Ngaˬ hui htawˇ yawˇ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ Peˍtruˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44015012	Oˇ htaˇ, hk'a hpawnˬ la ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo anˇ tuˬ leh awˬ heˆ hk'a te ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui na chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44015013	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ tawˇ yaw peuˬ htaˇ, Yaˍkoˆ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na sheˍ.
44015014	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pfuhˇ tuˬ ve awˬ pon buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ moˍ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ tuˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ dawˇ nyi leh ha k'aˉ ve awˬ lawn Suˉmonˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ peuˬ.
44015015	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hawˍ da‸ ve yoˬ. Tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve,
44015016	Chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ k'aw‸ la leh, paiˍ peuˬ ve Daˍviˆ ve yehˬ hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ te tuˬ yoˬ. Luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai peuˬ ve hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ k'aw‸ gu leh, yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ cawˍ ti tuˬ yoˬ.
44015017	Oˇ htaˇ, cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hk'a pfuhˇ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hk'a peu-eˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ca tuˬ yoˬ.
44015018	Aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ awˬ lawn chi ngaˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ tcuh laˇ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44015019	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha geh k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te maˇ cawˇ.
44015020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, k'awˍ peˍ nyiˉ pehˍ ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ suhˍ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
44015021	Awˬ lawn k'o, teˇ shinˉ nyi le le bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'aw maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ te leh teˇ venˇ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ Yaˍkoˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44015022	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, Pawˇlu‸ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ geh Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo k'ai tcuh tuˬ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ te ve Baˍsaˍbaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yuˇda‸ leh Siˍlaˆ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44015023	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ yuˬ k'ai ve li‸ lehˬ chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo tcuh yaˇ hui leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ, Suˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Kiˇliˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ pehnˇ ve tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
44015024	Ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui maˇ k'ai tcuh ve ka‸ nawˬ hui geh k'ai leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ piˇ leh nyi ma htawˇ hpfuhˆ nawˬ hpfuhˆ k'ai tuˬ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44015025	Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui jehˬ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh, nawˬ hui geh k'ai tuˬ chaw nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44015026	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ pon a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ tanˇ taˬ ve, ngaˬ hui ha‸ ve Baˍnaˍbaˆ leh Pawˇlu‸ geh yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44015027	Hk'e te leh, li‸ hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ tuˬ, Yuˇda‸ leh Siˍlaˆ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
44015028	Jaw k'ai tuˬ loˍ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve awˬ vuiˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ taˍ tuˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ka‸ ngaˬ hui ka‸ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
44015029	Nawˬ hui jaw k'ai cawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ suhˍ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, k'awˍ peˍ nyiˉ pehˍ ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui jaw k'ai ve k'o da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44015030	Yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai leh Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ li‸ oˇ ve piˇ ve yoˬ.
44015031	Li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ g'aw htaˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve pa taw ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44015032	Yuˇda‸ leh Siˍlaˆ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ htawˇ bon maˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, awˍ viˉ awˬ nyi hui hta‸ maˇ maˇ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ g'aˇ piˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ yeˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44015033	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ oˇ kaˬ lo a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh peu laˇ ve chaw hui geh k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ.
44015035	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Pawˇlu‸ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw laiˉ g'aˇ geh teˇ geh Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ leh bon maˍ ve yoˬ.
44015036	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ hk'a cawˇ cawˇ maw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ Baˍnaˍbaˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ jaw peuˬ ve teˇ venˇ le le awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ ca k'aw‸ toˇ nyi-a veuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44015037	Baˍnaˍbaˆ lehˬ, Maˍkuˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai gaˇ ve yoˬ.
44015038	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ k'ai cawˇ teh‸ dawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ ve teˇ pawˆ Paˍpuˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh kanˉ te kuiˬ lo yawˇ maˇ k'ai ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
44015039	Hk'e te leh, awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yawˇ huiˉ maˬ maˇ cawˇ da‸ leh hpaˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Baˍnaˍbaˆ lehˬ Maˍkuˆ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, Kuˇpaˍruˆ conˇ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44015040	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ bon piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ Siˍlaˆ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44015041	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ Suˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Kiˇliˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ yeˬ la tuˬ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016001	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Deˍbeˍ venˇ leh Luˇtaˍraˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Luˇtaˍraˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Tiˆmoˉseˍ meh ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ e lehˬ, yonˍ ve Yuˇda‸ ma hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ pa lehˬ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44016002	Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Luˇtaˍraˆ venˇ leh Iˇkawˇniˆ venˇ lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh da‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44016003	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ yawˇ geh shiˍ k'ai gaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ pa Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ shiˍ ve pa taw, Pawˇlu‸ Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ yuˬ leh awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016004	Yawˇ hui venˇ teˇ hpaˍ lo hpanˍ k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo chehˇ ve tcuh yaˇ hui leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ jehˬ cheˆ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te k'ai tuˬ, teˇ caˉ yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016005	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ la leh, teˇ nyi le le chaw maˇ la ve yoˬ.
44016006	Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo bon hkawˇ maˇ g'a maˍ tuˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui Hpuˍgiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Gaˍlaˍtiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo hpanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44016007	Muˇsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, Beˍtuˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e tuˬ dawˇ taˍ ve htawˇ, Yeˍsuˆ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hui hta‸ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ piˇ.
44016008	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui Muˇsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ jaˇ lo hpanˍ k'ai leh, Taˍroˇaˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44016009	Tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ chaw teˇ g'aˇ huˉ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ leh k'oˆ ve, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo laˬ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ ga laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44016010	Awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ chi hk'e g'a mawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ chaw hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve teh‸ g'a shiˍ leh, teˇ cawˬ haˉ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo g'a k'ai tuˬ ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
44016011	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui Taˍroˇaˆ venˇ te leh Saˍmoˍtaˍrehˆ conˇ lo hteˇ lehˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ k'ai leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi Naˍpawˇliˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44016012	Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai leh Hpiˇliˇpiˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Roˉma‸ chaw hui teh taˍ ve venˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui oˇ kaˬ lo a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44016013	Shinˉ nyi gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, shu bon lawˬ kuiˬ cawˬ hehˉ teh‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ leh, venˇ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ iˉ kaˆ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui oˇ kaˬ lo mui taˍ leh, hk'a hpawnˬ la ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016014	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve Luˍdiˇ meh ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hui ve hkawˇ hta‸ na chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hpa nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve hta‸ hawˇ ve Saˍtiˍrehˇ venˇ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Pawˇ lu‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve nyi ma hta‸ hpaw piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016015	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve leh yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve yehˬ lo ca chehˇ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ leh, ngaˬ hui hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
44016016	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, mawˉ te puiˉ ve awˬ ceˬ ma ehˉ teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ laˬ ha‸ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ kuˇ puiˉ k'aoˍ puiˉ ve pa taw, yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ maˇ paw sha la ve yoˬ.
44016017	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ leh ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ leh, Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve ya‸ k'aw maˍ laˇ ve, mvuh jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hui hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44016018	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ maw chaweh yawˇ chi hk'e te ve pa taw, Pawˇlu‸ hkanˍ maˇ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ leh neˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, oˇ teˇ hkui neˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44016019	Yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui paw sha la tuˬ dawˇ law kuiˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ ve teh‸ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ leh Siˍlaˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui hpeh yuˬ leh, shaˉ nanˉ lo chehˇ ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh g'awˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44016020	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ geh sheh k'ai leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui ve venˇ hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ maˇ maˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44016021	Ngaˬ hui Roˉma‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ ha‸ yuˬ maˇ hpeh‸, te maˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44016022	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ htawˇ, Pawˇlu‸ leh Siˍlaˆ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ g'aˇ hte‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ k'ehˆ baˬ sheˬ leh, suhˆ taˬ yuˬ leh dawˆ tuˬ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016023	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ maˇ maˇ dawˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ shaw tuˬ htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016024	Htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, shu tawˇ piˇ ve hk'e yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ htawnˍ awˬ k'aw ji ve teˇ bawehˇ lo keu leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve hkui sheh hta‸ ka‸ suhˆ htawˆ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo keu leh shawˇ hoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44016025	Shehˍ k'aw hkui teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ leh Siˍlaˆ bon lawˬ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve yoˬ. Htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44016026	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ miˬ hiˆ jaˇ ve pa taw, htawnˍ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ hpaw baˬ sheˬ leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hpeh taˍ ve sho caˆ teˇ hpaˍ k'ehˆ tawˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44016027	Htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ teˇ cawˬ haˉ nawˇ la leh, htawnˍ yehˬ miˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hpaw baˬ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hpaw-e peuˬ hehˉ teh‸ dawˇ leh, yawˇ ve aˉ htaw g'awˬ tawˆ leh yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ juˆ pehˍ-a teh‸ te ve yoˬ.
44016028	Pawˇlu‸ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ te‸ chiˉ taˇ te, Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016029	Oˇ htaˇ, htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ lehˬ, Aˬ miˍ tuˉ veu laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh g'uiˇ lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ kawˆ cheˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Pawˇlu‸ leh Siˍlaˆ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ boˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44016030	Yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ shiˍ tawˆ-e peuˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44016031	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ loˬ. Nawˬ leh nawˬ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016032	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ leh yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016033	Oˇ ve teˇ haˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve naˬ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ awˬ to ka‸ yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ ka‸ teˇ cawˬ haˉ baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44016034	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo shiˍ k'ai leh, te caˍ te taw piˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ peuˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ leh yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44016035	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la htaˇ, jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, paˍ leˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, Chaw oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, ca k'oˆ piˇ tcuh ve yoˬ.
44016036	Oˇ htaˇ, htawnˍ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ, jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ chaw hta‸ tcuh peu laˇ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, chi beu‸ tawˆ-e leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016037	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve ka‸, suhˉ maˇ jehˬ sheˍ htaˇ shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ dawˆ leh htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ laˇ. Chi hk'e maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hui laˬ leh ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ piˇ lawˬ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44016038	Paˍ leˆ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ hui hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ leh kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44016039	Yawˇ hui yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh laˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve ya‸ kuiˬ hpehˇ laˇ tuˬ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ peuˬ leh, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai tuˬ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44016040	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ htawnˍ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai leh, Luˍdiˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ peuˬ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44017001	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui Aˍhpiˇpawˇliˆ venˇ leh Aˍpawˇ lawˇniˆ venˇ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai leh, Hteˇsaˍ lawˇniˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve bon yehˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44017002	Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ te jaw ve hk'e, yawˇ hui geh lo‸-e leh, shehˆ shinˉ hk'a gaˬ Li‸ hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh yawˇ hui geh jehˬ da‸ cehˇ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44017003	Hkri‸ lehˬ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, suh kuiˬ lo g'a k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve Yeˍsuˆ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44017004	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yonˍ la leh, Pawˇlu‸ leh Siˍlaˆ hta‸ pawnˇ da‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ maˇ yonˍ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ hk'a cawˇ cawˇ yonˍ maˇ ve yoˬ.
44017005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hkawehˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ leh, kanˉ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw haiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ hpawnˬ da‸ piˇ leh, venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui Yaˍsonˍ ve yehˬ hta‸ hoˆ yuˬ leh, Pawˇlu‸ leh Siˍlaˆ hta‸ chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ g'awˬ tawˆ la tuˬ ca ve yoˬ.
44017006	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ca maˇ mawˬ htaˇ, Yaˍsonˍ leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ hui geh g'awˬ k'ai leh k'oˆ ve, Miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te piˇ lawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo htawˇ gaˬ la peuˬ.
44017007	Yaˍsonˍ lehˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ peuˬ. Yeˍsuˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ leh, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44017008	Venˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ hui lehˬ, awˬ lawn chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44017009	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yaˍsonˍ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpu tanˇ keu tcuh leh hkanˍ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44017010	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ Pawˇlu‸ leh Siˍlaˆ hta‸ Beˍriˆ venˇ lo tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve bon yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
44017011	Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ chaw hui a‸ kehˉ dawˇ nyi puiˉ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ cawˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, yawˇ hui teˇ nyi le le Li‸ hpu hta‸ hk'a deh‸ g'aw nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44017012	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw maˇ maˇ yonˍ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve Heˍlaˍsaˆ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, yonˍ la ve chaw hk'a cawˇ cawˇ maˇ ve yoˬ.
44017013	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Beˍriˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ venˇ lo chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, oˇ kaˬ lo htawˇ yawˇ hui k'ai leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ juˆ piˇ leh duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44017014	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'a gaˬ teˇ cawˬ haˉ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Siˍlaˆ leh Tiˆmoˉseˍ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˉ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
44017015	Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ shiˍ k'oˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, Aˍhtenˍ venˇ hk'a gaˬ shiˍ k'oˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Siˍlaˆ leh Tiˆmoˉseˍ yawˇ geh haˆ haˆ laˬ tuˬ, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu piˇ leh yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
44017016	Pawˇlu‸ Aˍhtenˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ law chehˇ htaˇ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo shaˉ ho‸ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hpeh‸ bawˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44017017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ lehˬ bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ chaw hui leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ nyi le le tcuh hk'aw lo hk'a mawˬ hk'a hpuˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, jehˬ da‸ cehˇ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44017018	Oˇ htaˇ, Eˇpiˇkuˇruˆ awˬ liˇ leh Saˍtawˉeˆ awˬ liˇ yuˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Pawˇ lu‸ geh jehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Shu hkawˇ ca g'awˆ k'aoˍ toˇ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve leh naˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn leh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ ve pa taw, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ miˬ ve g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ca maˍ toˇ ve chaw yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44017019	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ yuˬ leh, jehˬ da‸ kuiˬ Aˍreˍ hk'aw teˇ shiˍ lo shiˍ k'ai leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ lawn awˬ suhˉ chi ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ a ciˉ maˍ laˇ-oˆ.
44017020	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ maˇ kaˇ jaw ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ aˬ hto‸ ma tcuhˉ kuiˬ cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44017021	Aˍhtenˍ venˇ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ leh hkehˉ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ lawn awˬ suhˉ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a kaˇ g'a hto tuˬ awˬ pon ceh tiˉ yawˇ hui awˬ yanˇ te peuˬ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44017022	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, jehˬ da‸ kuiˬ Aˍreˍ hk'aw awˬ k'aw ji ve teˇ kaˬ lo huˉ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Aˍhtenˍ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˆ yan puiˉ jaˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44017023	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ k'ai leh nawˬ hui oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve tanˇ kuiˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ leh oˉ k'oˍ pui chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44017024	Miˬ guiˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma leh miˬ guiˬ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ chaw yaˇ la‸ sheh te taˍ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
44017025	Chaw yaˇ ve la‸ sheh yawˇ awˬ pon teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ te tuˬ yawˇ loˍ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ a sha‸ te‸ piˇ leh, teˇ ceuˬ le le piˇ ve yoˬ.
44017026	Yawˇ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ tuˬ, chaw teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ te hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ pon fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ ve awˬ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui chehˇ tuˬ ve miˬ tcuhˉ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44017027	Hk'aˬ hk'e te leh chaw yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ ca ve awˬ hk'aw lo ca shoˆ nyi leh g'a mawˬ tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ chaw yaˇ hta‸ te hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve ka‸, yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ vuiˇ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
44017028	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui te‸ chehˇ ve, hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ te chehˇ ve leh hpeh‸ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve k'a muiˬ hkawˇ k'a shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve hk'e, Ngaˬ hui lehˬ yawˇ lo caˉ ya‸ la ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44017029	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha lo caˉ ya‸ la ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ pa taw, chaw yaˇ hui dawˇ puiˉ te puiˉ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han teˇ hpaˍ, shi maˇ k'oˆ, hpu maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ pui maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shuˍ da‸ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ dawˇ cawˇ.
44017030	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ leh te ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha maˇ tawnˇ taˍ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ lehˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44017031	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ leuˆ yuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ, yawˇ awˬ nyi tinˍ taˍ peuˬ. Chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ ve teh‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, suh kuiˍ lo yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ peuˬ teh‸ Pawˇlu‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44017032	Suh peuˬ ve chaw k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ leh g'uiˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ lawn chi awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ngaˬ hui na tuˬ sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44017033	Hk'e te leh, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44017034	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yonˍ la leh Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ pawnˇ da‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, Daˍyawˉnaˍsiˆ meh ve Aˍreˍ hk'aw jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ, Daˍmaˍriˆ meh ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44018001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Aˍhtenˍ venˇ lo tawˆ k'ai leh Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44018002	Oˇ kaˬ lo, Poˍtuˆ mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ Aˍkuˉlaˆ meh ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ hpuˇ da‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ Roˉma‸ venˇ hk'aw lo g'a tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ teh‸, jawˇ mawˇ Kaˍlawˇdiˆ tawˇ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma Piˇkiˇlaˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Iˉtaˍliˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo tawˆ la leh, oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ la gehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
44018003	Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh k'ai leh, yawˇ hui te ve kanˉ teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh chehˇ leh kanˉ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ hpa aˉ po k'o tawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44018004	Teˇ shinˉ nyi le le bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˍ g'a tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ jehˬ piˇ cehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018005	Siˍlaˆ leh Tiˆmoˉseˍ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo tawˆ la leh Pawˇlu‸ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ lehˬ g'aˇ hte‸ bon maˍ chehˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ coˇ caˇ leh shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44018006	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ leh maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ hta‸ hpi maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui ve awˬ suhˍ nawˬ hui ve oˉ k'oˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo gaˬ la piˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui geh ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018007	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve Tiˇtuˆ Yuˇtuˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve yehˬ lehˬ, bon yehˬ hta‸ neˇ da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44018008	Kaˍliˇpuˆ meh ve bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ leh, yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ htawˇ Pawˇlu‸ maˍ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44018009	Tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ taˇ kawˆ. Ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ taˇ chehˇ. Hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
44018010	Ngaˬ +nawˬ geh chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ naˬ tuˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na te tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, venˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve chaw maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018011	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo teˇ hk'aw‸ leh ha pa hkaw‸ maˬ chehˇ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018012	Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Gaˍliˍoˍ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ te chehˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ tu la leh yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw lo yuˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44018013	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui htaˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ hawˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo pui tuˬ beˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44018014	Oˇ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ tawˇ yaw-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ Gaˍliˍoˍ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ lawn chi lehˬ maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve, maˇ heˆ k'o haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ yeunˇ hkanˍ leh nawˬ hui ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
44018015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ meh teˇ hpaˍ leh nawˬ hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ lawn hpeh‸ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui te-o. Awˬ lawn chi hk'e ve hta‸ ngaˬ suhˉ maˇ jehˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018016	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw lo g'a‸ tawˆ ve yoˬ.
44018017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ bon yehˬ awˬ hoˉ Suˇtenˍ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh, suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo yawˇ hta‸ jaw‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Gaˍliˍoˍ lehˬ awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
44018018	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ oˇ kaˬ lo a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ peuˬ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh Suˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Piˇkiˇlaˆ leh Aˍkuˉlaˆ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ htawˇ yawˇ geh k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ te taˍ ve hk'e, Keˍcheˍ venˇ lo gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ chiˇ baˬ ve yoˬ.
44018019	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ lo gaˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo teh taˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, bon yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh Yuˇda‸ chaw hui geh jehˬ da‸ cehˇ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44018020	Yawˇ hui geh a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve htawˇ, yawˇ chehˇ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44018021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ k'o, nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ hk'aw tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44018022	Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo teˆ-e leh Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ ca hpuˇ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
44018023	Oˇ kaˬ lo a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ peuˬ htaˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai leh, Gaˍlaˍtiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Hpuˍgiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ k'ai leh awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ ca piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018024	Oˇ htaˇ, Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ venˇ yaˇ Aˍpawˇlu‸ meh ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ tawˇ yaw puiˉ ve chaw leh, Liˬ hpu shiˍ jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44018025	Yawˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve ya‸ k'aw awˬ lawn g'a henˇ leh nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ lawn hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve htawˇ, Yoˇhanˬ maˍ piˇ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44018026	Yawˇ lehˬ, bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh tanˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Piˇkiˇlaˆ leh Aˍkuˉlaˆ yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ hteˇ lehˍ k'aw‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018027	Yawˇ lehˬ, Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hpawˇ lo hkanˍ k'ai gaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ leh, oˇ hpawˇ chehˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw yonˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ maˇ ga piˇ ve yoˬ.
44018028	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw yawˇ hk'a deh‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'aˇ ve yoˬ.
44019001	Aˍpawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ awˬ na hpawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai leh, Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
44019002	Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ g'a peuˬ laˇ teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ kaˇ jaw teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019003	Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ ve, Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e ve baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ ve le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yoˇhanˬ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019004	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve baˆtiˆsaˬ teˇ ceuˬ piˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a yonˍ tuˬ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019005	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44019006	Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ htaˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh leh bon maˍ ve yoˬ.
44019007	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hk'e cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44019008	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh ha pa sheh lehˇ hk'a gaˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui geh yawˇ jehˬ da‸ cehˇ da‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn yawˇ hui yonˍ la tuˬ yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ nyi ma heh leh maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Ya‸ k'aw awˬ liˇ awˬ lawn hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui geh tawˆ k'ai leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai leh, Tuˇraˍnuˆ ve cawnˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ nyi le le jehˬ da‸ cehˇ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44019010	Yawˇ nyiˇ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ chi hk'e te ve pa taw, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44019011	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh uiˍ jaˇ ve anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve yoˬ.
44019012	Pawˇlu‸ yehˇ ve hpaˉ ce‸ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, tsuh‸ tuˬ ve hpa teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh shu yuˬ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui na-e la leh, haiˬ ve neˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44019013	Oˇ htaˇ, neˇ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ toˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, haiˬ ve neˇ geh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Pawˇlu‸ maˍ ve Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44019014	Keˍvaˆ meh ve Yuˇda‸ paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ suhˍ g'aˇ htawˇ chi hk'e te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44019015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, haiˬ ve neˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ awˬ lawn htawˇ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ a shu le teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019016	Oˇ htaˇ, haiˬ ve neˇ geh ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ pawˆ k'uˉ leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'aˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hehnˇ chaweh te ve pa taw, yawˇ hui g'a naˬ leh, yehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ k'u nyi te hpaw tawˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44019017	Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ lawn chi hta‸ g'a shiˍ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ kawˆ jaˇ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
44019018	Yonˍ peuˬ ve chaw htawˇ maˇ maˇ laˬ leh yawˇ hui te ya‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ hto maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019019	Faˍ te paˍ laiˉ g'aˇ htawˇ, yawˇ hui ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ laˬ leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ tuˉ baˬ ve yoˬ. Li‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hpfuhˇ yawˇ hui shawˍ nyi htaˇ, ngaˇ meunˍ hteh‸ hpfuhˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44019020	Hk'e te leh, awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ uiˍ la maˇ la leh, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44019021	Chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ taˍ ve, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Roˉma‸ venˇ lo htawˇ ngaˬ g'a gaˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44019022	Yawˇ hta‸ ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, Tiˆmoˉseˍ leh Eˇraˍtuˆ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo yawˇ k'ai tcuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ awˬ to Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ jaw chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
44019023	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Ya‸ k'aw awˬ liˇ hta‸ pa taw sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ maˇ maˇ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
44019024	Awˬ lawn k'o, Deˍmeˍtriˆ meh ve hpu dawˆ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hpu yuˬ leh Aˍteˍmiˆ g'uiˬ sha ma ve fuˍ yehˬ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw hpu dawˆ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ maˇ paw sha la ve yoˬ.
44019025	Yawˇ lehˬ hpu dawˆ paˍ hui hta‸ leh oˇ hk'e ve kanˉ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ peuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, kanˉ chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui paw sha la ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44019026	Pawˇlu‸ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui ve la‸ sheh hk'a te ve g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, g'uiˬ sha maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, aˬ laˬ hk'e Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ yawˇ beˬ leh, nyi ma hpfuhˆ k'ai tuˬ te ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44019027	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui ve kanˉ luˬ k'ai ve hta‸ dawˇ haˍ tuˬ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve Aˍteˍmiˆ g'uiˬ sha ma ve fuˍ yehˬ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve hk'e hpeh‸ leh, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve Aˍteˍmiˆ g'uiˬ sha ma ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ luˬ k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ htawˇ dawˇ haˍ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019028	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, Eˇfeˇsu‸ chaw hui ve Aˍteˍmiˆ g'uiˬ sha ma lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44019029	Hk'e te leh, venˇ oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh, Pawˇlu‸ geh toˇ ve Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ chaw Gaˍyuˆ leh Aˍriˍtaˍhkuˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'awˬ yuˬ leh, pawehˇ te ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo teˇ geh g'uiˇ lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
44019030	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e gaˇ ve htawˇ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44019031	Pawˇlu‸ ve awˬ chawˇ hpeh‸ ve Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ htawˇ, pawehˇ te ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˇ g'a lo‸-e tuˬ, chaw hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
44019032	Hpawˬ da‸ ve awˬ moˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ hpeh‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ teˇ ceuˬ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui maˇ-awˍ ve aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw hpawnˬ da‸ ve hta‸ maˇ shiˍ.
44019033	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui lehˬ, Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ chaw chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ca‸ peu leh, yawˇ tawˇ yaw tuˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ tawˇ yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ gaˇ leh, yawˇ la‸ sheh awˬ heˆ te maˍ ve yoˬ.
44019034	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ htaˇ, Eˇfeˇsu‸ chaw hui ve Aˍteˍmiˆ g'uiˬ sha ma lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, aˬ laˬ hk'e nyiˇ naˍ riˍ hk'a gaˬ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ hkawˇ tiˉ te leh kuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44019035	Venˇ ceˇ leˇ lonˉ lehˬ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ ta‸ iˉ chehˇ tcuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Eˇfeˇsu‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve Aˍteˍmiˆ g'uiˬ sha ma ve fuˍ yehˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo ce la ve shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ shaˉ ve venˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve chaw a shu cawˬ le.
44019036	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ta‸ iˉ chehˇ cawˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, maˇ dawˇ nyi leh te ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ te cawˇ ve yoˬ.
44019037	Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, bon yehˬ hta‸ te luˬ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ, ngaˬ hui ve g'uiˬ sha ma hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ nawˬ hui choˬ kaˬ lo g'awˬ veu laˇ peuˬ.
44019038	Hk'e te leh, Deˍmeˍtriˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ hpu dawˆ paˍ hui lehˬ, teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tawˇ te da‸ tuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, shaˉ nanˉ cawˬ leh, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui tawˇ te da‸ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
44019039	Chi awˬ hk'oˆ nawˬ hui te gaˇ ve k'o, tawˇ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ lonˉ g'a jehˬ cheˆ ve yoˬ.
44019040	Awˬ lawn k'o, ya‸ nyi duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te ve lehˬ, awˬ lawn te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, shu ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ laˇ ve hta‸ dawˇ haˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw chi hk'e hpawnˬ da‸ le teh‸ shu na nyi laˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ hui te‸ chiˉ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44019041	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hpawnˬ da‸ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ
44020001	Duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te ve chi gawˬ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ leh awˬ g'aˇ piˇ peuˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44020002	Yawˇ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ maˇ maˇ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
44020003	Pawˇlu‸ oˇ kaˬ lo ha pa sheh lehˇ chehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh Suˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'o‸-e-a teh‸ te htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jehˬ da‸ taˍ ve pa taw, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hpawˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44020004	Pawˇlu‸ geh k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Beˍriˆ venˇ yaˇ Puˇluˆ ve yaˇ paˍ Sawˇpaˍtaˍruˆ, Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ venˇ yaˇ Aˍriˍtaˍhkuˆ leh Seˍkuˍduˆ, Deˍbeˍ venˇ yaˇ Gaˍyuˆ leh Tiˆmoˉseˍ, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ chaw Tuˇhkiˆ leh Taˍroˆhpeˍ hui yoˬ.
44020005	Yawˇ hui awˉ lawˉ k'ai leh, Taˍroˇaˆ venˇ lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44020006	Hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ hk'aw lo diˇ maˇ keu ve pawehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui Hpiˇliˇpiˆ venˇ lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ tawˆ-e leh, ngaˇ nyi gaˬ heh‸, Taˍroˇaˆ venˇ lo yawˇ hui geh gaˬ leh, oˇ kaˬ lo suhˍ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44020007	Suhˍ nyi awˬ hk'aw awˉ lawˉ teˇ haˉ htaˇ, hkaoˍ monˇ hk'eh‸ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hui hpawnˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, shawˉ pawˍ tawˆ k'ai tuˬ dawˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ jehˬ piˇ leh, shehˍ k'aw hkui hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44020008	Ngaˬ hui hpawnˬ da‸ ve awˬ hta‸ teˇ htai‸ ve awˬ bawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo kawˆ faiˇ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44020009	Uˇtuˇhkuˆ meh ve chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ yehˬ miˉ ehˉ awˬ hpe‸ lo mui taˍ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ maw chaweh maˍ piˇ ve pa taw yawˇ zuh‸ muiˉ jo leh, zuh‸ muiˉ k'a ve teˇ yanˇ, yehˬ shehˆ htai‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ ce leh, suh peuˬ ve hta‸ shu ca chiˇ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44020010	Oˇ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ ya‸-e leh, chaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ boˆ taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hta‸ k'uˉ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ taˇ te. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo a sha‸ cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44020011	Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ taˆ-e leh, hkaoˍ monˇ hk'eh‸ leh caˇ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ htiˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui geh maw chaweh na‸ uˉ te da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44020012	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ awˬ te‸ g'a shiˍ k'o‸-e leh, ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44020013	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ leh Aˍsoˆ venˇ lo awˉ lawˉ k'ai taˍ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, ya‸ k'aw juˇ k'ai leh, oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui geh haw lo‸ k'oˍ g'a k'aw‸ ciˇ tuˬ yawˇ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
44020014	Aˍsoˆ venˇ lo yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw ha‸ yuˬ leh, Miˍtuˆleˍ venˇ lo ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44020015	Oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai leh, shawˉ pawˍ teˇ nyi hk'e ngaˬ hui Hkiˇoˆ conˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ leh, hpa‸ nyi hk'e teˇ nyi Saˍmoˆ conˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Hpiˇ nyi hk'e teˇ nyi oˇ kaˬ lo k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai leh, Meˍleˍtuˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44020016	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maw maw maˇ g'a chehˇ tuˬ, Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ lo maˇ deh leh teˇ pawˆ tiˉ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai tuˬ yawˇ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hpeh‸ ve k'o, Peˍteˍkoˆteˍ awˬ nyi htaˇ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ taˍ tuˬ, yawˇ haˆ haˆ k'ai gaˇ ve yoˬ.
44020017	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Meˍleˍtuˆ venˇ lo chehˇ taˍ leh, Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ lo chaw hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca kuˬ tcuh ve yoˬ.
44020018	Yawˇ hui yawˇ geh gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ gaˬ la ve teˇ nyi te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44020019	Ngaˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˉ hta‸ te htaˇ, nyi ma nuˇ nuˇ nehˬ nehˬ taˍ ve, mehˆ g'uiˬ maˇ maˇ ya‸ la ve leh, Yuˆda‸ chaw hui ngaˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jehˬ da‸ ve pa taw, beˬ ve lawˇ ve laiˉ ceuˬ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44020020	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ hto laˇ htaˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ, teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ faˉ taˍ leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ yehˬ peuˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44020021	G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, Yuˇda‸ chaw leh Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44020022	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ leh naˍ maˇ shiˍ.
44020023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu hpeh yuˬ leh fawˉ mehˍ laˇ tuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ law taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, teˇ venˇ le le awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hto laˇ ve yoˬ.
44020024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ g'a toˇ tuˬ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ toˇ peuˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hta‸ kanˉ pe‸ laˇ ve hk'e G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ g'a hkanˍ peuˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve a sha‸ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve teh‸ ngaˬ maˇ shawˍ.
44020025	G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ca toˇ maˍ piˇ peuˬ. Nawˬ hui hk'a g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ ngaˬ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ tuˬ ve ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44020026	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ ngaˬ ponˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, ya‸ nyi ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
44020027	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ maˇ jaw k'ai.
44020028	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˬ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a deh‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ-oˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ vuiˬ yuˬ taˍ ve awˬ moˍ hta‸ caˍ piˇ taw piˇ tuˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ.
44020029	Ngaˬ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˬ awˬ moˍ hta‸ te luˬ te sheˆ tuˬ ve haiˬ jaˇ ve veˬ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44020030	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tu la leh, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ ve awˬ pon beˬ yuˬ tuˬ hteˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hpfuhˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44020031	Chi hta‸ pa taw shaw taˍ-o‸. Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ shehˆ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ maˇ jehˇ jehˇ leh mehˆ g'uiˬ ya‸ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo shaˍ ti‸ pe‸ laˇ ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ.
44020032	Ngaˬ lehˬ chi beu‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sheh hk'aw leh, yawˇ ve awˬ bon uiˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ bon uiˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ uiˍ la mvuh la piˇ puiˉ leh, da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh nawˬ hui hta‸ chehˇ kuiˬ pe‸ laˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
44020033	Ngaˬ lehˬ, a shu teˇ g'aˇ ve hpu, shi, veu‸ tuˬ k'aˇ tuˬ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ sheˉ lai.
44020034	Ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh chi lehˬ, ngaˬ leh ngaˬ geh chehˇ ve chaw hui hk'a loˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ kanˉ te ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44020035	Nawˬ hui htawˇ chi hk'e g'aˇ hte‸ te leh awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ g'a ga piˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ te maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Piˇ ve lehˬ g'a ve a‸ kehˉ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ htawˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ te maˍ laˇ peuˬ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44020036	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh hkui tcuhˉ teh leh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44020037	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ g'aˇ hte‸ hawˬ leh, Pawˇlu‸ ve k'awˍ peˍ hta‸ k'uˉ taˍ leh yawˇ hta‸ boˆ nu ve yoˬ,
44020038	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ lo hk'a gaˬ shiˍ k'oˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44021001	Yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ k'aw‸ ciˇ leh, Kawˇsaˆ conˇ lo hteˇ lehˍ kai ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi Rawˇduˆ conˇ lo k'ai leh, oˇ kaˬ lo k'aw‸ tu leh Paˍtaˍraˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44021002	Oˇ kaˬ lo Hpiˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ
44021003	Kuˇpaˍruˆ conˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, la‸ sha paˉ hpawˇ lo ngaˬ hui k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Suˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ciˇ k'ai leh, Tuˇruˆ venˇ lo deh ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw taˆ taˍ ve mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo yuˬ ya‸-e ve yoˬ.
44021004	Oˇ kaˬ lo awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui ca mawˬ leh, suhˍ nyi hk'a gaˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ la‸ g'awˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
