44021005	Suhˍ nyi biˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ leh, awˬ miˇ awˬ yaˇ hui ka‸ teˇ geh venˇ awˬ baˬ lo hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ k'oˬ laˇ leh, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44021006	Teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hpaˆ da‸ hkawˇ yaw da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo taˆ lo‸-e leh, yawˇ hui htawˇ a shu yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
44021007	Ngaˬ hui Tuˇruˆ venˇ lo tu leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ ve ya‸ k'aw leh peuˬ htaˇ, Paˍtawˇleˍ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui geh ca guiˇ leh, yawˇ hui geh teˇ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44021008	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi ngaˬ hui k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai leh, Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Suhˍ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, Hpiˇliˇpuˆ meh ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui lo‸-e leh, yawˇ geh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44021009	G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ ma te ve yawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ awˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve awˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ haˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44021010	Yawˇ aˉ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Aˍgaˍbuˆ meh ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo tu leh oˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
44021011	Yawˇ ngaˬ hui geh lo‸ la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ ve haˍ pi caˆ hta‸ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ, yawˇ ve hkui sheh la‸ sheh hta‸ hpeh taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Haˍ pi caˆ chi ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ chi hk'e te hpeh yuˬ leh buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve la‸ sheh hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Aˍgaˍbuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44021012	Ngaˬ hui tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ hui leh oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
44021013	Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui hawˬ leh ngaˬ ve nyi ma hkoˇ k'ai tuˬ te laˇ ve le. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo shu hpeh laˇ ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, suh ve hta‸ hkanˍ tuˬ ve ka‸ ngaˬ gu taˍ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44021014	Ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ beˬ maˇ g'a ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ teh‸, ngaˬ hui k'oˆ leh ta‸ iˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44021015	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hui mawˇ gu taˍ leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44021016	Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve awˬ la‸ g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh k'ai leh, Maˍnaˍsonˍ meh ve Kuˇpaˍruˆ chaw teˇ g'aˇ geh haˉ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ geh shiˍ k'oˬ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ la‸ g'awˇ hpeh‸ maw peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44021017	Ngaˬ hui Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo gaˬ htaˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44021018	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh Yaˍkoˆ geh k'ai leh, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ hpawnˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44021019	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ hkawˇ yaw da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha hk'a te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn, teˇ ceuˬ peuˬ teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44021020	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ viˉ paˍ-oˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo yonˍ ve chaw hk'aˬ nyiˇ meunˍ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44021021	Nawˬ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ g'a shoˍ leh, awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ cawˬ ve hk'e maˇ g'a te teh‸ nawˬ k'oˆ leh, Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ tuˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui geh chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui laiˉ pawˆ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44021022	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e te tuˬ le. Nawˬ gaˬ la ve awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a kaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44021023	Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'e te-o. Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ te taˍ ve chaw awˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hui geh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44021024	Yawˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ ca te-o. Yawˇ hui oˉ k'oˍ chiˇ baˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ hpfuhˇ ca keu piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ ve awˬ lawn chaw chi ma ve g'a kaˇ ve hk'e maˇ cawˇ ve law teh‸ g'a shiˍ leh, nawˬ awˬ to awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh hk'a deh‸ k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
44021025	Yonˍ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon lehˬ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ suhˍ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, k'awˍ peˍ nyiˉ pehˍ ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai tuˬ ngaˬ hui jehˬ cheˆ taˍ ve hk'e yawˇ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ piˇ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44021026	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, shawˉ pawˍ teˇ nyi hk'e chaw oˇ ve awˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ ca te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ pon da‸ la kehˬ la ve awˬ liˇ te ve awˬ nyi biˇ la tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ pon tanˇ tuˬ g'a tanˇ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44021027	Suhˍ nyi oˇ ve biˇ la paˇ neˇ htaˇ, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo laˬ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a mawˬ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ ca juˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve,
44021028	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, haˆ ga la-o. Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chehˇ kuiˬ chi hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ canˇ tuˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo shiˍ veu laˇ leh, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ chi hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44021029	Awˬ lawn k'o, Taˍroˇhpeˍ meh ve Eˇfeˇsu‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ponˬ laˬ htaˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Pawˇlu‸ geh te toˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ leh, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo Pawˇlu‸ shiˍ veu laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ ve yoˬ.
44021030	Venˇ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te leh, chaw awˬ hpoˆ awˬ diˬ g'uiˇ laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo g'awˬ tawˆ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44021031	Pawˇlu‸ suh tuˬ yawˇ hui te chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ teˇ venˇ hk'a peu-eˬ duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ hta‸ shu ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44021032	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ ma‸ yaˇ leh ma‸ poˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te chehˇ kuiˬ lo g'uiˇ ya‸-e ve yoˬ. Chaw chi ma ve lehˬ, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ leh ma‸ yaˇ hui hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ dawˆ ve yoˬ.
44021033	Oˇ htaˇ, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ Pawˇlu‸ geh k'ai leh yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, sho caˆ nyiˇ caˆ hpeh tuˬ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ ve le, aˬ hto‸ ma te ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44021034	Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ hpaˍ teˇ ceuˬ kuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te ve hta‸ pa taw, awˬ lawn hk'a deh‸ maˇ shiˍ hpeh‸ leh, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ ma‸ yaˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ k'ai tuˬ ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44021035	Pawˇlu‸ go tcuhˉ puiˍ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hehnˇ chaweh te ve pa taw, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ g'a chiˇ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44021036	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a‸ leh, Yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ loˬ teh‸ kuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44021037	Ma‸ yaˇ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ yuˬ lo‸-e-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hta‸ ngaˬ tawˇ yaw hpeh‸-aw laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ Heˍlaˍsaˆ hkawˇ shiˍ-aˍ laˇ.
44021038	Nawˬ lehˬ, aˉ suhˆ htaˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hpfuhˆ leh shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve chaw awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ hta‸ shawˍ veu leh heh puiˉ hk'aw lo shiˍ k'ai ve Eˇjiˇtu‸ chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44021039	Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ Kiˇliˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Taˍsuˆ venˇ yaˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ meh maˇ uiˍ ve venˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Chaw chi ma ve hta‸ tawˇ yaw tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ a ciˉ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44021040	Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ yawˇ hta‸ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, go awˬ hk'oˆ huˉ taˍ leh, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ la‸ sheh awˬ heˆ te maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ yaw leh k'oˆ ve,
44022001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui leh awˬ pa teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ yaw hk'aw‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ a ciˉ na sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44022002	Yawˇ Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ yaw ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ htaˇ, ya‸ sheh htaˇ a‸ kehˉ ka‸ ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve,
44022003	Ngaˬ lehˬ Kiˇliˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ Taˍsuˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo paw la ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo Gaˍmaˍleˍlaˆ ve hkui paˇ lo ngaˬ uiˍ la leh, awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ g'a henˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ nyi nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ htawˇ nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44022004	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ, hawˉ hk'aˆ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh htawnˍ hk'aw lo keu leh, tiˇ pehˍ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ Ya‸ k'aw awˬ liˇ chi hta‸ ngaˬ fawˉ mehˍ jaw peuˬ.
44022005	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ ngaˬ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui geh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon ngaˬ li‸ g'a leh, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ hpeh yuˬ veu laˇ leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44022006	Ngaˬ k'ai leh Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ awˬ paˇ lo gaˬ la htaˇ, mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo hehnˇ jaˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ teˇ cawˬ haˉ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ hti la ve yoˬ.
44022007	Ngaˬ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ paiˍ leh, Sawˇlu‸-oˬ, Sawˇlu‸-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve le teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
44022008	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ a shu le teh‸, ngaˬ na nyi htaˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ chehˇ ve Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44022009	Ngaˬ geh k'ai chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htawˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ g'a kaˇ.
44022010	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ aˬ hto‸ ma g'a te tuˬ le teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Tu leh Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ hk'aw lo k'ai-o. Nawˬ awˬ pon hk'a fuiˍ teh taˍ ve kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ oˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44022011	Hehnˇ jaˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ mehˆ maˇ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ geh k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ sheh veu leh, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ hk'aw lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
44022012	Oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh da‸ leh awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan puiˉ ve Aˍnaˍniˆ meh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44022013	Yawˇ ngaˬ geh laˬ leh, Awˬ nyi paˍ Sawˉlu‸-oˬ, nawˬ mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la-o teh‸ ngaˬ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ teˇ hkui awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ mehˆ k'aw‸ mawˬ la leh yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44022014	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw hk'aw tawˆ la ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ tuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ peuˬ.
44022015	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ g'a mawˬ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ awˬ pon nawˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
44022016	Chi beu‸ nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw law chehˇ ve le. Tu la-o. Yawˇ ve awˬ meh hta‸ peun ve awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ leh, nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ htaˬ tsuhˇ hk'a-o teh‸ yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44022017	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44022018	Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo haˆ haˆ tawˆ k'ai loˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˬ lawn nawˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44022019	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw yuˬ keu leh, bon yehˬ teˇ yehˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ dawˆ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44022020	Nawˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ Saˍteˍhpanˍ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ yuˬ sheˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh yawˇ hui te chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ shaw taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44022021	Yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Tawˆ k'ai loˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui geh k'ai tcuh tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44022022	Tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui yawˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ ta‸ iˉ na taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Chi hk'e ve chaw hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yuˬ baˬ loˬ. Yawˇ te‸ chehˇ maˇ keunˍ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44022023	Yawˇ hui kuˬ leh, a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ k'ehˆ leh baˬ taˆ ve, je‸ meu-e ka‸ mvuhˇ hpe lo hkaˆ baˬ ve yoˬ.
44022024	Hk'e te leh, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ ma‸ yaˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ k'ai tcuh leh, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw shu yawˇ awˬ lawn chi hk'e k'oˆ kuˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, Yawˇ hta‸ jaw‸ leh na nyi-o teh‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44022025	Shaˍ guiˬ caˆ yuˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ hpeh ve teˇ yanˇ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve ma‸ poˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ suhˉ maˇ jehˬ leh nawˬ hui jaw‸ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ leh laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44022026	Tawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ma‸ poˍ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ geh k'ai leh, Nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te tuˬ dawˇ ve le. Chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve law teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44022027	Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ geh laˬ leh, Nawˬ Roˉma‸ chaw yoˬ laˇ. Ngaˬ hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ teh‸ na nyi htaˇ, Yoˬ teh‸ Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44022028	Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ hpu maˇ maˇ g'a piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ, paw la htaˇ ka‸ Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44022029	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ jaw‸ leh na nyi-a teh‸ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ teˇ cawˬ haˉ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ htawˇ, Pawˇlu‸ Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ g'a hpeh peuˬ ve pa taw kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44022030	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui Pawˇlu‸ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hta‸ hk'a deh‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ hpui hk'a leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ kuˬ hpawnˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ shiˍ ya‸-e leh, yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44023001	Oˇ htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hk'a te ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ maˇ taˍ.
44023002	Oˇ htaˇ paw hkuˇ lonˉ Aˍnaˍniˆ lehˬ, Yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw hta‸ dawˆ hpehˇ-oˆ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023003	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Htunˉ shehˍ taˍ ve g'o‸ pa-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ dawˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ nawˬ choˬ kaˬ mui chehˇ ve ka‸, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ hawˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ dawˆ tcuh ve laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023004	Awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44023005	Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, yawˇ lehˬ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ. Nawˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ lawn nawˬ haiˬ ve hkawˇ maˇ g'a yaw teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44023006	Hpawnˬ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Saˍduˆkehˇ hpeh‸ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ Pawˇlu‸ g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ htaˇ, jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ lehˬ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hpeh‸ leh, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ ve awˬ yaˇ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve hta‸ dawˇ law ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, bvuhˬ chaweh k'oˆ ve yoˬ.'
44023007	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui leh Saˍduˆkehˇ hui tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ leh, hpawnˬ da‸ ve chaw hui nyiˇ moˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
44023008	Awˬ lawn k'o, Saˍduˆkehˇ hui lehˬ, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve maˇ cawˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ka‸ awˬ ha ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hui lehˬ, chi hk'a peu-eˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
44023009	Hk'e te leh duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ve li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tu leh k'oˆ ve, Chi hpaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ mawˬ. Awˬ ha, maˇ heˆ k'o mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw piˇ leh naˍ teh‸ k'oˆ leh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44023010	Chi hk'e tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ jaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ g'awˬ tzuh‸ sheˬ puiˉ-aˆ teh‸, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ dawˇ haˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ya‸-e tcuh leh, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo lu yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ma‸ yaˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ yuˬ k'ai tuˬ, yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023011	Oˇ ve teˇ haˉ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha Pawˇlu‸ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Nyi ma taˇ luˬ. Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn nawˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ peuˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ Roˉma‸ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ nawˬ shaˉ hkiˆ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023012	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ da‸ leh, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ maˇ g'a tiˇ pehˍ ve ceh ceh, te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ caˇ maˇ dawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44023013	Chi hk'e hkanˍ taˍ ve chaw awˇ chi hpaˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44023014	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh k'ai leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ maˇ g'a tiˇ pehˍ ve ceh ceh, caˇ tuˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ leh‸ nyi teh‸ k'oˆ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44023015	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui leh jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ geh Pawˇlu‸ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ leuˉ leh hk'a deh‸ na nyi tuˬ ve hk'e te leh, yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh yuˬ laˬ tuˬ ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ hta‸ lawˬ hk'awˉ-oˆ. Awˬ paˇ lo yawˇ maˇ gaˬ la sheˍ htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ ngaˬ hui gu taˍ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023016	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e naˆ taˍ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ Pawˇlu‸ ve awˬ nuˍ ma ve yaˇ paˍ g'a shiˍ leh, yawˇ ma‸ yaˇ yehˬ hk'aw lo‸-e leh Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ ca hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023017	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ leh yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw haˉ paˍ chi hta‸ ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ geh shiˍ k'ai-o. Yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ tuˬ awˬ lawn cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023018	Hk'e te leh, ma‸ poˍ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai leh, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ geh gaˬ htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw haˉ paˍ chi nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ awˬ lawn cawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ geh shiˍ veu laˇ tuˬ, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve Pawˇlu‸ ngaˬ hta‸ kuˬ leh lawˬ hkawˉ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023019	Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ lehˬ, chaw haˉ paˍ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ yuˬ leh, baˬ kuiˬ lo shiˍ k'ai leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ cawˬ le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44023020	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Pawˇlu‸ awˬ lawn hk'a deh‸ na nyi gaˇ ve hk'e te leh, shawˉ pawˍ k'o jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ geh shiˍ veu laˇ tuˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ tuˬ nyi ma hawˍ da‸ peuˬ.
44023021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui nyi ma cawˇ ve hk'e nawˬ taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ maˇ g'a tiˇ pehˍ ve ceh ceh, te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ caˇ maˇ dawˬ teh‸, chaw awˇ chi hpaˆ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ taˍ leh, yawˇ hta‸ naˆ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ yawˇ hui gu taˍ leh, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ law na chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023022	Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ chaw haˉ paˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hto laˇ ve awˬ lawn chi, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ taˇ hto piˇ teh‸ tawˇ piˇ peuˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ.
44023023	Oˇ htaˇ, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ lehˬ, ma‸ poˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ya‸ puiˉ k'awˇ naˍ riˍ htaˇ Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo k'ai tuˬ, la‸ caˉ pfuhˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ nyiˇ ha, iˉ mvuhˇ ciˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ suhˍ chi leh, gehˇ taˆ ve ma‸ yaˇ nyiˇ ha hta‸ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ-o‸.
44023024	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Pawˇlu‸ ciˇ tuˬ ve iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ leh, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ Hpeˍliˆ geh yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ k'oˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023025	Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ lehˬ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ feu piˇ ve,
44023026	Kaˍlawˇdiˆ Luˇsiˆ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ Hpeˍliˆ hta‸ ha‸ hphnˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
44023027	Chaw chi teˇ g'a hta‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hpeh yuˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ k'ai leh, yawˇ Roˉma‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve pa taw yawˇ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023028	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ hk'aˬ hk'e taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ gaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui ve jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ geh ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44023029	Suh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ maˇ k'oˆ, htawnˍ hk'aw geh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ maˇ taˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ceh venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44023030	Chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ shu gu taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ geh peu laˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ awˬ lawn k'oˆ tuˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023031	Hk'e teˇ leh, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, Anˍtiˇpaˍriˆ venˇ hk'a gaˬ tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ k'oˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44023032	Shawˉ pawˍ teˇ nyi hk'e Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ shiˍ k'ai tuˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, iˉ mvuhˇ ciˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ teh taˉ leh, yawˇ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ.
44023033	Iˉ mvuhˇ ciˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo gaˬ htaˇ, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ hta‸ li‸ piˇ leh, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ geh shiˍ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44023034	Mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ lehˬ, li‸ hta‸ g'aw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ hk'aˬ ve teˇ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve le teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Kiˇliˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teh‸ g'a shiˍ htaˇ,
44023035	mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ gaˬ la htaˇ, nawˬ k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve teˇ phaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ na tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ Heˍroˆ ve hawˉ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo haw taˍ tuˬ yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44024001	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˇ nyi gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ Aˍnaˍniˆ geh awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ leh Teˍraˍtuˇluˆ meh ve tawˇ yaw puiˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ teˇ geh oˇ kaˬ lo laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ lawn k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44024002	Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ kuˬ teh taˍ peuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Teˍraˍtuˇluˆ yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ-oˬ, nawˬ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui dawˇ sha gaˇ sha jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ leh, nawˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ pa taw chaw ceuˬ chi awˬ pon awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ da‸ la tuˬ nawˬ te ve yoˬ.
44024003	Chi hta‸ pa taw, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ kaˬ le le ngaˬ hui nawˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44024004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maw chaweh maˇ g'a sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ, yeunˇ hkanˍ leh ngaˬ hui k'oˆ tuˬ ve tawˇ teˇ nyiˇ hkawˇ hta‸ a ciˉ na laˇ sheˍ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˇ ve yoˬ.
44024005	Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, haiˬ jaˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hk'a peu-eˬ hpfuhˆ k'ai tuˬ ca juˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Shu hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ k'ai ve Naˍzaˍrehˆ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ, yawˇ lehˬ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44024006	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ yawˇ coˇ caˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ leh yawˇ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44024008	Nawˬ awˬ to yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na nyi ve k'o, ngaˬ hui yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Teˍraˍtuˇluˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44024009	Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, Yawˇ k'oˆ ve hk'e cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh venˇ baˆ ga hpoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44024010	Mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ tawˇ yaw tuˬ awˬ heˆ te maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ laiˉ hk'aw‸ chaw ceuˬ chi awˬ hk'oˆ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ te jaw ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ha k'a yaw hk'aw‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44024011	Oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ ngaˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai ve, teˇ chi nyiˇ nyi awˬ hk'oˆ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44024012	Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, bon yehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ leh chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te piˇ lawˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ mawˬ.
44024013	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ taˍ ve awˬ lawn, nawˬ hta‸ yuˬ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ maˇ cawˬ.
44024014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hta‸ chi hk'e hteˇ lehˍ hto laˇ ve yoˬ. Shu hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ k'ai ve awˬ moˍ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Ya‸ k'aw awˬ liˇ chi awˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ leh tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
44024015	Hteˇ ve chaw ka‸ maˇ hteˇ ve chaw ka‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ law ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ htawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ cuˇ leh dawˇ law ve yoˬ.
44024016	G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ ngaˬ coˇ caˇ leh te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44024017	Awˬ hk'aw‸ a ciˉ maw chaweh ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ hta‸ ga piˇ tuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ leh tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ yuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
44024018	Ngaˬ chi hk'e te chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ liˇ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ ngaˬ geh chehˇ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te chehˇ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh,
44024019	yawˇ hui lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ taˍ tuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hui laˬ leh k'oˆ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
44024020	Maˇ heˆ k'o, jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ tu huˉ ve teˇ yanˇ, Suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ lawn hta‸ pa taw ya‸ nyi ngaˬ nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸,
44024021	ngaˬ bvuhˬ chaweh k'oˆ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ kuiˬ hk'aˬ hk'e cawˬ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui k'oˆ tcuh-o teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44024022	Jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ lehˬ, Ya‸ k'aw awˬ liˇ awˬ lawn hta‸ hk'a cawˇ cawˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ awˬ yanˇ jiˆ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ Luˇsiˆ gaˬ la htaˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn ngaˬ jehˬ cheˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44024023	Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ shaw taˍ tuˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ lehˬ ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh maˇ te leh, yawˇ loˍ ve hk'e yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ga piˇ tuˬ taˇ tawˍ taˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44024024	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw gaˬ leh, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ lehˬ, Duˍsiˆleˍ meh ve yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma geh teˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ ma yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ kuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ lawn k'oˆ maˍ laˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ na ve yoˬ.
44024025	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ lawn, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ g'aˇ ve awˬ lawn leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ gaˬ la tuˬ ve suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ lawn k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ kawˆ leh k'oˆ ve, Chi beu‸ k'o‸-e sheˍ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ kuˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44024026	Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hta‸ hpu pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yawˇ dawˇ law ve pa taw, laiˉ pawˆ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ kuˬ leh na‸ uˉ te da‸ ve yoˬ.
44024027	Nyiˇ hk'aw‸ biˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Hpeˍliˆ jawˇ mawˇ te kuiˬ lo Pawˇkiˆ Hpeˍtuˆ jawˇ mawˇ ca te la ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve pa taw, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw lo haw taˉ ve yoˬ.
44025001	Jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ lehˬ mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo gaˬ la leh, shehˆ nyi gaˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo tu leh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44025002	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ hoˉ awˬ naˬ teˇ hpaˍ Pawˇlu‸ awˬ lawn maˇ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ hta‸ hto piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025003	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Awˬ bon te leh Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo a ciˉ peu laˇ-oˆ teh‸, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo yawˇ hui naˆ taˍ leh Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44025004	Jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo haw taˍ ve yoˬ. Maˇ maw maw ngaˬ awˬ to oˇ kaˬ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
44025005	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh k'ai leh, chaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ cawˬ ve k'o ca taˍ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025006	Yawˇ yawˇ hui geh aˬ laˬ hk'e teˇ chi nyi chehˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo k'aw‸ k'o‸-e ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi yawˇ suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw hk'oˆ mui leh, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ ca shiˍ veu laˇ tuˬ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025007	Pawˇlu‸ gaˬ la htaˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo laˬ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ huˉ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ yuˬ maˍ piˇ maˇ g'a ve htawˇ, uiˍ jaˇ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44025008	Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ ve awˬ lawn k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ leh k'oˆ ve, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ te ya‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve pa taw, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ, nawˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai gaˇ laˇ teh‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44025010	Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ngaˬ huˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Choˬ kaˬ lo ngaˬ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ laˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ to hk'a deh‸ shiˍ taˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ te ya‸.
44025011	Ngaˬ te ya‸ leh suh keunˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ te taˍ ve k'o, suh ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ jaw k'ai. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ, teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˇ ve k'o, yawˇ hui ve la‸ shehˍ hk'aw ngaˬ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ maˇ hpeh‸. Jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ geh k'ai tuˬ ngaˬ lawˬ ve yoˬ teh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025012	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve jehˬ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ moˍ geh jehˬ da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Nawˬ jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ geh k'ai tuˬ lawˬ ve pa taw, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ geh nawˬ g'a k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025013	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw gaˬ leh, hkunˉ hawˉ hkawnˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ leh awˬ miˇ ma Beˍraˍniˆ lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ tuˬ Kehˉsaˍriˆ venˇ lo gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
44025014	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ oˇ kaˬ lo a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ awˬ lawn hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ hto piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍliˆ htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44025015	Ngaˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui leh Yuˇda‸ awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn hto laˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ tuˬ yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44025016	Ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mehˆ hpfuhˇ tawˍ da‸ leh, venˇ baˆ taˍ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ maˇ g'a yaw hk'aw‸ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, shu la‸ hk'aw chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ Roˉma‸ chaw hui awˬ liˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui choˬ kaˬ lo hpawnˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ awˬ yanˇ maˇ jiˆ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw hk'oˆ mui leh, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ veu laˇ tuˬ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025018	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui tu leh chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ dawˇ taˍ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ yawˇ hui maˇ taˍ.
44025019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn leh, Yeˍsuˆ teh‸ meh ve suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn ceh tiˉ yawˇ geh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44025020	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e na nyi tuˬ ngaˬ dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve pa taw, Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ, nawˬ oˇ kaˬ lo k'ai gaˇ laˇ teh‸, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ na nyi ve yoˬ.
44025021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lonˉ suhˉ taˆ laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon teh taˍ laˇ sheˍ teh‸ yawˇ lawˬ hkawˉ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ geh k'ai tcuh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ shaw taˍ tuˬ ngaˬ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025022	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ htaˇ, Shawˉ pawˍ nawˬ g'a kaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44025023	Hk'e te leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi jawˇ mawˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ leh Beˍraˍniˆ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ jiˇ leh, ma‸ teˇ hinˉ poˍ hui leh, venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ve chaw uiˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ bawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ tawˇ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ shu shiˍ veu laˇ ve yoˬ.
44025024	Oˇ htaˇ jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ k'oˆ ve, Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ leh choˬ kaˬ lo hpawnˬ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui mawˬ ve chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, choˬ kaˬ lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ awˬ lawn Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ geh laˬ leh, Chi hpaˇ te‸ chehˇ maˇ keunˍ teh‸ yawˇ hui g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
44025025	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi hpaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo suh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ mawˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lonˉ geh k'ai tuˬ lawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ k'ai tcuh tuˬ ngaˬ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ peuˬ.
44025026	Yawˇ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ ve jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ piˇ tuˬ awˬ ti teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na nyi peuˬ k'o, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ bvuh‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ hui chi ma ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ-oˬ, leuˉ leh nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ veu laˇ peuˬ.
44025027	Awˬ lawn k'o, htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ peu k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ li‸ hk'a deh‸ maˇ bvuh‸ piˇ k'o, a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˇ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44026001	Oˇ htaˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ lawn k'oˆ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ ve la‸ sheh che leh yawˇ ve awˬ lawn k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ ve,
44026002	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ-oˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ laˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ lawn, ya‸ nyi nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
44026003	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, yawˇ hui tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn nawˬ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, a ciˉ yeunˇ hkanˍ leh ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ
44026004	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ, ngaˬ yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ ve teˇ yanˇ hta‸ tanˬ leh, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ te ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44026005	Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ hui ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn shiˍ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui ve oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, Hpaˍriˍsehˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hehnˇ jaˇ ve awˬ liˇ te ve teˇ moˍ hta‸ ngaˬ caˉ da‸ ve teh‸ yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ gaˇ ve k'o hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44026006	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law ve pa taw, chi beu‸ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ choˬ kaˬ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44026007	Ngaˬ hui ve chaw ceuˬ teˇ chi nyiˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ coˇ caˇ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ka ti‸ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yawˇ hui dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ-oˬ, dawˇ law taˍ ve oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44026008	Suh peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yonˍ maˇ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui dawˇ ve le.
44026009	Naˍzaˍrehˆ chaw Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ tawˍ taˍ tuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ te cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na dawˇ nyi jaw ve yoˬ.
44026010	Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ oˇ hk'e te jaw ve yoˬ. Paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui geh a hkaw-anˬ g'a peuˬ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui laiˉ g'aˇ hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw haw taˍ ve yoˬ. Shu yawˇ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ htawˇ nyi ma cawˇ leh la‸ sheh chiˇ jaw ve yoˬ.
44026011	Bon yehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ laiˉ pawˆ ciˍ yanˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ tuˬ ngaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te ve yoˬ. Nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ beu‸ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, shu mvuhˇ shu miˬ ve venˇ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ jaw ve yoˬ.
44026012	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ chi hk'e te chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui ngaˬ hta‸ kanˉ chi chiˇ a‸ laˇ leh a hkaw-anˬ pe‸ laˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44026013	Ya‸ k'aw k'aˉ lo mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw tcuhˆ teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo mvuhˇ nyi a‸ kehˉ hehnˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ lehˬ, ngaˬ leh ngaˬ geh teˇ geh k'ai chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ hti la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
44026014	Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ lo paiˍ taˍ htaˇ, Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ yaw leh chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve, Sawˉlu‸-oˬ, Sawˉlu‸-oˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve le. Nuˇ juˆ tuˬ ve aˉ taˬ hta‸ nawˬ hteˆ ve lehˬ, nawˬ g'a naˬ ve ceh tiˉ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44026015	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ a shu le teh‸ ngaˬ na nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ fawˉ mehˍ chehˇ ve Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ.
44026016	Tu leh hteˇ lehˍ huˉ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve lehˬ, chi awˬ pon yoˬ. Nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ tuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ kanˉ te leh shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44026017	Yuˇda‸ chaw leh buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui mehˆ g'a mawˬ la tuˬ, yawˇ hui geh ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'ai tcuh leh, yawˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ ponˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44026018	Yawˇ hui mehˆ mawˬ la ve pa taw, naˆ ho‸ ve hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˉ leh, awˬ g'euˆ lo laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, saˍtanˍ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˉ leh G'uiˬ sha geh laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a ve hta‸ ka‸ g'a leh ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh ka‸ g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
44026019	Hk'e te leh hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ-oˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ na yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
44026020	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ leh Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ bon maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh, G'uiˬ sha geh k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la leh, venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ te tuˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44026021	Chi hta‸ pa taw, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ngaˬ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
44026022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ G'uiˬ sha ga laˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ choˬ kaˬ lo g'a huˉ taˍ leh, uiˍ ve i ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui leh Moˉseˍ k'oˆ ve hk'e ceh ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44026023	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ awˉ lawˉ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ chaw leh buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ awˬ g'euˆ awˬ lawn yawˇ hto piˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44026024	Pawˇlu‸ chi hk'e yaw hk'aw‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ k'oˆ ve, Pawˇlu‸-oˬ, nawˬ g'uˇ k'ai peuˬ. Nawˬ li‸ maˇ maˇ henˇ ve pa taw nawˬ g'uˇ k'ai ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44026025	Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ-oˬ, ngaˬ g'uˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Chaw hkawˇ hk'a deh‸ nawˇ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ yaw laˇ ve yoˬ.
44026026	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ shiˍ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi lehˬ baˬ kuiˬ lo hpeh‸ la ve maˇ heˆ ve pa taw, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ maˇ shiˍ maˇ mawˬ ve te ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ ngaˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
44026027	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ yonˍ ve laˇ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44026028	Jawˇ mawˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Teˇ hkui tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ nawˬ te ve law leˇ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44026029	Pawˇlu‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ yanˇ ngeh ve maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ yanˇ maw ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ awˬ to ka‸, ya‸ nyi ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ka‸, sho caˆ hpeh taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44026030	Oˇ htaˇ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ tu leh, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ka‸, Beˍraˍniˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui geh mui taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ tu ve yoˬ.
44026031	Yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, tiˇ pehˍ keunˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hpeh taˍ keunˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44026032	Jawˇ mawˇ Aˍgiˇpaˆ lehˬ jawˇ mawˇ Hpeˍtuˆ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw chi lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ geh k'ai tuˬ maˇ lawˬ ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44027001	Iˉtaˍliˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ g'a ciˇ k'ai tuˬ jawˇ mawˇ dawˇ cheˆ peuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Pawˇlu‸ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hpeh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸, Awˇguˇtuˆ ma‸ teˇ ta‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve Yuˇluˆ meh ve ma‸ poˍ teˇ g'aˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44027002	Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ lo cawˬ ve venˇ teˇ hpaˍ lo k'ai tuˬ ve, Aˍdaˍmuˇtiˆ venˇ yaˇ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui ciˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ve Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ venˇ yaˇ Aˍriˍtaˍhkuˆ htawˇ, ngaˬ hui geh k'ai ve yoˬ.
44027003	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi ngaˬ hui Siˉdonˍ venˇ lo deh ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh k'ai tuˬ leh awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ, Yuˇluˆ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ leh a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44027004	Ngaˬ hui oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ haw hpawˇ maˇ cawˇ ve pa taw, mvuhˇ haw maˇ htinˍ ve teˇ hpawˇ lo Kuˇpaˍruˆ conˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui peun leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
44027005	Kiˇliˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Paˍpuˇliˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ paˇ lo cawˬ ve laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ teˇ tawn hta‸ ngaˬ hui hpanˍ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Luˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Muˍraˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44027006	Ma‸ poˍ lehˬ oˇ kaˬ Iˉtaˍliˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ mawˬ leh, ngaˬ hui hta‸ lo‸-e tcuh ve yoˬ. Haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ venˇ yaˇ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44027007	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ maw chaweh ngaˬ hui a yehˉ yehˉ k'ai leh, haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Kaˍniˆ venˇ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ hui lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ haw hpawˇ maˇ cawˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'aw‸ k'ai maˇ hpeh‸ leh, mvuhˇ haw maˇ htinˍ ve teˇ hpawˇ lo Kaˍreˍteˍ conˇ hta‸ peun leh Saˍmoˍneˍ venˇ hpawˇ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
44027008	Haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo conˇ oˇ ve awˬ paˇ lo ngaˬ hui k'ai leh, Laˍsehˇ venˇ hta‸ neˇ ve Nyi sha ve deh kuiˬ meh ve teˇ kaˬ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44027009	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ maˇ maˇ peuˬ k'ai leh, caˇ tuˬ ce ve awˬ nyi ponˬ k'ai peuˬ ve pa taw, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ ve kawˆ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ. Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve,
44027010	Awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi beu‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ k'ai ve k'o, haw lo‸ k'oˍ leh mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a luˬ ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui ve a sha‸ htawˇ g'a shonˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ shiˍ dawˇ mawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44027011	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ma‸ poˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ a‸ kehˉ haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hoˉ leh haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na ve yoˬ.
44027012	Deh kuiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ kaˆ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw chehˇ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ da‸ ve pa taw, oˇ kaˬ tawˆ k'ai leh, hpeh‸ ve k'o Hpiˇniˆ venˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ deh kuiˬ lo gaˬ leh, mvuhˇ kaˆ ve awˬ yanˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ tuˬ chaw maˇ-awˍ ve nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ. Hpiˇniˆ venˇ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ deh kuiˬ g'uiˬ k'aweh‸ lehˬ, Kaˍreˍteˍ conˇ lo cawˬ leh, mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ awˬ na teˇ ceˍ leh, mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ awˬ hawˉ teˇ ceˍ lo mawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44027013	Awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ ve mvuhˇ haw a yehˉ yehˉ meuˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui dawˇ law taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la peuˬ teh‸ dawˇ leh, sho k'uˉ k'aweh‸ g'awˬ tawˆ peuˬ hkaw‸ nawˉ, Kaˍreˍteˍ conˇ awˬ paˇ lo hpanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44027014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ maw maw gaˬ leh mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ awˬ na teˇ ceˍ lo laˬ ve mvuhˇ haw lonˉ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hpawˇ lo te leh g'aˇ hte‸ meuˆ la ve yoˬ.
44027015	Mvuhˇ haw oˇ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ htinˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hkanˍ maˇ g'aˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ hk'e leˇ hpehˇ peu leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ haw meuˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44027016	Kaˍlawˉdeˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve conˇ ehˉ, mvuhˇ haw maˇ hehnˇ jaˇ ve teˇ hpawˇ lo ngaˬ hui k'ai chehˇ htaˇ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ehˉ maˇ g'a luˬ k'ai tuˬ, g'aˇ hte‸ coˇ caˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo haw lo‸ k'oˍ ehˉ hta‸ g'awˬ yuˬ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ lonˉ awˬ hk'oˆ lo g'awˬ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
44027017	Haw lo‸ k'oˍ lonˉ maˇ g'a paˆ-e tuˬ, yawˇ hui aˉ caˆ hkeh yuˬ leh hk'a deh‸ hpeh tcuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, shehˇ shiˍ hpoˆ lonˉ cawˬ kuiˬ lo yawˇ hui ca hkanˉ taˍ puiˉ-aˆ teh‸ dawˇ haˍ ve pa taw, hpa peˆ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ ya‸-e leh, hk'e leˇ mvuhˇ haw meuˆ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
44027018	Mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ hehnˇ jaˇ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ taˆ taˆ ya‸ ya‸ te ve pa taw, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi yawˇ hui taˆ taˍ ve mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ ve yoˬ.
44027019	Shehˆ nyi gaˬ la htaˇ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui yuˬ baˬ ve yoˬ.
44027020	Awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ maw chaweh awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ nyi ka‸ meu‸ keu teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ maˇ tawˆ la ve awˬ hk'oˆ, mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ tcuhˉ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui g'a pon tuˬ ve teh‸ dawˇ law kuiˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
44027021	Yawˇ hui caˇ tuˬ maˇ caˇ ve maw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui awˬ k'aw ji lo tu huˉ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ ve hk'awˇ hta‸ na leh keˍreˍteˍ conˇ lo maˇ tawˆ la sheˍ ve hk'e k'o, luˬ ve sheˆ ve chi hta‸ maˇ g'a hpuˇ.
44027022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'a ka‸ maˇ g'a suh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ceh tiˉ luˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
44027023	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ leh ngaˬ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ya‸ puiˉ haˉ ngaˬ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
44027024	Pawˇlu‸-oˬ, taˇ kawˆ, Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lonˉ Kehˉsaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ g'a tu huˉ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ geh teˇ geh haw lo‸ k'oˍ ciˇ taˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44027025	Hk'e te leh, awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
44027026	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ hui lehˬ, conˇ teˇ maˬ maˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo g'a hkanˉ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44027027	Teˇ chi awˇ nyi teˇ haˉ gaˬ leh, ngaˬ hui Aˍdiˆ laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, shehˍ k'aw hkui htaˇ hk'e gaˬ leh, ngaˬ hui miˬ guiˬ teˇ peˆ peˆ hta‸ neˇ la peuˬ hehˉ teh‸, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw kanˉ te paˍ teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
44027028	Yawˇ hui iˉ kaˆ hta‸ tehˆ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, nyiˇ chi loˬ naˉ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ maw maw yawˇ hui teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ tehˆ nyi htaˇ, teˇ chi ngaˇ loˬ naˉ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44027029	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, haˉ pui hta‸ htinˍ heuˆ la puiˉ-aˆ teh‸ dawˇ haˍ ve pa taw, haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ mehˍ hpawˇ lo sho k'uˉ k'aweh awˍ lehˇ hpehˇ ya‸-e peuˬ leh, mvuhˇ haˆ haˆ htiˇ la tuˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44027030	Haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw kanˉ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh hpaw-e tuˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˉ k'oˍ hpawˇ lo sho k'uˉ k'aweh‸ hpehˇ ya‸-e ve hk'e te leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ehˉ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ ya‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ,
44027031	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ ma‸ poˍ leh ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ chehˇ taˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui ponˬ maˇ hpeh‸ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44027032	Oˇ htaˇ, ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ ehˉ ve aˉ caˆ hkeh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˆ cheˆ leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'aw shi peu ve yoˬ.
44027033	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la paˇ neˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˍ caˇ tuˬ Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ hui dawˇ haˍ dawˇ hkiˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo law chehˇ leh, caˇ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ caˇ ve, ya‸ nyi teˇ chi awˇ nyi gaˬ peuˬ.
44027034	Chi hta‸ pa taw, caˇ tuˬ caˇ-oˆ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hk'awˉ ve yoˬ. Chi lehˬ, nawˬ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ uˉ hkeh mvuh teˇ mvuh ka‸ maˇ g'a luˬ maˇ g'a sheˆ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44027035	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ peuˬ htaˇ, hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hk'aoˍ monˇ hk'eh‸ leh caˇ ve yoˬ.
44027036	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ ha lehˬ la leh caˇ tuˬ caˇ ve yoˬ.
44027037	Haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve hta‸ ciˇ taˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, 276 g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
44027038	Yawˇ hui hk'a bvuhˆ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, caˬ shiˍ caˬ hk'a hta‸ laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ lawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
44027039	Mvuhˇ htiˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, miˬ guiˬ oˇ ve teˇ peˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shehˇ shiˍ cawˬ ve g'uiˬ k'aweh‸ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, hpeh‸ ve k'o haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo g'a‸ k'ai tuˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44027040	Hk'e te leh, sho k'uˉ k'aweh‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'aw lo hpui baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ. Haw lo‸ k'oˍ g'a‸ tuˬ ve caˉ behˆ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh taˍ ve aˉ caˆ hkeh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ hpui sheˬ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˉ k'oˍ hpawˇ ve hpa peˆ lonˉ hta‸ mvuhˇ haw meuˆ tuˬ chiˇ taˆ-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, shehˇ shiˍ cawˬ ve g'uiˬ pfuhˍ lo g'a‸ k'ai ve yoˬ.
44027041	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, iˉ kaˆ maˇ naˉ kuiˬ lo miˬ pui diˬ hta‸ htinˍ heuˆ leh, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hkanˉ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˉ k'oˍ hpawˇ hkanˉ yeˬ jaˇ leh, a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ jiˆ. Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ mehˍ hpawˇ teˇ tawn hta‸ g'uiˬ baˇ g'aˇ hte‸ dawˆ leh paˆ-e ve yoˬ.
44027042	Hpeh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ iˉ kaˆ lawehˇ leh hpaw tawˆ-e puiˉ-aˆ teh‸ ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ haˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ jehˬ daˬ ve yoˬ.
44027043	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ma‸ poˍ lonˉ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ gaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui jehˬ da‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, iˉ kaˆ lawehˇ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ hk'aw pawˆ lo‸-e leh, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ lo lawehˇ tawˆ-e tuˬ, ma‸ poˍ lonˉ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44027044	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ suhˆ baˉ hta‸ ciˇ tuˬ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ciˇ tuˬ, yawˇ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a ponˬ leh, g'uiˬ pfuhˍ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44028001	Ngaˬ hui luˬ ve sheˆ ve hta‸ ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, conˇ oˇ ve Meˍleˍteˍ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
44028002	Conˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ jaˇ leh hk'a deh‸ ga laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ yeˬ laˬ leh kaˆ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui aˬ miˍ ceh leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
44028003	Oˇ htaˇ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, suhˆ k'aˉ ku-iˍ teˇ k'a‸ g'awˆ veu laˇ leh, aˬ miˍ hk'aw keu ve teˇ yanˇ, aˬ miˍ chiˆ ve pa taw vuiˬ haiˬ teˇ hkeh tawˆ la leh, Pawˇlu‸ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ hawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44028004	Oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Pawˇlu‸ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ vuiˬ haiˬ hawˆ leh yu taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na chaw hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'a ponˬ htawˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, yawˇ te‸ chehˇ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ piˇ teh‸ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
44028005	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, vuiˬ oˇ ve hta‸ aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo hpi keu leh, yawˇ awˬ to te‸ chiˉ maˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44028006	Yawˇ lehˬ awˬ to hpo‸ la tuˬ, maˇ heˆ k'o, teˇ cawˬ haˉ paˍ suh-e tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ leh law nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maw chaweh law nyi chehˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ te‸ chiˉ maˇ hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, yawˇ hui dawˇ hk'aˇ k'aw‸ pa leh, Chaw chi hpaˇ lehˬ, g'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
44028007	Chehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve awˬ paˇ lo, conˇ awˬ hoˉ Puˍbaˍliˆ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ leh, shehˆ nyi hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ caˍ laˇ taw laˇ ve yoˬ.
44028008	Oˇ htaˇ Puˍbaˍliˆ ve awˬ pa lehˬ, kaˆ naˬ leh g'oˇ peˬ awˬ nyi te ve pa taw zuh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ geh k'ai leh, bon lawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ leh, yawˇ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
44028009	Oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ la ve pa taw, conˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw naˬ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ laˬ leh, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ ka‸ gu na-e piˇ ve yoˬ.
44028010	Yawˇ hui htawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˇ maˇ yawˆ yan leh, ngaˬ hui haw lo‸ k'oˍ k'aw‸ ciˉ tawˆ-e ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui hk'a loˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ haw lo‸ k'oˍ hk'aw lo keu laˇ ve yoˬ.
44028011	Shehˆ ha pa gaˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ venˇ yaˇ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ teˇ maˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui k'aw‸ ciˇ tawˆ-e ve yoˬ. Haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ kaˆ yanˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ conˇ oˇ ve teˇ maˬ lo deh taˍ ve yoˬ. Haw lo‸ k'oˍ oˇ ve awˬ han lehˬ, yaˇ cehˬ k'a g'uiˬ sha ve awˬ han hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
44028012	Suˇraˍkuˆ venˇ lo gaˬ leh, oˇ kaˬ lo ngaˬ hui shehˆ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ.
44028013	Ngaˬ hui oˇ kaˬ lo k'aw‸ tawˆ k'ai leh, htawˇ k'aw‸ nawˬ k'aw‸ te k'ai leh, Reˍgiˍonˍ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ nyi, awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ ve mvuhˇ haw meuˆ la leh, nyiˇ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ htaˇ, ngaˬ hui Pawˇtaˍyawˇliˆ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44028014	Oˇ kaˬ lo ngaˬ hui awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mawˬ da‸ leh, yawˇ hui geh suhˍ nyi chehˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui chi hk'e te k'ai leh, Roˉma‸ venˇ lo gaˬ ve yoˬ.
44028015	Oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui laˬ chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, Aˍpiˆ tcuh teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ kaˬ leh, Saˉ laˆ shehˆ yehˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ kaˬ lo hk'a gaˬ laˬ leh, ngaˬ hui hta‸ ca ha‸ yuˬ la ve yoˬ. Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ g'a mawˬ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh nyi ma awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
44028016	Ngaˬ hui Roˉma‸ venˇ lo gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ shaw ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ geh hk'a geh yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ chehˇ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
44028017	Shehˆ nyi gaˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ oˇ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hpawnˬ la htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ puˬ awˬ pi hui ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ te ya‸ htawˇ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ngaˬ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh, Roˉma‸ chaw hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44028018	Roˉma‸ chaw hui ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na nyi peuˬ htaˇ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo suh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ maˇ mawˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
44028019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ tawˍ taˍ ve pa taw, Kehˉsaˍ suhˉ taˆ laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ g'a lawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ chi hk'e g'a te lawˬ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'oˆ ngaˬ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
44028020	Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui hta‸ mawˬ leh tawˇ g'a yaw da‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw sho caˆ chi hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44028021	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ lawn Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ lo laˬ ve li‸ hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ g'a jaw. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ awˬ lawn maˇ da‸ ve ca k'oˆ ca k'aoˍ la ve ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
44028022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, shu hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ k'ai ve chaw awˬ moˍ chi hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ chehˇ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ dawˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ k'oˆ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui kaˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44028023	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui awˬ nyi tinˍ da‸ ve yoˬ. Tinˍ da‸ taˍ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la htaˇ, Pawˇlu‸ chehˇ taˍ kuiˬ lo chaw maˇ maˇ hpawnˬ laˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ shawˉ te leh mvuhˇ hpeu‸ hk'a gaˬ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh, yawˇ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ la tuˬ Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ leh tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hui hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44028024	Yawˇ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ yonˍ la ve, ya‸ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ maˇ yonˍ.
44028025	Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ leh, tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui maˇ tawˆ k'ai sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ Pawˇlu‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Iˉsaˍyaˆ hta‸ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, cawˇ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ,
44028026	Chaw chi teˇ ceuˬ geh k'ai leh chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a kaˇ ve htawˇ, na maˇ g'a taˍ. Nawˬ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a mawˬ ve htawˇ, maˇ shiˍ taˍ.
44028027	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui mehˆ shiˍ maˇ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, naˍ paw maˇ g'a kaˇ tuˬ, nyi ma hk'aw lo maˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, nyi ma maˇ k'aw‸ pa leh ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a gu na-e tuˬ, chaw chi teˇ ceuˬ ve nyi ma heh leh, yawˇ hui ve naˍ paw maˇ na gaˇ leh, yawˇ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ me‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
44028028	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve chi, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ piˇ k'ai leh, yawˇ hui na tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ-o‸ teh‸, Pawˇlu‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
44028030	Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, yawˇ ngaˍ taˍ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nyiˇ hk'aw‸ chehˇ leh, yawˇ geh hk'a laˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
44028031	Yawˇ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ lawn bon maˍ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, a shu ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ tawˍ taˍ.
45001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ Pawˇlu‸ yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ te tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ laˇ peuˬ. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ peuˬ.
45001002	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh Li‸ hpu hk'aw lo bvuh‸ tcuh taˍ ve yoˬ.
45001003	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi lehˬ, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ k'o, Daˍviˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45001004	Yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸, kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇmawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yoˬ.
45001005	Yawˇ hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ ka‸, yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ te tuˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ peuˬ. Kanˉ chi ve lehˬ, chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yonˍ leh na yuˬ tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
45001006	Nawˬ hui htawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui hpeh‸ ve pa taw, chaw ceuˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lo‸-e taˍ ve yoˬ.
45001007	G'uiˬ sha ha‸ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve Roˉma‸ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
45001008	Awˉ lawˉ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo nawˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ lawn bvuhˬ k'ai ve hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
45001009	Nawˬ hui awˬ pon hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ pon ngaˬ ve nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ kanˉ te leh, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45001010	Ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ pa taw ya‸ k'aw teˇ caˆ caˆ tawˆ la leh nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ g'a gaˬ la tuˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ngaˬ lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45001011	Nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ mawˬ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. G'a mawˬ da‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ la tuˬ, Awˬ ha hpu ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ pehˬ laˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
45001012	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ yonˍ ve leh nawˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ da‸ tuˬ ve hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
45001013	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui geh ngaˬ awˬ shiˍ g'a taˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui geh htawˇ ngaˬ awˬ shiˍ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ ve, nawˬ hui geh laˬ tuˬ ngaˬ laiˉ pawˆ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve awˬ lawn nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ piˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ tawˍ taˍ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45001014	Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, chaw hteunˍ maˇ k'oˆ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ, chaw ceuˬ chi ma ve hta‸ ngaˬ shaiˍ piˇ tuˬ jeˬ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45001015	Hk'e te leh, puiˉ ve hpeh‸ ve hk'e nawˬ hui Roˉma‸ venˇ yaˇ hui hta‸ ka‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ gu taˍ peuˬ.
45001016	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ tuˬ ngaˬ maˇ ya‸ taw. Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'a yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui, hk'aw‸ nawˉ Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45001017	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ k'aw‸ yonˍ maˇ la tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45001018	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yonˍ leh maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo tawˆ la ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ tawˍ taˍ tsuhˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45001019	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ hpeh‸ ve hk'e, hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a shiˍ g'a mawˬ peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
45001020	Hk'aˬ hk'e le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, G'uiˬ sha hpanˍ taˍ te taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha awˬ lawn mehˆ mawˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ te taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, co co taiˍ taiˍ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ ka‸, yawˇ co co taiˍ taiˍ G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ka‸, yawˇ hui dawˇ shiˍ dawˇ mawˬ la ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, maˇ shiˍ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
45001021	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ ve ka‸, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh keunˍ ve hk'e maˇ chiˇ uiˍ maˇ chiˇ mvuh. Yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ htawˇ maˇ shiˍ maˇ nawˇ. Yawˇ hui ve dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ. Yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw maˇ dawˇ nyi puiˉ leh naˆ ho‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
45001022	A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸, Ngaˬ cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui chaw k'aˍ chaw buiˬ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
45001023	Maˇ luˬ maˇ suh puiˉ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ ha‸ yuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, luˬ puiˉ suh puiˉ ve chaw, ngaˆ, hkui sheh la‸ sheh awˍ lehˇ cawˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ, vuiˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ ve shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ yawˇ hui ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
45001024	Chi hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw cha‸ cha‸ chiˆ chiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te gaˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui te g'aˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ haiˬ te da‸ ve yoˬ.
45001025	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ lawn hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ ha‸ yuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui baˬ taˍ leh, te hpanˍ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon kanˉ te ve yoˬ. Te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ chiˇ mvuh cawˇ ve yoˬ. A menˬ.
45001026	Chi hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ hui haiˬ ve hta‸ te gaˇ jaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve hk'e te tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, yawˇ hui ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, te keunˍ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, te maˇ keunˍ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ te ve yoˬ.
45001027	Hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh yawˇ hui maˇ k'aw‸ zuh‸. Hawˉ hk'aˆ chawˇ hawˉ hk'aˆ peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh te da‸ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ taw tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ te da‸ leh, venˇ baˆ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
45001028	Yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ gaˇ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ. Hk'e te leh, maˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ la leh, maˇ keunˍ maˇ cawˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45001029	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve, haiˬ ve, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve, shu hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te gaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Shu hta‸ hkawehˉ puiˉ ve, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve, shu hta‸ ya‸ gaˇ puiˉ ve, shu hta‸ heˍ puiˉ ve, shu hta‸ nyi bawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45001030	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, shu hta‸ hk'awˇ deˇ ve chaw, shu hta‸ hk'aiˉ ve chaw, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ canˇ ve chaw, caˆ muiˬ puiˉ ve chaw, nyi ma uiˍ ve mvuh ve chaw, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh ve chaw, sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te puiˉ ve chaw leh, awˬ pa awˬ e hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45001031	Yawˇ hui lehˬ maˇ dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ, ka ti‸ maˇ yeˬ puiˉ, shu hta‸ ha‸ cawˇ ve hk'e maˇ ha‸ puiˉ leh, shu hta‸ maˇ ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45001032	Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a te ve chaw hui lehˬ, suh keunˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e shiˍ taˍ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ to te chehˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, oˇ hk'e te ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hui nyi ma cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
45002001	Hk'e te leh, shu hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve chaw-oˬ, nawˬ awˬ to ka‸ ca k'oˆ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, shu hta‸ nawˬ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ awˬ to ka‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh shu hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ka‸ venˇ baˆ k'aw‸ taˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45002002	Oˇ hk'e te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ciˍ yanˍ ve lehˬ, hteˇ jaˇ cawˇ jaˇ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45002003	Shu awˬ hk'oˆ nawˬ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hk'e nawˬ awˬ to ka‸ te chehˇ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ g'a ponˬ tuˬ teh‸ dawˇ ve laˇ.
45002004	G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve paw sha jaˇ ve awˬ bon te laˇ ve, yeunˇ hkanˍ ve leh, nyi ma dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te ve laˇ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon lehˬ, nawˬ venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ sheh k'ai laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
45002005	Nawˬ nyi ma heh leh venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ pon, yawˇ nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ shaw hpoˆ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, G'uiˬ sha hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ tawˇ jehˬ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
45002006	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ te ve kanˉ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45002007	Yeunˇ hkanˍ leh da‸ ve kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ, da‸ ve awˬ meh leh, maˇ luˬ maˇ sheˆ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ co ti‸ ha ti‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45002008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ leh, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ, hehnˇ jaˇ ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
45002009	Haiˬ ve hta‸ hk'a te ve chaw hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve leh dawˇ tui‸ gaˇ tui‸ ve gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui, hk'aw‸ nawˉ Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
45002010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve hta‸ hk'a te ve chaw hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui, hk'aw‸ nawˉ Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
45002011	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ chaw mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi.
45002012	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ leh venˇ baˆ hk'a te ve chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a luˬ g'a sheˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ leh venˇ baˆ hk'a te ve chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo tawˇ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
45002013	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw hui ceh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45002014	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve ka‸ yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui dawˇ shiˍ leh awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e te ve k'o, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e yoˬ.
45002015	Yawˇ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma htawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve, maˇ heˆ k'o venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45002016	Ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh, chaw yaˇ hui nyi ma hk'aw faˉ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˇ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
45002017	Nawˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw teh‸ k'oˆ leh, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ va leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ nyi ma uiˍ chaweh te ve yoˬ.
45002018	Nawˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a henˇ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ shiˍ ve chaw leh, da‸ jaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ fuiˍ puiˉ pehˬ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45002019	Nawˬ lehˬ mehˆ cuˉ ve chaw hui hta‸ sheh k'ai shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ awˬ g'euˆ ba piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ nawˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
45002020	Nawˬ lehˬ, maˇ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ sheh k'ai shehˍ hpaˇ te leh, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ te ve teh‸ nawˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ cawˬ ve teh‸ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45002021	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve ka‸, nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ maˇ maˍ leh laˇ. Shu ve mawˇ hta‸ taˇ hk'awˇ teh‸ nawˬ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve ka‸, nawˬ awˬ to shu ve mawˇ hta‸ hk'awˇ ve laˇ.
45002022	Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ taˇ te teh‸ nawˬ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve ka‸, nawˬ awˬ to haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve laˇ. Shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ nawˬ cha‸ naˬ chehˇ ve ka‸, shaˉ ho‸ yehˬ hk'aw cawˬ ve mawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hk'awˇ yuˬ ve laˇ.
45002023	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ g'aˇ va leh nyi ma uiˍ ve ka‸, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ k'aw‸ te ya‸ leh G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ te luˬ ve laˇ.
45002024	Awˬ lawn k'o, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45002025	Nawˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve k'o, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ya‸ ve k'o, nawˬ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve lehˬ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve hk'e k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
45002026	Hk'e te leh, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve ka‸, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
45002027	Bvuh‸ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ leh awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve awˬ liˇ nawˬ cawˬ ve ka‸, nawˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te ya‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve ka‸, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ laˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
45002028	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ ceh Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ heˆ. Awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ ceh awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ.
45002029	Awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ ve li‸ mehˆ biˇ la tuˬ ceh shoˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Co ha leh nyi ma awˬ hk'aw shoˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e ve chaw hta‸ chaw yaˇ maˇ chiˇ mvuh htawˇ G'uiˬ sha chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
45003001	Hk'e te leh Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, shu a‸ kehˉ awˬ bon hk'aˬ hk'e cawˬ leuˉ ve le. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le.
45003002	Teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ bon cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45003003	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ka ti‸ maˇ yeˬ htawˇ, aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le. Yawˇ hui ka ti‸ maˇ yeˬ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve ka ti‸ hta‸ te luˬ ve laˇ. Maˇ te luˬ taˬ.
45003004	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ heˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ hteˇ ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Nawˬ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ htaˇ, nawˬ g'aˇ tuˬ yoˬ. teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45003005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui ve maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ te tawˆ la piˇ ve k'o, k'oˆ kuiˬ hk'aˬ hk'e cawˬ le. G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ leh ciˍ yanˍ laˇ ve lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te laˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. (Tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ k'oˆ jaw ve hk'e ceh ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
45003006	Chi hk'e maˇ heˆ. Tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ cawˇ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te suhˉ jehˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
45003007	Ngaˬ heˍ ve hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ leuˉ leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ la piˇ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma te ngaˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ suhˉ taˆ chehˇ sheˍ le.
45003008	Da‸ ve tawˆ la tuˬ maˇ da‸ ve hta‸ te shaˍ teh‸, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui chi hk'e k'oˆ ve teh‸ yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hk'aiˉ chehˇ ve law. Oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve chaw hui ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
45003009	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ shu a‸ kehˉ da‸ ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ venˇ baˆ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hawˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'oˆ taˍ peuˬ.
45003010	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw maˇ cawˬ, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
45003011	Shiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ca ve chaw htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ
45003012	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ya‸ k'aw ya‸ k'ai peuˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Da‸ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve chaw maˇ cawˬ, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
45003013	Yawˇ hui ve hk'aw‸ hk'aw lehˬ, hpaw taˍ ve tuˍ hpfuh hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve ha tehˍ lehˬ, heˍ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve meuˇ guiˬ awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo vuiˬ haiˬ awˬ taw‸ ma cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45003014	Yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo hkeu ve hkawˇ leh, nyi ma naˬ ve hkawˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45003015	Shu ve awˬ suhˍ yuˬ sheˆ tuˬ yawˇ hui ve hkui sheh gehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
45003016	Yawˇ hui hk'a k'ai kuiˬ lo, shu awˬ pon luˬ tuˬ sheˆ tuˬ leh dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ tuˬ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45003017	Dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
45003018	Yawˇ hui hk'a nyi ve teˇ hpaˍ aw hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45003019	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ tawˇ teˇ hk'awˇ ka‸ k'aw‸ yaw tuˬ maˇ cawˬ leh, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
45003020	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45003021	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ. Awˬ lawn chi ve hta‸ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ teˇ hpaˍ leh tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ.
45003022	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yonˍ ve pa taw G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, peun da‸ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ.
45003023	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ venˇ baˆ te leh G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ maˇ mi taˬ.
45003024	Awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ piˇ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
45003025	Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ tanˇ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ leh, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ chaw yaˇ te ya‸ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ ciˍ yanˍ sheˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ te maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
45003026	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, chi beu‸ awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ yawˇ te ve yoˬ.
45003027	Hk'e te leh, nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ hk'aˬ lo cawˬ le. Nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ le. Kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw laˇ. Maˇ heˆ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
45003028	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ leh, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45003029	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Yawˇ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha htawˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Yoˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui ve G'uiˬ sha htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45003030	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui htawˇ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45003031	Hk'e te leh, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te luˬ ve laˇ. Maˇ te luˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ leuˉ leh yeˬ la tuˬ ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
45004001	Hk'e te leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ awˬ lawn hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ le.
45004002	Awˬ lawn k'o, kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
45004003	Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ ve le. Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45004004	Kanˉ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, g'aˇ hpfuhˇ g'a ve teˇ yanˇ, shu yawˇ hta‸ awˬ bon te piˇ ve teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shawˍ. Yawˇ g'a keunˍ ve pa taw g'a ve teh‸ shawˍ ve yoˬ.
45004005	Yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teh‸ shawˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Haiˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la piˇ lawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ yonˍ ve pa taw yoˬ.
45004006	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ kanˉ hta‸ maˇ nyi leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ Daˍviˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
