45004007	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ peuˬ leh, venˇ baˆ hta‸ beh taˍ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
45004008	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha venˇ baˆ maˇ taˍ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45004009	Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui ceh tiˉ awˬ bon chi hta‸ g'a ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui htawˇ g'a ve laˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Aˍbraˍhanˍ yonˍ ve pa taw G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45004010	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ teˇ yanˇ chi hk'e shawˍ taˍ piˇ ve le. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ peuˬ htaˇ laˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o, maˇ shoˍ sheˍ htaˇ laˇ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ maˇ heˆ. Maˇ shoˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45004011	Yawˇ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸, yawˇ yonˍ ve htaˬ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve hta‸ yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ tuˬ, yawˇ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve awˬ heˆ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve ka‸, yonˍ ve hta pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ la tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45004012	Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ pa htawˇ yawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Aˍbraˍhanˍ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ sheˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸, yawˇ yonˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hui htawˇ yonˍ leh yawˇ ve hkui ha awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a‸ k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45004013	Aˍbraˍhanˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ g'a tuˬ ve awˬ shinˉ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yoˬ teh‸ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ g'a taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui g'a ve maˇ heˆ. Yonˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui g'a ve yoˬ.
45004014	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ ve chaw hui awˬ shinˉ hta‸ g'a ve k'o, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ leh, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ oˇ ve ka‸ luˬ k'ai peuˬ.
45004015	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ te tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
45004016	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ awˬ shinˉ hta‸ g'a hpeh‸ leh, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha cuˇ leh awˬ shinˉ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ ve chaw hui ceh tiˉ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ g'a tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ yonˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hui htawˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
45004017	Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve awˬ lawn Li‸ hpu hk'aw lo chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Chaw ceuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ ve awˬ pa ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ leh, maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeh‸ la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˇ yonˍ leh, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ yawˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
45004018	Chaw ceuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ la tuˬ, dawˇ law kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ htawˇ, yawˇ yonˍ leh dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Nawˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ lehˬ, oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve pa taw yoˬ.
45004019	A sha‸ aˬ laˬ hk'e teˇ ha hk'aw‸ gaˬ leh, yawˇ awˬ to suh taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ leh, Saˍraˇ htawˇ yaˇ hu yaˇ leh ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ g'aˇ maˇ nuˇ k'ai.
45004020	G'uiˬ sha ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ nyi htaˇ, yawˇ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ yonˍ ve awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ la leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
45004021	Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e G'uiˬ sha te hpeh‸ ve hta‸ Aˍbraˍhanˍ yonˍ yeˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
45004022	Hk'e te leh yawˇ yonˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45004023	Yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e shawˍ taˍ ve teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ awˬ pon ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ.
45004024	Ngaˬ hui awˬ pon htawˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ shawˍ taˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45004025	Ngaˬ hui ve ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hkanˍ suh leh, ngaˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ ve yoˬ.
45005001	Ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ ve yoˬ.
45005002	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw awˬ bon chi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui g'a lo‸ la leh g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ law leh, ha lehˬ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45005003	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, ha lehˬ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ la ve yoˬ.
45005004	Yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve hta‸ pa taw da‸ ve hta‸ te puiˉ la ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve hta‸ te puiˉ ve pa taw ngaˬ hui dawˇ law puiˉ la ve hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45005005	Dawˇ law puiˉ ve hta‸ pa taw g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngeuˍ keu laˇ peuˬ.
45005006	Ngaˬ hui g'aˇ nuˇ jaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw haiˬ hui awˬ pon Hkri‸ hkanˍ suh ve yoˬ.
45005007	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw awˬ pon hkanˍ suh tuˬ ve chaw ca haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ pawˆ pawˆ chaw da‸ awˬ pon hkanˍ suh haˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ hehˉ.
45005008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ yaˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, Hkri‸ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon hkanˍ suh leh, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ha‸ ve hk'a tawˍ lehˆ maw laˇ ve yoˬ.
45005009	Hkri‸ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh ngaˬ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
45005010	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hkanˍ suh ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ la ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui chi hk'e yawˇ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ la peuˬ ve k'o, Yaˇ hpu te‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45005011	Chi ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ sheˍ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha lehˬ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ la peuˬ.
45005012	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo venˇ baˆ lo‸ la leh, venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw suh ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ la ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ venˇ baˆ te peuˬ ve pa taw, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
45005013	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ taˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo venˇ baˆ cawˬ taˍ peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, venˇ baˆ maˇ taˍ sheˍ.
45005014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Aˍdanˍ hta‸ tanˬ leh Moˉseˍ ve awˬ co-e hk'a gaˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ uˉ peunˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ te ya‸ ve lehˬ, Aˍdanˍ te ya‸ ve hta‸ maˇ shuˍ da‸ htawˇ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ uˉ peunˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Aˍdanˍ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45005015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, te ya‸ ve oˇ ve lehˬ hk'e leˇ piˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ maˇ shuˍ da‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ te ya‸ ve pa taw, chaw maˇ maˇ g'a suh ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon ka‸, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw hk'e leˇ piˇ ve awˬ bon ka‸, chaw maˇ ve awˬ pon leuˉ leh k'aw‸ maˇ la ve yoˬ.
45005016	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, chaw teˇ g'aˇ teˇ ya‸ ve hta‸ pa taw hpeh‸ la ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, hk'e leˇ piˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ maˇ shuˍ da‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ te ya‸ ve ka‸, suhˉ jehˬ leh ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, te ya‸ maˇ ve ka‸, hk'e leˇ piˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
45005017	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, chaw teˇ g'aˇ te ya‸ leh, te ya‸ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw suh ve teˇ ceuˬ uˉ peunˍ ve k'o, maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ ka‸, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ ka‸ g'a ve chaw hui lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw te‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo leuˉ leh g'a uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
45005018	Hk'e te leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ te ya‸ ve hta‸ pa taw, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve pa taw, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la leh, co ha g'a te‸ ve yoˬ.
45005019	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ na yuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, chaw maˇ maˇ venˇ baˆ yaˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ na yuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, chaw maˇ maˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
45005020	Ya‸ ve jiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ maˇ la tuˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lo‸ la ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ venˇ baˆ maˇ la ve teˇ kaˬ lo awˬ bon leuˉ leh k'aw‸ maˇ la ve yoˬ.
45005021	Chi hta‸ pa taw, venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, suh ve hta‸ cuˇ leh uˉ peunˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ cuˇ leh uˉ peunˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45006001	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le. Awˬ bon maˇ la tuˬ ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'aw‸ k'ai tuˬ sheˍ laˇ. Maˇ k'ai taˬ.
45006002	Ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ hpawˇ suh peuˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e te k'aw‸ te‸ chehˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
45006003	Ngaˬ hui Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ suh ve awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
45006004	Hk'e te leh, baˆtiˆsaˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui hkanˍ htaˇ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh suh leh tuˍ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ lehˬ, Awˬ pa ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ pa taw suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui htawˇ te‸ la leh chaw awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
45006005	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui yawˇ geh teˇ geh suh ve k'o, ngaˬ hui yawˇ geh teˇ geh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ.
45006006	Ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ ve awˬ ceˬ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ te leh, venˇ baˆ ve awˬ to luˬ k'ai tuˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ piˍ lehˬ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh peuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45006007	Suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ponˬ tawˆ la peuˬ.
45006008	Ngaˬ hui Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh suh ve k'o, yawˇ geh teˇ geh te‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve yoˬ.
45006009	Hkri‸ lehˬ, suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ ve pa taw, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ yawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ suh leh, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ uˉ peunˍ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45006010	Yawˇ hkanˍ suh ve lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hpawˇ teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ hkanˍ suh leh, yawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hpawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45006011	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui htawˇ venˇ baˆ hpawˇ suh peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha hpawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve teh‸ shawˍ taˍ-o‸.
45006012	Venˇ baˆ ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ, nawˬ hui suh puiˉ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ hta‸ taˇ uˉ peunˍ tcuh.
45006013	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haiˬ ve awˬ pon la‸ caˉ hk'e yehˇ tuˬ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ taˇ a‸ piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ ve chaw hui hpeh‸ ve pa taw, a shu yawˇ awˬ to G'uiˬ sha hta‸ a‸ piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ pon la‸ caˉ hk'e yehˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ a‸ piˇ-oˆ.
45006014	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ bon awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve pa taw, venˇ baˆ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
45006015	Hk'e te leh hk'aˬ hk'e le. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ maˇ k'aw‸ chehˇ leh awˬ bon awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ k'aw‸ te tuˬ laˇ. Maˇ heˆ taˬ.
45006016	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ te tuˬ nawˬ hui ve awˬ to yawˇ hta‸ a‸ piˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ nawˬ hui na yuˬ chehˇ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ te ve k'o, g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, na yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ te ve k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
45006017	Nawˬ hui lehˬ venˇ baˆ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ jaw htawˇ, nawˬ hui g'a henˇ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ na yuˬ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ.
45006018	Nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ponˬ tawˆ la peuˬ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
45006019	Nawˬ hui awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ceh dawˇ pawnˍ puiˉ ve pa taw, chaw yaˇ hui shiˍ hpeh‸ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, cha‸ chiˆ ve hta‸ te tuˬ leh, haiˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ haiˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ a‸ piˇ jaw ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ awˬ pon, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ te tuˬ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a‸ piˇ-oˆ.
45006020	Nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ maˇ hpeh‸.
45006021	Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui te ve pa taw, awˬ bon hk'aˬ hk'e g'a le. Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui awˬ pon ya‸ taw tuˬ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ leh meuˇ lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
45006022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ chi beu‸ nawˬ hui lehˬ, venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ponˬ tawˆ la peuˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve pa taw, naw hui da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Awˬ bon oˇ ve awˬ leh meuˇ lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45006023	Awˬ lawn k'o, venˇ baˆ te leh g'a ve awˬ hpfuhˇ lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'e leˇ pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ bon lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
45007001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ yawˇ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. (Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ paˍ hui hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
45007002	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ miˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ geh hpeh ka taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ awˬ hpawˇ suh peuˬ ve k'o, awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ awˬ miˇ ma g'a ponˬ peuˬ.
45007003	Chi hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ maˇ suh sheˍ htaˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ca heuˆ ve k'o, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te shehˍ ma teh‸ shu yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ suh peuˬ ve k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ponˬ peuˬ ve pa taw, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ca heuˆ ve htawˇ, yawˇ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te shehˍ ma maˇ heˆ.
45007004	Ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui Hkri‸ ve awˬ to geh teˇ geh suh peuˬ ve pa taw, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ caˉ da‸. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la hpeh‸ tuˬ, suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui heuˆ da‸ peuˬ.
45007005	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la tuˬ, venˇ baˆ te gaˇ ve nyi ma teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ te gaˇ ve nyi ma oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw nawˇ la ve yoˬ.
45007006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ponˬ peuˬ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui suh taˉ peuˬ ve pa taw, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui kanˉ te ve lehˬ, bvuh‸ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ piˍ awˬ hawˉ lo te ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve nyi ma awˬ suhˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
45007007	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ le. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ taˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, venˇ baˆ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ taˇ sheˉ lai teh‸ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ k'oˆ ve k'o, sheˉ lai ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ.
45007008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ venˇ baˆ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ g'a leh, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo sheˉ lai ve laiˉ ceuˬ te tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, venˇ baˆ lehˬ suh taˍ ve yoˬ.
45007009	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ gaˬ la htaˇ, venˇ baˆ te‸ la leh ngaˬ suh ve yoˬ.
45007010	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ ve teh‸ dawˇ ve ka‸, ngaˬ awˬ pon suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
45007011	Awˬ lawn k'o venˇ baˆ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ g'a leh, ngaˬ hta‸ heˍ laˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, oˇ ve hta‸ yehˇ leh ngaˬ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
45007012	Hk'e te leh, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ htawˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve leh, da‸ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
45007013	Hk'e te leh da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ suh tuˬ te laˇ ve laˇ. Chi hk'e maˇ heˆ taˬ. Venˇ baˆ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na venˇ baˆ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ, venˇ baˆ lehˬ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yehˇ leh ngaˬ hta‸ suh tuˬ te laˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, piˇ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, venˇ baˆ hk'aˬ ma haiˬ jaˇ ve hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
45007014	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, co ha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ leh, venˇ baˆ vuiˬ yuˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45007015	Ngaˬ te ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ ca dawˇ maˇ tawˆ. Ngaˬ te gaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ te leh, ngaˬ canˇ jaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ te ve yoˬ.
45007016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ te gaˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ te ve k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
45007017	Hk'e te leh maˇ da‸ ve oˇ ve hta‸ chi beu‸ ngaˬ awˬ to te ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve venˇ baˆ te ve yoˬ.
45007018	Ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ to chi awˬ hk'aw lo, da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve hta‸ te gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ htawˇ, da‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ te maˇ puiˉ.
45007019	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ da‸ ve hta‸ te gaˇ ve ka‸ maˇ te. Maˇ te gaˇ ve awˬ haiˬ hta‸ ngaˬ te ve yoˬ.
45007020	Ngaˬ maˇ te gaˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ te ve k'o, ngaˬ awˬ to oˇ ve hta‸ te ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve venˇ baˆ te ve yoˬ.
45007021	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ da‸ ve hta‸ te gaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ haiˬ teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ geh chehˇ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
45007022	Ngaˬ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo tiˉ k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve yoˬ.
45007023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ liˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ chi teˇ maˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve nyi ma dawˇ hk'aˇ hta‸ bawˆ da‸ chehˇ leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hpeh k'ai tuˬ ka‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45007024	Ngaˬ lehˬ hpeh‸ bawˬ jaˇ, dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ suh piˇ lawˬ puiˉ ve awˬ to chi awˬ hk'aw lo a shu ponˬ laˇ tuˬ le.
45007025	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ponˬ laˇ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ve nyi ma dawˇ hk'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ cawˇ ve hk'e te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ cawˇ ve hk'e te ve yoˬ.
45008001	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chi beu‸ ciˍ yanˍ tuˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ.
45008002	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo leh, suh ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ hpehˇ laˇ peuˬ.
45008003	Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ pa taw, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ leh te maˇ g'a ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha te taˍ peuˬ. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, venˇ baˆ awˬ pon tanˇ tuˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui awˬ to cawˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ to cawˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ciˍ yanˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45008004	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ k'ai leh, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ te ve yoˬ.
45008005	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ hta‸ dawˇ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45008006	Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve nyi ma lehˬ, suh ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ dawˇ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve nyi ma lehˬ, co ha te‸ ve leh dawˇ sha ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45008007	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve nyi ma lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ canˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, chehˇ maˇ hpeh‸ taˬ.
45008008	Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
45008009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ tehˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ ve Awˬ ha hpu maˇ chehˇ ve k'o, yawˇ Hkri‸ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸.
45008010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve k'o, awˬ to lehˬ venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw suh peuˬ ve htawˇ, co ha lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45008011	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui suh puiˉ ve awˬ to hta‸ htawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yawˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh yawˇ chi hk'e k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45008012	Hk'e te leh, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ geh jeˬ pfuhˇ taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
45008013	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh a sha‸ te‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh awˬ to te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ suh piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
45008014	G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu shiˍ k'ai sheh k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45008015	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ kawˆ tuˬ, awˬ ceˬ ve nyi ma hta‸ g'a ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui awˬ yaˇ ve nyi ma hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Aˍbaˆ a pa-oˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45008016	Ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma geh teˇ geh shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
45008017	Awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve k'o, awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ yawˇ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ hui g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh awˬ shinˉ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a caˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45008018	Chi beu‸ teˇ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ tehˆ nyi maˇ keunˍ ve teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
45008019	Hpanˍ taˍ te taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ, dawˇ law jaˇ leh law chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45008020	Awˬ lawn k'o, hpanˍ taˍ te taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ te maˇ g'a ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ chehˇ gaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh shehˍ hpaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ pa taw g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45008021	Hpanˍ taˍ te taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, luˬ ve sheˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ te ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ponˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ, yawˇ hui dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45008022	Chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ hpanˍ taˍ teˍtaˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, teˇ geh hk'anˇ chehˇ leh, teˇ geh tu‸ jaˇ hkanˍ jaˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45008023	Hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ ha hpu ve awˬ bon hta‸ awˉ lawˉ g'a peuˬ ve ngaˬ hui htawˇ, awˬ yaˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ la leh, awˬ to chi htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui law chehˇ htaˇ, nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hk'anˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45008024	Awˬ lawn k'o, dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Dawˇ law taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve k'o, k'aw‸ dawˇ law tuˬ maˇ loˍ. G'a mawˬ peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ a shu teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ dawˇ law tuˬ sheˍ le.
45008025	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui maˇ mawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve k'o, oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ leh law chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45008026	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve hta‸ Awˬ ha hpu ga laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui bon hk'aˬ hk'e te lawˬ cawˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ shiˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ hk'anˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui awˬ pon lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hk'anˇ ve lehˬ, tawˇ yaw maˇ tawˆ leh hk'anˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45008027	Nyi ma hta‸ ca nyi shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu ve dawˇ hk'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui awˬ pon Awˬ ha hpu lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
45008028	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'a ha‸ ve chaw hui awˬ pon, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ yawˇ te tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45008029	Awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ shiˍ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi maˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yaˇ uiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha te ve yoˬ.
45008030	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ fuiˍ teh taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ htawˇ, yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ htawˇ, yawˇ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45008031	Hk'e te leh, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le. G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hpawˇ chehˇ ve k'o, a shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˍ da‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
45008032	Yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ yawˇ maˇ ponˬ piˇ leh, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu geh teˇ geh hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
45008033	G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ a shu venˇ baˆ taˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la piˇ lawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha yoˬ.
45008034	Venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve teh‸ a shu suhˉ taˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Hkanˍ suh shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yoˬ. Yawˇ hkanˍ suh ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la leh, G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sha paˉ lo chehˇ taˍ leh, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon lawˬ hkawˉ chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
45008035	Hkri‸ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, a shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ yuˬ hpaˆ laˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve, dawˇ tui‸ gaˇ tui‸ ve, fawˉ ve mehˍ ve, meu‸ ve kaˆ ve, veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ cawˬ ve, kawˆ tuˬ ve, aˉ hte‸ aˉ htaw, chi teˇ hpaˍ laˇ.
45008036	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Nawˬ awˬ pon teˇ nyi tanˇ vanˇ ngaˬ hui tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ awˬ pon teh taˍ ve yawˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ shu shawˍ taˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45008037	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw, chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui leuˉ leh g'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ taˍ peuˬ.
45008038	Awˬ lawn k'o, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, chi beu‸ cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ cawˬ la tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ,
45008039	kanˇ paˆ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, naˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ yuˬ hpaˆ laˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ ngaˬ yonˍ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
45009001	Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ heˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
45009002	Ngaˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ jaˇ leh, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ngaˬ nyi ma haw haw chiˆ chiˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma htawˇ, ngaˬ geh teˇ geh awˬ lawn chi hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
45009003	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui awˬ pon, ngaˬ awˬ to Hkri‸ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh hkeu ve hta‸ hkanˍ gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45009004	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ la ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a ve maˇ k'oˆ, oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ liˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ka ti‸ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hui ve hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45009005	Awˬ puˍ lonˉ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ shawˍ k'o, Hkri‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui ve chaw ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ chehˇ leh, co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ bon uiˍ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. A menˬ.
45009006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ luˬ k'ai ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw awˬ tehˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
45009007	Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teh‸ k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Iˉcaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ nawˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ shawˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45009008	K'oˆ gaˇ ve lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui ceh tiˉ yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45009009	Awˬ lawn k'o, ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve, Nehˉ hk'aw‸ chi teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ k'aw‸ laˬ htaˇ, Saˍraˇ lehˬ yaˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45009010	Oˇ ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Reˍbehˆka‸ htawˇ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Iˉcaˆ hta‸ heuˆ leh yaˇ hu chehˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ maˇ paw la sheˍ.
45009011	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ da‸ ve kanˉ ka‸ maˇ da‸ ve kanˉ ka‸ maˇ g'a te sheˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha chaw yaˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve lehˬ, kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ g'a luˬ tuˬ, kuˬ yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ chaw hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu g'a shiˍ tuˬ, awˬ e hta‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve,
45009012	Awˬ viˉ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ceˬ g'a te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45009013	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Yaˍkoˆ hta‸ ngaˬ ha‸ leh Iˉsawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ canˇ ve yoˬ.
45009014	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le. G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ taˬ.
45009015	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ Moˉseˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Ngaˬ awˬ bon te piˇ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ awˬ bon te piˇ leh, ngaˬ ha k'aˉ piˇ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ ha k'aˉ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45009016	Heuˆ gaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw g'a ve maˇ heˆ. G'aˇ hte‸ te ve hta‸ pa taw g'a ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha awˬ bon te piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ g'a ve yoˬ.
45009017	Li‸ hpu hk'aw jawˇ mawˇ Hpaˍrawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve kanˇ paˆ hpeu‸ tawˆ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve awˬ meh bvuhˬ k'ai tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45009018	Hk'e te leh, awˬ bon te piˇ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ yawˇ te piˇ leh, nyi ma heh piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ yawˇ heh piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
45009019	Hk'e te leh, aˬ hto‸ ma te G'uiˬ sha venˇ baˆ k'aw‸ taˍ laˇ sheˍ le. Yawˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ a shu tawˍ taˍ g'a tuˬ le teh‸ nawˬ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45009020	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tawˇ k'aw‸ shaˬ ve chaw-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw le. Te taˍ ve mawˇ lehˬ, te shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸, Aˬ hto‸ ma te ngaˬ hta‸ chi hk'e te laˇ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ laˇ.
45009021	Mu‸ hk'u te shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, mu‸ hk'u te tuˬ ve je‸ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Je‸ teˇ diˬ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve awˬ pon yehˇ tuˬ ve mu‸ hk'u teˇ shiˍ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ pon yehˇ tuˬ ve mu‸ hk'u teˇ shiˍ hta‸ yawˇ te hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
45009022	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ maw piˇ tuˬ leh, yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ shiˍ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ awˬ pon gu taˍ ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve mu‸ hk'u teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ leh yeunˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le.
45009023	Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ tuˬ ve awˬ pon awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ gu taˍ ve, yawˇ ha k'aˉ ve mu‸ hk'u teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ hk'aˬ ma maˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le.
45009024	Yawˇ hk'a kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve ngaˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chi hk'e ve muˬ hk'u hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ kuˬ yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45009025	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Hawˇseˍ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ maˇ heˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, maˇ ha‸ ve yaˇ miˇ hta‸ ha‸ ve yaˇ miˇ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
45009026	Yawˇ hui hta‸, Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
45009027	Iˉsaˍyaˆ htawˇ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ awˬ lawn bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ ve shehˇ shiˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ ve htawˇ, chaw a ciˉ ceh tiˉ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
45009028	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ haˆ haˆ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45009029	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, Hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ maˇ teh taˉ laˇ ve k'o, Sawˉdonˍ venˇ hk'e ngaˬ hui hpeh‸ leh, Gawˇmawˇra‸ venˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45009030	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le. Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ ca ve htawˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ g'a peuˬ. Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yonˍ leh g'a ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
45009031	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ca ve htawˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te biˇ maˇ g'a.
45009032	Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, yonˍ ve hta‸ maˇ cuˇ leh kanˉ hta‸ ceh tiˉ cuˇ ve pa taw yoˬ.
45009033	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Nyi loˬ. Chaw yaˇ hkui htiˇ poˬ tuˬ ve haˉ pui leh, paiˍ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ Ziˉonˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ kawˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ maˇ g'a ya‸ taw, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu hkui htiˇ poˬ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui htawˇ hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ ve yoˬ.
45010001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ. Iˉsaˍ reˍlaˆ chaw hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ nyi ma cawˇ jaˇ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45010002	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui shiˍ leh te ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ.
45010003	G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ leh, a shu yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ yeˬ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ te ve pa taw, yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45010004	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ, Hkri‸ lehˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te leh piˇ ve yoˬ.
45010005	Moˉseˍ bvuh‸ taˍ ve lehˬ, Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45010006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yonˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo a shu taˆ-e tuˬ le. Naˉ jaˇ kuiˬ lo a shu ya‸-e tuˬ le teh‸ nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ dawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45010007	(Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ hta‸ ca shiˍ ya‸ la tuˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo a shu taˆ-e tuˬ le. Hkri‸ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ, naˉ jaˇ kuiˬ lo a shu ya‸-e tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.)
45010008	Hk'e te leh, yonˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ ve le. Tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ neˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, nawˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. (Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve yonˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.)
45010009	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ ve maw‸ k'aw hkanˍ yuˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo yonˍ ve k'o, nawˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
45010010	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ lehˬ nyi ma hk'aw yonˍ ve pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la leh, maw‸ k'aw hkanˍ yuˬ ve pa taw htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
45010011	Li‸ hpu hk'aw k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, maˇ g'a ya‸ taw teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45010012	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yuˇda‸ chaw leh Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw peun da‸ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ. Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ hk'a kuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ bon hk'a biˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45010013	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ hk'a kuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
45010014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te kuˬ tuˬ le. Yawˇ awˬ lawn maˇ g'a kaˇ jaw ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te yonˍ tuˬ le. Maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te g'a kaˇ tuˬ le.
45010015	Chaw hta‸ maˇ k'ai tcuh ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve hkui sheh lehˬ, hk'aˬ ma nyi sha jaˇ ve le teh‸ Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45010016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Iˉsaˍyaˆ k'oˆ ve, Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ a shu yonˍ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45010017	Hk'e te leh yonˍ ve lehˬ, g'a kaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ. G'a kaˇ ve htawˇ, Hkri‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ shu hto laˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
45010018	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hui maˇ g'a kaˇ leh laˇ. G'a kaˇ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve awˬ hkawˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai leh, yawˇ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ, gaˬ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
45010019	Teˇ pawˆ ngaˬ k'aw‸ na nyi ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui maˇ shiˍ leh laˇ. Moˉseˍ k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ miˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui hkawehˉ tuˬ ngaˬ te leh, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ ngaˬ te tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45010020	Iˉsaˍyaˆ htawˇ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ ca ve chaw hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn maˇ na nyi ve chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn shiˍ piˇ peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45010021	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui awˬ lawn yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Maˇ na yuˬ leh tawˇ k'aw‸ shaˬ puiˉ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ tuˬ, teˇ nyi tanˇ vanˇ ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh che law taˍ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45011001	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ na nyi ve, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ peuˬ laˇ. Maˇ baˬ taˉ taˬ. Ngaˬ htawˇ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hpeh‸ leh, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Beˍyaˍmenˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45011002	Awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha shiˍ taˍ ve, yawˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ baˬ taˉ ve maˇ heˆ. Eˇliˇya‸ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
45011003	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hta‸ yawˇ hui tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ tanˇ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ hui duˇ baˬ peuˬ. Ngaˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ taˉ leh, ngaˬ hta‸ ka‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui ca chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
45011004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve le. Baˍlaˆ shaˉ ho‸ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hkui tcuhˉ maˇ teh ve chaw suhˍ hinˉ g'aˇ ngaˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ teh taˍ sheˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
45011005	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chi beu‸ awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ, awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw a ciˉ cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
45011006	Awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw leuˆ yuˬ ve k'o, kanˉ te ve hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ caˉ da‸. Kanˉ te ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve k'o, awˬ bon oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ bon maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45011007	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e le. Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui ca ve hta‸ maˇ g'a. Leuˆ yuˬ ve chaw hui ceh tiˉ g'a leh, maˇ leuˆ yuˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, nyi ma heh k'ai ve yoˬ.
45011008	Li‸ hpu hk'aw k'oˆ ve hk'e, Ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ zuh‸ muiˉ jo ve nyi ma maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ mawˬ puiˉ ve mehˆ shiˍ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ kaˇ puiˉ ve naˍ paw maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45011009	Daˍviˆ htawˇ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hui ve hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon pehˍ htaw taˍ ve, va htaw taˍ ve, ce lo‸-e tuˬ paˆ te taˍ ve leh, yawˇ hui g'a hkanˍ cawˇ ve ciˍ yanˍ tuˬ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ.
45011010	Yawˇ hui mehˆ maˇ mawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ naˆ ho‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Yawˇ hui ve caw‸ htawˇ hk'aˬ htaˇ ka‸ k'aw‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ-o‸, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45011011	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ na nyi ve, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui lehˬ, paiˍ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ hkui htiˇ poˬ ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ taˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui ya‸ ve jiˆ ve hta‸ pa taw buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Chi lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hkawehˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45011012	Yawˇ hui ya‸ ve jiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ paw sha la piˇ lawˬ leh, yawˇ hui shonˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ paw sha la piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hk'a biˇ lo‸ la htaˇ, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh hk'aˬ ma k'aw‸ paw sha la piˇ lawˬ tuˬ ve le.
45011013	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ leh, kanˉ chi ve hta‸ ngaˬ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh ve yoˬ.
45011014	Ngaˬ kanˉ chi ve hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh ve lehˬ, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hkawehˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ la leh, yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ te ve yoˬ.
45011015	Awˬ lawn k'o, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hta‸ baˬ taˍ ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ la ve k'o, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hta‸ k'aw‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve hk'e hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
45011016	Awˉ lawˉ tanˇ piˇ ve hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ tcuhˇ teˇ diˬ ehˉ da‸ kehˬ ve k'o, hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ diˬ lonˉ hk'a peu-eˬ ka‸ da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ geu da‸ kehˬ ve k'o, awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ.
45011017	Awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˆ baˬ leh, nawˬ hui shaˍlonˍ awˬ hteunˍ ve awˬ k'aˉ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, shaˍlonˍ meuˇ cehˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui caˉ da‸ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ geh awˬ tcuhˇ hta‸ g'a caˇ ve k'o, tawˆ baˬ taˍ ve awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ nyi ma taˇ uiˍ.
45011018	Nawˬ hui nyi ma uiˍ ve k'o, chi hta‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ. Nawˬ awˬ geu hta‸ kanˬ chiˇ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ, awˬ geu nawˬ hta‸ kanˬ chiˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45011019	Ngaˬ awˬ cehˬ hta‸ g'a caˉ da‸ tuˬ, awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˆ baˬ peuˬ teh‸, nawˬ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Cawˇ ve yoˬ.
45011020	Yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw tawˆ baˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, nyi ma taˇ uiˍ. Kawˆ ve nyi ma cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
45011021	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ shaˍlonˍ meuˇ awˬ k'aˉ hta‸ maˇ teh taˍ piˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hta‸ htawˇ teh taˍ laˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
45011022	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh yawˇ hehnˇ chaweh te ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ. Paiˍ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hehnˇ chaweh te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ chehˇ taˍ ve k'o, nawˬ awˬ hk'oˆ yawˇ ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ maˇ chehˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hta‸ htawˇ tawˆ baˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45011023	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, maˇ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'aw‸ chehˇ tcuhˉ taˍ ve k'o, awˬ cehˬ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ caˉ da‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ caˉ da‸ piˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha te puiˉ ve yoˬ.
45011024	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ maˇ heˆ htawˇ, shaˍlonˍ cehˬ awˬ hteunˍ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ tawˆ yuˬ leh, shaˍlonˍ meuˇ cehˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ piˇ ve k'o, shaˍlonˍ meuˇ awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve shaˍlonˍ meuˇ cehˬ hta‸ leuˉ leh k'aw‸ caˉ da‸ piˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
45011025	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a cuˇ tuˬ, faˉ taˍ ve awˬ lawn chi nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lo‸ la maˇ biˇ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ nyi ma heh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45011026	Hk'e te leh, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui hk'a peu-eˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Ponˬ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Ziˉonˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh, Yaˍkoˆ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
45011027	Ngaˬ yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, chi ve lehˬ yawˇ hui geh ngaˬ te tuˬ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45011028	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve lehˬ, awˬ puˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ha‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45011029	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha hk'e leˇ piˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ yawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ yuˬ hk'aw‸. Yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hta‸ yawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ.
45011030	Nawˬ hui awˉ lawˉ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui maˇ na yuˬ ve pa taw yoˬ.
45011031	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui ha k'aˉ ve hta‸ g'a ve pa taw, yawˇ hui htawˇ ha k'aˉ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, chi beu‸ yawˇ hui maˇ na yuˬ ve yoˬ.
45011032	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ piˇ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo haw tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45011033	G'uiˬ sha ve uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ leh shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma lehˬ, hk'aˬ ma naˉ jaˇ ve le. G'uiˬ sha suhˉ taˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu ka‸ ca dawˇ maˇ gaˬ. Yawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a shu ka‸ ca maˇ mawˬ.
45011034	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve nyi ma hta‸ a shu shiˍ ve le. Yawˇ hta‸ a shu maˍ piˇ jehˬ piˇ jaw ve le.
45011035	G'uiˬ sha awˬ bon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ, a shu yawˇ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ awˬ bon te piˇ jaw ve le. Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le lehˬ,
45011036	yawˇ lo laˬ ve, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw cawˬ la ve leh, yawˇ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Co co taiˍ taiˍ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
45012001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha ha k'aˉ ve awˬ bon teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ naw hui hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve awˬ to lehˬ, te‸ chehˇ ve, da‸ kehˬ ve leh, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve tanˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ-oˆ. Chi lehˬ, nawˬ hui te keunˍ ve oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ liˇ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45012002	Chi miˬ guiˬ yaˇ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh taˇ k'ai. G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ jaˇ ve, nyi ma cawˇ jaˇ ve leh biˇ jaˇ ve a loˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ leh fuiˍ da‸ g'a tuˬ, nyi ma awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ pa leh, chaw awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ.
45012003	Ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ lawn dawˇ keunˍ dawˇ cawˇ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh taˇ dawˇ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ pehˬ piˇ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, dawˇ keunˍ dawˇ cawˇ ve hk'e ceh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ lawn dawˇ nyi-o.
45012004	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ hk'eun maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'eun oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, kanˉ te ve maˇ shuˍ da‸.
45012005	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui chaw maˇ ve htawˇ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ caˉ da‸ taˍ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45012006	Ngaˬ hui hta‸ awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ peun da‸ ve yoˬ. Bon maˍ paˍ te tuˬ ve awˬ bon g'a ve k'o, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve hk'e bon maˍ paˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ te-o.
45012007	Ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ te tuˬ ve awˬ bon g'a ve k'o, ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te-o. Maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ te ve chaw lehˬ, maˍ piˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te-o.
45012008	Shu hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te-o. Shu hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve chaw lehˬ, ha lehˬ ha k'a maˇ chaweh pehˬ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ hoˉ te ve chaw lehˬ, g'aˇ hte‸ coˇ caˇ leh te-o. Ha k'aˉ piˇ ve chaw lehˬ, ha lehˬ ha k'a te leh ha k'aˉ piˇ-oˆ.
45012009	Nawˬ hui ha‸ ve lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ cha‸ loˬ. Da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ-o‸.
45012010	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ha‸ da‸ ve hk'e teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸-o‸. A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˇ taˍ uiˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ shu hta‸ taˍ uiˍ piˇ-oˆ.
45012011	Coˇ caˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ taˇ nuˇ piˇ. Nyi ma pfuhˇ leh Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon kanˉ g'aˇ hte‸ te-o.
45012012	Dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yeunˇ hkanˍ chehˇ-oˆ. Hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ tcuhˉ taˍ-o‸.
45012013	Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ loˍ ve hk'e pehˬ piˇ ga piˇ-oˆ. Hkehˉ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ-oˆ.
45012014	Nawˬ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ na‸ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ taˇ hkeu piˇ. Na‸ piˇ ve ceh tiˉ te-o.
45012015	Ha lehˬ ve chaw hui geh teˇ geh ha lehˬ-o‸. Hawˬ ve chaw hui geh teˇ geh hawˬ-o‸.
45012016	Teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ nyi ma htaˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Uiˍ gaˇ mvuh gaˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ dawˇ. Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh awˬ chawˇ te-o. A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve teh‸ taˇ dawˇ.
45012017	Shu haiˬ ve te laˇ htawˇ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ awˬ haiˬ taˇ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ. Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ da‸ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ tiˉ te tuˬ dawˇ nyi taˍ-o‸.
45012018	Te hpeh‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui puiˉ ve hpeh‸ ve hk'e chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ te chehˇ-oˆ.
45012019	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ te ya‸ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui taˇ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ. G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ leh te hk'aw‸ tuˬ awˬ pon teh taˍ piˇ-oˆ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve, K'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve kanˉ yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45012020	Hk'e te leh nawˬ ve canˇ paˍ awˍ meu‸ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ caˍ piˇ-oˆ. Iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve k'o, taw piˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, yawˇ ya‸ taw jaˇ leh mehˆ hpfuhˇ haw tuˬ yoˬ.
45012021	Haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ taˇ g'aˇ piˇ lawˬ. Da‸ ve hta‸ cuˇ leh haiˬ ve hta‸ g'aˇ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
45013001	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha geh g'a ve maˇ heˆ k'o, uˉ peunˍ tuˬ kanˇ paˆ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ hui cawˬ taˍ ve kanˇ paˆ teˇ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
45013002	Hk'e te leh, uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpfuhˆ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha teh taˍ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Tawˍ taˍ ve chaw hui lehˬ, ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
45013003	Awˬ lawn k'o, da‸ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˆ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ. Haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˆ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ gaˇ laˇ. Da‸ ve hta‸ te-o. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
45013004	Nawˬ awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve k'o, kawˆ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ aˉ htaw hk'e leˇ pfuhˇ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ haiˬ hk'a te ve chaw hui hta‸ ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45013005	Hk'e te leh, uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma htawˇ, dawˇ sha hpeh‸ tuˬ hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ.
45013006	Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui a moˇ ka‸ keu piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh kanˉ chi ve hta‸ yawˇ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ te tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45013007	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ piˇ keunˍ piˇ cawˇ ve hk'e piˇ-oˆ. A moˇ shaw ve chaw hui hta‸ a moˇ keu piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ hkawnˍ shaw ve chaw hui hta‸ awˬ hkawnˍ keu piˇ-oˆ. Kawˆ keunˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ kawˆ-oˆ. Yawˆ yan keunˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˆ yan-o.
45013008	Jeˬ a ciˉ ka‸ taˇ pfuhˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸ ve jeˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pfuhˇ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te biˇ peuˬ.
45013009	Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ maˇ g'a te, chaw hta‸ maˇ g'a tiˇ pehˍ, shu ve mawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a hk'awˇ, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a sheˉ lai teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ chi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve teˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la ve yoˬ.
45013010	Ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ awˬ haiˬ maˇ te. Hk'e te leh, ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te biˇ ve yoˬ.
45013011	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, chi beu‸ awˬ yanˇ lehˬ nawˬ hui zuh‸ nawˇ la tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui awˉ lawˉ yonˍ gehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ a‸ kehˉ, chi beu‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ leuˉ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ neˇ la peuˬ.
45013012	Mvuhˇ hpeu‸ awˬ yanˇ peuˬ la paˇ neˇ leh, mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, naˆ ho‸ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'ehˆ baˬ taˉ leh, awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve la‸ caˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ veu‸ deh-a veuˬ.
45013013	Ha lehˬ tuˬ te ponˬ te leuˉ leh tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te leh te ponˬ te leuˉ ve, shu hta‸ ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ leh hkawehˉ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ te. Mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw htaˇ te keunˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui te-a veuˬ.
45013014	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ veu‸ deh-o. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai tuˬ te‸ chiˉ taˇ gu taˍ.
45014001	Yonˍ ve nyi ma awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, dawˇ hk'aˇ maˇ hawˍ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn yawˇ geh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ tuˬ awˬ pon ha‸ yuˬ ve taˇ te.
45014002	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ caˇ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ yonˍ ve nyi ma awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, g'awˇ hpa‸ mvuhˬ naweh hta‸ ceh tiˉ caˇ ve yoˬ.
45014003	Teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ caˇ ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ caˇ ve chaw hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ g'a te. Maˇ caˇ ve chaw htawˇ, caˇ ve chaw hta‸ venˇ baˆ maˇ g'a taˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ peuˬ.
45014004	Shu ve awˬ ceˬ awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve nawˬ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw le. Yawˇ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, g'a‸ k'oˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve awˬ jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, jawˇ mawˇ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, jawˇ mawˇ yawˇ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh tuˬ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45014005	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ nyi nyi hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ taˍ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yoˬ teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw hk'a deh‸ dawˇ cheˆ loˬ.
45014006	Awˬ nyi hta‸ taˍ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh taˍ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh caˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh caˇ ve yoˬ. Maˇ caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo caˇ tuˬ ce leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
45014007	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo a shu htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon te‸ chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ. A shu htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon suh ve maˇ heˆ.
45014008	Ngaˬ hui te‸ ve lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon te‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui suh ve htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon suh ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh te‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, suh ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45014009	Awˬ lawn k'o, suh peuˬ ve chaw hta‸ ka‸, te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hta‸ ka‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ, Hkri‸ hkanˍ suh leh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve yoˬ.
45014010	Nawˬ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve le. Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te ve le. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha ve suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ g'a gaˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
45014011	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ te‸ chehˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hkui tcuhˉ teh leh, maw‸ k'aw teˇ maˬ le le G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45014012	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha hta‸ g'a k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
45014013	Chi hta‸ pa taw, ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ venˇ baˆ taˇ k'aw‸ taˍ da‸. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ leh te ya‸ tuˬ ngaˬ maˇ te-o teh‸, nawˬ hui dawˇ cheˆ taˍ loˬ.
45014014	Hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ shiˍ leh yonˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ ve teh‸ yawˇ shawˍ ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45014015	Caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi g'a dawˇ haˍ ve k'o, nawˬ lehˬ ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ taˇ te luˬ piˇ. Yawˇ awˬ pon htawˇ Hkriˬ hkanˍ suh taˍ peuˬ.
45014016	Nawˬ awˬ pon da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ tuˬ taˇ cawˬ piˇ.
45014017	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve leh, ha lehˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45014018	Hkri‸ awˬ pon chi hk'e kanˉ te ve chaw hta‸ G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh leh, chaw yaˇ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
45014019	Hk'e te leh cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ tuˬ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ uiˍ la mvuh la tuˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ te k'ai-a veuˬ.
45014020	Caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ hta‸ taˇ te luˬ piˇ. Hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, caˇ ve hta‸ pa taw shu hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ ve k'o, caˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ te ya‸ ve yoˬ.
45014021	Shaˍ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ te ve htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve k'o, maˇ te cawˇ ve yoˬ.
45014022	Nawˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ to leh G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ceh tiˉ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A shu yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ venˇ baˆ maˇ taˍ ve pa taw, ha lehˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45014023	Yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ caˇ ve k'o, yonˍ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ leh caˇ ve pa taw, nyi ma hk'aw suhˉ taˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ peuˬ. Yonˍ ve hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ baˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45015001	Ngaˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ te leh, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw hui g'aˇ nuˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
45015002	Ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le, a shu yawˇ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ da‸ la uiˍ la tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ hui nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ te piˇ-a veuˬ.
45015003	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ htawˇ yawˇ awˬ to nyi ma cawˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ te. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Nawˬ hta‸ hk'aiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ, yawˇ hui hk'aiˉ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45015004	Awˬ lawn k'o, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ hk'a bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ pon bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ leh Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ sha ve hta‸ g'a ve pa taw, dawˇ law tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45015005	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ htaˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ tuˬ, yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ leh dawˇ sha piˇ puiˉ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
45015006	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ te leh, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh hkawˇ teˇ hkawˇ tiˉ chiˇ mvuh hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
45015007	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, Hkri‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸.
45015008	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ pon Hkri‸ lehˬ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e te leh, awˬ puˍ lonˉ hui hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ teˇ hpaˍ yeˬ la tuˬ leh,
45015009	yawˇ ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve hta‸ pa taw buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ, Hkri‸ lehˬ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Chi hta‸ pa taw, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh, nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45015010	Teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, yawˇ ve chaw hui geh teˇ geh ha lehˬ-o‸, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45015011	Teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ sheˍ ve, Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o. Chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh piˇ lawˬ-o‸, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
45015012	Iˉsaˍyaˆ htawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'oˆ ve, Yeˍsehˇ ve awˬ geu lo awˬ caˍ caˍ la tuˬ yoˬ. Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yawˇ tawˆ la leh, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ law kuiˬ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45015013	Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ pa taw, dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui biˇ la tuˬ, dawˇ law tuˬ cawˬ la piˇ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ dawˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ le le biˇ la piˇ-oˆ.
45015014	Ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui lehˬ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve chaw, shiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ biˇ ve chaw leh, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ maˍ da‸ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
45015015	Ngaˬ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve paw hkuˇ te tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh, li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
45015016	Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ tanˇ tuˬ hk'e G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tanˇ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
45015017	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45015018	Awˬ lawn k'o, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui na yuˬ tuˬ, tawˇ yaw leh kanˉ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ heˆ leh anˇ tuˬ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ ngaˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh te ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ lawn te‸ chiˉ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ ca k'oˆ.
45015019	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ te leh Iˇluˇriˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a gaˬ, hk'a caw zuhˇ Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ peuˬ.
45015020	Yehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hta‸ shu te taˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ k'aw‸ caˉ te tuˬ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ g'a kaˇ jaw sheˍ ve chehˇ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
45015021	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Yawˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ shu maˇ hto piˇ jaw htawˇ, yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ lawn maˇ g'a kaˇ jaw htawˇ, yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45015022	Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ maˇ g'a gaˬ la tuˬ laiˉ pawˆ ngaˬ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ laˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
45015023	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te kuiˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ leh, laiˉ hk'aw‸ nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ laˬ gaˇ jaˇ ve pa taw,
45015024	Saˍpenˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui geh ca guiˇ taˉ tuˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui geh teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ jaw awˬ chawˇ te da‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve lo nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ peu k'ai laˇ tuˬ htawˇ ngaˬ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45015025	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hta‸ ga piˇ tuˬ, chi beu‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo ngaˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
45015026	Awˬ lawn k'o, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ mawˇ jeˬ pehˬ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a ga piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
45015027	Yawˇ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a ga piˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ bon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, co ha hpawˇ Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve awˬ bon teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui htawˇ g'a ve k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ k'aw‸ ga piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
45015028	Hk'e te leh, kanˉ chi hta‸ ngaˬ te peuˬ leh, la‸ shawnˍ chi teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nawˬ hui geh te leh Saˍpenˍ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
45015029	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la htaˇ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45015030	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ ha hpu ve ha‸ da‸ pehnˇ da‸ ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
45015031	Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw hui la‸ hk'aw ngaˬ g'a ponˬ leh, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ chaw hui awˬ pon ngaˬ g'a te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Hkri‸ yaˇ hui nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ pon bon ga lawˬ laˆ mehˍ.
45015032	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ pa taw ha lehˬ ha k'a nawˬ hui geh g'a gaˬ la tuˬ leh, nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ k'aw‸ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ geh teˇ geh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ bon g'aˇ hte‸ ga lawˬ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
45015033	Dawˇ sha piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh chehˇ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
45016001	Keˍcheˍ venˇ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ga piˇ shehˍ ma hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ hui ve awˬ nyi ma Hpiˉbeˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh lo ngaˬ k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
45016002	Hkri‸ yaˇ hui te keunˍ ve hk'e, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nyi leh yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸. Yawˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ loˍ ve htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ ga piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ chaw laiˉ g'aˇ hta‸ ga piˇ peuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ ka‸ ga laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
45016003	Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve kanˉ ga te ve Piˇkiˇlaˆ leh Aˍkuˉlaˆ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016004	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ a sha‸ g'a ponˬ tuˬ ngaˬ awˬ pon hkanˍ suh taˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ceh tiˉ chiˇ mvuh ve maˇ heˆ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve yoˬ.
45016005	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ yaˇ awˉ lawˉ hpeh‸ la ve ngaˬ ha‸ ve Eˇpehˇnehˆ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016006	Nawˬ hui awˬ pon kanˉ g'aˇ hte‸ te ve Maˍriˆ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016007	Ngaˬ geh htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ jaw ve, ngaˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ Aˍdawˇniˆ leh Yuˇniˆ hta‸ ka‸, ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, tcuh yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh bvuhˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ Hkri‸ yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
45016008	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ha‸ ve Aˍpaˍliˆ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016009	Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh Hkri‸ ve kanˉ te ve Uˇraˍbaˍ leh ngaˬ ha‸ ve Saˍtaˍhkuˆ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016010	Hk'a deh‸ lawˇ nyi peuˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ Aˍpeˍleˍ hta‸ ka‸, Aˍriˇtawˇbuˆ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016011	Ngaˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve Heˍroˍdiˍoˍ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Naˍkiˍsuˆ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016012	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon kanˉ te chehˇ ve Taˍruˇhpehˇnaˆ leh Taˍruˇ hpawˇsaˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˉ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve ngaˬ ha‸ ve Peˍraˍsiˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016013	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve Ruˇhpuˆ leh ngaˬ ve awˬ e hk'a shuˍ shuˍ shawˍ taˍ ve, yawˇ ve awˬ e yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016014	Aˍsoˍkaˍreˆ, Hpaˍleˍgoˍ, Heˍraˍmeˍ, Paˇrawˇbaˆ, Heˍraˍmaˆ leh, yawˇ hui geh chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016015	Hpiˇlawˇluˆ, Yuˇliˆ, Neˍruˆ leh Neˍruˆ ve awˬ nyi ma Awˇloˍpaˆ leh, yawˇ hui geh chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
45016016	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo boˆ nu da‸ leh la‸ sheh caˉ da‸-o‸. Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
45016017	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a henˇ peuˬ ve maˍ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ hawˍ ve, hpaˆ da‸ tuˬ te puiˉ ve, shu ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi leh jaw k'ai-o teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
45016018	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Hkri‸ awˬ pon kanˉ te ve maˇ heˆ. A shu yawˇ ve g'oˇ peˬ awˬ pon ceh kanˉ te ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, na sha ve tawˇ leh chiˇ mvuh ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yehˇ leh, da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
45016019	Nawˬ hui na yuˬ puiˉ ve awˬ lawn lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a kaˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ha lehˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ shiˍ puiˉ leh, nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
45016020	Maˇ maw maw k'o, dawˇ sha piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve hkui taw k'aw awˬ hawˉ lo Saˍtanˍ hta‸ naˆ nehˆ sheˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
45016021	Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ Tiˆmoˉseˍ leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ Luˇkiˆ, Yaˍsonˍ leh Sawˇsiˇpaˍtaˆ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
45016022	Ngaˬ lehˬ, li‸ chi bvuh‸ shehˍ hpaˇ Teˍraˍtiˆ yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
45016023	Ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ yuˬ leh caˍ laˇ taw laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Gaˍyuˆ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Venˇ chi awˬ hk'aw hpu ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ Eˇraˍtuˆ leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Kawˍtuˆ htawˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
45016025	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ lawn ngaˬ bon maˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui hta‸ yeˬ la piˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve bon hkawˇ chi lehˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ chi lehˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ faˉ taˍ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la peuˬ.
45016026	Chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yonˍ leh na yuˬ tuˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ G'uiˬ sha tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, faˉ taˍ ve oˇ ve chi beu‸ tawˆ la peuˬ leh, tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve li‸ hta‸ pa taw faˉ taˍ ve oˇ ve hta‸ chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
45016027	Yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ cuˇ yiˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo co co taiˍ taiˍ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
46001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ Pawˇlu‸ yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, tcuh yaˇ te tuˬ yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
46001002	Nawˬ hui Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ ngaˬ leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Suˇtenˍ, li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ. Teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve chaw hui, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ hk'a kuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46001003	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
46001004	Nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a peuˬ.
46001005	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw, tawˇ yaw ve maˇ k'oˆ, shiˍ puiˉ ve maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui biˇ la peuˬ.
46001006	Hkri‸ awˬ lawn ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hk'e cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ peuˬ.
46001007	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ tawˆ la ve hta‸ law chehˇ htaˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ yawnˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
46001008	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ, awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ yeˬ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
46001009	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ka ti‸ yeˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ geh nawˬ hui awˬ chawˇ g'a te da‸ tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46001010	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui tawˇ yaw da‸ ve hawˍ da‸ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ moˍ shawˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ ve taˇ cawˬ piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ te leh, dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ hk'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
46001011	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ ve cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ Hkaˍlawˇiˆ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ.
46001012	Ngaˬ k'oˆ gaˇ ve lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ Pawˇlu‸ ve chaw yoˬ, Ngaˬ lehˬ Aˍpawˇlu‸ ve chaw yoˬ, Ngaˬ lehˬ Keˍhpaˆ ve chaw yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ ve chaw yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46001013	Hkri‸ lehˬ hpaˆ da‸ pehˬ da‸ taˍ ve leh laˇ. Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh ve leh laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, Pawˇlu‸ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve leh laˇ.
46001014	Kaˍliˇpuˆ leh Gaˍyuˆ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ maˇ piˇ ve pa taw ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve yoˬ.
46001015	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
46001016	(Saˍteˍhpanˍ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi awˬ hk'oˆ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw hta‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ dawˇ nawˇ.)
46001017	Awˬ lawn k'o, baˆtiˆsaˬ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon Hkri‸ ngaˬ hta‸ tcuh peu laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ tcuh peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ htaˇ, Hkri‸ ve la‸ ka kanˇ paˆ maˇ g'a yawnˇ k'ai tuˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ uiˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ yaw leh maˍ piˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
46001018	Awˬ lawn k'o, la‸ ka awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai chehˇ ve chaw hui awˬ pon cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, la‸ ka lehˬ ngaˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a chehˇ ve chaw hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46001019	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hui ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ ngaˬ te luˬ leh, shiˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui ve shiˍ puiˉ ve hta‸ ngaˬ tawˍ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46001020	Cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ hk'aˬ lo le. Li‸ bvuh‸ paˍ hk'aˬ lo le. Chi beu‸ awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ lawn laiˉ ceuˬ shiˍ leh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ paˍ hk'aˬ lo le. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46001021	Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Chi lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve cuˇ yiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ shu shawˍ ve ngaˬ hui maˍ piˇ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46001022	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ lawˬ leh, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui lehˬ, cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ.
46001023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ hui lehˬ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh ve Hkri‸ teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ lawn bon maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn chi lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ pon hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ tuˬ hpeh‸ leh, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46001024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon, Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ leh G'uiˬ sha ve cuˇ yiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46001025	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve g'aˇ uiˍ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
46001026	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ. Miˬ guiˬ hpawˇ hta‸ shawˍ k'o, kuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hui maˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve chaw hui ka‸ maˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hui htawˇ maˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
46001027	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ ya‸ taw piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ ya‸ taw piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ Guiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
46001028	Cawˬ taˍ hpeh‸ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te mehˉ tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ, shu shawˍ baˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ leh, te‸ chiˉ maˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
46001029	Chi hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ.
46001030	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui g'a chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui awˬ pon cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve, da‸ ve kehˬ ve leh, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpeh‸ la piˇ ve yoˬ.
46001031	Hk'e te leh, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Nyi ma uiˍ ve chaw lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ nyi ma uiˍ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46002001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh laˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ ca maˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ, na sha jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ yaw leh cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh ngaˬ ca maˍ la ve maˇ heˆ.
46002002	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ chehˇ htaˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ leh, yawˇ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46002003	Nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ chehˇ htaˇ, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ leh kawˆ jaˇ cheˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46002004	Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a yeˬ tuˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ tuˬ,
46002005	ngaˬ tawˇ yaw ve maˇ k'oˆ, bon maˍ laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, cuˇ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yehˇ leh beˬ yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ ha hpu chehˇ ve hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ leh, yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
46002006	Biˇ la peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui cuˇ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi miˬ guiˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Luˬ k'ai mehˉ k'ai tuˬ ve miˬ guiˬ jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ ka‸ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ.
46002007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ faˉ taˍ ve leh naˉ jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˍ ve yoˬ. Cuˇ yiˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon, miˬ guiˬ maˇ te hpanˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve cuˇ yiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46002008	Cuˇ yiˍ chi hta‸ chi miˬ guiˬ jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ. Yawˇ hui shiˍ ve hk'e k'o, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ ve Awˬ jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
46002009	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw hui awˬ pon yawˇ gu taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mehˆ shiˍ maˇ mawˬ jaw, naˍ paw maˇ kaˇ jaw leh, chaw yaˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw lo maˇ dawˇ shiˍ jaw ve yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46002010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ca nyi leh, G'uiˬ sha ve naˉ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ ca nyi ve yoˬ.
