46002011	Chaw yaˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve nyi ma maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw yaˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a shu shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu maˇ heˆ k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ a shu ka‸ shiˍ maˇ hpeh‸.
46002012	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ g'a taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve awˬ bon teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ ve yoˬ.
46002013	Awˬ bon oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ chaw yaˇ maˍ laˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh k'aw‸ maˍ piˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ ha hpu maˍ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ hui k'aw‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Co ha hpawˇ awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ htaˇ, co ha hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46002014	Co ha hpawˇ maˇ dawˇ pawnˍ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ pon cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Co ha hpawˇ ceh tiˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ g'a ve pa taw, yawˇ lehˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ puiˉ.
46002015	Co ha hpawˇ dawˇ pawnˍ ve chaw lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw oˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ maˇ g'a.
46002016	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ve nyi ma hta‸ a shu shiˍ ve le. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ Hkri‸ ve nyi ma cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46003001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, co ha hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ maˇ hpeh‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, miˬ guiˬ hpawˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ caˉ da‸ ve chaw leh, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ ehˉ hpeh‸ ve chaw hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve hk'e ceh ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46003002	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, heh ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ maˇ g'a ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ caˍ laˇ. Cuˉ g'uiˬ ceh tiˉ nawˬ hui hta‸ taw laˇ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ ka‸, nawˬ hui heh ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ maˇ g'a sheˍ.
46003003	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hkawehˉ da‸ leh, ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ chehˇ ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui te chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46003004	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ ve chaw yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Ngaˬ Aˍpawˇlu‸ ve chaw yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve ceh ceh, nawˬ hui miˬ guiˬ yaˇ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46003005	Aˍpawˇlu‸ lehˬ a shu le. Pawˇlu‸ htawˇ a shu le. Nawˬ hui g'a yonˍ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ kanˉ piˇ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ htawˇ a shu yawˇ ve kanˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46003006	Ngaˬ ti taˍ leh Aˍpawˇlu‸ iˉ kaˆ pfuhˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yeˬ la uiˍ la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha yoˬ.
46003007	Hk'e te leh, ti shehˍ hpaˇ leh iˉ kaˆ pfuhˍ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ uiˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Yeˬ la uiˍ la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha ceh tiˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
46003008	Ti shehˍ hpaˇ leh iˉ kaˆ pfuhˍ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, a shu yawˇ ve kanˉ te taˍ ve hk'e, teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
46003009	Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, teˇ geh G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve ti mi leh G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46003010	G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve yehˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ hk'e yehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hta‸ ngaˬ te taˍ peuˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ caˉ te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ hk'e k'aw‸ caˉ te ve hta‸ te shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ le le shaˍ ti‸ te cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46003011	Awˬ lawn k'o, teh taˍ peuˬ ve awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yoˬ. Hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ teh taˍ maˇ g'a.
46003012	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ shi, hpu, haˉ pui shehnˉ, suhˆ, zuhˇ, chi g'awˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ caˉ te ve k'o, teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ kanˉ te taˍ ve hk'e tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
46003013	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ nyi oˇ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ htaˇ, aˬ miˍ lehˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le ve kanˉ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le ve kanˉ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve kanˉ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ aˬ miˍ oˇ ve lawˇ nyi tuˬ yoˬ.
46003014	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ caˉ te ve kanˉ yeˬ chehˇ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
46003015	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ aˬ miˍ to‸ baˬ ve k'o, yawˇ ve awˬ bon lehˬ shonˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ awˬ to htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw g'a ponˬ ve hk'e hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
46003016	Nawˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
46003017	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ hta‸ te luˬ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ bon yehˬ oˇ ve hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46003018	Chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˇ heˍ. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ chi miˬ guiˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ ve k'o, yawˇ cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ la tuˬ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ.
46003019	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi miˬ guiˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ, yawˇ hui cuˇ yiˍ te chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ hpeh yuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46003020	Teˇ kaˬ k'aw‸ bvuh‸ taˍ sheˍ ve, Cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hui ve dawˇ hk'aˇ lehˬ, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46003021	Hk'e te leh, chaw yaˇ hta‸ g'aˇ va ve awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma taˇ uiˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui ve hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46003022	Pawˇlu‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Aˍpawˇlu‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Keˍhpaˆ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ maˇ k'oˆ, te‸ ve leh suh ve awˬ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chi beu‸ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve leh awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui ve hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46003023	Nawˬ hui Hkri‸ ve hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46004001	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui lehˬ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve naˉ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ shawˍ taˍ laˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46004002	Ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46004003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ laˇ ve lehˬ, i jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hk'aˇ ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ ka‸ suhˉ maˇ jehˬ.
46004004	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˬ to ya‸ kuiˬ cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ dawˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yoˬ.
46004005	Hk'e te leh, awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ lawn hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, suhˉ taˇ taˆ sheˍ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ gaˬ la htaˇ naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ yawˇ te leh, chaw yaˇ ve nyi ma dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hpeu‸ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, a shu yawˇ keunˍ ve hk'e chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ G'uiˬ sha chiˇ mvuh piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46004006	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ bvuh‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ leh Aˍpawˇlu‸ hta‸ nawˬ hui henˇ yuˬ jawˬ yuˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ tawˇ pa haˉ te maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh ceh tiˉ nawˬ hui te tuˬ leh, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ nawˬ hui maˇ g'a te tuˬ, ngaˬ chi hk'e te maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
46004007	Awˬ lawn k'o, shu hta‸ peun da‸ tuˬ a shu nawˬ hta‸ te laˇ ve le. G'uiˬ sha geh g'a taˍ ve maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ aˬ hto‸ ma cawˬ le. G'uiˬ sha geh g'a taˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha geh maˇ g'a ve hk'e te leh aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve le.
46004008	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, nawˬ hui nyi hk'aˇ suh peuˬ leˇ. Chi beu‸ lehˬ, nawˬ hui paw sha la peuˬ leˇ. Ngaˬ hui maˇ heˆ ka‸, nawˬ hui uˉ peunˍ g'a ve law leˇ. Nawˬ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na uˉ peunˍ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui htawˇ nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh g'a uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
46004009	Awˬ lawn k'o, tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ suhˉ taˆ peuˬ ve chaw hui hk'e, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ hui tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ leh meuˇ htaˇ maw piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon teh taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui leh chaw yaˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nyi guiˇ tuˬ awˬ pon ceh hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46004010	Ngaˬ hui Hkri‸ awˬ pon cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve ka‸, nawˬ hui lehˬ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve ka‸, nawˬ hui lehˬ awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve ka‸, ngaˬ hui lehˬ shu shawˍ baˬ taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46004011	Chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˍ meu‸ ve, iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve, maˇ g'a veu‸ maˇ g'a deh ve, dawˆ ve tiˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ ti maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46004012	Ngaˬ hui ve la‸ sheh kanˉ g'aˇ hte‸ g'a te caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ laˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ hui bon k'aw‸ na‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
46004013	Shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ laˇ htaˇ, k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ tuˬ ngaˬ hui lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ miˬ guiˬ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'e ngaˬ hui hpeh‸ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ shu shiˆ baˬ taˍ ve awˬ puiˍ taˆ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46004014	Nawˬ hui ya‸ taw tuˬ ngaˬ chi hk'e bvuh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ ha‸ ve yaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ shawˍ taˍ leh, shaˍ ti‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
46004015	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui saˍ la‸ awˬ meunˍ g'aˇ hk'e cawˬ htawˇ, awˬ pa laiˉ g'aˇ maˇ cawˬ. Ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo paw la piˇ peuˬ.
46004016	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ te ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui te tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
46004017	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ ve, ngaˬ ha‸ ve yaˇ Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve hk'e, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ te ve awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46004018	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh maˇ laˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ dawˇ leh nyi ma uiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46004019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ a loˍ cawˇ ve k'o, maˇ maw maw ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ gaˬ la htaˇ, ngaˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ ve lehˬ, nyi ma uiˍ ve mvuh ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ heˆ, yawˇ hui kanˇ paˆ cawˬ maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
46004020	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, tawˇ yaw ve hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Kanˇ paˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ.
46004021	Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e heuˆ gaˇ ve le. Ngaˬ lehˬ, suhˆ taˬ yuˬ leh g'a laˬ tuˬ ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, ha‸ pehnˇ ve leh nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a laˬ tuˬ ve laˇ.
46005001	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ chi teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, lawˇ kiˍ yaˇ hui geh ka‸ maˇ cawˬ jaw ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yawˇ awˬ pa ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ heuˆ peuˬ.
46005002	Chi hk'e te chehˇ ve ka‸ nawˬ hui nyi ma uiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui dawˇ haˍ cawˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Chi hk'e te ve chaw hta‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ k'oˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46005003	Ngaˬ awˬ to nawˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ htawˇ, ngaˬ ve nyi ma nawˬ hui geh cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ to nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve hk'e, chi hk'e te ve chaw hta‸ chi beu‸ ka‸ ngaˬ suhˉ taˆ peuˬ.
46005004	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui leh ngaˬ ve nyi ma teˇ geh hpawnˬ da‸ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ cuˇ leh chi hk'e te loˬ.
46005005	Te ya‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ te luˬ piˇ tuˬ, Saˍtanˍ la‸ hk'aw lo chiˇ a‸ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve co ha lehˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
46005006	Nawˬ hui chi hk'e nyi ma uiˍ ve lehˬ maˇ da‸. Diˇ a ciˉ ceh tiˉ hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ tcuhˇ teˇ diˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ciˇ la piˇ puiˉ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
46005007	Nawˬ hui diˇ maˇ cawˬ ve hkaoˍ monˇ awˬ suhˉ teˇ diˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ, diˇ awˬ piˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon tanˇ peuˬ ve Paˍsaˍhkaˍ yawˬ ehˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46005008	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui pawehˇ caˇ htaˇ, diˇ awˬ piˍ hta‸ taˇ yehˇ. Haiˬ ve leh cha‸ chiˆ ve diˇ hta‸ ka‸ taˇ yehˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, diˇ maˇ cawˬ ve hkaoˍ monˇ, da‸ kehˬ ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ caˇ-a veuˬ.
46005009	Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw hui geh awˬ chawˇ maˇ g'a te teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
46005010	Ngaˬ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui geh maˇ k'oˆ, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai leh hiˉ yuˬ lu yuˬ ve chaw hui geh maˇ k'oˆ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw hui geh maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ chawˇ maˇ g'a te teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Oˇ hk'e yoˬ k'o, nawˬ hui miˬ guiˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo g'a tawˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
46005011	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ bvuh‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ ve, tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve leh, shu mawˇ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ lu yuˬ ve chaw hui geh awˬ chawˇ maˇ g'a te ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, chi hk'e ve chaw geh awˍ ka‸ taˇ caˇ teh‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
46005012	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e caˉ da‸ ve le. Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ nawˬ hui suhˉ g'a jehˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46005013	Awˬ baˬ hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha suhˉ jehˬ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ k'oˬ loˬ.
46006001	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ tawˇ te da‸ tuˬ cawˬ htaˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui geh maˇ k'ai leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ laˇ tuˬ lawˇ kiˍ yaˇ hui geh k'ai ve laˇ.
46006002	Hkri‸ yaˇ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ g'a jehˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hta‸ suhˉ g'a jehˬ k'o, i jaˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui suhˉ jehˬ maˇ keunˍ leh laˇ.
46006003	Nyiˬ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ g'a jehˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Hk'e te leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo leuˉ leh suhˉ g'a jehˬ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46006004	Chi hk'e ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ shawˍ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ te tcuh tuˬ, nawˬ hui teh taˍ ve laˇ.
46006005	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui ya‸ taw tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ maˇ cawˇ da‸ ve awˬ kaˍ lo jehˬ cheˆ tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ leh laˇ.
46006006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ tawˇ te da‸ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ka‸ tawˇ te da‸ ve law leˇ.
46006007	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ tawˇ te da‸ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui awˬ pon co ha hpawˇ shonˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Shu te ya‸ laˇ ve hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui maˇ hkanˍ le. Shu nawˬ hui ve mawˇ heˍ caˇ laˇ ve hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui maˇ hkanˍ le.
46006008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui shu hta‸ te ya‸ leh heˍ caˇ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chi hk'e te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46006009	Maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e ve nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Nawˬ hui taˇ dawˇ ya‸. Guiˇ ya‸ ve chaw, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ puiˬ ve chaw, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw, hawˉ hk'aˆ chawˇ hawˉ hk'aˆ peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai ve chaw,
46006010	shu mawˇ hta‸ hk'awˇ ve chaw, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve chaw, tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve chaw, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ ve chaw leh, shu mawˇ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ lu yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e.
46006011	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ chi hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ jaw ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui tsuhˇ hk'a peuˬ leh da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh leh ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
46006012	Ngaˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ bon cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ ceˬ te tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
46006013	Caˇ tuˬ lehˬ, g'oˇ peˬ awˬ pon yoˬ. G'oˇ peˬ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, chi nyiˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ te luˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ to lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46006014	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ yehˇ leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46006015	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ to lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ yuˬ leh meh maˬ lanˉ ve awˬ hk'eun hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ taˬ.
46006016	Meh maˬ lanˉ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ geh awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46006017	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ geh co ha teˇ maˬ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46006018	Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve hta‸ jaw k'ai loˬ. Chaw yaˇ te ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu venˇ baˆ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ te ya‸ ve yoˬ.
46006019	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ to lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ve bon yehˬ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Yawˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ leh nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve awˬ to lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve mawˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
46006020	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha awˬ hpfuhˇ piˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ vuiˬ hk'aw‸ taˍ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
46007001	Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ bvuh‸ laˇ shaˍ. Hawˉ hk'aˆ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma maˇ heuˆ k'o da‸ ve yoˬ.
46007002	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ cawˬ maˇ ve pa taw, hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ g'aˇ le le awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ cawˇ leh, yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ le le htawˇ awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46007003	Awˬ hpawˇ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ hk'a deh‸ caˉ da‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ miˇ ma htawˇ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ caˉ da‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46007004	Awˬ miˇ ma lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ maˇ uˉ peunˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hpawˇ uˉ peunˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ hpawˇ htawˇ a shu yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ maˇ uˉ peunˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ miˇ ma uˉ peunˍ ve yoˬ.
46007005	Awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ teˇ geh zuh‸ tuˬ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ taˇ tawˍ taˍ. Bon hk'a deh‸ lawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nyiˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nyi ma cawˇ leh teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ yanˇ teˇ geh maˇ zuh‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ taˇ tawˍ taˍ. Awˬ to hta‸ maˇ g'aˇ puiˉ ve pa taw, Saˍtanˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a beˬ tuˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ geh k'aw‸ chehˇ-oˆ.
46007006	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, tawˇ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ, a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve teˇceuˬ yoˬ.
46007007	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ piˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha geh a shu yawˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ g'aˇ teˇ ceuˬ g'a taˍ ve yoˬ.
46007008	Awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ maˇ heuˆ sheˍ ve chaw leh mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ngaˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te chehˇ ve k'o da‸ ve yoˬ.
46007009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ maˇ g'aˇ ve k'o, heuˆ da‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ gaˇ leh nyi ma haw haw chiˆ chiˆ hpeh‸ ve a‸ kehˉ heuˆ da‸ ve lehˬ da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
46007010	Awˬ miˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a hpaˆ da‸ teh‸, heuˆ da‸ peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi lehˬ ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ heˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46007011	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hpaˆ da‸ peuˬ ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ hpawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ ca leh, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ chehˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ tuˬ te cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hpawˇ htawˇ, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ maˇ g'a baˬ.
46007012	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma Hkri‸ yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ geh chehˇ gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ baˬ cawˇ ve teh‸, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ chi ve hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ, ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
46007013	Awˬ miˇ ma htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ Hkri‸ yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma geh chehˇ gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ baˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46007014	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hpawˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ pa taw da‸ la kehˬ la ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ miˇ ma htawˇ, awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ pa taw da‸ la kehˬ la ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ hui ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ lehˬ, maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ lehˬ yawˇ hui da‸ kehˬ peuˬ.
46007015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ hpaˆ da‸ gaˇ ve k'o, hpaˆ da‸ piˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'e te hpaˆ da‸ gaˇ ve k'o, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ, hawˉ hk'aˆ maˇ k'oˆ, yaˇ miˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpeh ka taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ taˍ ve lehˬ, cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ tuˬ awˬ pon kuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46007016	Awˬ miˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ g'a tuˬ leh naˍ, maˇ g'a tuˬ leh naˍ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ hpeh‸ le. Awˬ hpawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ g'a tuˬ leh naˍ, maˇ g'a tuˬ leh naˍ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ hpeh‸ le.
46007017	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpeh‸ tcuh ve hk'e leh, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ taˍ ve hk'e ceh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le te k'ai sheˍ. Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ moˍ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ awˬ hk'aˇ chi hk'e te teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
46007018	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha kuˬ yuˬ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve hk'e taˇ k'aw‸ te. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ htaˇ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve taˇ te.
46007019	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te ve teˇ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46007020	Teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ kuˬ yuˬ htaˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ taˍ ve hk'e ceh, hpeh‸ chehˇ taˍ sheˍ.
46007021	Nawˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ htaˇ, nawˬ awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve laˇ. Chi ve hta‸ nawˬ taˇ dawˇ haˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ ceˬ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ ponˬ hpeh‸ ve hk'e k'o, nawˬ tawˆ k'ai cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46007022	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ chehˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve ponˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ponˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ chehˇ htaˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
46007023	G'uiˬ sha awˬ hpfuhˇ piˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ vuiˬ hk'aw‸ taˍ ve pa taw, chaw yaˇ ve awˬ ceˬ taˇ hpeh‸ la piˇ.
46007024	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ htaˇ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ taˍ ve hk'e, G'uiˬ sha geh teˇ geh oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
46007025	Yaˇ miˇ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh ngaˬ g'a taˍ ve tawˇ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ha k'aˉ laˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ka ti‸ yeˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hk'e, ngaˬ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ.
46007026	Hk'e te leh, chi beu‸ tu‸ hkanˍ jaˇ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la ve pa taw, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hk'e chehˇ taˍ ve k'o, da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
46007027	Nawˬ awˬ miˇ ma cawˬ laˇ. Cawˬ k'o, yawˇ hta‸ taˇ baˬ. Nawˬ awˬ miˇ ma maˇ cawˬ laˇ. Maˇ cawˬ k'o awˬ miˇ ma taˇ heuˆ.
46007028	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ awˬ miˇ ma heuˆ ve k'o, venˇ baˆ te ve maˇ heˆ. Yaˇ miˇ haˉ htawˇ, awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ ve k'o, venˇ baˆ te ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi hk'e te ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve chi ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ piˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
46007029	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ k'oˆ gaˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ yanˇ ngeh jaˇ peuˬ. Chi beu‸ hta‸ tanˬ leh, awˬ miˇ ma cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hk'e chehˇ-oˆ.
46007030	Paˆ hawˬ kehˇ hawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ hawˬ ve chaw hk'e chehˇ-oˆ. Ha lehˬ ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ ha lehˬ ve chaw hk'e chehˇ-oˆ. Mawˇ vuiˬ ve chaw lehˬ, mawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hk'e chehˇ-oˆ.
46007031	Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ ca ve chaw hk'e chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ lehˬ, pa k'ai mehˉ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46007032	Nawˬ hui maˇ g'a dawˇ haˍ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ miˇ ma maˇ cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˉ hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ nyi leh shaˍ ti‸ taˍ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
46007033	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ miˇ ma cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh awˬ miˇ ma nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ nyi leh dawˇ hkiˉ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, nyi ma nyiˇ hk'aˇ dawˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
46007034	Awˬ hpawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ leh yaˇ miˇ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh awˬ to hpawˇ leh co ha hpawˇ da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˉ hta‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ nyi leh shaˍ ti‸ taˍ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hpawˇ cawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh awˬ hpawˇ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ miˬ guiˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ nyi leh dawˇ hkiˉ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
46007035	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ tuˬ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ va htaw ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ, keunˍ ve cawˇ ve hk'e te leh, nyi ma htawˇ hpfuhˆ nawˬ hpfuhˆ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon kanˉ hk'a deh‸ te tuˬ, ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
46007036	Awˬ pa teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ miˇ, yaˇ miˇ haˉ te ve awˬ yanˇ ponˬ leh, awˬ hpawˇ maˇ heuˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ da‸ teh‸ dawˇ ve k'o, awˬ yaˇ miˇ awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ gaˇ ve hk'e heuˆ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Awˬ pa lehˬ, venˇ baˆ te ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ heuˆ da‸ tcuh-o.
46007037	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, a shu htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nyi ma yeˬ leh yawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ hta‸ awˬ hpawˇ maˇ heuˆ tcuh ka‸ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, yawˇ te gaˇ ve hk'e te hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hta‸ awˬ hpawˇ maˇ heuˆ tcuh tuˬ nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve k'o, yawˇ da‸ ve hta‸ te ve yoˬ.
46007038	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve yaˇ miˇ hta‸ awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ tcuh ve chaw lehˬ da‸ ve hta‸ te ve yoˬ. Maˇ heuˆ tcuh ve chaw htawˇ, leuˉ leh da‸ ve hta‸ te ve yoˬ.
46007039	Awˬ miˇ ma lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ maˇ suh ve ceh ceh, yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ geh hpeh ka taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ suh peuˬ k'o, yawˇ heuˆ gaˇ ve chaw hta‸ k'aw‸ heuˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ heuˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46007040	Ngaˬ dawˇ ve lehˬ, maˇ k'aw‸ heuˆ leh chehˇ hpeh‸ ve k'o, leuˉ leh yawˇ pon ha lehˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu cawˬ leh k'oˆ ve teh‸ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
46008001	Shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ peuˬ ve caˇ tuˬ awˬ lawn lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ lehˬ, nyi ma uiˍ tuˬ te puiˉ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
46008002	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ shiˍ ve teh‸ dawˇ ve k'o, shiˍ keunˍ shiˍ cawˇ ve hk'e yawˇ maˇ shiˍ sheˍ.
46008003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
46008004	Hk'e te leh, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ peuˬ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ ve awˬ lawn lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Shaˉ ho‸ lehˬ, chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ leh, G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu G'uiˬ sha maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
46008005	Awˬ lawn k'o, g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ leh jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, g'uiˬ sha teh‸ shu meh piˇ taˍ ve g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ htawˇ,
46008006	ngaˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la leh, ngaˬ hui htawˇ yawˇ awˬ pon hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui awˬ pon Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui htawˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46008007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ chi teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ cawˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ taˍ uiˍ chehˇ sheˍ ve pa taw, caˇ tuˬ oˇ ve shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ peuˬ ve teh‸ shawˍ leh caˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve pa taw, cha‸ chiˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
46008008	Caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha geh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui maˇ caˇ ve k'o, awˬ bon yawnˇ k'ai tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui caˇ ve k'o, awˬ bon leuˉ leh g'a tuˬ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ.
46008009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui te hpeh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ kuiˬ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ te-o.
46008010	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ lehˬ shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, shaˉ ho‸ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo mui caˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ mawˬ leh, yawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve k'o, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ peuˬ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ yawˇ caˇ tuˬ, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ la tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46008011	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ pa taw awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ luˬ k'ai peuˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi chi teˇ g'aˇ awˬ pon htawˇ, Hkri‸ hkanˍ suh peuˬ ve yoˬ.
46008012	Chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui hta‸ te ya‸ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui ve awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te piˇ ve pa taw, Hkri‸ hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui te ya‸ ve yoˬ.
46008013	Hk'e te leh, caˇ tuˬ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ ngaˬ te ya‸ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi maˇ g'a te ya‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ shaˍ maˇ k'aw‸ caˇ ve yoˬ.
46009001	Ngaˬ lehˬ ponˬ peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Tcuh yaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ te taˍ ve kanˉ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46009002	Shu awˬ pon ngaˬ tcuh yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ htawˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46009003	Ngaˬ hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46009004	Ngaˬ hui g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ laˇ.
46009005	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ teˇ hpaˍ leh, Keˍhpaˆ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ shiˍ toˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hui a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ laˇ.
46009006	Ngaˬ leh Baˍnaˍbaˆ ceh tiˉ la‸ sheh kanˉ maˇ g'a te tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ laˇ.
46009007	A shu yawˇ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ leh ma‸ yaˇ te ve chaw, a shu teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ le. Hko te leh iˉ shiˍ maˇ shaˉ caˇ ve, a shu teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ le. Ceˇ caˬ awˬ moˍ hta‸ hawˉ leh cuˉ g'uiˬ maˇ dawˬ ve, a shu teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ le.
46009008	Chaw yaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ k'oˆ ve laˇ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ htawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46009009	Awˬ lawn k'o, Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Caˬ naˆ chehˇ ve nuˇ hta‸ maw‸ k'aw maˇ g'a hoˆ taˍ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nuˇ awˬ pon dawˇ nyi ve laˇ. Ngaˬ hui awˬ pon yawˇ dawˇ nyi leh k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46009010	Yoˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ti mi mehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo mehˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Caˬ jaw‸ ve chaw htawˇ, caˬ shiˍ g'a tuˬ dawˇ law leh jaw‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46009011	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo co ha hpawˇ ve awˬ yawˇ sheˍ peuˬ leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ve awˬ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a g'eu‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui te ya‸ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ ve laˇ.
46009012	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw nawˬ hui geh awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ve awˬ shiˍ hta‸ g'eu‸ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui leuˉ leh a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ htawˇ maˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a tawˍ taˍ tuˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
46009013	Bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te ve chaw hui lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ g'a caˇ leh, tanˇ kuiˬ lo kanˉ te ve chaw hui lehˬ, tanˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a pehˬ caˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ.
46009014	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw g'a caˇ g'a dawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46009015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ lehˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ te. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ chi hk'e te laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ chi hta‸ te luˬ te mehˉ laˇ ve a‸ kehˉ, ngaˬ suh k'o da‸ ve yoˬ.
46009016	Ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ pon nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˇ maˍ k'o, chehˇ maˇ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ awˬ pon dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46009017	Hpu maˇ caˇ leh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ te gaˇ leh te ve k'o, awˬ bon g'a ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ maˇ te gaˇ ve ka‸ ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ taˍ laˇ ve kanˉ cawˬ leh g'a te ve yoˬ.
46009018	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ awˬ bon g'a ve lehˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve le. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, hpu caˇ tuˬ a hkawn-anˬ cawˬ ve ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ caˇ leh, na shehˍ hpaˇ hui te‸ chiˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ peuˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ awˬ bon g'a ve yoˬ.
46009019	Ngaˬ lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ceˬ ka‸ maˇ hpeh‸ htawˇ, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ maˍ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ ceˬ ngaˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
46009020	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ maˍ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ pon Yuˇda‸ chaw hk'e ngaˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ to awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ chehˇ htawˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˍ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'e ngaˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
46009021	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˍ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hk'e ngaˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ngaˬ awˬ pon awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Hkri‸ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46009022	Awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˍ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e te leh chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ teˇ ceuˬ le le hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
46009023	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ ngaˬ htawˇ shu geh teˇ geh g'a tuˬ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ pon chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ te ve yoˬ.
46009024	G'uiˇ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, g'uiˇ da‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ g'uiˇ ve htawˇ, teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ la‸ shawnˍ g'a ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ g'uiˇ-oˆ.
46009025	G'uiˇ da‸ ve pawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo g'uiˇ da‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ o‸ yuˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, luˬ puiˉ sheˆ puiˉ ve uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ maˇ luˬ maˇ sheˆ puiˉ ve uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
46009026	Hk'e te leh, htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ te leh ngaˬ g'uiˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Chu-iˬ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, hk'e leˇ mvuhˇ haw hta‸ ceh ngaˬ chu-iˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
46009027	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ shu hta‸ bon maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ awˬ to shawˍ baˬ taˍ ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ to hta‸ chu-iˬ leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ to hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
46010001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e shiˍ piˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, moˬ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ hpanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
46010002	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, moˬ leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Moˉseˍ geh baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ.
46010003	Yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ co ha ve caˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ caˇ leh,
46010004	yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ co ha ve dawˬ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ dawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, co ha ve haˉ hpawˇ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, haˉ hpawˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve iˉ kaˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a dawˬ ve yoˬ.
46010005	Haˉ hpawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui maˇ-awˍ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ maˇ suh. Yawˇ hui heh puiˉ hk'aw lo g'a luˬ g'a sheˆ ve yoˬ.
46010006	Yawˇ hui haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve hk'e ngaˬ hui maˇ g'a sheˉ lai tuˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon shaˍ ti‸ g'a tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46010007	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, caˇ ve dawˬ ve awˬ pon mui leh, leˍ guiˇ tuˬ awˬ pon tu la ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46010008	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui oˇ hk'e maˇ g'a te. Yawˇ hui oˇ hk'e te ve pa taw, teˇ nyi tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw nyiˇ meunˍ shehˆ hinˉ g'aˇ paˍ suh-e ve yoˬ.
46010009	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui oˇ hk'e maˇ g'a te. Yawˇ hui oˇ hk'e te ve pa taw, vuiˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ te luˬ te sheˆ ve yoˬ.
46010010	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hk'anˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo beu ve deˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui oˇ hk'e maˇ g'a te. Yawˇ hui oˇ hk'e te ve pa taw, te luˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo g'a luˬ g'a sheˆ ve yoˬ.
46010011	Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shu shaˍ ti‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw hpeh‸ la leh, awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon Li‸ hpu hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46010012	Hk'e te leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, Ngaˬ yeˬ lehˍ huˉ chehˇ ve teh‸ dawˇ ve k'o, yawˇ maˇ g'a paiˍ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46010013	Chaw yaˇ hui g'a hpuˇ jaw ve beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ ceh tiˉ nawˬ hui g'a hpuˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha htawˇ, ka ti‸ yeˬ leh, nawˬ hui hkanˍ maˇ g'a ve beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ g'a hpuˇ tuˬ, yawˇ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ hpuˇ htaˇ, nawˬ hui hkanˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ponˬ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ yawˇ gu taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
46010014	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ jaw k'ai loˬ.
46010015	Dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve cawˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ nyi-o.
46010016	Ngaˬ hui chiˇ mvuh ve awˬ bon uiˍ ve kawˆ lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui teˇ geh caˉ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ngaˬ hui hk'eh‸ ve hkaoˍ monˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui teˇ geh caˉ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46010017	Hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ diˬ tiˉ cawˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui maˇ ve htawˇ, teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ diˬ hta‸ tiˉ hpawnˬ caˇ ve yoˬ.
46010018	Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui te ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ. Tanˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ caˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, tanˇ kuiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46010019	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ gaˇ ve le. Shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ peuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le. Shaˉ ho‸ ka‸, aˬ hto‸ ma k'oˆ tuˬ cawˬ le.
46010020	K'oˆ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ. Lawˇ kiˍ yaˇ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve tanˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tanˇ ve maˇ heˆ, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tanˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ tuˬ ngaˬ maˇ heuˆ gaˇ.
46010021	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kawˆ leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve kawˆ, teˇ maˬ hta‸ dawˬ ve k'o, teˇ maˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve hpui lawˇ leh neˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve hpui lawˇ, teˇ maˬ lo mui caˇ ve k'o teˇ maˬ lo nawˬ hui mui caˇ maˇ hpeh‸.
46010022	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ ngaˬ hui te tuˬ laˇ. Ngaˬ hui yawˇ a‸ kehˉ awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve laˇ.
46010023	Ngaˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ bon cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ ve uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ puiˉ ve maˇ heˆ,
46010024	Hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon awˬ bon g'a tuˬ taˇ ca. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu awˬ pon awˬ bon g'a tuˬ ca-o.
46010025	Tcuh hk'aw hk'a hawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˇ-oˆ. Shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ pa taw, te‸ chiˉ taˇ na nyi.
46010026	Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46010027	Maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ leh nawˬ hui k'ai gaˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hk'a teh laˇ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ-oˆ. Shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ pa taw, te‸ chiˉ taˇ na nyi.
46010028	Ya‸ hk'aˇ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, Chi lehˬ shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ peuˬ ve caˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hta‸ hto laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, taˇ caˇ loˬ.
46010029	Shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ nawˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Shu ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ te hpeh‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw shu ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma tawˍ taˍ laˇ ve le.
46010030	Awˬ bon hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh ngaˬ caˇ ve k'o, bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh caˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw shu ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ laˇ ve le.
46010031	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, dawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la tuˬ te-o.
46010032	Chaw maˇ maˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ to awˬ pon awˬ bon hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ ca leh, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hk'a peu-eˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ngaˬ ca ve yoˬ.
46010033	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui htawˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ tuˬ taˇ te.
46011001	Hkri‸ te ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ te ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ te ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te-o.
46011002	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ maˍ laˇ ve hk'e nawˬ hui na yuˬ leh te k'ai ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
46011003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e shiˍ tcuh gaˇ ve yoˬ. Hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ g'aˇ le le ve oˉ k'oˍ lehˬ Hkri‸ yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ lehˬ hawˉ hk'aˆ yoˬ. Hkri‸ ve oˉ k'oˍ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha yoˬ.
46011004	Hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, bon lawˬ htaˇ maˇ k'oˆ, bon maˍ htaˇ maˇ k'oˆ, oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ beh ve k'o, a shu yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ te luˬ ve yoˬ.
46011005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ bon lawˬ htaˇ maˇ k'oˆ, bon maˍ htaˇ maˇ k'oˆ, oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ maˇ beh ve k'o, a shu yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ te luˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ maˇ beh ve k'o, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ chiˇ baˬ taˍ ve hk'e yoˬ.
46011006	Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ miˇ lehˬ oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ maˇ beh ve k'o, uˉ hkeh mvuh nuˆ baˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, uˉ hkeh mvuh nuˆ baˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, oˉ k'oˍ chiˇ baˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, yaˇ miˇ awˬ pon ya‸ taw tuˬ hpeh‸ ve k'o, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ beh taˍ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
46011007	Hawˉ hk'aˆ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ beh maˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ lehˬ, hawˉ hk'aˆ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46011008	Awˬ lawn k'o, hawˉ hk'aˆ hta‸ yaˇ miˇ lo yuˬ te taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Yaˇ miˇ hta‸ hawˉ hk'aˆ lo yuˬ te taˍ ve yoˬ.
46011009	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, hawˉ hk'aˆ lehˬ yaˇ miˇ awˬ pon hpanˍ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Yaˇ miˇ lehˬ hawˉ hk'aˆ awˬ pon hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46011010	Hk'e te leh mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ pa taw, yaˇ miˇ lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ beh taˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46011011	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ miˇ lehˬ hawˉ hk'aˆ hta‸ loˍ leh, hawˉ hk'aˆ htawˇ yaˇ miˇ hta‸ loˍ ve yoˬ.
46011012	Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ miˇ lehˬ hawˉ hk'aˆ lo hpeh‸ la ve hk'e, hawˉ hk'aˆ htawˇ yaˇ miˇ awˬ hk'aw lo paw la ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha lo hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
46011013	Yaˇ miˇ lehˬ, oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ maˇ beh leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ bon lawˬ keunˍ maˇ keunˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui dawˇ nyi-o.
46011014	Hawˉ hk'aˆ lehˬ, uˉ hkeh mvuh hu ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ pon ya‸ taw tuˬ hpeh‸ ve teh‸, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ve awˬ liˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46011015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yaˇ miˇ lehˬ uˉ hkeh mvuh hu ve k'o, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve uˉ hkeh mvuh lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ beh tuˬ awˬ pon piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46011016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ gaˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ liˇ maˇ cawˬ.
46011017	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui hpawnˬ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, leuˉ leh da‸ la tuˬ awˬ pon hpawnˬ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Leuˉ leh luˬ k'ai tuˬ awˬ pon hpawnˬ da‸ ve pa taw, tawˇ piˇ laˇ tuˬ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve maˇ heˆ.
46011018	Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hpawnˬ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui awˬ moˍ shawˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ kaˇ ve hk'e cawˇ ve yoˬ hehˉ teh‸ ngaˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
46011019	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ, awˬ moˍ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ g'a cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46011020	Nawˬ hui hpawnˬ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve pawehˇ hta‸ caˇ tuˬ awˬ pon hpawnˬ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
46011021	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ, a shu yawˇ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ a shu yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ awˉ lawˉ caˇ sheˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, teˇ g'aˇ k'o awˍ meu‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ k'o a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve yoˬ.
46011022	Hk'aˬ hk'e le. Nawˬ hui caˇ kuiˬ dawˬ kuiˬ awˬ pon a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ maˇ cawˬ leh laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te leh, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ ya‸ taw piˇ lawˬ ve laˇ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a k'oˆ tuˬ ve le. Chi hk'e te ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ ve laˇ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ mvuh laˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
46011023	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ maˍ laˇ peuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh g'a taˍ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, shu yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve teˇ haˉ htaˇ, hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ yuˬ leh,
46011024	awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ hk'eh‸ leh k'oˆ ve, Chi lehˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ ve awˬ to hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ chi hta‸ te-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
46011025	Yawˇ hui mvuhˇ haˉ awˍ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ kawˆ hta‸ yuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Kawˆ chi lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui dawˬ ve teˇ pawˆ le le ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ te-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46011026	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui hkaoˍ monˇ chi hta‸ caˇ leh, kawˆ chi hta‸ dawˬ ve teˇ pawˆ le le, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ ya‸ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46011027	Hk'e te leh, chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ keunˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ caˇ leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kawˆ hta‸ dawˬ ve k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to leh awˬ suhˍ hta‸ yawˇ te ya‸ ve yoˬ.
46011028	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ lawˇ nyi peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hkaoˍ monˇ hta‸ caˇ leh kawˆ hta‸ dawˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46011029	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ maˇ pehˬ maˇ fuiˍ g'a leh caˇ ve dawˬ ve k'o, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ hk'oˆ ciˍ yanˍ ve gaˬ la tuˬ yawˇ caˇ ve dawˬ ve yoˬ.
46011030	Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw maˇ maˇ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ leh naˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw laiˉ g'aˇ htawˇ suh peuˬ ve yoˬ.
46011031	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hk'a deh‸ lawˇ nyi ve k'o, ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ.
46011032	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui geh teˇ geh ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ jaw‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
46011033	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, caˇ ve dawˬ ve awˬ pon nawˬ hui teˇ geh hpawnˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hk'a deh‸ law da‸-o‸.
46011034	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ awˍ meu‸ ve k'o, yawˇ ve aˉ hk'aw lo caˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ hui hpawnˬ da‸ ve lehˬ, ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh laˬ htaˇ hk'a deh‸ maˍ laˇ gu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46012001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, co ha hpawˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
46012002	Nawˬ hui lawˇ kiˍ yaˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ k'ai ve hk'e nawˬ hui k'ai leh, tawˇ yaw maˇ puiˉ ve shaˉ ho‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ ca pui ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46012003	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e shiˍ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ hkeu taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ maˇ cuˇ ve k'o, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
46012004	La‸ shawnˍ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ ve htawˇ, Awˬ ha hpu teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46012005	Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon te tuˬ ve kanˉ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ ve htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46012006	Te tawˆ la ve kanˉ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ ve htawˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a peu-eˬ te tawˆ la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46012007	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ tuˬ, Awˬ ha hpu hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ, teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
46012008	Awˬ lawn k'o Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ shiˍ puiˉ ve tawˇ hkawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46012009	Awˬ ha hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yonˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ lehˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ chaw naˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ puiˉ ve la‸ shawnˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46012010	Teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ anˇ tuˬ te hpeh‸ tuˬ piˇ ve, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ bon maˍ puiˉ tuˬ piˇ ve, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ ha teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ puiˉ tuˬ piˇ ve, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh puiˉ tuˬ piˇ ve, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve hta‸ tcuhˉ kuiˬ yuˬ tawˆ puiˉ tuˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46012011	Chi hk'a peu-eˬ Awˬ ha hpu teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ te tawˆ la leh, yawˇ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46012012	Awˬ to lehˬ, teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ leh awˬ hk'eun maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ to ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ maˇ ve htawˇ, awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ ve hk'e, Hkri‸ htawˇ oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46012013	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yuˇda‸ chaw leh Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceˬ leh ponˬ peuˬ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, Awˬ ha hpu teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ. Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ geh Awˬ ha hpu teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hta‸ g'a dawˬ peuˬ.
46012014	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ to lehˬ awˬ hk'eun teˇ maˬ tiˉ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ.
46012015	Hkui sheh lehˬ, Ngaˬ la‸ sheh maˇ heˆ ve pa taw awˬ to hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve pa taw awˬ to hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
46012016	Naˍ paw lehˬ, ngaˬ mehˆ shiˍ maˇ heˆ ve pa taw awˬ to hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve pa taw awˬ to hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
46012017	Awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te kaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le. Awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ naˍ paw hpeh‸ ve k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e te nuˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le.
46012018	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e, awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo keu taˍ ve yoˬ.
46012019	Awˬ hk'eun hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ hk'eun teˇ maˬ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve k'o, awˬ to hk'aˬ hk'e te cawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
46012020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hk'eun cawˬ maˇ ve htawˇ, awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46012021	Mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ loˍ teh‸, la‸ sheh hta‸ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸. Oˉ k'oˍ htawˇ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ loˍ teh‸, hkui sheh hta‸ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
46012022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ g'a cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46012023	Awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ taˍ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˉ leh ngaˬ hui awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve nyi maˇ sha ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ, leuˉ leh nyi sha tuˬ ngaˬ hui te piˇ ve yoˬ.
46012024	Nyi sha chehˇ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˇ hk'e te tuˬ maˇ loˍ. Awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo hpaˆ da‸ guiˇ da‸ ve maˇ g'a cawˬ leh, awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ teˇ maˬ leh teˇ maˬ dawˇ nyi da‸ puiˉ tuˬ,
46012025	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ awˬ to hta‸ caˉ da‸ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˉ leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
46012026	Awˬ hk'eun teˇ maˬ tu‸ hkanˍ ve k'o, awˬ hk'eun hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ yawˇ geh tu‸ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'eun teˇ maˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a ve k'o, awˬ hk'eun hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ yawˇ geh g'a ha lehˬ ve yoˬ.
46012027	Nawˬ hui lehˬ Hkri‸ ve awˬ to hpeh‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ to oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hk'eun hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46012028	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ moˍ tcuh yaˇ hui, nyiˇ moˍ teˇ moˍ bon maˍ paˍ hui, shehˆ moˍ teˇ moˍ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui, oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ anˇ tuˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ hui, oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ chaw naˬ hui hta‸ gu na-e piˇ puiˉ ve chaw hui, ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui, awˬ hoˉ te ve chaw hui leh, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh puiˉ ve chaw hui hta‸ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha teh taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
46012029	Hk'a peu-eˬ tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Hk'a peu-eˬ bon maˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Hk'a peu-eˬ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Hk'a peu-eˬ anˇ tuˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve laˇ.
46012030	Hk'a peu-eˬ chaw naˬ hta‸ gu na-e piˇ puiˉ ve la‸ shawnˍ cawˬ ve laˇ. Hk'a peu-eˬ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh puiˉ ve laˇ. Hk'a peu-eˬ tcuhˉ kuiˬ yuˬ tawˆ puiˉ ve laˇ.
46012031	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ da‸ ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ sheˉ lai jaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ da‸ jaˇ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ caˆ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46013001	Ngaˬ lehˬ chaw yaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ yaw puiˉ ve htawˇ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve maˇ cawˬ k'o, bo lo k'oˍ dawˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ leh shehnˍ hehˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ hk'e ceh ngaˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46013002	Ngaˬ bon maˍ puiˉ ve maˇ k'oˆ, faˉ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ leh cuˇ yiˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hk'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jiˆ k'ai g'a tuˬ yonˍ ve nyi ma hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve maˇ cawˬ k'o, ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ.
46013003	Ngaˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ shu hta‸ pehˬ piˇ tanˇ piˇ leh, ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ ka‸ aˬ miˍ tuˉ tanˇ piˇ ve htawˇ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve maˇ cawˬ k'o, ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ g'a.
46013004	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ, dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ leh ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ maˇ hkawehˉ puiˉ, maˇ caˆ muiˬ puiˉ, nyi ma uiˍ ve mvuh ve maˇ cawˬ.
46013005	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ te puiˉ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon maˇ ca puiˉ, nyi ma maˇ zuhˆ puiˉ, shu awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ maˇ taˍ puiˉ.
46013006	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ ha lehˬ puiˉ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
46013007	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hkanˍ puiˉ ve, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yonˍ puiˉ ve, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ dawˇ law puiˉ ve leh, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
46013008	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ maˇ luˬ puiˉ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, bon maˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve maˇ k'oˆ, shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a peu-eˬ mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
46013009	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve lehˬ, maˇ biˇ sheˍ. Ngaˬ hui bon maˍ ve ka‸ maˇ biˇ sheˍ.
46013010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, biˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ gaˬ la htaˇ, maˇ biˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
46013011	Ngaˬ yaˇ ehˉ hpeh‸ chehˇ htaˇ, yaˇ ehˉ hk'e ngaˬ tawˇ yaw ve, yaˇ ehˉ hk'e ngaˬ nyi ma cawˬ ve leh, yaˇ ehˉ hk'e ngaˬ dawˇ nyi ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ chaw mawˇ hpeh‸ la htaˇ, yaˇ ehˉ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ.
46013012	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, maˇ kehˬ da‸ ve mehˆ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui nyi chehˇ ve hk'e yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ oˇ htaˇ gaˬ k'o, mehˆ hpfuhˇ tawˍ da‸ leh g'a mawˬ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi beu‸ ngaˬ hk'a biˇ maˇ shiˍ sheˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ shiˍ taˍ ve hk'e, oˇ htaˇ gaˬ k'o ngaˬ hk'a biˇ shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
46013013	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, yonˍ ve, dawˇ law ve leh ha‸ pehnˇ ve, chi shehˆ ceuˬ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi shehˆ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ jaˇ ve lehˬ ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
46014001	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'aˇ hte‸ k'ai leh, co ha hpawˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ sheˉ lai-o. Bon maˍ puiˉ ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ leuˉ leh sheˉ lai-o.
46014002	Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve chaw lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tawˇ yaw ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ na maˇ g'a. Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw, tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ yaw ve yoˬ.
46014003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ bon maˍ ve chaw lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ tuˬ, awˬ g'aˇ piˇ tuˬ leh, dawˇ sha la piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ yaw ve yoˬ.
46014004	Tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ tiˉ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ bon maˍ ve chaw lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ ve yoˬ.
46014005	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh g'a tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh nawˬ hui bon maˍ puiˉ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve chaw lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ tuˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ maˇ yuˬ tawˆ maˍ piˇ ve k'o, bon maˍ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ yawˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
46014006	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh laˬ leh tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve htawˇ, hpeu‸ maˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ, shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ, bon maˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ, maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ hkawˇ maˇ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le.
46014007	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, a sha‸ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, lehˉ lu maˇ k'oˆ, tinˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hkawˇ hk'a deh‸ maˇ cehnˍ k'o, hk'aˬ hk'e ve teˇ ceuˬ meuˆ gaˇ ve leh naˍ, hk'aˬ hk'e ve teˇ ceuˬ hteˆ gaˇ ve leh naˍ, shu hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
46014008	Behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve hkawˇ htawˇ maˇ cehnˍ k'o, ma‸ bawˆ tuˬ awˬ pon a shu gu taˍ tuˬ le.
46014009	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui maw‸ k'aw yehˇ leh tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo, shu na g'a ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˇ yaw ve k'o, nawˬ yaw ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ shu hk'aˬ hk'e te shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ haw hta‸ tawˇ yaw piˇ ve hk'e ceh hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46014010	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo tawˇ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
46014011	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ k'o, tawˇ yaw shehˍ hpaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ lehˬ shu mvuhˇ miˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, tawˇ yaw shehˍ hpaˇ htawˇ, ngaˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shu mvuhˇ miˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
46014012	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui htawˇ Awˬ ha hpu ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ sheˉ lai jaˇ ve chaw hui hpeh‸ ve pa taw, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ puiˉ tuˬ leuˉ leh ca-o.
46014013	Hk'e te leh, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve chaw lehˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ yuˬ tawˆ g'a tuˬ bon lawˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46014014	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw leh bon lawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve nyi ma hk'aw bon lawˬ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ shiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ.
46014015	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e te tuˬ le. Ngaˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ bon lawˬ leh, ngaˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ ngaˬ bon lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh leh, ngaˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ ngaˬ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
46014016	Hk'e maˇ heˆ leh, nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ bon hta‸ nawˬ chiˇ mvuh ve k'o, Awˬ ha hpu ve la‸ shawnˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, nawˬ chiˇ mvuh ve hkawˇ hta‸ na maˇ g'a ve pa taw, hk'aˬ hk'e te, A menˬ teh‸ k'oˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
46014017	Nawˬ lehˬ bon hta‸ hk'a deh‸ chiˇ mvuh ve htawˇ, shu hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ maˇ g'a.
46014018	Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh puiˉ ve pa taw, ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
46014019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hpawnˬ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh leh tawˇ teˇ meunˍ hkawˇ yaw ve a‸ kehˉ, ngaˬ shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ngaˬ shiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ ngaˇ hkawˇ ceh yaw gaˇ ve yoˬ.
46014020	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui dawˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yaˇ ehˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Haiˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ ehˉ hk'e hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, dawˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw mawˇ hk'e hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
46014021	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw ceuˬ ve ha tehˍ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw ceuˬ ve maw‸ k'aw hta‸ ngaˬ cuˇ leh, chaw chi teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ tawˇ yaw piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ chi hk'e te yaw piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
46014022	Hk'e te leh, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve lehˬ, yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Maˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Bon maˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon maˇ heˆ. Yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon yoˬ.
46014023	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hpawnˬ da‸ leh, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh chehˇ htaˇ, Awˬ ha hpu ve la‸ shawnˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hui, maˇ heˆ k'o maˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui lo‸ la k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ chaw g'uˇ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ tuˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
46014024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ bon maˍ chehˇ ve k'o, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw, maˇ heˆ k'o Awˬ ha hpu ve la‸ shawnˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lo‸ la htaˇ, bon maˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ awˬ to venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ jawˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
46014025	Yawˇ nyi ma hk'aw faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ mehˆ hpfuhˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ taˍ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui geh awˬ tehˬ awˬ na chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
46014026	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e le. Nawˬ hui hpawnˬ da‸ htaˇ, k'a muiˬ hkawˇ k'a ve, maˍ piˇ ve, hpeu‸ maˍ ve, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve, tcuhˉ kuiˬ yuˬ tawˆ ve, teˇ g'aˇ le le teˇ g'aˇ teˇ ceuˬ te ve yoˬ. Shu uiˍ la yeˬ la tuˬ awˬ pon hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te-o.
46014027	Tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve chaw cawˬ k'o, nyiˇ g'aˇ shehˆ g'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ taˇ yaw tcuh. Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ chiˇ mvuh peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ tcuhˉ kuiˬ yuˬ tawˆ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
46014028	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hpawnˬ da‸ htaˇ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ yuˬ tawˆ shehˍ hpaˇ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve chaw hui hta‸ ta‸ iˉ chehˇ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Yawˇ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ka‸ na‸ uˉ te da‸ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
46014029	Bon maˍ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o shehˆ g'aˇ hta‸ maˍ tcuh leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ shawˍ nyi dawˇ nyi piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
46014030	Oˇ kaˬ lo mui taˍ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a ve k'o, awˉ lawˉ maˍ chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ta‸ iˉ chehˇ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
46014031	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ henˇ yuˬ jawˬ yuˬ leh awˬ g'aˇ g'a tuˬ, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ bon maˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46014032	Bon maˍ paˍ hui ve nyi ma lehˬ, bon maˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46014033	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ lehˬ gawˬ lehˍ ve hta‸ te piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46014034	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ te chehˇ ve hk'e, yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ta‸ iˉ chehˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui tawˇ yaw tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui lehˬ shu awˬ hawˉ lo g'a chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46014035	Yawˇ hui teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ shiˍ gaˇ ve k'o, aˉ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ na nyi cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ miˇ lehˬ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ yaw ve k'o, ya‸ taw tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46014036	G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ tawˆ la ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ hui geh ceh tiˉ gaˬ la ve laˇ.
46014037	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ bon maˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve, maˇ heˆ k'o Awˬ ha hpu la‸ shawnˍ cawˬ ve teh‸ yawˇ dawˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ shiˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
46014038	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ maˇ shiˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ.
46014039	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, bon maˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai jaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Tawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw chiˇ mvuh ve hta‸ htawˇ taˇ tawˍ taˍ.
46014040	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ keunˍ da‸ cawˇ da‸ ve hk'e, nyi sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo te-o.
46015001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ taˍ peuˬ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ peuˬ leh, oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46015002	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'e leˇ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ leh hk'a deh‸ vawˆ yeˬ taˍ ve k'o, oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
46015003	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ g'a taˍ ve awˬ lawn uiˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn oˇ ve lehˬ, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Hkri‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ pon hkanˍ suh peuˬ.
46015004	Tuˍ hpfuh hk'aw tuˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, shehˍ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ htaˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve yoˬ.
46015005	Yawˇ lehˬ, Keˍhpaˆ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to maw piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ.
46015006	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, teˇ pawˆ tiˉ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ngaˇ ha g'aˇ hpaˆ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ to k'aw‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ maˇ-awˍ ve te‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ suh peuˬ.
46015007	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Yaˍkoˆ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ maw piˇ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ tcuh yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ to k'aw‸ maw piˇ ve yoˬ.
46015008	Ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ka‸ paw la ve yaˇ ehˉ hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, awˬ leh teˇ pawˆ yawˇ awˬ to ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ maw laˇ ve yoˬ.
46015009	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ tcuh yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo i jaˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ ngaˬ fawˉ mehˍ jaw ve pa taw, shu ngaˬ hta‸ tcuh yaˇ k'oˆ tuˬ ve hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ keunˍ ve yoˬ.
46015010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw yoˬ. Ngaˬ g'a ve awˬ bon htawˇ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tcuh yaˇ hui a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh ngaˬ kanˉ te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ te ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon ngaˬ geh cawˬ leh, awˬ bon oˇ ve kanˉ te ve yoˬ.
46015011	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ awˬ to maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chi hk'e bon maˍ leh, nawˬ hui htawˇ chi hk'e yonˍ taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
46015012	Hkri‸ lehˬ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hui bon maˍ ve k'o, suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve maˇ cawˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hk'aˬ hk'e te k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve le.
46015013	Suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve maˇ cawˬ k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
46015014	Hkri‸ lehˬ maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve k'o, ngaˬ hui bon maˍ ve chi, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve htawˇ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015015	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ lawn maˇ heˆ heˆ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Hkri‸ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ peuˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, suh ve chaw hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve k'o, Hkri‸ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
46015016	Awˬ lawn k'o, suh ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve k'o, Hkri‸ hta‸ htawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ peuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
46015017	Hkri‸ lehˬ maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve k'o, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
46015018	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo suh peuˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ luˬ k'ai peuˬ.
46015019	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ceh tiˉ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ law tuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46015020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Hkri‸ lehˬ suh kuiˬ lo awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ leh, suh peuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ naw‸ la ve awˬ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015021	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw suh ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ la ve hk'e, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pa taw suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
46015022	Aˍdanˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hk'a peu-eˬ suh ve hk'e, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hk'a peu-eˬ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ.
46015023	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve hk'e k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ. Hkri‸ lehˬ awˉ lawˉ naw‸ ve awˬ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ hk'a caˉ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ.
46015024	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ lehˬ uˉ peunˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ, aˉ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ leh, kanˇ paˆ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te luˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ mvuhˇ miˬ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46015025	Hkri‸ lehˬ canˇ paˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ ve hkui taw k'aw awˬ hawˉ lo taˍ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ g'a uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
46015026	Awˬ leh meuˇ te luˬ piˇ tuˬ ve canˇ paˍ lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yoˬ.
46015027	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ Yaˇ hpu ve hkui taw k'aw awˬ hawˉ lo G'uiˬ sha teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ Yaˇ hpu awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo teh taˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
46015028	Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ Yaˇ hpu awˬ hawˉ lo teh taˍ peuˬ htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ teh taˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hawˉ lo Yaˇ hpu htawˇ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
46015029	Suh peuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ pon baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ ve chaw hui lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw ca hkanˍ ve le. Suh ve chaw hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw yawˇ hui ve awˬ tan shu baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ ve le.
46015030	Ngaˬ hui htawˇ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw teˇ naˍ riˍ le le kawˆ tuˬ dawˇ haˍ tuˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve le.
46015031	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ leh, teˇ nyi le le suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015032	Shu te jaw ve hk'e, ngaˬ lehˬ Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a loˍ yuˬ da‸ jaw ve htawˇ, ngaˬ awˬ pon aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le. Suh ve chaw hui maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la k'o, shu k'oˆ ve hk'e, Shawˉ pawˍ ngaˬ hui g'a suh tuˬ ve pa taw, caˇ bvuhˆ dawˬ bvuhˆ te chehˇ-a veuˬ.
46015033	Nawˬ hui taˇ dawˇ ya‸. Haiˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ chawˇ te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, da‸ ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te luˬ ve yoˬ.
46015034	Nawˇ la leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai-o. Venˇ baˆ hta‸ taˇ k'aw‸ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shiˍ. Nawˬ hui ya‸ taw tuˬ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
46015035	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e na nyi laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Suh ve chaw hui lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ le. Hk'aˬ hk'e ve awˬ to cawˬ leh k'aw‸ tawˆ la tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
46015036	Maˇ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve chaw-oˬ, nawˬ sheˍ ve awˬ yawˇ lehˬ, maˇ luˬ maˇ suh ve k'o, te‸ la tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
46015037	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ sheˍ ve lehˬ, hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ cehˬ hta‸ nawˬ sheˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Caˬ yawˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ yawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh nawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
46015038	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e, awˬ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ cehˬ hpeh‸ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ cehˬ hpeh‸ la piˇ ve yoˬ.
46015039	Shaˍ hk'a cawˬ ve lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Chaw yaˇ ve awˬ shaˍ teˇ ceuˬ, to nuˇ to shaˆ ve awˬ shaˍ teˇ ceuˬ, ngaˆ awˬ shaˍ teˇ ceuˬ leh, ngaˇ awˬ shaˍ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015040	Mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ to teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ leh, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ to teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ to teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ to teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ htawˇ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015041	Mvuhˇ nyi ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ, ha pa ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ leh, meu‸ keu teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Meu‸ keu teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, teˇ shiˍ leh teˇ shiˍ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ peun da‸ ve yoˬ.
46015042	Suh peuˬ ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la tuˬ ve lehˬ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ to lehˬ, luˬ puiˉ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ leh, maˇ luˬ maˇ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46015043	Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ leh, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46015044	Sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ to hpeh‸ leh, k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, co ha ve awˬ to hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ ve awˬ to cawˬ ve k'o, co ha ve awˬ to htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46015045	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve Aˍdanˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a sha‸ te‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ leh meuˇ ve Aˍdanˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a sha‸ te‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015046	Co ha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˉ lawˉ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˉ lawˉ laˬ leh, oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ co ha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ laˬ ve yoˬ.
46015047	Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve chaw lehˬ, je‸ hpeh‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
46015048	Je‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, je‸ lo tawˆ la ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo tawˆ la ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015049	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, je‸ lo tawˆ la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ pfuhˇ ve hk'e, mvuhˇ naw ma lo tawˆ la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ hui pfuhˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46015050	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ to lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e maˇ hpeh‸. Luˬ puiˉ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ luˬ maˇ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e maˇ hpeh‸.
46015051	Nyi loˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ jaˇ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto maˍ laˇ shaˍ. Nyiˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ g'a suh tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
46015052	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ leh meuˇ ve behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ hkui tiˉ, mehˆ teˇ me‸ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo, nyiˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ g'a pa tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, behˬ heh ma awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, suh peuˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, maˇ luˬ maˇ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la leh, nyiˬ hui htawˇ g'a pa tuˬ yoˬ.
46015053	Awˬ lawn k'o, luˬ puiˉ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ chi lehˬ, maˇ luˬ maˇ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a veu‸ deh tuˬ yoˬ. Suh puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ chi htawˇ, maˇ suh puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a veu‸ deh tuˬ yoˬ.
46015054	Luˬ puiˉ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ luˬ maˇ kuiˇ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, suh puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ htawˇ maˇ suh puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ veu‸ deh ve teˇ yanˇ, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ. G'aˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hehˆ dawˬ peuˬ.
46015055	Suh ve teˇ ceuˬ-oˬ, nawˬ g'aˇ tuˬ hk'aˬ lo cawˬ le. Suh ve teˇ ceuˬ-oˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ viˇ hk'aˬ lo cawˬ le.
46015056	Suh ve awˬ viˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ ve kanˇ paˆ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46015057	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui hta‸ g'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o.
46015058	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nyi ma yeˬ ve chaw, te kuiˬ dawˇ kuiˬ yeˬ ve chaw leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˉ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon nawˬ hui te ve kanˉ lehˬ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ shiˍ chehˇ-oˆ.
46016001	Hkri‸ yaˇ hui awˬ pon hpu tanˇ shaw ve awˬ lawn lehˬ, Gaˍlaˍtiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hto piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ oˇ hk'e te-o.
46016002	Ngaˬ gaˬ la htaˇ hpu tanˇ maˇ g'a shaw tuˬ, teˇ shinˉ le le awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi htaˇ, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ awˬ bon g'a taˍ ve hk'e, hpu tanˇ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yuˬ tawˆ leh ha‸ shaˉ taˍ-o‸.
46016003	Ngaˬ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ve hpu tanˇ hta‸ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo yuˬ k'oˬ piˇ tuˬ, nawˬ hui nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve li‸ bvuh‸ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ peu k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
46016004	Ngaˬ htawˇ k'ai cawˇ ve k'o, yawˇ hui ngaˬ geh teˇ geh k'ai hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46016005	Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hpanˍ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ g'a hpanˍ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
46016006	Ngaˬ hk'aˬ ve teˇ hpawˇ lo k'aw‸ k'ai tuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ peu k'ai laˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ tuˬ teh‸ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇkaˆ yanˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ hehˉ.
46016007	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi beu‸ hpanˍ k'ai chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ceh nawˬ hui hta‸ g'a mawˬ da‸ tuˬ ngaˬ maˇ te gaˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ nyi ma cawˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh a ciˉ maw chaweh chehˇ tuˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve yoˬ.
46016008	Peˍteˍkoˆteˍ pawehˇ awˬ nyi hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
46016009	Awˬ lawn k'o, kanˉ hk'a deh‸ te hpeh‸ tuˬ ngaˬ awˬ pon k'ehˬ jaˇ ve yehˬ miˉ teˇ maˬ hpaw taˍ ve yoˬ. Tawˍ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ htawˇ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
46016010	Tiˆmoˉseˍ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la k'o, nawˬ hui geh chehˇ htaˇ yawˇ maˇ g'a kawˆ tuˬ nawˬ hui shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
46016011	Hk'e te leh, a shu ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ taˇ te. Yawˇ ngaˬ geh k'aw‸ la hpeh‸ tuˬ, dawˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ peu laˇ-oˆ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh yawˇ k'aw‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46016012	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Aˍpawˇlu‸ awˬ lawn lehˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh nawˬ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo laˬ tuˬ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo laˬ tuˬ yawˇ nyi ma a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ nawˬ hui geh laˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
46016013	Nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ shaw taˍ-o‸. Yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ lehˍ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ g'aˇ yuˬ tawˆ leh, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te chehˇ-oˆ.
46016014	Nawˬ hui hk'a te ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo te-o.
46016015	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Saˍteˍhpanˍ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui lehˬ, Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ yaˇ awˉ lawˉ hpeh‸ la leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ, yawˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ ve awˬ to chiˇ a‸ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
46016016	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, chi hk'e ve chaw hui awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ga piˇ leh kanˉ g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a deh‸ chehˇ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
46016017	Saˍteˍhpanˍ, Hpawˍtuˇnaˆ leh Aˍhkaˍyaˍkuˆ hui gaˬ la ve pa taw, ngaˬ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ htawˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw ngaˬ nyi ma sha la ve yoˬ.
46016018	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ ve nyi ma leh nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ dawˇ sha la piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ yawˆ yan-o.
46016019	Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Aˍkuˉlaˆ leh Piˇkiˇlaˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui ve yehˬ hk'aw hpawnˬ da‸ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ka‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, teˇ geh tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
46016020	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo boˆ nu da‸ leh la‸ sheh caˉ da‸-o‸.
46016021	Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ awˬ to nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
46016022	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ maˇ ha‸ ve k'o, hkeu ve hta‸ hkanˍ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ laˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
46016023	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
