46016024	Ngaˬ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
47001001	G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ leh, Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Tiˆmoˉseˍ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ teˇ geh li‸ chi teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47001002	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
47001003	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o. Yawˇ lehˬ ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ leh, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47001004	Ngaˬ hui g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ sha la piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ sha la piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ hui htawˇ dawˇ sha la piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47001005	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ la ve hk'e, Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ la ve yoˬ.
47001006	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ ceuˬ leh htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui htawˇ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ ve k'o, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve chi hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
47001007	Nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui dawˇ law ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui ve dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
47001008	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ peuˬ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ piˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui a sha‸ g'a ponˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ dawˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ hui hkanˍ maˇ g'aˇ ve tu‸ jaˇ hkanˍ jaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ nyiˉ tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47001009	Ngaˬ hui g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, suhˉ taˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve hk'e yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ to hta‸ g'aˇ maˇ va leh, suh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ceh tiˉ g'aˇ va tuˬ, chi hk'e hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
47001010	Yawˇ lehˬ, chi taw taw uiˍ jaˇ ve suh ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ peuˬ leh k'aw‸ ponˬ laˇ tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ ponˬ laˇ tuˬ sheˍ ve hta‸ htawˇ, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47001011	Nawˬ hui htawˇ, bon ga lawˬ laˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ bon lawˬ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui g'a ve awˬ bon teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon, chaw laiˉ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
47001012	Ngaˬ hui nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, leuˉ leh nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hui ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ g'aˇ va ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'aˇ va ve yoˬ.
47001013	Nawˬ hui g'aw g'a leh shiˍ g'a ve awˬ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47001014	Nawˬ hui hk'a cawˇ cawˇ shiˍ taˍ peuˬ ve hk'e, hk'a biˇ shiˍ la tuˬ ngaˬ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui oˇ hk'e shiˍ la ve k'o, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ pa taw nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
47001015	Ngaˬ chi hta‸ hk'a deh‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ g'a k'aw‸ ha lehˬ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh awˉ lawˉ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47001016	Ngaˬ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ nawˬ hui geh ca guiˇ la taˉ leh, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'aw‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ nawˬ hui geh ca k'aw‸ guiˇ la leh, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ hpawˇ lo shiˍ k'oˬ laˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47001017	Ngaˬ chi hk'e dawˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ te ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ te ve hk'e, yoˬ ka‸ maˇ heˆ ka‸ teˇ pawˆ tiˉ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve laˇ.
47001018	G'uiˬ sha ka ti‸ yeˬ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, yoˬ ka‸ maˇ heˆ ka‸ teˇ pawˆ tiˉ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ.
47001019	Awˬ lawn k'o, Siˍlaˍnuˆ, Tiˆmoˉseˍ, ngaˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, yoˬ ka‸ maˇ heˆ ka‸ teˇ pawˆ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yoˬ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47001020	G'uiˬ sha ve ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yoˬ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui A menˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
47001021	Nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh ngaˬ hui hta‸ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ yeˬ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ leh leuˆ yuˬ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha yoˬ.
47001022	Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maiˉ taˍ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ shinˉ g'a tuˬ ve hta‸ shiˍ tuˬ, chi beu‸ ka‸ ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu pe‸ laˇ taˍ peuˬ.
47001023	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ venˇ lo maˇ laˬ ve teh‸, G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ ngaˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
47001024	Ngaˬ hui chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui uˉ peunˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh te ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve lehˬ yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47002001	Dawˇ haˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh maˇ k'aw‸ laˬ teh‸, ngaˬ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ peuˬ.
47002002	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, a shu ngaˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ le. Ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve chaw ceh tiˉ ngaˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ piˇ lawˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47002003	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸ ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon ha lehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ piˇ lawˬ cawˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
47002004	Awˬ lawn k'o, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve, nyi ma dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve leh, mehˆ g'uiˬ maˇ maˇ ya‸ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ha‸ jaˇ ve nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47002005	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ shu hta‸ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hk'a cawˇ cawˇ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. (Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ k'oˆ ponˬ k'oˆ leuˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ maˇ te gaˇ.)
47002006	Oˇ hk'e ve chaw hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ-awˍ ve chi hk'e ciˍ yanˍ piˇ ve lehˬ law‸ peuˬ.
47002007	Dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˇ g'a gaˬ tuˬ, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ cawˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ dawˇ sha la piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
47002008	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
47002009	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui na yuˬ chehˇ ve leh naˍ teh‸ ngaˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
47002010	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ nawˬ hui hpehˇ piˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hpehˇ hk'a ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon Hkri‸ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hpehˇ hk'a ve yoˬ.
47002011	Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, Saˍtanˍ lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ g'aˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47002012	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ Taˍroˇaˆ venˇ lo ngaˬ gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ awˬ pon yehˬ miˉ hpaw laˇ ve yoˬ.
47002013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Tiˇtuˆ hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nyi ma maˇ sha ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ Taˍroˇaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve yoˬ.
47002014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui g'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ sheh k'ai laˇ leh, shu yawˇ hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ ve awˬ shaˉ hawnˉve teˇ ceuˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo zuhˇ k'ai piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ cuˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47002015	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Hkri‸ ve awˬ shaˉ hawnˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47002016	Luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai chehˇ ve chaw hui awˬ pon, suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ suh ve awˬ shaˉ hpeh‸ leh, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve chaw hui awˬ pon co ha te‸ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te‸ ve awˬ shaˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a shu teˇ g'aˇ te hpeh‸ ve le.
47002017	Chaw laiˉ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ yawˬ g'a tuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ hkaw‸ da‸ lehmaˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, oˇ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha maˍ tcuh laˇ ve hk'e ceh, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui nyi ma pfuhˇ leh hteˇ lehˍ maˍ ve yoˬ.
47003001	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ to awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ k'aw‸ hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui geh shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve li‸ hta‸ g'a tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui loˍ ve laˇ.
47003002	Nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve li‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Li‸ chi lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo bvuh‸ taˍ leh, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ shiˍ leh g'aw g'a ve li‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47003003	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, Hkri‸ ngaˬ hui hta‸ cuˇ leh bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ ve yoˬ. Naˬ meu‸ g'uiˬ bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Haˉ pui baˉ awˬ hk'oˆ bvuh‸ taˍ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47003004	G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui chi hk'e yonˍ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
47003005	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ te hpeh‸ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ g'aˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ hui cuˇ ve yoˬ.
47003006	Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ awˬ pon kanˉ te puiˉ te g'a tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ leh cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ chi ve lehˬ, li‸ mehˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, li‸ mehˆ lehˬ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ co ha te‸ la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47003007	Haˉ pui baˉ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ htawˆ bvuh‸ taˍ ve, suh piˇ lawˬ puiˉ ve awˬ liˇ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Moˉseˍ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ lo ba tawˆ la chehˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ lehˬ, shaˬ te shaˬ mehˉ k'ai chehˇ ve htawˇ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nyi maˇ hpeh‸ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ ba tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
47003008	Hk'e te k'o, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ liˇ lehˬ, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ tuˬ ve le.
47003009	Awˬ lawn k'o, ciˍ yanˍ tuˬ suhˉ taˆ ve awˬ liˇ gaˬ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ liˇ gaˬ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo, leuˉ leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
47003010	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ tawˆ la ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve pa taw, awˉ lawˉ cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ mehˉ k'ai ve yoˬ.
47003011	Awˬ lawn k'o, mehˉ k'ai chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo gaˬ la ve k'o, yeˬ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leuˉ leh cawˬ ve yoˬ.
47003012	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui dawˇ law kuiˬ chi hk'e cawˬ ve pa taw, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47003013	Mehˉ k'ai chehˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ maˇ g'a nyi tuˬ, Moˉseˍ lehˬ yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ hpa beh taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ oˇ hk'e maˇ te.
47003014	Yawˇ hui nyi ma heh leh maˇ dawˇ pawnˍ puiˉ ve pa taw, ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ piˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'aw ve teˇ yanˇ, beh taˍ ve hpa maˇ yehˬ baˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ hpa oˇ ve hta‸ yehˬ baˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47003015	Ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Moˉseˍ ve li‸ hta‸ g'aw ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ hpa beh taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
47003016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la ve k'o, beh taˍ ve hpa oˇ ve hta‸ yehˬ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
47003017	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Awˬ ha hpu hpeh‸ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve Awˬ ha hpu chehˇ ve teˇ kaˬ lo ponˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
47003018	Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, mehˆ hpfuhˇ maˇ beh leh, mehˆ g'euˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui k'aw‸ ba piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu hpeh‸ ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui lehˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ shaˬ te shaˬ maˇ la leh yawˇ hk'e hpeh‸ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47004001	G'uiˬ sha ha k'aˉ laˇ ve pa taw, kanˉ chi ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui nyi ma maˇ luˬ,
47004002	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ leh ya‸ taw tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ. Heˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yuˬ hpfuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui maˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ cawˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
47004003	Ngaˬ hui maˍ chehˇ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ lehˬ beh taˍ ve k'o, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai ve chaw hui awˬ pon ceh tiˉ beh taˍ ve yoˬ.
47004004	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hpeh‸ ve Hkri‸ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ g'euˆ lehˬ, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a ba tuˬ, chi miˬ guiˬ ve g'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ naˆ ho‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
47004005	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ to awˬ lawn bon maˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Yeˍsuˆ hkri‸ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ lawn leh, ngaˬ hui Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon nawˬ hui ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui bon maˍ ve yoˬ.
47004006	Naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'euˆ ba tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'euˆ ba laˇ peuˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, Hkri‸ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ shu g'a shiˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ g'euˆ ba piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47004007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ chi lehˬ, ngaˬ hui lo tawˆ la ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha geh lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ teh‸, hpeu‸ maw piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve mawˇ chi lehˬ, je‸ mu‸ hk'u awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47004008	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, teˇ hpawˇ le le lo nyi tiˍ taˍ laˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve htawˇ, hoˆ tiˍ taˍ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve htawˇ, dawˇ tui‸ gaˇ tui‸ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ maˇ heˆ.
47004009	Fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve htawˇ, ga laˇ paˍ maˇ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Shu dawˆ baˬ laˇ ve htawˇ, luˬ k'ai htaˇ hk'a gaˬ maˇ heˆ.
47004010	Yeˍsuˆ ve te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la hpeh‸ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ pfuhˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47004011	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ ve te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve suh puiˉ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon suh tuˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
47004012	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo suh ve teˇ ceuˬ kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo lehˬ, te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47004013	Ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui htawˇ yonˍ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve pa taw, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
47004014	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh teˇ geh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ lawˬ leh, nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ chehˇ tcuh laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
47004015	Chi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon shaˬ te shaˬ maˇ la ve hk'e, shu yawˇ hta‸ shaˬ te shaˬ chiˇ mvuh ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
47004016	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui nyi ma maˇ luˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ luˬ k'ai chehˇ ve htawˇ, co ha hpawˇ lehˬ teˇ nyi peuˬ teˇ nyi awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47004017	Chi beu‸ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve i jaˇ lawˬ jaˇ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ca tehˆ nyi maˇ g'a ve uiˍ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon te laˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47004018	Awˬ lawn k'o, mawˬ hpeh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui nyi ve maˇ heˆ. Maˇ mawˬ hpeh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui nyi ve yoˬ. Mawˬ hpeh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ hkui tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ mawˬ hpeh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ cawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ
47005001	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ hui chehˇ taˍ ve aˉ po k'o chi luˬ k'ai ve k'o, la‸ sheh maˇ te ve, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo co co taiˍ taiˍ cawˬ ve, G'uiˬ sha te taˍ ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
47005002	Awˬ lawn k'o, aˉ po k'o chi ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hk'anˇ chehˇ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve ngaˬ hui ve yehˬ hta‸ veu‸ deh gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
47005003	Oˇ hk'e g'a veu‸ deh ve k'o, awˬ k'u nyi g'a chehˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
47005004	Aˉ po k'o chi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui chehˇ taˍ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, hawˇ ve mawˇ pfuhˇ leh hk'anˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ veu‸ deh gaˇ leh hk'anˇ chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Suh puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ te‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ g'a hehˆ dawˬ tuˬ, veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui veu‸ deh gaˇ ve yoˬ.
47005005	Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ awˬ pon, ngaˬ hui hta‸ gu laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ hui awˬ bon chi hta‸ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ lehˬ chi beu‸ ka‸ Awˬ ha hpu pe‸ laˇ taˍ peuˬ.
47005006	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ nyi ma yeˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
47005007	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui te k'ai chehˇ ve lehˬ mehˆ shiˍ mawˬ ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
47005008	Ngaˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ to chi hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh leuˉ leh chehˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
47005009	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ to hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ ngaˬ hui coˇ caˇ leh te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47005010	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ htaˇ te ve hk'e, da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, g'a tuˬ awˬ pon, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ Hkri‸ ve suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ k'aw jaw g'uˇ suhˍ lo g'a gaˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
47005011	Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, chaw yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ maˍ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha hk'a tawˍ lehˆ shiˍ leh, nawˬ hui htawˇ nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ ve yoˬ.
47005012	Ngaˬ hui chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui awˬ to hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ nyi ma hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ dawˇ nyi leh awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ ceh tiˉ nyi ma uiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui nyi ma uiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve awˬ hk'aˇ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47005013	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui g'uˇ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon g'uˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui nyi ma biˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon biˇ ve yoˬ.
47005014	Hkri‸ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ vawˆ taˍ leh shiˍ k'ai sheh k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon hkanˍ suh ve pa taw, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ suh peuˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ cheˆ taˍ peuˬ.
47005015	Yawˇ lehˬ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon maˇ k'aw‸ te‸ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ pon hkanˍ suh leh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ pon te‸ chehˇ tuˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon hkanˍ suh ve yoˬ.
47005016	Hk'e te leh, ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, chaw yaˇ hui shu hta‸ shawˍ taˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui lehˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ shawˍ taˍ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui Hkri‸ hta‸ chaw yaˇ hui shawˍ taˍ ve hk'e ceh shawˍ taˍ chehˇ ve htawˇ, ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, yawˇ hta‸ oˇ hk'e maˇ k'aw‸ shawˍ taˍ.
47005017	Hk'e te leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ chaw awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ la peuˬ, Awˬ piˍ teˇ hpaˍ mehˉ k'ai peuˬ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
47005018	Awˬ ceuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ tuˬ te laˇ peuˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸ shu yawˇ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ la tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ te tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ.
47005019	Yawˇ lehˬ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ la tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ taˍ. Shu yawˇ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ te tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ.
47005020	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui Hkri‸ ve awˬ tan te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ loˬ teh‸, Hkri‸ ve awˬ tan te leh ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
47005021	Hkri‸ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ jaw htawˇ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hpeh‸ la tuˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ venˇ baˆ hpeh‸ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
47006001	Ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha geh teˇ geh kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'e leˇ maˇ g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
47006002	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve, Cawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve yoˬ. Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ga laˇ ve yoˬ. teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ lehˬ cawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ nyi lehˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ nyi hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47006003	Ngaˬ hui kanˉ te ve hta‸ shu venˇ baˆ taˍ maˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ hkui htiˇ poˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ te.
47006004	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na G'uiˬ sha ve kanˉ te paˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ shu shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ. G'aˇ hte‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ ve, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve, dawˇ tui‸ gaˇ tui‸ ve, haˍ jaˇ ve,
47006005	dawˆ laˇ jaw‸ laˇ ve, htawnˍ hk'aw keu laˇ ve, shu duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te ve, kanˉ te hkeu‸ ve, maˇ g'a zuh‸ ve leh, meu‸ ve kaˆ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
47006006	Da‸ kehˬ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve, shiˍ puiˉ ve, dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ ve, shu awˬ pon da‸ ve hta‸ te ve, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ ve, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ha‸ ve, hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ maˍ piˇ ve,
47006007	G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ cuˇ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve la‸ caˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ la‸ sha paˉ la‸ mehˍ paˉ vawˆ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo,
47006008	awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a ve maˇ k'oˆ, shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, shu chiˇ mvuh laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, shu hk'aiˉ laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ. Shu hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ ve chaw hk'e, shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ shawˍ laˇ ve htawˇ, hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
47006009	Ngaˬ hui hta‸ shu maˇ shiˍ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, shu hk'a peu-eˬ shiˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Suh paˇ neˇ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, tiˇ pehˍ laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ.
47006010	Dawˇ haˍ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ha lehˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Haˍ g'awˇ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ paw sha la piˇ ve yoˬ. Te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, teˇ ceuˬ le le cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47006011	Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ faˉ taˍ leh, hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hto laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
47006012	Ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ i ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ i jaˇ ve yoˬ.
47006013	Nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ ha‸ laˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
47006014	Maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ caˉ da‸, taˇ pawnˇ da‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te caˉ da‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Awˬ g'euˆ lehˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te awˬ chawˇ te da‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
47006015	Hkri‸ lehˬ Beˍleˍlaˆ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw geh hk'aˬ hk'e te leh nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
47006016	G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ lehˬ, shaˉ ho‸ shaˉ nanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te cawˇ da‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve, Ngaˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, yawˇ hui geh ngaˬ te toˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hui htawˇ ngaˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
47006017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh yawˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ chehˇ taˍ-o‸ teh‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ taˇ htawˇ, Maˇ htawˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
47006018	Ngaˬ lehˬ nawˬ hui ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ ve yaˇ paˍ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, kanˇ paˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
47007001	Hk'e te leh, ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to leh nyi ma hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ leh yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo, da‸ ve kehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ biˇ la piˇ-a veuˬ.
47007002	Nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ te ya‸, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ maˇ te leh, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ heˍ caˇ ve maˇ te.
47007003	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ leh chi hk'e k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, suh k'o teˇ geh suh tuˬ, te‸ k'o teˇ geh te‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47007004	Nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ ceuˬ htawˇ ngaˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ca k'oˆ maˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ ha lehˬ tuˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
47007005	Awˬ lawn k'o, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ hui gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo bawˆ da‸ tuˬ cawˬ leh, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
47007006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma luˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ sha piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Tiˇtuˆ gaˬ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ sha la piˇ ve yoˬ.
47007007	Tiˇtuˆ gaˬ la ve pa taw ceh tiˉ dawˇ sha la ve maˇ heˆ. Tiˇtuˆ lehˬ, nawˬ hui geh g'a veu laˇ ve dawˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui dawˇ sha la ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ, dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, ngaˬ awˬ pon nyi ma pfuhˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ leuˉ leh ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
47007008	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ngaˬ bvuh‸ laˇ ve li‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve pa taw, oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ hpeh‸ bawˬ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ ngaˬ maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ bawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, li‸ oˇ ve lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ hkui ceh tiˉ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
47007009	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ haˍ piˇ lawˬ ve pa taw ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve pa taw ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ g'a shonˇ k'ai tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ve dawˇ haˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
47007010	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve dawˇ haˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, hpeh‸ bawˬ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve dawˇ haˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
47007011	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve dawˇ haˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e ve teˇ hpaˍ te tawˆla piˇ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ. Nawˬ hui coˇ caˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hteˇ ve awˬ lawn k'aw‸ k'oˆ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, kawˆ ve nyi ma cawˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, dawˇ law tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nyi ma pfuhˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ ma te tawˆ la ve le. Kanˉ chi hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peu.
47007012	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, te ya‸ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ pon maˇ heˆ. Te ya‸ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw awˬ pon ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hk'aˬ ma coˇ caˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47007013	Chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui dawˇ sha la peuˬ. Ngaˬ hui dawˇ sha gaˇ sha peuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, Tiˇtuˆ ha lehˬ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui leuˉ leh ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ nyi ma sha la piˇ peuˬ.
47007014	Ngaˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn chiˇ mvuh ve hkawˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Tiˇtuˆ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ lawn chiˇ mvuh ve hkawˇ yaw taˍ ve lehˬ hteˇ ve yoˬ.
47007015	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ na yuˬ leh, kawˆ ve cheˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ nawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˉ leh ha‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
47007016	Teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve yoˬ.
47008001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Maˍkeˍ dawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha awˬ bon hk'aˬ hk'e na‸ piˇ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
47008002	Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve maˇ maˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui ha lehˬ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, haˍ g'awˇ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, biˇ sheˆ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui mawˇ jeˬ maˇ maˇ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
47008003	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui puiˉ ve hpeh‸ ve hk'e tanˇ piˇ peuˬ. Puiˉ ve hpeh‸ ve hk'e tanˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a k'aw‸ tanˇ piˇ sheˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
47008004	Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga piˇ ve awˬ bon chi teˇ ceuˬ g'a te tuˬ, a hkaw-anˬ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸, yawˇ hui ngaˬ hui hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
47008005	Ngaˬ hui dawˇ law ve a‸ kehˉ ka‸ yawˇ hui te ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui lehˬ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ka‸ a shu yawˇ awˬ to tanˇ ve yoˬ.
47008006	Hk'e te leh, Tiˇtuˆ lehˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ tanˬ te ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve kanˉ chi hta‸ te peuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
47008007	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo, yonˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ yaw ve maˇ k'oˆ, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ k'oˆ, g'aˇ hte‸ coˇ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ nawˬ hui g'aˇ hte‸ te taˍ ve hk'e, awˬ bon uiˍ ve kanˉ chi teˇ maˬ hta‸ htawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ te-o.
47008008	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, tawˇ piˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Shu coˇ caˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ htaˇ, nawˬ hui ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na cawˬ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
47008009	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ paw sha chehˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon haˍ ve g'awˇ ve hta‸ hkanˍ leh, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hkanˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui paw sha la ve yoˬ.
47008010	Chi awˬ lawn ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ ve nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ shaˍ. Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ hui te gaˇ leh te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, aˉ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˬ hui tanˬ te laˬ ve hk'e chi beu‸ te peuˬ piˇ-oˆ. Chi lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon da‸ ve yoˬ.
47008011	Hk'e te leh, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ hui te gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui te puiˉ te hpeh‸ ve hk'e te peuˬ piˇ-oˆ.
47008012	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha nyi ve maˇ heˆ. Te gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
47008013	Kanˉ chi hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon sha leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon haˍ jaˇ tuˬ ngaˬ te gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
47008014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ngaˬ te gaˇ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui awˬ leuˉ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui loˍ ve cuˆ ve hta‸ ga piˇ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ nawˬ hui loˍ ve cuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ leuˉ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ ga laˇ leh, hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
47008015	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Maˇ chaweh g'awˆ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ awˬ leuˉ maˇ cawˬ leh, a ciˉ ceh tiˉ g'awˆ yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ loˍ ve cuˆ ve maˇ cawˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47008016	Nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ nyi ma pfuhˇ ve hk'e, Tiˇtuˆ htawˇ nyi ma pfuhˇ la tuˬ G'uiˬ sha te piˇ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
47008017	Tiˇtuˆ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ nawˬ hui geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
47008018	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve hta‸ pa taw, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ hui k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ.
47008019	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve kanˉ chi hta‸ ga te tuˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Kanˉ chi hta‸ te ve lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la leh, shu hta‸ ga piˇ gaˇ ve nyi ma hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
47008020	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, maˇ jaˇ ve tanˇ tuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaw leh pehˬ piˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, shu venˇ baˆ maˇ g'a taˍ laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hui shaˍ ti‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47008021	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ htawˇ keunˍ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te tuˬ ngaˬ hui dawˇ taˍ leh te ve yoˬ.
47008022	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ geh teˇ geh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ hui k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi chi teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ laiˉ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo laiˉ pawˆ lawˇ nyi peuˬ leh, yawˇ nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ yonˍ jaˇ ve pa taw, chi beu‸ leuˉ leh nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
47008023	Tiˇtuˆ awˬ lawn lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ ve awˬ chawˇ hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ geh teˇ geh kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi chi nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ peu laˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47008024	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui ha‸ pehnˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui chiˇ mvuh ve hkawˇ yaw ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ te-o.
47009001	Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga piˇ ve kanˉ awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ loˍ.
47009002	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ shu hta‸ ga piˇ gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui shu hta‸ ga piˇ gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ chaw hui hta‸ hto piˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Aˍhkaˍyaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, aˉ nyi hk'aw‸ htaˇ ka‸ gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui g'aˇ hte‸ te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui maˇ-awˍ ve hta‸ nawˍ piˇ peuˬ.
47009003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn ngaˬ chiˇ mvuh ve lehˬ, kanˉ chi awˬ hk'aw hk'e leˇ maˇ g'a hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ k'oˆ ve hk'e nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ tuˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
47009004	Maˇ heˆ k'o, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh laˬ leh, nawˬ hui maˇ gu maˇ hehnˇ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui g'a ya‸ taw ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui htawˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ yoˬ.
47009005	Chi hta‸ pa taw, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ bon uiˍ ve kanˉ chi teˇ maˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ te peuˬ taˍ laˇ tuˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ hui geh peu k'ai cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Tanˇ tuˬ chi piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ nyiˉ te ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ g'a hpeh‸ leh, ha lehˬ ha k'a tanˇ piˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
47009006	Awˬ lawn chi ve lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. A ciˉ ceh tiˉ sheˍ ve chaw lehˬ, a ciˉ ceh tiˉ g'a g'eu‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Maˇ chaweh sheˍ ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ chaweh g'a g'eu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
47009007	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le, a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e tanˇ piˇ-oˆ. Dawˇ haˍ leh te ve maˇ k'oˆ, g'a te ve hta‸ pa taw te ve maˇ k'oˆ, taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ha lehˬ ha k'a tanˇ piˇ ve chaw hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ha‸ ve yoˬ.
47009008	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le cawˬ law‸ leh, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ le le maˇ chaweh piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47009009	Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Yawˇ maˇ chaweh sheˍ peuˬ. Haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ piˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47009010	Awˬ yawˇ sheˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ awˬ yawˇ ka‸ caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ ka‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ yawˇ piˇ leh maˇ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ maˇ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
47009011	Hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui maˇ chaweh piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui paw sha la tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ pa taw shu G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ awˬ pon te ve yoˬ.
47009012	Awˬ lawn k'o, shu hta‸ ga piˇ ve kanˉ chi lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ loˍ ve hk'e hk'a biˇ ga piˇ ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, shu G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ maˇ maˇ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ htawˇ te ve yoˬ.
47009013	Shu hta‸ ga piˇ ve kanˉ chi awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ leh awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai ve pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ ka‸, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui maˇ chaweh tanˇ piˇ ve pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
47009014	G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ bon na‸ laˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ jaˇ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon bon lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
47009015	Ca k'oˆ maˇ peuˬ ve la‸ shawnˍ G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o.
47010001	Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ awˬ to lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, yawˇ ve nyi ma da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ mehˆ hpfuhˇ tawˍ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ lehˍ taˍ leh, ngaˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ ngaˬ yoˬ.
47010002	Ngaˬ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ te ve hk'e te ve chaw hpeh‸ ve teh‸ shawˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ te maˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, chi taw taw nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ maˇ g'a te maˍ laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
47010003	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve htawˇ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ma‸ bawˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui te ve maˇ heˆ.
47010004	Ngaˬ hui ma‸ bawˆ ve la‸ caˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve la‸ caˉ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ta‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ awˬ pon, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve la‸ caˉ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47010005	Tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ tawˍ taˍ tsuhˇ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui yuˬ baˬ hpaˆ baˬ ve yoˬ. Dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ maˬ le le hta‸ ngaˬ hui hpeh yuˬ leh, Hkri‸ hta‸ na yuˬ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
47010006	Nawˬ hui na yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ biˇ la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hui gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ peuˬ.
47010007	Nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ cawˬ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi sheˍ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to Hkri‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ shawˍ taˍ ve k'o, yawˇ Hkri‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hk'e ngaˬ hui htawˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
47010008	Nawˬ hui hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hui hta‸ aˉ yaˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ awˬ pon pe‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Hk'e te leh, aˉ yaˇ chi awˬ lawn ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a cawˇ cawˇ k'oˆ maˇ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
47010009	Ngaˬ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ kawˆ tuˬ ngaˬ te gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
47010010	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yawˇ ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ kanˇ paˆ uiˍ leh hehnˇ jaˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ awˬ to chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ leh, yawˇ k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47010011	Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ htawˇ chi hk'e te ve yoˬ teh‸, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ piˇ-oˆ.
47010012	A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui awˬ to yawˇ hui hta‸ tehˆ da‸ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui te maˇ haˆ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ tehˆ da‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ shuˍ da‸ ve hta‸ nyi ve pa taw, yawˇ hui cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47010013	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ ponˬ k'oˆ leuˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ kanˉ te kuiˬ pehˬ laˇ ve hk'e ceh ngaˬ hui te tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui htawˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ pehˬ laˇ ve kanˉ te kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e taˍ ve yoˬ.
47010014	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ pehˬ laˇ ve kanˉ te kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e taˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve kanˉ te kuiˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui te ponˬ te leuˉ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ nawˬ hui geh hk'a gaˬ awˉ lawˉ ca maˍ la ve lehˬ ngaˬ hui yoˬ.
47010015	Shu te taˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ ngaˬ hui te ve hk'e te leh, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'aˇ hte‸ ca k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ uiˍ la maˇ la ve hk'e, nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ pehˬ laˇ taˍ ve kanˉ te kuiˬ htawˇ leuˉ leh uiˍ la k'ehˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ law ve yoˬ.
47010016	Chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ coˇ paˉ lo hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ hui ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ g'a maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, shu kanˉ te kuiˬ lo shu te taˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui ca k'oˆ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
47010017	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ ve chaw lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ nyi ma uiˍ leh k'oˆ loˬ.
47010018	Awˬ lawn k'o, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve chaw hta‸ G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ awˬ pon Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve chaw hta‸ ceh tiˉ G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh ve yoˬ.
47011001	Cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ a ciˉ bvuh‸ laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ tuˬ ngaˬ dawˇ law ve yoˬ. Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na nawˬ hui a ciˉ yeunˇ hkanˍ laˇ sheˍ.
47011002	G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ sheˉ lai ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ sheˉ lai ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ hpawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hta‸ caˉ da‸ piˇ peuˬ.
47011003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, vuiˬ lehˬ heˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Eˇva‸ hta‸ beˬ yuˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui ve dawˇ hk'aˇ luˬ k'ai leh, Hkri‸ hta‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ mehˉ k'ai puiˉ-aˆ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ.
47011004	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui geh laˬ leh, ngaˬ maˍ ve Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn hta‸ maˇ maˍ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ lawn maˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui g'a peuˬ ve awˬ ha maˇ heˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ha hta‸ g'a ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ peuˬ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˇ heˆ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ ve law.
47011005	Ngaˬ lehˬ, uiˍ ve mvuh ve tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ chehˇ ve teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ ve yoˬ.
47011006	Tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ maˇ puiˉ ve htawˇ, cuˇ yiˍ hpawˇ ngaˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ chi hk'e puiˉ ve yoˬ teh‸, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ.
47011007	Nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ piˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ nehˬ piˇ lawˬ leh, awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ yuˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ venˇ baˆ te ve leh laˇ.
47011008	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon kanˉ te hpeh‸ tuˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ geh hpu hta‸ ngaˬ ha‸ yuˬ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve mawˇ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ ve hk'e yoˬ.
47011009	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ leh teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ loˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ maˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo laˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hk'a loˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ g'a sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ ngaˬ te taˍ leh, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hpawˇ htawˇ ngaˬ te tuˬ yoˬ.
47011010	Hkri‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve hk'e, ngaˬ chi hk'e nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ leh k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸, Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ tawˍ taˍ maˇ g'a.
47011011	Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw le. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ ha‸ ve pa taw laˇ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47011012	Ponˬ la htaˇ ngaˬ te chehˇ ve hk'e, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hpawˇ htawˇ k'aw‸ te k'ai tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ k'oˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ chi hk'e te ve yoˬ.
47011013	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'e te leh, heˍ puiˉ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47011014	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, anˇ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Saˍtanˍ ka‸ awˬ g'euˆ ba ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te puiˉ ve yoˬ.
47011015	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve hk'e te ve k'o, anˇ tuˬ uiˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ, Yawˇ hui kanˉ te ve hk'e, awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ k'o g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
47011016	Ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ shaˍ. Ngaˬ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ taˇ dawˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui chi hk'e dawˇ ve ka‸, ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ a ciˉ yaw hpeh‸ tuˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hk'e ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ sheˍ.
47011017	(Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ tcuh laˇ leh k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hk'e, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ chaweh te leh k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
47011018	Chaw laiˉ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ awˬ lawn nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.)
47011019	Nawˬ hui cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve pa taw, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ nawˬ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a yeunˇ hkanˍ ve law.
47011020	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ ceˬ te tcuh ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ hiˉ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ heˍ caˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ hta ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47011021	Nawˬ hui hta‸ oˇ hk'e te laˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, ya‸ taw ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ g'a k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ awˬ lawn hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ haˆ ve k'o, ngaˬ htawˇ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ k'oˆ haˆ ve yoˬ. (Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hk'e ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
47011022	Yawˇ hui Heˍbrehˇ chaw hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Ngaˬ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Ngaˬ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Ngaˬ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47011023	Yawˇ hui Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve laˇ. Yawˇ hui a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh ngaˬ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. (Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, chaw g'uˇ hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.) Shu a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh ngaˬ kanˉ te ve yoˬ. Shu a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ jaw ve yoˬ. G'aw maˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ dawˆ laˇ jaw‸ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ jaw ve yoˬ. Suh paˇ neˇ ve ka‸ laiˉ pawˆ ngaˬ cawˬ jaw ve yoˬ.
47011024	Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ngaˬ hta‸ shehˆ chi k'awˇ hk'e jaw‸ laˇ ve, ngaˇ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ jaw peuˬ.
47011025	Shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ gawˇ taˬ jaw‸ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ leh, haˉ pui baˬ laˇ ve hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ g'a hkanˍ jaw peuˬ. Shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ haw lo‸ k'oˍ luˬ k'ai ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ jaw peuˬ. Teˇ nyi teˇ haˉ laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ g'a chehˇ jaw peuˬ.
47011026	Laiˉ pawˆ ngaˬ ca te toˇ jaw peuˬ. Iˉ kaˆ lawˬ hta‸ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, Chaw hk'awˇ hta‸ kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hta‸ kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, venˇ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˆ tuˬ cawˬ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ g'a hpuˇ jaw peuˬ.
47011027	Kanˉ te hkeu‸ leh heuˬ jaˇ ve, laiˉ pawˆ maˇ g'a zuh‸ ve, awˍ meu‸ ve leh iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve, laiˉ pawˆ caˇ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve, kaˆ ve leh veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ cawˬ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ jaw peuˬ.
47011028	Awˬ ceuˬ chi ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon dawˇ haˍ dawˇ hkiˉ ve teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, teˇ nyi le le ngaˬ hta‸ nyiˉ tiˍ taˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47011029	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ htawˇ awˬ g'aˇ maˇ nuˇ leh laˇ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ya‸ k'ai ve k'o, ngaˬ maˇ hpeh‸ bawˬ leh laˇ.
47011030	Ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ g'a yaw ve k'o, ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ceh, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ yaw tuˬ yoˬ.
47011031	Ngaˬ heˍ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸, co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ bon uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47011032	Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ tuˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ Aˍreˍtaˆ awˬ hawˉ ve mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ lehˬ, Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ hta‸ shaw tcuh taˍ ve yoˬ.
47011033	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˉ puˍ lu awˬ hk'aw keu leh, lanˇ venˇ yehˬ miˉ ehˉ awˬ hpe‸ lo ngaˬ hta‸ hpehˇ ya‸-e laˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, mvuhˇ miˬ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ g'a ponˬ ve yoˬ.
47012001	Ngaˬ lehˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ leh awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo maw laˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ngaˬ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ shaˍ.
47012002	Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ ve teˇ chi awˇ hk'aw‸ htaˇ mvuhˇ naw ma shehˆ htai‸ teˇ htai‸ hk'a gaˬ chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. (Awˬ to taˆ-e ve leh naˍ, awˬ ha ceh tiˉ taˆ-e ve leh naˍ, ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ. G'uiˬ sha ceh tiˉ shiˍ ve yoˬ.)
47012003	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Paˍraˍdiˇsuˆ lo chiˇ taˆ-e ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. (Awˬ to taˆ-e ve leh naˍ, awˬ ha ceh tiˉ taˆ-e ve leh naˍ, ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ. G'uiˬ sha ceh tiˉ shiˍ ve yoˬ.)
47012004	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸ k'oˆ maˇ keunˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
47012005	Chaw oˇ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ shaˍ. Ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ to awˬ lawn nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ k'oˆ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
47012006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ gaˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ te ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, ngaˬ k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chi nyiˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ awˬ lawn maˇ g'a dawˇ nyi tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ to awˬ lawn nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'oˆ.
47012007	Uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ leuˉ leh maˇ g'a taˍ uiˍ tuˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ aˉ chuˇ teˇ maˬ tcuhˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Aˉ chuˇ chi lehˬ, Saˍtanˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ awˬ to hta‸ leuˉ leh maˇ g'a taˍ uiˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47012008	Aˉ chuˇ chi hta‸ ngaˬ g'a ponˬ tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ shehˆ pawˆ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
47012009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ ve awˬ bon lehˬ, nawˬ awˬ pon law‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ kaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve kanˇ paˆ biˇ la ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ ve kanˇ paˆ lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo g'a cawˬ taˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn hta‸ leuˉ leh nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ha lehˬ ha k'a k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
47012010	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Hkri‸ awˬ pon g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ laˇ ve, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve, fawˉ ve mehˍ ve, tu‸ jaˇ hkanˍ jaˇ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ ha lehˬ ha k'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
47012011	Ngaˬ lehˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ chi hk'e hpeh‸ la piˇ lawˬ peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh laˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ maˇ hpeh‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ chehˇ.
47012012	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ te maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ te maˍ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
47012013	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a hu ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ taˍ uiˍ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ taˍ uiˍ ve, aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ le. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a hu ve, ngaˬ ve ya‸ kuiˬ chi hta‸ a ciˉ hpehˇ laˇ-oˆ.
47012014	Shehˆ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ nawˬ hui geh laˬ tuˬ chi beu‸ ngaˬ gu taˍ leh, chi teˇ pawˆ ka‸ nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ g'a hu tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ve mawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ ca ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ ca ve yoˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ pa awˬ e awˬ pon mawˇ jeˬ g'a shaw hpoˆ taˍ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ pa awˬ e teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon mawˇ jeˬ g'a shaw hpoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
47012015	Nawˬ hui ve co ha awˬ pon ngaˬ ve mawˇ jeˬ g'a peuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ve awˬ to g'a luˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ha lehˬ ha k'a te tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ la ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ g'a i k'ai tuˬ ve leh laˇ.
47012016	Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a hu ve htawˇ, ngaˬ cuˇ yiˍ te leh heˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47012017	Nawˬ hui chehˇ kuiˬ lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ k'ai tcuh ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ ngaˬ heˍ yuˬ ve leh laˇ.
47012018	Tiˇtuˆ nawˬ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai tuˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ leh, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ geh k'ai tcuh ve yoˬ. Tiˇtuˆ lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ ve leh laˇ. Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh kanˉ te ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ ya‸ k'aw teˇ caˆ tiˉ toˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
47012019	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui awˬ to awˬ pon k'aw‸ yaw hk'aw‸ chehˇ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui chi maw maw dawˇ chehˇ ve leh laˇ. Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui uiˍ la yeˬ la tuˬ awˬ pon chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ.
47012020	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve hk'e nawˬ hui maˇ hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui dawˇ law taˍ ve hk'e ngaˬ htawˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ ve, hkawehˉ da‸ ve, nyi ma zuhˆ ve, pehˬ da‸ hpaˆ da‸ ve, hk'aiˉ da‸ ve, hk'awˇ deˇ ve, nyi ma uiˍ ve leh, duiˆ-ehˍ shaˇ-ehˍ te ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui te chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ hehˉ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ.
47012021	Nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hta‸ nyiˉ ya‸ laˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ, cha‸ chiˆ ve hta‸ te ve, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve leh, te ponˬ te leuˉ ve hta‸ te ve chaw laiˉ g'aˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ hehˉ teh‸ dawˇ hkiˉ ve yoˬ.
47013001	Chi teˇ pawˆ ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh laˬ tuˬ ve lehˬ, shehˆ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hk'a k'oˆ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ ti cawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o shehˆ g'aˇ g'aˇ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
47013002	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ ca guiˇ la htaˇ ngaˬ k'oˆ laˇ taˍ ve hk'e, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ ngaˬ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ venˇ baˆ te ve chaw hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, te ya‸ chehˇ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ gaˬ la ve k'o, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
47013003	Hkri‸ ngaˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh tawˇ yaw chehˇ ve leh naˍ teh‸, nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ shiˍ gaˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ ponˬ piˇ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ te tuˬ, Hkri‸ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
47013004	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo g'a hkanˍ suh ve htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui htawˇ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh te‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
47013005	Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ chehˇ-aw laˇ, maˇ yeˬ chehˇ laˇ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ hk'a deh‸ tehˆ nyi lawˇ nyi sheˍ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, lawˇ nyi ve hta‸ hkanˍ maˇ g'a ve chaw hpeh‸ ve k'o, Hkri‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ chehˇ.
47013006	Lawˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui lehˬ hkanˍ g'a ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ law ve yoˬ.
47013007	Haiˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'a te tuˬ, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Lawˇ nyi ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui hkanˍ g'a peuˬ ve teh‸ ngaˬ hui tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ. ngaˬ hui hkanˍ maˇ g'a ve chaw hta‸ shuˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ da‸ ve hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47013008	Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ tuˬ ngaˬ hui te‸ chiˉ te maˇ hpeh‸. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon ceh tiˉ ngaˬ hui te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
47013009	Ngaˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve pa taw ngaˬ hui ha lehˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui da‸ la biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
47013010	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hehnˇ chaweh maˇ g'a yehˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve aˉ yaˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
47013011	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ leh ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Da‸ la biˇ la piˇ-oˆ. Dawˇ sha gaˇ sha cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ-o‸. Cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, ha‸ pehnˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ leh cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
47013012	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo boˆ nu da‸ leh la‸ sheh caˉ da‸-o‸.
47013013	Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
47013014	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ, G'uiˬ sha ve ha‸ ve pehnˇ ve leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ awˬ chawˇ te da‸ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
48001001	Ngaˬ tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve Pawˇlu‸ leh ngaˬ geh chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Gaˍlaˍtiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
48001002	Ngaˬ tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve lehˬ, chaw yaˇ geh lo g'a ve maˇ heˆ. Chaw yaˇ hta‸ pa taw hpeh‸ la ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ leh yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ pa taw hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
48001003	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
48001004	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e, haiˬ ve chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui awˬ pon yawˇ awˬ to chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
48001005	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
48001006	Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ haˆ haˆ baˬ taˉ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
48001007	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ cawˬ tehˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te laˇ leh, Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ yuˬ hpfuhˆ gaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
48001008	Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve bon hkawˇ ngaˬ hui maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve k'o, hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ piˇ-oˆ.
48001009	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ shaˍ. Nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ peuˬ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve bon hkawˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve k'o, hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ piˇ-oˆ.
48001010	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, chaw yaˇ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ ngaˬ te ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ ngaˬ te ve laˇ. Chaw yaˇ hui nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ngaˬ ca ve laˇ. Chaw yaˇ hui nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ngaˬ ca chehˇ sheˍ ve hk'e k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
48001011	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ geh lo tawˆ la ve maˇ heˆ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ tcuh laˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
48001012	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ geh lo ngaˬ g'a ve maˇ heˆ. Shu ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ngaˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve pa taw g'a ve yoˬ.
48001013	Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chehˇ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e te ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui kaˇ jaw ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ ngaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ fawˉ mehˍ leh, luˬ k'ai tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
48001014	Ngaˬ ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui teh taˉ laˇ ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tuˬ ngaˬ nyi ma pfuhˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ve chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo a sha‸ ngaˬ hk'e ceh ve chaw maˇ-awˍ ve a‸ kehˉ Yuˇda‸ awˬ liˇ hta‸ ngaˬ te ve yoˬ.
48001015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ maˇ paw la sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ laˇ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ,
48001016	yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu ngaˬ hta‸ yawˇ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, chaw yaˇ geh ngaˬ ca jehˬ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
48001017	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ tcuh yaˇ maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ htaˇ tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ taˍ ve, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh ngaˬ maˇ k'ai. Aˍraˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ k'ai leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Daˍmaˍsehˆ venˇ lo k'aw‸ la ve yoˬ.
48001018	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, shehˆ hk'aw‸ gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Keˍhpaˆ geh ngaˬ ca guiˇ-e tuˬ Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo k'ai leh, yawˇ geh teˇ chi ngaˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48001019	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Yaˍkoˆ hta‸ maˇ heˆ k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ maˇ mawˬ.
48001020	(Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ heˍ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
48001021	Oˇ ve hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Suˇriˆ leh Kiˇliˇkiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo ngaˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
48001022	Oˇ htaˇ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw sheˍ.
48001023	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ laˇ jaw ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, oˇ htaˇ yawˇ te luˬ chehˇ ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ chi beu‸ bon maˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, k'oˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
48001024	Ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
48002001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, teˇ chi awˇ hk'aw‸ gaˬ htaˇ, ngaˬ Tiˇtuˆ hta‸ shiˍ veu leh, Baˍnaˍbaˆ geh Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lo teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'ai ve yoˬ.
48002002	G'uiˬ sha hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ te peuˬ ve kanˉ leh chi beu‸ te chehˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hk'e leˇ maˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ yawˇ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. (Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.)
48002003	Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh k'ai ve Tiˇtuˆ lehˬ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, shu yawˇ hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ tcuh.
48002004	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ ve ponˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ jaˆ nyi leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ awˬ ceˬ te tcuh laˇ tuˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teh‸ k'oˆ ve ka‸, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi maˇ heˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui geh lo hk'awˇ lo‸ la ve yoˬ.
48002005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ yawˇ hui ve hkawˇ hta‸ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ na.
48002006	Awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ maˇ htehˍ laˇ. (Yawˇ hui awˬ hoˉ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hui hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ dawˇ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ chaw yaˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi.)
48002007	Yawˇ hui te‸ chiˉ maˇ htehˍ laˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha Peˍtruˆ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
48002008	(Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ Peˍtruˆ hta‸ aˉ yaˇ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ aˉ yaˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.)
48002009	Ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, nyi ma yeˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpaˍ, Yaˍkoˆ, Keˍhpaˆ leh Yoˇhanˬ hui lehˬ, Baˍnaˍbaˆ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ la‸ sha paˉ la‸ sheh caˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e te ve lehˬ, awˬ chawˇ te da‸ ve awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui geh k'ai leh, yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw hui geh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ da‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48002010	Haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ, chi teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ hui lawˬ hkawˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e te tuˬ ngaˬ htawˇ te gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
48002011	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Keˍhpaˆ lehˬ, Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ te maˇ cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve pa taw, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ mehˆ hpfuhˇ tawˍ da‸ taˍ leh deˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
48002012	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yaˍkoˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ maˇ gaˬ la sheˍ htaˇ, Keˍhpaˆ lehˬ, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh awˍ caˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ moˍ hta‸ yawˇ kawˆ ve pa taw, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh, awˬ chawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ te ve yoˬ.
48002013	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Yuˇda‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh maˇ heˆ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ te ve pa taw, Baˍnaˍbaˆ ka‸ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
48002014	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh hteˇ lehˍ maˇ k'ai ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ Keˍhpaˆ hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve ka‸, Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ te leh buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ te ve k'o, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ te tuˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ nyiˉ te ve le teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
48002015	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, paw la htaˇ ka‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
48002016	Ngaˬ hui Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve ka‸, chaw teˇ g'aˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve pa taw maˇ heˆ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui htawˇ, Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ taˍ peuˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
48002017	Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ ngaˬ hui ca chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˆ la ve k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ venˇ baˆ awˬ pon kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve leh laˇ. Chi hk'e maˇ heˆ taˬ.
48002018	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hpaˆ baˬ peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ gu te ve k'o, ngaˬ te ya‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
48002019	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ hpawˇ lo g'a te‸ tuˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ hpawˇ lo, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ suh ve yoˬ.
48002020	Ngaˬ Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, chi beu‸ te‸ chehˇ ve lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ to maˇ heˆ, Hkri‸ ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ngaˬ a sha‸ te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ leh ngaˬ awˬ pon yawˇ awˬ to tanˇ peuˬ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ ngaˬ yonˍ ve pa taw te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
48002021	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ ngaˬ baˬ taˉ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la g'a ve hk'e k'o, Hkri‸ suh ve lehˬ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48003001	Cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve Gaˍlaˍtiˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh ve hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve htawˇ, a shu nawˬ hui hta‸ heˍ g'a ve le.
48003002	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e ceh tiˉ na nyi gaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a ve lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw laˇ.
48003003	Nawˬ hui chi taw taw cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ leh laˇ. Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui tanˬ te taˍ ve ka‸, chi beu‸ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ cuˇ leh te peuˬ piˇ tuˬ ve laˇ.
48003004	Chi taw taw tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'e leˇ hkanˍ peuˬ ve leh laˇ. Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve teh‸ ngaˬ maˇ dawˇ.
48003005	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ hui hta‸ Awˬ ha hpu pe‸ laˇ leh nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo anˇ tuˬ te tawˆ la shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te ve laˇ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui kaˇ leh yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ te ve laˇ.
48003006	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48003007	Hk'e te leh, yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ-o‸.
48003008	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ Li‸ hpu shiˍ taˍ mawˬ taˍ leh, Nawˬ hta‸ pa taw chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Liˬ hpu lehˬ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
48003009	Hk'e te leh, yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yonˍ puiˉ ve Aˍbraˍhanˍ geh teˇ geh awˬ bon g'a ve yoˬ.
48003010	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, hkeu ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ te tcuhˉ taˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48003011	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la g'a tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸, hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw lehˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
48003012	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te ve chaw lehˬ, oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ g'a te k'ai tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48003013	Suhˆ cehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ g'a hkanˍ suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Hkri‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve pa taw, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lo laˬ ve hkeu ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
48003014	Hk'e te leh, Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve awˬ bon Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la leh, yawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ ve lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
48003015	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chaw yaˇ hui g'a hpuˇ g'a mawˬ jaw ve tawˇ pa haˉ ngaˬ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ shaˍ. Chaw yaˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ te leh li‸ hk'a deh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ peuˬ ve k'o, chaw yaˇ hui te ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ baˬ taˉ maˇ hpeh‸. K'aw‸ htehˍ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ te maˇ hpeh‸.
48003016	Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ leh yawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, laiˉ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ceh tiˉ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Hkri‸ yoˬ.
48003017	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˇ ha shehˆ chi hk'aw‸ gaˬ htaˇ, yawˇ piˇ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ oˇ ve hta‸ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ leh te luˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
48003018	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ shinˉ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve k'o, ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ caˉ da‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ awˬ shinˉ piˇ ve yoˬ.
48003019	Hk'e te leh, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le. Ka ti‸ hta‸ g'a tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ gaˬ la sheˍ ve ceh ceh, te ya‸ te jiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ htehˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ cuˇ leh, awˬ kaˍ te shehˍ hpaˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo piˇ ve yoˬ.
48003020	Awˬ kaˍ te shehˍ hpaˇ cawˬ ve k'o, teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ cawˬ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48003021	Hk'e te leh, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ cawˇ da‸ leh tawˍ taˍ ve laˇ. Oˇ hk'e maˇ heˆ taˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, piˇ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ hpeh‸ ve hk'e k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw awˬ tehˬ awˬ na cawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
48003022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e g'a tuˬ, Li‸ hpu lehˬ awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ awˬ hawˉ lo teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
48003023	Yonˍ ve oˇ ve maˇ gaˬ la sheˍ htaˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo hpeh taˍ leh shaw taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ leh, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ hui chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48003024	Hk'e te leh, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ Hkri‸ gaˬ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48003025	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ gaˬ la peuˬ ve pa taw, nyi ha‸ shaˉ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ hui maˇ k'aw‸ chehˇ.
48003026	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48003027	Nawˬ hui Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ yuˬ peuˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, Hkri‸ hta‸ veu‸ deh taˍ peuˬ.
48003028	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, Yuˇda‸ chaw leh Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ ceˬ leh ponˬ ve chaw maˇ cawˬ. Hawˉ hk'aˆ leh yaˇ miˇ maˇ cawˬ.
48003029	Nawˬ hui lehˬ Hkri‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ leh, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e, awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004001	Ngaˬ k'oˆ gaˇ ve lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ shinˉ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, yawˇ yaˇ ehˉ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, awˬ ceˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ peun da‸.
48004002	Awˬ pa tinˍ taˍ ve awˬ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, yaˇ ehˉ lehˬ shaw shehˍ hpaˇ leh ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48004003	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui yaˇ ehˉ hpeh‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ g'a te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
48004004	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo hpeh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ vuiˬ hk'aw‸ piˇ leh, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, awˬ yanˇ biˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
48004005	Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ geh paw la leh, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo paw la ve yoˬ.
48004006	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo peu laˇ leh, Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, Aˍbaˆ A pa-oˬ teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
48004007	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ lehˬ awˬ ceˬ maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸. Nawˬ lehˬ awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ pa taw awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004008	Nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shiˍ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve g'uiˬ sha teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo nawˬ hui awˬ ceˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
48004009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, awˬ tehˬ k'oˆ k'o G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e ka‸, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ leh haˍ g'awˇ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'o‸-e ve le. Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ hui awˬ ceˬ k'aw‸ te gaˇ ve le.
48004010	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ awˬ nyi, ha pa, awˬ tcuhˉ awˬ yanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ ce kan chehˇve law leˇ.
48004011	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon g'aˇ hte‸ g'aˇ na te ve lehˬ, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ hehˉ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ.
48004012	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ te‸ chiˉ maˇ te ya‸ laˇ jaw.
48004013	Ngaˬ awˬ to naˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˉ lawˉ teˇ pawˆ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ g'a maˍ laˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
48004014	Ngaˬ awˬ to naˬ ve chi lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon hkanˍ haˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ te, ngaˬ hta‸ maˇ baˬ taˉ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
48004015	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui ha lehˬ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ chi beu‸ hk'aˬ lo mehˉ k'ai ve le. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ hta‸ k'ehˉ tawˆ leh ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'e k'o, pe‸ laˇ peuˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004016	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ k'oˆ laˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ la ve laˇ.
48004017	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon g'aˇ hte‸ awˬ bon te laˇ ve htawˇ, da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ dawˇ law leh te ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hui awˬ pon nawˬ hui g'aˇ hte‸ awˬ bon te piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui dawˇ law ve pa taw, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo chehˇ tcuh gaˇ ve yoˬ.
48004018	Da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon shu nawˬ hui hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ awˬ bon te laˇ ve lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ da‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ceh tiˉ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
48004019	Ngaˬ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Hkri‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ chehˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, yaˇ paw tuˬ naˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ g'a k'aw‸ hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
48004020	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ lawn dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve pa taw, chi beu‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh chehˇ gaˇ leh, ngaˬ k'oˆ hehnˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ pa gaˇ ve yoˬ.
