48004021	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ gaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ kaˇ laˇ. Ngaˬ hta‸ hto laˇ-oˆ.
48004022	Awˬ lawn k'o, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ ceˬ ma ve yaˇ hpeh‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ awˬ ceˬ ma maˇ heˆ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ ve yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004023	Awˬ ceˬ ma ve yaˇ paˍ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ pa taw paw la ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceˬ ma maˇ heˆ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ ve yaˇ paˍ lehˬ, ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo paw la ve yoˬ.
48004024	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ tehˆ nyi leh henˇ yuˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ oˇ ve nyiˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Siˉnaˆ hk'aw hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve Haˍgaˍraˆ yoˬ. Yawˇ yaˇ paw la piˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ la tuˬ awˬ pon paw la piˇ ve yoˬ.
48004025	Haˍgaˍraˆ lehˬ, Aˍraˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Siˉnaˆ hk'aw hpeh‸ leh, chi beu‸ cawˬ taˍ ve Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004026	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo cawˬ ve Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ lehˬ, awˬ ceˬ ma maˇ heˆ ve yaˇ miˇ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004027	Awˬ lawn k'o, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Yaˇ maˇ paw jaw ve chaw meh ma-oˬ, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Yaˇ paw tuˬ maˇ g'a hkanˍ ve yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, ha lehˬ leh g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ hpawˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ lehˬ, awˬ hpawˇ cawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ a‸ kehˉ awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ. teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48004028	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ Iˉcaˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004029	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ pa taw paw la ve yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw paw la ve yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chi beu‸ ka‸ oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48004030	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Li‸ hpu hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve le. Awˬ ceˬ ma leh yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceˬ ma ve yaˇ paˍ lehˬ, awˬ ceˬ ma maˇ heˆ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ ve yaˇ paˍ geh teˇ geh awˬ shinˉ hta‸ a ciˉ ka‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48004031	Hk'e te leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ awˬ ceˬ ma ve yaˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ ceˬ ma maˇ heˆ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ ve yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
48005001	Ngaˬ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ awˬ pon Hkri‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, hk'a deh‸ yeˬ chehˇ leh, awˬ ceˬ pfuhˇ ve ehˉ k'aweh‸ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ taˇ k'aw‸ pfuhˇ-oˆ.
48005002	Na sheˍ. Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ.
48005003	Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ shaˍ. Oˇ hk'e ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'a na yuˬ leh g'a te ve yoˬ.
48005004	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui hk'a dawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hkri‸ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ k'ai peuˬ. Awˬ bon hta‸ nawˬ hui shonˇ k'ai peuˬ.
48005005	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ dawˇ law ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
48005006	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ shoˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ. Yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yonˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
48005007	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ g'uiˇ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a na yuˬ tuˬ, a shu nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˍ taˍ laˇ ve le.
48005008	Nawˬ hui nyi ma chi hk'e hpfuhˆ k'ai tuˬ beˬ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
48005009	Diˇ a ciˉ ceh tiˉ ka‸ hkaoˍ monˇ teˇ diˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ciˇ la piˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
48005010	Ngaˬ dawˇ ve hk'e nawˬ hui ka‸ teˇ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ dawˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ yonˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te laˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
48005011	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ maˍ piˇ chehˇ sheˍ ve hk'e k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ sheˍ le. Oˇ hk'e maˍ piˇ ve k'o, la‸ ka hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ peuˬ.
48005012	Nawˬ hui hta‸ nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ shawˆ baˬ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
48005013	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ponˬ ve chi, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai tuˬ awˬ pon taˇ yehˇ. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ ceˬ te da‸-o‸.
48005014	Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ biˇ la peuˬ.
48005015	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ che‸ caˇ da‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ maˇ g'a te luˬ da‸ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o.
48005016	Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai-o. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh nawˬ hui maˇ k'ai taˬ.
48005017	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ heh‸ hkehnˉ leh, Awˬ ha hpu htawˇ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ heh‸ hkehnˉ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui te gaˇ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a te tuˬ, oˇ ve nyiˇ ceuˬ tanˬ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
48005018	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ k'aw‸ chehˇ.
48005019	Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la peuˬ.Kanˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve, cha‸ chiˆ ve hta‸ te ve, peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve hta‸ te ve,
48005020	shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve, neˇ te ve, canˇ da‸ ve, ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ ve, shu ve mawˇ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve, nyi ma zuhˆ ve, tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve, hpaˆ da‸ guiˇ da‸ ve, awˬ moˍ pehˬ da‸ ve,
48005021	hkawehˉ ve, tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve, ha lehˬ tuˬ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve, chi hk'e ve teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ. Chi hk'e te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e teh‸, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ngaˬ k'oˆ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, chi beu‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
48005022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Awˬ ha hpu ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve, ha lehˬ ve, dawˇ sha ve, dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ ve, ha k'aˉ ve, shu awˬ pon da‸ ve hta‸ te ve, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve,
48005023	nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ g'aˇ puiˉ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a te teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ maˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
48005024	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ hk'a caˉ da‸ ve chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve a loˍ leh sheˉ lai ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ geh la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ pehˍ peuˬ.
48005025	Ngaˬ hui Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo te‸ chehˇ ve k'o, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai-a veuˬ.
48005026	Ngaˬ hui nyi ma uiˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ da‸ tuˬ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hkawehˉ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui baˬ taˉ-a veuˬ.
48006001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ te chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ k'aw‸ da‸ la tuˬ, nawˬ hui co ha hpawˇ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ gu piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ htawˇ, beˬ ve lawˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ g'a k'ai tuˬ, nawˬ awˬ to shaˍ ti‸ te-o.
48006002	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ vuiˬ hta‸ ga pfuhˇ da‸-o‸. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, Hkri‸ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui te biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ.
48006003	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ te‸ chiˉ te maˇ puiˉ ve ka‸, ngaˬ lehˬ, cheuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ dawˇ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ heˍ ve yoˬ.
48006004	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, a shu yawˇ te taˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ dawˇ nyi tehˆ nyi-o. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, shu te taˍ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ awˬ to te taˍ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ yawˇ g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
48006005	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ vuiˬ hta‸ g'a pfuhˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
48006006	Bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a henˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ maˍ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ pehˬ piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
48006007	Taˇ dawˇ ya‸. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na te maˇ hpeh‸. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ yawˇ sheˍ ve hk'e yawˇ g'a g'eu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
48006008	A shu yawˇ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ sheˍ ve k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo luˬ ve sheˆ ve hta‸ g'a g'eu‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ sheˍ ve k'o, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ g'a g'eu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
48006009	Da‸ ve hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ maˇ nuˇ leh te-a veuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui nyi ma maˇ luˬ ve k'o, awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ hui g'a g'eu‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
48006010	Te hpeh‸ ve hk'e, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon da‸ ve hta‸ te-a veuˬ. Yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon leuˉ leh da‸ ve hta‸ te-a veuˬ.
48006011	Ngaˬ awˬ to ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve li‸ mehˆ chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ ve hta‸ nyi-o.
48006012	Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ nyi sha tuˬ te gaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ guiˬ meuˇ g'a shoˍ tuˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ nyiˉ leh te tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve la‸ ka hta‸ pa taw fawˉ ve mehˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ te ve ceh tiˉ yoˬ.
48006013	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ to ka‸ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a biˇ na yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ tuˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ tcuh gaˇ ve yoˬ.
48006014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ ngaˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve la‸ ka awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. La‸ ka oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ awˬ pon suh peuˬ leh, ngaˬ htawˇ miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ suh baˬ taˉ peuˬ.
48006015	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ shoˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ. Chaw awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ la ve teˇ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ.
48006016	Chaw awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ la ve awˬ liˇ chi awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ leh ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
48006017	Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hta‸ taˇ k'aw‸ sho‸ sha‸ laˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve awˬ to hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ maiˉ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
48006018	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
49001001	G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ yeˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ li‸ chi teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
49001002	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
49001003	Ngaˬ hui Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o. Yawˇ lehˬ, co ha hpawˇ awˬ pon mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ le le, Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ na‸ laˇ peuˬ.
49001004	Miˬ guiˬ maˇ te hpanˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ leh, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ da‸ kehˬ ve chaw leh, ya‸ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49001005	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ peuˬ. Chi hk'e te tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
49001006	Yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ha‸ jaˇ ve yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve yawˇ ve awˬ bon ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ pe‸ laˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49001007	Yaˇ hpu ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a peuˬ. Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ ve awˬ bon uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui ve ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ ve yoˬ.
49001008	Cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ leh shiˍ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon ngaˬ hui hta‸ shaˬ te shaˬ maˇ la tuˬ yawˇ te laˇ ve yoˬ.
49001009	Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ lehˬ faˉ taˍ ve ka‸, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ. Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ cuˇ leh chi hk'e te tuˬ yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
49001010	Hk'aˬ hk'e le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, awˬ yanˇ biˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha tcuhˉ da‸ caˉ da‸ piˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tcuh tuˬ yoˬ.
49001011	Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui htawˇ awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Yawˇ a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hui hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ peuˬ.
49001012	Hkri‸ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ dawˇ law taˍ ve ngaˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ ve awˬ pon, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ peuˬ.
49001013	Nawˬ hui htawˇ, nawˬ hui g'a ponˬ ve awˬ lawn ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ peuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ maiˉ taˍ peuˬ.
49001014	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ shinˉ hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'a biˇ g'a caˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ shiˍ tuˬ, chi beu‸ ka‸ yawˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ taˍ peuˬ. Chi lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui chiˇ mvuh tuˬ ve awˬ pon yoˬ.
49001015	Nawˬ hui Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ g'a kaˇ peuˬ.
49001016	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chiˇ mvuh leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
49001017	Ngaˬ bon lawˬ htaˇ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ, dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma leh hpeu‸ maˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
49001018	Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, dawˇ law tuˬ hk'aˬ hk'e cawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui g'a tuˬ ve awˬ shinˉ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve leh hk'aˬ ma awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a tawˍ lehˆ dawˇ mawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
49001019	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ hui hk'a yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon, k'oˆ maˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ jaˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ ve ka‸, ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ G'uiˬ sha te htaˇ, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ hehnˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ te ve yoˬ.
49001020	Kanˇ paˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo yawˇ hta‸ mui tcuh taˍ ve yoˬ.
49001021	Yawˇ lehˬ, uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ, awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ, jawˇ mawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ leh, awˬ meh hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ, chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ ca‸ na‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yawˇ uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve yoˬ.
49001022	Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo G'uiˬ sha teh taˍ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ hk'a caˉ da‸ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
49001023	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to yoˬ. Hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ biˇ ve hk'e, hk'a peu-eˬ k'aw‸ biˇ la tuˬ yawˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
49002001	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, te ya‸ kuiˬ leh venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo suh chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve yoˬ.
49002002	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve awˬ hk'aw lo, venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ hpe lo ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh ka‸ nawˬ hui k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, maˇ na yuˬ, ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te ve awˬ ha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49002003	Oˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh chehˇ leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ te ve pa taw, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ te gaˇ ve hk'e te ve maˇ k'oˆ, dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e te ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui te ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
49002004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ha k'aˉ puiˉ jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve ha‸ pehnˇ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve pa taw,
49002005	venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui suh taˍ ve htawˇ, Hkri‸ geh hk'a geh yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ la piˇ peuˬ. (G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a peuˬ.)
49002006	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ geh hk'a geh ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw mvuhˇ naw ma ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ geh mui tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ.
49002007	Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ bon hk'aˬ ma uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon te ve yoˬ.
49002008	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hk'aˇ nawˬ hui te ve pa taw g'a ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49002009	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nyi ma maˇ g'a uiˍ tuˬ, kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw g'a ve maˇ heˆ.
49002010	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ te taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve kanˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui te k'ai tuˬ awˬ pon awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha gu taˍ peuˬ.
49002011	Hk'e te leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hpeh‸ ve nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ Hkri‸ hta‸ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ. Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ la‸ sheh te ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49002012	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ awˬ moˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a pawnˇ da‸. Awˬ bon g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ huiˬ maˇ caˉ da‸. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo dawˇ law kuiˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ.
49002013	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui vuiˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw awˬ paˇ neˇ lo gaˬ la peuˬ.
49002014	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui chaw nyiˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ hpeh‸ la piˇ leh, ngaˬ hui awˬ kaˍ lo ko taˍ ve g'o‸ pa hta‸ yawˇ hpaˆ baˬ peuˬ.
49002015	Yawˇ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ leh tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te luˬ peuˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, chaw nyiˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw awˬ suhˉ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ la leh, cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
49002016	La‸ ka hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui chaw nyiˇ ceuˬ hta‸ awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ tuˬ awˬ pon htawˇ yawˇ te ve yoˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve pa taw, canˇ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
49002017	Hkri‸ laˬ leh, nawˬ hui vuiˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, neˇ kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ leh, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
49002018	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui chaw nyiˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ pa geh k'ai tuˬ, ya‸ k'aw cawˬ taˍ peuˬ.
49002019	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui lehˬ shu mvuhˇ miˬ ve chaw maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸. Hkehˉ chaw ka‸ maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸. Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui geh teˇ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ chehˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49002020	Yehˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo tcuh yaˇ hui leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hpeh‸ leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ to lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ ceˍ k'aweh‸ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49002021	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ yehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ caˉ da‸ taˍ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ kehˬ ve bon yehˬ lonˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ uiˍ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
49002022	G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yawˇ lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ yuˬ leh yehˬ oˇ ve hta‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
49003001	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ pon htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49003002	Nawˬ hui hta‸ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ g'a kaˇ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
49003003	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ a ciˉ bvuh‸ laˇ peuˬ ve hk'e, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49003004	Li‸ chi hta‸ nawˬ hui g'aw chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Hkri‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
49003005	Faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve awˬ lawn, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ piˇ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ kehˬ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49003006	Faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, chi hk'e yoˬ. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo Yuˇda‸ chaw hui geh teˇ geh awˬ shinˉ g'a caˇ ve, yawˇ hui geh awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ hpeh‸ la leh, piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh g'a ve yoˬ.
49003007	G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve awˬ bon ngaˬ hta‸ hk'e leˇ pe‸ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ te tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ chi hta‸ ngaˬ g'a ve lehˬ, yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ te laˇ ve hta‸ pa taw g'a ve yoˬ.
49003008	Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve biˇ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ leh awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bon maˍ piˇ tuˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ shu a‸ kehˉ i ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, awˬ bon chi yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
49003009	Peuˬ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ ve G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la biˇ la chehˇ ve awˬ lawn chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon ka‸, awˬ bon chi hta‸ ngaˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
49003010	Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw faˉ taˍ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ pa taw mvuhˇ hpe lo chehˇ ve uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hui hta‸ chi beu‸ shiˍ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, oˇ htaˇ yawˇ faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49003011	Chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ maˇ te hpanˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ dawˇ law taˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ te ve yoˬ.
49003012	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, maˇ kawˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49003013	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui nyi ma maˇ g'a luˬ tuˬ, ngaˬ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49003014	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ pa taw, Awˬ pa mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
49003015	Yawˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49003016	Ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve hk'e, yawˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo kanˇ paˆ hta‸ yawˇ yehˇ leh, awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ lawˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ,
49003017	nawˬ hui yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw Hkri‸ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ yeˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
49003018	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui awˬ geu tcuhˆ naˉ leh awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ yeˬ ve pa taw, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh Hkri‸ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve hk'aˬ ma k'ehˬ ve, hk'aˬ ma zuhˬ ve, hk'aˬ ma mvuh ve leh hk'aˬ ma naˉ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui htawˇ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ awˬ pon ka‸ ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
49003019	Chaw yaˇ shiˍ maˇ gaˬ ve Hkri‸ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ awˬ pon ka‸ ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e shiˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve biˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ.
49003020	G'uiˬ sha ve kanˇ paˆ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te chehˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui lawˬ ve leh dawˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh yawˇ maˇ chaweh te laˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
49003021	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, co co taiˍ taiˍ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
49004001	Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon htawnˍ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ ve ngaˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh ceh tiˉ te k'ai-o.
49004002	Hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ nehˬ ve, nyi ma nuˇ nuˇ nehˬ nehˬ ve, nyi ma dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ ve leh, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ yeunˇ hkanˍ da‸ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai-o.
49004003	Aˉ caˆ hkeh hpeh tsuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hpeh tsuh‸ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ cawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ g'aˇ hte‸ ta-o.
49004004	G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui dawˇ law kuiˬ teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ cawˬ tuˬ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ cawˬ leh, Awˬ ha hpu teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
49004005	Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ, baˆtiˆsaˬ teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
49004006	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ chehˇ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te leh, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49004007	Hkri‸ lehˬ yawˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ hk'aˬ ma pe‸ laˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le awˬ bon chi ma g'a peuˬ.
49004008	Hk'e te leh, Li‸ hpu hk'aw chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve, Yawˇ lehˬ mvuh kuiˬ lo taˆ-e ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ yawˇ hpeh veu leh, chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49004009	Yawˇ taˆ-e ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ miˬ guiˬ awˬ hawˉ teˇ htai‸ lo yawˇ ya‸-e taˍ peuˬ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
49004010	Ya‸-e ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ biˇ la piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, mvuhˇ nawˬ ma hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ taˆ-e ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49004011	Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, shu awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ to uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
49004012	La‸ shawnˍ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ tcuh yaˇ te tuˬ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ bon maˍ paˍ te tuˬ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ paˍ te tuˬ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ paˍ te tuˬ, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ te tuˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49004013	Ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ shiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh, uiˍ la peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ biˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ hui htawˇ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ te laˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
49004014	Chi hk'e uiˍ la ve k'o, ngaˬ hui yaˇ ehˉ maˇ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ leh, la‸ lehnˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ cuˇ yiˍ te leh heˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ maˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ haw meuˆ chiˇ veu ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ choˬ hpawˇ oˇ hpawˇ meuˆ chiˇ veu g'a tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
49004015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yaw leh, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hk'a biˇ biˇ uiˍ la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ oˉ k'oˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49004016	Oˉ k'oˍ oˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve pa taw, awˬ to teˇ to hk'a peu-eˬ uiˍ la chehˇ leh, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ la chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ to oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ tcuhˉ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ pa taw, teˇ tawn leh teˇ tawn caˉ da‸ taˍ leh, awˬ hk'eun teˇ maˬ peuˬ teˇ maˬ a shu yawˇ ve kanˉ cawˬ ve hk'e te ve pa taw, awˬ to oˇ ve uiˍ la ve yoˬ.
49004017	Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ leh shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ te ve hk'e, nawˬ hui taˇ k'aw‸ te. Yawˇ hui dawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
49004018	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, nyi ma heh leh te‸ chiˉ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui shiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ naˆ ho‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ k'ai leh, G'uiˬ sha ve te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ caˉ da‸.
49004019	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, ya‸ taw puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ leh, cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ te gaˇ jaˇ leh, peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve hta‸ te tuˬ yawˇ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
49004020	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, Hkri‸ hta‸ oˇ hk'e g'a henˇ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
49004021	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh g'a henˇ taˍ ve k'o, haiˬ ve oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a henˇ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
49004022	Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ piˍ hta‸ k'ehˆ baˬ taˉ-oˆ. Nyi ma awˬ piˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui te chehˇ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˉ da‸ leh, ya‸ k'ai tuˬ te puiˉ ve sheˉ lai ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ.
49004023	Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ hk'aˇ awˬ suhˉ cawˬ la piˇ-oˆ.
49004024	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hteˇ ve cawˇ ve leh da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha hpanˍ taˍ ve nyi ma awˬ suhˉ hta‸ veu‸ deh-o.
49004025	Hk'e te leh, heˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, teˇ g'aˇ le le a shu yawˇ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ceh tiˉ yaw da‸-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ caˉ da‸ taˍ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49004026	Nawˬ hui nyi ma zuhˆ ve htawˇ, venˇ baˆ taˇ te. Mvuhˇ nyi maˇ k'ehˬ sheˍ htaˇ, nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ mehˉ k'ai piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
49004027	Neˇ haiˬ kanˉ te hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ a hkaw-anˬ taˇ piˇ.
49004028	Shu ve mawˇ hta‸ hk'awˇ jaw ve chaw taˇ k'aw‸ hk'awˇ loˬ. Loˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ ga piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ sheh yehˇ leh da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te-o.
49004029	Nawˬ hui ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo cha‸ chiˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ peu-eˍ ka‸ taˇ tawˆ la piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, g'a kaˇ ve chaw hui awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ tuˬ, shu loˍ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ ve tawˇ ceh tiˉ yaw leh, shu hta‸ uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ puiˉ ve da‸ ve tawˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ yaw-o.
49004030	G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ taˇ dawˇ haˍ piˇ. Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ laˇ peuˬ.
49004031	Shu hta‸ nyi ma naˬ ve, shu hta‸ beu‸ ve, shu hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ ve, shu hta‸ deˇ da‸ ya‸ da‸ ve leh, shu hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve, chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ-oˆ. Shu hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te gaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ htawˇ baˬ taˉ-oˆ.
49004032	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ da‸ ve hta‸ te da‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha k'aˉ da‸-o‸. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ peuˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ venˇ baˆ hpehˇ da‸-o‸.
49005001	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ha‸ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve hk'e, yawˇ te ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te-o.
49005002	Hkri‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai-o. Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve pa taw, awˬ shaˉ hawnˉ ve tanˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tanˇ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ ve awˬ to G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
49005003	Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve, cha‸ chiˆ ve hk'a peu-eˬ ve leh, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ yaw da‸ ve ceh ka‸ taˇ te. Hkri‸ yaˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ maˇ keunˍ ve yoˬ.
49005004	Cha‸ chiˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh baˇ da‸ g'uiˬ da‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ, tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ maˇ keunˍ. Chiˇ mvuh ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ yaw-o.
49005005	Awˬ lawn k'o, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw, maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve chaw leh, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ leh G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ shinˉ maˇ g'a ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. (Shu ve mawˇ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve chaw lehˬ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.)
49005006	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yaw leh nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la ve yoˬ.
49005007	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ chawˇ taˇ te da‸.
49005008	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˉ lawˉ htaˇ naˆ ho‸ lehˍ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49005009	Awˬ g'euˆ yaˇ hk'e te k'ai-o. (Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ g'euˆ ve awˬ shiˍ lehˬ, da‸ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ leh, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.)
49005010	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ nyi ma cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ la tuˬ te-o.
49005011	Awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ ve, naˆ hoˆ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a ciˉ ka‸ taˇ te. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, kanˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve ya‸ kuiˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ tawˆ la piˇ-oˆ.
49005012	Awˬ lawn k'o, baˬ kuiˬ lo yawˇ hui te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui tawˇ yaw ve ceh ka‸ ya‸ taw tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
49005013	Ya‸ kuiˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ tawˆ la piˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ pa taw hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ, awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49005014	Hk'e te leh, chi hk'e k'oˆ taˍ ve, Zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve chaw-oˬ, nawˇ la-o. Suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tuˬ la-o. Hkri‸ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ g'euˆ ba laˇ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
49005015	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e dawˇ ve te ve hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ hk'a deh‸ taˍ-o‸. Cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hui hk'e taˇ te. Cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hui hk'e te chehˇ-oˆ.
49005016	Chi beu‸ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ haiˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, awˬ yanˇ hta‸ vuiˬ hk'aw‸ leh hk'a deh‸ yehˇ-oˆ.
49005017	Chi hta‸ pa taw, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve a loˍ hk'aˬ hk'e cawˬ ve hta‸ shiˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
49005018	A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve taˇ te. Oˇ hk'e te ve lehˬ, te ponˬ te leuˉ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ ha hpu hk'a biˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
49005019	Chiˇ mvuh ve tawˇ hkawˇ, k'a muiˬ hkawˇ leh co ha hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve k'a muiˬ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ da‸-o‸. Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh-o.
49005020	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ pon Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ-oˆ.
49005021	Hkri‸ hta‸ yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hawˉ lo teˇ g'aˇ hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ.
49005022	Awˬ miˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hawˉ lo nawˬ hui chehˇ ve hk'e, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ-oˆ.
49005023	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ moˍ ve oˉ k'oˍ hpeh‸ ve hk'e, awˬ hpawˇ htawˇ awˬ miˇ ma ve oˉ k'oˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ to hpeh‸ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49005024	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve hk'e, awˬ miˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ-oˆ.
49005025	Awˬ hpawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Hkri‸ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ moˍ hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ ha‸-o‸.
49005026	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ, iˉ kaˆ tsuhˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Hkri‸ lehˬ bon hkawˇ hta‸ yehˇ leh Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ tsuhˇ kehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e te tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ ve awˬ to chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
49005027	Yawˇ aˬ hto‸ ma te Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ tsuhˇ kehˬ piˇ le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, da‸ kehˬ ve, ya‸ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve, awˬ kuiˉ awˬ haiˇ hk'e ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ moˍ hpeh‸ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ moˍ oˇ ve yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ a‸ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ awˬ pon tsuhˇ kehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
49005028	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ hpawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ ha‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ. A shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
49005029	Awˬ lawn k'o, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ to hta‸ canˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ caˍ piˇ taw piˇ leh, hk'a deh‸ ha‸ shaˉ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ moˍ hta‸ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te ve yoˬ.
49005030	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ yawˇ awˬ to ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49005031	Chi hta‸ pa taw hawˉ hk'aˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˉ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, teˇ suhˍ teˇ shaˍ tiˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
49005032	Awˬ lawn chi lehˬ, naˉ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ leh yawˇ ve awˬ moˍ awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
49005033	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le htawˇ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, a shu yawˇ awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ ha‸-o‸. Awˬ miˇ ma htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan-o.
49006001	Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui ve awˬ pa awˬ e ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e te cawˇ ve yoˬ.
49006002	Teˇ ceuˬ le le nawˬ awˬ pon da‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo co zuhˬ ha zuhˬ cawˬ tuˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te-o.
49006003	(Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ awˉ lawˉ teˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.)
49006004	Awˬ pa teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ taˇ te. Nawˬ hui yaˇ hu duˬ hu ve awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ maˍ laˇ ve hk'e yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ leh sheh k'ai-o.
49006005	Vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Hkri‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve hk'e, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kawˆ cheˇ leh nyi ma teˇ hk'aˇ tiˉ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo na yuˬ-o‸.
49006006	Shu mehˆ mawˬ kuiˬ ceh te ve leh, chaw yaˇ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ceh te ve teˇ ceuˬ taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve hk'e, nyi ma pfuhˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ te-o.
49006007	Chaw yaˇ awˬ pon ceh te ve maˇ heˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon te ve hk'e, ha lehˬ, ha k'a te-o.
49006008	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, da‸ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, shu vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ponˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e k'aw‸ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ chehˇ-oˆ.
49006009	Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui htawˇ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ te piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui kawˆ tuˬ taˇ te. Yawˇ hui ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ leh nawˬ hui ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, shu ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi ve teh‸ shiˍ chehˇ-oˆ.
49006010	Awˬ leh meuˇ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yeˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
49006011	Neˇ haiˬ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'aˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ ve la‸ caˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui veu‸ deh leh pfuhˇ taˍ-o‸,
49006012	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ chaw yaˇ hta‸ g'a tawˍ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, kanˇ paˆ cawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi beu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ naˆ ho‸ ve hta‸ uˉ peunˍ chehˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ hpe lo chehˇ ve haiˬ ve awˬ ha teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, g'a tawˍ da‸ ve yoˬ.
49006013	Hk'e te leh, haiˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui yeˬ chehˇ hpeh‸ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ huˉ chehˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ ve la‸ caˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ-o‸.
49006014	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui ve caw‸ cehˍ nyi hta‸ tsuh‸ taˍ leh, nyi ma hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ nyi ma pui hta‸ htanˬ tuˬ veu‸ deh leh,
49006015	cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ tuˬ te hpeh‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw gu taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hkuiˉ nuˆ tcuhˉ ve hk'e tcuhˉ leh huˉ taˍ-o‸.
49006016	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ bawˆ laˇ ve aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ ve hkaˆ ce teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ g'a tuˬ, htanˬ tuˬ hta‸ pfuhˇ ve hk'e, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pfuhˇ taˍ-o‸.
49006017	Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve sho uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ taˍ leh, Awˬ ha hpu ve aˉ htaw hta‸ pfuhˇ taˍ-o‸. Aˉ htaw oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49006018	Hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ ve leh lawˬ hkawˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ te leh, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e bon lawˬ tuˬ awˬ g'aˇ maˇ nuˇ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon bon lawˬ leh shaw chehˇ-oˆ.
49006019	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve faˉ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ pon htawˇ bon lawˬ-o‸.
49006020	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve awˬ pon ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ tan te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, sho caˆ hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˍ piˇ keunˍ ve hk'e, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ngaˬ awˬ pon bon lawˬ-o‸.
49006021	Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ chehˇ leh hk'aˬ hk'e te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn nawˬ hui htawˇ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Tuˇhkiˆ lehˬ awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
49006022	Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ leh, yawˇ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
49006023	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ pe‸ laˇ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
49006024	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ha‸ tcuhˉ taˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ geh awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
50001001	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ leh Tiˆmoˉseˍ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Hpiˇliˇpiˆ venˇ hk'aw chehˇ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
50001002	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
50001003	Teˇ pawˆ le le ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
50001004	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ bon lawˬ htaˇ, teˇ pawˆ le le ha lehˬ ha k'a bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
50001005	Awˉ lawˉ teˇ nyi te leh chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ bvuhˬ k'ai tuˬ nawˬ hui ngaˬ geh teˇ geh awˬ chawˇ te ve pa taw, ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
50001006	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ ve kanˉ hta‸ tanˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ kanˉ oˇ ve hta‸ te peuˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ yonˍ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
50001007	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ lawn ngaˬ chi hk'e dawˇ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ geh teˇ geh G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
50001008	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ ma dawˇ nawˇ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50001009	Ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ shiˍ puiˉ tuˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ teˇ ceuˬ leh pehˬ puiˉ fuiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ shaˬ te shaˬ uiˍ la maˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
50001010	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ piˇ leh yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh piˇ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw g'a ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ shiˍ nawˬ hui hk'a biˇ cawˬ leh,
50001011	Hkri‸ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ pon da‸ ve kehˬ ve nyi ma cawˬ leh, venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ awˬ pon ka‸ ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
50001012	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ g'a hpuˇ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ bvuhˬ k'ai piˇ lawˬ ve law teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
50001013	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ awˬ pon ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ ve hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ lonˉ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ ta‸ hk'a peu-eˬ leh awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
50001014	Ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ ve pa taw, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi maˇ-awˍ ve lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma yeˬ leh, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui maˇ kawˆ.
50001015	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, hkawehˉ ve leh ya‸ da‸ gaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ awˬ lawn bon maˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, da‸ ve hta‸ tawˆ la tuˬ dawˇ law leh bon maˍ ve yoˬ.
50001016	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ lehˬ, cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ g'a yaw hk'aw‸ tuˬ ve awˬ pon ngaˬ choˬ kaˬ lo g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, da‸ ve hta‸ dawˇ law leh maˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ shiˍ leh ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon maˍ ve yoˬ.
50001017	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hkawehˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ awˬ lawn bon maˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hteˇ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ. Ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ ve hta‸ leuˉ leh tu‸ hkanˍ jaˇ la tuˬ yawˇ hui dawˇ taˍ leh, tanˬ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon maˍ ve yoˬ.
50001018	Hk'e te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e le. Heˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ awˬ lawn shu bon maˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ awˬ lawn shu bon maˍ chehˇ ve hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ha lehˬ leh, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hpawˇ htawˇ k'aw‸ ha lehˬ tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
50001019	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui bon lawˬ ve leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve Awˬ ha hpu ga laˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve chi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ g'a ponˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
50001020	Ngaˬ dawˇ law leh heuˆ gaˇ ve lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ ngaˬ maˇ g'a ya‸ taw leh, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ chi beu‸ htawˇ ngaˬ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve hk'a deh‸ cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ngaˬ te‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, suh ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ Hkri‸ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
50001021	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ suh ve k'o, ngaˬ awˬ pon awˬ yawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
50001022	Ngaˬ awˬ to te‸ chehˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, suh ve leh te‸ ve, hk'aˬ hk'e ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a leuˆ yuˬ tuˬ leh naˍ maˇ shiˍ.
50001023	Oˇ ve nyiˇ ceuˬ awˬ kaˍ lo ngaˬ chehˇ leh dawˇ maˇ tawˆ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ k'o‸-e leh Hkri‸ geh chehˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Chi lehˬ leuˉ leh da‸ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
50001024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ g'a chehˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon leuˉ leh awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ.
50001025	Ngaˬ chi hta‸ hk'a deh‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui uiˍ la leh ha lehˬ la tuˬ awˬ pon, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
50001026	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui leuˉ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
50001027	Hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui hk'a te hk'a dawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, ngaˬ gaˬ la leh nawˬ hui hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh, dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ hk'aˇ tiˉ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon nawˬ hui teˇ geh g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
50001028	Nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ kawˆ. Maˇ kawˆ ve k'o, yawˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ heˆ chi ve nyiˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui g'a luˬ g'a sheˆ ve awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a taˍ ve awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
50001029	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui g'a ve awˬ bon lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, yawˇ awˬ pon g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ htawˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
50001030	Ngaˬ g'a bawˆ da‸ ve leh nawˬ hui g'a bawˆ da‸ ve, teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, Bawˆ da‸ ve chi, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ te chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, chi beu‸ htawˇ ngaˬ te chehˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
50002001	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ g'a ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ chawˇ te ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, shu hta‸ dawˇ nyi leh ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve k'o,
50002002	ngaˬ ha lehˬ tuˬ ve biˇ la tuˬ chi hk'e te-o. Nawˬ hui nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ, ha‸ da‸ pehnˇ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ leh, nyi ma dawˇ hk'aˇ taˍ hk'aˇ teˇ hk'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
50002003	Hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ leh nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ a shu yawˇ awˬ to a‸ kehˉ shu hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh piˇ-oˆ.
50002004	A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh tiˉ taˇ dawˇ nyi. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, shu hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ dawˇ nyi-o.
50002005	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ nyi ma taˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ taˍ-o‸.
50002006	Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ vawˆ taˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ maˇ dawˇ.
50002007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ k'ehˆ teh taˉ leh, awˬ ceˬ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ deh leh, chaw yaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
50002008	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ chaw yaˇ hpeh‸ tehˬ ve hta‸ shu g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ taˍ nehˬ leh, suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ na yuˬ ve yoˬ. Suh ve oˇ ve lehˬ, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
50002009	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yuˬ uiˍ yuˬ mvuh piˇ leh, awˬ meh hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve awˬ meh yawˇ hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
50002010	Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a chehˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo hkui tcuhˉ g'a teh tuˬ yoˬ.
50002011	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, maw‸ k'aw teˇ maˬ le le shaˉ hkiˆ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
50002012	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ngaˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve hk'e, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, leuˉ leh chi beu‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ, nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, kawˆ ve cheˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'aˇ hte‸ te-o.
50002013	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui te gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ tuˬ leh te g'a tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
50002014	Nawˬ hui hk'a te ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, hk'anˇ ve leh tawˇ k'aw‸ shaˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ taˇ te.
50002015	Oˇ hk'e maˇ te ve k'o, nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ leh, shu hta‸ maˇ ya‸ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Nyi ma k'aw‸ ve leh nyi ma hpfuhˆ puiˉ ve chaw chi teˇ co awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui lehˬ ya‸ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui vawˆ taˍ leh, awˬ g'euˆ ba ve hk'e miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chaw chi teˇ co hta‸ nawˬ hui ba piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
50002016	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi gaˬ k'o, ngaˬ nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ chi hk'e cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ g'uiˇ ve lehˬ, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ kanˉ te hkeu‸ ve htawˇ, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
50002017	Nawˬ hui ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, tanˇ tuˬ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Tanˇ tuˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ hta‸ ngeuˍ baˬ ve htawˇ ngaˬ ha lehˬ jaˇ leh, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh ha lehˬ ve yoˬ.
50002018	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui htawˇ ha lehˬ leh, ngaˬ geh teˇ geh ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
50002019	Nawˬ hui awˬ lawn ngaˬ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ, maˇ maw maw Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve yoˬ.
50002020	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nyi ma taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ geh maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50002021	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ pon da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ ca leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ ca ve yoˬ.
50002022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Tiˆmoˉseˍ lehˬ awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hk'aˬ ma da‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ pa geh teˇ geh kanˉ te ve hk'e, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ bvuhˬ k'ai tuˬ yawˇ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh kanˉ te ve yoˬ.
50002023	Hk'e te leh, shu ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te laˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ cawˬ haˉ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve yoˬ.
50002024	Maˇ maw maw ngaˬ awˬ to nawˬ hui geh laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ yonˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
50002025	Ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Eˇpaˍhpawˍdiˆ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh k'aw‸ la tcuh cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ geh teˇ geh kanˉ te leh ngaˬ geh teˇ geh bon hpawˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve tcuh yaˇ ka‸ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ loˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50002026	Yawˇ nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nyi ma haˍ jaˇ leh, yawˇ naˬ ve awˬ lawn nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ maˇ maˇ dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh k'aw‸ la tcuh ve yoˬ.
50002027	Suh paˇ neˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ naˬ jaˇ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ ha k'aˉ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ leuˉ leh maˇ g'a dawˇ haˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ htawˇ G'uiˬ sha ha k'aˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
50002028	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ nawˬ hui g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve a ciˉ hkehnˇ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh haˆ haˆ k'aw‸ la tcuh ve yoˬ.
50002029	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw, ha lehˬ ve hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸. Chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te-o.
50002030	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ ga laˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo loˍ ve cuˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te biˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ ve a sha‸ tanˇ leh, Hkri‸ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve pa taw, yawˇ aˬ laˬ hk'e suh ve yoˬ.
50003001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ leh ve teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ teˇ pawˆ peuˬ teˇ pawˆ ngaˬ bvuh‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ awˬ pon hkeu‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ hui yeˬ la tuˬ awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ.
50003002	Hpuiˇ hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, haiˬ ve kanˉ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ baˬ shawˆ baˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui shaˍ ti‸ te-o.
50003003	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ ngaˬ hui yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma uiˍ kuiˬ cawˬ leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'aˇ va ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50003004	Awˬ tehˬ k'oˆ k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ va gaˇ k'o, hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ va tuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ yawˇ a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh cawˬ ve yoˬ.
50003005	Ngaˬ paw la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hiˉ nyi gaˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Beˍyaˍmenˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ leh, Heˍbrehˇ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo paw la ve Heˍbrehˇ chaw hpeh‸ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ Hpaˍriˍsehˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50003006	Ngaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te jaw ve awˬ lawn hta‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ ngaˬ fawˉ mehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, ngaˬ lehˬ venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50003007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ yawˬ teˇ hpaˍ, Hkri‸ hta‸ ngaˬ ha‸ ve pa taw, shonˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
50003008	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ ve k'o, ngaˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ shonˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ ve pa taw, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ shonˇ baˬ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
50003009	Hkri‸ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ peuˬ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ. Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ leh, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ g'a ve yoˬ.
50003010	Ngaˬ htawˇ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ dawˇ law ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ ka‸, yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ ka‸ shiˍ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ,
50003011	yawˇ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ geh teˇ geh hkanˍ leh, yawˇ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ shuˍ da‸ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ shonˇ baˬ leh, chiˇ baˬ peuˬ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
50003012	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, chi beu‸ ka‸ ngaˬ g'a peuˬ, maˇ heˆ k'o chi beu‸ ka‸ ngaˬ biˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ngaˬ hta‸ vawˆ yuˬ peuˬ ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a vawˆ yuˬ tuˬ, awˬ hk'aˇ suh ngaˬ g'a‸ yuˬ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
50003013	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ vawˆ yuˬ peuˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
50003014	Ponˬ laˬ peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ leunˇ baˬ taˉ leh, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo cawˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ la‸ sheh che yuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ mvuhˇ naw ma lo taˆ-e tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ g'a htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ g'a‸ yuˬ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
50003015	Yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ la peuˬ ve ngaˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ma oˇ hk'e taˍ-a veuˬ. Nawˬ hui nyi ma oˇ hk'e maˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ lawn oˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
50003016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui hk'a g'a‸ mi taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ leh hteˇ lehˍ k'ai-a veuˬ.
50003017	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ te ve hk'e nawˬ hui htawˇ te-o. Ngaˬ hta‸ henˇ yuˬ leh te k'ai chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chiˇ nyi-o.
50003018	Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ laiˉ pawˆ hto laˇ peuˬ leh, chi beu‸ ka‸ mehˆ g'uiˬ ya‸ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'aw‸ hto laˇ ve hk'e, Hkri‸ ve la‸ ka hta‸ canˇ paˍ te chehˇ ve chaw maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
50003019	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ k'o, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve g'oˇ peˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve g'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ya‸ taw cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma uiˍ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hpawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh tiˉ yawˇ hui dawˇ nyi ve yoˬ.
50003020	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ oˇ kaˬ lo tawˆ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
50003021	Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ tcuh tuˬ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ yehˇ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ jaˇ ve yawˇ ve awˬ to hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ pa laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
50004001	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ ha‸ leh ngaˬ nyi ma haˍ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍoˬ, nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ ve ha lehˬ tuˬ hpeh‸ leh ngaˬ ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
50004002	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma hawˍ da‸ la tuˬ, Eˇvawˇdiˆ leh Suˇtuˆ hta‸ ngaˬ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
50004003	Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh kanˉ hk'a deh‸ te jaw ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ-oˬ, nawˬ htawˇ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ga piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ka‸, Kaˍleˍmeˍ teˇ g'aˇ ka‸, co ti‸ ha ti‸ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh bvuh‸ taˍ ve, ngaˬ geh kanˉ te ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ ka‸, ngaˬ geh teˇ geh ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ bvuhˬ k'ai tuˬ te jaw ve yoˬ.
50004004	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
50004005	Nawˬ hui nyi ma da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
50004006	Aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ awˬ lawn hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ. Teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui bon lawˬ ve, lawˬ hkawˉ ve leh chiˇ mvuh ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui hk'a lawˬ gaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
50004007	Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha lo laˬ ve, chaw yaˇ hui ca dawˇ maˇ gaˬ ve dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma leh nawˬ hui ve dawˇ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ shaˉ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
50004008	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Hteˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ, yawˆ yan keunˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ, cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ, nyi sha ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ leh, shu ve awˬ lawn da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ g'a kaˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ, chiˇ mvuh keunˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, awˬ lawn oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o.
50004009	Ngaˬ geh nawˬ hui g'a henˇ g'a ha‸ yuˬ leh, g'a kaˇ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te-o. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, dawˇ sha piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui geh chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
50004010	Chi beu‸ htawˇ, nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ ve pa taw, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ ga laˇ tuˬ ya‸ k'aw maˇ cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
50004011	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ loˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ cawˬ leh k'oˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a hpuˇ da‸ ve htawˇ, oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ngaˬ shiˍ la peuˬ.
50004012	Haˍ g'awˇ jaˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, paw sha jaˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hkanˍ puiˉ la peuˬ. Caˇ bvuhˆ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve maˇ k'oˆ, meu‸ ve kaˆ ve maˇ k'oˆ, paw sha ve maˇ k'oˆ, haˍ g'awˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te hkanˍ tuˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ shiˍ la peuˬ.
50004013	Ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ pe‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ te puiˉ te hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50004014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui awˬ chawˇ te laˇ ve lehˬ, da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
50004015	Hpiˇliˇpiˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ tanˬ maˍ gehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai htaˇ, piˇ ve leh ha‸ yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui ceh tiˉ ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ chawˇ te laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ moˍ ka‸ chi hk'e maˇ te ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
50004016	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ loˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui ngaˬ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ nyiˇ pawˆ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
50004017	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ ngaˬ ca ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui awˬ shiˍ naw‸ maˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui awˬ bon g'a maˇ tuˬ ve hta‸ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ ca ve yoˬ.
50004018	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, ngaˬ teˇ ceuˬ le le hk'a law‸ cawˬ leh, awˬ leuˉ ka‸ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Eˇpaˍhpawˍdiˆ geh nawˬ hui feu laˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. La‸ shawnˍ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ shaˉ hawnˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh leh ha‸ yuˬ ve tanˇ tuˬ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
50004019	Ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui hk'a loˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a biˇ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
50004020	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
50004021	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
50004022	Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Leuˉ leh jawˇ mawˇ Kehˉsaˍ ve hawˉ yehˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
50004023	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
51001001	G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Tiˆmoˉseˍ ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, Kawˇlawˇsehˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hui leh, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ li‸ chi teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
51001002	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
51001003	Nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
51001004	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
51001005	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, mvuhˇ naw ma lo nawˬ hui awˬ pon ha‸ shaˉ taˍ ve dawˇ law ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve hta‸ pa taw htawˇ, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Dawˇ law ve chi awˬ lawn awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
51001006	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la peuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la uiˍ la chehˇ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ leh G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a shiˍ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ, awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la leh uiˍ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51001007	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh kanˉ te ve, ngaˬ hui ha‸ ve Eˇpaˍhpaˍraˆ geh nawˬ hui g'a henˇ taˍ peuˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon Hkri‸ ve ka ti‸ yeˬ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh,
51001008	Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ.
51001009	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui yonˍ leh ha‸ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Co ha hpawˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ leh dawˇ pawnˍ dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'a biˇ biˇ shiˍ tuˬ ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
51001010	Nawˬ hui oˇ hk'e shiˍ ve k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e nawˬ hui te k'ai leh, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la tuˬ leh, leuˉ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ maˇ la tuˬ yoˬ.
51001011	Yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a ve awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma yeˬ leh yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ tuˬ, nawˬ hui kanˇ paˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ tuˬ awˬ pon htawˇ ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ ve yoˬ.
51001012	Hk'e te leh, awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ hui awˬ shinˉ caˇ keunˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ te laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ pa hta‸ nawˬ hui chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
51001013	Awˬ pa lehˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ peuˬ leh, yawˇ ha‸ ve Yaˇ hpu ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tcuh laˇ ve yoˬ.
51001014	Yaˇ hpu oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hpehˇ laˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
51001015	Yawˇ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ mawˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hpeh‸ leh, hpanˍ taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yaˇ kaoˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51001016	Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, mawˬ hpeh‸ ve leh mawˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, k'aw jaw teˇ hpaˍ, jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh kanˇ paˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo te hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ pa taw leh yawˇ awˬ pon te hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
51001017	Teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, yawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51001018	Yawˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve oˉ k'oˍ hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ to hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hpeh‸ leh hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, suh kuiˬ lo awˉ lawˉ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51001019	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ cawˬ tuˬ Awˬ pa nyi hk'aˇ suh leh,
51001020	la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo sheˆ ve yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
51001021	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ leh haiˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma hpawˇ yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51001022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ chi beu‸ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ to hkanˍ suh ve pa taw, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ cawˇ da‸ hawˍ da‸ piˇ lawˬ peuˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui da‸ kehˬ ve chaw, venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw leh, shu k'oˆ kuiˬ yaw kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ te ve yoˬ.
51001023	Nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ taˍ peuˬ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve dawˇ law ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ jiˆ leh, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ taˍ leh yeˬ chaweh vawˆ taˍ ve k'o, yawˇ chi hk'e chiˇ a‸ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ hawˉ lo cawˬ taˍ ve, hk'a hpanˍ taˍ ve te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve shu maˍ piˇ taˍ peuˬ. Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ htawˇ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
51001024	Chi beu‸ ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ha lehˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hk'a cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve awˬ to awˬ pon ngaˬ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la tuˬ ngaˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ to teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
51001025	G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a biˇ shiˍ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ laˇ ve hk'e, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ pon ngaˬ kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Kanˉ chi G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon yoˬ.
51001026	G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ teˇ co peuˬ teˇ co faˉ taˍ leh tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ yawˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ taˍ peuˬ.
51001027	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui awˬ pon tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ chi, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn, Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ piˇ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ ve tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
51001028	Yawˇ awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui bon maˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e te leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ la peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sheh hk'aw chiˇ a‸ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ piˇ leh, cuˇ yiˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yehˇ leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
51001029	Oˇ ve awˬ pon ngaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ pe‸ laˇ leh ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ coˇ caˇ leh te ve yoˬ.
51002001	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, Lawˍdiˍkiˆ venˇ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hk'aˬ ma coˇ caˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
51002002	Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw le teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, Hkri‸ hta‸ caˇ da‸ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ yawˇ hui hk'a deh‸ na g'a leh shiˍ puiˉ ve cuˇ yiˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve cawˬ leh teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hk'a deh‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui nyi ma awˬ g'aˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ te ve yoˬ.
51002003	Awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ leh shiˍ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
51002004	A shu teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, na sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yehˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ, ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
51002005	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ awˬ to nawˬ hui geh maˇ chehˇ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ ve nyi ma nawˬ hui geh cawˬ leh, awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ cawˬ ve hk'e nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ te chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui yonˍ yeˬ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw ha lehˬ ve yoˬ.
51002006	Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ peuˬ ve hk'e, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo k'ai chehˇ-oˆ.
51002007	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui awˬ geu g'a tcuhˉ naw‸ taˍ leh g'a uiˍ la yeˬ la chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui g'a henˇ taˍ ve hk'e, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui yeˬ chaweh chehˇ taˍ leh, oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ-oˆ.
51002008	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ tawˇ hkawˇ leh tcuhˉ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve heˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yehˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a hpeh yuˬ veu tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ Hkri‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Chaw yaˇ teˇ caˉ peuˬ teˇ caˉ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ ceh hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51002009	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve biˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ Hkri‸ ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
51002010	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui biˇ la peuˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51002011	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ peuˬ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, la‸ sheh te ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Hkri‸ ve awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51002012	Nawˬ hui baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh tuˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha te taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ ve pa taw, baˆtiˆsaˬ hkanˍ ve oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ geh teˇ geh nawˬ hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve yoˬ.
51002013	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, te ya‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, suh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, yawˇ lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ leh, ngaˬ hui te ya‸ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ peuˬ.
51002014	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve la‸ ma‸ oˇ ve teˇ maˬ hta‸ yawˇ hk'aˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hta‸ keu ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ yuˬ baˬ ve yoˬ.
51002015	Uˉ peunˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve la‸ caˉ hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ baˬ sheˬ leh, oˇ ve nyiˇ ceuˬ hta‸ shu g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. La‸ ka hta‸ pa taw awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ g'aˇ ve yoˬ.
51002016	Hk'e te leh, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, pawehˇ te ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, ha pa cheˆ ve awˬ nyi awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, shinˉ nyi awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hkawˇ hta‸ taˇ na.
51002017	Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, gaˬ la tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve aˉ g'uiˬ ha ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve yoˬ.
51002018	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ nehˬ lehˍ g'a taˍ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ g'a pui ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ceh tiˉ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui te ve teˇ hpaˍ te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve ka‸ nyi ma uiˍ chaweh te ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh tiˉ g'aˇ va ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a lu yuˬ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸.
51002019	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ maˇ caˉ da‸. Oˉ k'oˍ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw awˬ to teˇ to hk'a peu-eˬ uiˍ la chehˇ leh, uiˍ la ve oˇ ve lehˬ G'uiˬ sha geh lo laˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ to lehˬ, awˬ tcuhˉ awˬ caˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw caˉ da‸ taˍ leh, awˬ g'aˇ biˇ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51002020	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh suh taˍ peuˬ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma te miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hk'e nawˬ hui te chehˇ sheˍ ve le.
51002021	Taˇ ca vawˆ, taˇ ca leh‸, taˇ ca htawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw nawˬ hui te chehˇ sheˍ ve le.
51002022	Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai ve awˬ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui teh taˍ leh maˍ piˇ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51002023	A shu yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ dawˇ tawˆ leh oˉ k'oˍ pui ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, nyi ma taˍ nehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ to hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve hk'e hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ sheˉ lai ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ tuˬ te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
51003001	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca-o. Hkri‸ lehˬ, oˇ kaˬ lo G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sha paˉ mui chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
51003002	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ tcuhˉ taˍ ve taˇ te. Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ tcuhˉ taˍ-o‸.
51003003	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui suh peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ hui ve co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Hkri‸ geh teˇ geh G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
51003004	Ngaˬ hui ve co ha te‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
51003005	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ-o‸. Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve, cha‸ chiˆ ve hta‸ te ve, peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve hta‸ te ve, haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve leh, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51003006	Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ gaˬ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51003007	Nawˬ hui htawˇ ponˬ laˬ htaˇ awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te jaw ve yoˬ.
51003008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ lehˬ nyi ma zuhˆ ve, beu‸ jaˇ ve, shu hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te gaˇ ve, shu hta‸ hk'aiˉ ve leh, cha‸ chiˆ ve tawˇ hta‸ yaw ve, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ-oˆ.
51003009	Teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ taˇ heˍ da‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ chaw awˬ piˍ hta‸ ka‸, chaw awˬ piˍ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ k'ehˆ baˬ peuˬ leh, chaw awˬ suhˉ hta‸ veu‸ deh taˍ peuˬ.
51003010	Chaw awˬ suhˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shiˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51003011	Chaw awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Heˍlaˍsaˆ chaw leh Yuˇda‸ chaw maˇ cawˬ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw leh awˬ guiˬ meuˇ maˇ shoˍ ve chaw maˇ cawˬ. Chaw hteunˍ leh Saˍkuˍsiˆ chaw maˇ cawˬ. Vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ leh ponˬ ve chaw maˇ cawˬ. Hkri‸ lehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51003012	Chi hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ leh, nawˬ hui da‸ kehˬ ve leh yawˇ ha‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hk'e, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ veu‸ deh-o. Ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve, shu awˬ pon da‸ ve hta‸ te ve, nyi ma taˍ nehˬ ve, nyi ma nuˇ nuˇ nehˬ nehˬ ve leh, nyi ma dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ veu‸ deh-o.
51003013	Teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ yeunˇ hkanˍ da‸-o‸. Teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ venˇ baˆ taˍ da‸ kuiˬ cawˬ k'o, venˇ baˆ hpehˇ da‸-o‸. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ venˇ baˆ hpehˇ da‸-o‸.
51003014	Oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ veu‸ deh taˍ-o‸. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ biˇ la tuˬ hpeh tsuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
