51003015	Hkri‸ ve dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo uˉ peunˍ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ pon, awˬ to teˇ to tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ ve bon hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ.
51003016	Cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve Hkri‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Chiˇ mvuh ve tawˇ hkawˇ, k'a muiˬ hkawˇ leh co ha hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve k'a muiˬ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˍ da‸ leh shaˍ ti‸ piˇ da‸-o‸. Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ-oˆ.
51003017	Nawˬ hui hk'a te ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, tawˇ yaw ve maˇ k'oˆ, kanˉ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te-o. Yawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ-oˆ.
51003018	Awˬ miˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ-oˆ.
51003019	Awˬ hpawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ ha‸ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh taˇ te.
51003020	Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ pa awˬ e ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui chi hk'e te ve hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
51003021	Awˬ pa teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma maˇ g'a luˬ tuˬ, yawˇ hui nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ taˇ te.
51003022	Vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ -oˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ-o‸. Shu g'a mawˬ kuiˬ ceh te ve leh chaw yaˇ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ceh te ve taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Nyi ma taˍ hk'aˇ teˇ hk'aˇ tiˉ te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ kawˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo na yuˬ-o‸.
51003023	Nawˬ hui kanˉ hk'aˬ hk'e ve teˇ ceuˬ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ awˬ pon te ve maˇ heˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon te ve hk'e nyi ma pfuhˇ leh g'aˇ hte‸ te-o.
51003024	Nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ ve awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ shinˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui Jawˇ mawˇ Hkri‸ awˬ pon kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51003025	Maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ te ve maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi.
51004001	Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui htawˇ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ shiˍ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve leh keunˍ da‸ cawˇ da‸ ve hk'e ceh te piˇ-oˆ.
51004002	Hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Bon lawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo shaw chehˇ leh, chiˇ mvuh chehˇ-oˆ.
51004003	Hkri‸ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ hui g'a k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ ve, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui pon yehˬ miˉ hpaw laˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon htawˇ bon lawˬ laˇ-oˆ. Tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ ve tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve awˬ pon ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
51004004	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ keunˍ ve hk'e ngaˬ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve awˬ pon ka‸ bon lawˬ laˇ-oˆ.
51004005	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a deh‸ dawˇ nyi leh te-o. Awˬ yanˇ hta‸ vuiˬ hk'aw‸ leh hk'a deh‸ yehˇ-oˆ.
51004006	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a yaw hk'aw‸ cawˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ tuˬ, nawˬ hui tawˇ yaw ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ shu awˬ pon cawˇ da‸ leh na sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yaw leh, aˉ leh‸ hkaw‸ taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
51004007	Ngaˬ ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Tuˇhkiˆ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ geh teˇ geh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
51004008	Chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ leh, yawˇ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
51004009	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ hui chehˇ kuiˬ lo laˬ ve, ka ti‸ yeˬ leh ngaˬ hui ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Awˍneˍsiˍmuˆ hta‸ htawˇ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, choˬ kaˬ lo hk'a hpeh‸ la ve awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
51004010	Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ ve Aˍriˍtaˍhkuˆ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Baˍnaˍbaˆ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Maˍkuˆ htawˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. (Maˍkuˆ awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸.)
51004011	Yuˇtuˆ meh ve Yeˍsuˆ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Yuˇda‸ chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ geh teˇ geh G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ pon kanˉ te chehˇ ve lehˬ, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ maˇ maˇ dawˇ sha la ve yoˬ.
51004012	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve Eˇpaˍhpaˍraˆ htawˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ la leh hk'a deh‸ yeˬ chehˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hui awˬ pon hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
51004013	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, Lawˍdiˍkiˆ venˇ leh Heˍraˍpawˇliˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, hk'aˬ ma coˇ caˇ leh te ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ yawˇ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
51004014	Ngaˬ hui ha‸ jaˇ ve saˍ la‸ g'onˍ Luˉka‸ leh Deˍmaˆ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
51004015	Lawˍdiˍkiˆ venˇ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Noˍhpaˆ leh yawˇ ve yehˬ hk'aw lo hpawnˬ da‸ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
51004016	Li‸ chi hta‸ nawˬ hui g'aw peuˬ k'o, Lawˍdiˍkiˆ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ g'aw tcuh-o. Lawˍdiˍkiˆ chaw hui g'a ve li‸ hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui g'aw-o.
51004017	Aˍhkiˇpuˆ hta‸ htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh nawˬ g'a taˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ.
51004018	Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ awˬ to nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui geh awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
52001001	Pawˇlu‸, Siˍlaˍnuˆ leh Tiˆmoˉseˍ hui lehˬ, Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ li‸ chi teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
52001002	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh leh, ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52001003	Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw kanˉ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve hta‸ pa taw kanˉ hkeu‸ ve hta‸ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ dawˇ law ve pa taw nyi ma yeˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52001004	G'uiˬ sha ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
52001005	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui maˍ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ lehˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ ceh hpeh‸ leh nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la ve maˇ heˆ. Kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yonˍ yeˬ jaˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ tuˬ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
52001006	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ ka‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ka‸ henˇ yuˬ leh te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, bon hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ jaˇ ve htawˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu pe‸ laˇ ve ha lehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo bon hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
52001007	Chi hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui lehˬ, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon henˇ kuiˬ jawˬ kuiˬ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
52001008	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ leh Aˍhkaˍyaˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ lawn teˇ kaˬ le le lo bvuhˬ k'ai ve pa taw, oˇ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui te‸ chiˉ k'oˆ tuˬ maˇ loˍ.
52001009	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ laˇ ve awˬ lawn shu k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, te‸ chehˇ ve leh awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon kanˉ hta‸ nawˬ hui te hpeh‸ tuˬ, shaˉ ho‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui baˬ taˉ leh G'uiˬ sha geh k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ k'aw‸ la ve awˬ lawn hta‸ htawˇ, shu k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52001010	Suh kuiˬ lo G'uiˬ sha k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui law chehˇ ve awˬ lawn htawˇ, shu k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, gaˬ la tuˬ ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Yeˍsuˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52002001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh laˬ ve lehˬ, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52002002	Nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve hk'e, Hpiˇliˇpiˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve leh maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ca maˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ, g'a tawˍ da‸ tuˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
52002003	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ dawˇ ya‸ te ya‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, heˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
52002004	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ nyi hk'aˇ suh leh chiˇ a‸ laˇ ve hk'e ceh ngaˬ hui maˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ngaˬ hui maˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ lawˇ nyi laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ngaˬ hui maˍ ve yoˬ.
52002005	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve hk'e, shu nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hui shu hta‸ chiˇ mvuh piˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui sheˉ lai leh maˍ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52002006	Ngaˬ hui Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, kanˇ paˆ hta‸ yehˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui geh maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw geh maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ hui geh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ hui maˇ ca.
52002007	Awˬ e teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52002008	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ jaˇ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ceh tiˉ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ, ngaˬ hui ve a sha‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hui ha‸ jaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
52002009	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui kanˉ te ve hk'aˬ ma hkeu‸ jaˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a hkeu‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ kanˉ te ve yoˬ.
52002010	Nawˬ hui Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui te laˇ ve lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve leh venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui ka‸ G'uiˬ sha ka‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52002011	Nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve hk'e, awˬ pa teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te piˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ te laˇ ve yoˬ.
52002012	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ keunˍ ve hk'e ceh te tuˬ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ leh yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ laˇ peuˬ.
52002013	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui maˍ laˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ chaw yaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'e nawˬ hui shawˍ taˍ leh ha‸ yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shawˍ taˍ leh ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52002014	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Yuˇda‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui henˇ yuˬ jawˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hui ve la‸ hk'aw lo tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ nawˬ hui ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve la‸ hk'aw lo tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
52002015	Yuˇda‸ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ tiˇ pehˍ leh, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ g'a‸ k'oˬ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ maˇ te ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52002016	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ ngaˬ hui maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ Yuˇda‸ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ tawˍ taˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ biˇ la tuˬ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hk'a biˇ gaˬ la peuˬ.
52002017	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, teˇ hkui teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ g'a hpaˆ da‸ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ mawˬ gaˇ jaˇ leh g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ to nawˬ hui hta‸ g'a hpaˆ da‸ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ hpaˆ da‸.
52002018	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, nawˬ hui geh laiˉ pawˆ laˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Saˍtanˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˍ taˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
52002019	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui ve dawˇ law kuiˬ, ha lehˬ kuiˬ leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ aˬ hto‸ ma le. Nawˬ hui yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
52002020	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh ngaˬ hui ve ha lehˬ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52003001	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui maˇ g'a shiˍ maˇ g'a kaˇ ve pa taw hkanˍ maˇ g'a ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ Aˍhtenˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˉ tuˬ ngaˬ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
52003002	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52003003	Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ chehˇ yeˬ leh awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52003004	Awˬ lawn k'o, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. K'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
52003005	Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hkanˍ maˇ g'a ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e yonˍ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ ngaˬ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Beˬ shehˍ hpaˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ beˬ yuˬ leh, ngaˬ hui kanˉ te hkeu‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ la puiˉ-aˆ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ haˍ ve yoˬ.
52003006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ Tiˆmoˉseˍ k'aw‸ gaˬ la leh, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ lawn, ha lehˬ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ leh, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ mawˬ gaˇ ve hk'e nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ mawˬ gaˇ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn ka‸, yawˇ hto laˇ ve yoˬ.
52003007	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve leh tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw dawˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a ve yoˬ.
52003008	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui yeˬ chehˇ ve k'o, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52003009	Nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui ha lehˬ tuˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ha lehˬ tuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ maˇ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
52003010	Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ mawˬ da‸ leh, nawˬ hui yonˍ maˇ biˇ sheˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ biˇ la tuˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ venˇ ngaˬ hui bon g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52003011	Nawˬ hui geh ngaˬ hui laˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hui pon ya‸ k'aw gu taˍ laˇ piˇ-oˆ.
52003012	Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ha‸ da‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ la maˇ la tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ te laˇ piˇ-oˆ.
52003013	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˇ ve da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ geh teˇ geh k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma da‸ kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ yeˬ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
52004001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ leh awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te keunˍ ve leh, G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a te cawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui geh g'a henˇ taˍ peuˬ ve hk'e, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui te chehˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ g'aˇ hte‸ te k'ai sheˍ.
52004002	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52004003	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui g'a da‸ g'a kehˬ tuˬ, chi lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o.
52004004	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le da‸ ve kehˬ ve leh yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma hta‸ hk'a deh‸ heuˆ chehˇ-oˆ.
52004005	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui oˇ hk'e taˇ te.
52004006	Kanˉ chi teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ a shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ maˇ g'a te ponˬ te leuˉ leh maˇ g'a te ya‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ hk'a deh‸ pe‸ laˇ taˍ ve hk'e, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, chi hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
52004007	Awˬ lawn k'o, cha‸ chiˆ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
52004008	Hk'e te leh, chi hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve chaw lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu pe‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ.
52004009	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ loˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ.
52004010	Awˬ tehˬ k'oˆ ve k'o, Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ maˇ la tuˬ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
52004011	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, awˬ baˬ hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ tuˬ leh nawˬ hui chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a ca cuˇ tuˬ,
52004012	ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ peuˬ ve hk'e, ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ leh a shu yawˇ te kuiˬ hta‸ te leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to la‸ sheh kanˉ te tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
52004013	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, dawˇ law kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ dawˇ haˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui maˇ g'a dawˇ haˍ tuˬ, suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ piˇ lawˬ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
52004014	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ suh leh k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh yawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ geh teˇ geh k'aw‸ shiˍ veu laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
52004015	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui cuˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e hto laˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ gaˬ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve ngaˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ g'a gaˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ.
52004016	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, tawˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ htawˇ bvuhˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˉ lawˉ te‸ tu la tuˬ yoˬ.
52004017	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve ngaˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mvuhˇ hpe lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ tuˬ, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ geh hk'a geh moˬ cawˬ kuiˬ lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ taˆ-e laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
52004018	Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui dawˇ sha la tuˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ da‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ da‸-o‸.
52005001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ leh awˬ tcuhˉ awˬ yanˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ loˍ.
52005002	Awˬ lawn k'o, tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ chaw hk'awˇ laˬ ve hk'e Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52005003	Mvuhˇ miˬ gawˬ la peuˬ leh ngaˬ hui te‸ chiˉ dawˇ haˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ teh‸, shu k'oˆ da‸ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ paw tuˬ naˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ naˬ jaˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve hk'e, luˬ ve sheˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ teˇ cawˬ haˉ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ponˬ kuiˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
52005004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui naˆ ho‸ ve hk'aw lo maˇ chehˇ ve pa taw, awˬ nyi oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw hk'awˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
52005005	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ awˬ g'euˆ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ leh mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ hpeu‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, naˆ ho‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ caˉ da‸.
52005006	Hk'e te leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a ve hk'e ngaˬ hui zuh‸ muiˉ taˇ k'a chehˇ. Ngaˬ hui hk'a deh‸ shaw chehˇ leh shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-a veuˬ.
52005007	Awˬ lawn k'o, zuh‸ muiˉ k'a ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ zuh‸ muiˉ k'a chehˇ ve yoˬ. Tzuhˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve chaw hui htawˇ, tanˇ hkuinˇ htaˇ dawˬ bvuhˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
52005008	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ chehˇ-a veuˬ. Yonˍ ve leh ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ nyi ma pui hta‸ htanˬ tuˬ hk'e veu‸ deh leh, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve dawˇ law ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve sho uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ taˍ-a veuˬ.
52005009	Awˬ lawn k'o, nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ fuiˍ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
52005010	Ngaˬ hui te‸ chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, suh ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ geh teˇ geh g'a te‸ chehˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon hkanˍ suh peuˬ.
52005011	Hk'e te leh, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui te chehˇ ve hk'e, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ da‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ uiˍ la yeˬ la tuˬ te da‸-o‸.
52005012	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ leh shaˍ ti‸ pe‸ laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˆ yan-o.
52005013	Yawˇ hui te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui htawˇ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ chehˇ-oˆ.
52005014	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ chi hk'e pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Kanˉ maˇ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ piˇ-oˆ. Nyi ma i puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga piˇ-oˆ. Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ nyi ma zuhˬ chaweh taˍ-o‸.
52005015	Shu haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ te laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te tcuhˉ taˍ-o‸.
52005016	Hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
52005017	Hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ bon lawˬ tcuhˉ taˍ-o‸.
52005018	Teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e te tuˬ nawˬ hui awˬ pon Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
52005019	Awˬ ha hpu ve aˬ miˍ hta‸ taˇ tiˇ pehˍ.
52005020	Shu G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ laˇ ve hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ taˇ te.
52005021	Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ lawˇ nyi-o. Da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ vawˆ taˍ-o‸.
52005022	Haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ jaw k'ai-o.
52005023	Dawˇ sha piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ la kehˬ la piˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma, co ha leh awˬ to biˇ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ piˇ-oˆ.
52005024	Nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e te laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
52005025	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon bon lawˬ-o‸.
52005026	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo boˆ nu da‸ leh la‸ sheh caˉ da‸-o‸.
52005027	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ li‸ chi g'aw maˍ piˇ tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ngaˬ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
52005028	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
53001001	Pawˇlu‸, Siˍlaˍnuˆ leh Tiˆmoˉseˍ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ li‸ chi teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
53001002	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
53001003	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh cawˇ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ uiˍ la maˇ la chehˇ leh, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ha‸ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ la chehˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui chi hk'e chiˇ mvuh keunˍ ve yoˬ.
53001004	Hk'e te leh, fawˉ ve mehˍ ve leh tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ leh yonˍ chehˇ taˍ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
53001005	Hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha hteˇ lehˍ suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ heˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ pon nawˬ hui hkanˍ chehˇ leh, mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve hta‸ keunˍ da‸ tuˬ yawˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
53001006	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui geh teˇ geh aˬ miˍ awˬ g'euˆ ba jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ,
53001007	chi beu‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ fawˉ mehˍ piˇ tuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh g'aˇ jehˇ piˇ tuˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
53001008	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hehnˇ chaweh k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
53001009	Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ nyi htaˇ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ka‸, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ ka‸ g'a hpaˆ da‸ leh, co co taiˍ taiˍ luˬ ve sheˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
53001010	Oˇ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ leh, yonˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ anˇ leh chiˇ mvuh tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui htawˇ oˇ ve teˇ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
53001011	Nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chi hk'e bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve awˬ bon hta‸ nawˬ hui keunˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve hta‸ hk'a dawˇ law ve hk'a peu-eˬ leh, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a te ve kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui te peuˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
53001012	Nawˬ hui chi hk'e te ve k'o, ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon uiˍ jaˇ maˇ jaˇ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui htawˇ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
53002001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ ya‸ la leh, yawˇ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ tuˬ ngaˬ hui g'a hpawnˬ da‸ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui taˇ dawˇ hkiˉ.
53002002	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸, awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo shu g'a mawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, shu k'oˆ chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ ve taˇ cawˬ piˇ.
53002003	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ g'a tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ nyi oˇ ve maˇ gaˬ sheˍ g'uˇ suhˍ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hpfuhˆ k'ai ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ la tuˬ leh, venˇ baˆ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve, luˬ ve sheˆ ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
53002004	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, g'uiˬ sha teh‸ shu hk'a k'oˆ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ tawˍ taˍ leh, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ taˍ uiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo mui taˍ leh, yawˇ awˬ to G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
53002005	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh chehˇ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ hto laˇ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ dawˇ nawˇ leh laˇ.
53002006	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ, chi beu‸ yawˇ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e tawˍ taˍ chehˇ ve awˬ lawn nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
53002007	Awˬ lawn k'o, haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, chi beu‸ ka‸ baˬ kuiˬ lo kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ maˇ tawˆ k'ai ve ceh ceh, oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ tawˍ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
53002008	Tawˍ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, venˇ baˆ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ chaw oˇ ve hta‸ meuˆ pehˍ leh, yawˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ ya‸ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
53002009	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ laˬ ve lehˬ, Saˍtanˍ te taˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ cuˇ leh laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Kanˇ paˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, shu hta‸ heˍ yuˬ tuˬ awˬ heˆ leh anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ,
53002010	luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ g'a tuˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ yehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
53002011	Hk'e te leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ leh, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ piˇ tuˬ,
53002012	maˇ heˆ heˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui yonˍ tuˬ awˬ pon dawˇ ya‸ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ gaˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
53002013	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ g'a chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui hta‸ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui yonˍ ve pa taw, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ.
53002014	Oˇ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ, ngaˬ hui maˍ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha cuˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ awˬ pon te ve yoˬ.
53002015	Hk'e te leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, yeˬ chaweh chehˇ taˍ-o‸. Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui hk'a maˍ laˇ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ vawˆ taˍo‸.
53002016	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ to leh ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ dawˇ sha la piˇ leh, da‸ ve kanˉ leh da‸ ve tawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hta‸ yeˬ la piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
53002017	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw co co taiˍ taiˍ dawˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, dawˇ law ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
53003001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo haˆ haˆ bvuhˬ k'ai leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a ve hk'e, teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ lo oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon bon lawˬ-o‸.
53003002	Te ponˬ te leuˉ ve chaw leh haiˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve la‸ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ htawˇ bon lawˬ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yonˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
53003003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ yeˬ la piˇ lawˬ leh, haiˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ, yawˇ ha‸ shaˉ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
53003004	Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui te chehˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hpawˇ htawˇ nawˬ hui te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui hk'a deh‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ.
53003005	Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh Hkri‸ ve nyi ma yeˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ nawˬ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai piˇ-oˆ.
53003006	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui geh nawˬ hui g'a henˇ taˍ peuˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ k'ai leh te‸ chiˉ kanˉ maˇ te ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ chawˇ taˇ te.
53003007	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui te ve hta‸ nawˬ hui henˇ yuˬ leh te cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui kanˉ maˇ te leh hk'e leˇ chehˇ taˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
53003008	A shu teˇ g'aˇ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ piˇ leh ngaˬ hui caˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a hkeu‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ kanˉ g'aˇ hte‸ te ve yoˬ.
53003009	Shu caˍ laˇ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a caˇ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw ngaˬ hui chi hk'e te ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ hui ngaˬ hui hta‸ henˇ yuˬ tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aˇ chi hk'e te teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
53003010	Ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e tawˇ piˇ taˍ peuˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ kanˉ maˇ te gaˇ ve k'o, awˍ taˇ caˍ piˇ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
53003011	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, bawˬ jaˇ leh, shu ve kanˉ hta‸ ca sho‸ sha‸ piˇ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to kanˉ te‸ chiˉ maˇ te ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
53003012	Chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui chi hk'e tawˇ piˇ leh awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te leh, a shu yawˇ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ-oˆ.
53003013	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, da‸ ve hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ taˇ nuˇ piˇ.
53003014	Li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ maˇ na yuˬ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ tawnˇ taˍ-o‸. Yawˇ g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ chawˇ taˇ te.
53003015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, canˇ paˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hta‸ taˇ shawˍ taˍ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ shawˍ taˍ leh, yawˇ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ piˇ-oˆ.
53003016	Dawˇ sha piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh chehˇ piˇ-oˆ.
53003017	Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ awˬ to nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ bvuh‸ ve li‸ teˇ k'oˆ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, chi hk'e cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ bvuh‸ ve la‸ meuˇ lehˬ, chi hk'e cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ-o‸.
53003018	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
54001001	Ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ G'uiˬ sha leh, ngaˬ hui ve dawˇ law kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve yaˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
54001002	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ, ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
54001003	Ngaˬ Maˍkeˍdawˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ chehˇ taˉ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Peun da‸ ve yonˍ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ g'a maˍ piˇ tuˬ, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
54001004	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, kaˇ puiˇ kaˇ lao teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ caˉ peuˬ teˇ caˉ k'oˆ leh peuˬ kuiˬ leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ g'a taˍ uiˍ tuˬ nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon htawˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chehˇ tcuh taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ tuˬ ceh tiˉ te tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
54001005	Nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hui ha‸ pehnˇ ve cawˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve yoˬ. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve chi lehˬ, da‸ kehˬ ve nyi ma, venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve nyi ma leh, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yonˍ ve nyi ma, chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
54001006	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn hta‸ ceh tiˉ tawˇ yaw da‸ ve yoˬ.
54001007	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ paˍ te gaˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui hk'aˬ hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui k'oˆ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
54001008	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh hteˇ lehˍ te k'ai htaˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
54001009	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui awˬ pon awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teh taˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw, maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan te ve chaw, venˇ baˆ te ve chaw, maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve chaw, bon liˇ hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve chaw, awˬ pa awˬ e hta‸ dawˆ ve chaw, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve chaw,
54001010	haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw, hawˉ hk'aˆ chawˇ hawˉ hk'aˆ peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve hta‸ te ve chaw, chaw hta‸ hk'awˇ yuˬ ve chaw, heˍ ve chaw, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo heˍ ve chaw leh, cawˇ ve maˍ hk'aˇ hta‸ heh‸ hkehnˉ ve chaw, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teh taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
54001011	Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ taˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ hawˍ da‸ ve yoˬ. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54001012	Ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ ngaˬ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, kanˉ chi hta‸ te tuˬ ngaˬ ka ti‸ yeˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ dawˇ taˍ leh ngaˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
54001013	Ngaˬ lehˬ ponˬ laˬ htaˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve, yawˇ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ ve leh, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ maˇ shiˍ leh maˇ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo te ve pa taw, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
54001014	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve yonˍ ve leh ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ geh teˇ geh, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ htawˇ, ca k'oˆ maˇ peuˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
54001015	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ tuˬ awˬ pon miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, cawˇ jaˇ leh, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ha‸ yuˬ cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ lehˬ shu a‸ kehˉ venˇ baˆ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54001016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, yawˇ hk'aˬ ma yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ jaˇ ve hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, ngaˬ shu a‸ kehˉ venˇ baˆ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ ha k'aˉ laˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a tuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon ngaˬ lehˬ, henˇ kuiˬ jawˬ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54001017	Co co taiˍ taiˍ uˉ peunˍ ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ, maˇ luˬ maˇ sheˆ puiˉ leh, chaw yaˇ mawˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
54001018	Ngaˬ yaˇ Tiˆmoˉseˍ-oˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ shu G'uiˬ sha awˬ tan te leh, nawˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ chi hk'e pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yonˍ ve hta‸ vawˆ taˍ leh, venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh, da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon ma‸ bawˆ loˬ.
54001019	Venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve nyi ma hta‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ baˬ taˉ ve pa taw, haw lo‸ k'oˍ luˬ k'ai ve hk'e, yawˇ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma htawˇ luˬ k'ai peuˬ.
54001020	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo, Huˍmeˍnehˇ leh Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ g'a k'oˆ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn henˇ yuˬ tuˬ, Saˍtanˍ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ.
54002001	Hk'e te leh, awˉ lawˉ teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ chi hk'e awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha geh lawˬ hkawˉ ve, bon lawˬ ve, shu awˬ pon bon lawˬ ve leh chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ hpaˍ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon te-o.
54002002	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, dawˇ sha leh nyi ma gawˬ lehˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'a deh‸ yawˆ yan leh, teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ hk'a deh‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, a sha‸ te‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon htawˇ oˇ hk'e te-o.
54002003	Oˇ hk'e te ve lehˬ, da‸ ve kanˉ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve kanˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54002004	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ la tuˬ yawˇ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
54002005	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha leh chaw yaˇ awˬ kaˍ lo awˬ kaˍ te shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hpeh‸ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yoˬ.
54002006	Yawˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ awˬ to tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
54002007	Awˬ lawn oˇ ve hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ awˬ pon, ngaˬ lehˬ bon maˍ paˍ leh tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yonˍ ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ leuˆ teh taˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. (Ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, heˍ ve maˇ heˆ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.)
54002008	Hk'e te leh, teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ma zuhˆ ve leh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, da‸ kehˬ ve la‸ sheh chiˇ leh bon lawˬ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
54002009	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve leh nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, keunˍ da‸ cawˇ da‸ ve veu‸ k'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ veu‸ deh ve hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Uˉ hkeh mvuh hpeˇ ve, shi hk'eun tcuhˉ ve, piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ tcuhˉ ve leh, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve veu‸ k'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ veu‸ deh ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ heuˆ gaˇ.
54002010	Ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui te keunˍ ve hk'e, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tcuhˉ taˍ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
54002011	Yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ taˍ leh, ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo henˇ yuˬ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
54002012	Yaˇ miˇ lehˬ, shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, hawˉ hk'aˆ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ piˇ. Yawˇ ta‸ iˉ g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
54002013	Awˬ lawn k'o, Aˍdanˍ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ te hpanˍ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Eˇva‸ hta‸ te hpanˍ ve yoˬ.
54002014	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Aˍdanˍ hta‸ heˍ g'a ve maˇ heˆ. Yaˇ miˇ hta‸ heˍ g'a leh, yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve te ya‸ ve yoˬ.
54002015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yonˍ ve, ha‸ pehnˇ ve, da‸ kehˬ ve leh nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ chehˇ ve k'o, yaˇ paw ve pa taw yawˇ g'a ponˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
54003001	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ te ve kanˉ hta‸ ca ve chaw lehˬ, da‸ ve kanˉ hta‸ ca ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ cawˇ tehˬ ve yoˬ.
54003002	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw, awˬ miˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve chaw, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ puiˉ ve chaw, nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve chaw, te keunˍ te cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw, hkehˉ chaw hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw leh, maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54003003	Yawˇ a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ponˬ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw leh, shu hta‸ ya‸ da‸ dawˆ da‸ ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve chaw, shu hta‸ tawˇ maˇ g'awˬ da‸ puiˉ ve chaw, hpu hta‸ maˇ sheˉ lai puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54003004	Yawˇ ve yehˬ k'a hta‸ hk'a deh‸ uˉ peunˍ leh, yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a deh‸ te tuˬ maˍ g'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54003005	Awˬ lawn k'o, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ k'a hta‸ uˉ peunˍ maˇ g'aˇ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te nyi ha‸ shaˉ g'a tuˬ le.
54003006	Yawˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ suhˉ maˇ g'a hpeh‸. Maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ nyi ma uiˍ la mvuh la leh neˇ haiˬ ve ciˍ yanˍ kuiˬ lo ce lo‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
54003007	Awˬ baˬ hpawˇ chehˇ ve chaw mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ da‸ ve awˬ meh cawˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Maˇ heˆ k'o, shu hk'aiˉ leh venˇ baˆ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, neˇ haiˬ va htaw taˍ ve hta‸ yaw tuˬ yoˬ.
54003008	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, dawˇ yeˬ gaˇ yeˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ha tehˬ nyiˇ maˬ cawˬ ve chaw, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ponˬ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸.
54003009	Da‸ ve kehˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo, hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ peuˬ ve yonˍ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ yonˍ yeˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54003010	Yawˇ hui hta‸ htawˇ awˉ lawˉ lawˇ nyi sheˍ. Lawˇ nyi peuˬ leh, venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ k'o, ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ te tcuh cawˇ ve yoˬ.
54003011	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ga piˇ shehˍ ma teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, dawˇ yeˬ gaˇ yeˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ca hk'aiˉ ca k'oˆ puiˉ ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸, shaˍ ti‸ cawˬ ve chaw leh teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54003012	Ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, awˬ miˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ g'a cawˬ ve yoˬ. A shu yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ leh, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ k'a hta‸ hk'a deh‸ uˉ peunˍ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54003013	Awˬ lawn k'o, ga piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ te ve chaw hui lehˬ, da‸ ve awˬ meh g'a ve awˬ hk'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ha‸ hanˉ ve nyi ma ka‸ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
54003014	Maˇ maw maw nawˬ geh laˬ tuˬ ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ haˆ haˆ maˇ gaˬ la k'o,
54003015	G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ k'a awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e te keunˍ te cawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yehˬ k'a oˇ ve lehˬ, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ moˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ moˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ pon, awˬ hkuiˉ daw leh awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54003016	Ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan leh oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ liˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ jaˇ tehˬ tehˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ htawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a mawˬ peuˬ. Yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ Awˬ ha hpu shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ peuˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ. Yawˇ awˬ lawn awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bon maˍ piˇ peuˬ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ peuˬ. Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ taˆ k'o‸-e peuˬ.
54004001	Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, chi hk'e hk'a tawˍ lehˆ k'oˆ taˍ ve, Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, heˍ puiˉ ve awˬ ha teˇ hpaˍ leh, neˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
54004002	Heˍ puiˉ jaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ neˇ haiˬ cuˇ leh oˇ hk'e maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ sho chiˆ ngawˉ piˇ leh hkeu‸ k'ai peuˬ ve hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54004003	Awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ maˇ g'a heuˆ da‸ leh, caˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a caˇ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Caˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, yonˍ ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a caˇ tuˬ ve awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha te hpanˍ taˍ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
54004004	G'uiˬ sha te hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ yuˬ ve k'o, hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ g'a baˬ.
54004005	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, bon lawˬ ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ da‸ peuˬ kehˬ peuˬ.
54004006	Nawˬ lehˬ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ ve k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve da‸ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ nawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, yonˍ hk'aˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, nawˬ te k'ai chehˇ ve da‸ ve maˍ hk'aˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hk'a deh‸ caˇ chehˇ dawˬ chehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
54004007	A pi k'u teˇ hpaˍ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan ve kaˇ lao teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ na. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan puiˉ la tuˬ, nawˬ awˬ to hk'a deh‸ te jawˬ-o‸.
54004008	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la tuˬ te jawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ bon a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
54004009	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi lehˬ, cawˇ jaˇ leh awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ha‸ yuˬ cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54004010	Te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ law tcuhˉ taˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui g'aˇ hte‸ coˇ caˇ leh kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon leuˉ leh Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54004011	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ shu hta‸ tawˇ piˇ leh maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
54004012	Nawˬ yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ g'a k'oˆ maˇ g'a te tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve, yonˍ ve leh da‸ kehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ lehˬ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon henˇ kuiˬ jawˬ kuiˬ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
54004013	Ngaˬ gaˬ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, shu hta‸ Li‸ hpu g'aw maˍ piˇ ve, awˬ g'aˇ piˇ ve leh maˍ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ coˇ caˇ leh te chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
54004014	Awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ la‸ sheh taˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha awˬ tan te leh yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ yaw ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ nawˬ hk'a deh‸ yehˇ leh te-o mehˍ.
54004015	Nawˬ kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ la mvuh la chehˇ ve hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ma pfuhˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'aˇ hte‸ te-o.
54004016	Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, shaˍ ti‸ te leh, chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yeˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
54005001	Chaw mawˇ hta‸ deˇ maˍ piˇ ve taˇ te. Awˬ pa hk'a shuˍ shuˍ shawˍ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ-oˆ. Yaˇ nehˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'e shawˍ taˍ-o‸.
54005002	Chaw mawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ e hk'a shuˍ shuˍ shawˍ taˍ leh, yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸, da‸ kehˬ ve nyi ma hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'e shawnˍ taˍ-o‸.
54005003	Ga piˇ paˍ maˇ cawˬ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ-oˆ.
54005004	Mehˇ chawˇ ma lehˬ, awˬ yaˇ maˇ heˆ k'o awˬ hawehˍ cawˬ ve k'o, yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ a shu yawˇ yehˬ hk'aw ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ leh, awˬ pa awˬ e awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ bon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e ha‸ shaˉ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
54005005	Ga piˇ paˍ maˇ cawˬ leh, yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ chehˇ taˍ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ leh, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ htaˇ lawˬ hkawˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
54005006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ha lehˬ tuˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ ca ve mehˇ chawˇ ma lehˬ, yawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve htawˇ, suh taˍ peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54005007	Shu venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ, mehˇ chawˇ ma hui ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˇ hk'e tawˇ piˇ-oˆ.
54005008	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, leuˉ leh a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ hk'aw ve chaw hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ ha‸ shaˉ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ peuˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw a‸ kehˉ haiˬ ve yoˬ.
54005009	A sha‸ hkaw‸ chi hk'aw‸ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ meh hta‸ mehˇ chawˇ ma ve caˇ lanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ bvuh‸ keu.
54005010	Awˬ hpawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ heuˆ jaw ve, da‸ ve kanˉ te ve yoˬ teh‸ shu shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve, awˬ yaˇ awˇ duˬ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ ve, hkehˉ chaw hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui ve hkui sheh hta‸ tsuhˇ piˇ ve, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga piˇ ve leh, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ hk'a deh‸ te ve mehˇ chawˇ ma hpeh‸ ve k'o, caˇ lanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh bvuh‸ keu-o.
54005011	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˇ lanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh taˇ bvuh‸ keu. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui Hkri‸ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˉ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ hpawˇ k'aw‸ heuˆ gaˇ la tuˬ yoˬ.
54005012	Hk'e te leh, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ve ka ti‸ hta‸ yawˇ hui te luˬ ve pa taw, ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
54005013	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui teˇ yehˬ peuˬ teˇ yehˬ lo k'ai leh, bawˬ la puiˉ ve yoˬ. Bawˬ ve ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hui tawˇ maˇ leh, k'oˆ maˇ keunˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve shu te kuiˬ hta‸ ca sho‸ sha‸ piˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54005014	Hk'e te leh, yaˇ nehˬ hpeh‸ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ hpawˇ k'aw‸ heuˆ tuˬ, yaˇ paw la piˇ tuˬ leh, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ k'a hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, canˇ paˍ lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
54005015	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi beu‸ ka‸ mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ya‸ k'ai leh, Saˍtanˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai peuˬ.
54005016	Yonˍ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ to yawˇ hui hta‸ ga piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ lehˬ, ga piˇ paˍ maˇ cawˬ ve mehˇ chawˇ ma hpeh‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, awˬ vuiˬ chi Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ taˇ gaˬ piˇ.
54005017	A shu yawˇ ve kanˉ hk'a deh‸ te ve awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyiˇ pun yawˆ yan cawˇ ve yoˬ. Bon maˍ ve leh shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˉ leh yawˆ yan cawˇ ve yoˬ.
54005018	Awˬ lawn k'o, Li‸ hpu hk'aw k'oˆ taˍ ve, Caˬ shiˍ naˆ chehˇ ve nuˇ maw‸ k'aw hta‸ nawˬ maˇ g'a hoˆ taˍ. Peuˬ leh, Kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, g'aˇ hpfuhˇ g'a cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
54005019	Shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ, maˇ heˆ k'o shehˆ g'aˇ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ taˇ na.
54005020	Venˇ baˆ te tcuhˉ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ deˇ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ kawˆ ve nyi ma cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
54005021	Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, maˇ fuiˍ maˇ pehˬ leh, shu ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi ve awˬ hk'aw lo te-o teh‸, G'uiˬ sha leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
54005022	A shu hta‸ ka‸ aˉ yaˇ haˆ haˆ taˇ piˇ. Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ venˇ baˆ te chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ a ciˉ ka‸ taˇ caˉ da‸. Nawˬ awˬ to da‸ lehˍ kehˬ lehˍ chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
54005023	Chi hk'aw‸ nawˉ iˉ kaˆ ceh tiˉ taˇ dawˬ. Nawˬ ve g'oˇ peˬ awˬ pon leh, nawˬ teˇ hkui teˇ hkui naˬ chehˇ ve awˬ pon, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ ka‸ a ciˉ dawˬ-o‸.
54005024	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ve venˇ baˆ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la leh, suhˉ jehˬ kuiˬ lo yawˇ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ve venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
54005025	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ maˇ tawˆ la sheˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ faˉ taˍ g'a tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
54006001	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui maˍ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ g'a k'oˆ tuˬ, shu vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ g'a hpeh‸ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo yawˆ yan keunˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
54006002	Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ hawˉ lo g'a chehˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hpeh‸ la peuˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te maˇ cawˇ. Yawˇ hui awˬ pon leuˉ leh kanˉ hk'a deh‸ te cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui oˇ hk'e te ve teˇ yanˇ, ha‸ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ bon g'a ve yoˬ.
54006003	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ maˍ piˇ leh awˬ g'aˇ piˇ-oˆ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, peun da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve da‸ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve k'o,
54006004	yawˇ lehˬ nyi ma uiˍ leh, te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ na da‸ leh, tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn tawˇ g'awˬda‸ ve hta‸ ceh tiˉ yawˇ te gaˇ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ hk'e te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, hkawehˉ da‸ ve, deˇ da‸ ya‸ da‸ ve, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve, shu awˬ lawn haiˬ ve hta‸ ca dawˇ ve leh,
54006005	da‸ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tawˆ la puiˉ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve pa taw awˬ yawˬ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
54006006	Awˬ tehˬ k'oˆ k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo nyi hk'aˇ suh ve k'o, awˬ yawˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
54006007	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ hui lo‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, te‸ chiˉ maˇ yuˬ laˬ leh, ngaˬ hui tawˆ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ htawˇ, te‸ chiˉ yuˬ k'ai maˇ hpeh‸.
54006008	Hk'e te leh, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ leh veu‸ tuˬ k'aˇ tuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ yoˬ.
54006009	Paw sha la gaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ beˬ ve, va htaw taˍ ve leh, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸ te luˬ puiˉ ve sheˉ lai ve laiˉ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ce lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Sheˉ lai ve oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hta‸ luˬ kuiˬ sheˆ kuiˬ lo k'a piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
54006010	Awˬ lawn k'o, hpu hta‸ sheˉ lai ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, haiˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, hpu hta‸ sheˉ lai ve hta‸ pa taw, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˉ leh, dawˇ haˍ tuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ juˆ pawnˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
54006011	G'uiˬ sha ve chaw-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ, nyi ma yeˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh hk'a deh‸ k'ai-o.
54006012	Yonˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve, da‸ ve bawˆ da‸ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ bawˆ da‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ vawˆ taˍ-o‸. Oˇ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leh, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ laiˉ g'aˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ da‸ ve shaˉ hkiˆ nawˬ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ.
54006013	Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ a sha‸ te‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, jawˇ mawˇ Poˍtiˆ Piˉla‸ g'uˇ suhˍ da‸ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ chi hk'e pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
54006014	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ tawˆ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, nawˬ ya‸ kuiˬ leh venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na yuˬ leh te k'ai-o.
54006015	G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ tawˆ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ awˬ hk'oˆ Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ leh, jawˇ mawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
54006016	Yawˇ ceh tiˉ co co taiˍ taiˍ a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ leh, a shu teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ awˬ paˇ lo k'ai maˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw leh, mawˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh kanˇ paˆ yawˇ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
54006017	Chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo paw sha ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma maˇ g'a uiˍ tuˬ leh, luˬ puiˉ sheˆ puiˉ ve mawˇ jeˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ g'a dawˇ law tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ hui g'a ha lehˬ tuˬ awˬ pon awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ pe‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ceh tiˉ g'a dawˇ law tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ-oˆ.
54006018	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, shu hta‸ awˬ bon te piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve kanˉ maˇ chaweh te tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, shu hta‸ pehˬ piˇ tanˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ chaweh piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ-oˆ.
54006019	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yeˬ ve a sha‸ te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui da‸ ve awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ cawˬ tuˬ ve awˬ pon, da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaw hpoˆ taˍ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ-oˆ.
54006020	Tiˆmoˉseˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hta‸ a‸ piˇ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ-o‸. Cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve cuˇ yiˍ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'e leˇ k'oˆ guiˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ leh tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o.
54006021	Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve cuˇ yiˍ oˇ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hkanˍ yuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, yonˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui ya‸ k'aw ya‸ k'ai peuˬ. Nawˬ hui geh awˬ bon cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
55001001	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw co ha g'a te‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ lawn k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, ngaˬ ha‸ ve yaˇ Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
55001002	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
55001003	Bon lawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˬ pon kanˉ te ve hk'e ngaˬ htawˇ kanˉ te ve yoˬ.
55001004	Nawˬ ve mehˆ g'uiˬ ya‸ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ nyi teˇ haˉ le le ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ mawˬ gaˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ.
55001005	Nawˬ nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve chi lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ ve awˬ pi Lawˇiˆ leh nawˬ ve awˬ e Uˇniˆ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ leh, chi beu‸ nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
55001006	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ awˬ hk'oˆ la‸ sheh taˍ ve pa taw nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ aˬ miˍ gu ceh ve hk'e hk'a deh‸ gu ceh tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ ve yoˬ.
55001007	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ kawˆ puiˉ ve nyi ma pe‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve nyi ma, ha‸ pehnˇ ve nyi ma leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ g'aˇ puiˉ ve nyi ma yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
55001008	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ taˇ ya‸ taw. Yawˇ awˬ pon htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ ve ngaˬ hta‸ pa taw htawˇ taˇ ya‸ taw. G'uiˬ sha geh kanˇ paˆ g'a taˍ ve hk'e, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ pon g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh hkanˍ-o‸.
55001009	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ dawˇ law taˍ ve hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ leh, da‸ kehˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw yawˇ chi hk'e te laˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
55001010	Yawˇ ve awˬ bon oˇ ve lehˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ leh, ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ tawˆ la ve hta‸ pa taw, chi beu‸ awˬ bon oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te luˬ leh, co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh maˇ luˬ maˇ sheˆ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸, ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la piˇ lawˬ peuˬ.
55001011	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi awˬ pon bon maˍ paˍ, tcuh yaˇ leh, saˍ la‸ te tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
55001012	Chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ chi hk'e g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ maˇ ya‸ taw. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ yonˍ chehˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ hk'a chiˇ a‸ piˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ nyi oˇ ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ yawˇ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
55001013	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yonˍ ve leh ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ geh g'a kaˇ taˍ ve, da‸ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na yuˬ leh te k'ai-o.
55001014	Ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ nawˬ cuˇ leh, nawˬ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ laˇ peuˬ ve, da‸ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ-o‸.
55001015	Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˉ peuˬ ve teh‸ nawˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo, Hpuˍgeˍluˆ leh Heˍraˆmoˇgenˍ ka‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
55001016	Awˇneˍsiˉhpawˍ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ laiˉ pawˆ dawˇ sha la piˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ sho caˆ hpeh taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ ya‸ taw.
55001017	Yawˇ Roˉma‸ venˇ lo gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hta‸ mawˬ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ ca ve yoˬ.
55001018	Yawˇ lehˬ, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh lo ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ ha k'aˉ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ga laˇ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
55002001	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ yaˇ-oˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ-oˆ.
55002002	Shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ laiˉ g'aˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ ngaˬ geh g'a kaˇ taˍ peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve ka ti‸ yeˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ-oˆ.
55002003	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve da‸ ve ma‸ yaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ ngaˬ geh teˇ geh tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ-o‸.
55002004	Ma‸ yaˇ te chehˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve ma‸ poˍ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ te gaˇ ve pa taw, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo k'aˉ tiˍ hawˆ tiˍ taˍ tuˬ yawˇ maˇ te.
55002005	G'uiˇ da‸ ve pawehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ cawˬ ve hk'e maˇ g'uiˇ ve k'o, shu yawˇ hta‸ g'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ yoˬ teh‸ maˇ shawˍ piˇ.
55002006	Kanˉ te hkeu‸ ve muiˬ caˇ paˍ lehˬ, awˬ shiˍ hta‸ awˉ lawˉ g'a caˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
55002007	Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ puiˉ tuˬ cuˇ yiˍ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
55002008	Ngaˬ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ taˍ peuˬ ve hk'e, Daˍviˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve, suh kuiˍ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la peuˬ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ.
55002009	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, chaw haiˬ teˇ g'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ hta‸ shu hpeh taˍ laˇ leh, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ shu hpeh taˍ maˇ g'a.
55002010	Chi hta‸ pa taw, leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ yeunˇ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve oˇ ve geh teˇ geh co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ ka‸ yawˇ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
55002011	Tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui yawˇ geh teˇ geh suh ve k'o, yawˇ geh teˇ geh g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
55002012	Ngaˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ ve k'o, yawˇ geh teˇ geh g'a uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve k'o, yawˇ htawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ baˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
55002013	Ngaˬ hui ka ti‸ maˇ ye‸ ve htawˇ, yawˇ lehˬ ka ti‸ yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ baˬ maˇ hpeh‸.
55002014	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ-oˆ. Tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn tawˇ maˇ g'a g'awˬ da‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ piˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'e tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, kaˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui hta‸ te luˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
55002015	Nawˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ awˬ to yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, g'aˇ hte‸ coˇ caˇ leh te-o. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ lehˬ ya‸ taw tuˬ maˇ cawˬ leh, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
55002016	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo hk'e leˇ k'oˆ guiˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve nyi ma shaˬ te shaˬ maˇ la leh,
55002017	yawˇ hui maˍ piˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, kuiˇ ve behˬ ve hk'aw kuiˬ uiˍ la k'ehˬ la ve hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo Huˍmeˍnehˇ leh Hpiˇlehˆ ka‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
55002018	Suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, hpeh‸ la peuˬ teh‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ k'oˆ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ya‸ k'ai peuˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ve yonˍ ve nyi ma hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hpfuhˆ baˬ piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
55002019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve yeˬ ve awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yeˬ chehˇ leh, yinˉ chi hk'e tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ pfuhˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ baˬ taˉ-oˆ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
55002020	Uiˍ ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hpu hk'eun shi hk'eun ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Suhˆ leh je‸ te taˍ ve awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'eun teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve awˬ pon yehˇ leh, teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ pon yehˇ ve yoˬ.
55002021	Hk'e te leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo yuˬ baˬ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yehˇ hpeh‸ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ hk'eun hpeh‸ leh, da‸ ve kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ ve, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'eun hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
55002022	Yaˇ nehˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ sheˉ lai puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ jaw k'ai-o. Da‸ kehˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ kuˬ ve chaw hui geh teˇ geh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ, yonˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ leh, cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai-o.
55002023	Cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ leh, te‸ chiˉ tcuhˉ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ jehˬ da‸ ve hta‸ ka‸ jaw k'ai-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e jehˬ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ te tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
55002024	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ ceˬ lehˬ, deˇ da‸ ya‸ da‸ ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸. Yawˇ lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ te ve chaw, maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve chaw leh, yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
55002025	Yawˇ hta‸ tawˍ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ puiˉ ve chaw htawˇ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha te piˇ tuˬ leh naˍ, maˇ shiˍ.
55002026	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, neˇ haiˬ ve a loˍ hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ hui hta‸ neˇ haiˬ hpeh yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve va awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
55003001	Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ taˍ-o‸.
55003002	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw, hpu hta‸ sheˉ lai ve chaw, caˆ muiˬ puiˉ ve chaw, nyi ma uiˍ ve chaw, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve chaw, awˬ pa awˬ e hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw, shu ve awˬ bon hta‸ maˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve chaw, maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve chaw,
55003003	shu hta‸ maˇ ha‸ puiˉ ve chaw, shu ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ hpehˇ piˇ puiˉ ve chaw, shu hta‸ hk'aiˉ puiˉ ve chaw, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ maˇ g'aˇ puiˉ ve chaw, haiˬ jaˇ ve chaw leh, da‸ ve hta‸ canˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
55003004	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, shu hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ puiˉ ve chaw, shu shaˍ ti‸ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw, nyi ma uiˍ jaˇ ve chaw leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ ha‸ leh miˬ guiˬ ha lehˬ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
55003005	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ve htawˇ, oˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ yawˇ hui chiˇ baˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o.
55003006	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, shu ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ g'a ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ maˇ maˇ pfuhˇ taˍ leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ sheˉ lai ve laiˉ ceuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ.
55003007	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ shu maˍ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na chehˇ ve ka‸, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ la puiˉ.
55003008	Yaˍneˍ leh Yaˍbeˍ hui Moˉseˍ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve hk'e, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ luˬ k'ai peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
55003009	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ g'u suhˍ k'ai maˇ g'a. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ lawn hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve hk'e, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ lawn htawˇ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
55003010	Ngaˬ maˍ piˇ ve, ngaˬ te ve, ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve, ngaˬ yonˍ ve, ngaˬ dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ ve, ngaˬ ha‸ pehnˇ ve leh ngaˬ nyi ma yeˬ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ taˍ peuˬ.
55003011	Anˍtiˆawˍ venˇ, Iˇkawˇniˆ venˇ leh Luˇtaˍraˆ venˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo shu fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ ve hk'e, fawˉ ve mehˍ ve leh tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a hkanˍ ve hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ taˍ peuˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hta‸ ponˬ laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
55003012	Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ ve k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan gaˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, fawˉ ve mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
55003013	Haiˍ ve chaw leh heˍ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shaˬ te shaˬ haiˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui shu hta‸ heˍ leh, shu htawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ heˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
55003014	Nawˬ lehˬ, nawˬ g'a henˇ leh hk'a deh‸ g'a yonˍ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yeˬ chaweh vawˆ taˍ-o‸. Nawˬ a shu geh g'a henˇ taˍ peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
55003015	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ yaˇ ehˉ hpeh‸ htaˇ ka‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Li‸ hpu hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ cuˇ yiˍ pe‸ laˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
55003016	Li‸ hpu hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
55003017	G'uiˬ sha ve chaw lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te leh biˇ ve chaw leh, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ pon gu taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ, Li‸ hpu lehˬ maˍ piˇ ve, venˇ baˆ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve, k'aw‸ da‸ la piˇ ve leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te tuˬ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon Li‸ hpu lehˬ awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ.
55004001	G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hui leh suh peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ la tuˬ ve leh yawˇ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ cuˇ leh nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ chi hk'e pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
55004002	Bon hkawˇ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ cawˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, g'aˇ hte‸ te-o. Deˇ maˍ piˇ leh shaˍ ti‸ piˇ-oˆ. Dawˇ zuhˬ gaˇ zuhˬ ve leh maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ piˇ-oˆ.
55004003	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ hui lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma teˇ ceuˬ awˬ lawn ka‸ kaˇ gaˇ puiˉ leh, a shu yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve hk'e maˍ laˇ ve saˍ la‸ maˇ chaweh hta‸ yawˇ hui geh chehˇ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
55004004	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ g'a na tuˬ yawˇ hui hpfuhˆ k'ai leh, kaˇ puiˇ kaˇ lao hkawˇ hta‸ na leh awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
55004005	Nawˬ lehˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ chehˇ-oˆ. Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ ve kanˉ hta‸ te chehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ te chehˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te-o.
55004006	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi beu‸ ka‸ tanˇ tuˬ hk'e tanˇ piˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a hkanˍ leh, ngaˬ g'a k'o‸-e ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
55004007	Da‸ jaˇ ve bawˆ da‸ tuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ bawˆ da‸ peuˬ. G'uiˇ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ g'uiˇ peuˬ. Yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hk'a deh‸ vawˆ taˍ peuˬ.
55004008	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ ngaˬ awˬ pon ha‸ shaˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ nyi oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, shi uˉ tcuhˍ oˇ ve ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ la tuˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
55004009	Nawˬ ngaˬ geh haˆ haˆ laˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ coˇ caˇ-oˆ.
55004010	Awˬ lawn k'o, Deˍmaˆ lehˬ chi miˬ guiˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, Hteˇsaˍlawˇniˆ venˇ lo k'ai peuˬ. Kaˍreˍkeˍ lehˬ, Gaˍlaˍtiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai leh, Tiˇtuˆ lehˬ Daˍlaˍmaˍtiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai peuˬ.
55004011	Luˉka‸ teˇ g'a ceh tiˉ ngaˬ geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Maˍkuˆ hta‸ ka‸ shiˍ veu laˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ga laˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
55004012	Tuˇhkiˆ hta‸ Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ lo ngaˬ k'ai tcuh peuˬ.
55004013	Nawˬ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Taˍroˇaˆ venˇ hk'aw lo Kaˍpuˆ geh ngaˬ teh taˉ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, li‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, leuˉ leh shaˍ guiˬ k'uˉ hta‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yuˬ veu laˇ-oˆ.
55004014	Ca liˉ paˍ Aˍleˍsaˍduˆ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ haˍ tuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ te laˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
55004015	Nawˬ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ maˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
55004016	Ngaˬ awˬ to awˬ pon ngaˬ awˉ lawˉ teˇ pawˆ g'a yaw hk'aw‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hpawˇ lo maˇ chehˇ. Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˇ taˍ piˇ lawˬ.
55004017	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ bon hkawˇ hk'a biˇ maˍ piˇ leh, buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ g'a kaˇ tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ geh chehˇ leh awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, laˇ caˬ shiˉ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ ponˬ laˇ ve yoˬ.
55004018	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, haiˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ ponˬ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A men.
55004019	Piˇkiˇlaˆ leh Aˍkuˉlaˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Awˇneˍsiˉhpawˍ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
55004020	Eˇraˍtuˆ lehˬ, Kawˇrenˍhtuˆ venˇ lo chehˇ taˉ ve yoˬ. Taˍroˆhpeˍ teˇ g'aˇ naˬ leh, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ Meˍleˍtuˆ venˇ hk'aw lo teh taˉ ve yoˬ.
55004021	Mvuhˇ kaˆ yanˇ maˇ gaˬ sheˍ htaˇ nawˬ haˆ haˆ gaˬ la tuˬ coˇ caˇ-oˆ. Uˇbuˇluˆ, Puˇdeˍ, Liˇnuˆ, Kaˍlawˉduˆ leh awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
55004022	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ ka‸ nawˬ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
56001001	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve yaˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve Tiˇtuˆ hta‸ li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
56001002	Ngaˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ uiˍ la maˇ la leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ shiˍ la tuˬ awˬ pon tcuh yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56001003	Yawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, maˇ heˍ puiˉ ve G'uiˬ sha aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo te ve yoˬ.
