Co ti‸ ha ti‸ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ pe‸ laˇ leh chiˇ a‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
56001004	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
56001005	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, loˍ sheˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ gu k'aw‸ te leh, teˇ venˇ le le awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˆ teh taˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ Keˍreˍteˍ conˇ lo chehˇ tcuh taˉ laˇ ve yoˬ.
56001006	Awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw leh, awˬ miˇ ma teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ g'a hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui awˬ lawn shu k'oˆ kuiˬ yaw kuiˬ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ, awˬ liˇ da‸ leh, shu ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56001007	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve mawˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw, venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. A shu yawˇ ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te ve chaw, nyi ma ngeh ve chaw, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ponˬ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw, shu hta‸ ya‸ da‸ dawˆ da‸ ve chaw leh, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸.
56001008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hkehˉ chaw hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw, da‸ ve hta‸ nyi ma cawˇ ve chaw, nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve chaw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw, da‸ ve kehˬ ve chaw leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ g'aˇ puiˉ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56001009	Da‸ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo shu hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ hpeh‸ leh, g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ g'aˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, maˍ piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ yeˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yeˬ chaweh vawˆ taˍ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56001010	Awˬ lawn k'o, shu hkawˇ maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw, awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'e leˇ ca k'oˆ puiˉ ve chaw leh, heˍ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ guiˬ meuˇ shoˍ ve chaw teˇ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e ve chaw leuˉ leh cawˬ maˇ ve yoˬ.
56001011	Yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw hta‸ g'a hoˆ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon, maˍ piˇ maˇ keunˍ ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh, yehˬ k'a teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te ve yoˬ.
56001012	Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hui ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve, Keˍreˍteˍ chaw hui lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ heˍ ve chaw, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hk'e hpeh‸ ve chaw leh, caˇ ponˬ caˇ leuˉ ve chaw bawˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
56001013	Shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve tawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Yuˇda‸ ve kaˇ puiˇ kaˇ lao teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve chaw hui tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ g'a na yuˬ leh, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ la tuˬ,
56001014	yawˇ hui hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
56001015	Nyi ma hk'aw da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hui awˬ pon, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ cha‸ chiˆ ve chaw leh maˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon, da‸ kehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ hui ve dawˇ hk'aˇ leh yawˇ hui ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma lehˬ, cha‸ chiˆ ve yoˬ.
56001016	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui te ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve hk'e te ve yoˬ. Shu yawˇ hui hta‸ cha‸ naˬ ve chaw, maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw leh, da‸ ve kanˉ te tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ hui hta‸ a ciˉ ka‸ yehˇ maˇ hpeh‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56002001	Nawˬ lehˬ, da‸ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve yonˍ hk'aˇ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
56002002	Chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shaˍ ti‸ cawˬ ve chaw, dawˇ yeˬ gaˇ yeˬ ve chaw, nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve chaw, yonˍ ve, ha‸ pehnˇ ve leh nyi ma yeˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56002003	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chaw mawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, te ve dawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo keunˍ ve hk'e te ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Shu hta‸ hk'aiˉ puiˉ ve chaw leh, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ponˬ dawˬ leuˉ ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸. Da‸ ve hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve chaw g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56002004	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e te ve k'o, a sha‸ i ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ leh awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ puiˉ tuˬ, yawˇ hui maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56002005	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve chaw, da‸ kehˬ ve chaw, a shu yawˇ ve yehˬ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ puiˉ ve chaw, nyi ma da‸ ve chaw leh, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ la tuˬ htawˇ, yawˇ hui maˍ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ chi hk'e te ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸.
56002006	A sha‸ i ve hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ nyi ma taˍ puiˉ tuˬ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ hk'a deh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
56002007	Teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ awˬ to hk'a deh‸ te maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ lehˍ te leh, dawˇ yeˬ gaˇ yeˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
56002008	Shu venˇ baˆ taˍ kuiˬ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ, da‸ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ te‸ chiˉ hk'aiˉ maˇ hpeh‸ leh, g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ yoˬ.
56002009	Shu vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ te cawˇ ve yoˬ.
56002010	Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve mawˇ hta‸ hk'awˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ g'a te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ g'a chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ pa G'uiˬ sha ve maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ awˬ hkiˇ shawˍ ve hk'e yawˇ hui te hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
56002011	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ tuˬ awˬ pon tawˆ la peuˬ.
56002012	Awˬ bon oˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve sheˉ lai ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ baˬ taˉ tuˬ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ ca‸ na‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui lehˬ, nyi ma taˍ puiˉ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te puiˉ ve leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan puiˉ tuˬ ka‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
56002013	Ngaˬ hui ve uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la tuˬ ve awˬ bon uiˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ law chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
56002014	Yawˇ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon da‸ ve kehˬ ve chaw teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve awˬ to tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te gaˇ jaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
56002015	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ piˇ leh deˇ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇyan maˇ g'a te tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ te-o.
56003001	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, jawˇ mawˇ leh uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ leh yawˇ hui ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ-oˆ.
56003002	A shu hta‸ ka‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ g'a k'oˆ. Tawˇ maˇ g'a g'awˬ da‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ taˍ leh, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˆ yawˆ yan yan te tuˬ ka‸, yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ-oˆ.
56003003	Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui htawˇ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw, maˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve chaw, ya‸ k'aw ya‸ ve chaw, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ sheˉ lai leh ha lehˬ tuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai ve chaw, shu hta‸ hkawehˉ leh naˬ tuˬ te ve chaw, shu ngaˬ hui hta‸ canˇ leh, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ canˇ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ jaw ve yoˬ.
56003004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, yawˇ chaw yaˇ hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
56003005	Ngaˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve kanˉ te ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha k'aˉ ve hta‸ pa taw htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ suhˉ teˇ pawˆ paw la ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve tsuhˇ hk'a laˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ gu te laˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
56003006	Ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yawˇ cuˇ leh, oˇ ve nyiˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ hk'a biˇ ngeuˍ pfuhˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
56003007	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, co ti‸ ha ti‸ hta‸ dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui yawˇ ve awˬ shinˉ hta‸ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
56003008	Tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ nawˬ yonˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw hui lehˬ, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a te tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ g'aˇ hte‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, da‸ ve kanˉ hpeh‸ leh, chaw yaˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ ve yoˬ.
56003009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, cuˇ yiˍ maˇ cawˬ ve jehˬ da‸ cehˇ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ caˉ peuˬ teˇ caˉ shawˍ nyi ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ lawn tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, jaw k'ai-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ leh, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
56003010	Awˬ moˍ pehˬ da‸ hpaˆ da‸ tuˬ te ve chaw hta‸ teˇ pawˆ nyiˇ pawˆ hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ chawˇ taˇ k'aw‸ te.
56003011	Chi hk'e ve chaw lehˬ, nyi ma a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ hteˇ leh, venˇ baˆ te chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ shiˍ-o‸. Yawˇ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ suhˉ taˆ peuˬ.
56003012	Ngaˬ lehˬ, Aˍteˍmaˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Tuˇhkiˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ geh peu laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Niˇkawˇpaˍliˆ venˇ lo ngaˬ hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ tuˬ coˇ caˇ leh laˬ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ kaˆ ve awˬ yanˇ htaˇ venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
56003013	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ shiˍ pa Seˍnaˆ leh Aˍpawˇlu‸ hta‸ haˆ haˆ peu laˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ g'a loˍ tuˬ hk'a deh‸ ga piˇ-oˆ.
56003014	Ngaˬ hui ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ te k'ai hpeh‸ tuˬ maˍ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui chi hk'e te ve k'o, loˍ jaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ga piˇ hpeh‸ leh, awˬ shiˍ naw‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
56003015	Ngaˬ geh chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
57001001	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ pon htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ leh, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Tiˆmoˉseˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ geh teˇ geh kanˉ te ve ha‸ ve Hpiˇleˍmonˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ,
57001002	awˬ nyi ma Aˍpiˆ leh ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ geh teˇ geh bon hpawˇ ma‸ yaˇ te ve Aˍhkiˇpuˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ ve yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hpawnˬ da‸ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
57001003	Ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
57001004	Nawˬ lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve pa taw,
57001005	nawˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ngaˬ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
57001006	Ngaˬ bon lawˬ ve lehˬ, shu geh teˇ geh nawˬ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui cawˬ taˍ ve da‸ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ shiˍ maˇ la tuˬ awˬ pon ngaˬ lawˬ ve yoˬ.
57001007	Awˬ nyi paˍ-oˬ, nawˬ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ ha lehˬ dawˇ sha jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hta‸ pa taw Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve nyi ma awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
57001008	Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ te keunˍ te cawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon nawˬ hta‸ tawˇ piˇ tuˬ, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ha‸ hanˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ oˇ hk'e maˇ te.
57001009	Chaw mawˇ hpeh‸ leh, chi beu‸ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ pon htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ taˍ ve ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
57001010	Ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, co ha hpawˇ ngaˬ paw la piˇ taˍ ve, ngaˬ ve yaˇ Awˍneˍsiˍmuˆ awˬ pon ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
57001011	(Yawˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ awˬ pon awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ bon cawˬ tehˬ ve yoˬ.)
57001012	Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ geh k'aw‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ chi hk'e peuˬ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ ve nyi ma shiˍ hta‸ nawˬ geh peu laˇ ve hk'e yoˬ.
57001013	Ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ htawnˍ hk'aw g'a chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ nawˬ ve awˬ tan te leh ngaˬ awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ geh chehˇ tcuh gaˇ ve yoˬ.
57001014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ awˬ bon te laˇ ve lehˬ, g'a te ve pa taw te ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ g'a hpeh‸ leh, te gaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo te ve teˇ ceuˬ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ geh a hkaw-anˬ maˇ g'a ve ceh ceh, ngaˬ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ te gaˇ.
57001015	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ nawˬ geh hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chehˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ yanˇ g'a hpaˆ da‸ ve yoˬ hehˉ.
57001016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi teˇ pawˆ nawˬ geh k'aw‸ chehˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ ceˬ hk'e maˇ heˆ. Ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hk'e chehˇ piˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ htawˇ chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
57001017	Ngaˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na nawˬ ve awˬ chawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ shawˍ taˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve hk'e yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸.
57001018	Yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ te ya‸ ve maˇ k'oˆ, jeˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ cawˬ ve maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ ve jeˬ hk'e shawˍ taˍ-o‸.
57001019	Ngaˬ Pawˇlu‸ lehˬ, jeˬ oˇ ve hta‸ shaiˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ awˬ to bvuh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ awˬ to nawˬ ve co ha ngaˬ hta‸ shaiˍ laˇ cawˇ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'oˆ.
57001020	Awˬ nyi paˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ geh awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ g'a gaˇ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ ve nyi ma hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ-oˆ.
57001021	Nawˬ ngaˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ yonˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'oˆ ve a‸ kehˉ ka‸ nawˬ te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
57001022	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ a ciˉ gu taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui bon lawˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ pawˆ g'a k'aw‸ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law taˍ ve yoˬ.
57001023	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ geh teˇ geh htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ taˍ ve Eˇpaˍhpaˍraˆ lehˬ, nawˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
57001024	Ngaˬ geh teˇ geh kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ Maˍkuˆ, Aˍriˍtaˍhkuˆ, Deˍmaˆ leh Luˉka‸ hui htawˇ, nawˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
57001025	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
58001001	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh, awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ laiˉ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo laiˉ pawˆ tawˇ yaw piˇ ve yoˬ.
58001002	Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ chi awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ k'aw‸ yaw laˇ peuˬ. Awˬ shinˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, Yaˇ hpu oˇ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh, sha hpa‸ laˬ hpa‸ htaˆ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58001003	Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ba tawˆ la leh, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Kanˇ paˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh, hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ ha‸ shaˉ leh ga piˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ tsuhˇ baˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuh kuiˬ lo chehˇ ve kanˇ paˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo yawˇ mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
58001004	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui da‸ ve awˬ meh cawˬ ve a‸ kehˉ yawˇ g'a taˍ ve awˬ meh lehˬ da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ lehˬ yawˇ hui a‸ kehˉ uiˍ leuˉ da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ.
58001005	Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ. Ya‸ nyi ngaˬ nawˬ ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ la peuˬ, teh‸ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ jaw le. Maˇ heˆ k'o, Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ pa hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ngaˬ ve yaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ jaw le.
58001006	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yaˇ uiˍ hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ peu laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui loˬ, teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58001007	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ haw hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tcuh leh, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ aˬ miˍ ha hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ tcuh ve yoˬ, teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58001008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yaˇ hpu ve awˬ lawn chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, nawˬ ve k'aw jaw co co taiˍ taiˍ yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ nawˬ uˉ peunˍ ve yoˬ.
58001009	Nawˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ ha‸ leh, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ canˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw nawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pfuhˍ piˇ ve a‸ kehˉ, ha lehˬ ve naˍ manˇ nawˬ hta‸ yawˇ pfuhˍ laˇ peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58001010	Peuˬ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ nawˬ miˬ guiˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ taˍ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ htawˇ nawˬ ve la‸ sheh te hpanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58001011	Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ luˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ lehˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ veu‸ k'aˇ hk'e piˍ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
58001012	Aˉ po‸ lonˉ hta‸ lo‸ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ lo‸ leh k'aw‸ pa piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ leh, nawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ htawˇ maˇ peuˬ maˇ leh, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58001013	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, Nawˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve hkui sheh awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ taˍ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ-oˆ, teh‸ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ jaw le.
58001014	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ shinˉ hta‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ pon kanˉ te tuˬ, tcuh taˍ ve awˬ ha teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
58002001	Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ taˍ peuˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a jiˆ tawˆ-e tuˬ, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ leuˉ leh hk'a deh‸ na yuˬ-o‸.
58002002	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ tcuh ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ cawˇ ve pa taw, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te ya‸ leh maˇ na yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e yawˇ ciˍ yanˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58002003	Hk'e te leh, uiˍ jaˇ ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve chi hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e te ponˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le. Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ lawn chi awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'oˆ taˍ leh, g'a kaˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, Awˬ lawn chi awˬ tehˬ awˬ na cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
58002004	G'uiˬ sha htawˇ, awˬ heˆ leh anˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ pehˬ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
58002005	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ chehˇ ve, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ cawˬ la tuˬ ve miˬ guiˬ chi hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui awˬ hawˉ lo yawˇ teh taˍ ve maˇ heˆ.
58002006	Li‸ hpu teˇ kaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ chaw yaˇ hta‸ dawˇ nyi tuˬ, chaw yaˇ lehˬ aˬ hto‸ ma hpeh‸ ve le. Nawˬ chaw yaˇ ve yaˇ hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ, chaw yaˇ ve yaˇ lehˬ aˬ hto‸ ma hpeh‸ ve le.
58002007	Nawˬ yawˇ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo a ciˉ ceh tiˉ nehˬ piˇ leh, da‸ ve awˬ meh leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ, shi uˉ tcuhˍ hk'e nawˬ yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ piˇ taˍ peuˬ.
58002008	Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ ve hkui taw k'aw awˬ hawˉ lo nawˬ teh taˍ peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ teh taˍ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ teh taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ teh taˍ ve hta‸ chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ g'a mawˬ sheˍ.
58002009	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo a ciˉ ceh tiˉ nehˬ piˇ leh, suh ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve pa taw, da‸ ve awˬ meh leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ, shi uˉ tcuhˍ hk'e yawˇ hta‸ hk'awˆ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon suh ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
58002010	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ maˇ maˇ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ kuiˬ lo shiˍ k'ai ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ leh sheh k'ai piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la tuˬ yawˇ te piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hta‸ pa taw awˬ ceuˬ chi hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
58002011	Awˬ lawn k'o, da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ leh, yawˇ da‸ piˇ kehˍ piˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yawˇ maˇ ya‸ taw.
58002012	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ ve awˬ meh ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ awˬ k'aw ji lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
58002013	Yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'aˇ va tuˬ yoˬ. Peuˬ leh teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ leh G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ choˬ kaˬ lo chehˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58002014	Hk'e te leh, awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ htawˇ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ ve yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, yawˇ suh ve awˬ hk'aw lo, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'oˆ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve neˇ haiˬ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ,
58002015	suh ve hta‸ kawˆ ve pa taw, te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ co-e awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ ceˬ g'a te chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ ve yoˬ.
58002016	Awˬ lawn k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ ga piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ laˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na k'oˆ k'o, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ ga piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon laˬ ve yoˬ.
58002017	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ha k'aˉ puiˉ jaˇ leh ka ti‸ yeˬ ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ leh, chaw yaˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ awˬ to tanˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ g'a hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
58002018	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ to tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve leh beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ jaw peuˬ ve pa taw, beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ ga piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58003001	Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo kuˬ yuˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ ngaˬ hui geh hk'a geh g'a ve, da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o. Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui yonˍ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tcuh yaˇ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58003002	Moˉseˍ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ leh na yuˬ puiˉ ve hk'e, Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ leuˆ teh taˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ka ti‸ yeˬ leh na yuˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
58003003	Yehˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yehˬ a‸ kehˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ Moˉseˍ a‸ kehˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ keunˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58003004	Awˬ lawn k'o, yehˬ teˇ yehˬ le le lehˬ, te shehˍ hpaˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ te shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha yoˬ.
58003005	Moˉseˍ lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hk'a k'oˆ maˍ tuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ awˬ pon, G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hkaw, awˬ ceˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ka ti‸ yeˬ leh na yuˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
58003006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ Hkri‸ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ yaˇ paˍ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ka ti‸ yeˬ leh na yuˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui htawˇ, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, dawˇ law ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ leh nyi ma uiˍ tuˬ cawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ leh meuˇ hk'a gaˬ yeˬ chaweh vawˆ taˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui lehˬ yehˬ oˇ ve teˇ yehˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58003007	Hk'e te leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, Ya‸ nyi yawˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve k'o,
58003008	heh puiˉ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hta‸ lawˇ nyi leh nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ te laˇ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma taˇ heh piˇ.
58003009	Oˇ kaˬ lo nawˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui ngaˬ hta‸ lawˇ nyi canˇ nyi leh, awˇ chi hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yo.
58003010	Hk'e te leh, chaw oˇ ve teˇ co hta‸ ngaˬ nyi ma zuhˆ leh k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ ya‸ k'ai chehˇ leh, ngaˬ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58003011	Hk'e te leh, Yawˇ hui lehˬ ngaˬ ve g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e teh‸, nyi ma zuhˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hkanˍ taˍ peuˬ, teh‸ da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58003012	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve leh maˇ yonˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ te-o. Chi hk'e ve nyi ma lehˬ, nawˬ hui leh te‸ chehˇ ve, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ piˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
58003013	Venˇ baˆ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nyi ma maˇ g'a heh k'ai tuˬ, ya‸ nyi teh‸ k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ nyi le le nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ da‸-o‸.
58003014	Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ ve hk'e, awˬ leh meuˇ hk'a gaˬ nyi ma hk'a deh‸ yeˬ taˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui Hkri‸ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58003015	Li‸ hpu hk'aw k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, Ya‸ nyi yawˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve k'o, nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ te laˇ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma taˇ heh piˇ.
58003016	G'a kaˇ peuˬ ve htawˇ nyi ma zuhˆ tuˬ te ve chaw hui lehˬ, a shu le. Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo Moˉseˍ sheh tawˆ la ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
58003017	Awˇ chi hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ a shu hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ ve le. Venˇ baˆ te leh, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo paˍ suh-e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ heˆ laˇ.
58003018	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ ve g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e teh‸, a shu hta‸ yawˇ hkanˍ ve le. Maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hkanˍ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
58003019	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ hui maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw maˇ g'a lo‸-e ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
58004001	Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ cawˬ sheˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ maˇ g'a lo‸-e puiˉ-aˆ teh‸ nyiˬ hui teˇ geh dawˇ hkiˉ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
58004002	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ g'a kaˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui htawˇ g'a kaˇ peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui g'a kaˇ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ.
58004003	Ngaˬ hui yonˍ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Yawˇ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ ve g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e teh‸ nyi ma zuhˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hkanˍ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, miˬ guiˬ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ te taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
58004004	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te peuˬ leh, suhˍ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo g'aˇ jehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, suhˍ nyi teˇ nyi awˬ lawn Li‸ hpu teˇ kaˬ awˬ hk'aw lo k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58004005	Li‸ hpu teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo, Yawˇ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ ve g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e, teh‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58004006	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ peuˬ ve chaw hui maˇ na yuˬ ve pa taw yawˇ hui maˇ g'a lo‸-e ve htawˇ, g'a lo‸-e tuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ cawˬ ve pa taw,
58004007	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ awˬ nyi teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ tinˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yanˇ maw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Daˍviˆ hta‸ cuˇ leh ya‸ sheh bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Ya‸ nyi yawˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui nyi ma taˇ heh, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ tinˍ taˍ ve awˬ nyi oˇ ve lehˬ ya‸ nyi yoˬ.
58004008	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yawˇsuˆ lehˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e piˇ lawˬ peuˬ ve hk'e k'o, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ nyi hta‸ G'uiˬ sha k'aw‸ k'oˆ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
58004009	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon g'aˇ jehˇ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
58004010	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ kanˉ te peuˬ leh g'aˇ jehˇ ve hk'e, yawˇ ve g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te peuˬ leh g'aˇ g'a jehˇ ve yoˬ.
58004011	Hk'e te leh, g'aˇ jehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e tuˬ, ngaˬ hui g'aˇ hte‸ te-a veuˬ. Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, shu maˇ na yuˬ leh paiˍ ve hk'e, ngaˬ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ paiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
58004012	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, te‸ chehˇ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ viˇ nyiˇ hpawˇ cawˬ ve aˉ htaw hk'a peu-eˬ a‸ kehˉ tcuhˆ leh, nyi ma leh co ha hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ mu‸ ku awˬ tcuhˉ leh awˬ caw paw hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, juˆ pawnˍ leh pehˬ da‸ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ leh heuˆ gaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ, fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
58004013	Hk'a hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ faˉ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ k'u nyi hpeh‸ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ mawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58004014	Ngaˬ hui uiˍ jaˇ ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui yonˍ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yeˬ chaweh vawˆ taˍ-a veuˬ, Paw hkuˇ lonˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ hk'a gaˬ lo‸-e peuˬ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58004015	Ngaˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, maˇ ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hui cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ beˬ ve lawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ jaw ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ venˇ baˆ maˇ te.
58004016	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸, loˍ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ga laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ ka‸ g'a tuˬ, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ bon uiˍ ve k'aw jaw awˬ paˇ lo ngaˬ hui jiˆ k'ai-a veuˬ.
58005001	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ te tuˬ, chaw yaˇ hui awˬ tan leuˆ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon la‸ shawnˍ leh tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58005002	Yawˇ hui awˬ to htawˇ g'aˇ nuˇ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve pa taw, maˇ shiˍ ve chaw leh ya‸ k'ai ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hui ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
58005003	Yawˇ hui g'aˇ nuˇ puiˉ ve pa taw, chaw yaˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ pon g'a tanˇ piˇ ve hk'e, a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ awˬ pon htawˇ yawˇ hui g'a tanˇ piˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
58005004	Peuˬ leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ a shu yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ aˉ yaˇ chi hta‸ yuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Aˍronˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha kuˬ yuˬ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui hta‸ htawˇ G'uiˬ sha g'a kuˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
58005005	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Hkri‸ lehˬ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ taˍ uiˍ leh paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ ca te yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ lehˬ ngaˬ ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ nyi ngaˬ nawˬ ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ la peuˬ, teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ aˉ yaˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58005006	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu teˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve, Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ lehˬ co co taiˍ taiˍ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58005007	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ puiˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ leh mehˆ g'uiˬ ya‸ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ leh lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan puiˉ, na yuˬ puiˉ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve yoˬ.
58005008	Yawˇ lehˬ, Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve htawˇ tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ na yuˬ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ shiˍ la ve yoˬ.
58005009	Yawˇ biˇ la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a na yuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ pon yawˇ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
58005010	Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ paw hkuˇ lonˉ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
58005011	Awˬ lawn chi ngaˬ k'oˆ tuˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui haˆ haˆ na maˇ g'a puiˉ ve pa taw, tcuhˉ kuiˬ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ tuˬ haˍ ve yoˬ.
58005012	Awˬ yanˇ chi maw maw gaˬ peuˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi ve k'o, nawˬ hui lehˬ shu hta‸ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ cawˇ ve htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ lawn lonˉ ma teˇ hpaˍ, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ loˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Heh ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui caˇ maˇ g'a ve pa taw, cuˉ g'uiˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˬ cawˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
58005013	Awˬ lawn k'o, cuˉ g'uiˬ hta‸ dawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, yaˇ ehˉ hpeh‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve pa taw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ puiˉ.
58005014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, heh ve caˇ tuˬ lehˬ, chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ mawˬ ve kaˇ ve jawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ puiˉ la tuˬ laiˉ pawˆ te jawˬ ve pa taw, da‸ ve leh maˇ da‸ ve hta‸ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
58006001	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Hkri‸ ve awˬ lawn awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ ngaˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ teh taˉ leh, uiˍ la biˇ la tuˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai-a veuˬ. Suh taˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ,
58006002	baˆtiˆsaˬ awˬ lawn maˍ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, la‸ sheh taˍ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, suh ve chaw hui k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'o, co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ pon suhˉ jehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ ceh tiˉ taˇ k'aw‸ kawˍ chehˇ-oˆ.
58006003	G'uiˬ sha a hkaw-anˬ pe‸ laˇ ve k'o, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui teh taˉ leh awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
58006004	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve, mvuhˇ naw ma ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ g'a leh‸ nyi peuˬ ve leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ g'a peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ,
58006005	G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ tuˬ ve teˇ co ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, g'a leh‸ nyi peuˬ ve htawˇ,
58006006	yawˇ hui k'aw‸ luˬ k'aw‸ kuiˇ k'ai ve k'o, venˇ baˆ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ dawˇ hpfuhˇ tuˬ te maˇ hpeh‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui ka‸ G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo k'aw‸ hta‸ pehˍ leh, yawˇ hta‸ shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ya‸ taw tuˬ te piˇ ve yoˬ.
58006007	Miˬ guiˬ lehˬ, laiˉ pawˆ laˬ ve mvuhˇ yeˬ g'uiˬ hta‸ g'a chaw‸ leh, muiˬ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon awˬ bon cawˬ ve g'awˇ hpa‸ mvuhˬ naweh leh awˬ shiˍ awˬ nu hta‸ cawˬ la piˇ lawˬ ve k'o, miˬ guiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha na‸ piˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
58006008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, miˬ guiˬ oˇ ve aˉ chuˇ leh mvuh‸ teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ yeˬ la ve k'o, awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, baˬ taˍ leh hkeu ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ k'o, aˬ miˬ tuˉ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
58006009	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve htawˇ, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ da‸ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58006010	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui te taˍ ve kanˉ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hta‸ ga piˇ taˍ peuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, chi beu‸ ka‸ nawˬ hui chi hk'e te chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ha‸ pehnˇ ve chi G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon nawˬ hui hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ leunˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
58006011	Dawˇ law taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ biˇ la tuˬ ve awˬ pon, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le awˬ leh meuˇ hk'a gaˬ chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ g'aˇ hte‸ te tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
58006012	Hk'e te leh, a yehˉ yehˉ taˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yonˍ ve leh yeunˇ hkanˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, nawˬ hui htawˇ te-o.
58006013	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ ka ti‸ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58006014	Yawˇ hkanˍ taˍ ve lehˬ, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na bon na‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na maˇ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ leh hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
58006015	Hk'e te leh, Aˍbraˍhanˍ yeunˇ hkanˍ leh law taˍ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e yawˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
58006016	Chaw yaˇ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh hkanˍ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te peuˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58006017	G'uiˬ sha htawˇ, yawˇ dawˇ cheˆ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ pa puiˉ ve awˬ lawn, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ g'a taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ leuˉ leh hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ gaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ to hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ te ve yoˬ.
58006018	Ka ti‸ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ, chi nyiˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui ponˬ kuiˬ lo hpaw lo‸ la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ cawˬ taˍ ve dawˇ law taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yeˬ chaweh vawˆ taˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Maˇ pa puiˉ ve chi nyiˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ heˍ maˇ hpeh‸.
58006019	Dawˇ law ve chi lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ pon yeˬ leh maˇ jiˆ k'ai puiˉ ve sho k'uˉ k'aweh‸ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, hpaˬ kaˍ nyiˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58006020	Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ paw hkuˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ la leh, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo‸-e taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
58007001	Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Saˍlehnˍ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ leh, mvuh jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Aˍbraˍhanˍ bawˆ pehˍ taˉ leh k'aw‸ la chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍ dehˆ yawˇ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ leh bon na‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58007002	Aˍbraˍhanˍ htawˇ, yawˇ hk'a g'a taˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ chi pun teˇ pun yawˇ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve awˬ meh chi lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, Saˍlehnˍ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Tcuhˉ kuiˬ k'o, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58007003	Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ pa awˬ e maˇ cawˬ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ leh, yawˇ ve a sha‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ leh meuˇ maˇ cawˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yawˇ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58007004	Yawˇ hk'aˬ ma uiˍ jaˇ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ. Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ, bawˆ da‸ kuiˬ lo g'a veu laˇ ve mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hta‸ teˇ chi pun teˇ pun piˇ ve yoˬ.
58007005	Leˍviˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo paw hkuˇ te tuˬ aˉ yaˇ g'a ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ chi pun teˇ pun shaw yuˬ tuˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui geh g'a shaw yuˬ ve yoˬ.
58007006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ maˇ heˆ htawˇ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ geh yawˇ teˇ chi pun teˇ pun g'a leh, ka ti‸ teˇ hpaˍ g'a shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ bon na‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58007007	Uiˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, i ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ bon na‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn chi ve hta‸ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ.
58007008	Suh puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chi beu‸ teˇ yanˇ teˇ chi pun teˇ pun hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Te‸ chehˇ ve teh‸ yawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, oˇ ve teˇ yanˇ teˇ chi pun teˇ pun hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
58007009	Shu geh teˇ chi pun teˇ pun ha‸ yuˬ ve Leˍviˆ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ chi pun teˇ pun piˇ taˍ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58007010	Awˬ lawn k'o, Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ lehˬ Aˍbraˍhanˍ hta‸ hpuˇ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, Leˍviˆ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ puˍ lonˉ Aˍbraˍhanˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
58007011	Leˍviˆ chaw hui paw hkuˇ te ve teˇ yanˇ, Iˉsaˍraˍlaˆ chaw hui lehˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, Leˍviˆ chaw hui paw hkuˇ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw yaˇ hui biˇ la g'a ve hk'e k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma te awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu paw hkuˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la tuˬ loˍ sheˍ ve le. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, paw hkuˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Aˍronˍ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ heˆ. Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58007012	Awˬ lawn k'o, paw hkuˇ te ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ pa ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ htawˇ g'a pa ve yoˬ.
58007013	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ Li‸ hpu hk'aw k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ tanˇ kuiˬ lo kanˉ maˇ te jaw.
58007014	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'a deh‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ oˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ paw hkuˇ g'a te tuˬ ve awˬ lawn Moˉseˍ te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'oˆ taˍ.
58007015	Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu paw hkuˇ teˇ g'aˇ tawˆ la peuˬ ve pa taw, paw hkuˇ awˬ ceuˬ k'aw‸ pa peuˬ ve hta‸ leuˉ leh hk'a deh‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
58007016	Yawˇ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ yawˇ paw hkuˇ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ cawˇ ve pa taw hpeh‸ la ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ luˬ maˇ suh puiˉ ve a sha‸ te‸ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
58007017	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ lawn chi hk'e shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ Maˍlaˍhkiˆsaˍdehˆ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, co co taiˍ taiˍ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ G'uiˬ sha hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58007018	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ leh te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve pa taw, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha teh taˉ ve yoˬ.
58007019	(Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ biˇ la piˇ maˇ g'a.) Hk'e te leh, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ da‸ leuˉ ve dawˇ law tuˬ cawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha k'aw‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Dawˇ law tuˬ chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha geh lo jiˆ k'ai hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58007020	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hkanˍ taˍ ve maˇ cawˬ ka‸, paw hkuˇ te tuˬ aˉ yaˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
58007021	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ aˉ yaˇ g'a ve lehˬ, hkanˍ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ leh g'a ve yoˬ. Hkanˍ taˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hkanˍ taˍ leh, yawˇ k'aw‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ lehˬ co co taiˍ taiˍ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ leh hkanˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58007022	Chi hta‸ pa taw, da‸ leuˉ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ chi hta‸ yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58007023	Oˇ htaˇ, paw hkuˇ maˇ maˇ g'a cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ kanˉ te maˇ hpeh‸.
58007024	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ chehˇ ve pa taw, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yawˇ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58007025	Chi hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh G'uiˬ sha geh jiˆ laˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui awˬ pon lawˬ hkawˉ tuˬ, yawˇ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58007026	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, chi hk'e ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ hta‸ loˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve, ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve, cha‸ chiˆ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ taˍ ve leh, mvuhˇ naw ma mvuh ve a‸ kehˉ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ taˆ piˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58007027	Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu paw hkuˇ lonˉ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ awˬ pon, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ chaw yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve venˇ baˆ awˬ pon, teˇ nyi le le tanˇ tuˬ g'a tanˇ piˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ k'aw‸ tanˇ piˇ tuˬ maˇ loˍ.
58007028	Chaw yaˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ puiˉ ve htawˇ, paw hkuˇ lonˉ te tuˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ aˉ yaˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ laˬ ve hkanˍ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ biˇ jaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ aˉ yaˇ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58008001	Ngaˬ k'oˆ gaˇ ve awˬ lawn uiˍ ve lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Chi hk'e ve paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hui cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chehˇ ve Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ ve k'aw jaw la‸ sha paˇ lo mui taˍ leh,
58008002	awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo, kanˉ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw yaˇ te ve maˇ heˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha te taˍ ve yoˬ.
58008003	Awˬ lawn k'o, paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, la‸ shawnˍ leh tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ tanˇ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ hui hta‸ leuˆ teh taˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, paw hkuˇ lonˉ chi teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, tanˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ yawˇ g'a cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58008004	Yawˇ lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ taˍ ve hk'e k'o, yawˇ paw hkuˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te leh, la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ tanˇ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58008005	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ bon yehˬ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han leh aˉ g'uiˬ ha ceh hpeh‸ ve bon yehˬ teˇ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Moˉseˍ lehˬ aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ hta‸ te-a teh‸ te ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e maˍ piˇ ve, Hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hta‸ maw laˇ peuˬ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hk'a peu-eˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ te tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58008006	Chi beu‸ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, da‸ leuˉ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ pon awˬ kaˍ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'e, yawˇ g'a taˍ ve kanˉ htawˇ da‸ leuˉ ve yoˬ. Aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ oˇ ve da‸ leuˉ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, da‸ leuˉ ve ka ti‸ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ teh taˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
58008007	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ teˇ maˬ biˇ ve hk'e k'o, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ maˇ loˍ.
58008008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ teˇ yehˬ leh Yuˇda‸ teˇ yehˬ hta‸ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ ngaˬ teh taˍ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
58008009	Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ la‸ sheh g'awˬ leh Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo sheh tawˆ la ve teˇ nyi htaˇ, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ te piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hk'e maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ hk'aˇ suh yawˇ hui maˇ k'aw‸ te. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ teh taˉ ve yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58008010	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ teˇ yehˬ hta‸ ngaˬ te piˇ tuˬ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui ve nyi ma dawˇ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo keu piˇ leh, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ bvuh‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hui htawˇ ngaˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
58008011	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ-o‸ teh‸, mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ chawˇ chawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ maˍ piˇ da‸ tuˬ maˇ loˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo i jaˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ te leh uiˍ jaˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hta‸ shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
58008012	Ngaˬ yawˇ hui ve ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha k'aˉ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ, teh‸ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58008013	Ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˉ lawˉ piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ hta‸ awˬ piˍ hpeh‸ la piˇ lawˍ ve yoˬ. Maw jaˇ leh piˍ k'ai peuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ lehˬ, mehˉ k'ai paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
58009001	Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ lehˬ, oˉ k'oˍ pui ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve da‸ kehˬ ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
58009002	Awˬ lawn k'o, aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ hta‸ te taˍ leh, awˉ lawˉ teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo kawˆ faiˇ taˍ kuiˬ, hpui lawˇ leh, tanˇ taˍ ve hkaoˍ monˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve teˇ tawn hta‸ da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58009003	Hpaˬ kaˍ nyiˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ lo, da‸ kehˬ jaˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ teˇ tawn cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
58009004	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo shi oˍ taˍ ve sha tuˉ tanˇ kuiˬ leh, shi hk'a caw zuhˇ oˍ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ ta k'oˍ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ta k'oˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, maˍnaˆ shiˍ keu taˍ ve shi mu‸ hk'u, awˬ tuˍ tuˍ ve Aˍronˍ ve juˇ fuiˍ leh, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ liˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve haˉ pui baˉ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58009005	Ta k'oˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve hkeˍruˆbenˍ nyiˇ maˬ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hpehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hoˆ hta‸ beh taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ, teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ chi beu‸ k'oˆ maˇ tanˇ sheˍ.
58009006	Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chi hk'e te peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te tuˬ, aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ lo‸-e chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58009007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyiˇ tawn teˇ tawn awˬ hk'aw lo paw hkuˇ lonˉ teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ lo‸-e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, tanˇ piˇ tuˬ awˬ suhˍ yuˬ leh, teˇ hk'aw‸ teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ g'a lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
58009008	Aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve teˇ tawn cawˬ chehˇ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e tuˬ ve ya‸ k'aw maˇ pawnˍ sheˍ teh‸, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
58009009	Awˬ lawn chi lehˬ, chi teˇ co-e awˬ pon tawˇ pa haˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo la‸ shawnˍ leh tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ tanˇ piˇ chehˇ ve htawˇ, la‸ shawnˍ leh tanˇ tuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, oˉ k'oˍ pui la ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ biˇ la tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
58009010	Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, caˇ tuˬ dawˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, tsuhˇ baˬ ve laiˉ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ to hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ leh k'aw‸ gu hteˇ ve awˬ yanˇ hk'a gaˬ ceh tiˉ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
58009011	Pawˇ hkuˇ lonˉ te leh da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ te laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon Hkri‸ gaˬ la htaˇ, leuˉ leh uiˍ jaˇ biˇ jaˇ ve aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hpanˍ k'ai leh, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ k'aw‸ lo‸-e tuˬ maˇ loˍ. Aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, la‸ sheh te taˍ ve maˇ heˆ, miˬ guiˬ chi hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ.
58009012	Da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ lo‸-e ve teˇ yanˇ, aˉ cheˬ leh nuˇ ehˉ awˬ suhˍ hta‸ yuˬ lo‸-e ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ yuˬ lo‸-e ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui co co taiˍ taiˍ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yawˇ te ve yoˬ.
58009013	Awˬ lawn k'o, aˉ che‸ leh nuˇ paˍ ve awˬ suhˍ ka‸, nuˇ ma haˉ hta‸ tuˉ tanˇ ve hk'aw‸ laˉ ka‸, awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hpawˇ maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ hpeh‸ pfuhˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ tuˬ te g'a ve k'o,
58009014	Hkri‸ ve awˬ suhˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo suh taˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ piˇ leh, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon kanˉ te hpeh‸ tuˬ, chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh hk'aˬ ma te g'a tuˬ le. Yawˇ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ chehˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ cuˇ leh, awˬ kuiˉ awˬ haiˇ a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ ve awˬ to G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58009015	Chi hta‸ pa taw, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ hawˉ lo te ya‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, Yeˍsuˆ hkanˍ suh peuˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve co co taiˍ taiˍ ve awˬ shinˉ hta‸ g'a tuˬ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ awˬ pon awˬ kaˍ te shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58009016	Awˬ shinˉ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon li‸ bvuh‸ teh taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve k'o, awˬ shinˉ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na suh peuˬ ve hta‸ awˉ lawˉ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
58009017	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ shinˉ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon li‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ suh peuˬ htaˇ heh‸ awˬ shinˉ pehˬ piˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ te‸ chehˇ ve ceh ceh, bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e awˬ shinˉ pehˬ piˇ maˇ hpeh‸ sheˍ.
58009018	Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ teˇ maˬ ka‸, awˬ suhˍ maˇ yehˇ leh tanˬ te laˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
58009019	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ le le Moˉseˍ chaw chi ma ve hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, nuˇ ehˉ awˬ suhˍ leh aˉ che‸ awˬ suhˍ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ hkaw‸ da‸ leh, nyiˉ-ehˍ ve yawˬ mvuh leh huˇsoˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve mvuh‸ teˇ tsuh‸ hta‸ yehˇ leh, li‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hpeh‸ pfuhˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58009020	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ suhˍ chi lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58009021	Aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ leh oˇ kaˬ lo yehˇ ve awˬ hk'eun hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ htawˇ, oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ awˬ suhˍ yuˬ leh hpeh‸ pfuhˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58009022	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, aˬ laˬ hk'e awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ awˬ suhˍ yuˬ leh tsuhˇ baˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ suhˍ sheˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ k'o, venˇ baˆ hpehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
58009023	Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ tuˬ, chi hk'e ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ tuˬ, leuˉ leh da‸ ve tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a yehˇ ve yoˬ.
58009024	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ chaw yaˇ la‸ sheh te taˍ ve da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e ve maˇ heˆ. Oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve chehˇ kuiˬ teˇ maˬ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han ceh hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ chehˇ taˍ tuˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo yawˇ lo‸-e taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
58009025	Paw hkuˇ lonˉ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ maˇ heˆ ve hta‸ yuˬ leh, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ hk'aw‸ le le lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ lehˬ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ awˬ to laiˉ pawˆ g'a tanˇ piˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
58009026	Oˇ hk'e g'a tanˇ piˇ ve k'o, miˬ guiˬ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸ tanˬ leh, yawˇ laiˉ pawˆ g'a hkanˍ suh tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ awˬ to tanˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ tuˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
58009027	Chaw yaˇ hui lehˬ, teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ suh leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
58009028	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ Hkri‸ lehˬ, chaw maˇ maˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hkanˍ pfuhˇ tuˬ, teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ yawˇ awˬ to tanˇ piˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ ya‸ la htaˇ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ya‸ la leh, yawˇ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
58010001	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, gaˬ la tuˬ ve da‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve aˉ g'uiˬ ha ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, teˇ hk'aw‸ peuˬ teˇ hk'aw‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ tanˇ tuˬ hta‸ ceh tiˉ tanˇ piˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ paˇ lo jiˆ k'ai ve chaw hui hta‸ biˇ la tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
58010002	Yawˇ hui biˇ la ve hk'e k'o, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hui tanˇ tuˬ maˇ k'aw‸ tanˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. Oˉ k'oˍ pui la ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ pawˆ da‸ peuˬ kehˬ peuˬ ve hk'e k'o, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve teh‸, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hk'aw maˇ k'aw‸ dawˇ.
58010003	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, tanˇ tuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tanˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, teˇ hk'aw‸ peuˬ teˇ hk'aw‸ venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ la ve yoˬ.
58010004	Awˬ lawn k'o, nuˇ paˍ awˬ suhˍ leh aˉ che‸ awˬ suhˍ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ maˇ hpeh‸ taˬ.
58010005	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Hkri‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ tanˇ tuˬ leh la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ heuˆ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ ngaˬ awˬ pon awˬ to gu taˍ peuˬ.
58010006	Aˬ miˍ tuˉ tanˇ ve tanˇ tuˬ leh, venˇ baˆ awˬ pon tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ha lehˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
58010007	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, lo‸ taˍ ve li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ awˬ lawn bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ ve a loˍ hta‸ te tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010008	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Tanˇ tuˬ leh la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, aˬ miˍ tuˉ tanˇ ve tanˇ tuˬ leh venˇ baˆ awˬ pon tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ maˇ heuˆ gaˇ leh maˇ ha lehˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. (Tanˇ tuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.)
58010009	Nyi loˬ, nawˬ ve a loˍ hta‸ te tuˬ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ve teˇ maˬ hta‸ yeˬ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve teˇ maˬ hta‸ yawˇ baˬ taˉ ve yoˬ.
58010010	Oˇ hk'e te tuˬ G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yawˇ ve awˬ to teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ tanˇ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ.
58010011	Paw hkuˇ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, teˇ nyi le le tanˇ kuiˬ lo huˉ taˍ leh, venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ maˇ g'a ve tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tanˇ piˇ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010012	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a tuˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ pon tanˇ tuˬ teˇ maˬ tiˉ ve hta‸ tanˇ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sha paˉ lo mui taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010013	Yawˇ oˇ kaˬ lo mui taˍ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve hkui taw k'aw hawˉ lo, G'uiˬ sha taˍ piˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ law chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010014	Awˬ lawn k'o, tanˇ tuˬ teˇ maˬ tiˉ ve hta‸ tanˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ co co taiˍ taiˍ biˇ la piˇ peuˬ.
58010015	Da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu htawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o yawˇ k'oˆ ve,
58010016	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ te tuˬ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo keu piˇ leh, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma dawˇ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ngaˬ bvuh‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010017	Peuˬ leh, Yawˇ hui ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ leh haiˬ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58010018	Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, venˇ baˆ awˬ pon tanˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ loˍ.
58010019	Hk'e te leh, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ te leh lo‸-e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58010020	Ngaˬ hui lo‸-e ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon hpaˬ kaˍ hta‸ yehˬ baˬ taˍ leh, co ha te‸ ve ya‸ k'aw awˬ suhˉ teˇ caˆ yawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon te pawnˍ taˍ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui cuˇ leh lo‸-e ve yoˬ. Hpaˬ kaˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ to hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58010021	G'uiˬ sha ve yehˬ teˇ yehˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ uiˍ jaˇ ve paw hkuˇ teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hui cawˬ ve yoˬ.
58010022	Hk'e te leh, shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ mehˉ k'ai htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ awˬ suhˍ hpeh‸ pfuhˍ laˇ leh da‸ kehˬ ve iˉ kaˆ hta‸ yehˇ leh ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ laˇ peuˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui hk'a biˇ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ geh jiˆ lo‸-e veuˬ.
58010023	Ngaˬ hui hkanˍ yuˬ taˍ ve dawˇ law ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hiˆ hiˆ naˇ naˇ maˇ te leh, yeˬ chaweh vawˆ taˍ-a veuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ka ti‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve yoˬ.
58010024	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ pehnˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ leh, da‸ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te tuˬ, shu hta‸ dawˇ nyi leh awˬ g'aˇ piˇ-a veuˬ.
58010025	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ teˇ geh hpawnˬ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ peuˬ. Nawˬ hui oˇ hk'e taˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ nyi oˇ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, leuˉ leh awˬ g'aˇ piˇ da‸ chehˇ-oˆ.
58010026	Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ leh ha‸ yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh venˇ baˆ k'aw‸ te ve k'o, venˇ baˆ awˬ pon tanˇ tuˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ.
58010027	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, kawˆ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve suhˉ jehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo aˬ miˍ tuˉ baˬ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, law taˍ tuˬ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
58010028	Moˉseˍ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te ya‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o shehˆ g'aˇ cawˬ ve k'o, shu yawˇ hta‸ maˇ ha k'aˉ leh tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
58010029	G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ naˆ tiˍ taˍ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ da‸ kehˬ piˇ lawˬ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ ve teh‸ shawˍ leh, awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh hk'aˬ ma hehnˇ jaˇ ve ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hkanˍ keunˍ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ ve le.
58010030	Awˬ lawn k'o, K'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve kanˉ yoˬ. Ngaˬ k'aw‸ shaiˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi hk'e k'oˆ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010031	Te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo ce lo‸-e tuˬ ve lehˬ, kawˆ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58010032	Ponˬ laˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ haˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ. Oˇ htaˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yeunˇ hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ g'a bawˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
58010033	Shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, oˇ hk'e g'a hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh nawˬ hui nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ jaw ve yoˬ.
58010034	Awˬ lawn k'o, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui ha k'aˉ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, shu nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ hiˉ yuˬ lu yuˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh da‸ jaˇ ve, maˇ mehˉ puiˉ maˇ luˬ puiˉ ve mawˇ jeˬ nawˬ hui cawˬ taˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010035	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ taˇ baˬ taˉ. Awˬ lawn k'o, oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw la‸ shawnˍ uiˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
58010036	G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui te leh, yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ nawˬ hui loˍ ve yoˬ.
58010037	Awˬ lawn k'o, laˬ tuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ maˇ law chehˇ leh maˇ maw maw gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
58010038	Ngaˬ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ jiˆ k'o‸-e ve k'o, ngaˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ maˇ heˆ, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58010039	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui lehˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ jiˆ k'o‸-e leh luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui ve co ha htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58011001	Yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui dawˇ law taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na g'a tuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui maˇ mawˬ sheˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na cawˬ taˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui hk'a deh‸ deh‸ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58011002	Aˍ sho-eˬ htaˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ yonˍ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ nyi hk'aˇ suh ve yoˬ.
58011003	G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw sha hpa‸ laˬ hpa‸ htaˆ hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, maˇ mawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
58011004	Aˍbeˍlaˆ lehˬ, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, Kaˍiˉnaˆ ve tanˇ tuˬ a‸ kehˉ da‸ ve tanˇ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ha‸ yuˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, Aˍbeˍlaˆ suh peuˬ htawˇ, yonˍ ve oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yawˇ tawˇ yaw chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
58011005	Eˇnawˆ lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma lo yuˬ taˆ-e ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ yuˬ taˆ-e ve pa taw, shu yawˇ hta‸ ca maˇ mawˬ. G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ maˇ yuˬ taˆ-e sheˍ htaˇ, Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh ve yoˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
58011006	Chaw yaˇ lehˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ te maˇ g'a. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha geh jiˆ k'ai ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha cawˬ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ ca ve chaw hui hta‸ awˬ bon piˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ g'a yonˍ ve yoˬ.
58011007	Noˉa‸ lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, maˇ hpeh‸ la sheˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ hto piˇ maˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo na yuˬ leh, yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ g'a ponˬ tuˬ, yawˇ haw lo‸ k'oˍ te ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ taˆ leh, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
58011008	Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ awˬ shinˉ g'a tuˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lo k'ai tuˬ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ kuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, hk'aˬ lo g'a k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ htawˇ na yuˬ leh k'ai ve yoˬ.
58011009	Yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ g'a tuˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, shu mvuhˇ miˬ hk'aw ca chehˇ ve chaw hk'e yawˇ hkehˉ chaw te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ geh teˇ geh mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a tuˬ ve Iˉcaˆ leh Yaˍkoˆ hui geh aˉ po k'o teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58011010	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha kawˍ taˍ te taˍ ve, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ yeˬ jaˇ ve venˇ hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58011011	Saˍraˇ htawˇ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, yaˇ hu ve awˬ yanˇ leh peuˬ ve htawˇ, yawˇ yaˇ hu g'a ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ka ti‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58011012	Hk'e te leh, mawˇ jaˇ leh suh paˇ neˇ ve hawˉ hk'aˆ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo cawˬ ve meu‸ keu shiˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ jaˇ leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ lo cawˬ ve shehˇ shiˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ g'aw maˇ g'a htaˇ hk'a gaˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
58011013	Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo suh ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ g'a sheˍ htawˇ, awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ vuiˇ kuiˬ lo yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ leh ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ htaˇ, shu mvuhˇ shu miˬ lo hkehˉ chaw hk'e hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58011014	Oˇ hk'e k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui g'a tuˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ ca chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ hui hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
58011015	Yawˇ hui tawˆ la ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve k'o, yawˇ hui k'o‸-e tuˬ awˬ yanˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
58011016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui dawˇ law taˍ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, oˇ ve a‸ kehˉ da‸ ve mvuhˇ naw ma mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, shu k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ ya‸ taw. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui chehˇ tuˬ awˬ pon venˇ hta‸ yawˇ gu taˍ peuˬ.
58011017	Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ Iˉcaˆ hta‸ yuˬ leh tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58011018	Iˉcaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ cawˬ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ka ti‸ g'a taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ ve hta‸ tanˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
58011019	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ chaw yaˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ puiˉ ve hta‸ yawˇ yonˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ pa haˉ k'oˆ ve k'o, suh kuiˬ lo yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ hta‸ yawˇ k'aw‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
58011020	Iˉcaˆ lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, Yaˍkoˆ leh Iˉsawˇ hta‸ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ g'a tuˬ ve awˬ bon na‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58011021	Yaˍkoˆ lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, suh la paˇ neˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yoˇseh‸ ve yaˇ paˍ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ bon na‸ piˇ leh, yawˇ ve juˇ fuiˍ awˬ meuˇ awˬ hk'oˆ boˆ taˍ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
58011022	Yoˇseh‸ lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ ve a sha‸ leh la paˇ neˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ g'a tawˆ k'ai tuˬ ve awˬ lawn hto piˇ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ mu‸ ku hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te tuˬ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ tawˇ piˇ taˉ ve yoˬ.
58011023	Moˉseˍ ve awˬ pa awˬ e lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, Moˉseˍ paw la peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ha pa sheh lehˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hta‸ faˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve lehˬ awˬ hkiˇ awˬ nganˇ da‸ jaˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ g'a mawˬ leh, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ maˇ kawˆ.
58011024	Moˉseˍ lehˬ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ uiˍ la ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, Hpaˍrawˇ yaˇ miˇ ve awˬ yaˇ paˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ hkanˍ gaˇ.
58011025	Teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ yanˇ venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw ha lehˬ chehˇ ve a‸ kehˉ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ geh hk'a geh g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ leuˉ leh heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
58011026	Hkri‸ awˬ pon g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve da‸ jaˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve teh‸, yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ g'a tuˬ ve la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58011027	Yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ kawˆ leh, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, mawˬ maˇ hpeh‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ mawˬ taˍ ve hk'e te leh, yawˇ nyi ma yeˬ ve yoˬ.
58011028	Yaˇ uiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te luˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a htawˇ tuˬ, Moˉseˍ yawˇ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, Paˍsaˍhkaˍ pawehˇ te leh awˬ suhˍ hpeh‸ pfuhˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58011029	Yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ goˇ lehˍ ve miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ juˇ k'ai ve hk'e, Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ nyi hta‸ hkanˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ Eˇjiˇtu‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hkanˍ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, k'a suh peuˬ ve yoˬ.
58011030	Yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw hui Yeˍriˆhkoˇ venˇ hta‸ suhˍ nyi caw peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, lanˇ venˇ paˆ ce ve yoˬ.
58011031	Meh maˬ lanˉ Raˍhaˆ lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh maˇ g'a luˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, jaˆ nyi shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ha lehˬ ha k'a ha‸ yuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
58011032	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ aˬ hto‸ ma g'a k'aw‸ k'oˆ tuˬ sheˍ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, Giˉdonˍ, Baˍrehˆ, Saˍsonˍ, Yeˍhpaˍtaˆ, Daˍviˆ, Saˍmo-eˍlaˆ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn ca k'aoˍ maˇ peuˬ taˬ.
58011033	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'aˇ ve, hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ uˉ peunˍ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a taˍ ve, laˇ caˬ shiˉ ve maw‸ k'aw hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve,
58011034	hehnˇ jaˇ ve aˬ miˍ hta‸ shiˉ pehˍ g'aˇ ve, aˉ htaw la‸ hk'aw g'a ponˬ ve, awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve hta‸ g'a ve, ma‸ bawˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ la leh, shu mvuhˇ miˬ ve ma‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ.
58011035	Yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, suh kuiˬ lo a shu yawˇ ve chaw k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, hehnˇ jaˇ ve fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, leuˉ leh da‸ ve k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, shu ponˬ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ hkanˍ yuˬ.
58011036	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te leh dawˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, sho caˆ hpeh leh htawnˍ hk'aw keu taˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
58011037	Shu haˉ pui baˬ ve, liˉ leu g'eu‸ cheˆ ve leh, aˉ htaw chaw pehˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Haˍ g'awˇ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ, fawˉ ve mehˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˬ guiˬ k'uˉ aˉ che‸ guiˬ k'uˉ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, teˇ kaˬ peuˬ teˇ kaˬ lo yawˇ hui g'a hpaw toˇ ve yoˬ.
58011038	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, heh puiˉ hk'aw leh hk'aw hk'oˆ lawˬ hk'oˆ lo, miˬ k'oˍ haˉ k'oˍ hk'aw lo ca chehˇ toˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui da‸ ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ chi yawˇ hui hta‸ maˇ keunˍ.
58011039	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, yawˇ hui yonˍ ve teh‸ G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve htawˇ, ka ti‸ piˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ g'a sheˍ.
58011040	Aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ pa taw le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh maˇ heˆ k'o, yawˇ hui biˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a sheˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon da‸ leuˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ gu taˍ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
58012001	Hk'e te leh, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ chi taw taw maˇ leh, moˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ hui hta‸ caw zuhˇ chehˇ taˍ ve pa taw, tawˍ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ sheˬ leh, hawˆ taˍ ve venˇ baˆ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'ehˆ baˬ taˉ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ pon gu taˍ laˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ nyi ma yeˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'uiˇ k'ai-a veuˬ.
58012002	G'uiˇ k'ai chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ nyi taˍ-o‸. Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ tanˬ te leh biˇ la piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ teh taˍ ve ha lehˬ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw, ya‸ taw ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ leh, la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh peuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ chi beu‸ G'uiˬ sha ve k'aw jaw la‸ sha paˉ lo mui chehˇ taˍ peuˬ.
58012003	Nawˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ maˇ g'a nuˇ leh, nyi ma maˇ g'a luˬ tuˬ, venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo chi taw taw hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na te leh tawˍ taˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o.
58012004	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hta‸ g'a tawˍ da‸ bawˆ da‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui ve awˬ suhˍ sheˆ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ maˇ g'a hkanˍ jaw sheˍ.
58012005	Yaˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ pa maˍ piˇ ve hk'e, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ maˍ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui leunˇ peuˬ laˇ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ yaˇ paˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha maˍ laˇ ve hta‸ hk'e leˇ taˇ dawˇ. Yawˇ nawˬ hta‸ deˇ maˍ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, nyi ma taˇ luˬ.
58012006	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ ha‸ ve chaw hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve yaˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ jaw‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58012007	Yawˇ maˍ laˇ ve hta‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ-o‸. Yaˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ pa te piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ te laˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ pa maˇ maˍ piˇ ve yaˇ paˍ a shu teˇ g'aˇ cawˬ le.
58012008	Yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ maˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve hk'e nawˬ hui maˇ g'a hkanˍ ve k'o, nawˬ hui yaˇ awˬ tehˬ ma hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58012009	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ awˬ pa teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ hui yawˆ yan ve yoˬ. Chi a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh, co ha hpawˇ ve Awˬ pa awˬ hawˉ lo ngaˬ hui chehˇ leh co ha g'a te‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
58012010	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ hui hta‸ teˇ tcuhˉ teˇ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ da‸ ve kehˬ ve hk'e ngaˬ hui htawˇ da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon da‸ ve hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ leh maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
58012011	Maˍ laˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, ha lehˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve maˇ heˆ, dawˇ haˍ tuˬ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve awˬ shiˍ naw‸ la ve yoˬ.
58012012	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui ve la‸ sheh deu lehˍ te chehˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chiˇ leh, awˬ g'aˇ maˇ cawˬ ve hkui tcuhˉ k'u teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ-oˆ.
58012013	Hkui sheh luˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ tcuhˉ maˇ g'a jiˆ k'ai leh na-e la tuˬ, nawˬ hui ve hkui sheh awˬ pon ya‸ k'aw hteˇ lehˍ gu taˍ-o‸.
58012014	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, da‸ la kehˬ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, g'aˇ hte‸ te-o. Da‸ ve kehˬ ve maˇ cawˬ ve chaw a shu teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ.
58012015	Nawˬ hui shaˍ ti‸ hk'a deh‸ taˍ-o‸. Maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ maˇ g'a puiˉ-aˆ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ laˇ tuˬ, hk'aˇ ve awˬ geu tawˆ la leh, chaw maˇ maˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ htawˇ te laˇ puiˉ-aˆ.
58012016	Awˍ teˇ poˬ ceh tiˉ g'a caˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, yaˇ uiˍ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ hawˇ baˬ ve Iˉsawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve chaw, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ hk'a deh‸ taˍ-o‸.
58012017	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ Iˉsawˇ lehˬ na‸ piˇ ve awˬ bon hta‸ k'aw‸ heuˆ gaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, baˬ taˉ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Mehˆ g'uiˬ ya‸ la ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ ca ve htawˇ, k'aw‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ awˬ yanˇ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ.
58012018	Awˬ lawn k'o, la‸ sheh htawˇ g'a ve, aˬ miˍ to‸ ve, naˆ tawˉ naˆ ho‸ ve leh, mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ la ve hk'aw teˇ shiˍ lo nawˬ hui laˬ ve maˇ heˆ.
58012019	Hk'aw oˇ ve teˇ shiˍ lo behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ leh tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ yaw laˇ tuˬ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
58012020	Awˬ lawn k'o, To nuˇ to shaˆ ka‸ hk'aw oˇ ve hta‸ g'a daw‸ ve k'o, haˉ pui baˬ pehˍ-o‸ teh‸, tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui hkanˍ maˇ g'a.
58012021	Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, kawˆ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve pa taw, Ngaˬ kawˆ cheˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, Moˉseˍ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
58012022	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui laˬ ve lehˬ, Ziˉonˍ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo laˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'aw oˇ ve lehˬ, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve venˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ ve Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ, ca g'aw maˇ peuˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ,
58012023	mvuhˇ naw ma ve caˇ lanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh bvuh‸ taˍ ve yaˇ uiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ suhˉ jehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha geh lo, biˇ la peuˬ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui ve co ha teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ kuiˬ lo,
58012024	ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ awˬ suhˉ awˬ pon awˬ kaˍ te shehˍ hpaˇ Yeˍsuˆ geh lo leh, Aˍbeˍlaˆ ve awˬ suhˍ tawˇ yaw ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh da‸ ve tawˇ hta‸ yaw ve, pfuhˍ taˍ ve awˬ suhˍ geh lo nawˬ hui laˬ ve yoˬ.
58012025	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, tawˇ yaw laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na ve chaw maˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo shaˍ ti‸ piˇ sheh hpaˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ na ve pa taw maˇ g'a ponˬ ve k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve shaˍ ti‸ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui maˇ na ve k'o, leuˉ leh ponˬ maˇ hpeh‸.
58012026	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ miˬ guiˬ hta‸ hiˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ ka ti‸ cawˬ taˍ ve lehˬ, Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ ngaˬ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ hiˆ piˇ tuˬ sheˍ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ htawˇ hiˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58012027	Teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ hiˆ piˇ tuˬ sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve lehˬ, hiˆ piˇ maˇ g'a ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ yeˬ chehˇ tuˬ, hiˆ piˇ g'a ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Hiˆ piˇ g'a ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, te hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58012028	Hk'e te leh, hiˆ piˇ maˇ g'a ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-a veuˬ. Yawˆ yan puiˉ kawˆ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve hk'e yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui-a veuˬ.
58012029	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, to‸ baˬ chehˇ ve aˬ miˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58013001	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi ha‸ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
58013002	Hkehˉ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ tuˬ taˇ leunˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hkehˉ chaw hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ jaw ve yoˬ.
58013003	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve chaw hui geh teˇ geh chehˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ shawˍ taˍ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui htawˇ awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ taˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ.
58013004	Awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ heuˆ da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ chaw hk'a peu-eˬ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ hpawˇ awˬ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh taˇ k'ai. Awˬ lawn k'o, guiˇ ya‸ ve chaw leh haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
58013005	Hpu hta‸ sheˉ lai ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo taˇ cawˬ piˇ. Nawˬ hui hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi hk'aˇ suh chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ hpaˆ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ baˬ teh‸ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
58013006	Chi hta‸ pa taw, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ ga laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ kawˆ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ. Chaw yaˇ ngaˬ hta‸ aˬ hto‸ ma te laˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ le, teh‸ nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui k'oˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
58013007	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpa hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ nyi leh, yawˇ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ henˇ yuˬ leh te-o.
58013008	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, aˉ nyi, ya‸ nyi leh co co taiˍ taiˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58013009	Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ shu laiˉ ceuˬ ca maˍ la ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh nawˬ hui taˇ k'ai. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ pa taw nyi ma yeˬ ve k'o, da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Caˇ tuˬ ce kan ve hta‸ pa taw nyi ma yeˬ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Caˇ tuˬ ce kan ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ yehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ bon maˇ g'a.
58013010	Ngaˬ hui tanˇ kuiˬ teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tanˇ kuiˬ chi teˇ maˬ lo g'a caˇ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ maˇ cawˬ.
58013011	Awˬ lawn k'o, paw hkuˇ lonˉ lehˬ venˇ baˆ hpehˇ tuˬ ve tanˇ tuˬ awˬ pon to nuˇ to shaˆ ve awˬ suh hta‸ yuˬ leh, da‸ kehˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ to oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ baˬ lo aˬ miˍ tuˉ baˬ ve yoˬ.
58013012	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ Yeˍsuˆ htawˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw chaw yaˇ hta‸ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ tuˬ, lanˇ venˇ yehˬ miˉ awˬ baˬ lo yawˇ hkanˍ suh ve yoˬ.
58013013	Hk'e te leh ngaˬ hui htawˇ, shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te ve hta‸ yawˇ hkanˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ hui hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, deh kuiˬ awˬ baˬ lo yawˇ geh tawˆ k'ai-a veuˬ.
58013014	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yeˬ ve venˇ maˇ cawˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ cawˬ la tuˬ ve venˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ law leh ca chehˇ ve yoˬ.
58013015	Hk'e te leh, Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ chiˇ mvuh ve tanˇ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ tanˇ piˇ-a veuˬ. Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ ve awˬ meh hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
