58013016	Da‸ ve hta‸ te ve teˇ ceuˬ leh shu hta‸ mawˇ jeˬ pehˬ piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ taˇ leunˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chi hk'e ve tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ.
58013017	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ hoˉ teˇ hpaˍ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui te ve kanˉ awˬ lawn G'uiˬ sha hta‸ g'a k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ve co ha hta‸ yawˇ hui hk'a deh‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui chi hk'e nyi ha‸ shaˉ chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, dawˇ haˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ leh ha lehˬ ha k'a te hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui ve hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o. Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon te‸ chiˉ maˇ cawˬ.
58013018	Ngaˬ awˬ pon bon lawˬ laˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma lehˬ, ya‸ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ ngaˬ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ da‸ ve hta‸ tiˉ te gaˇ ve yoˬ.
58013019	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh haˆ haˆ g'a k'aw‸ la hpeh‸ tuˬ ve, bon lawˬ laˇ tuˬ leuˉ leh ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
58013020	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ uiˍ jaˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Co co taiˍ taiˍ ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ te tuˬ yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ sheˆ leh, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ ve yoˬ.
58013021	Dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ te shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui te g'a tuˬ, da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la tuˬ ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ lawˬ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nyi ma cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
58013022	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ngeh ve li‸ teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ leh na yuˬ tuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
58013023	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Tiˆmoˉseˍ hta‸ shu hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ ve teh‸ shiˍ-o‸. Yawˇ haˆ haˆ gaˬ la ve k'o, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh laˬ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ g'a mawˬ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
58013024	Nawˬ hui ve awˬ hoˉ hk'a peu-eˬ leh Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ hto piˇ-oˆ. Choˬ kaˬ lo chehˇ taˍ ve Iˉtaˍliˍ chaw teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
58013025	Nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ geh awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
59001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha leh Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ Yaˍkoˆ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hpaˆ da‸ k'ai peuˬ ve chaw teˇ chi nyiˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo dawˇ sha ha lehˬ tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
59001002	Ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, beˬ ve lawˇ ve laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
59001003	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma lehˬ, lawˇ nyi ve hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ htaˇ, nawˬ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
59001004	Nawˬ hui teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ yawnˇ k'ai leh, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te-o.
59001005	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ cuˇ yiˍ maˇ biˇ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha geh lawˬ-o‸. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, maˇ deˇ leh chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ chaweh hk'e leˇ piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, cuˇ yiˍ lawˬ ve chaw hta‸ ka‸ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
59001006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo lawˬ-o‸. Nyi ma htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, nyi ma htawˇ dawˇ nawˬ dawˇ te ve chaw lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ mvuhˇ haw meuˆ leh g'uiˬ baˇ taˆ taˆ ya‸ ya‸ te ve hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59001007	Oˇ hk'e ve chaw lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha geh yawˇ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ g'a tuˬ ve teh‸ taˇ dawˇ.
59001008	Yawˇ lehˬ, nyi ma nyiˇ shiˍ cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ maˇ yeˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59001009	Shu awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ ve k'o, yawˇ ha lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
59001010	Paw sha ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ maˇ cawˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ ve k'o, yawˇ htawˇ ha lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, paw sha ve chaw lehˬ, mvuh‸ veˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
59001011	Mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ la leh, haw jaˇ chiˆ jaˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuh‸ lehˬ nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai ve yoˬ. Awˬ veˆ ka‸ piˬ k'ai ce k'ai leh, nyi sha ve awˬ ceuˬ ka‸ mehˉ k'ai ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, paw sha ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ te chehˇ ve kanˉ awˬ hk'aw lo luˬ k'ai mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
59001012	eˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ g'a hpuˇ da‸ htaˇ, yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, lawˇ nyi ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hkanˍ g'aˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ shi uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ yawˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Shi uˉ tcuhˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
59001013	Venˇ baˆ beˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hta‸ beˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ taˇ k'oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ beˬ maˇ hpeh‸. Haiˬ ve te tuˬ G'uiˬ sha chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ maˇ beˬ.
59001014	Hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ sheˉ lai puiˉ ve nyi ma lehˬ, venˇ baˆ te tuˬ yawˇ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
59001015	Oˇ htaˇ, sheˉ lai puiˉ ve nyi ma lehˬ, yaˇ hu ve hk'e yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hu la leh, venˇ baˆ hta‸ paw la piˇ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ htawˇ, uiˍ la biˇ la ve teˇ yanˇ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ paw la piˇ ve yoˬ.
59001016	Ngaˬ ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, taˇ dawˇ ya‸.
59001017	Da‸ ve awˬ bon hk'a peu-eˬ leh, biˇ ve la‸ shawnˍ hk'a peu-eˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chehˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ ve Awˬ pa geh ya‸ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ maˇ pa puiˉ. Yawˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo aˉ g'uiˬ ha ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
59001018	Hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ naw‸ la ve iˉ shiˍ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ, yawˇ a loˍ cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ paw la piˇ ve yoˬ.
59001019	Ngaˬ ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ lawn chi hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Shu tawˇ yaw ve hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na sheˍ. Tawˇ haˆ haˆ taˇ yaw. Nyi ma haˆ haˆ taˇ zuhˆ.
59001020	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ tawˆ la tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
59001021	Chi hta‸ pa taw, cha‸ chiˆ ve hk'a peu-eˬ leh, haiˬ ve hta‸ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui ve co ha hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ puiˉ ve, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw ti taˍ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ yuˬ-o‸,
59001022	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Kaˇ ve chaw ceh tiˉ taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Kaˇ ve chaw ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve k'o, nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ heˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59001023	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh maˇ te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, mehˆ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nyi ve chaw hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
59001024	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nyi peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ tawˆ k'ai leh, yawˇ awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hk'aˬ hk'e cawˬ ve hta‸ teˇ cawˬ haˉ leunˇ k'ai ve yoˬ.
59001025	Chaw hta‸ ponˬ piˇ ve, biˇ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nyi tcuhˉ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, kaˇ leh leunˇ k'ai ve chaw maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ na yuˬ leh te ve chaw hpeh‸ ve pa taw, yawˇ hk'a te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
59001026	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ liˇ hta‸ yawˇ hk'a deh‸ te ve teh‸ dawˇ htawˇ, yawˇ ve ha tehˍ hta‸ maˇ g'aˇ ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ heˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve lehˬ hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59001027	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ cha‸ chiˆ ve maˇ cawˬ leh da‸ kehˬ ve oˉ k'oˍ pui ve awˬ liˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Yaˇ cuˬ shi leh mehˇ chawˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ miˬ guiˬ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ maˇ g'a ngawˉ tuˬ g'a faˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
59002001	Ngaˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw yaˇ mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ taˇ nyi.
59002002	Awˬ lawn k'o, shi la‸ peˍ tcuhˉ leh da‸ ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ leh, maˇ da‸ ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh ve haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ hui nyiˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui ve hpawnˬ da‸ kuiˬ lo lo‸ la htaˇ,
59002003	da‸ ve veu‸ k'aˇ veu‸ deh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui nyi leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Da‸ ve mui kuiˬ chi hta‸ mui-o. Peuˬ leh haˍ yaˇ g'awˇ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve, Oˇ kaˬ lo huˉ taˍ-o‸, maˇ heˆ k'o, Ngaˬ ve hkui paˇ lo mui taˍ-o‸ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve k'o,
59002004	nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ pehˬ da‸ fuiˍ da‸ leh, haiˬ ve dawˇ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo shu hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
59002005	Ngaˬ ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, hk'a deh‸ na sheˍ. Yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo paw sha la tuˬ, haˍ ve g'awˇ ve miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ hui lehˬ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59002006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ haˍ ve g'awˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ te ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ leh suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ shaˉ nanˉ lo g'awˬ k'ai ve chaw hui lehˬ, paw sha ve chaw hui maˇ heˆ laˇ.
59002007	Nawˬ hui g'a taˍ ve da‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, paw sha ve chaw hui maˇ heˆ laˇ.
59002008	Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ ha‸ ve hk'e, nawˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ ha‸-o‸ teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ nawˬ hui te biˇ ve k'o, da‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui te peuˬ.
59002009	Shu mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui nyi chehˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ te chehˇ leh, nawˬ hui te ponˬ te leuˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve. yoˬ.
59002010	Awˬ lawn k'o, hk'aˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ liˇ teˇ maˬ hta‸ ceh te ya‸ ve ka‸, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ya‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59002011	Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ taˇ te teh‸ k'oˆ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Shu hta‸ taˇ tiˇ pehˍ ka‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ maˇ te htawˇ shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve k'o, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59002012	Ponˬ piˇ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh, nawˬ hui hta‸ suhˉ g'a jehˬ tuˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui tawˇ yaw ve maˇ k'oˆ, kanˉ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a deh‸ te-o.
59002013	Awˬ lawn k'o, shu hta‸ maˇ ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ htaˇ, Suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ ha k'aˉ piˇ. Ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'aˇ ve yoˬ.
59002014	Ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, Ngaˬ lehˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ htawˇ, kanˉ maˇ te ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le. Yonˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ hpeh‸-aw laˇ.
59002015	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ veu‸ k'aˇ maˇ cawˬ leh, teˇ nyi pon teˇ nyi caˇ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ ve k'o,
59002016	nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Dawˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo k'o‸-e loˬ. Nawˬ awˬ to hta‸ lehˬ la piˆ, bvuhˆ la piˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ to pon loˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ piˇ ve k'o, aˬ hto‸ ma awˬ bon cawˬ le.
59002017	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shu, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, kanˉ maˇ te ve k'o, shuˍ yonˍ ve oˇ ve suh taˍ ve yoˬ.
59002018	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ lehˬ yonˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ kanˉ te ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Kanˉ maˇ te leh, nawˬ yonˍ ve maˍ laˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, kanˉ te ve awˬ hk'aw lo, ngaˬ yonˍ ve nawˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
59002019	G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ yonˍ ve leˇ. Nawˬ yonˍ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Neˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yonˍ leh kawˆ cheˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
59002020	Maˇ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve chaw-oˬ, yonˍ leh kanˉ maˇ te ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ gaˇ laˇ.
59002021	Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ pa Aˍbraˍhanˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve yaˇ paˍ Iˉcaˆ hta‸ tanˇ kuiˬ hk'oˆ tanˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, kanˉ te ve pa taw yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
59002022	Yawˇ te ve kanˉ geh hk'a geh yonˍ ve ka‸ cawˬ leh, kanˉ hta‸ pa taw yawˇ yonˍ ve biˇ la ve hta‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
59002023	Aˍbraˍhanˍ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve Li‸ hpu tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ biˇ la ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ chawˇ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
59002024	Hk'e te leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ yonˍ ve hta‸ pa taw ceh tiˉ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve maˇ heˆ. Kanˉ ka‸ te ve hta‸ pa taw hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
59002025	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Raˍhaˆ meh ve meh maˬ lanˉ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, tcuh peu ve chaw hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ leh, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ya‸ k'aw teˇ caˆ hta‸ k'o‸-e tcuh ve pa taw, kanˉ te leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ la ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
59002026	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo co ha maˇ cawˬ k'o suh ve yoˬ. Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ kanˉ maˇ te ve k'o, suh taˍ ve yoˬ.
59003001	Ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui laiˉ g'aˇ maˍ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ taˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, maˍ pi shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shu a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
59003002	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ laiˉ ceuˬ te ya‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ, yawˇ tawˇ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ yaw ya‸ jaw k'o, yawˇ biˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, awˬ to teˇ to hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ g'aˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59003003	Iˉ mvuhˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'aˇ tuˬ yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo sho caˆ keu ve k'o, yawˇ awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'awˬ caw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59003004	Haw lo‸ k'oˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi sheˍ. Uiˍ jaˇ ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ k'ai ve htawˇ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ g'a‸ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, i jaˇ ve caˉ behˆ ehˉ hta‸ yehˇ leh, yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e haw lo‸ k'oˍ lonˉ hta‸ suhˉ caw piˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
59003005	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ha tehˍ lehˬ, awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo i jaˇ ve awˬ hk'eun hpeh‸ ve htawˇ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˇ uiˍ tawˇ mvuh yaw puiˉ ve yoˬ. I jaˇ ve aˬ miˍ lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ ve heh puiˉ hk'aw hta‸ to‸ baˬ g'a ve hta‸ nyi sheˍ.
59003006	Ha tehˍ lehˬ, aˬ miˍ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo, ha tehˍ lehˬ venˇ baˆ ve mvuhˇ miˬ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ maˇ maˇ hpehˇ tawˆ la piˇ leh, shaˬ te shaˬ maˇ la tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Moˬ naˆ ho‸ lehˬ, ha tehˍ hta‸ aˬ miˍ tuˉ piˇ ve yoˬ.
59003007	Awˬ lawn k'o, to nuˇ to shaˆ, ngaˆ, loˇ k'ai gaˆ k'ai puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ, iˉ kaˆ hk'aw chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ, teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ chaw yaˇ meuˇ la tuˬ te g'a leh, te meuˇ taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
59003008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw yaˇ lehˬ, ha tehˍ hta‸ meuˇ la tuˬ te maˇ g'a. Ha tehˍ lehˬ, ta‸ iˉ maˇ chehˇ puiˉ ve haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Suh piˇ puiˉ ve awˬ taw‸ ma htawˇ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
59003009	Ngaˬ hui ha tehˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh ngaˬ hui ve Awˬ pa hpeh‸ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hk'a shuˍ shuˍ te hpanˍ taˍ ve chaw yaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui ha tehˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh k'aw‸ hkeu piˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
59003010	Maw‸ k'aw teˇ maˬ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo, chiˇ mvuh ve hkawˇ ka‸, hkeu ve hkawˇ ka‸ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi hk'e te maˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
59003011	G'uiˬ tuˇ teˇ maˬ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo mehˬ ve iˉ kaˆ leh hk'aˇ ve iˉ kaˆ teˇ geh tawˆ la tuˬ laˇ.
59003012	Ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, maˉ nawˆ cehˬ hta‸ shaˍlonˍ shiˍ naw‸ hpeh‸-aw laˇ. A pehˉ meuˇ te hta‸ maˉ nawˆ shiˍ naw‸ hpeh‸-aw laˇ. Oˇ hk'e naw‸ maˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, hk'aˇ ve g'uiˬ tuˇ lehˬ, mehˬ ve iˉ kaˆ hta‸ tawˆ la piˇ maˇ hpeh‸.
59003013	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ leh shiˍ puiˉ ve chaw a shu le. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ cawˬ ve hk'e, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te leh, yawˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
59003014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui hkawehˉ puiˉ jaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ leh, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ moˍ shawˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ gaˇ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve taˇ te.
59003015	Chi hk'e ve cuˇ yiˍ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la ve cuˇ yiˍ maˇ heˆ. Miˬ guiˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ ve cuˇ yiˍ leh, neˇ haiˬ ve cuˇ yiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59003016	Awˬ lawn k'o, hkawehˉ puiˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ leh, nyi ma uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ moˍ shawˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ puiˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve k'o, sho‸ sha‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ leh haiˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
59003017	Mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la ve cuˇ yiˍ lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ da‸ ve kehˬ ve, hk'aw‸ nawˉ cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ ve, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve, na yuˬ puiˉ ve leh, ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸, da‸ ve awˬ shiˍ ka‸, hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Htawˇ hpfuhˆ nawˬ hpfuhˆ te ve nyi ma leh, heˍ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
59003018	Cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ tuˬ te ve chaw hui lehˬ, dawˇ sha ve awˬ hk'aw lo sheˍ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ shiˍ hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
59004001	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo canˇ da‸ ve leh ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ ve teˇ hpaˍ aˬ hto‸ ma pa taw tawˆ la ve le. Nawˬ hui awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ te gaˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo bawˆ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ pa taw tawˆ la ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
59004002	Nawˬ hui heuˆ gaˇ jaˇ ve hk'e maˇ g'a ve pa taw, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai ve hk'e maˇ g'a ve pa taw, shu hta‸ ya‸ da‸ jiˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui maˇ lawˬ ve pa taw nawˬ hui maˇ g'a.
59004003	Nawˬ hui lawˬ htawˇ maˇ g'a. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ ceh te gaˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui lawˬ ya‸ ve yoˬ.
59004004	Haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te shehˍ ma hta‸ shuˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ liˇ hta‸ awˬ chawˇ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ laˇ. Miˬ guiˬ awˬ liˇ hta‸ awˬ chawˇ te gaˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha ve canˇ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59004005	Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ keu laˇ ve co ha hta‸ yawˇ sheˉ lai jaˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve tawˇ chi lehˬ, hk'e leˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve teh‸ dawˇ ve laˇ.
59004006	Yawˇ lehˬ awˬ bon leuˉ leh piˇ ve yoˬ. Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve mvuh ve chaw hui hta‸ tawˍ taˍ leh, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ awˬ bon piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
59004007	Chi hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha uˉ peunˍ ve awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Neˇ haiˬ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ-o‸. Nawˬ hui lo yawˇ hpaw tawˆ-e tuˬ yoˬ.
59004008	G'uiˬ sha geh jiˆ laˬ-o‸. Hk'e te k'o, yawˇ nawˬ hui geh jiˆ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ yaˇ hui-oˬ, nawˬ hui ve la‸ sheh hta‸ tsuhˇ hpu tsuhˇ kehˬ-o‸. Nyi ma nyiˇ hk'aˇ dawˇ ve chaw hui-oˬ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ da‸ la kehˬ la piˇ-oˆ.
59004009	Nyi ma hk'aw tu‸ hkanˍ chehˇ-oˆ. Nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ haˍ leh hk'anˇ chehˇ-oˆ. Paˆ hawˬ kehˇ hawˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui g'uiˬ yawˬ ve lehˬ, nyi ma hk'aw dawˇ haˍ leh hk'anˇ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ hpeh‸ la piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui ve ha lehˬ tuˬ lehˬ, dawˇ haˍ tuˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ pa piˇ-oˆ.
59004010	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nyi ma nehˬ lehˍ taˍ-o‸. Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ chiˇ taˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
59004011	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ taˇ hk'aiˉ da‸. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ hk'aiˉ ve maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ baˆ taˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ lehˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'aiˉ leh venˇ baˆ taˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve k'o, nawˬ lehˬ awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ shehˍ hpaˇ maˇ heˆ. Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ venˇ baˆ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59004012	Awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ teh taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ leh suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ponˬ piˇ tuˬ ka‸, te luˬ tuˬ ka‸ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ awˬ paˇ awˬ kui chehˇ ve chaw awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ taˍ ve chaw-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ hk'aˬ hk'e ve chaw le.
59004013	Nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ k'oˆ ve, Ya‸ nyi shawˉ pawˍ ngaˬ hui venˇ teˇ venˇ venˇ lo teˇ hk'aw‸ ca chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo tanˇ kaˬ te leh, awˬ yawˬ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e k'oˆ ve chaw hui-oˬ, hk'a deh‸ dawˇ nyi sheˍ.
59004014	Shawˉ pawˍ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ. Nawˬ ve a sha‸ aˬ hto‸ ma hta‸ shuˍ da‸ le. Teˇ hkui tiˉ g'a mawˬ taˉ leh, mehˉ k'ai ve iˉ kaˆ shaˉ hta‸ shuˍ da‸ ve yoˬ.
59004015	Nawˬ hui k'oˆ cawˇ ve lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui a sha‸ te‸ leh, chi hk'e oˇ hk'e te tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
59004016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ nawˬ hui nyi ma uiˍ leh caˆ muiˬ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Nyi ma uiˍ ve chi hk'e ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ haiˬ ve yoˬ.
59004017	Hk'e te leh, da‸ ve hta‸ te tuˬ shiˍ taˍ htawˇ maˇ te ve chaw lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ pon venˇ baˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
59005001	Chaw paw chaw sha teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi beu‸ na sheˍ. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ lo gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ hawˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
59005002	Nawˬ hui ve mawˇ jeˬ lehˬ kuiˇ k'ai peuˬ. Nawˬ hui ve veu‸ k'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ pfuhˇ shehˍ ma caˇ peuˬ.
59005003	Nawˬ hui ve hpu shi htawˇ yawˇ caˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ caˇ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ te ve hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh, aˬ miˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon, nawˬ hui mawˇ jeˬ shaw hpoˆ taˍ peuˬ.
59005004	Na sheˍ. Nawˬ hui ve ti mi hk'aw caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heˍ leh awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ piˇ ve pa taw, awˬ hpfuhˇ oˇ ve kuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Caˬ g'eu‸ shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve kuˬ hkawˇ htawˇ, hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve naˍ paw awˬ hk'aw lo geh peuˬ.
59005005	Nawˬ hui miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo paw sha jaˇ leh nyi hk'aˇ suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ te taˍ peuˬ. Tiˇ pehˍ ve awˬ nyi awˬ pon nawˬ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma hta‸ hu leh gu taˍ peuˬ.
59005006	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hta‸ nawˬ hui suhˉ taˆ leh tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ. Yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ tawˍ taˍ.
59005007	Chi hta‸ pa taw, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ gaˬ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yeunˇ hkanˍ chehˇ-oˆ. Muiˬ caˇ paˍ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve awˬ shiˍ hta‸ g'a tuˬ yawˇ law taˍ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ yeˬ awˉ lawˉ laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ leh, awˬ leh laˬ ve teˇ yanˇ hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ yeunˇ hkanˍ leh law taˍ ve yoˬ.
59005008	Nawˬ hui htawˇ, yeunˇ hkanˍ leh law taˍ-o‸. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
59005009	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ teˇ g'aˇ venˇ baˆ taˇ taˍ da‸. Nyi-o, Suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yehˬ miˉ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ taˍ peuˬ.
59005010	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ peun leh maˍ laˇ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hpuˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui henˇ yuˬ jawˬ yuˬ-o‸.
59005011	Yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve chaw hui lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇbaˆ yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ dawˇ taˍ ve hk'e te piˇ leh, yawˇ hk'aˬ ma ha‸ leh ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a mawˬ peuˬ.
59005012	Ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, a ciˉ ka‸ taˇ hkanˍ. Tawˇ chi lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve teˇ hkawˇ yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh taˇ hkanˍ. Nawˬ hui suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, nawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, yoˬ ve k'o yoˬ, maˇ heˆ ve k'o maˇ heˆ teh‸ ceh tiˉ k'oˆ loˬ.
59005013	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ tu‸ chehˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve laˇ. Yawˇ hta‸ bon lawˬ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ ha lehˬ chehˇ ve laˇ. Yawˇ hta‸ k'a muiˬ chiˇ mvuh piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
59005014	Nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ naˬ chehˇ gawˬ chehˇ ve laˇ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ cuˇ leh, chaw naˬ oˇ ve hta‸ naˍ manˇ shehˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ awˬ pon bon lawˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
59005015	Yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, chaw naˬ hta‸ na-e la piˇ leh, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yawˇ hta‸ tu la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
59005016	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui na-e la tuˬ, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ venˇ baˆ k'aoˍ maˍ da‸ leh, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ pon bon lawˬ-o‸. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw bon lawˬ ve lehˬ, kanˇ paˆ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
59005017	Eˇliˇya‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ chaw yaˇ hpeh‸ ve htawˇ, mvuhˇ yeˬ maˇ laˬ tuˬ yawˇ bon g'aˇ hte‸ lawˬ htaˇ, shehˆ hk'aw‸ leh ha pa hkaw‸ maˬ hk'a gaˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo mvuhˇ yeˬ maˇ laˬ.
59005018	Teˇ pawˆ yawˇ bon k'aw‸ lawˬ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lehˬ mvuhˇ yeˬ k'aw‸ laˬ piˇ leh, miˬ guiˬ htawˇ awˬ shiˍ k'aw‸ naw‸ la ve yoˬ.
59005019	Ngaˬ awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ ya‸ k'ai leh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ shiˍ hk'aw‸ veu laˇ ve k'o,
59005020	venˇ baˆ yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ ya‸ k'aw ya‸ k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ shiˍ hk'aw‸ veu laˇ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, suh kuiˬ lo co ha teˇ maˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ leh, venˇ baˆ maˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ beh taˍ peuˬ teh‸, yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ piˇ-oˆ.
60001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ Peˍtruˆ yoˬ. Hpaˆ da‸ leh, Poˍtuˆ, Gaˍlaˍtiˆ, Kaˍpaˍdawˇkiˆ, Aˍsiˆ leh Beˍtuˇniˆ mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ca chehˇ k'ai peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
60001002	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ na yuˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ pfuhˍ piˇ tuˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ leh, Awˬ ha hpu nawˬ hui hta‸ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ peuˬ. Awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ la piˇ-oˆ.
60001003	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o. Yawˇ ha k'aˉ puiˉ jaˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ hui chaw awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ la leh, te‸ chehˇ ve dawˇ law kuiˬ cawˬ la ve yoˬ. Dawˇ law kuiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve hta‸ pa taw cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
60001004	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ shinˉ caˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Maˇ luˬ puiˉ, maˇ cha‸ chiˆ puiˉ, maˇ pehˆ puiˉ ve awˬ shinˉ oˇ ve hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo nawˬ hui awˬ pon yawˇ ha‸ shaˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60001005	Awˬ leh meuˇ teˇ nyi htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, nawˬ hui hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ cuˇ leh ha‸ shaˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
60001006	Hk'e te leh, chi beu‸ teˇ hkui teˇ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve leh lawˇ nyi ve laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a hpuˇ da‸ ve htawˇ, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
60001007	Aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo shi hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve hk'e, tu‸ hkanˍ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ nawˬ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma lehˬ, luˬ puiˉ sheˆ puiˉ ve shi a‸ kehˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui yonˍ yeˬ ve k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, chiˇ mvuh ve, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh, taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
60001008	Yawˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ mawˬ jaw htawˇ, nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ htawˇ, nawˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ yonˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ jaˇ leh, ca k'oˆ maˇ peuˬ ve ha lehˬ tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ ve yoˬ.
60001009	Nawˬ hui yonˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ve co ha htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
60001010	Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve chi hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hk'a deh‸ na nyi leh ca nyi peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ bon pe‸ laˇ tuˬ ve awˬ lawn, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ yawˇ hui bon maˍ peuˬ.
60001011	Tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, Hkri‸ ve Awˬ ha hpu kanˉ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ tuˬ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ yanˇ te tuˬ leh naˍ, yawˇ hui ca nyi peuˬ ve yoˬ. Aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Hkri‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ g'a tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60001012	Tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ te ve kanˉ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon maˇ heˆ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon yoˬ teh‸, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Chi beu‸ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ chi shu nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma lo peu laˇ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hui hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui ka‸ mawˬ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
60001013	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui nyi ma gu taˍ leh shaˍ ti‸ taˍ chehˇ-oˆ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ ya‸ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui hta‸ piˇ tuˬ ve awˬ bon hta‸ hk'a deh‸ dawˇ law taˍ-o‸.
60001014	Aˉ suhˆ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ sheˍ htaˇ, a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te ve hk'e, chi beu‸ taˇ k'aw‸ te. Na yuˬ puiˉ ve yaˇ ehˉ hk'e te-o.
60001015	Nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ da‸ kehˬ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui hk'a te ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo da‸ kehˬ piˇ-oˆ.
60001016	Ngaˬ da‸ kehˬ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui htawˇ da‸ kehˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60001017	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ nawˬ hui bon lawˬ htaˇ, A pa-oˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ chaw mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ maˇ nyi leh, teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ te ve kanˉ hta‸ nyi leh suhˉ jehˬ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hkehˉ chaw te chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo te-o.
60001018	Awˬ puˍ awˬ pi teˇ hpaˍ geh g'a ve awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ponˬ tuˬ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Luˬ puiˉ sheˆ puiˉ ve hpu shi hta‸ yehˇ leh htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ.
60001019	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve Hkri‸ ve awˬ suhˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ laˇ ve nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ suhˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ kuiˉ awˬ haiˇ maˇ cawˬ leh awˬ meˇ maˇ cawˬ ve yawˬ ehˉ awˬ suhˍ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
60001020	Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ te hpanˍ sheˍ htaˇ ka‸, chi hk'e g'a te hkanˍ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ chi awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
60001021	Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yonˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ suh kuiˬ lo k'aw‸ te‸ tu la piˇ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ leh dawˇ law ve awˬ ceuˬ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve yoˬ.
60001022	Nawˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ na yuˬ ve pa taw, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hui hta‸ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ha‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma da‸ la kehˬ la peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui nyi ma awˬ tawˬ hk'a gaˬ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸-o‸.
60001023	Nawˬ hui awˬ suhˉ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ paw la peuˬ. Paw la ve chi lehˬ, luˬ puiˉ sheˆ puiˉ ve awˬ yawˇ hta‸ pa taw maˇ heˆ. Maˇ luˬ maˇ sheˆ puiˉ ve awˬ yawˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve te‸ chehˇ yeˬ chehˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw paw la ve yoˬ.
60001024	Awˬ lawn k'o, Chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ mvuh‸ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hui ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ htawˇ mvuh‸ veˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Mvuh‸ lehˬ nawˍ k'ai goˇ k'ai leh, awˬ veˆ htawˇ piˬ k'ai ce k'ai ve yoˬ.
60001025	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ yeˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
60002001	Hk'e te leh, shu hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te ve, shu hta‸ heˍ ve, maˇ heˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ ka‸ yoˬ ve hk'e te ve, hkawehˉ ve leh hk'aiˉ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ-oˆ.
60002002	Paw la gehˇ sheˍ ve yaˇ ehˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, co ha hpawˇ da‸ jaˇ ve cuˉ g'uiˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai-o. Co ha hpawˇ ve cuˉ g'uiˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˬ ve pa taw, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui uiˍ la tuˬ yoˬ.
60002003	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve ha k'aˉ puiˉ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a leh‸ nyi peuˬ.
60002004	Jawˇ mawˇ oˇ ve geh laˬ-o‸. Yawˇ lehˬ te‸ chehˇ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ leh, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60002005	Nawˬ hui htawˇ te‸ chehˇ ve haˉ pui shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ yuˬ leh co ha hpawˇ ve yehˬ te hpeh‸ tuˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ-oˆ. Co ha hpawˇ ve tanˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tanˇ tuˬ, nawˬ hui da‸ kehˬ ve paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Nawˬ hui Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh tanˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, tanˇ tuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ha‸ yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
60002006	Li‸ hpu awˬ hk'aw chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Nyi-o, ngaˬ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ Ziˉonˍ awˬ hk'aw awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ ceˍ k'aweh‸ lo ngaˬ kawˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Haˉ pui shiˍ oˇ ve hta‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw lehˬ maˇ g'a ya‸ taw, teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60002007	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hui hk'a yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon, yawˇ da‸ jaˇ leh awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw hui awˬ pon, Li‸ hpu hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, Yehˬ kawˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hui baˬ taˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ awˬ ceˍ k'aweh‸ ve haˉ pui teˇ shiˍ hpeh‸ la peuˬ.
60002008	Chaw yaˇ hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ leh, nyi ma luˬ tuˬ ve haˉ pui shiˍ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hkui htiˇ poˬ paiˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ taˍ peuˬ.
60002009	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha leuˆ yuˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve paw hkuˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui da‸ kehˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ awˬ tehˬ awˬ na hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve da‸ jaˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸ la tuˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ tawˆ la peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, yawˇ ve da‸ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn shu hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ-oˆ.
60002010	Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ, nawˬ hui lehˬ awˬ meh maˇ cawˬ ve chaw ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ chi beu‸ lehˬ, nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve chaw ceuˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ hui lehˬ, ha k'aˉ ve awˬ bon hta‸ maˇ g'a. Ya‸ hk'aˇ chi beu‸ ha k'aˉ ve awˬ bon hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a peuˬ.
60002011	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, shu mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui hkehˉ chaw hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, co ha hta‸ bawˆ da‸ chehˇ ve, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
60002012	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ hui da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ te-o. Yawˇ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'aiˉ leh venˇ baˆ taˍ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui ve da‸ ve kanˉ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la htaˇ, yawˇ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ.
60002013	Jawˇ mawˇ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw, chaw yaˇ hui leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ uˉ peunˍ ve awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ-oˆ.
60002014	A shu yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ ve jawˇ mawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo htawˇ hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Chaw haiˬ hta‸ ciˍ yanˍ piˇ leh, chaw da‸ hta‸ chiˇ mvuh piˇ tuˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
60002015	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui da‸ ve hteˇ ve hta‸ te tuˬ G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e te ve pa taw, maˇ shiˍ puiˉ maˇ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, te‸ chiˉ ca k'oˆ maˇ hpeh‸ leh, ta‸ iˉ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
60002016	Nawˬ hui ponˬ peuˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui ponˬ ve lehˬ, haiˬ ve hta‸ te tuˬ awˬ pon maˇ heˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ te tuˬ awˬ pon hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
60002017	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˆ yan-o. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ha‸-o‸. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ-oˆ. Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan-o.
60002018	Awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kawˆ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Nyi ma da‸ leh nuˇ nehˬ ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Haiˬ ve jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo htawˇ hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ.
60002019	Nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ leh, shu fawˉ mehˍ laˇ ve teˇ yanˇ yeunˇ hkanˍ sheˍ. Nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh chi hk'e te ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ yoˬ.
60002020	Nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ cawˬ ve pa taw shu dawˆ laˇ tiˇ laˇ ve hta‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ htaˇ, aˬ hto‸ ma chiˇ mvuh tuˬ cawˬ le. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve hta‸ te ve pa taw, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ yeunˇ hkanˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha nyi hk'aˇ suh tuˬ yoˬ.
60002021	Oˇ hk'e g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ. Hkri‸ htawˇ nawˬ hui awˬ pon g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, nawˬ hui yawˇ ve hkui ha awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a‸ k'ai tuˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ pon henˇ kuiˬ jawˬ kuiˬ yawˇ te taˉ peuˬ.
60002022	Yawˇ lehˬ venˇ baˆ maˇ te jaw. Yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw hk'aw lo heˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ka‸ maˇ tawˆ la jaw.
60002023	Shu yawˇ hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ htaˇ, yawˇ shu hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na maˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ. Yawˇ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, shu hta‸ yawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸. Hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ Suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
60002024	Suhˆ hkuiˉ daw hk'oˆ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ suh htaˇ, yawˇ awˬ to awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ yawˇ pfuhˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ suh baˬ taˉ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a te‸ chehˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hkanˍ suh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve naˬ kuiˬ hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui na-e la peuˬ.
60002025	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ya‸ k'aw ya‸ leh mehˉ k'ai ve yawˬ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chi beu‸ lehˬ nawˬ hui ve co ha hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ shehˍ hpaˇ Yawˬ hawˉ paˍ geh nawˬ hui k'aw‸ la peuˬ.
60003001	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ miˇ ma teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui ve awˬ hpawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve htawˇ, nawˬ hui yawˆ yan puiˉ ve leh da‸ kehˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ te ve hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ,
60003002	nawˬ hui te‸ chiˉ maˇ k'oˆ maˍ piˇ ve ka‸, nawˬ hui ve da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
60003003	Nawˬ hui awˬ hkiˇ shawˍ ve lehˬ, uˉ hkeh mvuh hpeˇ ve, shi hk'eun tcuhˉ ve, veu‸ jiˇ k'aˇ jiˇ ve, awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ awˬ hkiˇ shawˍ ve ceh taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ.
60003004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hkiˇ shawˍ ve lehˬ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve leh gawˬ lehˍ chehˇ puiˉ ve, awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ awˬ hkiˇ shawˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ hkiˇ shawˍ ve chi teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ luˬ puiˉ leh, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
60003005	Aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve da‸ kehˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ awˬ hkiˇ chi hk'e te shawˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ hpawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo hk'a deh‸ chehˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
60003006	Tawˇ pa haˉ te k'o, Saˍraˇ lehˬ, Aˍbraˍhanˍ ve hkawˇ hta‸ na yu‸ leh, yawˇ hta‸ jawˇ mawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui da‸ ve hta‸ te leh, hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ htawˇ kawˆ puiˉ ve nyi ma maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui Saˍraˇ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
60003007	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ hpawˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ miˇ ma geh chehˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ awˬ pon dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve nyi ma cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui a‸ kehˉ awˬ g'aˇ nuˇ ve htawˇ, co ha te‸ ve awˬ bon hta‸ nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh awˬ shinˉ g'a caˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˆ yan-o. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui bon lawˬ ve hta‸ tawˍ taˍ tuˬ maˇ cawˬ.
60003008	Awˬ leh meuˇ ve tawˇ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha k'aˉ da‸ leh ha‸ da‸-o‸. Nyi ma nuˇ lehˍ te leh, shu awˬ hawˉ lo nyi ma nehˬ lehˍ taˍ-o‸.
60003009	Shu awˬ haiˬ te laˇ ve htawˇ, awˬ haiˬ taˇ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸. Shu hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ laˇ ve htawˇ, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na taˇ k'aw‸ k'oˆ hk'aw‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ na‸ piˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui awˬ bon g'a tuˬ, chi ve awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ.
60003010	A sha‸ te‸ gaˇ leh, ha lehˬ dawˇ sha ve awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mawˬ gaˇ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve ha tehˍ haiˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ taˇ yaw. A shu yawˇ ve meuˇ guiˬ heˍ ve hkawˇ hta‸ ka‸ taˇ k'oˆ.
60003011	Haiˬ ve hta‸ jaw k'ai leh, da‸ ve hta‸ te-o. Cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ca leh, oˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'a‸ k'ai-o.
60003012	Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ nyi chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve naˍ paw htawˇ, yawˇ hui ve bon lawˬ hkawˇ hta‸ na chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, awˬ haiˬ hk'a te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ ve canˇ paˍ yoˬ teh‸ shawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60003013	Nawˬ hui da‸ ve hta‸ g'aˇ hte‸ te chehˇ ve k'o, a shu nawˬ hui hta‸ ca ya‸ la tuˬ le.
60003014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ puiˉ ve law k'o, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ho laˇ ve hta‸ taˇ kawˆ, sho‸ sha‸ ve nyi ma ka‸ taˇ cawˬ piˇ.
60003015	Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo Hkri‸ hta‸ Jawˇ mawˇ yoˬ teh‸ shawˍ taˍ leh yawˆ yan-o. Nawˬ hui dawˇ law taˍ ve awˬ lawn, hk'a na nyi laˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e yaw hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ, hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ-o‸. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ leh yawˆ yan ve awˬ hk'aw lo te-o.
60003016	Nawˬ hui shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma hta‸ kehˬ lehˍ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui te ve da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'aiˉ leh venˇ baˆ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ yoˬ.
60003017	G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve k'o, da‸ ve hta‸ te leh tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve lehˬ, haiˬ ve hta‸ te leh g'a hkanˍ ve a‸ kehˉ leuˉ leh da‸ ve yoˬ.
60003018	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw teˇ pawˆ g'a suh ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha geh ngaˬ hui hta‸ shiˍ k'o‸-e g'a tuˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve chaw hui awˬ pon hkanˍ suh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to suh ve htawˇ, Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw k'aw‸ te‸ la ve yoˬ.
60003019	Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw yawˇ k'ai leh, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ ve awˬ ha teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bon ca maˍ ve yoˬ.
60003020	Awˬ ha oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Noˉa‸ ve awˬ co-e htaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve pa taw, htawnˍ hk'aw chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Noˉa‸ haw lo‸ k'oˍ lonˉ hta‸ te chehˇ htaˇ, chaw yaˇ G'uiˬ sha hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ tuˬ G'uiˬ sha yeunˇ hkanˍ leh law taˍ htawˇ, yawˇ hui maˇ na yuˬ. Hk'e te leh, chaw hiˉ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a ponˬ ve yoˬ.
60003021	Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, chi beu‸ baˆtiˆsaˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ ponˬ laˇ ve yoˬ. Baˆtiˆsaˬ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, awˬ to hta‸ ngawˉ taˍ ve awˬ meˇ tsuhˇ baˬ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve pa taw, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ shiˍ puiˉ ve nyi ma da‸ la kehˬ la ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
60003022	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma lo taˆ k'o‸-e leh, G'uiˬ sha ve la‸ sha paˉ lo chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh, kanˇ paˆ cawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
60004001	Hk'e te leh, Hkri‸ yawˇ ve awˬ to g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ htaˇ, yawˇ nyi ma taˍ ve hk'e, nawˬ hui htawˇ nyi ma taˍ leh, gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ-o‸. A shu yawˇ ve awˬ to g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw lehˬ, venˇ baˆ te ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ peuˬ.
60004002	Oˇ hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ to te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ k'aw‸ te. G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te ve yoˬ.
60004003	Buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw teˇ hpaˍ te ve hk'e, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ nawˬ hui htawˇ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ nawˬ hui htawˇ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ te ve, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve, ha lehˬ tuˬ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve, caˇ leuˉ dawˬ leuˉ ve leh, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ maˇ pui cawˇ ve ka‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui taˇ k'aw‸ te loˬ.
60004004	Chi beu‸ nawˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui geh te ponˬ te leuˉ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh maˇ k'aw‸ g'a‸ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui anˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
60004005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ lawn g'a k'aoˍ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Suhˉ jehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, te‸ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ leh suh peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ, yawˇ gu taˍ hehnˇ taˍ peuˬ.
60004006	Chi hta‸ pa taw, suh peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ ca maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ awˬ to cawˬ ve chaw hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha te‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ co ha hpawˇ yawˇ hui te‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ yawˇ ca maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
60004007	Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve lehˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, bon hk'a deh‸ lawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, nyi ma taˍ puiˉ leh, shaˍ ti‸ taˍ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
60004008	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ, g'aˇ hte‸ ha‸ da‸-o‸. Tawˇ chi lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ ve tawˇ teˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, maˇ jaˇ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ beh taˍ ve yoˬ.
60004009	Hkehˉ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ha‸ yuˬ-o‸. Hpeh‸ bawˬ ve nyi ma taˇ cawˬ piˇ.
60004010	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ bon g'a taˍ ve hk'e, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ pon yehˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ hui chi hk'e te ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon laiˉ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'a deh‸ ha‸ shaˉ leh yehˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
60004011	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ tawˇ yaw ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha yaw tcuh ve hk'e ceh yaw-o. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ shu hta‸ ga piˇ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha pe‸ laˇ ve awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ hta‸ cuˇ leh ga piˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ pa taw teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo, shu G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh tuˬ yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh kanˇ paˆ co co taiˍ taiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. A menˬ.
60004012	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ aˬ miˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ lawˇ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, taˇ anˇ. Chi lehˬ anˇ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
60004013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, nawˬ hui g'a ha lehˬ jaˇ tuˬ ve awˬ pon, yawˇ tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ nawˬ hui ka‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve pa taw ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
60004014	Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw, shu nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ laˇ ve k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60004015	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve, shu mawˇ hk'awˇ ve, awˬ haiˬ te ve, shu hta‸ sho‸ sha‸ tuˬ te ve, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ.
60004016	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ Hkri‸ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve pa taw g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve k'o, taˇ ya‸ taw. Awˬ meh chi hta‸ pa taw g'a hkanˍ ve teˇ yanˇ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh-o.
60004017	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha suhˉ tanˬ jehˬ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ. Yawˇ ve yehˬ yaˇ k'a yaˇ hui hta‸ awˉ lawˉ suhˉ jehˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ awˉ lawˉ suhˉ jehˬ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ pon, awˬ leh meuˇ hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve le.
60004018	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw lehˬ, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a tuˬ haˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan ve venˇ baˆ yaˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ hk'e te ponˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve le.
60004019	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ te ve pa taw g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hpawˇ ka‸ da‸ ve hta‸ te cawˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve co ha a‸ piˇ-oˆ.
60005001	Nawˬ hui awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ lawˬ hkawˉ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hk'e awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ awˬ to g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Tawˆ la tuˬ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
60005002	Nawˬ hui geh cawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve yawˬ awˬ moˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ha‸ shaˉ-oˆ. Shu hkawˇ leuˉ maˇ g'a leh te ve teˇ ceuˬ taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Ha lehˬ ha k'a te-o. Hpu g'a gaˇ leh te ve ka‸ taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Nyi ma pfuhˇ leh te-o.
60005003	Nawˬ ve yawˬ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'oˆ jawˇ mawˇ hk'e taˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˬ awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ henˇ kuiˬ jawˬ kuiˬ hpeh‸ piˇ-oˆ.
60005004	Chi hk'e te ve k'o, Yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ awˬ hoˉ teˇ g'aˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, maˇ nawˍ k'ai puiˉ ve, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
60005005	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yaˇ nehˬ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ-oˆ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ ceˬ hk'e nyi ma nehˬ lehˍ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nyi ma uiˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nyi ma nuˇ nehˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ bon piˇ ve yoˬ.
60005006	Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha ve uiˍ jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hawˉ lo nyi ma nehˬ lehˍ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ yanˇ cawˇ ve teˇ yanˇ htaˇ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
60005007	G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui awˬ pon dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui ve dawˇ haˍ dawˇ hkiˉ tuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ-oˆ.
60005008	Shaˍ ti‸ te leh hk'a deh‸ shaw taˍ-o‸. Nawˬ hui ve canˇ paˍ neˇ haiˬ lehˬ, kuˬ chehˇ ve laˇ caˬ shiˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, shu hta‸ che‸ caˇ tuˬ ca caw nyi toˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
60005009	Yonˍ yeˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo neˇ haiˬ hta‸ tawˍ taˍ-o‸. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve nawˬ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
60005010	Nawˬ hui teˇ hkui teˇ yanˇ g'a tu‸ g'a hkanˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ bon hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ biˇ la piˇ, yeˬ la piˇ leh awˬ g'aˇ cawˬ la piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Co co taiˍ taiˍ yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ Hkri‸ hta‸ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
60005011	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
60005012	Ka ti‸ yeˬ ve teh‸ ngaˬ shawˍ taˍ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Siˍlaˍnuˆ hta‸ ngaˬ cuˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ ngeh ve li‸ chi teˇ k'oˆ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ pe‸ laˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ve awˬ bon awˬ lawn hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ, li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon chi awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hui yeˬ chaweh chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
60005013	Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw chehˇ ve, nawˬ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve awˬ moˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve yaˇ Maˍkuˆ ka‸, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
60005014	Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo boˆ nu da‸ leh la‸ sheh caˉ da‸-o‸. Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve nawˬ hui hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
61001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ leh tcuh yaˇ Siˉmonˍ Peˍtruˆ yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve yonˍ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui yonˍ ve nyi ma cawˬ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yawˇ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
61001002	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ka‸, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ ka‸ shiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ maˇ la piˇ-oˆ.
61001003	Ngaˬ hui co ha te‸ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan hpeh‸ tuˬ, hk'a loˍ ve hk'a peu-eˬ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ. Yawˇ chi hk'e te ve lehˬ, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve pa taw yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh biˇ jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui hta‸ yawˇ kuˬ yuˬ peuˬ.
61001004	Yawˇ ve awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ jaˇ leh uiˍ jaˇ ve ka ti‸ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ peuˬ. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ pa taw, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo luˬ ve sheˆ ve cawˬ la ve yoˬ. Ka ti‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ pa taw, luˬ ve sheˆ ve chi hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a ponˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma taˍ ve hk'e nawˬ hui htawˇ taˍ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
61001005	Chi hta‸ pa taw, g'aˇ hte‸ coˇ caˇ leh, nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'oˆ, da‸ ve awˬ liˇ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
61001006	Da‸ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'oˆ, cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Cuˇ yiˍ cawˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ g'aˇ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ g'aˇ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
61001007	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan puiˉ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ ha‸ ve awˬ hk'oˆ, ha‸ da‸ pehnˇ da‸ ve cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
61001008	Awˬ lawn k'o, chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ leh maˇ la ve k'o, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ shiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui awˬ bon cawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, awˬ shiˍ maˇ maˇ naw‸ la tuˬ yoˬ.
61001009	Chi teˇ hpaˍ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, mehˆ cuˉ paˍ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, mehˆ hk'oˆ hta‸ ceh tiˉ mawˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ awˬ piˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Yeˍsuˆ tsuhˇ hpu tsuhˇ kehˬ piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ leunˇ k'ai peuˬ.
61001010	Chi hta‸ pa taw awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ kuˬ yuˬ leuˆ yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ yeˬ la tuˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te-o. Chi hk'e te ve k'o, nawˬ hui teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ paiˍ.
61001011	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ leh Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve co co taiˍ taiˍ yeˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui g'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'e awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e tuˬ gu taˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
61001012	Hk'e te leh, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ yeˬ ve htawˇ, chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ tuˬ, ngaˬ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
61001013	Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'a leunˇ k'ai tuˬ, ngaˬ awˬ to te‸ chehˇ ve ceh ceh, nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ dawˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
61001014	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ngaˬ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, maˇ maw maw ngaˬ ve awˬ to chi hta‸ g'a baˬ taˉ tuˬ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
61001015	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ tawˆ k'ai peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ htawˇ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ dawˇ nawˇ tuˬ, chi beu‸ ngaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ te tuˬ yoˬ.
61001016	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ lawn leh yawˇ k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ htaˇ, cuˇ yiˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh ca dawˇ k'oˆ ve kaˇ puiˇ kaˇ lao hkawˇ ceh hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui mehˆ shiˍ g'a mawˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
61001017	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ taˍ uiˍ taˍ mvuh leh awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ piˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw chi lehˬ, ngaˬ ha‸ jaˇ ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ nyi hk'aˇ suh ve yoˬ teh‸, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
61001018	Da‸ kehˬ ve hk'aw oˇ ve teˇ shiˍ awˬ hk'oˆ yawˇ geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma lo tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
61001019	Chi hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui leuˉ leh yonˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ htiˇ la leh peuˬ tawˆ tawˆ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ g'euˆ ba chehˇ ve kawˆ faiˇ hta‸ cuˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na yuˬ leh cuˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
61001020	Li‸ hpu hk'aw cawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve tawˇ, hk'aˬ ve teˇ hkawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ tcuhˉ kuiˬ hta‸ dawˇ tawˆ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ awˉ lawˉ shiˍ-o‸.
61001021	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui ve a loˍ hta‸ pa taw yaw ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu yawˇ hui hta‸ dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ leh, yawˇ hui teˇ caˉ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ k'aw‸ yaw ve yoˬ.
61002001	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la jaw ve hk'e, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ maˇ heˆ heˆ ve saˍ la‸ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, shu hta‸ te luˬ te hpaˆ puiˉ ve yonˍ hk'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ca hk'awˇ keu la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ vuiˬ yuˬ peuˬ ve Awˬ Jawˇ mawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ taˉ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to haˆ haˆ luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ, yawˇ hui te chehˇ ve yoˬ.
61002002	Chaw laiˉ g'aˇ yawˇ hui ve cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ pa taw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ shu maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
61002003	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ sheˉ lai jaˇ ve pa taw, nawˬ hui hta‸ heˍ leh, yawˇ hui awˬ pon awˬ bon tawˆ la tuˬ ceh nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ chawˇ hk'e te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ taˆ cheˆ taˍ ve lehˬ, hk'e leˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve maˇ heˆ. Yawˇ hui awˬ tehˬ awˬ na luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
61002004	Venˇ baˆ te ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha maˇ ponˬ piˇ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ moˬ naˆ ho‸ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu leh, suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi hk'a gaˬ naˆ ho‸ jaˇ kuiˬ lo yawˇ hui hta‸ haw taˍ ve yoˬ.
61002005	Aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ve miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui hta‸ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha maˇ ponˬ piˇ. Yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ maˇ pui ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha iˉ kaˆ htonˍ pehˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ bon maˍ ve Noˉa‸ leh yawˇ geh chaw suhˍ g'aˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ G'uiˬ sha ponˬ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
61002006	Sawˉdonˍ venˇ leh Gawˇmawˇra‸ venˇ hta‸ htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha hk'aw‸ laˉ hpeh‸ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ oˇ hk'e te ciˍ yanˍ piˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ maˇ pui ve chaw hui awˬ pon henˇ kuiˬ jawˬ kuiˬ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
61002007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve Lawˇtaˍ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ ponˬ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw haiˬ teˇ hpaˍ cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ te ve pa taw, Lawˇtaˍ lehˬ dawˇ haˍ gaˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
61002008	(Awˬ lawn k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui geh chehˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ hui ve haiˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ g'a mawˬ g'a kaˇ ve pa taw, teˇ nyi le le yawˇ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo tu‸ hkanˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.)
61002009	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, beˬ ve lawˇ ve hta‸ g'a hpuˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te ponˬ piˇ tuˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi hk'a gaˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ hk'aˬ hk'e te ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tcuhˉ taˍ tuˬ htawˇ yawˇ shiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
61002010	Cha‸ chiˆ ve hta‸ sheˉ lai ve awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai leh jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hawˉ maˇ chehˇ gaˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ leuˉ leh ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ leh a shu yawˇ ve a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh tiˉ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ uiˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ tuˬ yawˇ hui maˇ kawˆ puiˉ.
61002011	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hui a‸ kehˉ awˬ g'aˇ leh kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve htawˇ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ maˇ te, venˇ baˆ ka‸ maˇ taˍ.
61002012	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hpeh yuˬ leh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ awˬ pon paw la ve, maˇ dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hk'e ceh tiˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'aˇ yawˇ hui haiˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai leh,
61002013	maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw htaˇ ka‸ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ha lehˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui geh yawˇ hui pawehˇ te leh ha lehˬ tuˬ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ to hta‸ cawˬ taˍ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ kuiˉ awˬ haiˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'e yoˬ.
61002014	Yawˇ hui ve mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ceh tiˉ nyi gaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ te ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ bvuhˆ puiˉ. Nyi ma maˇ yeˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ yawˇ hui beˬ yuˬ puiˉ leh, shu mawˇ shu jeˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui sheˉ lai puiˉ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hkeu taˍ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
61002015	Hteˇ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ yawˇ hui baˬ taˉ leh ya‸ k'aw ya‸ k'ai peuˬ. Bawˉsawˍ ve yaˇ Baˍlanˍ ve ya‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aˇ suh yawˇ hui g'a‸ k'ai peuˬ.
61002016	Baˍlanˍ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve kanˉ awˬ hpfuhˇ hta‸ sheˉ lai leh, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ pa taw deˇ maˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, tawˇ maˇ yaw puiˉ ve piˉ laˬ teˇ hkeh lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ tawˇ yaw leh, tcuh kaˍ paˍ Baˍlanˍ g'uˇ ve hta‸ tawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
61002017	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ fiˍ k'ai peuˬ ve g'uiˬ tuˇ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, mvuhˇ haw meuˆ chiˇ veu ve moˬ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ pon naˆ ho‸ jaˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ gu taˍ peuˬ.
61002018	Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ bon maˇ cawˬ ve tawˇ uiˍ tawˇ mvuh teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui yaw ve yoˬ. Ya‸ k'aw ya‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ponˬ tawˆ la gehˇ sheˍ ve chaw hui hta‸, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ te ponˬ te leuˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ hui yehˇ leh k'aw‸ beˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
61002019	Nawˬ hui shu awˬ ceˬ maˇ g'a k'aw‸ te teh‸ yawˇ hui shu hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ to lehˬ luˬ ve sheˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw yaˇ hta‸ g'aˇ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw yaˇ lehˬ oˇ ve awˬ hawˉ lo awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
61002020	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ leh Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hta‸ yawˇ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a ponˬ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e g'a ponˬ ve htawˇ, cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ lo‸-e leh hkanˉ taˍ ve pa taw, cha‸ chiˆ ve oˇ ve yawˇ hui hta‸ g'aˇ ve k'o, awˬ leh meuˇ hpeh‸ la ve lehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ hpeh‸ ve a‸ kehˉ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
61002021	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw hta‸ shiˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hui hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve da‸ ve kehˬ ve awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui k'aw‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ taˉ ve k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve ya‸ k'aw oˇ ve hta‸ shiˍ ve a‸ kehˉ maˇ shiˍ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ pon leuˉ leh da‸ ve yoˬ.
61002022	Hpuiˇ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ hpe‸ baˬ taˍ ve hta‸ k'aw‸ g'awˆ leh‸ leh, va‸ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ yawˇ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ tsuhˇ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ meh‸ g'uˬ k'aw‸ hehˉ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve chaw mawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ cawˇ da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
61003001	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve li‸ chi lehˬ, nyiˇ k'oˆ teˇ k'oˆ yoˬ. Li‸ chi ve nyiˇ k'oˆ k'oˆ awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ dawˇ nyi puiˉ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ ve yoˬ.
61003002	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ G'uiˬ sha ve da‸ kehˬ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui k'oˆ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve tcuh yaˇ hui hta‸ cuˇ leh piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ ve yoˬ.
61003003	Awˉ lawˉ shiˍ cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai leh, k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ.
61003004	Yawˇ hui chi hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ k'aw‸ ya‸ la tuˬ ve teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve ka ti‸ tawˇ hkawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e k'ai le. Awˬ puˍ awˬ pi hui ka‸ suh peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, miˬ guiˬ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸ tanˬ leh ya‸ nyi hk'a gaˬ, hk'a peu-eˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
61003005	Aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw mvuhˇ naw ma cawˬ la ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ dawˇ nawˇ gaˇ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo miˬ guiˬ tawˆ la leh, iˉ kaˆ hta‸ pa taw miˬ guiˬ hpeh‸ la ve hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
61003006	Oˇ htaˇ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ iˉ kaˆ htonˍ piˇ leh, chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ te luˬ te sheˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
61003007	G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, chi beuˬ cawˬ taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma leh miˬ guiˬ hta‸ aˬ miˍ tuˉ baˬ tuˬ ve awˬ pon leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ leh te luˬ ve teˇ nyi hk'a gaˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma leh miˬ guiˬ hta‸ yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ha‸ shaˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
61003008	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ teˇ nyi hta‸ teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ hk'e shawˍ leh, teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ hta‸ teˇ nyi hk'e shawˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui taˇ leunˇ.
61003009	Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ka ti‸ te taˍ ve hk'e biˇ la tuˬ yawˇ naiˇ jaˇ law teh‸ chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ dawˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ka ti‸ biˇ la tuˬ yawˇ naiˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a luˬ k'ai tuˬ yawˇ heuˆ gaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ yeunˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
61003010	Chaw hk'awˇ chaw naˆ laˬ ve hk'e, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo, mvuhˇ naw ma lehˬ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh te leh mehˉ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve aˬ miˍ chiˆ jaˇ leh kuiˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ leh miˬ guiˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hk'a te taˍ ve kanˉ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ aˬ miˍ to‸ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
61003011	Chi hk'a peu-eˬ kuiˬ k'ai tuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve awˬ liˇ awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ tiˉ te leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˆ yan ve chaw hpeh‸ keunˍ hpeh‸ cawˇ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
61003012	Nawˬ hui lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ nyi hta‸ law taˍ leh dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ nyi oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ aˬ miˍ to‸ baˬ leh, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve aˬ miˍ chiˆ jaˇ leh kuiˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
61003013	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ ka ti‸ cawˬ taˍ ve hk'e, mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ suhˉ leh miˬ guiˬ awˬ suhˉ cawˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ ceh tiˉ cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
61003014	Hk'e te leh ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ law chehˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ cha‸ chiˆ ve leh awˬ kuiˉ awˬ haiˇ maˇ g'a cawˬ tuˬ leh, dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve nyi ma g'a cawˬ tuˬ, coˇ caˇ leh te-o.
61003015	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ yeunˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve lehˬ, chaw yaˇ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ g'a tuˬ ve awˬ pon yeunˇ hkanˍ chehˇ ve teh‸ dawˇ-oˆ. Ngaˬ hui ha‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Pawˇlu‸ htawˇ, yawˇ cuˇ yiˍ g'a ve hk'e, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
61003016	Yawˇ ve li‸ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Li‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo shiˍ haˍ jaˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Maˇ shiˍ puiˉ leh nyi ma maˇ yeˬ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu Li‸ hpu tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yuˬ hpfuhˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui chi hk'e te ve hta‸ pa taw, g'a luˬ g'a sheˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
61003017	Hk'e te leh ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ lawn chi ve hta‸ awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ peuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw, haiˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ yawˇ hui te ya‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a sheh k'ai tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Nawˬ hui shaˍ ti‸ maˇ taˍ k'o, nawˬ hui nyi ma yeˬ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ luˬ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ.
61003018	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ leh Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ bon awˬ hk'aw lo leh yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, nawˬ hui uiˍ la piˇ-oˆ. Chi beu‸ ka‸ te leh co co taiˍ taiˍ yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
62001001	Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ cawˬ taˍ ve, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ lawn ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ leh, mehˆ shiˍ htawˇ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'a deh‸ nyi leh, g'a htawˇ g'a yuˬ nyi jaw peuˬ ve yoˬ.
62001002	Co ha te‸ ve oˇ ve hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, oˇ ve awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Awˬ pa geh cawˬ ve co ti‸ ha ti‸ teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ leh, ngaˬ hui nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
62001003	Nawˬ hui htawˇ ngaˬ hui geh awˬ chawˇ g'a te da‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ g'a kaˇ peuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui awˬ chawˇ te da‸ ve lehˬ, Awˬ pa leh yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ geh awˬ chawˇ te da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62001004	Ngaˬ hui ha lehˬ ve biˇ la tuˬ, awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
62001005	Yawˇ geh ngaˬ hui g'a kaˇ leh nawˬ hui hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ ve yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ awˬ g'euˆ hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo naˆ ho‸ ve a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
62001006	Ngaˬ hui yawˇ geh awˬ chawˇ te da‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui heˍ chehˇ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ maˇ te.
62001007	Ya‸ hk'aˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ hui htawˇ awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ awˬ chawˇ te da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ suhˍ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ laˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
62001008	Ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ heˍ leh, ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ.
62001009	Ngaˬ hui a shu yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeu‸ maˍ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ leh maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ laˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ka ti‸ yeˬ leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ.
62001010	Ngaˬ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ te jaw teh‸ k'oˆ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ngaˬ hui heˍ paˍ meh piˇ leh, yawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
62002001	Ngaˬ ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ g'a te tuˬ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ venˇ baˆ te ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hta‸ ga laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ Awˬ pa geh chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ yoˬ.
62002002	Ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon, yawˇ lehˬ tanˇ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ. Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62002003	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te ve k'o, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ hk'a deh‸ deh‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62002004	Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ na yuˬ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ chaw heˍ paˍ hpeh‸ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ cawˬ.
62002005	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ tehˬ awˬ na biˇ la peuˬ. Ngaˬ hui yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui chi hk'e g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62002006	Ngaˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve chaw lehˬ, Yeˍsuˆ te ve hk'e yawˇ htawˇ te cawˇ ve yoˬ.
62002007	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, tawˇ piˇ ve awˬ suhˉ teˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ piˇ leh, nawˬ hui geh cawˬ taˍ ve tawˇ awˬ piˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ awˬ piˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ jaw peuˬ ve tawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62002008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ htawˇ, tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve awˬ suhˉ teˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, naˆ ho‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ mehˉ k'ai chehˇ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ lehˬ chi beu‸ ka‸ ba tawˆ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
62002009	Awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ canˇ chehˇ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ chi beu‸ hk'a gaˬ naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
62002010	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ leh, awˬ g'euˆ awˬ hk'aw lo hkui htiˇ poˬ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ.
62002011	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ canˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ leh, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo toˇ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Naˆ ho‸ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ mehˆ cuˉ piˇ lawˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ hk'aˬ lo k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ shiˍ.
62002012	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw nawˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hpehˇ hk'a peuˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
62002013	Awˬ pa teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ cawˬ chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'aˇ peuˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
62002014	Awˬ pa teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ cawˬ chehˇ taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ taˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw haˉ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ leh, haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ nawˬ hui g'aˇ peuˬ ve pa taw ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
62002015	Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, taˇ ha‸ loˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ miˬ guiˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve k'o, Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ cawˬ.
62002016	Awˬ lawn k'o, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ te gaˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, mehˆ shiˍ mawˬ leh heuˆ gaˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ hta‸ pa taw nyi ma uiˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha lo tawˆ la ve maˇ heˆ. Miˬ guiˬ lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
62002017	Miˬ guiˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve sheˉ lai ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mehˉ k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve a loˍ hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
62002018	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi beu‸ lehˬ awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hkri‸ ve canˇ paˍ lonˉ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ ve hk'e, chi beu‸ ka‸ Hkri‸ ve canˇ paˍ lonˉ laiˉ g'aˇ tawˆ la peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, chi beu‸ lehˬ awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62002019	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui ngaˬ hui hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui geh teˇ geh chehˇ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui hk'a peu-eˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ teh‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la tuˬ, yawˇ hui tawˆ k'ai peuˬ.
62002020	Da‸ kehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ peuˬ ve pa taw, teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62002021	Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ leh, heˍ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
62002022	Heˍ shehˍ hpaˇ a shu le. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ maˇ heˆ laˇ. Awˬ pa leh Yaˇ hpu hta‸ g'awˬ hk'aˆ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve canˇ paˍ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62002023	Yaˇ hpu hta‸ hk'a chiˇ baˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ pa hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸. Yaˇ hpu hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ leh hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Awˬ pa hta‸ htawˇ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ.
62002024	Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ peuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ, nawˬ hui ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve k'o, nawˬ hui htawˇ Yaˇ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ pa awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
62002025	Yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ co ti‸ ha ti‸ pe‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
62002026	Nawˬ hui hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
62002027	Yeˍsuˆ nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve pa taw, a shu ka‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ maˇ loˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve lehˬ, awˬ lawn hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, heˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ heˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve oˇ ve nawˬ hui hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
62002028	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve cawˬ tuˬ leh yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ, chi beu‸ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
62002029	Yawˇ lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve k'o, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, yawˇ lo paw la peuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62003001	Awˬ pa ngaˬ hui hta‸ hk'aˬ ma ha‸ ve hta‸ dawˇ nyi-o. Ngaˬ hui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teh‸ meh laˇ leh, ngaˬ hui lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ tehˬ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ.
62003002	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ maˇ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ sheˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ k'aw‸ tawˆ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'a tawˍ lehˆ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
62003003	Yawˇ hta‸ chi hk'e dawˇ law chehˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, yawˇ da‸ kehˬ ve hk'e, chaw oˇ ve htawˇ a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ da‸ piˇ kehˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
62003004	Venˇ baˆ hk'a te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te ya‸ ve yoˬ. Venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, awˬ liˇ tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ te ya‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62003005	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ tuˬ awˬ pon tawˆ la ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ baˆ maˇ cawˬ.
62003006	Yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ baˆ maˇ te. Venˇ baˆ te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hta‸ maˇ mawˬ maˇ shiˍ sheˍ.
62003007	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, a shu htawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62003008	Venˇ baˆ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, neˇ haiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, neˇ haiˬ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ venˇ baˆ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, neˇ haiˬ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te luˬ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
62003009	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ baˆ maˇ te. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve te‸ ve awˬ yawˇ teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ leh, yawˇ G'uiˬ sha geh paw la peuˬ ve pa taw, yawˇ venˇ baˆ te maˇ hpeh‸.
62003010	Chi hta‸ pa taw, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ leh neˇ haiˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ fuiˍ da‸ pehˬ da‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ maˇ te ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸. A shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ maˇ ha‸ ve chaw htawˇ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ.
62003011	Ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ g'a ha‸ da‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ taˍ peuˬ.
62003012	Haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ leh yawˇ ve awˬ nyi paˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ Kaˍiˉnaˆ hk'e taˇ hpeh‸ piˇ. Yawˇ lehˬ, aˬ hto‸ ma te awˬ nyi paˍ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, yawˇ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ haiˬ leh, awˬ nyi paˍ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw yawˇ hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve yoˬ.
62003013	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ canˇ ve k'o, taˇ anˇ.
62003014	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ k'ai leh co ha te‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e peuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui hk'aˬ hk'e g'a shiˍ le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui ha‸ ve pa taw g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
62003015	A shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ canˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, chaw hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo co ti‸ ha ti‸ maˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62003016	Hkri‸ lehˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ pon yawˇ ve a sha‸ tanˇ piˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui htawˇ, awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon ngaˬ hui ve a sha‸ hta‸ tanˇ piˇ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
62003017	Chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, chi miˬ guiˬ ve hpu shi mawˇ jeˬ cawˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi haˍ g'awˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ htawˇ, ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ cawˬ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˬ hk'e te cawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
62003018	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, maw‸ k'aw ceh ha‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ taˇ te. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, kanˉ te ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸-o‸.
62003019	Ngaˬ hui chi hk'e ha‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve teh‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ taˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma dawˇ sha la tuˬ yoˬ.
62003020	Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma a‸ kehˉ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ leh, hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62003021	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve nyi ma ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ venˇ baˆ maˇ taˍ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
62003022	Yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui na yuˬ leh yawˇ nyi ma cawˇ ve hta‸ te ve pa taw, yawˇ geh ngaˬ hui hk'a lawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ.
62003023	Yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ meh hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a yonˍ leh, Yaˇ hpu tawˇ piˇ laˇ ve hk'e, teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ g'a ha‸ da‸ ve yoˬ.
62003024	Yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, yawˇ htawˇ chaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62004001	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, awˬ ha teˇ maˬ le le hta‸ taˇ yonˍ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, awˬ ha teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve leh naˍ, hk'a deh‸ lawˇ nyi sheˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ laiˉ g'aˇ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo k'ai peuˬ.
62004002	G'uiˬ sha ve Awˬ ha hpu hta‸ nawˬ hui chi hk'e shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ leh laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve awˬ ha teˇ maˬ le le G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ.
62004003	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ leh laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ shaˉ hkiˆ maˇ hkanˍ ve awˬ ha hk'aˬ ve teˇ maˬ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸. Chi hk'e ve awˬ ha lehˬ, Hkri‸ ve canˇ paˍ lonˉ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e ve awˬ ha laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ taˍ peuˬ ve hk'e, chi beu‸ ka‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ taˍ peuˬ.
62004004	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, nawˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ g'aˇ peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve yoˬ.
62004005	Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui yaw leh, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve yoˬ.
