62004006	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸ ve chaw lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ. Chi hta‸ pa taw, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ha hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve awˬ ha hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62004007	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸-a veuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha geh tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Ha‸ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62004008	Maˇ ha‸ puiˉ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shiˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62004009	G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ hpu hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ hui co ha g'a te‸ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu tiˍ hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo peu laˇ ve yoˬ.
62004010	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ gaˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ leh, ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu peu laˇ ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
62004011	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ ngaˬ hui hta‸ chi taw taw ha‸ ve k'o, ngaˬ hui htawˇ teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
62004012	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ mawˬ jaw. Ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸ ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, yawˇ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo biˇ la peuˬ.
62004013	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve Awˬ ha hpu ngaˬ hui hta‸ pe‸ laˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, yawˇ htawˇ ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62004014	Miˬ guiˬ yaˇ ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ shehˍ hpaˇ te tuˬ, Awˬ pa lehˬ yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu peu laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a mawˬ leh, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
62004015	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu yoˬ teh‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, yawˇ htawˇ G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
62004016	G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ leh yonˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha htawˇ yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve yoˬ.
62004017	Suhˉ jehˬ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ ve cawˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ biˇ la peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ hui htawˇ chi miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo hpeh‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
62004018	Ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo kawˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ cawˬ. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve biˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, kawˆ ve hta‸ mehˉ k'ai piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, kawˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve pa taw, kawˆ puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ biˇ sheˍ.
62004019	G'uiˬ sha ngaˬ hui hta‸ awˉ lawˉ ha‸ ve pa taw, ngaˬ hui htawˇ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
62004020	Ngaˬ G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ yawˇ canˇ ve k'o, yawˇ lehˬ heˍ paˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, a shu yawˇ mawˬ chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ maˇ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, maˇ mawˬ jaw ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˇ hk'aˬ hk'e te ha‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ le.
62004021	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve chaw lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hta‸ htawˇ g'a ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ hui yawˇ geh g'a taˍ ve yoˬ.
62005001	Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ hk'a yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ pa hta‸ hk'a ha‸ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le lehˬ, awˬ yaˇ hta‸ ka‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
62005002	Ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ leh yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ na yuˬ htaˇ, yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62005003	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ ha‸ ve teh‸ k'oˆ ve lehˬ, yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui na yuˬ leh te ve hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ.
62005004	G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ yaˇ hk'a hpeh‸ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ g'aˇ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ g'aˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ yoˬ.
62005005	Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ g'aˇ ve chaw lehˬ a shu le. Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ laˇ.
62005006	Chi teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ leh awˬ suhˍ awˬ hk'aw lo laˬ ve Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ceh tiˉ maˇ heˆ, iˉ kaˆ leh awˬ suhˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ.
62005007	Awˬ ha hpu lehˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ pa taw, yawˇ htawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62005008	Awˬ lawn k'o, Awˬ ha hpu, iˉ kaˆ leh awˬ suhˍ, shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ chi shehˆ ceuˬ cawˬ leh, chi shehˆ ceuˬ hawˍ da‸ ve yoˬ.
62005009	Chaw yaˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui na ve k'o, G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ leuˉ leh uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
62005010	G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu hta‸ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo shaˉ hkiˆ oˇ ve cawˬ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ heˍ paˍ meh piˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ maˇ yonˍ ve pa taw yoˬ.
62005011	G'uiˬ sha shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ co ti‸ ha ti‸ pe‸ laˇ leh, co ti‸ ha ti‸ chi yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve yoˬ.
62005012	Yaˇ hpu hta‸ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ hpu hta‸ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ maˇ cawˬ.
62005013	G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu awˬ meh hta‸ yonˍ ve nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, co ti‸ ha ti‸ cawˬ ve hta‸ g'a shiˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
62005014	Yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ ngaˬ hui chi hk'e nyi ma ha‸ hanˉ tuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve a loˍ cawˇ ve hk'e ngaˬ hui teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ lawˬ ve k'o, yawˇ na yuˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
62005015	Ngaˬ hui hk'a lawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ na yuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve k'o, yawˇ geh hk'a lawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a peuˬ teh‸ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62005016	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ g'aˇ, suh maˇ keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ te chehˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve k'o, chaw oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ awˬ pon yawˇ lawˬ leh, suh maˇ keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ te chehˇ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi oˇ ve co ha te‸ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha geh yawˇ lawˬ ve hk'e g'a tuˬ yoˬ. Suh keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ ve awˬ pon g'a lawˬ ve teh‸ ngaˬ k'oˆ ve maˇ heˆ.
62005017	Te ya‸ ve hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, venˇ baˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, suh maˇ keunˍ ve venˇ baˆ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
62005018	G'uiˬ sha geh paw la ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ baˆ maˇ te ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha geh paw la peuˬ ve yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ leh, haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ yawˇ hta‸ maˇ htawˇ.
62005019	Ngaˬ hui G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve hta‸ ka‸, miˬ guiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ haiˬ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ ka‸, ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
62005020	Peuˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu gaˬ la leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ puiˉ tuˬ yawˇ cuˇ yiˍ pe‸ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ leh yawˇ ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ hui chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha chi lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ leh, co ti‸ ha ti‸ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
62005021	Ha‸ ve yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, shaˉ ho‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ jaw k'ai-o.
63001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ leh, leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ leh yawˇ ve yaˇ ehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ceh tiˉ ha‸ ve maˇ heˆ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ hk'a shiˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ htawˇ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
63001002	Ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw, nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chi teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ ngaˬ hui geh cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
63001003	Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha leh, Awˬ pa ve Yaˇ hpu Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ geh lo, awˬ bon teˇ ceuˬ, ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hui geh cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chi teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui geh cawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
63001004	Awˬ pa ngaˬ hui hta‸ tawˇ pe‸ laˇ ve hk'e, nawˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve pa taw, ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
63001005	Chi beu‸ lehˬ, tawˇ piˇ ve awˬ suhˉ teˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve maˇ heˆ. Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ ngaˬ hui g'a taˍ peuˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ ha‸ da‸ tuˬ nawˬ hta‸ lawˬ hkawˉ ve yoˬ.
63001006	Yawˇ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve hk'e ngaˬ hui te ve lehˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai-o teh‸ tawˇ piˇ taˍ ve chi teˇ hkawˇ hta‸ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸ nawˬ hui g'a kaˇ taˍ peuˬ.
63001007	Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ chaw yaˇ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ pfuhˇ leh laˬ ve maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve chaw heˍ paˍ laiˉ g'aˇ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo k'ai peuˬ. Chi hk'e ve chaw lehˬ, chaw heˍ paˍ hpeh‸ leh, Yeˍsuˆ ve canˇ paˍ lonˉ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
63001008	Nawˬ hui te peuˬ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ g'a mehˉ k'ai leh, nawˬ hui awˬ bon hk'a biˇ g'a hpeh‸ tuˬ, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ shaˍ ti‸ taˍ-o‸.
63001009	Hkri‸ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ chehˇ leh, dawˇ ponˬ dawˇ leuˉ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ caˉ da‸. Hkri‸ maˍ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Awˬ pa hta‸ ka‸ Yaˇ hpu hta‸ ka‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ.
63001010	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ nawˬ hui geh laˬ leh maˍ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ chi maˇ pfuhˇ laˬ ve k'o, yawˇ hta‸ yehˬ hk'aw taˇ ha‸ yuˬ, hpuˇ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ tawˇ ka‸ taˇ yaw.
63001011	Awˬ lawn k'o, hpuˇ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ yaw ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ te ve haiˬ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ geh teˇ geh te ve hk'e yoˬ.
63001012	Ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve htawˇ, htawˇ g'euˆ leh naˬ meu‸ g'uiˬ maˇ bvuh‸ gaˇ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ hui ha lehˬ ve biˇ la tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh laˬ leh, mehˆ hpfuhˇ tawˍ da‸ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ g'a yaw da‸ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
63001013	Leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve nawˬ awˬ viˉ ma ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ hui nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ pehnˇ ve hkawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ.
64001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ hoˉ chaw mawˇ hpeh‸ leh, ha‸ ve Gaˍyuˆ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ.
64001002	Ha‸ ve awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, co ha hpawˇ loˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ nawˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve hk'e, teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ la tuˬ leh chehˇ sha cawˬ sha tuˬ ngaˬ bon lawˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
64001003	Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ laˬ leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh nawˬ k'ai chehˇ ve awˬ lawn yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ha lehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai tehˬ ve yoˬ.
64001004	Ngaˬ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ htaˇ, ngaˬ ha lehˬ tuˬ chi a‸ kehˉ uiˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
64001005	Ha‸ ve awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, hkehˉ chaw hpeh‸ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ mawˬ maˇ shiˍ da‸ jaw htawˇ, hk'a deh‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ ve lehˬ, da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
64001006	Nawˬ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ lawn Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ shiˍ k'oˬ piˇ ve k'o, da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
64001007	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon yawˇ hui bon ca maˍ k'ai leh, lawˇ kiˍ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ga piˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ ha‸ yuˬ.
64001008	Hk'e te leh, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chi hk'e ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ geh teˇ geh ngaˬ hui kanˉ te hpeh‸ tuˬ, ngaˬ hui yawˇ hui hta‸ hk'a deh‸ ha‸ yuˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ.
64001009	Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hta‸ ngaˬ li‸ a ciˉ bvuh‸ feu piˇ peuˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo shu a‸ kehˉ uiˍ gaˇ ve Daˍyawˇtaˍraˆ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve hkawˇ hta‸ maˇ na.
64001010	Chi hta‸ pa taw ngaˬ laˬ ve k'o, yawˇ te chehˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ haiˬ ve tawˇ hta‸ yaw leh, ngaˬ awˬ lawn maˇ heˆ heˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'e ceh tiˉ te ve hta‸ yawˇ nyi hk'aˇ maˇ suh sheˍ. Awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ ha‸ yuˬ ve awˬ hk'oˆ ka‸, ha‸ yuˬ gaˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ tawˍ taˍ leh Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a‸ k'oˬ ve yoˬ.
64001011	Ha‸ ve awˬ chawˇ-oˬ, haiˬ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh taˇ k'ai. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai-o. Da‸ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shiˍ maˇ mawˬ jaw.
64001012	Chaw hk'a peu-eˬ Deˍmeˍtriˆ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ yawˇ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawˇ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ leh, shaˉ hkiˆ chi ve lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui shiˍ ve yoˬ.
64001013	Ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ tuˬ maˇ maˇ cawˬ ve htawˇ, naˬ meu‸ taˬ leh naˬ meu‸ g'uiˬ bvuh‸ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ te gaˇ.
64001014	Maˇ maw maw k'o, nawˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, mehˆ hpfuhˇ tawˍ da‸ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ huiˉ maˬ na‸ uˉ g'a te da‸ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ dawˇ law chehˇ ve yoˬ.
64001015	Nawˬ geh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha ve cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ chawˇ teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ pehnˇ ve hkawˇ shanˍ feu laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ htawˇ, nawˬ geh chehˇ ve awˬ chawˇ teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ shanˍ feu laˇ ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve hkawˇ k'aw‸ hto piˇ-oˆ.
65001001	Ngaˬ lehˬ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve awˬ ceˬ, Yaˍkoˆ ve awˬ nyi paˍ Yuˇda‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ li‸ chi bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ nawˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
65001002	Ha k'aˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ, dawˇ sha ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ la piˇ-oˆ.
65001003	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui teˇ geh hk'a shuˍ shuˍ g'a taˍ ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ lawn, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ bvuh‸ laˇ gaˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hta‸ teˇ pawˆ ceh tiˉ chiˇ a‸ piˇ taˍ ve yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ pon nawˬ hui g'aˇ hte‸ te tuˬ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ piˇ leh li‸ chi teˇ k'oˆ g'a bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ.
65001004	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ ngaˬ hui geh hk'awˇ lo‸ la peuˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan ve chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haiˬ ve leh cha‸ chiˆ ve laiˉ ceuˬ te tuˬ awˬ pon, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ bon hta‸ yuˬ hpfuhˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ceh tiˉ ngaˬ hui ve Uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ leh Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ ve ka‸, yawˇ hui yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ baˬ ve yoˬ. Ciˍ yanˍ ve chi hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a hkanˍ tuˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ka‸ k'oˆ cheˆ taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
65001005	Nawˬ hui teˇ pawˆ hk'a deh‸ shiˍ peuˬ ve htawˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ chi hk'e k'aw‸ dawˇ nawˇ laˇ gaˇ ve yoˬ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, Eˇjiˇtu‸ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ htaiˍ hk'aw‸ piˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ te luˬ te sheˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
65001006	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, a shu yawˇ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ baˬ taˉ leh, a shu yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hta‸ baˬ taˉ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ co co taiˍ taiˍ yeˬ ve sho caˆ hpeh taˍ leh, naˆ ho‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo haw taˍ ve yoˬ. Suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ awˬ pon, uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ chi hk'e haw taˍ ve yoˬ.
65001007	Oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Sawˉdonˍ venˇ, Gawˇmawˇra‸ venˇ leh, awˬ paˇ awˬ kui lo cawˬ ve venˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, ngaˬ hui awˬ pon henˇ yuˬ jawˬ yuˬ tuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Venˇ yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ponˬ te leuˉ leh, hawˉ hk'aˆ chawˇ hawˉ hk'aˆ ka‸ peh‸ ve tzuhˆ ve hta‸ te ve pa taw, co co taiˍ taiˍ aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ ve ciˍ yanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
65001008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, zuh‸ maˆ mawˬ ve hta‸ cuˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ a shu yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ te ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, uˉ peunˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpfuhˆ baˬ leh, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
65001009	Uiˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ Miˆhkeˍlaˆ lehˬ, Moˉseˍ suh taˍ ve awˬ to awˬ lawn neˇ haiˬ hta‸ tawˇ g'awˬ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ maˇ haˆ. Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ deˇ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, yawˇ yawˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
65001010	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui maˇ shiˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ lawn maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Maˇ dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui lehˬ a shu yawˇ hk'aˇ yawˇ shiˍ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai ve pa taw, luˬ k'ai sheˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
65001011	Yawˇ hui g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Kaˍiˉnaˆ ve ya‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aˇ suh yawˇ hui k'ai ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, yawˇ hui awˬ hpfuhˇ g'a tuˬ awˬ pon, Baˍlanˍ te ya‸ ve awˬ hk'aˇ suh g'uiˇ k'ai leh, Kawˇraˆ hpfuhˆ k'ai ve hk'e, yawˇ hui htawˇ hpfuhˆ k'ai ve pa taw g'a luˬ g'a sheˆ ve yoˬ.
65001012	Nawˬ hui ha‸ pehnˇ ve pawehˇ hta‸ caˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ iˉ kaˆ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve, kawˆ tuˬ uiˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ geh hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, maˇ kawˆ puiˉ leh, a shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ pon ceh tiˉ dawˇ nyi puiˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, mvuhˇ haw meuˆ chiˇ veu ve, iˉ kaˆ maˇ cawˬ ve moˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ goˇ htaˇ, awˬ shiˍ maˇ naw‸ leh, g'awˬ baˬ peuˬ leh nyiˇ pawˆ suh peuˬ ve iˉ shiˍ cehˬ hk'e htawˇ yawˇ hui hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
65001013	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, htawˇ hpfuhˆ nawˬ hpfuhˆ te ve laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ g'uiˬ baˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ fuˇ tawˆ la piˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, a shu yawˇ ve ya‸ taw tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ tawˆ la piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, htawˇ k'aw‸ nawˬ k'aw‸ k'ai ve meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Naˆ ho‸ jaˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ yawˇ hui awˬ pon co co taiˍ taiˍ teh taˍ ve yoˬ.
65001014	Aˍdanˍ hta‸ tanˬ leh suhˍ co-e teˇ co-e awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve Eˇnawˆ teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ lawn bon maˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ ve da‸ kehˬ ve chaw awˬ meunˍ awˬ shehnˉ geh teˇ geh laˬ ve yoˬ.
65001015	Yawˇ laˬ ve lehˬ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, yawˇ hui maˇ yawˆ maˇ yan te leh haiˬ ve kanˉ hk'a te ve hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan ve venˇ baˆ yaˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ tzuhˇ tawˇ shaˆ hk'a yaw ve tawˇ hkawˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ pon maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ taˆ leh ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon htawˇ yawˇ laˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
65001016	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, beu puiˉ hk'aiˉ puiˉ ve chaw, k'oˆ puiˉ shanˬ puiˉ ve chaw, a shu yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw, caˆ muiˬ leh tawˇ uiˍ tawˇ mvuh yaw ve chaw leh, shu geh teˇ ceuˬ ceuˬ g'a tuˬ shu hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ puiˉ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
65001017	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ k'oˆ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ.
65001018	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, Awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ yawˆ yan leh a shu yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ awˬ hk'aˇ suh te k'ai leh, hk'a mvuhˇ hk'a na k'oˆ guiˇ g'uiˬ guiˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, nawˬ hui hta‸ k'oˆ taˍ laˇ peuˬ.
65001019	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ moˍ hta‸ hpaˆ da‸ tuˬ te ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo Awˬ ha hpu maˇ chehˇ leh, awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ hpawˇ hta‸ ceh tiˉ caˉ da‸ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
65001020	Ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, da‸ kehˬ jaˇ ve nawˬ hui yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ la yeˬ la piˇ leh, da‸ ve kehˬ ve Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo bon lawˬ chehˇ-oˆ.
65001021	Nawˬ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve ha‸ pehnˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ awˬ to yeˬ chaweh chehˇ taˍ-o‸. Co ti‸ ha ti‸ g'a htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ ve ha k'aˉ puiˉ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ law chehˇ taˍ-o‸.
65001022	Hk'a deh‸ maˇ yonˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ yonˍ la tuˬ ga piˇ-oˆ.
65001023	Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ ponˬ piˇ tuˬ, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo g'awˬ tawˆ-oˆ. Peuˬ leh, kawˆ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ ha k'aˉ-oˆ. Awˬ suhˍ awˬ shaˍ a loˍ hta‸ pa taw cha‸ chiˆ k'ai ve veu‸ k'aˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ canˇ-oˆ.
65001024	Nawˬ hui maˇ g'a paiˍ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ nawˬ hui hta‸ nyi ha‸ shaˉ puiˉ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ hui ya‸ kuiˬ jiˆ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ kuiˬ lo nawˬ hui ha lehˬ ha k'a g'a chehˇ tuˬ yawˇ te puiˉ ve yoˬ.
65001025	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ awˬ hk'aw lo, ngaˬ hui ve Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ paˍ G'uiˬ sha teˇ g'aˇ tiˉ ve hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ, uiˍ ve mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ, kanˇ paˆ teˇ ceuˬ leh, uˉ peunˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ htaˇ ka‸, chi beu‸ ka‸, co co taiˍ taiˍ ka‸ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
66001001	Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Maˇ maw maw hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maw piˇ tuˬ, hpeu‸ maˍ laˇ ve awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ peu laˇ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ Yoˇhanˬ hta‸ awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ shiˍ piˇ mawˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66001002	G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ taˍ ve awˬ lawn hta‸ Yoˇhanˬ yawˇ g'a mawˬ ve hk'e shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
66001003	G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ chi hta‸ g'aw maˍ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ, bvuh‸ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a kaˇ leh te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la paˇ neˇ ve yoˬ.
66001004	Ngaˬ Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, Aˍsiˆ mvuhˇ miˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ suhˍ moˍ hta‸ li‸ bvuh‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ka‸, chi beu‸ ka‸, laˬ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ geh lo maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve k'aw jaw mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo chehˇ taˍ ve awˬ ha suhˍ maˬ geh lo maˇ k'oˆ,
66001005	ka ti‸ yeˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ geh lo maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ leh dawˇ sha gaˇ sha tuˬ nawˬ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. Yeˍsuˆ Hkri‸ lehˬ, suh peuˬ ve chaw hui awˬ hk'aw lo awˉ lawˉ k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ ha‸ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh ngaˬ hui ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ hpehˇ hk'a laˇ peuˬ.
66001006	Ngaˬ hui lehˬ, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ hpeh‸ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve Awˬ pa G'uiˬ sha ve paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ te ve yoˬ. Co co taiˍ taiˍ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh kanˇ paˆ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ.
66001007	Nyi loˬ, yawˇ lehˬ moˬ geh teˇ geh ya‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. Mehˆ shiˍ teˇ shiˍ le le leh yawˇ hta‸ juˆ pawnˍ ve chaw hui yawˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hta‸ pa taw g'a paˆ hawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'e hpeh‸ la tuˬ yoˬ. A menˬ.
66001008	Ngaˬ lehˬ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ leh awˬ leh meuˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ka‸, chi beu‸ ka‸, laˬ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, te‸ chehˇ ve Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66001009	Ngaˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi Yoˇhanˬ yoˬ. Tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha uˉ peunˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yeunˇ hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hui geh teˇ geh hkanˍ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ leh, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve pa taw, Paˍmoˆ conˇ lo ngaˬ g'a chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66001010	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ nyi teˇ nyi htaˇ Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chehˇ leh, behˬ heh ma awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, ngaˬ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ lo bvuhˬ jaˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66001011	Tawˇ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ li‸ hk'aw bvuh‸ taˍ leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ chi suhˍ moˍ hta‸ feu piˇ-oˆ. Eˇfeˇsu‸, Saˍmuˇraˍnaˆ, Peˍraˍgaˍ, Saˍtiˍrehˇ, Saˍdiˆ, Hpiˇlaˍdeˍhpiˆ leh Lawˍdiˍkiˆ, awˬ moˍ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ feu piˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66001012	Ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ tuˬ ngaˬ hpfuhˆ nyi htaˇ, shi kawˆ faiˇ suhˍ maˬ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
66001013	Kawˆ faiˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ k'aw ji lo chaw yaˇ ve. Yaˇ hpu hta‸ shuˍ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, hkui sheh hk'a gaˬ zuhˬ ve aˉ po‸ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, yawˇ ve nyi ma pui lo shi haˍ pi caˆ tsuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66001014	Yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ leh yawˇ ve uˉ hkeh mvuh lehˬ, hpu ve yawˬ mvuh hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ k'oˆ, vaˇ meu-e hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ k'oˆ, hpu ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, aˬ miˍ ha hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66001015	Yawˇ ve hkui sheh lehˬ, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo lawˍ taˍ ve kuiˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ tawˇ yaw ve awˬ hkawˇ lehˬ, iˉ kaˆ g'uiˬ baˇ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66001016	Yawˇ ve la‸ sheh la‸ sha paˉ lo meu‸ keu shiˍ suhˍ shiˍ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ viˇ nyiˇ hpawˇ cawˬ ve tcuhˆ jaˇ ve aˉ htaw teˇ maˬ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ nyi g'euˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ba da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
66001017	Yawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ lehˬ suh ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ ve hkui paˇ lo paiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ la‸ sheh ngaˬ awˬ hk'oˆ taˍ leh k'oˆ laˇ ve, Taˇ kawˆ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ leh awˬ leh meuˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66001018	Te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ htawˇ ngaˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ suh peuˬ ve htawˇ chi beu‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ ngaˬ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Suh ve teˇ ceuˬ ve shawˇ leh suh mvuhˇ miˬ ve shawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66001019	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chi beu‸ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, bvuh‸ taˍ-o‸.
66001020	Ngaˬ ve la‸ sheh la‸ sha paˉ lo nawˬ g'a mawˬ peuˬ ve meu‸ keu shiˍ suhˍ shiˍ leh, shi kawˆ faiˇ suhˍ maˬ ve faˉ taˍ ve tcuhˉ kuiˬ lehˬ chi hk'e yoˬ. Meu‸ keu shiˍ suhˍ shiˍ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ suhˍ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ leh, kawˆ faiˇ suhˍ maˬ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ suhˍ moˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66002001	Eˇfeˇsu‸ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ piˇ-oˆ. La‸ sha paˉ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo meu‸ keu shiˍ suhˍ shiˍ vawˆ taˍ leh, shi kawˆ faiˇ suhˍ maˬ awˬ k'aw ji lo yiˬ yiˬ laˬ laˬ te chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66002002	Nawˬ te chehˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, kanˉ te hkeu‸ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hkanˍ maˇ g'a ve hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Tcuh yaˇ maˇ heˆ ve ka‸, a shu yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ tcuh yaˇ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ lawˇ nyi leh, yawˇ hui heˍ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ nawˬ g'a shiˍ ve yoˬ.
66002003	Nawˬ yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ pa taw tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ htawˇ, nawˬ nyi ma maˇ luˬ ve hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
66002004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ ha‸ puiˉ ve htawˇ, chi beu‸ maˇ k'aw‸ ha‸.
66002005	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ mvuh kuiˬ lo ce k'ai peuˬ ve hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ leh, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ te ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'aw‸ te-o. Nawˬ ve venˇ baˆ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ geh laˬ leh nawˬ ve kawˆ faiˇ hta‸ taˍ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yuˬ tawˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
66002006	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, da‸ ve chi teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ te chehˇ sheˍ. Niˇkawˇlaˆ chaw hui te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ canˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ htawˇ kanˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ canˇ ve yoˬ.
66002007	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o. G'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve suhˆ cehˬ teˇ cehˬ ve awˬ shiˍ hta‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Suhˆ cehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve Paˍraˍdiˇsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66002008	Saˍmuˇraˍnaˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ leh awˬ leh meuˇ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve leh, suh peuˬ ve htawˇ k'aw‸ te‸ la peuˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66002009	Nawˬ g'a hkanˍ chehˇ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve leh haˍ ve g'awˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. (Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ paw sha chehˇ ve yoˬ.) Chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ nawˬ hta‸ hk'aiˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ ka‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ, Saˍtanˍ ve awˬ moˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66002010	Maˇ maw maw nawˬ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ taˇ kawˆ. Nawˬ hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ neˇ haiˬ lehˬ, nawˬ hui teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ htawnˍ hk'aw lo baˬ keu leh, teˇ chi nyi hk'a gaˬ fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ nawˬ hui g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ nyi ma yeˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Oˇ hk'e te ve k'o, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ hk'awˆ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66002011	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o. Nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, g'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te maˇ g'a.
66002012	Peˍraˍgaˍ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ viˇ nyiˇ hpawˇ cawˬ ve tcuhˆ jaˇ ve aˉ htaw hta‸ vawˆ taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66002013	Nawˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ lehˬ, Saˍtanˍ ve k'aw jaw hpeh‸ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ nawˬ vawˆ yeˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve ka ti‸ yeˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ Anˍtiˇpaˆ ve awˬ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, ngaˬ hta‸ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ nawˬ maˇ baˬ taˉ. Yawˇ lehˬ, Saˍtanˍ chehˇ taˍ ve nawˬ ve chehˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
66002014	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Baˍlanˍ meh ve teˇ g'aˇ maˍ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ chaw yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hkui htiˇ poˬ kuiˬ teh taˍ tuˬ, yawˇ lehˬ Baˍlehˆ hta‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hkui htiˇ poˬ kuiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ taˍ ve caˇ tuˬ hta‸ caˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66002015	Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ lehˬ, Niˇkawˇlaˆ chaw hui maˍ ve awˬ hk'aˇ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66002016	Hk'e te leh, venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ-oˆ. Hk'e maˇ heˆ k'o, ngaˬ nawˬ geh haˆ haˆ laˬ leh, ngaˬ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve aˉ htaw hta‸ yehˇ leh, yawˇ hui hta‸ ngaˬ ma‸ bawˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
66002017	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o. G'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ faˉ taˍ ve maˍ naˆ shiˍ maˇ k'oˆ, hpuˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui teˇ shiˍ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Haˉ pui shiˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ bvuh‸ taˍ leh, haˉ pui shiˍ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ awˬ meh oˇ ve hta‸ maˇ shiˍ.
66002018	Saˍtiˍrehˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ piˇ-oˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve Yaˇ hpu ve mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, aˬ miˍ ha hk'e hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ve hkui sheh lehˬ, lawˍ taˍ ve kuiˇ hk'e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66002019	Yawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ kanˉ te chehˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ, ha‸ pehnˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ, yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ, shu hta‸ ga piˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, yeunˇ hkanˍ puiˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Chi hk'oˆ ka‸, chi beu‸ nawˬ te chehˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ nawˬ te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ a‸ kehˉ maˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ.
66002020	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ ma teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yeˍsaˍbeˍlaˆ meh ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ nawˬ chehˇ tcuh taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te tuˬ leh, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ tanˇ taˍ ve caˇ tuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ caˇ tuˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ maˍ piˇ leh sheh ya‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66002021	Venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ awˬ yanˇ piˇ ve htawˇ, yawˇ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te chehˇ ve hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ tuˬ nyi ma maˇ cawˬ.
66002022	Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ naˬ kuiˬ gawˬ kuiˬ lo baˬ keu tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ geh haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw hui hta‸ htawˇ, yawˇ te ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ ve k'o, uiˍ jaˇ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ baˬ keu tuˬ yoˬ.
66002023	Yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, nyi ma leh dawˇ hk'aˇ hta‸ ca nyi shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ hk'a peu-eˬ g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ hui teˇ g'aˇ peuˬ teˇ g'aˇ, a shu yawˇ te ve kanˉ hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e ngaˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66002024	Saˍtanˍ ve naˉ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ shiˍ leh, maˍ piˇ ve oˇ ve hta‸ maˇ na yuˬ ve, Saˍtiˍrehˇ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ taˍ ve nawˬ hui awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ nawˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ vuiˬ maˇ k'aw‸ taˍ.
66002025	Nawˬ hui geh hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ gaˬ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ hk'a deh‸ vawˆ taˍ-o‸.
66002026	G'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, awˬ leh hk'a gaˬ ngaˬ ve kanˉ hta‸ te ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ, Awˬ pa ngaˬ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ pe‸ laˇ ve hk'e, ngaˬ htawˇ yawˇ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66002027	Je‸ mu‸ hk'u hta‸ dawˆ hkoˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ lehˬ sho juˇ fuiˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66002028	Ngaˬ lehˬ, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ peuˬ tawˆ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66002029	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o.
66003001	Saˍdiˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ piˇ-oˆ. G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ha suhˍ maˬ cawˬ leh meu‸ keu shiˍ suhˍ shiˍ cawˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ te chehˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ shu k'oˆ ve htawˇ, nawˬ suh taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
66003002	Shaw chehˇ-oˆ. Cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve, suh paˇ neˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ g'aˇ hk'a deh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ nawˬ ve kanˉ biˇ la peuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ mawˬ.
66003003	Hk'e te leh, nawˬ hk'aˬ hk'e g'a ha‸ yuˬ taˍ leh g'a kaˇ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ dawˇ nawˇ-oˆ. Oˇ ve hta‸ na yuˬ leh venˇ baˆ dawˇ hpfuhˆ-oˆ. Nawˬ maˇ shaw chehˇ taˍ ve k'o, chaw hk'awˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Hk'aˬ ve teˇ yanˇ ngaˬ nawˬ geh gaˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ.
66003004	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Saˍdiˆ venˇ awˬ hkaw lo a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ maˇ te ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ cawˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui keunˍ ve pa taw, hpu ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ g'a veu‸ deh leh, ngaˬ geh g'a te toˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66003005	G'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, chi hk'e ve hpu ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ g'a veu‸ deh tuˬ yoˬ. Co ti‸ ha ti‸ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve awˬ meh hta‸ ngaˬ shiˆ baˬ tuˬ maˇ heˆ. Ngaˬ Awˬ pa mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, Awˬ pa ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, Yawˇ lehˬ ngaˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66003006	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o.
66003007	Hpiˇlaˍdeˍhpiˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Daˍviˆ ve shawˇ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ ve, da‸ ve kehˬ ve, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hpaw taˍ k'o, shu hoˆ maˇ g'a, yawˇ hoˆ taˍ k'o, shu hpaw maˇ g'a ve yoˬ.
66003008	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Nawˬ te chehˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Nyi loˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ hoˆ maˇ g'a ve yehˬ miˉ teˇ maˬ hta‸ nawˬ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo ngaˬ hpaw taˍ peuˬ. Nawˬ awˬ g'aˇ a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve ka‸, ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ na yuˬ peuˬ leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ nawˬ maˇ baˬ taˉ.
66003009	Saˍtanˍ ve awˬ moˍ awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ ve la‸ hk'aw lo ngaˬ chiˇ a‸ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, Yuˇda‸ chaw hpeh‸ ve maˇ heˆ, yawˇ hui heˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ nawˬ ve hkui sheh awˬ paˇ lo oˉ k'oˍ pui tcuh leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ha‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui g'a shiˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66003010	Yeunˇ hkanˍ-o‸ teh‸, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ na yuˬ leh te ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ lawˇ nyi tuˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo lawˇ nyi ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la htaˇ, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ ponˬ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66003011	Ngaˬ haˆ haˆ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Nawˬ ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ g'a lu yuˬ tuˬ, nawˬ geh hk'a cawˬ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ vawˆ taˍ-o‸.
66003012	G'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hkuiˉ daw hpeh‸ la tuˬ ngaˬ te tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ oˇ kaˬ lo maˇ tawˆ k'ai. Yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve venˇ awˬ meh leh, ngaˬ ve awˬ meh awˬ suhˉ ngaˬ bvuh‸ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, ngaˬ ve G'uiˬ sha geh mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la ve, Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ suhˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66003013	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o.
66003014	Lawˍdiˍkiˆ venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ ve tcuh yaˇ hta‸ li‸ chi hk'e bvuh‸ piˇ-oˆ. Ka ti‸ yeˬ leh hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ, G'uiˬ sha hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ hpeh‸ ve, A menˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve teˇ g'aˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66003015	Nawˬ te chehˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ lehˬ, gawˬ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ, chiˆ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ. Nawˬ lehˬ, gawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ, maˇ heˆ k'o chiˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ tuˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ heuˆ gaˇ ve yoˬ.
66003016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ lehˬ chiˆ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ, gawˬ ve ka‸ maˇ heˆ, lehˬ ve tiˉ hpeh‸ chehˇ ve pa taw, ngaˬ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ hpe‸ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
66003017	Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ paw sha ve yoˬ. Mawˇ jeˬ maˇ maˇ shaw hpoˆ taˍ peuˬ. Ngaˬ te‸ chiˉ ka‸ maˇ loˍ teh‸ nawˬ k'oˆ ve htawˇ, nawˬ lehˬ hk'aˬ ma hpeh‸ bawˬ tuˬ cawˬ ve, hk'aˬ ma ha k'aˉ tuˬ cawˬ ve leh, hk'aˬ ma haˍ g'awˇ chehˇ ve hta‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ, Nawˬ mehˆ cuˉ leh awˬ k'u nyi hpeh‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ ka‸ nawˬ maˇ shiˍ law leˇ.
66003018	Hk'e te leh, ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ awˬ hk'aˇ chi hk'e maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ paw sha la tuˬ, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'aw lo lawˍ taˍ ve shi hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ awˬ k'u nyi hpeh‸ ve hta‸ shu maˇ g'a mawˬ leh nawˬ maˇ g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ, hpu ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ mehˆ mawˬ la tuˬ, mehˆ shiˍ hk'aw keu tuˬ ve naˆ tsuhˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ geh laˬ vuiˬ la-o.
66003019	Ngaˬ ha‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ deˇ maˍ piˇ leh, hk'a deh‸ maˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, hk'a deh‸ k'aw‸ nawˇ la leh venˇ baˆ hta‸ dawˇ hpfuhˆ-oˆ.
66003020	Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ yehˬ miˉ paˇ lo huˉ leh htawˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ kaˇ leh yehˬ miˉ hpaw laˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ yawˇ geh lo lo‸-e leh, yawˇ geh caˇ tuˬ yoˬ.Yawˇ htawˇ ngaˬ geh caˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66003021	Ngaˬ lehˬ, g'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, ngaˬ Awˬ pa ve k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ Awˬ pa geh mui taˍ ve hk'e, g'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ ve k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ geh mui tuˬ ngaˬ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66003022	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw lehˬ, Awˬ ha hpu Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ hk'a deh‸ na-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66004001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo yehˬ miˉ hpaw taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Behˬ heh ma hkawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ bvuhˬ ve, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ ngaˬ hta‸ yaw laˇ leh ngaˬ g'a kaˇ peuˬ ve awˬ hkawˇ lehˬ, ngaˬ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Choˬ kaˬ lo taˆ la-o. Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ g'a hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ lawn teˇ hpaˍ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66004002	Teˇ cawˬ haˉ ngaˬ Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo k'aw jaw teˇ maˬ cawˬ taˍ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, k'aw jaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ lo teˇ g'aˇ mui chehˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
66004003	Oˇ kaˬ lo mui taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ leh, nyiˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Naw naˆ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hta‸ shuˍ ve aˉ laˇ miˬ shiˉ jaw lehˬ, k'aw jaw oˇ ve hta‸ hk'a caw zuhˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66004004	K'aw jaw oˇ ve teˇ maˬ hk'a caw zuhˇ lo k'aw jaw nyiˇ chi awˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ lo chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ nyiˇ chi awˇ g'aˇ mui taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ hpuˉ-ehˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, shi uˉ tcuhˍ hk'awˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66004005	K'aw jaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ ba tawˆ la ve, awˬ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ bvuhˬ la ve leh, mvuhˇ tawˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw oˇ ve awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ kawˆ faiˇ suhˍ maˬ to‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Kawˆ faiˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ha suhˍ maˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66004006	K'aw jaw oˇ ve awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ, haˉ pui keh-oˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve mehˆ g'euˆ hta‸ shuˍ ve g'uiˬ po teˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw awˬ k'aw ji lo maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a caw zuhˇ lo maˇ k'oˆ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh cawˬ ve yoˬ Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ hpawˇ ka‸ awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ hpawˇ ka‸ mehˆ shiˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66004007	Awˉ lawˉ teˇ hkeh lehˬ, laˇ caˬ shiˉ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Nyiˇ hkeh teˇ hkeh lehˬ, nuˇ paˍ ehˉ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Shehˆ hkeh teˇ hkeh lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˇ hkeh teˇ hkeh lehˬ, poˬ chehˇ ve aˉ ceˬ lonˉ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66004008	A sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve awˇ hkeh lehˬ, teˇ hkeh le le toˍ la‸ k'uˉ hkaw‸ maˬ cawˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve awˬ to hk'a peu-eˬ maˇ k'oˆ, toˍ la‸ k'uˉ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ k'oˆ, mehˆ shiˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ maˇ jehˇ jehˇ leh chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve, Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, da‸ kehˬ jaˇ, da‸ kehˬ jaˇ, da‸ kehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ka‸, chi beu‸ ka‸, laˬ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo ka‸, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66004009	A sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ oˇ ve awˇ hkeh lehˬ, k'aw jaw hk'oˆ mui taˍ ve, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ piˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ yanˇ,
66004010	chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ oˇ ve nyiˇ chi awˇ g'aˇ htawˇ, k'aw jaw hk'oˆ mui taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ hkui tcuhˉ teh leh, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ chehˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw oˇ ve awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo yawˇ hui ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ k'ehˆ teh taˍ leh k'oˆ ve,
66004011	Ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ, yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ leh kanˇ paˆ teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a keunˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ nawˬ hpanˍ taˍ ceˍ taˍ leh, nawˬ ve a loˍ hta‸ pa taw awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hpeh‸ la leh nawˬ te hpanˍ taˍ ve deˇ deˇ yoˬ.
66005001	K'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸ taˍ ve li‸ teˇ k'oˆ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Li‸ oˇ ve teˇ k'oˆ hta‸ awˬ hk'aw hpawˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hta‸ hpawˇ maˇ k'oˆ li‸ bvuh‸ taˍ leh yinˉ suhˍ maˬ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66005002	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ k'oˆ ve, Li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ hpeu‸ leh yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpaˆ baˬ tuˬ, a shu te keunˍ ve le teh‸, awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
66005003	Li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ hpeu‸ leh awˬ hk'aw lo nyi tuˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ te maˇ g'a.
66005004	Li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ hpeu‸ keunˍ nyi keunˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ka‸ ca maˇ mawˬ ve pa taw, ngaˬ g'aˇ hte‸ hawˬ ve yoˬ.
66005005	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Taˇ hawˬ. Yuˇda‸ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve, laˇ caˬ shiˉ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Daˍviˆ ve awˬ geu hpeh‸ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, g'aˇ peuˬ. Hk'e te leh, li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ ka‸, yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve suhˍ maˬ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ hpeu‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66005006	Oˇ htaˇ, k'aw jaw leh a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh awˬ k'aw ji lo maˇ k'oˆ, chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ k'aw ji lo maˇ k'oˆ, huˉ chehˇ ve Yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˬ ehˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ jaw peuˬ ve hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hkaw suhˍ maˬ cawˬ leh, mehˆ shiˍ suhˍ shiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Mehˆ shiˍ oˇ ve suhˍ shiˍ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo k'ai tcuh taˍ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ha suhˍ maˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66005007	Oˇ htaˇ, Yawˬ ehˉ laˬ leh k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui shehˍ hpaˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo vawˆ taˍ ve li‸ hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ ve yoˬ.
66005008	Li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ yuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh leh, chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ nyiˇ chi awˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, Yawˬ ehˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ boˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le tinˍ cawˬ leh, sha hawnˉ ve hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve shi mu‸ hk'u vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Sha hawnˉ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui bon lawˬ ve hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66005009	Yawˇ hui k'a muiˬ hkawˇ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ k'a leh k'oˆ ve, Li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ leh yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeu‸ tuˬ, nawˬ te keunˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ suh ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ leh, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh, G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ nawˬ vuiˬ hk'aw‸ peuˬ.
66005010	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha awˬ pon mvuhˇ miˬ yaˇ leh paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ nawˬ te piˇ peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui lehˬ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo g'a uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ k'a muiˬ ve yoˬ.
66005011	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ nyi leh, k'aw jaw hk'a caw zuhˇ lo a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh, chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ hpaˍ leh maˇ jaˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ meunˍ awˬ meunˍ pawˆ, awˬ hinˉ awˬ hinˉ pawˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66005012	Yawˇ hui awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve Yawˬ ehˉ lehˬ, kanˇ paˆ teˇ ceuˬ, mawˇ jeˬ teˇ ceuˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ teˇ ceuˬ, awˬ g'aˇ awˬ shaˉ teˇ ceuˬ, yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ leh chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ g'a keunˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66005013	Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ awˬ hawˉ lo maˇ k'oˆ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, teˇ kaˬ le le lo cawˬ ve te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui shehˍ hpaˇ leh Yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ, yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ leh uˉ peunˍ ve kanˇ paˆ teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ teh‸ yawˇ hui k'oˆ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66005014	A sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh lehˬ, A menˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, boˆ taˍ leh oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
66006001	Yawˬ ehˉ lehˬ, yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve suhˍ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ maˬ hpaw ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. A sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ hkeh lehˬ, mvuhˇ tawˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66006002	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ nyi leh, hpuˉ-ehˍ ve iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hkeh hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Iˉ mvuhˇ ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, hkaˆ teˇ maˬ shi taˍ leh, yawˇ shi uˉ tcuhˍ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ g'aˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh, g'aˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yawˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
66006003	Yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve nyiˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ hpaw ve teˇ yanˇ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ nyiˇ hkeh teˇ hkeh lehˬ, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66006004	Oˇ htaˇ nyiˉ-ehˍ ve iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hkeh tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chaw yaˇ hui cawˇ da‸ hui da‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yuˬ tawˆ leh yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ tiˇ pehˍ da‸ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ aˉ htaw lonˉ teˇ maˬ piˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66006005	Yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve sheh lehˇ teˇ maˬ hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ hpaw ve teˇ yanˇ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ shehˆ hkeh teˇ hkeh lehˬ, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ nyi leh, naˆ tawˉ ve iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hkeh hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo yaˍ cuˍ teˇ maˬ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66006006	A sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh awˬ k'aw ji lo tawˇ yaw ve hta‸ shuˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Caˬ shiˍ teˇ panˇ ve teˇ hteh‸ leh, cho‸ shiˍ shehˆ panˇ ve teˇ hteh‸ yoˬ. Naˍ manˇ leh a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ taˇ te luˬ piˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66006007	Yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve awˍ lehˇ teˇ maˬ hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ hpaw ve teˇ yanˇ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh teˇ hkeh lehˬ, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66006008	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ nyi leh, hpuiˇ tuˇ ve iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hkeh hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve awˬ meh lehˬ, Suh jawˇ mawˇ meh ve yoˬ. Suh mvuhˇ miˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ awˇ pun teˇ pun hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ. Aˉ htaw, meu‸ ve kaˆ ve, naˬ beuˬ naˬ ve leh, miˬ guiˬ ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ teˇ hpaˍ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
66006009	Yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve ngaˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ hpaw ve teˇ yanˇ, co ha teˇ hpaˍ tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ hawˉ lo chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Co ha oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw leh yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hui ve co ha teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66006010	Yawˇ hui awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'oˆ uiˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ hui awˬ suhˍ g'a sheˆ ve awˬ pon, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve chaw hui hta‸ nawˬ suhˉ taˆ leh ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ, hk'aˬ maw maw cawˬ tuˬ sheˍ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66006011	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ hpuˉ-ehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma teˇ g'aˇ teˇ hk'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hk'a shuˍ shuˍ tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ ve, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh awˬ ceˬ te leh yawˇ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hpeh‸ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ moˍ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ teˇ hkui jehˇ taˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66006012	Yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve hkaw‸ maˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ hpaw ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ nyi leh, miˬ hiˆ jaˇ ve hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ nyi lehˬ, meh htuˉ pui hpa naˆ tawˉ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ leh, ha pa tawˬ ve lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ hk'e hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
66006013	Maˉ nawˆ cehˬ hta‸ mvuhˇ haw lonˉ meuˆ leh maˇ meh sheˍ ve iˉ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ ce ve hk'e, mvuhˇ naw ma ve meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ce la ve yoˬ.
66006014	Li‸ hta‸ lo‸ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, mvuhˇ naw ma mehˉ k'ai ve yoˬ. Hk'aw pui hk'a peu-eˬ leh conˇ hk'a peu-eˬ jiˆ tawˆ-e ve yoˬ.
66006015	Oˇ htaˇ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ, jawˇ mawˇ teˇ hpaˍ, ma‸ poˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, chaw paw chaw sha teˇ hpaˍ, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ, awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve chaw leh ponˬ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, haˉ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo leh, hk'aw pui hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve haˉ pui teˇ hpaˍ awˬ kaˍ lo ca va‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66006016	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hk'aw pui teˇ hpaˍ leh haˉ pui teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ hui awˬ hk'oˆ ce teˍ laˇ-oˆ. K'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui shehˍ hpaˇ ngaˬ hui hta‸ maˇ g'a mawˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, Yawˬ ehˉ ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ hui g'a ponˬ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, ngaˬ hui hta‸ faˉ taˍ laˇ-oˆ.
66006017	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve awˬ nyi uiˍ ve teˇ nyi gaˬ la peuˬ. A shu teˇ g'aˇ hkanˍ hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66007001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, miˬ guiˬ awˇ ceˍ lo mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ awˇ g'aˇ huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'oˆ lo maˇ k'oˆ, suhˆ cehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ haw maˇ g'a meuˆ tuˬ miˬ guiˬ awˇ ceˍ awˍ hpawˇ lo ve mvuhˇ haw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ vawˆ tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66007002	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ kuiˬ lo taˆ la leh, te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve yinˉ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ kanˇ paˆ g'a taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ awˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve,
66007003	Ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ naˍ k'aˍ pui hk'oˆ lo yinˉ maˇ tcuhˉ piˇ sheˍ ve ceh ceh, miˬ guiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, suhˆ cehˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, taˇ fawˉ mehˍ sheˍ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66007004	Yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve chaw hk'aˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve awˬ lawn ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hk'a peu-eˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve chaw teˇ shehnˉ awˇ meunˍ awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66007005	Yuˇda‸ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Ruˇbenˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Gaˆ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ,
66007006	Aˍshaˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Naˍtaˍliˆ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Maˍnaˍseˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ,
66007007	Suˉmonˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Leˍviˆ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Iˉsaˍhkaˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ,
66007008	Zaˍbuˆlonˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Yoˇseh‸ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, Beˍyaˍmenˍ awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ, chaw chi ma ve hta‸ yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
66007009	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ nyi leh, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ g'aw maˇ g'a ve chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hpuˉ-ehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hk'aw lo tcuhˉ pui meuˇ awˬ k'aˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ leh, k'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ leh Yawˬ ehˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ huˉ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66007010	Yawˇ hui awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, K'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui chehˇ ve ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha leh Yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ pa taw, htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66007011	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, k'aw jaw hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, hk'a caw zuhˇ huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, k'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ hui boˆ taˍ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ.
66007012	Yawˇ hui k'oˆ ve, A menˬ. Chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ, cuˇ yiˍ maˍ yiˍ teˇ ceuˬ, yawˇ ve bon hta‸ chiˇ mvuh ve teˇ ceuˬ, yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ, kanˇ paˆ teˇ ceuˬ leh awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ co co taiˍ taiˍ cawˬ piˇ-oˆ. A menˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66007013	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Hpuˉ-ehˍ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ veu‸ deh ve chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ a shu le. Yawˇ hui hk'aˬ lo laˬ ve le teh‸ na nyi laˇ ve yoˬ.
66007014	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ shiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh, a shu yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ ve awˬ suhˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tsuhˇ hpu taˍ peuˬ ve chaw hui hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66007015	Hk'e te leh yawˇ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve k'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ chehˇ taˍ leh, yawˇ ve bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ yawˇ ve kanˉ hta‸ te chehˇ ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui geh chehˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
66007016	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ awˍ maˇ k'aw‸ meu‸ leh, iˉ kaˆ maˇ k'aw‸ shiˉ-o. Mvuhˇ cha chiˆ ve hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu haw ve chiˆ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui maˇ k'aw‸ g'a hkanˍ-o.
66007017	Awˬ lawn k'o, k'aw jaw awˬ k'aw ji lo chehˇ taˍ ve Yawˬ ehˉ lehˬ, yawˬ hawˉ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ hui hta‸ yawˬ hawˉ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve g'uiˬ tuˇ teˇ hpaˍ lo yawˇ hui hta‸ sheh k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve mehˆ g'uiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha shiˆ baˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ, teh‸ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66008001	Yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve suhˍ maˬ teˇ maˬ hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ hpaw ve teˇ yanˇ, naˍ riˍ teˇ hkawehˇ hk'e mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ta‸ iˉ gawˬ lehˍ hpeh‸ sheˬ ve yoˬ.
66008002	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ huˉ chehˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ behˬ heh ma suhˍ maˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66008003	Shi mu‸ hk'u shi taˍ ve, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh, tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ paˇ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ cawˬ taˍ ve shi te taˍ ve tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo, Hkri‸ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ ve bon lawˬ hkawˇ geh teˇ geh tanˇ piˇ tuˬ, sha hawnˉ ve maˇ maˇ yawˇ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66008004	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve sha hawnˉ ve mvuhˇ hk'awˇ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui ve bon lawˬ hkawˇ geh teˇ geh G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
66008005	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, mu‸ hk'u oˇ ve hta‸ yuˬ leh, tanˇ kuiˬ lo cawˬ ve aˬ miˍ hk'a biˇ keu peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ tawˍ tawˍ ve, awˬ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ bvuhˬ ve, mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ ba ve leh, miˬ hiˆ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
66008006	Behˬ heh ma suhˍ maˬ cawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ lehˬ, behˬ heh ma meuˆ tuˬ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
66008007	Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, awˬ suhˍ hkaw‸ da‸ taˍ ve vaˇ shiˍ leh aˬ miˍ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ce la ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ shehˆ pun teˇ pun hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, suhˆ cehˬ shehˆ pun teˇ pun hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˉ-ehˍ ve mvuh‸ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, aˬ miˍ to‸ baˬ ve yoˬ.
66008008	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ ve hk'aw pui lonˉ hta‸ shuˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ hta‸ laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ. Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ shehˆ pun teˇ pun lehˬ, awˬ suhˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
66008009	Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ shehˆ pun teˇ pun suh ve yoˬ. Haw lo‸ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, shehˆ pun teˇ pun luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ.
66008010	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, aˬ miˍ tuˉ taˍ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ to‸ chehˇ ve meu‸ keu shiˍ lonˉ teˇ shiˍ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ce la leh, iˉ kaˆ lawˬ shehˆ pun teˇ pun awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, g'uiˬ tuˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, ce la ve yoˬ.
66008011	Meu‸ keu shiˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, Hk'aˇ ve suhˆ meh ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ shehˆ pun teˇ pun lehˬ, hk'aˇ ve suhˆ awˬ g'uiˬ hpeh‸ la leh, iˉ kaˆ hk'aˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, chaw maˇ maˇ suh ve yoˬ.
66008012	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ awˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ nyi shehˆ pun teˇ pun, ha pa shehˆ pun teˇ pun leh, meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ shehˆ pun teˇ pun luˬ k'ai ve pa taw, yawˇ hui ve awˬ g'euˆ shehˆ pun teˇ pun naˆ ho‸ k'ai ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw shehˆ pun teˇ pun awˬ g'euˆ maˇ ba leh, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ shehˆ pun teˇ pun htawˇ oˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ g'euˆ maˇ ba ve yoˬ.
66008013	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ nyi leh, mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ k'aw ji lo aˉ ceˬ lonˉ teˇ hkeh poˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ shehˆ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ tuˬ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66009001	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ngaˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo te leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a gaˬ ce k'ai peuˬ ve meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ shiˍ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve miˬ k'oˍ ve shawˇ yawˇ hta‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66009002	Oˇ htaˇ, leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve miˬ k'oˍ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hpaw ve yoˬ. Aˬ miˍ buiˬ hpfuh lonˉ ve mvuhˇ hk'awˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, miˬ k'oˍ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ hk'awˇ tawˆ la leh, miˬ k'oˍ ve mvuhˇ hk'awˇ hta‸ pa taw mvuhˇ nyi naˆ ho‸ hpeh‸ la leh, mvuhˇ haw awˬ hk'aw lo htawˇ naˆ ho‸ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
66009003	Mvuhˇ hk'awˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo paˉ ce‸ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve aˉ ci ku taw‸ ma ve kanˇ paˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ hui hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66009004	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo cawˬ ve mvuh‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hpa‸ nawˉ lehˍ cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, suhˆ cehˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ g'a te luˬ teh‸ yawˇ hui hta‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Naˍ k'aˍ pui hta‸ G'uiˬ sha ve yinˉ maˇ tcuhˉ taˍ ve chaw hui hta‸ ceh tiˉ g'a te luˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ tawˇ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66009005	Chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yawˇ hui a hkaw-anˬ maˇ g'a. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, ha pa ngaˇ maˬ hk'a gaˬ fawˉ mehˍ piˇ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve lehˬ, aˉ ci ku taw‸ ma chaw hta‸ che‸ leh naˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, fawˉ mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
66009006	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo, chaw yaˇ hui lehˬ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ca ve ka‸, ca maˇ mawˬ. Yawˇ hui suh gaˇ jaˇ ve htawˇ, suh ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hui lo hpaw tawˆ-e tuˬ yoˬ.
66009007	Paˉ ce‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han lehˬ, ma‸ bawˆ tuˬ awˬ pon gu taˍ ve iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Shi uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ yawˇ hui ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ lehˬ, chaw yaˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66009008	Yawˇ hui ve uˉ hkeh mvuh lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ ve uˉ hkeh mvuh hta‸ shuˍ leh, yawˇ hui ve ciˬ lehˬ, laˇ caˬ shiˉ ve ciˬ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66009009	Yawˇ hui ve nyi ma pui htanˬ tuˬ ve lehˬ, sho te taˍ ve nyi ma pui htanˬ tuˬ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve toˍ la‸ k'uˉ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ ve lehˬ, ma‸ bawˆ kuiˬ lo g'aˇ hte‸ k'ai chehˇ ve iˉ mvuhˇ lawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66009010	Yawˇ hui ve awˬ mehˍ tu lehˬ, aˉ ci ku taw‸ ma ve awˬ mehˍ tu hta‸ shuˍ leh, awˬ viˇ htawˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ ha pa ngaˇ maˬ hk'a gaˬ fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ, yawˇ hui ve awˬ mehˍ tu awˬ hk'aw lo kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66009011	Yawˇ hui ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ lehˬ, leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve miˬ k'oˍ ve tcuh yaˇ yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ meh lehˬ, Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ k'o Aˍbaˍdonˍ, Heˍlaˍsaˆ hkawˇ k'o Aˍpawˇliˍonˍ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66009012	Dawˇ haˍ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ peuˬ ve yoˬ. Nyi loˬ, dawˇ haˍ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve nyiˇ ceuˬ k'aw‸ laˬ tuˬ sheˍ ve yoˬ.
66009013	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hkaw‸ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo cawˬ ve shi te taˍ ve tanˇ kuiˬ ve awˬ hkaw awˍ lehˇ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66009014	Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Uˇhpaˍraˆ g'uiˬ ma lonˉ awˬ paˇ lo hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ awˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpui hpehˇ-oˆ teh‸, behˬ heh ma cawˬ taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hkaw‸ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66009015	Hk'e te leh, chaw yaˇ shehˆ pun teˇ pun hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ awˬ pon gu taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ awˇ g'aˇ hta‸ hpui hpehˇ piˇ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve awˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, naˍ riˍ, awˬ nyi, ha pa, awˬ hk'aw‸, awˬ yanˇ chi awˬ pon G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hui hta‸ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
66009016	Iˉ mvuhˇ ciˇ ve ma‸ yaˇ hk'aˬ nyiˇ g'aˇ cawˬ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, nyiˇ ha lanˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66009017	Ngaˬ g'a mawˬ chehˇ ve awˬ ha awˬ hk'aw lo, iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ veu‸ deh ve nyi ma pui htanˬ tuˬ lehˬ, aˬ miˍ hk'e nyiˉ-ehˍ ve, naw hpui ve leh, ma‸ shiˉ hk'e shiˉ-ehˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve oˉ k'oˍ lehˬ, laˇ caˬ shiˉ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ shuˍ leh, yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo aˬ miˍ ha, aˬ miˍ mvuhˇ hk'awˇ leh ma‸ shiˉ tawˆ la chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66009018	Yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve aˬ miˍ ha, aˬ miˍ mvuhˇ hk'awˇ leh ma‸ shiˉ, fawˉ mehˍ ve chi shehˆ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw, chaw yaˇ shehˆ pun teˇ pun g'a suh ve yoˬ.
66009019	Awˬ lawn k'o, iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve kanˇ paˆ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw leh awˬ mehˍ tu awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui ve awˬ mehˍ tu lehˬ, vuiˬ hta‸ shuˍ leh oˉ k'oˍ ka‸ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Shu hta‸ te naˬ piˇ tuˬ, oˉ k'oˍ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui yehˇ ve yoˬ.
66009020	Fawˉ mehˍ ve oˇ ve shehˆ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw maˇ g'a suh leh cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ la‸ sheh te taˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ. Neˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, shi, hpu, kuiˇ, haˉ pui leh suhˆ te taˍ ve shaˉ ho‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui maˇ baˬ taˉ. Shaˉ ho‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, maˇ mawˬ puiˉ, maˇ kaˇ puiˉ, ya‸ k'aw maˇ toˇ puiˉ ve yoˬ.
66009021	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve maˇ k'oˆ, neˇ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve maˇ k'oˆ, shu ve mawˇ hta‸ hk'awˇ ve maˇ k'oˆ, chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ.
66010001	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ moˬ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hk'oˆ lo aˉ laˇ miˬ shiˉ jaw cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ nyi hta‸ shuˍ leh, yawˇ ve hkui sheh lehˬ, aˬ miˍ hkuiˉ daw hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66010002	Yawˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo hpaw taˍ ve li‸ ehˉ teˇ k'oˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ ve hkui sheh lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'oˆ lo naˆ taˍ leh, la‸ mehˍ paˉ ve hkui sheh lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo naˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66010003	Laˇ caˬ shiˉ kuˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ kuˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ tawˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ suhˍ maˬ bvuhˬ la ve yoˬ.
66010004	Mvuhˇ tawˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ suhˍ maˬ bvuhˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, ngaˬ li‸ bvuh‸-a teh‸ te ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la leh k'oˆ ve, Mvuhˇ tawˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ suhˍ maˬ bvuhˬ la ve hta‸ yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ-o‸. Oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ taˇ bvuh‸ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66010005	Oˇ htaˇ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'oˆ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve la‸ sha paˉ la‸ sheh mvuhˇ hpe lo chiˇ taˆ-e leh,
66010006	mvuhˇ naw ma leh mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ, miˬ guiˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'a cawˬ ve hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ hpanˍ taˍ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ chehˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ cuˇ leh chi hk'e hkanˍ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ yanˇ maˇ k'aw‸ jiˆ ve yoˬ.
66010007	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, G'uiˬ sha ve naˉ jaˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ponˬ laˬ htaˇ yawˇ ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ hto piˇ taˍ ve hk'e, biˇ la tuˬ yoˬ.
66010008	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ngaˬ g'a kaˇ peuˬ ve awˬ hkawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hk'oˆ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo huˉ chehˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo hpaw taˍ ve li‸ hta‸ ca yuˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66010009	Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve geh ngaˬ k'ai leh, Li‸ ehˉ oˇ ve ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ-oˆ teh‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Yuˬ leh caˇ-oˆ. Nawˬ ve g'oˇ peˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˇ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, nawˬ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo pehˇ g'uiˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ mehˬ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66010010	Oˇ htaˇ, li‸ ehˉ oˇ ve hta‸ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo ngaˬ yuˬ leh caˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo pehˇ g'uiˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ mehˬ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, li‸ oˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ caˇ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ ve g'oˇ peˬ awˬ hk'aw lo hk'aˇ la ve yoˬ.
66010011	Oˇ htaˇ yawˇ hui ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Chaw ceuˬ laiˉ ceuˬ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ miˬ laiˉ peˆ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ laiˉ g'aˇ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, G'uiˬ sha nawˬ hta‸ k'oˆ tcuh ve hk'e nawˬ g'a k'aw‸ k'oˆ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66011001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, juˇ fuiˍ taˬ hta‸ shuˍ ve lo taˬ teˇ taˬ ngaˬ hta‸ pe‸ laˇ leh k'oˆ laˇ ve, Tu loˬ. Guiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, tanˇ kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, oˇ kaˬ lo oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw hui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, tehˆ nyi-o.
66011002	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo cawˬ ve vanˇ hta‸ teh taˉ sheˍ. Oˇ ve hta‸ taˇ tehˆ nyi. Awˬ lawn k'o, vanˇ oˇ ve buiˇ shaˆ aˉ naˆ chaw hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve venˇ hta‸ awˇ chi nyiˇ ha pa hk'a gaˬ naˆ tiˍ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66011003	Ngaˬ ve shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ hta‸ ngaˬ kanˇ paˆ piˇ leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ meh htuˉ pui hpa hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, teˇ hinˉ nyiˇ ha hkaw‸ chi nyi hk'a gaˬ G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66011004	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo cawˬ taˍ ve shaˍlonˍ cehˬ nyiˇ cehˬ hpeh‸ leh, kawˆ faiˇ nyiˇ maˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66011005	Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te gaˇ ve k'o, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo aˬ miˍ tawˆ la leh, canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ to‸ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ naˬ tuˬ te gaˇ ve k'o, oˇ hk'e g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ.
66011006	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ maˍ chehˇ ve awˬ yanˇ awˬ hk'aw lo, mvuhˇ yeˬ maˇ laˬ tuˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ hoˆ taˍ tuˬ ve kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ awˬ suhˍ hpeh‸ la piˇ lawˬ tuˬ ka‸ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hk'aˬ nyiˇ pawˆ te gaˇ ve ka‸, fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ le le miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la piˇ tuˬ ve htawˇ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66011007	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve miˬ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ bawˆ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Bawˆ da‸ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ g'aˇ leh tiˇ pehˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66011008	Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve awˬ to hta‸ venˇ lonˉ ve ya‸ k'aw hpuiˇ lo teh taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve Awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ la‸ ka hk'oˆ lo hkanˍ suh kuiˬ venˇ hpeh‸ leh, tawˇ veˆ yehˇ k'o, Sawˉdonˍ leh Eˇjiˇtu‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66011009	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw ve chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, chaw chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, shehˆ nyi teˇ sha g'uˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve awˬ to hta‸ hpoˆ nyi tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ shu ca tuˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ hui tawˍ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66011010	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ suh ve pa taw ha lehˬ jaˇ leh, ha lehˬ ha k'a te tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui teˇ g'aˇ leh teˇ g'aˇ la‸ shawnˍ piˇ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve nyiˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nyi ma sho‸ sha‸ jaˇ tuˬ te piˇ peuˬ.
66011011	Shehˆ nyi teˇ sha g'uˇ ponˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, G'uiˬ sha awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve a sha‸ te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve awˬ shaˉ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e leh, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ tu huˉ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve chaw hui lehˬ, kawˆ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
66011012	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la leh k'oˆ ve, Choˬ kaˬ lo taˆ la-o teh‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ yawˇ huiˉ maˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ huiˉ maˬ ve canˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ moˬ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
66011013	Awˬ yanˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo miˬ hiˆ jaˇ leh, venˇ oˇ ve teˇ chi pun teˇ pun paˆ ce ve yoˬ. Miˬ hiˆ ve oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chaw suhˍ hinˉ g'aˇ suh ve yoˬ. Cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ kawˆ jaˇ leh mvuhˇ naw ma ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ ve yoˬ.
66011014	Dawˇ haˍ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve nyiˇ ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ peuˬ ve yoˬ. Nyi loˬ, dawˇ haˍ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve shehˆ ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ haˆ haˆ gaˬ la tuˬ yoˬ.
66011015	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve teˇ yanˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo bvuhˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ la leh k'oˆ ve, Miˬ guiˬ ve mvuhˇ miˬ lehˬ, ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha ve mvuhˇ miˬ leh yawˇ ve Hkri‸ ve mvuhˇ miˬ hpeh‸ la peuˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ co co taiˍ taiˍ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66011016	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ a shu yawˇ ve k'aw jaw hk'oˆ mui chehˇ ve chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ nyiˇ chi awˇ g'aˇ mehˆ hpfuhˇ miˬ chaˇ hk'oˆ boˆ taˍ leh G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh k'oˆ ve,
66011017	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ka‸, chi beu‸ ka‸ te‸ chehˇ taˍ ve, kanˇ paˆ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, nawˬ lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ yuˬ leh chi beu‸ uˉ peunˍ ve pa taw, nawˬ ve bon hta‸ ngaˬ hui chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
66011018	Mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, nawˬ htawˇ nyi ma zuhˆ la peuˬ. Suh taˍ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ. Nawˬ ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ yawˆ yan ve, uiˍ ve i ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ bon piˇ tuˬ awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ te luˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te luˬ piˇ tuˬ ka‸ awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66011019	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo G'uiˬ sha ve bon yehˬ lonˉ hpaw sheˬ leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ ve ka ti‸ shaˉ caˆ ta k'oˍ htaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ ba ve, awˬ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ bvuhˬ ve, mvuhˇ tawˍ ve, miˬ hiˆ ve leh vaˇ shiˍ g'aˇ hte‸ k'a ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
66012001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ heˆ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ nyi hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, ha pa hta‸ naˆ taˍ leh, meu‸ keu shiˍ teˇ chi nyiˇ shiˍ cawˬ ve shi uˉ tcuhˍ hta‸ hk'awˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66012002	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve yaˇ hu leh, yaˇ paw tuˬ naˬ jaˇ leh g'a hkanˍ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
66012003	Mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu awˬ heˆ teˇ maˬ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Nyiˉ-ehˍ ve cawˇ shehˍ ma lonˉ teˇ hkeh tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ oˉ k'oˍ suhˍ shiˍ cawˬ leh, awˬ hkaw teˇ chi maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shi uˉ tcuhˍ suhˍ shiˍ hk'awˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66012004	Yawˇ ve awˬ mehˍ tu lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo cawˬ ve meu‸ keu shiˍ shehˆ pun teˇ pun hta‸ shaw yuˬ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ. Yaˇ paw la paˇ neˇ ve yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ yaˇ paw la ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ, cawˇ shehˍ ma lehˬ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66012005	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, yaˇ hawˉ hk'aˆ paˍ paw la ve yoˬ. Yaˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, sho juˇ fuiˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Yaˇ miˇ ve yaˇ paˍ oˇ ve hta‸ G'uiˬ sha geh lo leh G'uiˬ sha ve k'aw jaw lo chiˇ taˆ-e ve yoˬ.
66012006	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, heh puiˉ hk'aw lo hpaw-e ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo teˇ hinˉ nyiˇ ha hkaw‸ chi nyi hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ yawˇ awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
66012007	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ma‸ lonˉ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Miˆhkeˍlaˆ leh yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, cawˇ shehˍ ma oˇ ve hta‸ bawˆ da‸ ve yoˬ. Cawˇ shehˍ ma leh yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ yawˇ hui hta‸ k'aw‸ bawˆ da‸ ve yoˬ.
66012008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, cawˇ shehˍ ma leh yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ g'aˇ leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo yawˇ hui awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ.
66012009	Oˇ htaˇ, Neˇ haiˬ leh Saˍtanˍ teh‸ meh ve cawˇ shehˍ ma lonˉ oˇ ve teˇ hkeh hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yuˬ baˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ heˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ leh aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ve vuiˬ haiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yuˬ baˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, yawˇ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ka‸ yawˇ geh teˇ geh yuˬ baˬ ve yoˬ.
66012010	Mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ jaˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve, Chi beu‸ ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha ve htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ, kanˇ paˆ teˇ ceuˬ, uˉ peunˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh, yawˇ ve Hkri‸ ve aˉ yaˇ teˇ ceuˬ gaˬ la peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ngaˬ hui ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ venˇ baˆ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ yuˬ baˬ peuˬ.
66012011	Yawˬ ehˉ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ pa taw maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ baˆ taˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'aˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, suh htaˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hui a shu yawˇ ve a sha‸ hta‸ maˇ sheˉ lai ve yoˬ.
66012012	Hk'e te leh, mvuhˇ naw ma leh mvuhˇ naw ma yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Miˬ guiˬ leh laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, neˇ haiˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve awˬ yanˇ a ciˉ ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ shiˍ ve pa taw, nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ nawˬ hui geh gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66012013	Cawˇ shehˍ ma oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo yuˬ baˬ peuˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a mawˬ g'a shiˍ ve teˇ yanˇ, yaˇ hawˉ hk'aˆ paˍ paw la piˇ ve yaˇ miˇ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ tuˬ yawˇ g'a‸ yuˬ chehˇ ve yoˬ
66012014	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, vuiˬ oˇ ve hta‸ g'a ponˬ leh heh puiˉ hk'aw lo poˬ k'ai hpeh‸ tuˬ, aˉ ceˬ lonˉ ve toˍ la‸ k'uˉ nyiˇ maˬ hta‸ g'a ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ yanˇ teˇ yanˇ, awˬ yanˇ nyiˇ yanˇ leh awˬ yanˇ teˇ hkoˇ yanˇ hk'a gaˬ yawˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ tuˬ yoˬ.
66012015	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ iˉ kaˆ shi veu tuˬ, vuiˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo iˉ kaˆ lawˬ lonˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yaˇ miˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh iˉ kaˆ hpe‸ baˬ ve yoˬ.
66012016	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, miˬ guiˬ lehˬ yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve hta‸ ga piˇ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ lehˬ, yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ leh, cawˇ shehˍ ma ve maw‸ k'aw hk'aw lo hpe‸ baˬ ve iˉ kaˆ hta‸ hehˆ dawˬ ve yoˬ.
66012017	Cawˇ shehˍ ma lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ hta‸ nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ leh, cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve yawˇ ve awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ma‸ ca bawˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ yaˇ awˬ duˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Cawˇ shehˍ ma oˇ ve lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ pfuhˍ paˇ shehˇ shiˍ hk'oˆ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66013001	Oˇ htaˇ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ teˇ hkeh tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, awˬ hkaw teˇ chi maˬ cawˬ leh oˉ k'oˍ suhˍ shiˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shi uˉ tcuhˍ teˇ chi shiˍ hk'awˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve awˬ meh teˇ hpaˍ, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66013002	Ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, laˇ ku-i hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve hkui sheh lehˬ, yehˬ miˉ tawˍ hkui sheh hta‸ shuˍ leh, yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw lehˬ, laˇ caˬ shiˉ maw‸ k'aw hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ. Cawˇ shehˍ ma lehˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ oˇ ve hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ leh, yawˇ ve k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui tcuh leh uˉ peunˍ tcuh ve yoˬ.
66013003	Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve oˉ k'oˍ teˇ shiˍ lehˬ, suh law‸ law‸ dawˆ hk'aw taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, naˬ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw oˇ ve k'aw‸ na-e la leh, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ oˇ ve hta‸ anˇ jaˇ leh awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ.
66013004	Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ piˇ shehˍ hpaˇ cawˇ shehˍ ma hta‸ yawˇ hui oˉ k'oˍ pui ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ hui oˉ k'oˍ pui leh k'oˆ ve, Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ chi hta‸ a shu shuˍ da‸ ve le. A shu yawˇ hta‸ bawˆ da‸ hpeh‸ tuˬ le teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66013005	Yawˇ hta‸ tawˇ uiˍ tawˇ mvuh yaw tcuh leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ tcuh ve yoˬ. Awˇ chi nyiˇ ha pa hk'a gaˬ kanˉ te tuˬ, yawˇ hta‸ a hkaw-anˬ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66013006	G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ tuˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw ngaˉ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve chehˇ kuiˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ naw ma yaˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ oˇ ve maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66013007	Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hta‸ ma‸ bawˆ leh g'aˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ, yawˇ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le, chaw ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ le le, tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le leh mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ le le awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ htawˇ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ.
66013008	Miˬ guiˬ hta‸ te hpanˍ htaˇ ka‸ co ti‸ ha ti‸ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh maˇ bvuh‸ keu taˍ ve miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ oˇ ve hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ yoˬ. Li‸ oˇ ve lehˬ, tiˇ pehˍ peuˬ ve Yawˬ ehˉ ve li‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66013009	Naˍ paw cawˬ ve chaw hk'a deh‸ na-o.
66013010	Shu hta‸ hpeh yuˬ ve chaw lehˬ, hpeh yuˬ ve hta‸ g'a k'aw‸ hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Aˉ htaw yuˬ leh shu hta‸ chaw pehˍ ve chaw lehˬ, aˉ htaw hta‸ pa taw g'a suh tuˬ yoˬ. Chi hk'e te ve hta‸ pa taw, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui hk'aˬ ma nyi ma yeˬ puiˉ leh hk'aˬ ma yonˍ puiˉ ve tawˆ la ve yoˬ.
66013011	Miˬ guiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ teˇ hkeh tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ yawˬ ehˉ ve awˬ hkaw hta‸ shuˍ ve awˬ hkaw nyiˇ maˬ cawˬ leh, cawˇ shehˍ ma tawˇ yaw ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ yawˇ tawˇ yaw ve yoˬ.
66013012	Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ chi teˇ hkeh lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ tawˆ la ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ teˇ hkeh ve kanˇ paˆ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yuˬ leh yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yehˇ ve yoˬ. Suh law‸ law‸ dawˆ hk'aw taˍ ve naˬ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw na-e la peuˬ ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ awˉ lawˉ teˇ hkeh hta‸ miˬ guiˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a chehˇ ve chaw hui oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ nyiˇ hkeh teˇ hkeh te ve yoˬ.
66013013	Uiˍ ve awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ te maˍ ve yoˬ. Hk'aˬ hk'e le teh‸ k'oˆ k'o, mvuhˇ naw ma lo te leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a gaˬ, chaw yaˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ yawˇ aˬ miˍ hta‸ ce la tcuh ve yoˬ.
66013014	Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ awˉ lawˉ teˇ hkeh mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ te maˍ tuˬ yawˇ a hkaw-anˬ g'a taˍ ve hk'e yawˇ te ve hta‸ pa taw, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ nyiˇ hkeh teˇ hkeh lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'a chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ awˉ lawˉ teˇ hkeh lehˬ, aˉ htaw chaw ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ peuˬ htawˇ te‸ chehˇ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ te tuˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ nyiˇ hkeh teˇ hkeh k'oˆ piˇ ve yoˬ.
