66013015	Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve shaˉ ho‸ tawˇ yaw puiˉ tuˬ, shaˉ ho‸ oˇ ve hta‸ te‸ la piˇ hpeh‸ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ yawˇ g'a ve yoˬ. Shaˉ ho‸ oˇ ve hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ maˇ pui ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ tiˇ pehˍ tcuh ve yoˬ.
66013016	Chaw uiˍ chaw i maˇ k'oˆ, chaw paw chaw sha maˇ k'oˆ, chaw haˍ chaw g'awˇ maˇ k'oˆ, ponˬ ve chaw maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceˬ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve la‸ sha paˉ la‸ sheh hta‸ maˇ heˆ k'o naˍ k'aˍ pui hta‸ maiˉ taˍ tuˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ oˇ ve teˇ hkeh hkanˍ yuˬ tcuh ve yoˬ.
66013017	Awˬ maiˉ maˇ cawˬ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸, mawˇ maˇ g'a vuiˬ maˇ g'a hawˇ tuˬ yawˇ te ve yoˬ. Awˬ maiˉ oˇ ve lehˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve awˬ meh, maˇ heˆ k'o yawˇ awˬ meh ve nanˍ ba‸ hta‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66013018	Chi awˬ hk'aw lo cuˇ yiˍ g'a hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Dawˇ shiˍ puiˉ ve chaw lehˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve nanˍ ba‸ hta‸ g'aw nyi shawˍ nyi tcuh-o. Yawˇ ve nanˍ ba‸ lehˬ, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ve nanˍ ba‸ hpeh‸ leh, nanˍ ba‸ oˇ ve hkaw‸ ha hkaw‸ chi hkaw‸ yoˬ.
66014001	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ nyi leh, Ziˉonˍ hk'aw hk'oˆ lo Yawˬ ehˉ huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˬ ehˉ ve awˬ meh leh yawˇ Awˬ pa ve awˬ meh a shu yawˇ ve naˍ k'aˍ pui hta‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve chaw teˇ shehnˉ awˇ meunˍ awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66014002	Iˉ kaˆ g'uiˬ baˇ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ leh, hehnˇ jaˇ ve mvuhˇ tawˍ ve awˬ hkawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ lehˬ, tinˍ hteˆ shehˍ hpaˇ teˇ hpaˍ a shu yawˇ ve tinˍ hteˆ chehˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66014003	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, k'aw jaw awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh leh chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, k'a muiˬ hkawˇ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ k'a chehˇ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo vuiˬ hk'aw‸ taˍ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ shehnˉ awˇ meunˍ awˇ hinˉ g'aˇ maˇ heˆ k'o, k'a muiˬ hkawˇ awˬ suhˉ oˇ ve hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ k'a maˇ g'a taˬ.
66014004	Chaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ teˇ hpaˍ geh cha‸ chiˆ tuˬ maˇ te ve chaw hui hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hui lehˬ da‸ kehˬ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, Yawˬ ehˉ hk'a k'ai kuiˬ teˇ kaˬ le le lo awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve chaw hui hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha leh Yawˬ ehˉ awˬ pon awˉ lawˉ naw‸ ve iˉ shiˍ hpeh‸ la tuˬ, chaw yaˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui hta‸ vuiˬ hk'aw‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66014005	Yawˇ hui ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo heˍ ve a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ hui hta‸ venˇ baˆ taˍ tuˬ ka‸ maˇ cawˬ.
66014006	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ k'aw ji lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ poˬ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ peˆ le le hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, chaw ceuˬ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, co co taiˍ taiˍ yeˬ ve ha lehˬ ve bon hkawˇ maˍ piˇ tuˬ yawˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66014007	Yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ kawˆ leh yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ suhˉ jehˬ tuˬ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma miˬ naˆ ma hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ leh iˉ kaˆ tawˆ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, te hpanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66014008	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ teˇ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ meh uiˍ ve Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ lehˬ paiˍ peuˬ, paiˍ peuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ taw piˇ ve hk'e, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve awˬ taw‸ ma yuˬ leh mvuhˇ miˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ taw piˇ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66014009	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ huiˉ maˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh laˬ leh awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, a shu yawˇ ve naˍ k'aˍ pui hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maiˉ taˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve k'o,
66014010	a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ve hk'e, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ yawˇ g'a dawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ oˇ ve hta‸ te‸ chiˉ maˇ hkaw‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve kawˆ awˬ hk'aw lo ngeuˍ keu taˍ ve yoˬ. Da‸ kehˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, Yawˬ ehˉ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ k'oˆ, aˬ miˍ leh ma‸ shiˉ hta‸ yehˇ leh, chaw oˇ ve hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh ciˍ yanˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66014011	Yawˇ hui hta‸ ciˍ yanˍ piˇ ve teˇ yanˇ, tawˆ la chehˇ ve aˬ miˍ mvuhˇ hk'awˇ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ taˆ-e chehˇ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, yawˇ ve awˬ meh maiˉ taˍ ve hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ g'aˇ g'a jehˇ kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66014012	G'uiˬ sha piˇ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ leh Yeˍsuˆ hta‸ yonˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve Hkri‸ yaˇ hui lehˬ, nyi ma yeˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ tuˬ chi awˬ hk'aw lo g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
66014013	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve, Chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ-o‸. Ya‸ nyi hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ awˬ hk'aw lo suh ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha hpu htawˇ k'oˆ ve, Cawˇ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui te taˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve pa taw, a shu yawˇ kanˉ te hkeu‸ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ponˬ peuˬ leh, yawˇ hui g'aˇ g'a jehˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66014014	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ nyi leh hpuˉ-ehˍ ve moˬ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Moˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ chaw yaˇ ve yaˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ mui taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, shi uˉ tcuhˍ hk'awˆ taˍ leh, yawˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo tcuhˆ jaˇ ve law‸ k'awˉ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66014015	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh, moˬ awˬ hk'oˆ lo mui taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo caˬ meh jaˇ peuˬ. Caˬ g'eu‸ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ peuˬ ve pa taw, law‸ k'awˉ hta‸ yuˬ leh caˬ g'eu‸-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66014016	Oˇ htaˇ, moˬ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ mui taˍ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve law‸ k'awˉ yuˬ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve caˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'uˉ yuˬ leh g'eu‸ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
66014017	Awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ ve bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ htawˇ, tcuhˆ jaˇ ve law‸ k'awˉ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66014018	Peuˬ leh, aˬ miˍ awˬ hk'oˆ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh, tcuhˆ ve law‸ k'awˉ cawˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ ve tcuhˆ ve law‸ k'awˉ hta‸ yuˬ leh, miˬ guiˬ ve a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ awˬ k'oˍ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'eu‸-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ meh la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66014019	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve law‸ k'awˉ yuˬ leh miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve a pehˉ meuˇ shiˍ awˬ k'oˍ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ k'uˉ yuˬ leh shaw yuˬ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ nyiˉ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ. A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ nyiˉ kuiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66014020	A pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ nyiˉ kuiˬ oˇ ve hta‸ venˇ awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo naˆ leh, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ nyiˉ kuiˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ suhˍ tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Awˬ suhˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, teˇ hinˉ hkaw‸ ha hpaˍlonˍ hk'a gaˬ iˉ mvuhˇ maw‸ k'aw caˆ hk'e mvuh naˉ ve yoˬ.
66015001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo anˇ tuˬ uiˍ jaˇ ve awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve awˬ heˆ teˇ maˬ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ heˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, fawˉ mehˍ ve suhˍ ceuˬ cawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Fawˉ mehˍ ve oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ leh meuˇ ve fawˉ mehˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ peu-eˬ ve yoˬ.
66015002	Peuˬ leh, aˬ miˍ leh mehˆ g'euˆ hkaw‸ da‸ taˍ ve g'uiˬ po hta‸ shuˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ leh yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ awˬ meh ve nanˍ ba‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, g'aˇ peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve la‸ sheh hk'aw G'uiˬ sha ve tinˍ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ leh, mehˆ g'euˆ g'uiˬ po awˬ paˇ lo huˉ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66015003	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ Moˉseˍ ve k'a muiˬ hkawˇ leh Yawˬ ehˉ ve k'a muiˬ hkawˇ hta‸ k'a muiˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, nawˬ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ uiˍ jaˇ da‸ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ve Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ-oˬ, nawˬ ve ya‸ k'aw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hteˇ jaˇ cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
66015004	Jawˇ mawˇ-oˬ, nawˬ hta‸ maˇ kawˆ leh nawˬ ve awˬ meh hta‸ maˇ chiˇ uiˍ maˇ chiˇ mvuh ve, a shu cawˬ le. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ teˇ g'aˇ ceh tiˉ da‸ kehˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ nawˬ geh laˬ leh nawˬ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hteˇ lehˍ cawˇ lehˍ te ve teˇ hpaˍ hk'a tawˍ lehˆ tawˆ la peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66015005	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ ngaˬ nyi leh, shaˉ hkiˆ hpeh‸ ve aˉ po k'o bon yehˬ lonˉ mvuhˇ naw ma lo hpaw taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
66015006	Fawˉ mehˍ ve suhˍ ceuˬ cawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ lehˬ, bon yehˬ lonˉ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ ba ve kehˬ da‸ jaˇ ve hpa hpu hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, a shu yawˇ ve nyi ma pui hta‸ shi haˍ pi caˆ tsuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66015007	A sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ hkeh lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ hta‸ shi mu‸ hk'u suhˍ shiˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. Shi mu‸ hk'u oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo, co co taiˍ taiˍ te‸ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66015008	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ leh yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ hta‸ pa taw, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ hk'awˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ ve fawˉ mehˍ ve suhˍ ceuˬ maˇ peuˬ ve ceh ceh, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo lo‸-e maˇ hpeh‸.
66016001	Peuˬ leh, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuhˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ hta‸ chi hk'e k'oˆ piˇ ve, Nawˬ hui k'ai leh, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma zuhˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ cawˬ ve mu‸ hk'u suhˍ shiˍ hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ngeuˍ baˬ-o‸ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66016002	Oˇ htaˇ, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ k'ai leh, yawˇ ve mu‸ hk'u hta‸ miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo ngeuˍ baˬ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve awˬ maiˉ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ taˍ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ ho‸ awˬ han hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo cha‸ chiˆ leh naˬ jaˇ ve pawˆ lawˆ k'uˉ teˇ hpaˍ cawˬ la ve yoˬ.
66016003	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ nyiˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mu‸ hk'u hta‸ laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo ngeuˍ baˬ ve yoˬ. Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ lehˬ, chaw suh ve awˬ suhˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ la leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ suh ve yoˬ.
66016004	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ shehˆ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mu‸ hk'u hta‸ iˉ kaˆ lawˬ teˇ hpaˍ leh iˉ kaˆ tawˆ kuiˬ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'aw lo ngeuˍ baˬ leh, iˉ kaˆ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ suhˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ.
66016005	Oˇ htaˇ, iˉ kaˆ hpawˇ hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'oˆ ve, Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ ka‸ chi beu‸ ka‸ te‸ chehˇ taˍ ve Da‸ kehˬ shehˍ hpaˇ-oˬ, nawˬ chi hk'e suhˉ jehˬ ve lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ.
66016006	Awˬ lawn k'o, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui ve awˬ suhˍ leh nawˬ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui yuˬ sheˆ ve pa taw, nawˬ yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ suhˍ k'aw‸ dawˬ tcuh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui chi hk'e g'a hkanˍ ve lehˬ cawˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66016007	Tanˇ kuiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la leh k'oˆ ve, Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha-oˬ, cawˇ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ suhˉ jehˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hteˇ jaˇ cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ.
66016008	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ awˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mu‸ hk'u hta‸ mvuhˇ nyi awˬ hk'oˆ lo ngeuˍ baˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ mvuhˇ nyi lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ aˬ miˍ chiˆ piˇ tuˬ kanˇ paˆ g'a ve yoˬ.
66016009	Haw jaˇ chiˆ jaˇ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, chaw yaˇ hui hta‸ hkeu‸ k'ai piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Fawˉ mehˍ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ cawˬ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ meh hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui venˇ baˆ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ chiˇ uiˍ maˇ chiˇ mvuh ve yoˬ.
66016010	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ngaˇ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mu‸ hk'u hta‸ haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve k'aw jaw awˬ hk'oˆ lo ngeuˍ baˬ leh, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve mvuhˇ miˬ naˆ ho‸ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ miˬ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, naˬ jaˇ ve pa taw, a shu yawˇ ve ha tehˍ hta‸ geu‸ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66016011	Naˬ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, pawˆ lawˆ k'uˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui g'a hkanˍ ve pa taw mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ yawˇ hui maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui te ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ maˇ dawˇ hpfuhˆ.
66016012	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hkaw‸ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mu‸ hk'u hta‸ Uˇhpaˍraˆ g'uiˬ ma lonˉ awˬ hk'oˆ lo ngeuˍ baˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ hpawˇ lo chehˇ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon ya‸ k'aw gu taˍ tuˬ, iˉ kaˆ lawˬ oˇ ve fiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ.
66016013	Oˇ htaˇ, cawˇ shehˍ ma ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'oˆ, cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ ha sheh lehˇ tawˆ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ha oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, paˍ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66016014	Yawˇ hui teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te maˍ chehˇ ve neˇ haiˬ ve awˬ ha teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ nyi uiˍ ve teˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo ma‸ bawˆ tuˬ awˬ pon, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ teˇ kaˬ le le lo chehˇ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpawnˬ da‸ piˇ lawˬ tuˬ, awˬ ha oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ.
66016015	(Nyi loˬ, chaw hk'awˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ laˬ ve yoˬ. A shu yawˇ awˬ to awˬ k'u nyi maˇ g'a k'ai leh shu mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ maˇ g'a ya‸ taw tuˬ, nawˇ chehˇ taˍ leh a shu yawˇ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ ha‸ shaˉ chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.)
66016016	Awˬ ha oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ Aˍmaˍgeˍdonˍ meh ve chehˇ kuiˬ lo hpawnˬ da‸ piˇ lawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ meh oˇ ve lehˬ, Heˍbrehˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66016017	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, yawˇ ve mu‸ hk'u hta‸ mvuhˇ haw awˬ hk'aw lo ngeuˍ baˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, bon yehˬ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw, k'aw jaw lo bvuhˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la leh, Peuˬ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66016018	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ tiˉ po-e‸ ba ve, awˬ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ bvuhˬ ve, mvuhˇ tawˍ ve leh miˬ hiˆ jaˇ ve, chi teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo chaw yaˇ tanˬ cawˬ la ve teˇ nyi hta‸ tanˬ leh, chi taw taw miˬ hiˆ jaˇ ve teˇ pawˆ ka‸ maˇ hpeh‸ la jaw.
66016019	Venˇ lonˉ lehˬ, hkoˇ k'ai leh, shehˆ hkoˇ hpeh‸ la ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve venˇ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ paˆ-e ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, hehnˇ ja ve nyi ma zuhˆ ve a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ keu taˍ ve kawˆ Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ hta‸ taw piˇ tuˬ, venˇ oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66016020	Conˇ hk'a peu-eˬ mehˉ k'ai leh, hk'aw pui teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ mawˬ ve yoˬ.
66016021	Shehˆ chi cawehˬ cawˬ ve vaˇ shiˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ mvuhˇ naw ma lo te leh chaw yaˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ ce la ve yoˬ. Vaˇ shiˍ fawˉ mehˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ pa taw chaw yaˇ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, fawˉ mehˍ ve oˇ ve lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ hehnˇ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66017001	Oˇ htaˇ, mu‸ hk'u suhˍ shiˍ cawˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Laˬ-o‸. Iˉ kaˆ maˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ mui chehˇ ve meh maˬ lanˉ lonˉ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66017002	Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ geh haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te peuˬ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ bvuhˆ ve hk'e, yawˇ ve haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ dawˬ bvuhˆ peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66017003	Oˇ htaˇ, Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve ngaˬ hta‸ heh puiˉ hk'aw shiˍ k'ai ve yoˬ. Nyiˉ-ehˍ ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ awˬ hk'oˆ lo yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ mui chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, oˉ k'oˍ suhˍ shiˍ leh awˬ hkaw teˇ chi maˬ cawˬ leh, G'uiˬ sha hta‸ maˇ shawˍ maˇ caˆ k'oˆ ve awˬ meh teˇ hpaˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66017004	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve leh nyiˉ-ehˍ ve veu‸ k'aˇ hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, shi, haˉ pui shehnˉ leh piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ teˇ hpaˍ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve hta‸ caˉ da‸ ve maˇ da‸ maˇ kehˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ leh, cha‸ naˬ tuˬ te ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ taˍ ve shi kawˆ hta‸ yawˇ vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66017005	Yawˇ ve naˍ k'aˍ pui hta‸ tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ jaˇ ve awˬ meh chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Uiˍ ve Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ lehˬ, meh maˬ lanˉ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ e leh miˬ guiˬ ve cha‸ chiˆ ve teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ e hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66017006	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ paˍ hui ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, dawˬ bvuhˆ g'uˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ yawˇ hta‸ mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, maˇ maˇ anˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
66017007	Oˇ htaˇ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Aˬ hto‸ ma te nawˬ anˇ ve le. Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, oˉ k'oˍ suhˍ shiˍ leh awˬ hkaw teˇ chi maˬ cawˬ ve yawˇ hta‸ pfuhˇ k'ai ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ awˬ lawn maˇ k'oˆ, tcuhˉ kuiˬ naˉ ve teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ k'aoˍ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66017008	Nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ lehˬ, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ cawˬ ve ka‸, chi beu‸ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ maˇ maw maw k'o, leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve miˬ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la leh, luˬ kuiˬ sheˆ kuiˬ lo g'a lo‸-e tuˬ yoˬ. Mvuhˇ kawˍ miˬ ya‸ htaˇ ka‸ co ti‸ ha ti‸ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh maˇ bvuh‸ keu taˍ ve miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, anˇ jaˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, ponˬ laˬ htaˇ yawˇ cawˬ ve ka‸, chi beu‸ maˇ cawˬ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'aw‸ cawˬ la tuˬ ve hta‸ pa taw yoˬ.
66017009	Awˬ lawn chi hta‸ shiˍ tuˬ cuˇ yiˍ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve nyi ma hta‸ loˍ ve yoˬ. Oˉ k'oˍ oˇ ve suhˍ shiˍ lehˬ, yaˇ miˇ mui taˍ ve hk'aw suhˍ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66017010	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ suhˍ g'aˇ htawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ngaˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, ce k'ai peuˬ. Chi beu‸ teˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ sheˍ ve yoˬ. Teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, maˇ gaˬ la sheˍ. Yawˇ gaˬ la ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ hkui ceh tiˉ g'a chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66017011	Ponˬ laˬ htaˇ cawˬ ve ka‸, chi beu‸ maˇ cawˬ ve haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ lehˬ, hiˉ g'aˇ teˇ g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, suhˍ g'aˇ hta‸ yawˇ caˉ da‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, luˬ kuiˬ sheˆ kuiˬ lo g'a lo‸-e tuˬ yoˬ.
66017012	Nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve awˬ hkaw teˇ chi maˬ lehˬ, mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ maˇ g'a uˉ peunˍ sheˍ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ chi g'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ hui lehˬ haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ geh teˇ geh hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ ve aˉ yaˇ hta‸ teˇ naˍ riˍ hk'a gaˬ g'a tuˬ yoˬ.
66017013	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ leh, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve kanˇ paˆ leh a shu yawˇ ve aˉ yaˇ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66017014	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, Yawˬ ehˉ hta‸ bawˆ da‸ tuˬ yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, Yawˬ ehˉ yawˇ hui hta‸ g'aˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ lehˬ jawˇ mawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ Jawˇ mawˇ hpeh‸ leh, hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ awˬ hk'oˆ Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ geh teˇ geh chehˇ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, kuˬ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw, leuˆ yuˬ taˍ ve chaw leh, ka ti‸ yeˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66017015	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ oˇ ve ngaˬ hta‸ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve meh maˬ lanˉ mui chehˇ ve iˉ kaˆ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ, mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ leh, tawˇ hkawˇ laiˉ ceuˬ yaw ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66017016	Nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve awˬ hkaw teˇ chi maˬ leh haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ lehˬ, meh maˬ lanˉ hta‸ canˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, yawˇ hta‸ gawˬ cu gawˬ pehˆ hpeh‸ piˇ lawˬ leh, awˬ k'u nyi te piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ yawˇ hui caˇ leh, yawˇ hta‸ aˬ miˍ tuˉ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
66017017	Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha nyi ma cawˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui te tuˬ, yawˇ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ G'uiˬ sha dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ biˇ la htaˇ hk'a gaˬ, yawˇ hui lehˬ nyi ma teˇ shiˍ tiˉ taˍ ve awˬ hk'aw lo haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve aˉ yaˇ chiˇ a‸ piˇ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha chi hk'e dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve yoˬ.
66017018	Nawˬ g'a mawˬ ve yaˇ miˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ uˉ peunˍ ve venˇ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66018001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, uiˍ ve kanˇ paˆ cawˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ pa taw, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ awˬ g'euˆ ba chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66018002	Yawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh g'aˇ hte‸ kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ meh uiˍ ve Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ lehˬ paiˍ peuˬ, paiˍ peuˬ. Chehˇ kuiˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, neˇ haiˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve chehˇ kuiˬ leh cha‸ chiˆ ve awˬ ha teˇ ceuˬ le le ve va‸ taˍ kuiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Cha‸ chiˆ leh shu cha‸ naˬ ve ngaˆ teˇ ceuˬ le le ve va‸ taˍ kuiˬ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66018003	Awˬ lawn k'o, chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ dawˬ ve hk'e, yawˇ ve haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ dawˬ leh paiˍ peuˬ. Miˬ guiˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ geh haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te peuˬ leh, miˬ guiˬ ve tanˇ kaˬ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, yawˇ paw sha jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo, yawˇ hui htawˇ paw sha la peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66018004	Mvuhˇ naw ma lo awˬ kaˍ awˬ nu ve awˬ hkawˇ chi hk'e k'oˆ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve, Ngaˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ g'a lo‸-e tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ g'a hkanˍ ve fawˉ mehˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ nawˬ hui maˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la-o.
66018005	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve venˇ baˆ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ mvuhˇ naw ma hta‸ daw‸ htaˇ hk'a gaˬ maˇ jaˇ leh, yawˇ ve maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha dawˇ nawˇ chehˇ ve yoˬ.
66018006	Yawˇ shu hta‸ te piˇ ve hk'e yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ-oˆ. Yawˇ kanˉ te taˍ ve hk'e, yawˇ hta‸ nyiˇ pun k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ-oˆ. Kawˆ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hkaw‸ da‸ taˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ nyiˇ pun hkaw‸ da‸ leh yawˇ hta‸ taw piˇ-oˆ.
66018007	Yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ yawˇ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh leh, paw sha jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ ha k'a te peuˬ ve hk'e taw, yawˇ hta‸ fawˉ mehˍ leh dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ gaˬ la piˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ ve nyi ma awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Ngaˬ lehˬ nanˇ hawˉ hkanˇ ma te leh mui chehˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ mehˇ chawˇ ma maˇ heˆ. Dawˇ haˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ hta‸ ngaˬ a ciˉ ka‸ g'a hpuˇ tuˬ maˇ heˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66018008	Hk'e te leh, teˇ nyi tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ, paˆ hawˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ leh meu‸ ve kaˆ ve teˇ ceuˬ, fawˉ mehˍ ve chi teˇ hpaˍ gaˬ la leh, aˬ miˍ to‸ baˬ ve hta‸ yawˇ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66018009	Venˇ oˇ ve geh haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te leh, paw sha jaˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo ha lehˬ ha k'a te peuˬ ve miˬ guiˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ oˇ ve to‸ chehˇ ve mvuhˇ hk'awˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ pon yawˇ hui kuˬ hawˬ paˆ hawˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
66018010	Venˇ oˇ ve g'a hkanˍ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ yawˇ hui kawˆ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui vuiˇ kuiˬ lo huˉ taˍ leh chi hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ meh uiˍ leh kanˇ paˆ uiˍ ve Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ-oˬ, nawˬ g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Teˇ naˍ riˍ tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo nawˬ hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ gaˬ la peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
66018011	Miˬ guiˬ ve tanˇ kaˬ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ pon kuˬ hawˬ paˆ hawˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, shu yawˇ hui ve mawˇ hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ vuiˬ.
66018012	Mawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hpu, shi, haˉ pui shehnˉ, piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ, da‸ jaˇ ve hpa hpu, nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve hpa, pfuhˇ hpa, nyiˉ-ehˍ ve hpa, hawnˉ ve suhˆ teˇ ceuˬ le le, haw ciˬ te taˍ ve mawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve suhˆ te taˍ ve mawˇ teˇ ceuˬ le le, kuiˇ te taˍ ve mawˇ, sho te taˍ ve mawˇ, haˉ pui hpu te taˍ ve mawˇ,
66018013	k'aw hpeh, hk'eu hawnˉ, awˬ shaˉ hawnˉ ve awˬ meu-e, naˍ manˇ hawnˉ, lawˇbanˍ, a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ, naˍ manˇ, meu da‸ ve hkaoˍ monˇ meu-e, caˬ shiˍ, nuˇ, yawˬ, iˉ mvuhˇ, iˉ mvuhˇ lawˬ, awˬ ceˬ leh, chaw yaˇ ve co ha, chi teˇ hpaˍ yoˬ.
66018014	Nawˬ ve nyi ma sheˉ lai jaˇ ve iˉ shiˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, mehˉ k'ai peuˬ. Mehˬ jaˇ ve caˇ tuˬ leh da‸ jaˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ luˬ k'ai peuˬ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ teˇ pawˆ ka‸ nawˬ maˇ k'aw‸ g'a mawˬ.
66018015	Mawˇ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hawˇ ve vuiˬ ve leh venˇ oˇ ve hta‸ pa taw paw sha la ve tanˇ kaˬ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ oˇ ve g'a hkanˍ ve tu‸ ve hkanˍ ve hta‸ kawˆ jaˇ ve pa taw, yawˇ hui vuiˇ kuiˬ lo huˉ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui kuˬ hawˬ paˆ hawˬ leh chi hk'e k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
66018016	Da‸ jaˇ ve hpa hpu, nyi naˆ meuˉ lehˍ ve hpa leh nyiˉ-ehˍ ve hpa hta‸ veu‸ deh leh, shi, haˉ pui shehnˉ leh piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve awˬ meh uiˍ ve venˇ lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ.
66018017	Chi taw taw maˇ jaˇ ve mawˇ jeˬ hk'a peu-eˬ teˇ naˍ riˍ ceh tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo luˬ k'ai peuˬ law leˇ, teh‸ k'oˆ tuˬ yoˬ. Haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hoˉ hk'a peu-eˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ hta‸ ciˇ leh k'ai k'ai laˬ laˬ te ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ, haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo kanˉ te ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ hpawˇ tanˇ kaˬ te ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, vuiˇ kuiˬ lo huˉ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66018018	Venˇ oˇ ve to‸ chehˇ ve mvuhˇ hk'awˇ hta‸ yawˇ hui g'a mawˬ ve teˇ yanˇ, Awˬ meh uiˍ ve venˇ chi teˇ venˇ hta‸ shuˍ ve, hk'aˬ ve teˇ venˇ cawˬ le teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
66018019	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, a shu yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ je‸ meu-e hkaˆ pfuhˍ leh kuˬ hawˬ paˆ hawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui kuˬ leh k'oˆ ve, Awˬ meh uiˍ ve venˇ lehˬ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ, g'a dawˇ haˍ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo mawˇ jeˬ cawˬ maˇ jaˇ ve pa taw, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw ve haw lo‸ k'oˍ awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hk'a peu-eˬ paw sha la ve yoˬ. Teˇ naˍ riˍ ceh tiˉ awˬ hk'aw lo venˇ oˇ ve luˬ k'ai peuˬ law leˇ.
66018020	Mvuhˇ naw ma leh da‸ kehˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ, tcuh yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ-oˬ, venˇ oˇ ve luˬ k'ai peuˬ ve pa taw ha lehˬ chehˇ-oˆ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ hui awˬ pon k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ tuˬ, G'uiˬ sha lehˬ venˇ oˇ ve hta‸ suhˉ taˆ peuˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66018021	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, haˉ pui mawˍ lonˉ hta‸ shuˍ ve haˉ pui shiˍ hta‸ chiˇ leh, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu leh k'oˆ ve, Chi hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ meh uiˍ ve Baˍbuˍlonˍ venˇ hta‸ hehnˇ chaweh chiˇ baˬ leh, awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ venˇ oˇ ve hta‸ maˇ k'aw‸ mawˬ.
66018022	Tinˍ hteˆ ve chaw, k'a muiˬ hkawˇ k'a ve chaw, lehˉ lu meuˆ ve chaw leh behˬ heh ma meuˆ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ te ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'aw‸ g'a kaˇ. La‸ meuˇ te puiˉ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ. Haˉ pui mawˍ geuˆ ve awˬ hkawˇ htawˇ, nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'aw‸ g'a kaˇ.
66018023	Kawˆ faiˇ awˬ g'euˆ htawˇ nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'aw‸ g'a ba. La‸ k'awˍ toˆ ve chaw haˉ yaˇ miˇ haˉ ve awˬ hkawˇ htawˇ, nawˬ awˬ hk'aw lo maˇ k'aw‸ g'a kaˇ. Awˬ lawn k'o, nawˬ ve tanˇ kaˬ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ ve chaw uiˍ chaw mvuh teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ neˇ te ve hta‸ pa taw, chaw ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ ya‸ k'ai peuˬ.
66018024	G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve awˬ suhˍ, da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hui ve awˬ suhˍ leh, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ lo tiˇ pehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ, teh‸ mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66019001	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ ve awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ jaˇ ve hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ la ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, Haˍleˍluˇyaˬ. Htaiˍ hk'aw‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ, awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ leh, kanˇ paˆ teˇ ceuˬ ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha geh ceh tiˉ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66019002	Awˬ lawn k'o, yawˇ suhˉ jehˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hteˇ jaˇ cawˇ jaˇ ve yoˬ. Meh maˬ lanˉ lonˉ haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve pa taw, miˬ guiˬ yaˇ hui luˬ k'ai ve yoˬ. Hk'e te leh, G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ suhˉ taˆ leh, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ suhˍ hta‸ yuˬ sheˆ ve awˬ pon yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ te hk'aw‸ piˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ kuˬ ve yoˬ.
66019003	Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Haˍleˍluˇyaˬ, venˇ oˇ ve aˬ miˍ mvuhˇ hk'awˇ lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ taˆ-e chehˇ ve yoˬ, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66019004	Oˇ htaˇ, chaw mawˇ chaw kehˉ nyiˇ chi awˇ g'aˇ leh a sha‸ te‸ chehˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ awˇ hkeh lehˬ, boˆ sheˬ leh, k'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui chehˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui leh, A menˬ, haˍleˍluˇyaˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66019005	K'aw jaw lo awˬ hkawˇ tawˆ la leh k'oˆ ve, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve, yawˇ hta‸ yawˆ yan ve chaw uiˍ chaw i hk'a peu-eˬ-oˬ, ngaˬ hui ve G'uiˬ sha hta‸ chiˇ mvuh-o, teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66019006	Peuˬ leh, chaw awˬ moˍ lonˉ ve awˬ hkawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ, iˉ kaˆ g'uiˬ baˇ maˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ leh, mvuhˇ tawˍ hehnˇ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Haˍleˍluˇyaˬ. Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve ngaˬ hui ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha uˉ peunˍ ve yoˬ.
66019007	Ngaˬ hui g'aˇ hte‸ ha lehˬ ha k'a te-a veuˬ. Ngaˬ hui yawˇ hta‸ chiˇ uiˍ chiˇ mvuh piˇ-a veuˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yawˬ ehˉ la‸ k'awˍ toˆ ve awˬ yanˇ gaˬ la peuˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ heuˆ tuˬ ve yaˇ miˇ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ to hta‸ gu taˍ peuˬ.
66019008	Yaˇ miˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ ba ve kehˬ da‸ jaˇ ve hpa hpu hta‸ veu‸ deh tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a ve yoˬ. Hpa hpu oˇ ve lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ te taˍ ve hteˇ ve cawˇ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ, teh‸ awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve kuˬ ve yoˬ.
66019009	Peuˬ leh mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Chi hta‸ bvuh‸ taˍ-o‸. Yawˬ ehˉ ve hkehˉ caˇ kuiˬ lo k'ai tuˬ kuˬ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Peuˬ leh, Tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ tehˬ awˬ na G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66019010	Oˇ htaˇ, yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ, yawˇ ve hkui sheh awˬ paˇ lo ngaˬ boˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Ya‸ hk'aˇ, yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Chi hk'e taˇ te. Nawˬ leh Yeˍsuˆ awˬ pon shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi teˇ hpaˍ geh ngaˬ awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui-o. Awˬ lawn k'o, Yeˍsuˆ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve teˇ ceuˬ lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui hta‸ dawˇ pawnˍ piˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66019011	Oˇ htaˇ ngaˬ nyi leh, mvuhˇ naw ma hpaw taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Hpuˉ-ehˍ ve iˉ mvuhˇ teˇ hkeh cawˬ leh, ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, Ka ti‸ yeˬ leh Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ shehˍ hpaˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ suhˉ jehˬ leh ma‸ bawˆ ve yoˬ.
66019012	Yawˇ ve mehˆ shiˍ lehˬ, aˬ miˍ ha hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ve oˉ k'oˍ hta‸ shi uˉ tcuhˍ maˇ maˇ hk'awˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hta‸ awˬ meh teˇ maˬ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˬ meh oˇ ve hta‸ yawˇ awˬ to maˇ heˆ k'o, chaw teˇ g'aˇ ka‸ maˇ shiˍ.
66019013	Awˬ suhˍ awˬ hk'aw lo tuˍ taˍ peuˬ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ yawˇ veu‸ deh ve yoˬ. Yawˇ ve awˬ meh lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66019014	Mvuhˇ naw ma ve ma‸ moˍ ma‸ cuˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, hpuˉ-ehˍ ve iˉ mvuhˇ hta‸ ciˇ leh yawˇ awˬ hk'aˇ suh k'ai ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, hpuˉ-ehˍ ve leh da‸ kehˬ ve hpa hpu hta‸ veu‸ deh ve yoˬ.
66019015	Mvuhˇ miˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw tuˬ, yawˇ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo tcuhˆ ve aˉ htaw tawˆ la ve yoˬ. Yawˇ lehˬ, sho juˇ fuiˍ hta‸ yehˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve G'uiˬ sha ve nyi ma zuhˆ jaˇ ve a pehˉ meuˇ g'uiˬ nyiˉ kuiˬ hta‸ yawˇ naˆ tuˬ yoˬ.
66019016	Yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma leh yawˇ ve pfuhˬ teh hta‸ awˬ meh chi hk'e bvuh‸ taˍ ve, Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ awˬ hk'oˆ Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ leh, jawˇ mawˇ awˬ hk'oˆ Jawˇ mawˇ teh‸ bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66019017	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ mvuhˇ nyi awˬ hk'aw lo huˉ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ k'aw ji lo poˬ chehˇ ve ngaˆ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ yawˇ awˬ hkawˇ bvuhˬ chaweh kuˬ leh k'oˆ piˇ ve, Laˬ-o‸, G'uiˬ sha ve hti caˇ hti dawˬ ve pawehˇ lonˉ awˬ hk'aw lo hpawnˬ la-o.
66019018	Hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ shaˍ, ma‸ poˍ lonˉ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ shaˍ, awˬ g'aˇ uiˍ ve chaw hui ve awˬ shaˍ, iˉ mvuhˇ leh ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ hui ve awˬ shaˍ, vuiˬ taˍ ve awˬ ceˬ hui ve awˬ shaˍ, ponˬ ve chaw hui ve awˬ shaˍ, uiˍ ve i ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ caˇ la-o teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66019019	Oˇ htaˇ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ maˇ k'oˆ, miˬ guiˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ leh yawˇ hui ve ma‸ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ maˇ k'oˆ, iˉ mvuhˇ ciˇ ve teˇ g'aˇ leh yawˇ ve ma‸ moˍ hta‸ bawˆ da‸ tuˬ, yawˇ hui hpawnˬ da‸ chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ.
66019020	Oˇ htaˇ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hta‸ hpeh yuˬ leh, maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hta‸ htawˇ yawˇ geh teˇ geh hpeh yuˬ ve yoˬ. Maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ oˇ ve lehˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ ve yinˉ hta‸ hkanˍ yuˬ leh yawˇ ve shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ awˬ heˆ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ te maˍ piˇ paˍ teˇ g'aˇ yoˬ. Aˬ miˍ to‸ chehˇ ve ma‸ shiˉ g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ huiˉ maˬ hta‸ awˬ te‸ te‸ baˬ keu ve yoˬ.
66019021	Iˉ mvuhˇ ciˇ shehˍ hpaˇ ve maw‸ k'aw awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve aˉ htaw lehˬ, cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw pehˍ ve yoˬ. Ngaˆ hk'a peu-eˬ yawˇ hui ve awˬ shaˍ hta‸ hk'a bvuhˆ caˇ ve yoˬ.
66020001	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ mvuhˇ naw ma lo ya‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve miˬ k'oˍ ve shawˇ leh sho caˆ lonˉ hta‸ yawˇ ve la‸ sheh awˬ hk'aw lo vawˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66020002	Neˇ haiˬ leh Saˍtanˍ hpeh‸ ve cawˇ shehˍ ma hta‸ yawˇ hpeh yuˬ leh, teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ hpeh tiˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Cawˇ shehˍ ma oˇ ve lehˬ, aˬ sho-eˬ htaˇ ve vuiˬ haiˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66020003	Teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ maˇ peuˬ ve ceh ceh, chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ yawˇ maˇ g'a heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ tuˬ, leh kuiˬ maˇ cawˬ ve miˬ k'oˍ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hta‸ baˬ keu sheˬ leh, hoˆ taˍ leh yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve yoˬ. Teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, yawˇ hta‸ teˇ hkui ceh g'a hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66020004	Oˇ htaˇ, k'aw jaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. K'aw jaw oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ mui chehˇ ve chaw hui lehˬ, suhˉ jehˬ suhˉ taˆ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a taˍ ve yoˬ. Yeˍsuˆ leh G'uiˬ sha ve tawˇ hkawˇ awˬ lawn shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ ve hta‸ pa taw, oˉ k'oˍ tawˆ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve chaw hui ve co ha teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ htawˇ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ ve shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, oˉ k'oˍ maˇ pui leh, yawˇ ve yinˉ tcuhˉ taˍ ve hta‸ a shu yawˇ ve naˍ k'aˍ pui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, la‸ sheh awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, maˇ hkanˍ yuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui k'aw‸ te‸ la leh, Hkri‸ geh teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ uˉ peunˍ ve yoˬ.
66020005	Cawˬ taˍ sheˍ ve suh taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ maˇ peuˬ ve ceh ceh maˇ g'a k'aw‸ te‸ la. Chi lehˬ, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66020006	Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve k'aw‸ te‸ tu la ve teˇ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a chehˇ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ leh da‸ kehˬ ve chaw hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ yawˇ hui awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ kanˇ paˆ maˇ cawˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha leh Hkri‸ ve paw hkuˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpeh‸ leh, Hkri‸ geh teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ hk'a gaˬ uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66020007	Teˇ hinˉ hk'aw‸ peuˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, Saˍtanˍ hta‸ htawnˍ awˬ hk'aw lo hpehˇ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66020008	Miˬ guiˬ awˇ ceˍ awˍ hpawˇ lo chehˇ ve chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ leh ma‸ bawˆ tuˬ awˬ pon hpawnˬ da‸ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ tawˆ k'ai ve yoˬ. Chaw ceuˬ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, Gawˇgaˆ leh Maˍgawˇgaˆ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ shehˇ shiˍ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ maˇ ve yoˬ.
66020009	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, miˬ guiˬ hk'oˆ hk'aˬ hpawˇ chi hpawˇ taˆ-e leh, Hkri‸ yaˇ teˇ hpaˍ ve deh kuiˬ leh ha‸ ve venˇ hta‸ hoˆ taˍ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma lo aˬ miˍ ce la leh yawˇ hui hta‸ to‸ baˬ ve yoˬ.
66020010	Yawˇ hui hta‸ heˍ yuˬ beˬ yuˬ ve neˇ haiˬ hta‸ htawˇ, aˬ miˍ leh ma‸ shiˉ g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ. Oˇ kaˬ lo haiˬ ve to nuˇ to shaˆ leh maˇ heˆ heˆ ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ tanˇ hkuinˇ tanˇ vanˇ fawˉ ve mehˍ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66020011	Oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ, hpuˉ-ehˍ ve k'aw jaw lonˉ hta‸ leh k'aw jaw oˇ ve awˬ hk'oˆ lo mui shehˍ hpaˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ leh mvuhˇ naw ma lehˬ, yawˇ mehˆ g'uˇ suhˍ lo hpaw-e leh, miˬ guiˬ leh mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ pon chehˇ kuiˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ.
66020012	Suh taˍ ve chaw uiˍ chaw i hk'a peu-eˬ k'aw jaw oˇ ve awˬ g'uˇ suhˍ lo huˉ chehˇ taˍ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, li‸ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ hpeu‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Co ti‸ ha ti‸ li‸ teˇ k'oˆ hta‸ htawˇ hpeu‸ taˍ ve yoˬ. Suh peuˬ ve chaw hui te taˍ ve kanˉ teˇ hpaˍ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve hk'e, li‸ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ cuˇ leh yawˇ hui hta‸ suhˉ jehˬ ve yoˬ.
66020013	Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ lehˬ, yawˇ awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve suh peuˬ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Suh ve teˇ ceuˬ leh Suh mvuhˇ miˬ htawˇ, yawˇ hui awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve suh peuˬ ve chaw hui hta‸ chiˇ a‸ piˇ ve yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le, a shu yawˇ te taˍ ve hk'e suhˉ jehˬ ve hta‸ g'a hkanˍ ve yoˬ.
66020014	Oˇ htaˇ, Suh ve teˇ ceuˬ leh Suh mvuhˇ miˬ hta‸ aˬ miˍ g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ. Aˬ miˍ g'uiˬ po oˇ ve lehˬ, nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66020015	Co ti‸ ha ti‸ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh maˇ cawˬ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, aˬ miˍ g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo baˬ keu ve yoˬ.
66021001	Oˇ htaˇ, mvuhˇ naw ma awˬ suhˉ leh miˬ guiˬ awˬ suhˉ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˉ lawˉ ve mvuhˇ naw ma leh awˉ lawˉ ve miˬ guiˬ lehˬ, mehˉ k'ai peuˬ. Laˇ tsuhˇ g'uiˬ htawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ.
66021002	Oˇ htaˇ, da‸ kehˬ ve venˇ teh‸ k'oˆ ve Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ awˬ suhˉ lehˬ, mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ G'uiˬ sha geh lo tawˆ la leh ya‸ la chehˇ ve hta‸ ngaˬ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ tuˬ awˬ pon awˬ hkiˇ shawˍ taˍ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hk'a deh‸ gu taˍ ve yoˬ.
66021003	K'aw jaw lo bvuhˬ jaˇ ve awˬ hkawˇ hta‸ ngaˬ g'a kaˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkawˇ oˇ ve chi hk'e k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve chehˇ kuiˬ chaw yaˇ hui geh cawˬ leh, yawˇ yawˇ hui geh chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve chaw hpeh‸ leh, G'uiˬ sha awˬ to yawˇ hui geh chehˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66021004	Yawˇ lehˬ, yawˇ hui ve mehˆ g'uiˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ shiˆ baˬ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Suh ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ. Dawˇ haˍ ve, paˆ hawˬ ve, naˬ ve, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ htawˇ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˉ lawˉ htaˇ cawˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ mehˉ k'ai peuˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66021005	K'aw jaw hk'oˆ lo mui shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve, Nyi loˬ, awˬ ceuˬ hk'a peu-eˬ hta‸ ngaˬ awˬ suhˉ k'aw‸ te ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. Yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Chi hta‸ bvuh‸ taˍ-o‸. Awˬ lawn k'o, tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ.
66021006	Peuˬ leh, yawˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Peuˬ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ leh awˬ leh meuˇ hpeh‸ leh, awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ ka‸, awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve chaw hta‸ awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ yuˬ leh g'uiˬ tuˇ awˬ hk'aw lo tawˆ la ve co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ kaˆ ngaˬ taw piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66021007	G'aˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ lehˬ, awˬ shinˉ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a caˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ yawˇ ve G'uiˬ sha hpeh‸ leh, yawˇ ngaˬ ve yaˇ hpeh‸ tuˬ yoˬ.
66021008	Ya‸ hk'aˇ, kawˆ puiˉ ve chaw, maˇ yonˍ ve chaw, cha‸ chiˆ ve chaw, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve chaw, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw, neˇ te ve chaw, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw leh heˍ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ lehˬ, aˬ miˍ leh ma‸ shiˉ to‸ chehˇ ve g'uiˬ po awˬ hk'aw lo g'a hkanˍ tuˬ yoˬ. Oˇ ve lehˬ, nyiˇ pawˆ teˇ pawˆ suh ve teˇ ceuˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66021009	Oˇ htaˇ, awˬ leh meuˇ ve fawˉ mehˍ ve suhˍ ceuˬ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve mu‸ hk'u suhˍ shiˍ hta‸ vawˆ taˍ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ suhˍ g'aˇ awˬ hk'aw lo teˇ g'aˇ laˬ leh ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw leh k'oˆ laˇ ve, Laˬ-o‸, Yawˬ ehˉ ve awˬ miˇ ma hpeh‸ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ ngaˬ nawˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66021010	Yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ Awˬ ha hpu awˬ hk'aw lo uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve hk'aw pui lo shiˍ k'ai laˇ ve yoˬ. Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha geh lo tawˆ la leh mvuhˇ naw ma hk'oˆ lo ya‸ la chehˇ ve da‸ kehˬ ve Yeˍruˆsaˍlehnˍ venˇ ngaˬ hta‸ yawˇ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66021011	Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hk'a biˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ g'euˆ ba ve lehˬ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hk'e hpeh‸ leh, haˉ pui keh-oˬ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ awˬ g'euˆ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hta‸ ka‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66021012	Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, uiˍ jaˇ mvuh jaˇ ve lanˇ venˇ cawˬ leh, lanˇ venˇ yehˬ miˉ teˇ chi nyiˇ maˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ oˇ ve teˇ chi nyiˇ maˬ lo mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ Iˉsaˍreˍlaˆ ve yaˇ paˍ teˇ hpaˍ ve chaw teˇ chi nyiˇ ceuˬ ve awˬ meh bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66021013	Mvuhˇ nyi tawˆ hpawˇ lo yehˬ miˉ sheh lehˇ, awˬ na hpawˇ lo yehˬ miˉ sheh lehˇ, awˬ hawˉ hpawˇ lo yehˬ miˉ sheh lehˇ leh, mvuhˇ nyi k'ehˬ hpawˇ lo yehˬ miˉ sheh lehˇ cawˬ ve yoˬ.
66021014	Lanˇ venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ kawˍ taˍ ve haˉ pui teˇ chi nyiˇ shiˍ cawˬ leh, oˇ ve teˇ hpaˍ awˬ hk'oˆ hta‸ Yawˬ ehˉ ve tcuh yaˇ teˇ chi nyiˇ g'aˇ ve awˬ meh bvuh‸ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66021015	Ngaˬ hta‸ tawˇ yaw laˇ shehˍ hpaˇ lehˬ, venˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, lanˇ venˇ yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, lanˇ venˇ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, tehˆ nyi tuˬ, shi lo taˬ cawˬ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66021016	Venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˇ ceˍ cawˬ leh, zuhˬ hpawˇ k'ehˬ hpawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Chaw oˇ ve lehˬ, yawˇ ve lo taˬ hta‸ yehˇ leh, venˇ hta‸ tehˆ nyi ve teˇ yanˇ, teˇ meunˍ nyiˇ hinˉ hpaˍlonˍ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Zuhˬ hpawˇ k'ehˬ hpawˇ, mvuh hpawˇ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66021017	Peuˬ leh lanˇ venˇ hta‸ yawˇ tehˆ nyi leh, chaw yaˇ ve la‸ jaˆ hta‸ shawˍ k'o, teˇ ha awˇ chi awˇ jaˆ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Chaw yaˇ ve la‸ jaˆ leh mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ ve la‸ jaˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66021018	Lanˇ venˇ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ kawˍ taˍ ve yoˬ. Venˇ lehˬ, da‸ jaˇ ve shi hpeh‸ leh, mehˆ g'euˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ kehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
66021019	Lanˇ venˇ awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ teˇ hpaˍ nyi sha tuˬ, awˬ hpfuhˇ hk'aˆ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ teˇ ceuˬ le le hta‸ yuˬ leh te taˍ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ laiˉ ceuˬ cawˬ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nyiˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, naw hpui ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Sheh lehˇ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, hpuˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˍ lehˇ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, naw naˆ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66021020	Ngaˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, ga‸-ehˍ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hkaw‸ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, nyiˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Suhˍ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, shi nyi ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Hiˉ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, naw shi ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. K'awˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, shiˉ-ehˍ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Teˇ chi maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, shi naw ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Teˇ chi teˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, nyi hpui ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Teˇ chi nyiˇ maˬ teˇ maˬ lehˬ, nyi naˆ ve haˉ pui shehnˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66021021	Lanˇ venˇ yehˬ miˉ teˇ chi nyiˇ maˬ lehˬ, piˉ ko-eˍ shehnˉ teˇ chi nyiˇ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Yehˬ miˉ teˇ maˬ le le lehˬ, piˉ k'o-eˍ shehnˉ teˇ shiˍ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo cawˬ ve ya‸ k'aw lonˉ lehˬ, da‸ jaˇ ve shi hpeh‸ leh, mehˆ g'euˆ hk'a shuˍ shuˍ kehˬ da‸ ve yoˬ.
66021022	Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon yehˬ lonˉ hta‸ ngaˬ maˇ mawˬ. Awˬ lawn k'o, kanˇ paˆ uiˍ jaˇ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha leh Yawˬ ehˉ lehˬ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo bon yehˬ lonˉ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66021023	Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo mvuhˇ nyi leh ha pa awˬ g'euˆ ba tuˬ maˇ loˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, G'uiˬ sha ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ lehˬ, venˇ oˇ ve hta‸ awˬ g'euˆ ba piˇ leh, Yawˬ ehˉ lehˬ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ pon kawˆ faiˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66021024	Chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, awˬ g'euˆ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo toˇ k'ai tuˬ yoˬ. Miˬ guiˬ ve hkunˉ hawˉ hkanˇ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a shu yawˇ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ hta‸ yuˬ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
66021025	Venˇ oˇ ve yehˬ miˉ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ mvuhˇ law‸ k'aw htaˇ hk'aˬ htaˆ ka‸ maˇ hoˆ. Oˇ kaˬ lo mvuhˇ hpeu‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ htawˇ maˇ cawˬ.
66021026	Chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve awˬ me‸ awˬ hponˇ teˇ ceuˬ leh yawˆ yan ve teˇ ceuˬ venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ hui yuˬ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
66021027	Cha‸ chiˆ ve hk'aˬ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'oˆ, cha‸ chiˆ ve hta‸ te ve chaw leh, heˍ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo a ciˉ ka‸ maˇ g'a lo‸-e. Yawˬ ehˉ ve co ti‸ ha ti‸ li‸ awˬ hk'aw lo awˬ meh bvuh‸ taˍ ve chaw teˇ hpaˍ ceh tiˉ g'a lo‸-e ve yoˬ.
66022001	Oˇ htaˇ, G'uiˬ sha leh Yawˬ ehˉ ve k'aw jaw lo tawˆ la leh venˇ oˇ ve ya‸ k'aw lonˉ awˬ k'aw ji lo yoˬ ya‸ k'ai chehˇ ve, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ kaˆ lawˬ yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve yoˬ. Iˉ kaˆ oˇ ve lehˬ, kehˬ da‸ jaˇ ve haˉ pui keh-oˬ hta‸ shuˍ ve yoˬ.
66022002	Iˉ kaˆ lawˬ oˇ ve nyiˇ hpawˇ hpawˇ lo co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ shiˍ cehˬ cawˬ ve yoˬ. Iˉ shiˍ cehˬ oˇ ve lehˬ, awˬ shiˍ teˇ chi nyiˇ ceuˬ naw‸ leh, ha pa teˇ maˬ le le awˬ shiˍ naw‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hpa‸ teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, chaw ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ ve naˬ ve gawˬ ve hta‸ na-e la piˇ tuˬ awˬ pon yoˬ.
66022003	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, teˇ ceuˬ ka‸ hkeu ve hta‸ maˇ g'a hkanˍ. Venˇ oˇ ve awˬ hk'aw lo G'uiˬ sha leh Yawˬ ehˉ ve k'aw jaw cawˬ leh, yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ yoˬ.
66022004	Yawˇ hui lehˬ, yawˇ ve mehˆ hpfuhˇ hta‸ g'a mawˬ leh, yawˇ hui ve naˍ k'aˍ pui lo yawˇ ve awˬ meh cawˬ taˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66022005	Awˬ hk'aw‸ nawˉ k'o, mvuhˇ hpeu‸ ve teˇ ceuˬ maˇ k'aw‸ cawˬ. Kawˆ faiˇ awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, mvuhˇ nyi awˬ g'euˆ hta‸ maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui maˇ loˍ. Awˬ lawn k'o, Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ, yawˇ hui hta‸ awˬ g'euˆ ba piˇ tuˬ yoˬ. Yawˇ hui lehˬ, co co taiˍ taiˍ g'a uˉ peunˍ tuˬ yoˬ.
66022006	Mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ pawˆ k'aw‸ k'oˆ ve, Tawˇ hkawˇ chi teˇ hpaˍ lehˬ, ka ti‸ yeˬ leh hteˇ ve cawˇ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui ve nyi ma hta‸ uˉ peunˍ ve Jawˇ mawˇ G'uiˬ sha lehˬ maˇ maw maw hpeh‸ la tuˬ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ yawˇ ve awˬ ceˬ teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ maˍ piˇ tuˬ, yawˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hta‸ peu laˇ peuˬ ve yoˬ.
66022007	Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ haˆ haˆ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66022008	Ngaˬ awˬ to Yoˇhanˬ lehˬ, awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a kaˇ g'a mawˬ ve yoˬ. Chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ g'a kaˇ g'a mawˬ peuˬ hkaw‸ nawˉ, ngaˬ hta‸ maˍ laˇ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ teˇ g'aˇ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui tuˬ, yawˇ ve hkui paˇ lo ngaˬ boˆ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66022009	Yawˇ k'oˆ ve, Chi hk'e taˇ te. Ngaˬ htawˇ nawˬ geh teˇ geh awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Nawˬ ve awˬ viˉ awˬ nyi hpeh‸ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ hui geh maˇ k'oˆ, li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ na yuˬ leh te ve chaw hui geh maˇ k'oˆ, yawˇ hui geh teˇ geh htawˇ ngaˬ awˬ ceˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. G'uiˬ sha hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui-o teh‸, ngaˬ hta‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve yoˬ.
66022010	Peuˬ leh yawˇ ngaˬ hta‸ k'aw‸ k'oˆ laˇ ve, Li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ yinˉ taˇ tcuhˉ. Awˬ lawn k'o, awˬ yanˇ neˇ la peuˬ.
66022011	Maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve chaw lehˬ, maˇ hteˇ maˇ cawˇ ve hta‸ te piˇ sheˍ. Cha‸ chiˆ ve chaw lehˬ, cha‸ chiˆ ve hta‸ te piˇ sheˍ. Hteˇ ve cawˇ ve chaw lehˬ, hteˇ ve cawˇ ve hta‸ te piˇ sheˍ. Da‸ kehˬ ve chaw lehˬ, da‸ kehˬ ve hta‸ te piˇ sheˍ.
66022012	Nyi loˬ, ngaˬ haˆ haˆ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ. Chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le, a shu yawˇ te taˍ ve hta‸ keunˍ da‸ ve hk'e piˇ tuˬ, la‸ shawnˍ hta‸ ngaˬ yuˬ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
66022013	Ngaˬ lehˬ Aˍlaˍhpaˆ leh Awˇmeˍgaˆ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ hkuiˉ puiˍ leh awˬ leh meuˇ htawˇ ngaˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˉ lawˉ peuˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ ka‸, awˬ leh meuˇ ve awˬ ceuˬ ka‸ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66022014	Co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ shiˍ cehˬ lo laˬ tuˬ a hkaw-anˬ g'a tuˬ leh, lanˇ venˇ yehˬ miˉ awˬ hk'aw lo g'a lo‸-e tuˬ awˬ pon, a shu yawˇ ve aˉ po‸ zuhˬ ma hta‸ tsuhˇ baˬ ve chaw lehˬ, awˬ bon uiˍ ve yoˬ.
66022015	Awˬ baˬ hpawˇ lo lehˬ, hpuiˇ hk'e ve chaw, neˇ te ve chaw, haˉ chawˇ haˉ paˆ te ve chaw, shu hta‸ tiˇ pehˍ ve chaw, shaˉ ho‸ hta‸ oˉ k'oˍ pui ve chaw leh, heˍ ve hta‸ tiˉ te gaˇ leh heˍ chehˇ ve chaw hk'a peu-eˬ chehˇ taˍ ve yoˬ.
66022016	Ngaˬ Yeˍsuˆ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ awˬ moˍ teˇ hpaˍ awˬ pon awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ nawˬ hui hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ tuˬ, ngaˬ ve mvuhˇ naw ma tcuh yaˇ hta‸ peu laˇ ve yoˬ. Ngaˬ lehˬ, Daˍviˆ ve awˬ geu leh awˬ ceuˬ awˬ hk'aˇ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ. Awˬ g'euˆ ba hehnˇ jaˇ ve peuˬ tawˆ htawˇ ngaˬ hpeh‸ ve yoˬ.
66022017	Awˬ ha hpu leh awˬ hpawˇ heuˆ tuˬ ve yaˇ miˇ haˉ k'oˆ ve, Laˬ-o‸. G'a kaˇ ve chaw htawˇ, Laˬ-o‸ teh‸ shu hta‸ k'oˆ piˇ-oˆ. Iˉ kaˆ shiˉ ve chaw laˬ piˇ lawˬ-o‸. Dawˬ gaˇ ve chaw hk'aˬ ve teˇ g'aˇ maˇ k'oˆ, awˬ hpfuhˇ maˇ piˇ leh co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ kaˆ hta‸ dawˬ piˇ lawˬ-o‸.
66022018	Li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ hta‸ g'a kaˇ ve chaw teˇ g'aˇ le le hta‸ ngaˬ chi hk'e shaˍ ti‸ pe‸ laˇ ve yoˬ. Awˬ ceuˬ chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ htehˍ piˇ ve k'o, li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve fawˉ mehˍ ve teˇ hpaˍ G'uiˬ sha yawˇ hta‸ k'aw‸ htehˍ piˇ tuˬ yoˬ.
66022019	G'uiˬ sha ve tcuh kaˍ paˍ ve tawˇ hkawˇ bvuh‸ taˍ ve li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo tawˇ hkawˇ teˇ hpaˍ hpaˍ hta‸ chaw teˇ g'aˇ g'aˇ yuˬ baˬ ve k'o, li‸ chi awˬ hk'aw lo bvuh‸ taˍ ve awˬ ceuˬ teˇ hpaˍ, co ha te‸ piˇ lawˬ ve iˉ shiˍ cehˬ leh da‸ kehˬ ve venˇ awˬ hk'aw lo yawˇ g'a tuˬ ve teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ G'uiˬ sha yuˬ baˬ tuˬ yoˬ.
66022020	Awˬ lawn chi teˇ hpaˍ hta‸ shaˉ hkiˆ hkanˍ shehˍ hpaˇ k'oˆ ve, Awˬ tehˬ awˬ na ngaˬ haˆ haˆ laˬ tuˬ yoˬ teh‸ k'oˆ ve yoˬ. A menˬ, Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ-oˬ, laˬ-o‸.
66022021	Jawˇ mawˇ Yeˍsuˆ ve awˬ bon awˬ shinˉ lehˬ, Hkri‸ yaˇ hui geh cawˬ piˇ-oˆ.
